 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam
 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
 śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujam
 prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye
 oṃ vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam
 parāśarātmajaṃ vande śukatātaṃ taponidhim
 vyāsāya viṣṇurūpāya vyāsarūpāya viṣṇave
 namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a evaṃ dyūtajitāḥ pārthāḥ kopitāś ca durātmabhiḥ
c dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sahāmātyair nikṛtyā dvijasattama
a śrāvitāḥ paruṣā vācaḥ sṛjadbhir vairam uttamam
c kim akurvanta kauravyā mama pūrvapitāmahāḥ
a kathaṃ caiśvaryavibhraṣṭāḥ sahasā duḥkham eyuṣaḥ
c vane vijahrire pārthāḥ śakrapratimatejasaḥ
a ke cainān anvavartanta prāptān vyasanam uttamam
c kimāhārāḥ kimācārāḥ kva ca vāso mahātmanām
a kathaṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane teṣāṃ mahātmanām
c vyatīyur brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha śūrāṇām arighātinām
a kathaṃ ca rājaputrī sā pravarā sarvayoṣitām
c pativratā mahābhāgā satataṃ satyavādinī
e vanavāsam aduḥkhārhā dāruṇaṃ pratyapadyata
a etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ vistareṇa tapodhana
c śrotum icchāmi caritaṃ bhūridraviṇatejasām
e kathyamānaṃ tvayā vipra paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ dyūtajitāḥ pārthāḥ kopitāś ca durātmabhiḥ
c dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ sahāmātyair niryayur gajasāhvayāt
a vardhamānapuradvāreṇābhiniṣkramya te tadā
c udaṅmukhāḥ śastrabhṛtaḥ prayayuḥ saha kṛṣṇayā
a indrasenādayaś cainān bhṛtyāḥ paricaturdaśa
c rathair anuyayuḥ śīghraiḥ striya ādāya sarvaśaḥ
d tatas te puruṣavyāghrā rathān āsthāya bhārata
d dadṛśur jāhnavītīre pramāṇākhyaṃ mahāvaṭam
a vrajatas tān viditvā tu paurāḥ śokābhipīḍitāḥ
c garhayanto 'sakṛd bhīṣmaviduradroṇagautamān
e ūcur vigatasaṃtrāsāḥ samāgamya parasparam
a nedam asti kulaṃ sarvaṃ na vayaṃ na ca no gṛhāḥ
c yatra duryodhanaḥ pāpaḥ saubaleyena pālitaḥ
e karṇaduḥśāsanābhyāṃ ca rājyam etac cikīrṣati
a no cet kulaṃ na cācāro na dharmo 'rthaḥ kutaḥ sukham
c yatra pāpasahāyo 'yaṃ pāpo rājyaṃ bubhūṣate
a duryodhano gurudveṣī tyaktācārasuhṛjjanaḥ
c arthalubdho 'bhimānī ca nīcaḥ prakṛtinirghṛṇaḥ
a neyam asti mahī kṛtsnā yatra duryodhano nṛpaḥ
c sādhu gacchāmahe sarve yatra gacchanti pāṇḍavāḥ
a sānukrośā mahātmāno vijitendriyaśatravaḥ
c hrīmantaḥ kīrtimantaś ca dharmācāraparāyaṇāḥ
a evam uktvānujagmus tān pāṇḍavāṃs te sametya ca
c ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve tān kuntīmādrinandanān
a kva gamiṣyatha bhadraṃ vas tyaktvāsmān duḥkhabhāginaḥ
c vayam apy anuyāsyāmo yatra yūyaṃ gamiṣyatha
a adharmeṇa jitāñ śrutvā yuṣmāṃs tyaktaghṛṇaiḥ paraiḥ
c udvignāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ sarve nāsmān hātum ihārhatha
a bhaktānuraktāḥ suhṛdaḥ sadā priyahite ratān
c kurājādhiṣṭhite rājye na vinaśyema sarvaśaḥ
a śrūyatāṃ cābhidhāsyāmo guṇadoṣān nararṣabhāḥ
c śubhāśubhādhivāsena saṃsargaṃ kurute yathā
a vastram āpas tilān bhūmiṃ gandho vāsayate yathā
c puṣpāṇām adhivāsena tathā saṃsargajā guṇāḥ
a mohajālasya yonir hi mūḍhair eva samāgamaḥ
c ahany ahani dharmasya yoniḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ
a tasmāt prājñaiś ca vṛddhaiś ca susvabhāvais tapasvibhiḥ
c sadbhiś ca saha saṃsargaḥ kāryaḥ śamaparāyaṇaiḥ
a yeṣāṃ trīṇy avadātāni yonir vidyā ca karma ca
c tān sevet taiḥ samāsyā hi śāstrebhyo 'pi garīyasī
a nirārambhā hy api vayaṃ puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
c puṇyam evāpnuyāmeha pāpaṃ pāpopasevanāt
a asatāṃ darśanāt sparśāt saṃjalpanasahāsanāt
c dharmācārāḥ prahīyante na ca sidhyanti mānavāḥ
a buddhiś ca hīyate puṃsāṃ nīcaiḥ saha samāgamāt
c madhyamair madhyatāṃ yāti śreṣṭhatāṃ yāti cottamaiḥ
d anīcair nāpy aviṣayair nādharmiṣṭhair viśeṣataḥ
a ye guṇāḥ kīrtitā loke dharmakāmārthasaṃbhavāḥ
c lokācārātmasaṃbhūtā vedoktāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥ
a te yuṣmāsu samastāś ca vyastāś caiveha sadguṇāḥ
c icchāmo guṇavan madhye vastuṃ śreyo 'bhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dhanyā vayaṃ yad asmākaṃ snehakāruṇyayantritāḥ
c asato 'pi guṇān āhur brāhmaṇapramukhāḥ prajāḥ
a tad ahaṃ bhrātṛsahitaḥ sarvān vijñāpayāmi vaḥ
c nānyathā tad dhi kartavyam asmatsnehānukampayā
a bhīṣmaḥ pitāmaho rājā viduro jananī ca me
c suhṛjjanaś ca prāyo me nagare nāgasāhvaye
a te tv asmaddhitakāmārthaṃ pālanīyāḥ prayatnataḥ
c yuṣmābhiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ śokasaṃtāpavihvalāḥ
a nivartatāgatā dūraṃ samāgamanaśāpitāḥ
c svajane nyāsabhūte me kāryā snehānvitā matiḥ
a etad dhi mama kāryāṇāṃ paramaṃ hṛdi saṃsthitam
c sukṛtānena me tuṣṭiḥ satkāraś ca bhaviṣyati
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tathānumantritās tena dharmarājena tāḥ prajāḥ
c cakrur ārtasvaraṃ ghoraṃ hā rājann iti duḥkhitāḥ
a guṇān pārthasya saṃsmṛtya duḥkhārtāḥ paramāturāḥ
c akāmāḥ saṃnyavartanta samāgamyātha pāṇḍavān
a nivṛtteṣu tu paureṣu rathān āsthāya pāṇḍavāḥ
c prajagmur jāhnavītīre pramāṇākhyaṃ mahāvaṭam
a taṃ te divasaśeṣeṇa vaṭaṃ gatvā tu pāṇḍavāḥ
c ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ vīrāḥ saṃspṛśya salilaṃ śuci
e udakenaiva tāṃ rātrim ūṣus te duḥkhakarśitāḥ
a anujagmuś ca tatraitān snehāt ke cid dvijātayaḥ
c sāgnayo 'nagnayaś caiva saśiṣyagaṇabāndhavāḥ
e sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā śuśubhe brahmavādibhiḥ
a teṣāṃ prāduṣkṛtāgnīnāṃ muhūrte ramyadāruṇe
c brahmaghoṣapuraskāraḥ saṃjalpaḥ samajāyata
a rājānaṃ tu kuruśreṣṭhaṃ te haṃsamadhurasvarāḥ
c āśvāsayanto viprāgryāḥ kṣapāṃ sarvāṃ vyanodayan
d rājā tu bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ tathā sarvaiḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥ
d aśeta tāṃ niśāṃ rājā duḥkhaśokasamāhataḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ teṣām akliṣṭakarmaṇām
c vanaṃ yiyāsatāṃ viprās tasthur bhikṣābhujo 'grataḥ
e tān uvāca tato rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a vayaṃ hi hṛtasarvasvā hṛtarājyā hṛtaśriyaḥ
c phalamūlāmiṣāhārā vanaṃ yāsyāma duḥkhitāḥ
a vanaṃ ca doṣabahulaṃ bahuvyālasarīsṛpam
c parikleśaś ca vo manye dhruvaṃ tatra bhaviṣyati
a brāhmaṇānāṃ parikleśo daivatāny api sādayet
c kiṃ punar mām ito viprā nivartadhvaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ
 brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ
a gatir yā bhavatāṃ rājaṃs tāṃ vayaṃ gantum udyatāḥ
c nārhathāsmān parityaktuṃ bhaktān saddharmadarśinaḥ
a anukampāṃ hi bhakteṣu daivatāny api kurvate
c viśeṣato brāhmaṇeṣu sadācārāvalambiṣu
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mamāpi paramā bhaktir brāhmaṇeṣu sadā dvijāḥ
c sahāyaviparibhraṃśas tv ayaṃ sādayatīva mām
a āhareyur hi me ye 'pi phalamūlamṛgāṃs tathā
c ta ime śokajair duḥkhair bhrātaro me vimohitāḥ
a draupadyā viprakarṣeṇa rājyāpaharaṇena ca
c duḥkhānvitān imān kleśair nāhaṃ yoktum ihotsahe
 brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ
a asmatpoṣaṇajā cintā mā bhūt te hṛdi pārthiva
c svayam āhṛtya vanyāni anuyāsyāmahe vayam
a anudhyānena japyena vidhāsyāmaḥ śivaṃ tava
c kathābhiś cānukūlābhiḥ saha raṃsyāmahe vane
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a evam etan na saṃdeho rameyaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
c nyūnabhāvāt tu paśyāmi pratyādeśam ivātmanaḥ
a kathaṃ drakṣyāmi vaḥ sarvān svayam āhṛtabhojanān
c madbhaktyā kliśyato 'narhān dhik pāpān dhṛtarāṣṭrajān
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity uktvā sa nṛpaḥ śocan niṣasāda mahītale
c tam adhyātmaratir vidvāñ śaunako nāma vai dvijaḥ
e yoge sāṃkhye ca kuśalo rājānam idam abravīt
a śokasthānasahasrāṇi bhayasthānaśatāni ca
c divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
a na hi jñānaviruddheṣu bahudoṣeṣu karmasu
c śreyoghātiṣu sajjante buddhimanto bhavadvidhāḥ
a aṣṭāṅgāṃ buddhim āhur yāṃ sarvāśreyovighātinīm
c śrutismṛtisamāyuktāṃ sā rājaṃs tvayy avasthitā
d śuśrūṣā śravaṇaṃ caiva grahaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ tathā
d ūhāpoho 'pi vijñānaṃ tattvajñānaṃ ca dhīguṇāḥ
a arthakṛcchreṣu durgeṣu vyāpatsu svajanasya ca
c śārīramānasair duḥkhair na sīdanti bhavadvidhāḥ
a śrūyatāṃ cābhidhāsyāmi janakena yathā purā
c ātmavyavasthānakarā gītāḥ ślokā mahātmanā
a manodehasamutthābhyāṃ duḥkhābhyām arditaṃ jagat
c tayor vyāsasamāsābhyāṃ śamopāyam imaṃ śṛṇu
d vyādhayo 'tra śarīre 'smin vātapittakaphodbhavāḥ
d ajīrṇaprabhavāḥ sarve duḥkhāḥ pāpodbhavās tathā
a vyādher aniṣṭasaṃsparśāc chramād iṣṭavivarjanāt
c duḥkhaṃ caturbhiḥ śārīraṃ kāraṇaiḥ saṃpravartate
a tad āśupratikārāc ca satataṃ cāvicintanāt
c ādhivyādhipraśamanaṃ kriyāyogadvayena tu
a matimanto hy ato vaidyāḥ śamaṃ prāg eva kurvate
c mānasasya priyākhyānaiḥ saṃbhogopanayair nṛṇām
a mānasena hi duḥkhena śarīram upatapyate
c ayaḥpiṇḍena taptena kumbhasaṃstham ivodakam
a mānasaṃ śamayet tasmāj jñānenāgnim ivāmbunā
c praśānte mānase duḥkhe śārīram upaśāmyati
a manaso duḥkhamūlaṃ tu sneha ity upalabhyate
c snehāt tu sajjate jantur duḥkhayogam upaiti ca
a snehamūlāni duḥkhāni snehajāni bhayāni ca
c śokaharṣau tathāyāsaḥ sarvaṃ snehāt pravartate
a snehāt karaṇarāgaś ca prajajñe vaiṣayas tathā
c aśreyaskāv ubhāv etau pūrvas tatra guruḥ smṛtaḥ
a koṭarāgnir yathāśeṣaṃ samūlaṃ pādapaṃ dahet
c dharmārthinaṃ tathālpo 'pi rāgadoṣo vināśayet
a viprayoge na tu tyāgī doṣadarśī samāgamāt
c virāgaṃ bhajate jantur nirvairo niṣparigrahaḥ
a tasmāt snehaṃ svapakṣebhyo mitrebhyo dhanasaṃcayāt
c svaśarīrasamutthaṃ tu jñānena vinivartayet
a jñānānviteṣu mukhyeṣu śāstrajñeṣu kṛtātmasu
c na teṣu sajjate snehaḥ padmapatreṣv ivodakam
a rāgābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmena parikṛṣyate
c icchā saṃjāyate tasya tatas tṛṣṇā pravartate
a tṛṣṇā hi sarvapāpiṣṭhā nityodvegakarī nṛṇām
c adharmabahulā caiva ghorā pāpānubandhinī
a yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
c yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
a anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antardehagatā nṛṇām
c vināśayati saṃbhūtā ayonija ivānalaḥ
a yathaidhaḥ svasamutthena vahninā nāśam ṛcchati
c tathākṛtātmā lobhena sahajena vinaśyati
a rājataḥ salilād agneś corataḥ svajanād api
b arthibhyaḥ kālatas tasmān nityam arthavatāṃ bhayam
c bhayam arthavatāṃ nityaṃ mṛtyoḥ prāṇabhṛtām iva
a yathā hy āmiṣam ākāśe pakṣibhiḥ śvāpadair bhuvi
c bhakṣyate salile matsyais tathā sarveṇa vittavān
a artha eva hi keṣāṃ cid anartho bhavitā nṛṇām
c arthaśreyasi cāsakto na śreyo vindate naraḥ
e tasmād arthāgamāḥ sarve manomohavivardhanāḥ
a kārpaṇyaṃ darpamānau ca bhayam udvega eva ca
c arthajāni viduḥ prājñā duḥkhāny etāni dehinām
a arthasyopārjane duḥkhaṃ pālane ca kṣaye tathā
c nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ ghnanti caivārthakāraṇāt
a arthā duḥkhaṃ parityaktuṃ pālitāś cāpi te 'sukhāḥ
c duḥkhena cādhigamyante teṣāṃ nāśaṃ na cintayet
a asaṃtoṣaparā mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ
c anto nāsti pipāsāyāḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
a tasmāt saṃtoṣam eveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ
c anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥ
e aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyed eṣu na paṇḍitaḥ
a tyajeta saṃcayāṃs tasmāt tajjaṃ kleśaṃ saheta kaḥ
c na hi saṃcayavān kaś cid dṛśyate nirupadravaḥ
a ataś ca dharmibhiḥ pumbhir anīhārthaḥ praśasyate
b dharmārthaṃ yasya vittehā varaṃ tasya nirīhatā
c prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varam
a yudhiṣṭhiraivam artheṣu na spṛhāṃ kartum arhasi
c dharmeṇa yadi te kāryaṃ vimukteccho bhavārthataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a nārthopabhogalipsārtham iyam arthepsutā mama
c bharaṇārthaṃ tu viprāṇāṃ brahman kāṅkṣe na lobhataḥ
a kathaṃ hy asmadvidho brahman vartamāno gṛhāśrame
c bharaṇaṃ pālanaṃ cāpi na kuryād anuyāyinām
a saṃvibhāgo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva śiṣyate
c tathaivāpacamānebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ gṛhamedhinā
a tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk caturthī ca sūnṛtā
c satām etāni geheṣu nocchidyante kadā cana
a deyam ārtasya śayanaṃ sthitaśrāntasya cāsanam
c tṛṣitasya ca pānīyaṃ kṣudhitasya ca bhojanam
a cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtām
b utthāya cāsanaṃ dadyād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c pratyudgamyābhigamanaṃ kuryān nyāyena cārcanam
a aghihotram anaḍvāṃś ca jñātayo 'tithibāndhavāḥ
c putradārabhṛtāś caiva nirdaheyur apūjitāḥ
a nātmārthaṃ pācayed annaṃ na vṛthā ghātayet paśūn
c na ca tat svayam aśnīyād vidhivad yan na nirvapet
a śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca vayobhyaś cāvaped bhuvi
c vaiśvadevaṃ hi nāmaitat sāyaṃprātar vidhīyate
a vighasāśī bhavet tasmān nityaṃ cāmṛtabhojanaḥ
c vighasaṃ bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yajñaśeṣaṃ tathāmṛtam
d cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtām
d anuvrajed upāsīta sa yajñaḥ pañcadakṣiṇaḥ
d yo dadyād aparikliṣṭam adhvani vartate
d śrāntāyādṛṣṭapūrvāya tasya puṇyaphalaṃ mahat
a etāṃ yo vartate vṛttiṃ vartamāno gṛhāśrame
c tasya dharmaṃ paraṃ prāhuḥ kathaṃ vā vipra manyase
 śaunaka uvāca
a aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ viparītam idaṃ jagat
c yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhus tena tuṣyati
a śiśnodarakṛte 'prājñaḥ karoti vighasaṃ bahu
c moharāgasamākrānta indriyārthavaśānugaḥ
a hriyate budhyamāno 'pi naro hāribhir indriyaiḥ
c vimūḍhasaṃjño duṣṭāśvair udbhrāntair iva sārathiḥ
a ṣaḍindriyāṇi viṣayaṃ samāgacchanti vai yadā
c tadā prādurbhavaty eṣāṃ pūrvasaṃkalpajaṃ manaḥ
a mano yasyendriyagrāmaviṣayaṃ prati coditam
c tasyautsukyaṃ saṃbhavati pravṛttiś copajāyate
a tataḥ saṃkalpavīryeṇa kāmena viṣayeṣubhiḥ
c viddhaḥ patati lobhāgnau jyotir lobhāt pataṃgavat
a tato vihārair āhārair mohitaś ca viśāṃ pate
c mahāmohamukhe magno nātmānam avabudhyate
a evaṃ patati saṃsāre tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
c avidyākarmatṛṣṇābhir bhrāmyamāṇo 'tha cakravat
a brahmādiṣu tṛṇānteṣu hūteṣu parivartate
c jale bhuvi tathākāśe jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
a abudhānāṃ gatis tv eṣā budhānām api me śṛṇu
c ye dharme śreyasi ratā vimokṣaratayo janāḥ
a yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
c tasmād dharmān imān sarvān nābhimānāt samācaret
a ijyādhyayanadānāni tapaḥ satyaṃ kṣamā damaḥ
c alobha iti mārgo 'yaṃ dharmasyāṣṭavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ
a tatra pūrvaś caturvargaḥ pitṛyānapathe sthitaḥ
c kartavyam iti yat kāryaṃ nābhimānāt samācaret
a uttaro devayānas tu sadbhir ācaritaḥ sadā
c aṣṭāṅgenaiva mārgeṇa viśuddhātmā samācaret
a samyak saṃkalpasaṃbandhāt samyak cendriyanigrahāt
c samyag vrataviśeṣāc ca samyak ca gurusevanāt
a samyag āhārayogāc ca samyak cādhyayanāgamāt
c samyak karmopasaṃnyāsāt samyak cittanirodhanāt
e evaṃ karmāṇi kurvanti saṃsāravijigīṣavaḥ
a rāgadveṣavinirmuktā aiśvaryaṃ devatā gatāḥ
c rudrāḥ sādhyās tathādityā vasavo 'thāśvināv api
e yogaiśvaryeṇa saṃyuktā dhārayanti prajā imāḥ
a tathā tvam api kaunteya śamam āsthāya puṣkalam
c tapasā siddhim anviccha yogasiddhiṃ ca bhārata
a pitṛmātṛmayī siddhiḥ prāptā karmamayī ca te
c tapasā siddhim anviccha dvijānāṃ bharaṇāya vai
a siddhā hi yad yad icchanti kurvate tad anugrahāt
c tasmāt tapaḥ samāsthāya kuruṣvātmamanoratham
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śaunakenaivam uktas tu kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c purohitam upāgamya bhrātṛmadhye 'bravīd idam

c na cāsmi pālane śakto bahuduḥkhasamanvitaḥ
a parityaktuṃ na śaknomi dānaśaktiś ca nāsti me
c katham atra mayā kāryaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me

a rājāno hi mahātmāno yonikarmaviśodhitāḥ
c uddharanti prajāḥ sarvās tapa āsthāya puṣkalam
a bhīmena kārtavīryeṇa vainyena nahuṣeṇa ca

a tathā tvam api dharmātman karmaṇā ca viśodhitaḥ
c tapa āsthāya dharmeṇa dvijātīn bhara bhārata
a evam uktas tu dhaumyena tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
b vipratyāgasamādhisthaḥ saṃyatātmā dṛḍhavrataḥ
b tatas tv adhyāpayām āsa mantraṃ sarvārthasādhakam
b aṣṭākṣaraṃ paraṃ mantram ārtasya satataṃ priyam
c dharmarājo viśuddhātmā tapa ātiṣṭhad uttamam

b so 'vagāhya jalaṃ rājā devasyābhimukho 'bhavat
c yogam āsthāya dharmātmā vāyubhakṣo jitendriyaḥ
e gāṅgeyaṃ vāry upaspṛṣya prāṇāyāmena tasthivān
f śuciḥ prayatavāg bhūtvā stotram ārabdhavāṃs tataḥ
f yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
f tvaṃ bhāno jagataś cakṣus tvam ātmā sarvadehinām
f tvaṃ yoniḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvam ācāraḥ kriyāvatām
f tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvasāṃkhyānāṃ yogināṃ tvaṃ parāyaṇam
f anāvṛtārgaladvāraṃ tvaṃ gatis tvaṃ mumukṣatām
f tvayā saṃdhāryate lokas tvayā lokaḥ prakāśyate

f svaśākhāvihitair mantrair arcanty ṛṣigaṇārcitam
f tava divyaṃ rathaṃ yāntam anuyānti varārthinaḥ
f siddhacāraṇagandharvā yakṣaguhyakapannagāḥ
f trayastriṃśac ca vai devās tathā vaimānikā gaṇāḥ
f sopendrāḥ samahendrāś ca tvām iṣṭvā siddhim āgatāḥ
f upayānty arcayitvā tu tvāṃ vai prāptamanorathāḥ
f divyamandāramālābhis tūrṇaṃ vidyādharottamāḥ
f guhyāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ sapta ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
f te pūjayitvā tvām eva gacchantyāśu pradhānatām
f vasavo maruto rudrā ye ca sādhyā marīcipāḥ
f vālakhilyādayaḥ siddhāḥ śreṣṭhatvaṃ prāṇināṃ gatāḥ
f sabrahmakeṣu lokeṣu saptasv apy akhileṣu ca
f na tad bhūtam ahaṃ manye yad arkād atiricyate
f santi cānyāni sattvāni vīryavanti mahānti ca
f na tu teṣāṃ tathā dīptiḥ prabhāvo vā yathā tava
f jyotīṃṣi tvayi sarvāṇi tvaṃ sarvajyotiṣāṃ patiḥ
f tvayi satyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca sarve bhāvāś ca sāttvikāḥ
f tvattejasā kṛtaṃ cakraṃ sunābhaṃ viśvakarmaṇā
f devārīṇāṃ mado yena nāśitaḥ śārṅgadhanvanā

f sarvauṣadhirasānāṃ ca punar varṣāsu muñcasi
f tapanty anye dahanty anye garjanty anye tathā ghanāḥ
f vidyotante pravarṣanti tava prāvṛṣi raśmayaḥ
f na tathā sukhayaty agnir na prāvārā na kambalāḥ
f śītavātārditaṃ loke yathā tava marīcayaḥ
f trayodaśadvīpavatīṃ gobhir bhāsayase mahīm
f trayāṇām api lokānāṃ hitāyaikaḥ pravartase
f tava yady udayo na syād andhaṃ jagad idaṃ bhavet
f na ca dharmārthakāmeṣu pravarteran manīṣiṇaḥ
f ādhānapaśubandheṣṭimantrayajñatapaḥkriyāḥ
f tvatprasādād avāpyante brahmakṣatraviśāṃ gaṇaiḥ
f yad ahar brahmaṇaḥ proktaṃ sahasrayugasaṃmitam
f tasya tvam ādir antaś ca kālajñaiḥ parikīrtitaḥ
f manūnāṃ manuputrāṇāṃ jagato 'mānavasya ca
f manvantarāṇāṃ sarveṣām īśvarāṇāṃ tvam īśvaraḥ
f saṃhārakāle saṃprāpte tava krodhaviniḥsṛtaḥ
f saṃvartakāgnis trailokyaṃ bhasmīkṛtyāvatiṣṭhate
f tvaddīdhitisamutpannā nānāvarṇā mahāghanāḥ
f sairāvatāḥ sāśanayaḥ kurvanty ābhūtasaṃplavam
f kṛtvā dvādaśadhātmānaṃ dvādaśādityatāṃ gataḥ
f saṃhṛtyaikārṇavaṃ sarvaṃ tvaṃ śoṣayasi raśmibhiḥ
f tvām indram āhus tvaṃ rudras tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
f tvam agnis tvaṃ manaḥ sūkṣmaṃ prabhus tvaṃ brahma śāśvatam
f tvaṃ haṃsaḥ savitā bhānur aṃśumālī vṛṣākapiḥ
f vivasvān mihiraḥ pūṣā mitro dharmas tathaiva ca
f sahasraraśmir ādityas tapanas tvaṃ gavāṃ patiḥ
f mārtaṇḍo 'rko raviḥ sūryaḥ śaraṇyo dinakṛt tathā
f divākaraḥ saptasaptir dhāmakeśī virocanaḥ
f āśugāmī tamoghnaś ca haritāśvaś ca kīrtyase
f saptamyām atha vā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhaktyā pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ
f anirviṇṇo 'nahaṃkārī taṃ lakṣmīr bhajate naram
f na teṣām āpadaḥ santi nādhayo vyādhayas tathā
f ye tavānanyamanasaḥ kurvanty arcanavandanam
f sarvarogair virahitāḥ sarvapāpavivarjitāḥ
f tvadbhāvabhaktāḥ sukhino bhavanti cirajīvinaḥ
f tvaṃ mamāpy annakāmasya sarvātithyaṃ cikīrṣataḥ
f annam annapate dātum abhitaḥ śraddhayārhasi
f ye ca te 'nucarāḥ sarve pādopāntaṃ samāśritāḥ
f māṭharāruṇadaṇḍādyās tāṃs tān vande 'śanikṣubhān
f kṣubhayā sahitā maitrī yāś cānyā bhūtamātaraḥ
f tāś ca sarvā namasyāmi pāntu māṃ śaraṇāgatam
f vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
f evaṃ stuto mahārāja bhāskaro lokabhāvanaḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
 puṣpopahārair balibhir bahuśaś ca yathāvidhi
 sarvātmabhūtaṃ saṃpūjya yataprāṇo jitendriyaḥ
a kathaṃ kurūṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sa tu rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c viprārtham ārādhitavān sūryam adbhutavikramam
d mayi sneho 'sti ced brahman yady anugrahabhāg aham
d bhagavan nāsti ced guhyaṃ tac ca me brūhi sāṃpratam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājañ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ
c kṣaṇaṃ ca kuru rājendra sarvaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
a dhaumyena tu yatha proktaṃ pārthāya sumahātmane
c nāmnām aṣṭaśataṃ puṇyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāmate
a sūryo 'ryamā bhagas tvaṣṭā pūṣārkaḥ savitā raviḥ
c gabhastimān ajaḥ kālo mṛtyur dhātā prabhākaraḥ
a pṛthivy āpaś ca tejaś ca khaṃ vāyuś ca parāyaṇam
c somo bṛhaspatiḥ śukro budho 'ṅgāraka eva ca
a indro vivasvān dīptāṃśuḥ śuciḥ śauriḥ śanaiścaraḥ

a vaidyuto jāṭharaś cāgnir aindhanas tejasāṃ patiḥ

a kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliḥ sarvāmarāśrayaḥ
c kalā kāṣṭhā muhūrtāś ca pakṣā māsā ṛtus tathā
a saṃvatsarakaro 'śvatthaḥ kālacakro vibhāvasuḥ
c puruṣaḥ śāśvato yogī vyaktāvyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ
a lokādhyakṣaḥ prajādhyakṣo viśvakarmā tamonudaḥ
c varuṇaḥ sāgaro 'ṃśuś ca jīmūto jīvano 'rihā
a bhūtāśrayo bhūtapatiḥ sarvabhūtaniṣevitaḥ
b sraṣṭā saṃvartako vahniḥ sarvasyādir alolupaḥ

a jayo viśālo varadaḥ śīghragaḥ prāṇadhāraṇaḥ
a   sarvadhātuniṣevitaḥ
c dhanvantarir dhūmaketur ādidevo 'diteḥ sutaḥ
a dvādaśātmāravindākṣaḥ pitā mātā pitāmahaḥ
c svargadvāraṃ prajādvāraṃ mokṣadvāraṃ triviṣṭapam
a dehakartā praśāntātmā viśvātmā viśvatomukhaḥ
c carācarātmā sūkṣmātmā maitreṇa vapuṣānvitaḥ
a etad vai kīrtanīyasya sūryasyaiva mahātmanaḥ
c nāmnām aṣṭaśataṃ puṇyaṃ śakreṇoktaṃ mahātmanā
a śakrāc ca nāradaḥ prāpto dhaumyaś ca tadanantaram
c dhaumyād yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāpya sarvān kāmān avāptavān
a surapitṛgaṇayakṣasevitaṃ
hy asuraniśācarasiddhavanditam
c varakanakahutāśanaprabhaṃ
tvam api manasy abhidhehi bhāskaram
a sūryodaye yas tu samāhitaḥ paṭhet
sa putralābhaṃ dhanaratnasaṃcayān
c labheta jātismaratāṃ sadā naraḥ
smṛtiṃ ca medhāṃ ca sa vindate parām

prakīrtayec chucisumanāḥ samāhitaḥ
c sa mucyate śokadavāgnisāgarāl
labheta kāmān manasā yathepsitān
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato divākaraḥ prīto darśayām āsa pāṇḍavam
c dīpyamānaḥ svavapuṣā jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ
a yat te 'bhilaṣitaṃ rājan sarvam etad avāpsyasi
c aham annaṃ pradāsyāmi sapta pañca ca te samāḥ
a phalamūlāmiṣaṃ śākaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ yan mahānase
b gṛhṇīṣva piṭharaṃ tāmraṃ mayā dattaṃ narādhipa
b yāvad vāñchati pāñcālī pātreṇānena suvrata
c caturvidhaṃ tadannādyam akṣayyaṃ te bhaviṣyati
d itaś caturdaśe varṣe bhūyo rājyam avāpsyasi
e dhanaṃ ca vividhaṃ tubhyam ity uktvāntaradhīyata
f imaṃ stavaṃ prayatamānāḥ samādhinā
f paṭhed ihānyo 'pi varaṃ samarthayan
f tat tasya dadyāc ca ravir manīṣitaṃ
f tad āpnuyād yady api tat sudurlabham
f yaś cedaṃ dhārayen nityaṃ śṛṇuyād vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
f putrārthī labhate putraṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam
f vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ puruṣo 'py atha vā striyaḥ
f ubhe saṃdhye paṭhen nityaṃ nārī vā puruṣo yadi
f āpadaṃ prāpya mucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt
f etad brahmā dadau pūrvaṃ śakrāya sumahātmane
f śakrāc ca nāradaḥ prāpto dhaumyas tu tadanantaram

c jagrāha pādau dhaumyasya bhrātṝṃś cāsvajatācyutaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d tvatprasādād dvijaśreṣṭha yad iṣṭaṃ prāptavān aham
a draupadyā saha saṃgamya paśyamāno 'bhyayāt prabhuḥ
c mahānase tadānnaṃ tu sādhayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
a saṃskṛtaṃ prasavaṃ yāti vanyam annaṃ caturvidham
c akṣayyaṃ vardhate cānnaṃ tena bhojayate dvijān
a bhuktavatsu ca vipreṣu bhojayitvānujān api
c śeṣaṃ vighasasaṃjñaṃ tu paścād bhuṅkte yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
e yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhojayitvā śeṣam aśnāti pārṣatī
a evaṃ divākarāt prāpya divākarasamadyutiḥ

a purohitapurogāś ca tithinakṣatraparvasu
c yajñiyārthāḥ pravartante vidhimantrapramāṇataḥ
a tataḥ kṛtasvastyayanā dhaumyena saha pāṇḍavāḥ
c dvijasaṃghaiḥ parivṛtāḥ prayayuḥ kāmyakaṃ vanam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a vanaṃ praviṣṭeṣv atha pāṇḍaveṣu
prajñācakṣus tapyamāno 'mbikeyaḥ
c dharmātmānaṃ viduram agādhabuddhiṃ
sukhāsīno vākyam uvāca rājā
a prajñā ca te bhārgavasyeva śuddhā

c samaś ca tvaṃ saṃmataḥ kauravāṇāṃ

d saubalenaiva pāpena duryodhanahitaiṣiṇā

d yatra pāṇḍusutāḥ sarve kliśyanti vanam āgatāḥ
 vidura uvāca
a trivargo 'yaṃ dharmamūlo narendra
rājyaṃ cedaṃ dharmamūlaṃ vadanti
c dharme rājan vartamānaḥ svaśaktyā
putrān sarvān pāhi kuntīsutāṃś ca
a sa vai dharmo vipraluptaḥ sabhāyāṃ
pāpātmabhiḥ saubaleyapradhānaiḥ
c āhūya kuntīsutam akṣavatyāṃ
parājaiṣīt satyasaṃdhaṃ sutas te
a etasya te duṣpraṇītasya rājañ
śeṣasyāhaṃ paripaśyāmy upāyam

a tad vai sarvaṃ pāṇḍuputrā labhantāṃ
yat tad rājann atisṛṣṭaṃ tvayāsīt

rājā tuṣyen na parasveṣu gṛdhyet
d yaśo na naśyej jñātibhedaś ca na syād
d dharmo na syān naiva caivaṃ kṛte tvām
a etat kāryaṃ tava sarvapradhānaṃ
teṣāṃ tuṣṭiḥ śakuneś cāvamānaḥ
c evaṃ śeṣaṃ yadi putreṣu te syād
etad rājaṃs tvaramāṇaḥ kuruṣva
a athaitad evaṃ na karoṣi rājan
dhruvaṃ kurūṇāṃ bhavitā vināśaḥ
c na hi kruddho bhīmaseno 'rjuno vā
śeṣaṃ kuryāc chātravāṇām anīke
a yeṣāṃ yoddhā savyasācī kṛtāstro
dhanur yeṣāṃ gāṇḍivaṃ lokasāram
c yeṣāṃ bhīmo bāhuśālī ca yoddhā
teṣāṃ loke kiṃ nu na prāpyam asti
d yeṣāṃ rājā dharmaputro mahātmā
d teṣāṃ loke kiṃ nu duṣprāpam asti
a uktaṃ pūrvaṃ jātamātre sute te
mayā yat te hitam āsīt tadānīm
c putraṃ tyajemam ahitaṃ kulasyety
etad rājan na ca tat tvaṃ cakartha
e idānīṃ te hitam uktaṃ na cet tvaṃ
kartāsi rājan paritaptāsi paścāt
a yady etad evam anumantā sutas te

c tāpo na te vai bhavitā prītiyogāt
tvaṃ cen na gṛhṇāsi sutaṃ sahāyaiḥ
e athāparo bhavati hi taṃ nigṛhya
pāṇḍoḥ putraṃ prakuruṣvādhipatye
f dhruvaṃ vināśas tava putreṇa dhīman
f sabandhuvargeṇa sahaiva rājabhiḥ
f caturdaśe caiva varṣe narendra
f kulakṣayaṃ prāpsyasi rājasiṃha
f tasmāt kuruṣvādhipatye narendra
f yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dharmavatāṃ variṣṭham
a ajātaśatrur hi vimuktarāgo
