c tato rājan pārthivāḥ sarva eva
vaiśyā ivāsmān upatiṣṭhantu sadyaḥ
a duryodhanaḥ śakuniḥ sūtaputraḥ
prītyā rājan pāṇḍuputrān bhajantām
c duḥśāsano yācatu bhīmasenaṃ
sabhāmadhye drupadasyātmajāṃ ca
a yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tvaṃ parisāntvayasva
rājye cainaṃ sthāpayasvābhipūjya
c tvayā pṛṣṭaḥ kim aham anyad vadeyam
etat kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo 'si rājan
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a etad vākyaṃ vidura yat te sabhāyām
iha proktaṃ pāṇḍavān prāpya māṃ ca
c hitaṃ teṣām ahitaṃ māmakānām
etat sarvaṃ mama nopaiti cetaḥ
a idaṃ tv idānīṃ kuta eva niścitaṃ
teṣām arthe pāṇḍavānāṃ yad āttha
c tenādya manye nāsi hito mameti
kathaṃ hi putraṃ pāṇḍavārthe tyajeyam
a asaṃśayaṃ te 'pi mamaiva putrā
duryodhanas tu mama dehāt prasūtaḥ
c svaṃ vai dehaṃ parahetos tyajeti
ko nu brūyāt samatām anvavekṣan
a sa mā jihmaṃ vidura sarvaṃ bravīṣi
mānaṃ ca te 'ham adhikaṃ dhārayāmi
c yathecchakaṃ gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā tvaṃ
susāntvyamānāpy asatī strī jahāti
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a etāvad uktvā dhṛtarāṣṭro 'nvapadyad
antarveśma sahasotthāya rājan
c nedam astīty atha viduro bhāṣamāṇaḥ
saṃprādravad yatra pārthā babhūvuḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a pāṇḍavās tu vane vāsam uddiśya bharatarṣabhāḥ
c prayayur jāhnavīkūlāt kurukṣetraṃ sahānugāḥ
a sarasvatīdṛṣadvatyau yamunāṃ ca niṣevya te
c yayur vanenaiva vanaṃ satataṃ paścimāṃ diśam
a tataḥ sarasvatīkūle sameṣu marudhanvasu
c kāmyakaṃ nāma dadṛśur vanaṃ munijanapriyam
a tatra te nyavasan vīrā vane bahumṛgadvije
c anvāsyamānā munibhiḥ sāntvyamānāś ca bhārata
a viduras tv api pāṇḍūnāṃ tadā darśanalālasaḥ
c jagāmaikarathenaiva kāmyakaṃ vanam ṛddhimat
a tato yātvā viduraḥ kānanaṃ tac
chīghrair aśvair vāhinā syandanena
c dadarśāsīnaṃ dharmarājaṃ vivikte
sārdhaṃ draupadyā bhrātṛbhir brāhmaṇaiś ca
a tato 'paśyad viduraṃ tūrṇam ārād
abhyāyāntaṃ satyasaṃdhaḥ sa rājā
c athābravīd bhrātaraṃ bhīmasenaṃ
kiṃ nu kṣattā vakṣyati naḥ sametya
a kaccin nāyaṃ vacanāt saubalasya
samāhvātā devanāyopayāti
c kaccit kṣudraḥ śakunir nāyudhāni
jeṣyaty asmān punar evākṣavatyām
a samāhūtaḥ kena cid ādraveti
nāhaṃ śakto bhīmasenāpayātum
c gāṇḍīve vā saṃśayite kathaṃ cid
rājyaprāptiḥ saṃśayitā bhaven naḥ
a tata utthāya viduraṃ pāṇḍaveyāḥ
pratyagṛhṇan nṛpate sarva eva
c taiḥ satkṛtaḥ sa ca tān ājamīḍho
yathocitaṃ pāṇḍuputrān sameyāt
a samāśvastaṃ viduraṃ te nararṣabhās
tato 'pṛcchann āgamanāya hetum
c sa cāpi tebhyo vistarataḥ śaśaṃsa
yathāvṛtto dhṛtarāṣṭro ''mbikeyaḥ
 vidura uvāca
a avocan māṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro 'nuguptam
ajātaśatro parigṛhyābhipūjya
c evaṃ gate samatām abhyupetya
pathyaṃ teṣāṃ mama caiva bravīhi
a mayāpy uktaṃ yat kṣamaṃ kauravāṇāṃ
hitaṃ pathyaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya caiva
c tad vai pathyaṃ tan mano nābhyupaiti
tataś cāhaṃ kṣamam anyan na manye
a paraṃ śreyaḥ pāṇḍaveyā mayoktaṃ
na me tac ca śrutavān āmbikeyaḥ
c yathāturasyeva hi pathyam annaṃ
na rocate smāsya tad ucyamānam
a na śreyase nīyate 'jātaśatro
strī śrotriyasyeva gṛhe praduṣṭā
c bruvan na rucyai bharatarṣabhasya
patiḥ kumāryā iva ṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ
a dhruvaṃ vināśo nṛpa kauravāṇāṃ
na vai śreyo dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ paraiti
c yathā parṇe puṣkarasyeva siktaṃ
jalaṃ na tiṣṭhet pathyam uktaṃ tathāsmin
a tataḥ kruddho dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bravīn māṃ
yatra śraddhā bhārata tatra yāhi
c nāhaṃ bhūyaḥ kāmaye tvāṃ sahāyaṃ
mahīm imāṃ pālayituṃ puraṃ vā
a so 'haṃ tyakto dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa rājaṃs
tvāṃ śāsitum upayātas tvarāvān
c tad vai sarvaṃ yan mayoktaṃ sabhāyāṃ
tad dhāryatāṃ yat pravakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ
a kleśais tīvrair yujyamānaḥ sapatnaiḥ
kṣamāṃ kurvan kālam upāsate yaḥ
c saṃ vardhayan stokam ivāgnim ātmavān
sa vai bhuṅkte pṛthivīm eka eva
a yasyāvibhaktaṃ vasu rājan sahāyais
tasya duḥkhe 'py aṃśabhājaḥ sahāyāḥ
c sahāyānām eṣa saṃgrahaṇe 'bhyupāyaḥ
sahāyāptau pṛthivīprāptim āhuḥ
d tasmāt satyaṃ satataṃ vai bruvāṇo
d lokasya hṛdyo bhavatīti sadyaḥ
a satyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pāṇḍava niṣpralāpaṃ
tulyaṃ cānnaṃ saha bhojyaṃ sahāyaiḥ
c ātmā caiṣām agrato nātivarted
evaṃvṛttir vardhate bhūmipālaḥ
d mitraiḥ putrair bhūmihastyaśvabhūri
d mahīm imāṃ pālayituṃ purastāt
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a evaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā bravīṣi
parāṃ buddhim upagamyāpramattaḥ
c yac cāpy anyad deśakālopapannaṃ
tad vai vācyaṃ tat kariṣyāmi kṛtsnam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a gate tu vidure rājann āśramaṃ pāṇḍavān prati
c dhṛtarāṣṭro mahāprājñaḥ paryatapyata bhārata
d vidurasya prabhāvaṃ ca saṃdhivigrahakāritam
d vivṛddhiṃ ca parāṃ matvā pāṇḍavānāṃ bhaviṣyati
a sa sabhādvāram āgamya vidurasmāramohitaḥ
c samakṣaṃ pārthivendrāṇāṃ papātāviṣṭacetanaḥ
d papāta sahasā rājā chinnadruma ivāvaśaḥ
a sa tu labdhvā punaḥ saṃjñāṃ samutthāya mahītalāt
c samīpopasthitaṃ rājā saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt
a bhrātā mama suhṛc caiva sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
c tasya smṛtvādya subhṛśaṃ hṛdayaṃ dīryatīva me
a tam ānayasva dharmajñaṃ mama bhrātaram āśu vai
c iti bruvan sa nṛpatiḥ karuṇaṃ paryadevayat
a paścāttāpābhisaṃtapto vidurasmārakarśitaḥ
c bhrātṛsnehād idaṃ rājan saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt
a gaccha saṃjaya jānīhi bhrātaraṃ viduraṃ mama
c yadi jīvati roṣeṇa mayā pāpena nirdhutaḥ
a na hi tena mama bhrātrā susūkṣmam api kiṃ cana
c vyalīkaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ me prājñenāmitabuddhinā
a sa vyalīkaṃ kathaṃ prāpto mattaḥ paramabuddhimān
c na jahyāj jīvitaṃ prājñas taṃ gacchānaya saṃjaya
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājñas tam anumānya ca
c saṃjayo bāḍham ity uktvā prādravat kāmyakaṃ vanam
a so 'cireṇa samāsādya tad vanaṃ yatra pāṇḍavāḥ
c rauravājinasaṃvītaṃ dadarśātha yudhiṣṭhiram
a vidureṇa sahāsīnaṃ brāhmaṇaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
c bhrātṛbhiś cābhisaṃguptaṃ devair iva śatakratum
a yudhiṣṭhiram athābhyetya pūjayām āsa saṃjayaḥ
c bhīmārjunayamāṃś cāpi tadarhaṃ pratyapadyata
a rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ sa kuśalaṃ sukhāsīnaś ca saṃjayaḥ
c śaśaṃsāgamane hetum idaṃ caivābravīd vacaḥ
a rājā smarati te kṣattar dhṛtarāṣṭro 'mbikāsutaḥ
c taṃ paśya gatvā tvaṃ kṣipraṃ saṃjīvaya ca pārthivam
a so 'numānya naraśreṣṭhān pāṇḍavān kurunandanān
c niyogād rājasiṃhasya gantum arhasi mānada
a evam uktas tu viduro dhīmān svajanavatsalaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhirasyānumate punar āyād gajāhvayam
d so 'bhigatvā tadā veśma rājñaḥ samabhivādya ca
d upātiṣṭhan mahātmānaṃ rājānaṃ preṣyavat tadā
a tam abravīn mahāprājñaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ pratāpavān
c diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dharmajña diṣṭyā smarasi me 'nagha
a adya rātrau divā cāhaṃ tvatkṛte bharatarṣabha
c prajāgare prapaśyāmi vicitraṃ deham ātmanaḥ
a so 'ṅkam ādāya viduraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya caiva ha
c kṣamyatām iti covāca yad ukto 'si mayā ruṣā
d dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārāja bhrātṛsnehād uvāca ha
d yudhiṣṭhiras tu kuśalī bhrātṛbhiḥ saha tiṣṭhati
d atha rātriṃ dinaṃ cāhaṃ tvatkṛte bharatarṣabha
d prītas tvam eva me nityaṃ bhrātā sarvaguṇānvitaḥ
 vidura uvāca
a kṣāntam eva mayā rājan gurur naḥ paramo bhavān
c tathā hy asmy āgataḥ kṣipraṃ tvaddarśanaparāyaṇaḥ
a bhavanti hi naravyāghra puruṣā dharmacetasaḥ
c dīnābhipātino rājan nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
a pāṇḍoḥ sutā yādṛśā me tādṛśā me sutās tava
c dīnā iti hi me buddhir abhipannādya tān prati
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a anyonyam anunīyaivaṃ bhrātarau tau mahādyutī
c viduro dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca lebhāte paramāṃ mudam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śrutvā ca viduraṃ prāptaṃ rājñā ca parisāntvitam
c dhṛtarāṣṭrātmajo rājā paryatapyata durmatiḥ
a sa saubalaṃ samānāyya karṇaduḥśāsanāv api
c abravīd vacanaṃ rājā praviśyābuddhijaṃ tamaḥ
a eṣa pratyāgato mantrī dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃmataḥ
c viduraḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ suhṛd vidvān hite rataḥ
a yāvad asya punar buddhiṃ viduro nāpakarṣati
c pāṇḍavānayane tāvan mantrayadhvaṃ hitaṃ mama
a atha paśyāmy ahaṃ pārthān prāptān iha kathaṃ cana
c punaḥ śoṣaṃ gamiṣyāmi nirāsur niravagrahaḥ
a viṣam udbandhanaṃ vāpi śastram agnipraveśanam
c kariṣye na hi tān ṛddhān punar draṣṭum ihotsahe
 śakunir uvāca
a kiṃ bāliṣāṃ matiṃ rājann āsthito 'si viśāṃ pate
c gatās te samayaṃ kṛtvā naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati
a satyavākye sthitāḥ sarve pāṇḍavā bharatarṣabha
c pitus te vacanaṃ tāta na grahīṣyanti karhi cit
a atha vā te grahīṣyanti punar eṣyanti vā puram
b athāgamiṣyanti punaḥ pāṇḍavā vāraṇāhvayam
c nirasya samayaṃ bhūyaḥ paṇo 'smākaṃ bhaviṣyati
a sarve bhavāmo madhyasthā rājñaś chandānuvartinaḥ
c chidraṃ bahu prapaśyantaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ susaṃvṛtāḥ
 duḥśāsana uvāca
a evam etan mahāprājña yathā vadasi mātula
c nityaṃ hi me kathayatas tava buddhir hi rocate
d tathā tad bhavitā rājan nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati
d nāgamiṣyanti te vīrā akṛtvā kālasaṃvidam
d āgaccheyuś ca te mohāt punar dyūtaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
 karṇa uvāca
a kāmam īkṣāmahe sarve duryodhana tavepsitam
c aikamatyaṃ hi no rājan sarveṣām eva lakṣyate
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tu karṇena rājā duryodhanas tadā
c nātihṛṣṭamanāḥ kṣipram abhavat sa parāṅmukhaḥ
a upalabhya tataḥ karṇo vivṛtya nayane śubhe
c roṣād duḥśāsanaṃ caiva saubaleyaṃ ca tāv ubhau
a uvāca paramakruddha udyamyātmānam ātmanā
c aho mama mataṃ yat tan nibodhata narādhipāḥ
a priyaṃ sarve cikīrṣāmo rājñaḥ kiṃkarapāṇayaḥ
c na cāsya śaknumaḥ sarve priye sthātum atandritāḥ
a vayaṃ tu śastrāṇy ādāya rathān āsthāya daṃśitāḥ
c gacchāmaḥ sahitā hantuṃ pāṇḍavān vanagocarān
a teṣu sarveṣu śānteṣu gateṣv aviditāṃ gatim
c nirvivādā bhaviṣyanti dhārtarāṣṭrās tathā vayam
a yāvad eva paridyūnā yāvac chokaparāyaṇāḥ
c yāvan mitravihīnāś ca tāvac chakyā mataṃ mama
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pūjayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c bāḍham ity eva te sarve pratyūcuḥ sūtajaṃ tadā
d etat kṛtyatamaṃ rājñaḥ kauravyasya mahātmanaḥ
a evam uktvā tu saṃkruddhā rathaiḥ sarve pṛthak pṛthak
c niryayuḥ pāṇḍavān hantuṃ saṃghaśaḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ
a tān prasthitān parijñāya kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
c ājagāma viśuddhātmā dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā
a pratiṣidhyātha tān sarvān bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
c prajñācakṣuṣam āsīnam uvācābhyetya satvaraḥ
 vyāsa uvāca
a dhṛtarāṣṭra mahāprājña nibodha vacanaṃ mama
c vakṣyāmi tvā kauravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ hitam uttamam
a na me priyaṃ mahābāho yad gatāḥ pāṇḍavā vanam
c nikṛtyā nirjitāś caiva duryodhanavaśānugaiḥ
a te smarantaḥ parikleśān varṣe pūrṇe trayodaśe
c vimokṣyanti viṣaṃ kruddhāḥ karaveyeṣu bhārata
a tad ayaṃ kiṃ nu pāpātmā tava putraḥ sumandadhīḥ
c pāṇḍavān nityasaṃkruddho rājyahetor jighāṃsati
a vāryatāṃ sādhv ayaṃ mūḍhaḥ śamaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
c vanasthāṃs tān ayaṃ hantum icchan prāṇair vimokṣyate
a yathāha viduraḥ prājño yathā bhīṣmo yathā vayam
c yathā kṛpaś ca droṇaś ca tathā sādhu vidhīyatām
a vigraho hi mahāprājña svajanena vigarhitaḥ
c adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca mā rājan pratipadyathāḥ
a samīkṣā yādṛśī hy asya pāṇḍavān prati bhārata
c upekṣyamāṇā sā rājan mahāntam anayaṃ spṛśet
a atha vāyaṃ sumandātmā vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
c pāṇḍavaiḥ sahito rājann eka evāsahāyavān
a tataḥ saṃsargajaḥ snehaḥ putrasya tava pāṇḍavaiḥ
c yadi syāt kṛtakāryo 'dya bhaves tvaṃ manujeśvara
a atha vā jāyamānasya yac chīlam anujāyate
c śrūyate tan mahārāja nāmṛtasyāpasarpati
a kathaṃ vā manyate bhīṣmo droṇo vā viduro 'pi vā
c bhavān vātra kṣamaṃ kāryaṃ purā cārtho 'tivartate
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a bhagavan nāham apy etad rocaye dyūtasaṃstavam
c manye tad vidhinākramya kārito 'smīti vai mune
a naitad rocayate bhīṣmo na droṇo viduro na ca
c gāndhārī necchati dyūtaṃ tac ca mohāt pravartitam
a parityaktuṃ na śaknomi duryodhanam acetanam
c putrasnehena bhagavañ jānann api yatavrata
 vyāsa uvāca
a vaicitravīrya nṛpate satyam āha yathā bhavān
c dṛḍhaṃ vedmi paraṃ putraṃ paraṃ putrān na vidyate
a indro 'py aśrunipātena surabhyā pratibodhitaḥ
c anyaiḥ samṛddhair apy arthair na sutād vidyate param
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi mahad ākhyānam uttamam
c surabhyāś caiva saṃvādam indrasya ca viśāṃ pate
a triviṣṭapagatā rājan surabhiḥ prārudat kila
c gavāṃ māta purā tāta tām indro 'nvakṛpāyata
 indra uvāca
a kim idaṃ rodiṣi śubhe kaccit kṣemaṃ divaukasām
c mānuṣeṣv atha vā goṣu naitad alpaṃ bhaviṣyati
 surabhir uvāca
a vinipāto na vaḥ kaś cid dṛśyate tridaśādhipa
c ahaṃ tu putraṃ śocāmi tena rodimi kauśika
a paśyainaṃ karṣakaṃ raudraṃ durbalaṃ mama putrakam
c pratodenābhinighnantaṃ lāṅgalena nipīḍitam
a etaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛśaṃ śrantaṃ vadhyamānaṃ surādhipa
c kṛpāviṣṭāsmi devendra manaś codvijate mama
a ekas tatra balopeto dhuram udvahate 'dhikām
c aparo 'lpabalaprāṇaḥ kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ
e kṛcchrād udvahate bhāraṃ taṃ vai śocāmi vāsava
a vadhyamānaḥ pratodena tudyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c naiva śaknoti taṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ paśya vāsava
a tato 'haṃ tasya duḥkhārtā viraumi bhṛśaduḥkhitā
c aśrūṇy āvartayantī ca netrābhyāṃ karuṇāyatī
 indra uvāca
a tava putrasahasreṣu pīḍyamāneṣu śobhane
c kiṃ kṛpāyitam asty atra putra eko 'tra pīḍyate
 surabhir uvāca
a yadi putrasahasraṃ me sarvatra samam eva me
c dīnasya tu sataḥ śakra putrasyābhyadhikā kṛpā
 vyāsa uvāca
a tad indraḥ surabhīvākyaṃ niśamya bhṛśavismitaḥ
c jīvitenāpi kauravya mene 'bhyadhikam ātmajam
a pravavarṣa ca tatraiva sahasā toyam ulbaṇam
c karṣakasyācaran vighnaṃ bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ
a tad yathā surabhiḥ prāha samam evāstu te tathā
c suteṣu rājan sarveṣu dīneṣv abhyadhikā kṛpā
a yādṛśo me sutaḥ paṇḍus tādṛśo me 'si putraka
c viduraś ca mahāprājñaḥ snehād etad bravīmy aham
a cirāya tava putrāṇāṃ śatam ekaś ca pārthiva
c pāṇḍoḥ pañcaiva lakṣyante te 'pi mandāḥ suduḥkhitāḥ
a kathaṃ jīveyur atyantaṃ kathaṃ vardheyur ity api
c iti dīneṣu pārtheṣu mano me paritapyate
a yadi pārthiva kauravyāñ jīvamānān ihecchasi
c duryodhanas tava sutaḥ śamaṃ gacchatu pāṇḍavaiḥ
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a evam etan mahāprājña yathā vadasi no mune
c ahaṃ caiva vijānāmi sarve ceme narādhipāḥ
a bhavāṃs tu manyate sādhu yat kurūṇāṃ sukhodayam
c tad eva viduro 'py āha bhīṣmo droṇaś ca māṃ mune
a yadi tv aham anugrāhyaḥ kauraveṣu dayā yadi
c anuśādhi durātmānaṃ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ mama
 vyāsa uvāca
a ayam āyāti vai rājan maitreyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
c anvīya pāṇḍavān bhrātṝn ihaivāsmad didṛkṣayā
a eṣa duryodhanaṃ putraṃ tava rājan mahān ṛṣiḥ
c anuśāstā yathānyāyaṃ śamāyāsya kulasya te
a brūyād yad eṣa rājendra tat kāryam aviśaṅkayā
c akriyāyāṃ hi kāryasya putraṃ te śapsyate ruṣā
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktvā yayau vyāso maitreyaḥ pratyadṛśyata
b tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
b pūjayitvā yathānyāyaṃ papracchāgamanakriyām
c pūjayā pratijagrāha saputras taṃ narādhipaḥ
a dattvārghyādyāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā viśrāntaṃ munipuṃgavam
c praśrayeṇābravīd rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro 'mbikāsutaḥ
a sukhenāgamanaṃ kaccid bhagavan kurujāṅgale
c kaccit kuśalino vīrā bhrātaraḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
a samaye sthātum icchanti kaccic ca puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c kaccit kurūṇāṃ saubhrātram avyucchinnaṃ bhaviṣyati
 maitreya uvāca
a tīrthayātrām anukrāman prāpto 'smi kurujāṅgalam
c yadṛcchayā dharmarājaṃ dṛṣṭavān kāmyake vane
a taṃ jaṭājinasaṃvītaṃ tapovananivāsinam
c samājagmur mahātmānaṃ draṣṭuṃ munigaṇāḥ prabho
a tatrāśrauṣaṃ mahārāja putrāṇāṃ tava vibhramam
c anayaṃ dyūtarūpeṇa mahāpāyam upasthitam
a tato 'haṃ tvām anuprāptaḥ kauravāṇām avekṣayā
c sadā hy abhyadhikaḥ snehaḥ prītiś ca tvayi me prabho
a naitad aupayikaṃ rājaṃs tvayi bhīṣme ca jīvati
c yad anyonyena te putrā virudhyante narādhipa
a meḍhībhūtaḥ svayaṃ rājan nigrahe pragrahe bhavān
c kimartham anayaṃ ghoram utpatantam upekṣase
a dasyūnām iva yadvṛttaṃ sabhāyāṃ kurunandana
c tena na bhrājase rājaṃs tāpasānāṃ samāgame
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato vyāvṛtya rājānaṃ duryodhanam amarṣaṇam
c uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā maitreyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
a duryodhana mahābāho nibodha vadatāṃ vara
c vacanaṃ me mahāprājña bruvato yad dhitaṃ tava
a mā druhaḥ pāṇḍavān rājan kuruṣva hitam ātmanaḥ
c pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca lokasya ca nararṣabha
a te hi sarve naravyāghrāḥ śūrā vikrāntayodhinaḥ
c sarve nāgāyutaprāṇā vajrasaṃhananā dṛḍhāḥ
a satyavrataparāḥ sarve sarve puruṣamāninaḥ
c hantāro devaśatrūṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpiṇām
e hiḍimbabakamukhyānāṃ kirmīrasya ca rakṣasaḥ
a itaḥ pracyavatāṃ rātrau yaḥ sa teṣāṃ mahātmanām
c āvṛtya mārgaṃ raudrātmā tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
a taṃ bhīmaḥ samaraślāghī balena balināṃ varaḥ
c jaghāna paśumāreṇa vyāghraḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
a paśya digvijaye rājan yathā bhīmena pātitaḥ
c jarāsaṃdho maheṣvāso nāgāyutabalo yudhi
a saṃbandhī vāsudevaś ca yeṣāṃ śyālaś ca pārṣataḥ
c kas tān yudhi samāsīta jarāmaraṇavān naraḥ
a tasya te śama evāstu pāṇḍavair bharatarṣabha
c kuru me vacanaṃ rājan mā mṛtyuvaśam anvagāḥ
a evaṃ tu bruvatas tasya maitreyasya viśāṃ pate
c ūruṃ gajakarākāraṃ kareṇābhijaghāna saḥ
a duryodhanaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā caraṇenālikhan mahīm
c na kiṃ cid uktvā durmedhās tasthau kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
a tam aśuśrūṣamāṇaṃ tu vilikhantaṃ vasuṃdharām
c dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ rājan maitreyaṃ kopa āviśat
a sa kopavaśam āpanno maitreyo munisattamaḥ
c vidhinā saṃprayuktaś ca śāpāyāsya mano dadhe
a tataḥ sa vāry upaspṛśya kopasaṃraktalocanaḥ
c maitreyo dhārtarāṣṭraṃ tam aśapad duṣṭacetasam
a yasmāt tvaṃ mām anādṛtya nemāṃ vācaṃ cikīrṣasi
c tasmād asyābhimānasya sadyaḥ phalam avāpnuhi
a tvadabhidrohasaṃyuktaṃ yuddham utpatsyate mahat
c yatra bhīmo gadāpātais tavoruṃ bhetsyate balī
a ity evam ukte vacane dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
c prasādayām āsa muniṃ naitad evaṃ bhaved iti
 maitreya uvāca
a śamaṃ yāsyati cet putras tava rājan yathā tathā
c śāpo na bhavitā tāta viparīte bhaviṣyati
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a sa vilakṣas tu rājendra duryodhanapitā tadā
c maitreyaṃ prāha kirmīraḥ kathaṃ bhīmena pātitaḥ
 maitreya uvāca
a nāhaṃ vakṣyāmy asūyā te na te śuśrūṣate sutaḥ
c eṣa te viduraḥ sarvam ākhyāsyati gate mayi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity evam uktvā maitreyaḥ prātiṣṭhata yathāgatam
c kirmīravadhasaṃvigno bahir duryodhano 'gamat
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a kirmīrasya vadhaṃ kṣattaḥ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām
c rakṣasā bhīmasenasya katham āsīt samāgamaḥ
 vidura uvāca
a śṛṇu bhīmasya karmedam atimānuṣakarmaṇaḥ
c śrutapūrvaṃ mayā teṣāṃ kathānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ
d yaṃ jaghānaikacakrāyāṃ bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
d rākṣasaṃ krodhatāmrākṣaṃ darpotsiktaṃ balādhikam
d tasya bhrātā mahāvīryaḥ kanīyān uruvikramaḥ
d bhrātṛnāśasamutthena channo vyasanabhasmanā
d bhīmasenāntaraprepsuś cacāra pṛthivīm imām
d sa nirjitān upāśrauṣīt pāṇḍavān anulakṣaye
a itaḥ prayātā rājendra pāṇḍavā dyūtanirjitāḥ
c jagmus tribhir ahorātraiḥ kāmyakaṃ nāma tad vanam
a rātrau niśīthe svābhīle gate 'rdhasamaye nṛpa
c pracāre puruṣādānāṃ rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
a tad vanaṃ tāpasā nityaṃ śeṣāś ca vanacāriṇaḥ
c dūrāt pariharanti sma puruṣādabhayāt kila
a teṣāṃ praviśatāṃ tatra mārgam āvṛtya bhārata
c dīptākṣaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ rakṣaḥ solmukaṃ pratyadṛśyata
a bāhū mahāntau kṛtvā tu tathāsyaṃ ca bhayānakam
c sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ yena yānti kurūdvahāḥ
a daṣṭoṣṭhadaṃṣṭraṃ tāmrākṣaṃ pradīptordhvaśiroruham
c sārkaraśmitaḍiccakraṃ sabalākam ivāmbudam
a sṛjantaṃ rākṣasīṃ māyāṃ mahārāvavirāviṇam
c muñcantaṃ vipulaṃ nādaṃ satoyam iva toyadam
a tasya nādena saṃtrastāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ sarvatodiśam
c vimuktanādāḥ saṃpetuḥ sthalajā jalajaiḥ saha
a saṃpradrutamṛgadvīpimahiṣarkṣasamākulam
c tad vanaṃ tasya nādena saṃprasthitam ivābhavat
a tasyoruvātābhihatā tāmrapallavabāhavaḥ
c vidūrajātāś ca latāḥ samāśliṣyanta pādapān
a tasmin kṣaṇe 'tha pravavau māruto bhṛśadāruṇaḥ
c rajasā saṃvṛtaṃ tena naṣṭarṣkam abhavan nabhaḥ
a pañcānāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇām avijñāto mahāripuḥ
c pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ tu śokavega ivātulaḥ
a sa dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavān dūrāt kṛṣṇājinasamāvṛtān
c āvṛṇot tad vanadvāraṃ maināka iva parvataḥ
a taṃ samāsādya vitrastā kṛṣṇā kamalalocanā
c adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃtrāsān nyamīlayata locane
a duḥśāsanakarotsṛṣṭaviprakīrṇaśiroruhā
c pañcaparvatamadhyasthā nadīvākulatāṃ gatā
a momuhyamānāṃ tāṃ tatra jagṛhuḥ pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
c indriyāṇi prasaktāni viṣayeṣu yathā ratim
a atha tāṃ rākṣasīṃ māyām utthitāṃ ghoradarśanām
c rakṣoghnair vividhair mantrair dhaumyaḥ samyakprayojitaiḥ
e paśyatāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ nāśayām āsa vīryavān
a sa naṣṭamāyo 'tibalaḥ krodhavisphāritekṣaṇaḥ
c kāmamūrtidharaḥ kṣudraḥ kālakalpo vyadṛśyata
a tam uvāca tato rājā dīrghaprajño yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c ko bhavān kasya vā kiṃ te kriyatāṃ kāryam ucyatām
a pratyuvācātha tad rakṣo dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c ahaṃ bakasya vai bhrātā kirmīra iti viśrutaḥ
d paiṭhīnagotre utpanno nāstiko vedanindakaḥ
a vane 'smin kāmyake śūnye nivasāmi gatajvaraḥ
c yudhi nirjitya puruṣān āhāraṃ nityam ācaran
a ke yūyam iha saṃprāptā bhakṣyabhūtā mamāntikam
c yudhi nirjitya vaḥ sarvān bhakṣayiṣye gatajvaraḥ
a yudhiṣṭhiras tu tac chrutvā vacas tasya durātmanaḥ
c ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvaṃ gotranāmādi bhārata
a pāṇḍavo dharmarājo 'haṃ yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
c sahito bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvair bhīmasenārjunādibhiḥ
a hṛtarājyo vane vāsaṃ vastuṃ kṛtamatis tataḥ
c vanam abhyāgato ghoram idaṃ tava parigraham
a kirmīras tv abravīd enaṃ diṣṭyā devair idaṃ mama
c upapāditam adyeha cirakālān manogatam
d vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rākṣaso ghoradarśanaḥ
a bhīmasenavadhārthaṃ hi nityam abhyudyatāyudhaḥ
c carāmi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ nainam āsādayāmy aham
a so 'yam āsādito diṣṭyā bhrātṛhā kāṅkṣitaś ciram
c anena hi mama bhrātā bako vinihataḥ priyaḥ
a vetrakīyagṛhe rājan brāhmaṇacchadmarūpiṇā
c vidyābalam upāśritya na hy asty asyaurasaṃ balam
a hiḍimbaś ca sakhā mahyaṃ dayito vanagocaraḥ
c hato durātmanānena svasā cāsya hṛtā purā
a so 'yam abhyāgato mūḍho mamedaṃ gahanaṃ vanam
c pracārasamaye 'smākam ardharātre samāsthite
a adyāsya yātayiṣyāmi tad vairaṃ cirasaṃbhṛtam
c tarpayiṣyāmi ca bakaṃ rudhireṇāsya bhūriṇā
a adyāham anṛṇo bhūtvā bhrātuḥ sakhyus tathaiva ca
c śāntiṃ labdhāsmi paramāṃ hatva rākṣasakaṇṭakam
a yadi tena purā mukto bhīmaseno bakena vai
c adyainaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi paśyatas te yudhiṣṭhira
a enaṃ hi vipulaprāṇam adya hatvā vṛkodaram
c saṃbhakṣya jarayiṣyāmi yathāgastyo mahāsuram
a evam uktas tu dharmātmā satyasaṃdho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c naitad astīti sakrodho bhartsayām āsa rākṣasam
a tato bhīmo mahābāhur ārujya tarasā druma
c daśavyāmam ivodviddhaṃ niṣpatram akarot tadā
a cakāra sajyaṃ gāṇḍīvaṃ vajraniṣpeṣagauravam
c nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tathaiva vijayo 'rjunaḥ
a nivārya bhīmo jiṣṇuṃ tu tad rakṣo ghoradarśanam
c abhidrutyābravīd vākyaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti bhārata
a ity uktvainam abhikruddhaḥ kakṣyām utpīḍya pāṇḍavaḥ
c niṣpiṣya pāṇinā pāṇiṃ saṃdaṣṭoṣṭhapuṭo balī
e tam abhyadhāvad vegena bhīmo vṛkṣāyudhas tadā
a yamadaṇḍapratīkāśaṃ tatas taṃ tasya mūrdhani
c pātayām āsa vegena kuliśaṃ maghavān iva
a asaṃbhrāntaṃ tu tad rakṣaḥ samare pratyadṛśyata
c cikṣepa colmukaṃ dīptam aśaniṃ jvalitām iva
a tad udastam alātaṃ tu bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
c padā savyena cikṣepa tad rakṣaḥ punar āvrajat
a kirmīraś cāpi sahasā vṛkṣam utpāṭya pāṇḍavam
c daṇḍapāṇir iva kruddhaḥ samare pratyayudhyata
a tad vṛkṣayuddham abhavan mahīruhavināśanam
c vālisugrīvayor bhrātror yathā śrīkāṅkṣiṇoḥ purā
a śīrṣayoḥ patitā vṛkṣā bibhidur naikadhā tayoḥ
c yathaivotpalapadmāni mattayor dvipayos tathā
a muñjavaj jarjarībhūtā bahavas tatra pādapāḥ
c cīrāṇīva vyudastāni rejus tatra mahāvane
a tad vṛkṣayuddham abhavat sumuhūrtaṃ viśāṃ pate
c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya narāṇām uttamasya ca
a tataḥ śilāṃ samutkṣipya bhīmasya yudhi tiṣṭhataḥ
c prāhiṇod rākṣasaḥ kruddho bhīmasenaś cacāla ha
a taṃ śilātāḍanajaḍaṃ paryadhāvat sa rākṣasaḥ
c bāhuvikṣiptakiraṇaḥ svarbhānur iva bhāskaram
a tāv anyonyaṃ samāśliṣya prakarṣantau parasparam
c ubhāv api cakāśete prayuddhau vṛṣabhāv iva
a tayor āsīt sutumulaḥ saṃprahāraḥ sudāruṇaḥ
c nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhavator vyāghrayor iva dṛptayoḥ
a duryodhananikārāc ca bāhuvīryāc ca darpitaḥ
c kṛṣṇānayanadṛṣṭaś ca vyavardhata vṛkodaraḥ
a abhipatyātha bāhubhyāṃ pratyagṛhṇād amarṣitaḥ
c mātaṅga iva mātaṅgaṃ prabhinnakaraṭāmukhaḥ
a taṃ cāpy ātha tato rakṣaḥ pratijagrāha vīryavān
c tam ākṣipad bhīmaseno balena balināṃ varaḥ
a tayor bhujaviniṣpeṣād ubhayor balinos tadā
c śabdaḥ samabhavad ghoro veṇusphoṭasamo yudhi
a athainam ākṣipya balād gṛhya madhye vṛkodaraḥ
c dhūnayām āsa vegena vāyuś caṇḍa iva drumam
a sa bhīmena parāmṛṣṭo durbalo balinā raṇe
c vyaspandata yathāprāṇaṃ vicakarṣa ca pāṇḍavam
a tata enaṃ pariśrāntam upalabhya vṛkodaraḥ
c yoktrayām āsa bāhubhyāṃ paśuṃ raśanayā yathā
a vinadantaṃ mahānādaṃ bhinnabherīsamasvanam
c bhrāmayām āsa suciraṃ visphurantam acetasam
a taṃ viṣīdantam ājñāya rākṣasaṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
c pragṛhya tarasā dorbhyāṃ paśumāram amārayat
a ākramya sa kaṭīdeśe jānunā rākṣasādhamam
c apīḍayata bāhubhyāṃ kaṇṭhaṃ tasya vṛkodaraḥ
a atha taṃ jaḍasarvāṅgaṃ vyāvṛttanayanolbaṇam
c bhūtale pātayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
a hiḍimbabakayoḥ pāpa na tvam aśrupramārjanam
c kariṣyasi gataś cāsi yamasya sadanaṃ prati
a ity evam uktvā puruṣapravīras
taṃ rākṣasaṃ krodhavivṛttanetraḥ
c prasrastavastrābharaṇaṃ sphurantam
udbhrāntacittaṃ vyasum utsasarja
a tasmin hate toyadatulyarūpe
kṛṣṇāṃ puraskṛtya narendraputrāḥ
c bhīmaṃ praśasyātha guṇair anekair
hṛṣṭās tato dvaitavanāya jagmuḥ
a evaṃ vinihataḥ saṃkhye kirmīro manujādhipa
c bhīmena vacanāt tasya dharmarājasya kaurava
a tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kṛtvā vanaṃ tad aparājitaḥ
c draupadyā saha dharmajño vasatiṃ tām uvāsa ha
a samāśvāsya ca te sarve draupadīṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ
c prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ prītyā praśaśaṃsur vṛkodaram
a bhīmabāhubalotpiṣṭe vinaṣṭe rākṣase tataḥ
c viviśus tad vanaṃ vīrāḥ kṣemaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
a sa mayā gacchatā mārge vinikīrṇo bhayāvahaḥ
c vane mahati duṣṭātmā dṛṣṭo bhīmabalād dhataḥ
a tatrāśrauṣam ahaṃ caitat karma bhīmasya bhārata
c brāhmaṇānāṃ kathayatāṃ ye tatrāsan samāgatāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ vinihataṃ saṃkhye kirmīraṃ rākṣasottamam
c śrutvā dhyānaparo rājā niśaśvāsārtavat tadā
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a bhojāḥ pravrajitāñ śrutvā vṛṣṇayaś cāndhakaiḥ saha
c pāṇḍavān duḥkhasaṃtaptān samājagmur mahāvane
a pāñcālasya ca dāyādā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedipaḥ
a   dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
a śiśupālasutaḥ śrīmān
c kekayāś ca mahāvīryā bhrātaro lokaviśrutāḥ
a vane te 'bhiyayuḥ pārthān krodhāmarśasamanvitāḥ
b keśavaḥ sātyakiś caiva dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
b amātyaiḥ saha mitraiś ca balena svajanena ca
b vane tena yayuḥ pārthān ūcuḥ kiṃ karavāmahe
c garhayanto dhārtarāṣṭrān kiṃ kurma iti cābruvan
a vāsudevaṃ puraskṛtya sarve te kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
c parivāryopaviviśur dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
d abhivādya kuruśreṣṭhaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ keśavo 'bravīt
 vāsudeva uvāca
a duryodhanasya karṇasya śakuneś ca durātmanaḥ
c duḥśāsanacaturthānāṃ bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam
d etān nihatya samare ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
d tāṃś ca sarvān vinirjitya sahitān sanarādhipān
a tataḥ sarve 'bhiṣiñcāmo dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c nikṛtyopacaran vadhya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a pārthānām abhiṣaṅgeṇa tathā kruddhaṃ janārdanam
c arjunaḥ śamayām āsā didhakṣantam iva prajāḥ
a saṃkruddhaṃ keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrvadeheṣu phalgunaḥ
c kīrtayām āsa karmāṇi satyakīrter mahātmanaḥ
a puruṣasyāprameyasya satyasyāmitatejasaḥ
c prajāpatipater viṣṇor lokanāthasya dhīmataḥ
 arjuna uvāca
a daśa varṣasahasrāṇi yatrasāyaṃgṛho muniḥ
c vyacaras tvaṃ purā kṛṣṇa parvate gandhamādane
a daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣaśatāni ca
c puṣkareṣv avasaḥ kṛṣṇa tvam apo bhakṣayan purā
a ūrdhvabāhur viśālāyāṃ badaryāṃ madhusūdana
c atiṣṭha ekapādena vāyubhakṣaḥ śataṃ samāḥ
a apakṛṣṭottarāsaṅgaḥ kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ
c āsīḥ kṛṣṇa sarasvatyāṃ satre dvādaśavārṣike
a prabhāsaṃ cāpy athāsādya tīrthaṃ puṇyajanocitam
c tathā kṛṣṇa mahātejā divyaṃ varṣasahasrakam
e ātiṣṭhas tapa ekena pādena niyame sthitaḥ
f lokapravṛttihetos tvam iti vyāso mamābravīt
a kṣetrajñaḥ sarvabhūtānām ādir antaś ca keśava
c nidhānaṃ tapasāṃ kṛṣṇa yajñas tvaṃ ca sanātanaḥ
d yogakartā hṛṣīkeśa sāṃkhyakartā sanātanaḥ
d śīlas tvaṃ sarvayogānāṃ vīrāṇāṃ niyamasya ca
a nihatya narakaṃ bhaumam āhṛtya maṇikuṇḍale
c prathamotpāditaṃ kṛṣṇa medhyam aśvam avāsṛjaḥ
a kṛtvā tat karma lokānām ṛṣabhaḥ sarvalokajit
c avadhīs tvaṃ raṇe sarvān sametān daityadānavān
a tataḥ sarveśvaratvaṃ ca saṃpradāya śacīpateḥ
c mānuṣeṣu mahābāho prādurbhūto 'si keśava
a sa tvaṃ nārāyaṇo bhūtvā harir āsīḥ paraṃtapa
c brahmā somaś ca sūryaś ca dharmo dhātā yamo 'nalaḥ
a vāyur vaiśravaṇo rudraḥ kālaḥ khaṃ pṛthivī diśaḥ
c ajaś carācaraguruḥ sraṣṭā tvaṃ puruṣottama
a turāyaṇādibhir deva kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
c ayajo bhūritejā vai kṛṣṇa caitrarathe vane
a śataṃ śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇasya janārdana
c ekaikasmiṃs tadā yajñe paripūrṇāni bhāgaśaḥ
a aditer api putratvam etya yādavanandana
c tvaṃ viṣṇur iti vikhyāta indrād avarajo bhuvi
a śiśur bhūtvā divaṃ khaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca paraṃtapa
c tribhir vikramaṇaiḥ kṛṣṇa krāntavān asi tejasā
a saṃprāpya divam ākāśam ādityasadane sthitaḥ
c atyarocaś ca bhūtātman bhāskaraṃ svena tejasā
d prādurbhāvasahasreṣu teṣu teṣu tvayā vibho
d adharmarucayaḥ kṛṣṇa nihatāḥ śataśo 'surāḥ
a sāditā mauravāḥ pāśā nisundanarakau hatau
c kṛtaḥ kṣemaḥ punaḥ panthāḥ puraṃ prāgjyotiṣaṃ prati
a jārūthyām āhutiḥ krāthaḥ śiśupālo janaiḥ saha
c bhīmasenaś ca śaibyaś ca śatadhanvā ca nirjitaḥ
a tathā parjanyaghoṣeṇa rathenādityavarcasā
c avākṣīr mahiṣīṃ bhojyāṃ raṇe nirjitya rukmiṇam
a indradyumno hataḥ kopād yavanaś ca kaśerumān
c hataḥ saubhapatiḥ śālvas tvayā saubhaṃ ca pātitam
d evam ete yudhi hatā bhūyaś cānyāñ śṛṇuṣva ha
a irāvatyāṃ tathā bhojaḥ kārtavīryasamo yudhi
c gopatis tālaketuś ca tvayā vinihatāv ubhau
a tāṃ ca bhogavatīṃ puṇyām ṛṣikāntāṃ janārdana
c dvārakām ātmasāt kṛtvā samudraṃ gamayiṣyasi
a na krodho na ca mātsaryaṃ nānṛtaṃ madhusūdana
c tvayi tiṣṭhati dāśārha na nṛśaṃsyaṃ kuto 'nṛju
a āsīnaṃ cittamadhye tvāṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
c āgamya ṛṣayaḥ sarve 'yācantābhayam acyuta
a yugānte sarvabhūtāni saṃkṣipya madhusūdana
c ātmany evātmasāt kṛtvā jagad āsse paraṃtapa
d yugādau tava vārṣṇeya nābhipadmād ajāyata
d brahmā carācaragurur yasyedaṃ sakalaṃ jagat
d taṃ hantum udyatau ghorau dānavau madhukaiṭabhau
d tayor vyatikramaṃ dṛṣṭvā kruddhasya bhavato hareḥ
d lalāṭāj jātavāñ śambhuḥ śūlapāṇis trilocanaḥ
d itthaṃ tāv api deveśau tvaccharīrasamudbhavau
d tvanniyogakārāv etāv iti me nārado 'bravīt
d tathā nārāyaṇa purā kratubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
d iṣṭavāṃs tvaṃ mahāsatraṃ kṛṣṇa caitrarathe vane
a naivaṃ pūrve nāpare vā kariṣyanti kṛtāni te
c karmāṇi yāni deva tvaṃ bāla eva mahādyute
a kṛtavān puṇḍarīkākṣa baladevasahāyavān
c vairājabhavane cāpi brahmaṇā nyavasaḥ saha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktvā tadātmānam ātmā kṛṣṇasya pāṇḍavaḥ
c tūṣṇīm āsīt tataḥ pārtham ity uvāca janārdanaḥ
a mamaiva tvaṃ tavaivāhaṃ ye madīyās tavaiva te
c yas tvāṃ dveṣṭi sa māṃ dveṣṭi yas tvām anu sa mām anu
a naras tvam asi durdharṣa harir nārāyaṇo hy aham
c lokāl lokam imaṃ prāptau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
a ananyaḥ pārtha mattas tvam ahaṃ tvattaś ca bhārata
c nāvayor antaraṃ śakyaṃ vedituṃ bharatarṣabha
 evam ukte tu vacane keśavena mahātmanā
 ity uktvā puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ pāṇḍavaṃ supriyaṃ priyam
 prīyamāṇo hṛṣīkeśas tūṣṇīm āsāṃ babhūva ha
a tasmin vīrasamāvāye saṃrabdheṣv atha rājasu
c dhṛṣṭadyumnamukhair vīrair bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritā
a pāñcālī puṇḍarīkākṣam āsīnaṃ yādavaiḥ saha
c abhigamyābravīt kṛṣṇā śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇī
 vāsudeva vasūnāṃ ca vāsavo bahudhācyuta
 devadevo 'si lokānāṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
a pūrve prajānisarge tvām āhur ekaṃ prajāpatim
c sraṣṭāraṃ sarvabhūtānām asito devalo 'bravīt
a viṣṇus tvam asi durdharṣa tvaṃ yajño madhusūdana
c yaṣṭā tvam asi yaṣṭavyo jāmadagnyo yathābravīt
a ṛṣayas tvāṃ kṣamām āhuḥ satyaṃ ca puruṣottama
c satyād yajño 'si saṃbhūtaḥ kaśyapas tvāṃ yathābravīt
a sādhyānām api devānāṃ vasūnām īśvareśvaraḥ
c lokabhāvana lokeśa yathā tvāṃ nārado 'bravīt
d brahmaśaṃkaraśakrādyair devavṛndaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d krīḍase tvaṃ naravyāghra bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva
a divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ ca pṛthivī vibho
c jaṭharaṃ te ime lokāḥ puruṣo 'si sanātanaḥ
a vidyātapo 'bhitaptānāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanām
c ātmadarśanasiddhānām ṛṣīṇām ṛṣisattama
a rājarṣīṇāṃ puṇyakṛtām āhaveṣv anivartinām
c sarvadharmopapannānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ puruṣottama
a tvaṃ prabhus tvaṃ vibhus tvaṃ bhūr ātmabhūs tvaṃ sanātanaḥ
c lokapālāś ca lokāś ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa
e nabhaś candraś ca sūryaś ca tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a martyatā caiva bhūtānām amaratvaṃ divaukasām
c tvayi sarvaṃ mahābāho lokakāryaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a sā te 'haṃ duḥkham ākhyāsye praṇayān madhusūdana
c īśas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
a kathaṃ nu bhāryā pārthānāṃ tava kṛṣṇa sakhī vibho
c dhṛṣṭadyumnasya bhaginī sabhāṃ kṛṣyeta mādṛśī
a strīdharmiṇī vepamānā rudhireṇa samukṣitā
c ekavastrā vikṛṣṭāsmi duḥkhitā kurusaṃsadi
a rājamadhye sabhāyāṃ tu rajasābhisamīritām
c dṛṣṭvā ca māṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ prāhasan pāpacetasaḥ
d kṛṣyamāṇāṃ tathā dīnām anāthām iva mādhava
d āhuś caitān ṣaṇḍatilān pañca caiva tu pāṇḍavān
d patim anyaṃ vṛṇīṣveti sarve te madhusūdana
a dāsībhāvena bhoktuṃ mām īṣus te madhusūdana
c jīvatsu pāṇḍuputreṣu pāñcāleṣv atha vṛṣṇiṣu
a nanv ahaṃ kṛṣṇa bhīṣmasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya cobhayoḥ
c snuṣā bhavāmi dharmeṇa sāhaṃ dāsīkṛtā balāt
a garhaye pāṇḍavāṃs tv eva yudhi śreṣṭhān mahābalān
c ye kliśyamānāṃ prekṣante dharmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm
a dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatām
c yau māṃ viprakṛtāṃ kṣudrair marṣayetāṃ janārdana
a śāśvato 'yaṃ dharmapathaḥ sadbhir ācaritaḥ sadā
c yad bhāryāṃ parirakṣanti bhartāro 'lpabalā api
a bhāryāyāṃ rakṣyamāṇāyāṃ prajā bhavati rakṣitā
c prajāyāṃ rakṣyamāṇāyām ātmā bhavati rakṣitaḥ
a ātmā hi jāyate tasyāṃ tasmāj jāyā bhavaty uta
c bhartā ca bhāryayā rakṣyaḥ kathaṃ jāyān mamodare
a nanv ime śaraṇaṃ prāptān na tyajanti kadā cana
c te māṃ śaraṇam āpannāṃ nānvapadyanta pāṇḍavāḥ
a pañceme pañcabhir jātāḥ kumārāś cāmitaujasaḥ
c eteṣām apy avekṣārthaṃ trātavyāsmi janārdana
a prativindhyo yudhiṣṭhirāt sutasomo vṛkodarāt
c arjunāc chrutakīrtis tu śatānīkas tu nākuliḥ
a kaniṣṭhāc chrutakarmā tu sarve satyaparākramāḥ
c pradyumno yādṛśaḥ kṛṣṇa tādṛśās te mahārathāḥ
a nanv ime dhanuṣi śreṣṭhā ajeyā yudhi śātravaiḥ
c kimarthaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sahante durbalīyasām
a adharmeṇa hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ sarve dāsāḥ kṛtās tathā
c sabhāyāṃ parikṛṣṭāham ekavastrā rajasvalā
a nādhijyam api yac chakyaṃ kartum anyena gāṇḍivam
c anyatrārjunabhīmābhyāṃ tvayā vā madhusūdana
a dhig bhīmasenasya balaṃ dhik pārthasya ca gāṇḍivam
c yatra duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa muhūrtam api jīvati
d kālaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ
d tat kālena kṛtaṃ manye na te pauruṣavardhanam
a ya etān ākṣipad rāṣṭrāt saha mātrāvihiṃsakān
c adhīyānān purā bālān vratasthān madhusūdana
a bhojane bhīmasenasya pāpaḥ prākṣepayad viṣam
c kālakūṭaṃ navaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
a taj jīrṇam avikāreṇa sahānnena janārdana
c saśeṣatvān mahābāho bhīmasya puruṣottama
a pramāṇakoṭyāṃ viśvastaṃ tathā suptaṃ vṛkodaram
c baddhvainaṃ kṛṣṇa gaṅgāyāṃ prakṣipya punar āvrajat
a yadā vibuddhaḥ kaunteyas tadā saṃchidya bandhanam
c udatiṣṭhan mahābāhur bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
a āśīviṣaiḥ kṛṣṇasarpaiḥ suptaṃ cainam adaṃśayat
c sarveṣv evāṅgadeśeṣu na mamāra ca śatruhā
a pratibuddhas tu kaunteyaḥ sarvān sarpān apothayat
c sārathiṃ cāsya dayitam apahastena jaghnivān
a punaḥ suptān upādhākṣīd bālakān vāraṇāvate
c śayānān āryayā sārdhaṃ ko nu tat kartum arhati
a yatrāryā rudatī bhītā pāṇḍavān idam abravīt
c mahad vyasanam āpannā śikhinā parivāritā
a hā hatāsmi kuto nv adya bhavec chāntir ihānalāt
c anāthā vinaśiṣyāmi bālakaiḥ putrakaiḥ saha
a tatra bhīmo mahābāhur vāyuvegaparākramaḥ
c āryām āśvāsayām āsa bhrātṝṃś cāpi vṛkodaraḥ
a vainateyo yathā pakṣī garuḍaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
c tathaivābhipatiṣyāmi bhayaṃ vo neha vidyate
a āryām aṅkena vāmena rājānaṃ dakṣiṇena ca
c aṃsayoś ca yamau kṛtvā pṛṣṭhe bībhatsum eva ca
a sahasotpatya vegena sarvān ādāya vīryavān
c bhrātṝn āryāṃ ca balavān mokṣayām āsa pāvakāt
a te rātrau prasthitāḥ sarve mātrā saha yaśasvinaḥ
c abhyagacchan mahāraṇyaṃ hiḍimbavanam antikāt
a śrāntāḥ prasuptās tatreme mātrā saha suduḥkhitāḥ
c suptāṃś cainān abhyagacchad dhiḍimbā nāma rākṣasī
d sā dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaṃ tatra śayānaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
d hṛcchayenābhibhūtā hi bhīmasenam akāmayat
a bhīmasya pādau kṛtvā tu sva utsaṅge tato balāt
c paryamardata saṃhṛṣṭā kalyāṇī mṛdupāṇinā
a tām abudhyad ameyātmā balavān satyavikramaḥ
c paryapṛcchac ca tāṃ bhīmaḥ kim ihecchasy anindite
d saivam uktā tu bhīmena rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī
d bhīmasenaṃ mahātmānam idam āha śucismitā
d palāyadhvam itaḥ kṣipraṃ mama bhrātā suvīryavān
d āgamiṣyati vo hantuṃ tasmād gacchata māciram
d atha bhīmo 'bhyuvācaināṃ sābhimānam idaṃ vacaḥ
d nodvijeyam ahaṃ tasmān nihaniṣye 'ham āgatam
d āgataṃ pratiyotsyāmi rākṣasaṃ bhrātaraṃ tava
a tayoḥ śrutvā tu kathitam āgacchad rākṣasādhamaḥ
c bhīmarūpo mahānādān visṛjan bhīmadarśanaḥ
 athainām abravīt kruddho rākṣasaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
a kena sārdhaṃ kathayasi ānayainaṃ mamāntikam
c hiḍimbe bhakṣayiṣyāvo na ciraṃ kartum arhasi
a sā kṛpāsaṃgṛhītena hṛdayena manasvinī
c nainam aicchat tadākhyātum anukrośād aninditā
a sa nādān vinadan ghorān rākṣasaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
c abhyadravata vegena bhīmasenaṃ tadā kila
d tam āgatam abhiprekṣya bhīmaseno mahābalam
d utthāya sahasā rakṣo nijagrāha mahābalaḥ
a tam abhidrutya saṃkruddho vegena mahatā balī
c agṛhṇāt pāṇinā pāṇiṃ bhīmasenasya rākṣasaḥ
a indrāśanisamasparśaṃ vajrasaṃhananaṃ dṛḍham
c saṃhatya bhīmasenāya vyākṣipat sahasā karam
a gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā pāṇiṃ bhīmaseno 'tha rakṣasā
c nāmṛṣyata mahābāhus tatrākrudhyad vṛkodaraḥ
a tatrāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ bhīmasenahiḍimbayoḥ
c sarvāstraviduṣor ghoraṃ vṛtravāsavayor iva
d vikrīḍya suciraṃ bhīmo rākṣasena sahānagha
d nijaghāna mahāvīryas taṃ tadā nirbalaṃ balī
d talair aśanikalpaiś ca muṣṭibhiś cāhanat tadā
d tato bhīmo mahābāhū rūpam āsthāya vai mahat
d jaghāna rākṣasaṃ kruddho vṛtraṃ devapatir yathā
a hatvā hiḍimbaṃ bhīmo 'tha prasthito bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
c hiḍimbām agrataḥ kṛtvā yasyāṃ jāto ghaṭotkacaḥ
a tataś ca prādravan sarve saha mātrā yaśasvinaḥ
c ekacakrām abhimukhāḥ saṃvṛtā brāhmaṇavrajaiḥ
a prasthāne vyāsa eṣāṃ ca mantrī priyahito 'bhavat
c tato 'gacchann ekacakrāṃ pāṇḍavāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
a tatrāpy āsādayām āsur bakaṃ nāma mahābalam
c puruṣādaṃ pratibhayaṃ hiḍimbenaiva saṃmitam
a taṃ cāpi vinihatyograṃ bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
c sahito bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvair drupadasya puraṃ yayau
a labdhāham api tatraiva vasatā savyasācinā
c yathā tvayā jitā kṛṣṇa rukmiṇī bhīṣmakātmajā
a evaṃ suyuddhe pārthena jitāhaṃ madhusūdana
c svayaṃvare mahat karma kṛtvā nasukaraṃ paraiḥ
a evaṃ kleśaiḥ subahubhiḥ kliśyamānāḥ suduḥkhitāḥ
c nivasāmāryayā hīnāḥ kṛṣṇa dhaumyapuraḥsarāḥ
a ta ime siṃhavikrāntā vīryeṇābhyadhikāḥ paraiḥ
c vihīnaiḥ parikliśyantīṃ samupekṣanta māṃ katham
a etādṛśāni duḥkhāni sahante durbalīyasām
c dīrghakālaṃ pradīptāni pāpānāṃ kṣudrakarmaṇām
a kule mahati jātāsmi divyena vidhinā kila
c pāṇḍavānāṃ priyā bhāryā snuṣā pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥ
a kacagraham anuprāptā sāsmi kṛṣṇa varā satī
c pañcānām indrakalpānāṃ prekṣatāṃ madhusūdana
a ity uktvā prārudat kṛṣṇā mukhaṃ pracchādya pāṇinā
c padmakośaprakāśena mṛdunā mṛdubhāṣiṇī
a stanāv apatitau pīnau sujātau śubhalakṣaṇau
c abhyavarṣata pāñcālī duḥkhajair aśrubindubhiḥ
a cakṣuṣī parimārjantī niḥśvasantī punaḥ punaḥ
c bāṣpapūrṇena kaṇṭhena kruddhā vacanam abravīt
a naiva me patayaḥ santi na putrā madhusūdana
c na bhrātaro na ca pitā naiva tvaṃ na ca bāndhavāḥ
a ye māṃ viprakṛtāṃ kṣudrair upekṣadhvaṃ viśokavat
c na hi me śāmyate duḥkhaṃ karṇo yat prāhasat tadā
d caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ kṛṣṇa tvayā rakṣyāsmi nityaśaḥ
d saṃbandhād gauravāt sakhyāt prabhutvenaiva keśava
a athainām abravīt kṛṣṇas tasmin vīrasamāgame
b draupadyās tad vacaḥ śrutvā krodhāmarṣasamanvitaḥ
b sāntvayaṃś ca varārohāṃ suvākyair bharatarṣabha
c rodiṣyanti striyo hy evaṃ yeṣāṃ kruddhāsi bhāmini
a bībhatsuśarasaṃchannāñ śoṇitaughapariplutān
c nihatāñ jīvitaṃ tyaktvā śayānān vasudhātale
d tvaṃ śroṣyasy anavadyāṅgi duryodhanamukhān ripūn
a yat samarthaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tat kariṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
c satyaṃ te pratijānāmi rājñāṃ rājñī bhaviṣyasi
a pated dyaur himavāñ śīryet pṛthivī śakalībhavet
c śuṣyet toyanidhiḥ kṛṣṇe na me moghaṃ vaco bhavet
d tac chrutvā draupadī vākyaṃ prativākyam athācyutāt
d sācīkṛtam avaikṣat sā pāñcālī madhyamaṃ patim
d ābabhāṣe mahārāja draupadīm arjunas tadā
d mā rodīḥ śubhatāmrākṣi yad āha madhusūdanaḥ
d tathā tad bhavitā devi nānyathā varavarṇini
 dhṛṣṭadyumna uvāca
a ahaṃ droṇaṃ haniṣyāmi śikhaṇḍī tu pitāmaham
c duryodhanaṃ bhīmasenaḥ karṇaṃ hantā dhanaṃjayaḥ
d śakuniṃ tv akṣakitavaṃ mādrīputro haniṣyati
a rāmakṛṣṇau vyapāśritya ajeyāḥ sma śucismite
c api vṛtrahaṇā yuddhe kiṃ punar dhṛtarāṣṭrajaiḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity ukte 'bhimukhā vīrā vāsudevam upasthitā
c teṣāṃ madhye mahābāhuḥ keśavo vākyam abravīt
 vāsudeva uvāca
a nedaṃ kṛcchram anuprāpto bhavān syād vasudhādhipa
c yady ahaṃ dvārakāyāṃ syāṃ rājan saṃnihitaḥ purā
a āgaccheyam ahaṃ dyūtam anāhūto 'pi kauravaiḥ
c āmbikeyena durdharṣa rājñā duryodhanena ca
a vārayeyam ahaṃ dyūtaṃ bahūn doṣān pradarśayan
c bhīṣmadroṇau samānāyya kṛpaṃ bāhlīkam eva ca
a vaicitravīryaṃ rājānam alaṃ dyūtena kaurava
c putrāṇāṃ tava rājendra tvannimittam iti prabho
a tatra vakṣyāmy ahaṃ doṣān yair bhavān avaropitaḥ
c vīrasenasuto yaiś ca rājyāt prabhraṃśitaḥ purā
d puṣkareṇa narendreṇa tāñ ca vakṣyāmi tasya vai
a abhakṣitavināśaṃ ca devanena viśāṃ pate
c sātatyaṃ ca prasaṅgasya varṇayeyaṃ yathātatham
a striyo 'kṣā mṛgayā pānam etat kāmasamutthitam
c vyasanaṃ catuṣṭayaṃ proktaṃ yai rājan bhraśyate śriyaḥ
a tatra sarvatra vaktavyaṃ manyante śāstrakovidāḥ
c viśeṣataś ca vaktavyaṃ dyūte paśyanti tadvidaḥ
a ekāhnā dravyanāśo 'tra dhruvaṃ vyasanam eva ca
c abhuktanāśaś cārthānāṃ vākpāruṣyaṃ ca kevalam
a etac cānyac ca kauravya prasaṅgi kaṭukodayam
c dyūte brūyāṃ mahābāho samāsādyāmbikāsutam
a evam ukto yadi mayā gṛhṇīyād vacanaṃ mama
c anāmayaṃ syād dharmasya kurūṇāṃ kurunandana
a na cet sa mama rājendra gṛhṇīyān madhuraṃ vacaḥ
c pathyaṃ ca bharataśreṣṭha nigṛhṇīyāṃ balena tam
a athainān abhinīyaivaṃ suhṛdo nāma durhṛdaḥ
c sabhāsadaś ca tān sarvān bhedayeyaṃ durodarān
d sarvāṃs tān anugṛhṇīma baddhvā pāśais tu vāruṇaiḥ
a asāṃnidhyaṃ tu kauravya mamānarteṣv abhūt tadā
c yenedaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptā bhavanto dyūtakāritam
a so 'ham etya kuruśreṣṭha dvārakāṃ pāṇḍunandana
c aśrauṣaṃ tvāṃ vyasaninaṃ yuyudhānād yathātatham
a śrutvaiva cāhaṃ rājendra paramodvignamānasaḥ
c tūrṇam abhyāgato 'smi tvāṃ draṣṭukāmo viśāṃ pate
a aho kṛcchram anuprāptāḥ sarve sma bharatarṣabha
c ye vayaṃ tvāṃ vyasaninaṃ paśyāmaḥ saha sodaraiḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a asāṃnidhyaṃ kathaṃ kṛṣṇa tavāsīd vṛṣṇinandana
c kva cāsīd vipravāsas te kiṃ vākārṣīḥ pravāsakaḥ
 kṛṣṇa uvāca
a śālvasya nagaraṃ saubhaṃ gato 'haṃ bharatarṣabha
c vinihantuṃ naraśreṣṭha tatra me śṛṇu kāraṇam
a mahātejā mahābāhur yaḥ sa rājā mahāyaśāḥ
c damaghoṣātmajo vīraḥ śiśupālo mayā hataḥ
a yajñe te bharataśreṣṭha rājasūye 'rhaṇāṃ prati
c sa roṣavaśasaṃprāpto nāmṛṣyata durātmavān
a śrutvā taṃ nihataṃ śālvas tīvraroṣasamanvitaḥ
c upāyād dvārakāṃ śūnyām ihasthe mayi bhārata
a sa tatra yodhito rājan bālakair vṛṣṇipuṃgavaiḥ
c āgataḥ kāmagaṃ saubham āruhyaiva nṛśaṃsakṛt
d cirajīvī nṛpaḥ so 'pi prasādāt padmajanmanaḥ
a tato vṛṣṇipravīrāṃs tān bālān hatvā bahūṃs tadā
c purodyānāni sarvāṇi bhedayām āsa durmatiḥ
a uktavāṃś ca mahābāho kvāsau vṛṣṇikulādhamaḥ
c vāsudevaḥ sumandātmā vasudevasuto gataḥ
a tasya yuddhārthino darpaṃ yuddhe nāśayitāsmy aham
c ānartāḥ satyam ākhyāta tatra gantāsmi yatra saḥ
a taṃ hatvā vinivartiṣye kaṃsakeśiniṣūdanam
c ahatvā na nivartiṣye satyenāyudham ālabhe
a kvāsau kvāsāv iti punas tatra tatra vidhāvati
c mayā kila raṇe yuddhaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ sa saubharāṭ
a adya taṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ kṣudraṃ viśvāsaghātinam
c śiśupālavadhāmarṣād gamayiṣye yamakṣayam
a mama pāpasvabhāvena bhrātā yena nipātitaḥ
c śiśupālo mahīpālas taṃ vadhiṣye mahītale
a bhrātā bālaś ca rājā ca na ca saṃgrāmamūrdhani
c pramattaś ca hato vīras taṃ haniṣye janārdanam
a evamādi mahārāja vilapya divam āsthitaḥ
c kāmagena sa saubhena kṣiptvā māṃ kurunandana
d gataḥ kauravya duṣṭātmā mārtikāvatiko nṛpaḥ
a tam aśrauṣam ahaṃ gatvā yathā vṛttaḥ sudurmatiḥ
c mayi kauravya duṣṭātmā mārttikāvatako nṛpaḥ
a tato 'ham api kauravya roṣavyākulalocanaḥ
c niścitya manasā rājan vadhāyāsya mano dadhe
a ānarteṣu vimardaṃ ca kṣepaṃ cātmani kaurava
c pravṛddham avalepaṃ ca tasya duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ
a tataḥ saubhavadhāyāhaṃ pratasthe pṛthivīpate
c sa mayā sāgarāvarte dṛṣṭa āsīt parīpsatā
a tataḥ pradhmāpya jalajaṃ pāñcajanyam ahaṃ nṛpa
c āhūya śālvaṃ samare yuddhāya samavasthitaḥ
a sumuhūrtam abhūd yuddhaṃ tatra me dānavaiḥ saha
c vaśībhūtāś ca me sarve bhūtale ca nipātitāḥ
a etat kāryaṃ mahābāho yenāhaṃ nāgamaṃ tadā
c śrutvaiva hāstinapuraṃ dyūtaṃ cāvinayotthitam
d drutam āgatavān yuṣmān draṣṭukāmaḥ suduḥkhitān
d śrutvaiva tat kṣaṇaṃ vegād āgato 'haṃ narādhipa
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a vāsudeva mahābāho vistareṇa mahāmate
c saubhasya vadham ācakṣva na hi tṛpyāmi kathyataḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a hataṃ śrutvā mahābāho mayā śrautaśravaṃ nṛpam
c upāyād bharataśreṣṭha śālvo dvāravatīṃ purīm
a arundhat tāṃ suduṣṭātmā sarvataḥ pāṇḍunandana
c śālvo vaihāyasaṃ cāpi tat puraṃ vyūhya viṣṭhitaḥ
a tatrastho 'tha mahīpālo yodhayām āsa tāṃ purīm
c abhisāreṇa sarveṇa tatra yuddham avartata
a purī samantād vihitā sapatākā satoraṇā
c sacakrā sahuḍā caiva sayantrakhanakā tathā
a sopatalpapratolīkā sāṭṭāṭṭālakagopurā
c sakacagrahaṇī caiva solkālātāvapothikā
a soṣṭrikā bharataśreṣṭha sabherīpaṇavānakā
c samittṛṇakuśā rājan saśataghnīkalāṅgalā
a sabhuśuṇḍyaśmalaguḍā sāyudhā saparaśvadhā
c lohacarmavatī cāpi sāgniḥ sahuḍaśṛṅgikā
a śāstradṛṣṭena vidhinā saṃyuktā bharatarṣabha
c dravyair anekair vividhair gadasāmboddhavādibhiḥ
a puruṣaiḥ kuruśārdūla samarthaiḥ pratibādhane
c abhikhyātakulair vīrair dṛṣṭavīryaiś ca saṃyuge
a madhyamena ca gulmena rakṣitā sārasaṃjñitā
c utkṣiptagulmaiś ca tathā hayaiś caiva padātibhiḥ
a āghoṣitaṃ ca nagare na pātavyā sureti ha
c pramādaṃ parirakṣadbhir ugrasenoddhavādibhiḥ
a pramatteṣv abhighātaṃ hi kuryāc chālvo narādhipaḥ
c iti kṛtvāpramattās te sarve vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ sthitāḥ
a ānartāś ca tathā sarve naṭanartakagāyanāḥ
c bahir vivāsitāḥ sarve rakṣadbhir vittasaṃcayān
a saṃkramā bheditāḥ sarve nāvaś ca pratiṣedhitāḥ
c parikhāś cāpi kauravya kīlaiḥ sunicitāḥ kṛtāḥ
a udapānāḥ kuruśreṣṭha tathaivāpy ambarīṣakāḥ
c samantāt krośamātraṃ ca kāritā viṣamā ca bhūḥ
d saṃkramā bheditāḥ sarve prākārāś ca navīkṛtāḥ
a prakṛtyā viṣamaṃ durgaṃ prakṛtyā ca surakṣitam
c prakṛtyā cāyudhopetaṃ viśeṣeṇa tadānagha
a surakṣitaṃ suguptaṃ ca sarvāyudhasamanvitam
c tat puraṃ bharataśreṣṭha yathendrabhavanaṃ tathā
a na cāmudro 'bhiniryāti na cāmudraḥ praveśyate
c vṛṣṇyandhakapure rājaṃs tadā saubhasamāgame
a anu rathyāsu sarvāsu catvareṣu ca kaurava
c balaṃ babhūva rājendra prabhūtagajavājimat
a dattavetanabhaktaṃ ca dattāyudhaparicchadam
c kṛtāpadānaṃ ca tadā balam āsīn mahābhuja
a na kupyavetanī kaś cin na cātikrāntavetanī
c nānugrahabhṛtaḥ kaś cin na cādṛṣṭaparākramaḥ
a evaṃ suvihitā rājan dvārakā bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
c āhukena suguptā ca rājñā rājīvalocana
 vāsudeva uvāca
a tāṃ tūpayātvā rājendra śālvaḥ saubhapatis tadā
c prabhūtanaranāgena balenopaviveśa ha
a same niviṣṭā sā senā prabhūtasalilāśaye
c caturaṅgabalopetā śālvarājābhipālitā
a varjayitvā śmaśānāni devatāyatanāni ca
c valmīkāṃś caiva caityāṃś ca tanniviṣṭam abhūd balam
a anīkānāṃ vibhāgena panthānaḥ ṣaṭ kṛtābhavan
c pravaṇā nava caivāsañ śālvasya śibire nṛpa
a sarvāyudhasamopetaṃ sarvaśastraviśāradam
c rathanāgāśvakalilaṃ padātidhvajasaṃkulam
a tuṣṭapuṣṭajanopetaṃ vīralakṣaṇalakṣitam
c vicitradhvajasaṃnāhaṃ vicitrarathakārmukam
a saṃniveśya ca kauravya dvārakāyāṃ nararṣabha
c abhisārayām āsa tadā vegena patagendravat
a tadāpatantaṃ saṃdṛśya balaṃ śālvapates tadā
c niryāya yodhayām āsuḥ kumārā vṛṣṇinandanāḥ
a asahanto 'bhiyānaṃ tac chālvarājasya kaurava
c cārudeṣṇaś ca sāmbaś ca pradyumnaś ca mahārathaḥ
a te rathair daṃśitāḥ sarve vicitrābharaṇadhvajāḥ
c saṃsaktāḥ śālvarājasya bahubhir yodhapuṃgavaiḥ
a gṛhītvā tu dhanuḥ sāmbaḥ śālvasya sacivaṃ raṇe
c yodhayām āsa saṃhṛṣṭaḥ kṣemavṛddhiṃ camūpatim
a tasya bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ jāmbavatyāḥ suto mahat
c mumoca bharataśreṣṭha yathā varṣaṃ sahasradṛk
a tad bāṇavarṣaṃ tumulaṃ viṣehe sa camūpatiḥ
c kṣemavṛddhir mahārāja himavān iva niścalaḥ
a tataḥ sāmbāya rājendra kṣemavṛddhir api sma ha
c mumoca māyāvihitaṃ śarajālaṃ mahattaram
a tato māyāmayaṃ jālaṃ māyayaiva vidārya saḥ
c sāmbaḥ śarasahasreṇa ratham asyābhyavarṣata
a tataḥ sa viddhaḥ sāmbena kṣemavṛddhiś camūpatiḥ
c apāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ sāmbabāṇaprapīḍitaḥ
a tasmin vipradrute krūre śālvasyātha camūpatau
c vegavān nāma daiteyaḥ sutaṃ me 'bhyadravad balī
a abhipannas tu rājendra sāmbo vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ
c vegaṃ vegavato rājaṃs tasthau vīro vidhārayan
a sa vegavati kaunteya sāmbo vegavatīṃ gadām
c cikṣepa tarasā vīro vyāvidhya satyavikramaḥ
a tayā tv abhihato rājan vegavān apatad bhuvi
c vātarugṇa iva kṣuṇṇo jīrṇamūlo vanaspatiḥ
a tasmin nipatite vīre gadānunne mahāsure
c praviśya mahatīṃ senāṃ yodhayām āsa me sutaḥ
a cārudeṣṇena saṃsakto vivindhyo nāma dānavaḥ
c mahārathaḥ samājñāto mahārāja mahādhanuḥ
a tataḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ cārudeṣṇavivindhyayoḥ
c vṛtravāsavayo rājan yathā pūrvaṃ tathābhavat
a anyonyasyābhisaṃkruddhāv anyonyaṃ jaghnatuḥ śaraiḥ
c vinadantau mahārāja siṃhāv iva mahābalau
a raukmiṇeyas tato bāṇam agnyarkopamavarcasam
c abhimantrya mahāstreṇa saṃdadhe śatrunāśanam
a sa vivindhyāya sakrodhaḥ samāhūya mahārathaḥ
c cikṣepa me suto rājan sa gatāsur athāpatat
a vivindhyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ca vikṣobhitāṃ camūm
c kāmagena sa saubhena śālvaḥ punar upāgamat
a tato vyākulitaṃ sarvaṃ dvārakāvāsi tad balam
c dṛṣṭvā śālvaṃ mahābāho saubhasthaṃ pṛthivīgatam
a tato niryāya kaunteya vyavasthāpya ca tad balam
c ānartānāṃ mahārāja pradyumno vākyam abravīt
a sarve bhavantas tiṣṭhantu sarve paśyantu māṃ yudhi
c nivārayantaṃ saṃgrāme balāt saubhaṃ sarājakam
a ahaṃ saubhapateḥ senām āyasair bhujagair iva
c dhanurbhujavinirmuktair nāśayāmy adya yādavāḥ
a āśvasadhvaṃ na bhīḥ kāryā saubharāḍ adya naśyati
c mayābhipanno duṣṭātmā sasaubho vinaśiṣyati
a evaṃ bruvati saṃhṛṣṭe pradyumne pāṇḍunandana
c viṣṭhitaṃ tad balaṃ vīra yuyudhe ca yathāsukham
 vāsudeva uvāca
a evam uktvā raukmiṇeyo yādavān bharatarṣabha
c daṃśitair haribhir yuktaṃ ratham āsthāya kāñcanam
a ucchritya makaraṃ ketuṃ vyāttānanam alaṃkṛtam
c utpatadbhir ivākāśaṃ tair hayair anvayāt parān
a vikṣipan nādayaṃś cāpi dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ mahābalaḥ
c tūṇakhaḍgadharaḥ śūro baddhagodhāṅgulitravān
a sa vidyuccalitaṃ cāpaṃ viharan vai talāt talam
c mohayām āsa daiteyān sarvān saubhanivāsinaḥ
a nāsya vikṣipataś cāpaṃ saṃdadhānasya cāsakṛt
c antaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cin nighnataḥ śātravān raṇe
a mukhasya varṇo na vikalpate 'sya
celuś ca gātrāṇi na cāpi tasya
c siṃhonnataṃ cāpy abhigarjato 'sya
śuśrāva loko 'dbhutarūpam agryam
a jalecaraḥ kāñcanayaṣṭisaṃstho
vyāttānanaḥ sarvatimipramāthī
c vitrāsayan rājati vāhamukhye
śālvasya senāpramukhe dhvajāgryaḥ
a tataḥ sa tūrṇaṃ niṣpatya pradyumnaḥ śatrukarśanaḥ
c śālvam evābhidudrāva vidhāsyan kalahaṃ nṛpa
a abhiyānaṃ tu vīreṇa pradyumnena mahāhave
c nāmarṣayata saṃkruddhaḥ śālvaḥ kurukulodvaha
a sa roṣamadamatto vai kāmagād avaruhya ca
c pradyumnaṃ yodhayām āsa śālvaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
a tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ śālvavṛṣṇipravīrayoḥ
c sametā dadṛśur lokā balivāsavayor iva
a tasya māyāmayo vīra ratho hemapariṣkṛtaḥ
c sadhvajaḥ sapatākaś ca sānukarṣaḥ satūṇavān
a sa taṃ rathavaraṃ śrīmān samāruhya kila prabho
c mumoca bāṇān kauravya pradyumnāya mahābalaḥ
a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjat tarasā raṇe
c pradyumno bhujavegena śālvaṃ saṃmohayann iva
a sa tair abhihataḥ saṃkhye nāmarṣayata saubharāṭ
c śarān dīptāgnisaṃkāśān mumoca tanaye mama
d tān āpatata sic
 bāṇaughān sa ciccheda mahābalaḥ
d tataś cānyāñ śarān dīptān pracikṣepa sute mama
a sa śālvabāṇai rājendra viddho rukmiṇinandanaḥ
c mumoca bāṇaṃ tvarito marmabhedinam āhave
a tasya varma vibhidyāśu sa bāṇo matsuteritaḥ
c bibheda hṛdayaṃ patrī sa papāta mumoha ca
a tasmin nipatite vīre śālvarāje vicetasi
c saṃprādravan dānavendrā dārayanto vasuṃdharām
a hāhākṛtam abhūt sainyaṃ śālvasya pṛthivīpate
c naṣṭasaṃjñe nipatite tadā saubhapatau nṛpa
a tata utthāya kauravya pratilabhya ca cetanām
c mumoca bāṇaṃ tarasā pradyumnāya mahābalaḥ
a tena viddho mahābāhuḥ pradyumnaḥ samare sthitaḥ
c jatrudeśe bhṛśaṃ vīro vyavāsīdad rathe tadā
a taṃ sa viddhvā mahārāja śālvo rukmiṇinandanam
c nanāda siṃhanādaṃ vai nādenāpūrayan mahīm
a tato mohaṃ samāpanne tanaye mama bhārata
c mumoca bāṇāṃs tvaritaḥ punar anyān durāsadān
a sa tair abhihato bāṇair bahubhis tena mohitaḥ
c niśceṣṭaḥ kauravaśreṣṭha pradyumno 'bhūd raṇājire
 vāsudeva uvāca
a śālvabāṇārdite tasmin pradyumne balināṃ vare
c vṛṣṇayo bhagnasaṃkalpā vivyathuḥ pṛtanāgatāḥ
a hāhākṛtam abhūt sārvaṃ vṛṣṇyandhakabalaṃ tadā
c pradyumne patite rājan pare ca muditābhavan
a taṃ tathā mohitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sārathir javanair hayaiḥ
c raṇād apāharat tūrṇaṃ śikṣito dārukis tataḥ
a nātidūrāpayāte tu rathe rathavarapraṇut
c dhanur gṛhītvā yantāraṃ labdhasaṃjño 'bravīd idam
a saute kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ kasmād yāsi parāṅmukhaḥ
c naiṣa vṛṣṇipravīrāṇām āhave dharma ucyate
a kaccit saute na te mohaḥ śālvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāhave
c viṣādo vā raṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā brūhi me tvaṃ yathātatham
 sūta uvāca
a jānārdane na me moho nāpi me bhayam āviśat
c atibhāraṃ tu te manye śālvaṃ keśavanandana
a so 'payāmi śanair vīra balavān eṣa pāpakṛt
c mohitaś ca raṇe śūro rakṣyaḥ sārathinā rathī
a āyuṣmaṃs tvaṃ mayā nityaṃ rakṣitavyas tvayāpy aham
c rakṣitavyo rathī nityam iti kṛtvāpayāmy aham
a ekaś cāsi mahābāho bahavaś cāpi dānavāḥ
c nasamaṃ raukmiṇeyāhaṃ raṇaṃ matvāpayāmy aham
 vāsudeva uvāca
a evaṃ bruvati sūte tu tadā makaraketumān
c uvāca sūtaṃ kauravya nivartaya rathaṃ punaḥ
a dārukātmaja maivaṃ tvaṃ punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
c vyapayānaṃ raṇāt saute jīvato mama karhi cit
a na sa vṛṣṇikule jāto yo vai tyajati saṃgaram
c yo vā nipatitaṃ hanti tavāsmīti ca vādinam
a tathā striyaṃ vai yo hanti vṛddhaṃ bālaṃ tathaiva ca
c virathaṃ viprakīrṇaṃ ca bhagnaśastrāyudhaṃ tathā
a tvaṃ ca sūtakule jāto vinītaḥ sūtakarmaṇi
c dharmajñaś cāsi vṛṣṇīnām āhaveṣv api dāruke
a sa jānaṃś caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ pṛtanāmukhe
c apayānaṃ punaḥ saute maivaṃ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
a apayātaṃ hataṃ pṛṣṭhe bhītaṃ raṇapalāyinam
c gadāgrajo durādharṣaḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati mādhavaḥ
a keśavasyāgrajo vāpi nīlavāsā madotkaṭaḥ
c kiṃ vakṣyati mahābāhur baladevaḥ samāgataḥ
a kiṃ vakṣyati śiner naptā narasiṃho mahādhanuḥ
c apayātaṃ raṇāt saute sāmbaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ
a cārudeṣṇaś ca durdharṣas tathaiva gadasāraṇau
c akrūraś ca mahābāhuḥ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyati sārathe
a śūraṃ saṃbhāvitaṃ santaṃ nityaṃ puruṣamāninam
c striyaś ca vṛṣṇīvīrāṇāṃ kiṃ māṃ vakṣyanti saṃgatāḥ
a pradyumno 'yam upāyāti bhītas tyaktvā mahāhavam
c dhig enam iti vakṣyanti na tu vakṣyanti sādhv iti
a dhig vācā parihāso 'pi mama vā madvidhasya vā
c mṛtyunābhyadhikaḥ saute sa tvaṃ mā vyapayāḥ punaḥ
a bhāraṃ hi mayi saṃnyasya yāto madhunihā hariḥ
c yajñaṃ bharatasiṃhasya pārthasyāmitatejasaḥ
a kṛtavarmā mayā vīro niryāsyann eva vāritaḥ
c śālvaṃ nivārayiṣye 'haṃ tiṣṭha tvam iti sūtaja
a sa ca saṃbhāvayan māṃ vai nivṛtto hṛdikātmajaḥ
c taṃ sametya raṇaṃ tyaktvā kiṃ vakṣyāmi mahāratham
a upayātaṃ durādharṣaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam
c puruṣaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ kiṃ vakṣyāmi mahābhujam
a sātyakiṃ baladevaṃ ca ye cānye 'ndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
c mayā spardhanti satataṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi tān aham
a tyaktvā raṇam imaṃ saute pṛṣṭhato 'bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥ
c tvayāpanīto vivaśo na jīveyaṃ kathaṃ cana
a sa nivarta rathenāśu punar dārukanandana
c na caitad evaṃ kartavyam athāpatsu kathaṃ cana
a na jīvitam ahaṃ saute bahu manye kadā cana
c apayāto raṇād bhītaḥ pṛṣṭhato 'bhyāhataḥ śaraiḥ
a kadā vā sūtaputra tvaṃ jānīṣe māṃ bhayārditam
c apayātaṃ raṇaṃ hitvā yathā kāpuruṣaṃ tathā
a na yuktaṃ bhavatā tyaktuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ dārukātmaja
c mayi yuddhārthini bhṛśaṃ sa tvaṃ yāhi yato raṇam
 vāsudeva uvāca
a evam uktas tu kaunteya sūtaputras tadā mṛdhe
c pradyumnam abravīc chlakṣṇaṃ madhuraṃ vākyam añjasā
a na me bhayaṃ raukmiṇeya saṃgrāme yacchato hayān
c yuddhajñaś cāsmi vṛṣṇīnāṃ nātra kiṃ cid ato 'nyathā
a āyuṣmann upadeśas tu sārathye vartatāṃ smṛtaḥ
c sarvārtheṣu rathī rakṣyas tvaṃ cāpi bhṛśapīḍitaḥ
a tvaṃ hi śālvaprayuktena patriṇābhihato bhṛśam
c kaśmalābhihato vīra tato 'ham apayātavān
a sa tvaṃ sātvatamukhyādya labdhasaṃjño yadṛcchayā
c paśya me hayasaṃyāne śikṣāṃ keśavanandana
a dārukeṇāham utpanno yathāvac caiva śikṣitaḥ
c vītabhīḥ praviśāmy etāṃ śālvasya mahatīṃ camūm
a evam uktvā tato vīra hayān saṃcodya saṃgare
c raśmibhiś ca samudyamya javenābhyapatat tadā
a maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi yamakānītarāṇi ca
c savyāni ca vicitrāṇi dakṣiṇāni ca sarvaśaḥ
a pratodenāhatā rājan raśmibhiś ca samudyatāḥ
c utpatanta ivākāśaṃ vibabhus te hayottamāḥ
a te hastalāghavopetaṃ vijñāya nṛpa dārukim
c dahyamānā iva tadā paspṛśuś caraṇair mahīm
a so 'pasavyāṃ camūṃ tasya śālvasya bharatarṣabha
c cakāra nātiyatnena tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a amṛṣyamāṇo 'pasavyaṃ pradyumnena sa saubharāṭ
c yantāram asya sahasā tribhir bāṇaiḥ samarpayat
a dārukasya sutas taṃ tu bāṇavegam acintayan
c bhūya eva mahābāho prayayau hayasaṃmataḥ
a tato bāṇān bahuvidhān punar eva sa saubharāṭ
c mumoca tanaye vīre mama rukmiṇinandane
a tān aprāptāñ śitair bāṇaiś ciccheda paravīrahā
c raukmiṇeyaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā darśayan hastalāghavam
a chinnān dṛṣṭvā tu tān bāṇān pradyumnena sa saubharāṭ
c āsurīṃ dāruṇīṃ māyām āsthāya vyasṛjac charān
a prayujyamānam ājñāya daiteyāstraṃ mahābalaḥ
c brahmāstreṇāntarā chittvā mumocānyān patatriṇaḥ
a te tad astraṃ vidhūyāśu vivyadhū rudhirāśanāḥ
c śirasy urasi vaktre ca sa mumoha papāta ca
a tasmin nipatite kṣudre śālve bāṇaprapīḍite
c raukmiṇeyo 'paraṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdadhe śatrunāśanam
a tam arcitaṃ sarvadāśārhapūgair
āśīrbhir arkajvalanaprakāśam
c dṛṣṭvā śaraṃ jyām abhinīyamānaṃ
babhūva hāhākṛtam antarikṣam
a tato devagaṇāḥ sarve sendrāḥ saha dhaneśvarāḥ
c nāradaṃ preṣayām āsuḥ śvasanaṃ ca mahābalam
a tau raukmiṇeyam āgamya vaco 'brūtāṃ divaukasām
c naiṣa vadhyas tvayā vīra śālvarājaḥ kathaṃ cana
a saṃharasva punar bāṇam avadhyo 'yaṃ tvayā raṇe
c etasya hi śarasyājau nāvadhyo 'sti pumān kva cit
a mṛtyur asya mahābāho raṇe devakinandanaḥ
c kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkalpito dhātrā tan na mithyā bhaved iti
a tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pradyumnaḥ śaram uttamam
c saṃjahāra dhanuḥśreṣṭhāt tūṇe caiva nyaveśayat
a tata utthāya rājendra śālvaḥ paramadurmanāḥ
c vyapāyāt sabalas tūrṇaṃ pradyumnaśarapīḍitaḥ
a sa dvārakāṃ parityajya krūro vṛṣṇibhir arditaḥ
c saubham āsthāya rājendra divam ācakrame tadā
 vāsudeva uvāca
a ānartanagaraṃ muktaṃ tato 'ham agamaṃ tadā
c mahākratau rājasūye nivṛtte nṛpate tava
a apaśyaṃ dvārakāṃ cāhaṃ mahārāja hatatviṣam
c niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārāṃ nirbhūṣaṇavarastriyam
a anabhijñeyarūpāṇi dvārakopavanāni ca
c dṛṣṭvā śaṅkopapanno 'ham apṛcchaṃ hṛdikātmajam
a asvasthanaranārīkam idaṃ vṛṣṇipuraṃ bhṛṣam
c kim idaṃ naraśārdūla śrotum icchāmahe vayam
a evam uktas tu sa mayā vistareṇedam abravīt
c rodhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca śālvena hārdikyo rājasattama
a tato 'haṃ kauravaśreṣṭha śrutvā sarvam aśeṣataḥ
c vināśe śālvarājasya tadaivākaravaṃ matim
a tato 'haṃ bharataśreṣṭha samāśvāsya pure janam
c rājānam āhukaṃ caiva tathaivānakadundubhim
e sarvavṛṣṇipravīrāṃś ca harṣayann abruvaṃ tadā
a apramādaḥ sadā kāryo nagare yādavarṣabhāḥ
c śālvarājavināśāya prayātaṃ māṃ nibodhata
a nāhatvā taṃ nivartiṣye purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prati
c saśālvaṃ saubhanagaraṃ hatvā draṣṭāsmi vaḥ punaḥ
e trisāmā hanyatām eṣā dundubhiḥ śatrubhīṣaṇī
a te mayāśvāsitā vīrā yathāvad bharatarṣabha
c sarve mām abruvan hṛṣṭāḥ prayāhi jahi śātravān
a taiḥ prahṛṣṭātmabhir vīrair āśīrbhir abhinanditaḥ
c vācayitvā dvijaśreṣṭhān praṇamya śirasāhukam
a sainyasugrīvayuktena rathenānādayan diśaḥ
c pradhmāpya śaṅkhapravaraṃ pāñcajanyam ahaṃ nṛpa
a prayāto 'smi naravyāghra balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
c kḷptena caturaṅgeṇa balena jitakāśinā
a samatītya bahūn deśān girīṃś ca bahupādapān
c sarāṃsi saritaś caiva mārttikāvatam āsadam
a tatrāśrauṣaṃ naravyāghra śālvaṃ nagaram antikāt
c prayātaṃ saubham āsthāya tam ahaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayām
d dṛṣṭavān asmi rājendra sālvarājam athāntike
a tataḥ sāgaram āsādya kukṣau tasya mahormiṇaḥ
c samudranābhyāṃ śālvo 'bhūt saubham āsthāya śatruhan
d sa mām ālokya sahasā senāṃ svāṃ prāhiṇon mṛdhe
d madbāhunā ca senāyāṃ śiṣṭāyāṃ kiṃ cid eva ca
a sa samālokya dūrān māṃ smayann iva yudhiṣṭhira
c āhvayām āsa duṣṭātmā yuddhāyaiva muhur muhuḥ
a tasya śārṅgavinirmuktair bahubhir marmabhedibhiḥ
c puraṃ nāsādyata śarais tato māṃ roṣa āviśat
a sa cāpi pāpaprakṛtir daiteyāpasado nṛpa
c mayy avarṣata durdharṣaḥ śaradhārāḥ sahasraśaḥ
a sainikān mama sūtaṃ ca hayāṃś ca samavākirat
c acintayantas tu śarān vayaṃ yudhyāma bhārata
a tataḥ śatasahasrāṇi śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām
c cikṣipuḥ samare vīrā mayi śālvapadānugāḥ
a te hayān me rathaṃ caiva tadā dārukam eva ca
c chādayām āsur asurā bāṇair marmavibhedibhiḥ
a na hayā na ratho vīra na yantā mama dārukaḥ
c adṛśyanta śaraiś channās tathāhaṃ sainikāś ca me
a tato 'ham api kauravya śarāṇām ayutān bahūn
c abhimantritānāṃ dhanuṣā divyena vidhinākṣipam
a na tatra viṣayas tv āsīn mama sainyasya bhārata
c khe viṣaktaṃ hi tat saubhaṃ krośamātra ivābhavat
a tatas te prekṣakāḥ sarve raṅgavāṭa iva sthitāḥ
c harṣayām āsur uccair māṃ siṃhanādatalasvanaiḥ
a matkārmukavinirmuktā dānavānāṃ mahāraṇe
c aṅgeṣu rudhirāktās te viviśuḥ śalabhā iva
a tato halahalāśabdaḥ saubhamadhye vyavardhata
c vadhyatāṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ patatāṃ ca mahārṇave
a te nikṛttabhujaskandhāḥ kabandhākṛtidarśanāḥ
c nadanto bhairavān nādan nipatanti sma dānavāḥ
d patitās te 'pi bhakṣyante samudrāmbhonivāsibhiḥ
a tato gokṣīrakundendumṛṇālarajataprabham
c jalajaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ vai prāṇenāham apūrayam
a tān dṛṣṭvā patitāṃs tatra śālvaḥ saubhapatis tadā
c māyāyuddhena mahatā yodhayām āsa māṃ yudhi
a tato huḍahuḍāḥ prāsāḥ śaktiśūlaparaśvadhāḥ
b asayaḥ śaktimuśalapāśārṣṭikaṇapāḥ śarāḥ
c paṭṭiśāś ca bhuśuṇḍyaś ca prāpatann aniśaṃ mayi
a tān ahaṃ māyayaivāśu pratigṛhya vyanāśayam
c tasyāṃ hatāyāṃ māyāyāṃ giriśṛṅgair ayodhayat
a tato 'bhavat tama iva prabhātam iva cābhavat
c durdinaṃ sudinaṃ caiva śītam uṣṇaṃ ca bhārata
d aṅgārapāṃśuvarṣaṃ ca śastravarṣaṃ ca bhārata
a evaṃ māyāṃ vikurvāṇo yodhayām āsa māṃ ripuḥ
c vijñāya tad ahaṃ sarvaṃ māyayaiva vyanāśayam
d sa mohayām āsa tadā māyayā yudhi dānavaḥ
d tato hatāyāṃ ca mayā māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavaḥ
e yathākālaṃ tu yuddhena vyadhamaṃ sarvataḥ śaraiḥ
a tato vyoma mahārāja śatasūryam ivābhavat
c śatacandraṃ ca kaunteya sahasrāyutatārakam
a tato nājñāyata tadā divārātraṃ tathā diśaḥ
c tato 'haṃ moham āpannaḥ prajñāstraṃ samayojayam
e tatas tad astram astreṇa vidhūtaṃ śaratūlavat
a tathā tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c labdhālokaś ca rājendra punaḥ śatrum ayodhayam
 vāsudeva uvāca
a evaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra śālvo rājñāṃ mahāripuḥ
c yudhyamāno mayā saṃkhye viyad abhyāgamat punaḥ
a tataḥ śataghnīś ca mahāgadāś ca
dīptāṃś ca śūlān musalān asīṃś ca
c cikṣepa roṣān mayi mandabuddhiḥ
śālvo mahārāja jayābhikāṅkṣī
a tān āśugair āpatato 'ham āśu
nivārya tūrṇaṃ khagamān kha eva
c dvidhā tridhā cācchinam āśu muktais
tato 'ntarikṣe ninado babhūva
a tataḥ śatasahasreṇa śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām
c dārukaṃ vājinaś caiva rathaṃ ca samavākirat
a tato mām abravīd vīra dāruko vihvalann iva
c sthātavyam iti tiṣṭhāmi śālvabāṇaprapīḍitaḥ
d avasthātuṃ na śakyāmi aṅgaṃ me vyavasīdati
a iti tasya niśamyāhaṃ sāratheḥ karuṇaṃ vacaḥ
c avekṣamāṇo yantāram apaśyaṃ śarapīḍitam
a na tasyorasi no mūrdhni na kāye na bhujadvaye
c antaraṃ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha paśyāmi nahataṃ śaraiḥ
a sa tu bāṇavarotpīḍād visravaty asṛg ulbaṇam
c abhivṛṣṭo yathā meghair girir gairikadhātumān
d śarair nānāvidhākārair divyāstrapratimantritaiḥ
d astraiḥ śastraiś ca vividhaiḥ khasthā hy antarhitā api
a abhīṣuhastaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sīdantaṃ sārathiṃ raṇe
c astambhayaṃ mahābāho śālvabāṇaprapīḍitam
a atha māṃ puruṣaḥ kaś cid dvārakānilayo 'bravīt
c tvarito ratham abhyetya sauhṛdād iva bhārata
a āhukasya vaco vīra tasyaiva paricārakaḥ
c viṣaṇṇaḥ sannakaṇṭho vai tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a dvārakādhipatir vīra āha tvām āhuko vacaḥ
c keśaveha vijānīṣva yat tvāṃ pitṛsakho 'bravīt
a upayātvādya śālvena dvārakāṃ vṛṣṇinandana
c viṣakte tvayi durdharṣa hataḥ śūrasuto balāt
a tad alaṃ sādhu yuddhena nivartasva janārdana
c dvārakām eva rakṣasva kāryam etan mahat tava
a ity ahaṃ tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā paramadurmanāḥ
c niścayaṃ nādhigacchāmi kartavyasyetarasya vā
a sātyakiṃ baladevaṃ ca pradyumnaṃ ca mahāratham
c jagarhe manasā vīra tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ vacaḥ
a ahaṃ hi dvārakāyāś ca pituś ca kurunandana
c teṣu rakṣāṃ samādhāya prayātaḥ saubhapātane
a baladevo mahābāhuḥ kaccij jīvati śatruhā
c sātyakī raukmiṇeyaś ca cārudeṣṇaś ca vīryavān
e sāmbaprabhṛtayaś caivety aham āsaṃ sudurmanāḥ
a eteṣu hi naravyāghra jīvatsu na kathaṃ cana
c śakyaḥ śūrasuto hantum api vajrabhṛtā svayam
a hataḥ śūrasuto vyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ te ca parāsavaḥ
c baladevamukhāḥ sarve iti me niścitā matiḥ
a so 'haṃ sarvavināśaṃ taṃ cintayāno muhur muhuḥ
c suvihvalo mahārāja punaḥ śālvam ayodhayam
a tato 'paśyaṃ mahārāja prapatantam ahaṃ tadā
c saubhāc chūrasutaṃ vīra tato māṃ moha āviśat
a tasya rūpaṃ prapatataḥ pitur mama narādhipa
c yayāteḥ kṣīṇapuṇyasya svargād iva mahītalam
a viśīrṇagalitoṣṇīṣaḥ prakīrṇāmbaramūrdhajaḥ
c prapatan dṛśyate ha sma kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ
a tataḥ śārṅgaṃ dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ karāt prapatitaṃ mama
c mohāt sannaś ca kaunteya rathopastha upāviśam
a tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sainyaṃ me gatacetanam
c māṃ dṛṣṭvā rathanīḍasthaṃ gatāsum iva bhārata
a prasārya bāhū patataḥ prasārya caraṇāv api
c rūpaṃ pitur apaśyaṃ tac chakuneḥ patato yathā
a taṃ patantaṃ mahābāho śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥ
c abhighnanto bhṛśaṃ vīrā mama ceto vyakampayan
a tato muhūrtāt pratilabhya saṃjñām
ahaṃ tadā vīra mahāvimarde
c na tatra saubhaṃ na ripuṃ na śālvaṃ
paśyāmi vṛddhaṃ pitaraṃ na cāpi
a tato mamāsīn manasi māyeyam iti niścitam
c prabuddho 'smi tato bhūyaḥ śataśo vikirañ śarān
 vāsudeva uvāca
a tato 'haṃ bharataśreṣṭha pragṛhya ruciraṃ dhanuḥ
c śarair apātayaṃ saubhāc chirāṃsi vibudhadviṣām
a śarāṃś cāśīviṣākārān ūrdhvagāṃs tigmatejasaḥ
c apraiṣaṃ śālvarājāya śārṅgamuktān suvāsasaḥ
a tato nādṛśyata tadā saubhaṃ kurukulodvaha
c antarhitaṃ māyayābhūt tato 'haṃ vismito 'bhavam
a atha dānavasaṃghās te vikṛtānanamūrdhajāḥ
c udakrośan mahārāja viṣṭhite mayi bhārata
a tato 'straṃ śabdasāhaṃ vai tvaramāṇo mahāhave
c ayojayaṃ tadvadhāya tataḥ śabda upāramat
a hatās te dānavāḥ sarve yaiḥ sa śabda udīritaḥ
c śarair ādityasaṃkāśair jvalitaiḥ śabdasādhanaiḥ
a tasminn uparate śabde punar evānyato 'bhavat
c śabdo 'paro mahārāja tatrāpi prāharaṃ śarān
a evaṃ daśa diśaḥ sarvās tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca bhārata
c nādayām āsur asurās te cāpi nihatā mayā
a tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ gatvā punar eva vyadṛśyata
c saubhaṃ kāmagamaṃ vīra mohayan mama cakṣuṣī
a tato lokāntakaraṇo dānavo vānarākṛtiḥ
c śilāvarṣeṇa sahasā mahatā māṃ samāvṛṇot
