labdhvā dvijaṃ nudati nṛpaḥ sapatnān
a caran naiḥśreyasaṃ dharmaṃ prajāpālanakāritam
c nādhyagacchad balir loke tīrtham anyatra vai dvijāt
a anūnam āsīd asurasya kāmair
vairocaneḥ śrīr api cākṣayāsīt
c labdhvā mahīṃ brāhmaṇasaṃprayogāt
teṣv ācaran duṣṭam ato vyanaśyat
a nābrāhmaṇaṃ bhūmir iyaṃ sabhūtir
varṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ bhajate cirāya
c samudranemir namate tu tasmai
yaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śāsti nayair vinītaḥ
a kuñjarasyeva saṃgrāme 'parigṛhyāṅkuśagraham
c brāhmaṇair viprahīṇasya kṣatrasya kṣīyate balam
a brahmaṇy anupamā dṛṣṭiḥ kṣātram apratimaṃ balam
c tau yadā carataḥ sārdham atha lokaḥ prasīdati
a yathā hi sumahān agniḥ kakṣaṃ dahati sānilaḥ
c tathā dahati rājanyo brāhmaṇena samaṃ ripūn
a brāhmaṇebhyo 'tha medhāvī buddhiparyeṣaṇaṃ caret
c alabdhasya ca lābhāya labdhasya ca vivṛddhaye
a alabdhalābhāya ca labdhavṛddhaye
yathārhatīrthapratipādanāya
c yaśasvinaṃ vedavidaṃ vipaścitaṃ
bahuśrutaṃ brāhmaṇam eva vāsaya
a brāhmaṇeṣūttamā vṛttis tava nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c tena te sarvalokeṣu dīpyate prathitaṃ yaśaḥ
a tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve bakaṃ dālbhyam apūjayan
c yudhiṣṭhire stūyamāne bhūyaḥ sumanaso 'bhavan
a dvaipāyano nāradaś ca jāmadagnyaḥ pṛthuśravāḥ
c indradyumno bhālukiś ca kṛtacetāḥ sahasrapāt
a karṇaśravāś ca muñjaś ca lavaṇāśvaś ca kāśyapaḥ
c hārītaḥ sthūṇakarṇaś ca agniveśyo 'tha śaunakaḥ
a ṛtavāk ca suvāk caiva bṛhadaśva ṛtāvasuḥ
c ūrdhvaretā vṛṣāmitraḥ suhotro hotravāhanaḥ
a ete cānye ca bahavo brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
c ajātaśatrum ānarcuḥ puraṃdaram ivarṣayaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato vanagatāḥ pārthāḥ sāyāhne saha kṛṣṇayā
c upaviṣṭāḥ kathāś cakrur duḥkhaśokaparāyaṇāḥ
a priyā ca darśanīyā ca paṇḍitā ca pativratā
c tataḥ kṛṣṇā dharmarājam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a na nūnaṃ tasya pāpasya duḥkham asmāsu kiṃ cana
c vidyate dhārtarāṣṭrasya nṛśaṃsasya durātmanaḥ
a yas tvāṃ rājan mayā sārdham ajinaiḥ prativāsitam
c bhrātṛbhiś ca tathā sarvair nābhyabhāṣata kiṃ cana
e vanaṃ prasthāpya duṣṭātmā nānvatapyata durmatiḥ
a āyasaṃ hṛdayaṃ nūnaṃ tasya duṣkṛtakarmaṇaḥ
c yas tvāṃ dharmaparaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ rūkṣāṇy aśrāvayat tadā
d vacanāny amanojñāni durvācyāni ca saṃsadi
a sukhocitam aduḥkhārhaṃ durātmā sasuhṛdgaṇaḥ
c īdṛśaṃ duḥkham ānīya modate pāpapūruṣaḥ
a caturṇām eva pāpānām aśru vai nāpatat tadā
c tvayi bhārata niṣkrānte vanāyājinavāsasi
a duryodhanasya karṇasya śakuneś ca durātmanaḥ
c durbhrātus tasya cograsya tathā duḥśāsanasya ca
a itareṣāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ kurūṇāṃ kurusattama
c duḥkhenābhiparītānāṃ netrebhyaḥ prāpataj jalam
a idaṃ ca śayanaṃ dṛṣṭvā yac cāsīt te purātanam
c śocāmi tvāṃ mahārāja duḥkhānarhaṃ sukhocitam
a dāntaṃ yac ca sabhāmadhye āsanaṃ ratnabhūṣitam
c dṛṣṭvā kuśabṛsīṃ cemāṃ śoko māṃ rundhayaty ayam
a yad apaśyaṃ sabhāyāṃ tvāṃ rājabhiḥ parivāritam
c tac ca rājann apaśyantyāḥ kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
a yā tvāhaṃ candanādigdham apaśyaṃ sūryavarcasam
c sā tvā paṅkamalādigdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā muhyāmi bhārata
a yā vai tvā kauśikair vastraiḥ śubhrair bahudhanaiḥ purā
c dṛṣṭavaty asmi rājendra sā tvāṃ paśyāmi cīriṇam
a yac ca tad rukmapātrībhir brāhmaṇebhyaḥ sahasraśaḥ
c hriyate te gṛhād annaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ sārvakāmikam
a yatīnām agṛhāṇāṃ te tathaiva gṛhamedhinām
c dīyate bhojanaṃ rājann atīva guṇavat prabho
e tac ca rājann apaśyantyāḥ kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
f satkṛtāni sahasrāṇi sarvakāmaiḥ purā gṛhe
f sarvakāmaiḥ suvihitair yad apūjayathā dvijān
a yāṃs te bhrātṝn mahārāja yuvāno mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥ
c abhojayanta mṛṣṭānnaiḥ sūdāḥ paramasaṃskṛtaiḥ
a sarvāṃs tān adya paśyāmi vane vanyena jīvataḥ
c aduḥkhārhān manuṣyendra nopaśāmyati me manaḥ
a bhīmasenam imaṃ cāpi duḥkhitaṃ vanavāsinam
c dhyāyantaṃ kiṃ na manyus te prāpte kāle vivardhate
a bhīmasenaṃ hi karmāṇi svayaṃ kurvāṇam acyuta
c sukhārhaṃ duḥkhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
a satkṛtaṃ vividhair yānair vastrair uccāvacais tathā
c taṃ te vanagataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
a kurūn api hi yaḥ sarvān hantum utsahate prabhuḥ
c tvatprasādaṃ pratīkṣaṃs tu sahate 'yaṃ vṛkodaraḥ
a yo 'rjunenārjunas tulyo dvibāhur bahubāhunā
c śarātisarge śīghratvāt kālāntakayamopamaḥ
a yasya śastrapratāpena praṇatāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ
c yajñe tava mahārāja brāhmaṇān upatasthire
a tam imaṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ pūjitaṃ devadānavaiḥ
c dhyāyantam arjunaṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
a dṛṣṭvā vanagataṃ pārtham aduḥkhārhaṃ sukhocitam
c na ca te vardhate manyus tena muhyāmi bhārata
a yo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca sarpāṃś caikaratho 'jayat
c taṃ te vanagataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
a yo yānair adbhutākārair hayair nāgaiś ca saṃvṛtaḥ
c prasahya vittāny ādatta pārthivebhyaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
a kṣipaty ekena vegena pañca bāṇaśatāni yaḥ
c taṃ te vanagataṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
a śyāmaṃ bṛhantaṃ taruṇaṃ carmiṇām uttamaṃ raṇe
c nakulaṃ te vane dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
a darśanīyaṃ ca śūraṃ ca mādrīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c sahadevaṃ vane dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
c   kasmāt kṣamasi pārthiva
c nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā te duḥkhitāv ubhau
c aduḥkhārhau manuṣyendra
a drupadasya kule jātāṃ snuṣāṃ pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥ
b dhṛṣṭadyumnasya bhaginīṃ vīrapatnīm anuvratām
c māṃ te vanagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā kasmān manyur na vardhate
a nūnaṃ ca tava naivāsti manyur bharatasattama
b tyaktavāṃs tvaṃ vināśāya vyaktaṃ bhṛgupatir yathā
c yat te bhrātṝṃś ca māṃ caiva dṛṣṭvā na vyathate manaḥ
a na nirmanyuḥ kṣatriyo 'sti loke nirvacanaṃ smṛtam
c tad adya tvayi paśyāmi kṣatriye viparītavat
a yo na darśayate tejaḥ kṣatriyaḥ kāla āgate
c sarvabhūtāni taṃ pārtha sadā paribhavanty uta
a tat tvayā na kṣamā kāryā śatrūn prati kathaṃ cana
c tejasaiva hi te śakyā nihantuṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a tathaiva yaḥ kṣamākāle kṣatriyo nopaśāmyati
c apriyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ so 'mutreha ca naśyati
 draupady uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c prahlādasya ca saṃvādaṃ baler vairocanasya ca
a asurendraṃ mahāprājñaṃ dharmāṇām āgatāgamam
c baliḥ papraccha daityendraṃ prahlādaṃ pitaraṃ pituḥ
a kṣamā svic chreyasī tāta utāho teja ity uta
c etan me saṃśayaṃ tāta yathāvad brūhi pṛcchate
a śreyo yad atra dharmajña brūhi me tad asaṃśayam
c kariṣyāmi hi tat sarvaṃ yathāvad anuśāsanam
a tasmai provāca tat sarvam evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ
c sarvaniścayavit prājñaḥ saṃśayaṃ paripṛcchate
 prahlāda uvāca
a na śreyaḥ satataṃ tejo na nityaṃ śreyasī kṣamā
c iti tāta vijānīhi dvayam etad asaṃśayam
a yo nityaṃ kṣamate tāta bahūn doṣān sa vindati
c bhṛtyāḥ paribhavanty enam udāsīnās tathaiva ca
a sarvabhūtāni cāpy asya na namante kadā cana
c tasmān nityaṃ kṣamā tāta paṇḍitair apavāditā
a avajñāya hi taṃ bhṛtyā bhajante bahudoṣatām
c ādātuṃ cāsya vittāni prārthayante 'lpacetasaḥ
a yānaṃ vastrāṇy alaṃkārāñ śayanāny āsanāni ca
c bhojanāny atha pānāni sarvopakaraṇāni ca
a ādadīrann adhikṛtā yathākāmam acetasaḥ
c pradiṣṭāni ca deyāni na dadyur bhartṛśāsanāt
a na cainaṃ bhartṛpūjābhiḥ pūjayanti kadā cana
c avajñānaṃ hi loke 'smin maraṇād api garhitam
a kṣamiṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ tāta bruvanti kaṭukāny api
c preṣyāḥ putrāś ca bhṛtyāś ca tathodāsīnavṛttayaḥ
a apy asya dārān icchanti paribhūya kṣamāvataḥ
c dārāś cāsya pravartante yathākāmam acetasaḥ
a tathā ca nityam uditā yadi svalpam apīśvarāt
c daṇḍam arhanti duṣyanti duṣṭāś cāpy apakurvate
a ete cānye ca bahavo nityaṃ doṣāḥ kṣamāvatām
c atha vairocane doṣān imān viddhy akṣamāvatām
a asthāne yadi vā sthāne satataṃ rajasāvṛtaḥ
c kruddho daṇḍān praṇayati vividhān svena tejasā
a mitraiḥ saha virodhaṃ ca prāpnute tejasāvṛtaḥ
c prāpnoti dveṣyatāṃ caiva lokāt svajanatas tathā
a so 'vamānād arthahānim upālambham anādaram
c saṃtāpadveṣalobhāṃś ca śatrūṃś ca labhate naraḥ
a krodhād daṇḍān manuṣyeṣu vividhān puruṣo nayan
c bhraśyate śīghram aiśvaryāt prāṇebhyaḥ svajanād api
a yo 'pakartṝṃś ca kartṝṃś ca tejasaivopagacchati
c tasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
a yasmād udvijate lokaḥ kathaṃ tasya bhavo bhavet
c antaraṃ hy asya dṛṣṭvaiva loko vikurute dhruvam
e tasmān nātyutsṛjet tejo na ca nityaṃ mṛdur bhavet
f kāle kāle tu saṃprāpte mṛdus tīkṣṇo 'pi vā bhavet
a kāle mṛdur yo bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ
c sa vai sukham avāpnoti loke 'muṣminn ihaiva ca
a kṣamākālāṃs tu vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vistareṇa tān
c ye te nityam asaṃtyājyā yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a pūrvopakārī yas tu syād aparādhe 'garīyasi
c upakāreṇa tat tasya kṣantavyam aparādhinaḥ
a abuddhim āśritānāṃ ca kṣantavyam aparādhinām
c na hi sarvatra pāṇḍityaṃ sulabhaṃ puruṣeṇa vai
a atha ced buddhijaṃ kṛtvā brūyus te tad abuddhijam
c pāpān svalpe 'pi tān hanyād aparādhe tathānṛjūn
a sarvasyaiko 'parādhas te kṣantavyaḥ prāṇino bhavet
c dvitīye sati vadhyas tu svalpe 'py apakṛte bhavet
a ajānatā bhavet kaś cid aparādhaḥ kṛto yadi
c kṣantavyam eva tasyāhuḥ suparīkṣya parīkṣayā
a mṛdunā mārdavaṃ hanti mṛdunā hanti dāruṇam
c nāsādhyaṃ mṛdunā kiṃ cit tasmāt tīkṣṇataro mṛduḥ
a deśakālau tu saṃprekṣya balābalam athātmanaḥ
b anvīkṣya kāraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ tejaḥ kṣamāpi vā
c nādeśakāle kiṃ cit syād deśaḥ kālaḥ pratīkṣyate
e tathā lokabhayāc caiva kṣantavyam aparādhinaḥ
a eta evaṃvidhāḥ kālāḥ kṣamāyāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
c ato 'nyathānuvartatsu tejasaḥ kāla ucyate
 draupady uvāca
a tad ahaṃ tejasaḥ kālaṃ tava manye narādhipa
c dhārtarāṣṭreṣu lubdheṣu satataṃ cāpakāriṣu
a na hi kaś cit kṣamākālo vidyate 'dya kurūn prati
c tejasaś cāgate kāle teja utsraṣṭum arhasi
a mṛdur bhavaty avajñātas tīkṣṇād udvijate janaḥ
c kāle prāpte dvayaṃ hy etad yo veda sa mahīpatiḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
 draupadyā vacanaṃ śrutvā ślakṣṇākṣarapadaṃ śubham
 uvāca draupadīṃ rājā smayamāno yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
 kāraṇe bhavatī kruddhā dhārtarāṣṭrasya durmateḥ
 yena krodhaṃ mahāprājñe bahudhā bahu manyase
 krodhaṃ mūlaharaṃ śatruṃ kāraṇaiḥ śṛṇu taṃ mama
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a krodho hantā manuṣyāṇāṃ krodho bhāvayitā punaḥ
c iti viddhi mahāprājñe krodhamūlau bhavābhavau
a yo hi saṃharate krodhaṃ bhāvas tasya suśobhane
b yo na saṃharate krodhaṃ tasyābhāvo bhavaty uta
b abhāvakaraṇaṃ tasmāt krodho bhavati śobhane
c yaḥ punaḥ puruṣaḥ krodhaṃ nityaṃ na sahate śubhe
e tasyābhāvāya bhavati krodhaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ
a krodhamūlo vināśo hi prajānām iha dṛśyate
c tat kathaṃ mādṛśaḥ krodham utsṛjel lokanāśanam
a kruddhaḥ pāpaṃ naraḥ kuryāt kruddho hanyād gurūn api
c kruddhaḥ paruṣayā vācā śreyaso 'py avamanyate
a vācyāvācye hi kupito na prajānāti karhi cit
c nākāryam asti kruddhasya nāvācyaṃ vidyate tathā
a hiṃsyāt krodhād avadhyāṃś ca vadhyān saṃpūjayed api
c ātmānam api ca kruddhaḥ preṣayed yamasādanam
a etān doṣān prapaśyadbhir jitaḥ krodho manīṣibhiḥ
c icchadbhiḥ paramaṃ śreya iha cāmutra cottamam
a taṃ krodhaṃ varjitaṃ dhīraiḥ katham asmadvidhaś caret
c etad draupadi saṃdhāya na me manyuḥ pravardhate
a ātmānaṃ ca paraṃ caiva trāyate mahato bhayāt
c krudhyantam apratikrudhyan dvayor eṣa cikitsakaḥ
a mūḍho yadi kliśyamānaḥ krudhyate 'śaktimān naraḥ
c balīyasāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tyajaty ātmānam antataḥ
a tasyātmānaṃ saṃtyajato lokā naśyanty anātmanaḥ
c tasmād draupady aśaktasya manyor niyamanaṃ smṛtam
a vidvāṃs tathaiva yaḥ śaktaḥ kliśyamāno na kupyati
c sa nāśayitvā kleṣṭāraṃ paraloke ca nandati
a tasmād balavatā caiva durbalena ca nityadā
c kṣantavyaṃ puruṣeṇāhur āpatsv api vijānatā
a manyor hi vijayaṃ kṛṣṇe praśaṃsantīha sādhavaḥ
c kṣamāvato jayo nityaṃ sādhor iha satāṃ matam
a satyaṃ cānṛtataḥ śreyo nṛśaṃsāc cānṛśaṃsatā
c tam evaṃ bahudoṣaṃ tu krodhaṃ sādhuvivarjitam
e mādṛśaḥ prasṛjet kasmāt suyodhanavadhād api
a tejasvīti yam āhur vai paṇḍitā dīrghadarśinaḥ
c na krodho 'bhyantaras tasya bhavatīti viniścitam
a yas tu krodhaṃ samutpannaṃ prajñayā pratibādhate
c tejasvinaṃ taṃ vidvāṃso manyante tattvadarśinaḥ
a kruddho hi kāryaṃ suśroṇi na yathāvat prapaśyati
c na kāryaṃ na ca maryādāṃ naraḥ kruddho 'nupaśyati
a hanty avadhyān api kruddho gurūn rūkṣais tudaty api
c tasmāt tejasi kartavye krodho dūrāt pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a dākṣyaṃ hy amarṣaḥ śauryaṃ ca śīghratvam iti tejasaḥ
c guṇāḥ krodhābhibhūtena na śakyāḥ prāptum añjasā
a krodhaṃ tyaktvā tu puruṣaḥ samyak tejo 'bhipadyate
c kālayuktaṃ mahāprājñe kruddhais tejaḥ suduḥsaham
a krodhas tv apaṇḍitaiḥ śaśvat teja ity abhidhīyate
c rajas tal lokanāśāya vihitaṃ mānuṣān prati
a tasmāc chaśvat tyajet krodhaṃ puruṣaḥ samyag ācaran
c śreyān svadharmānapago na kruddha iti niścitam
a yadi sarvam abuddhīnām atikrāntam amedhasām
c atikramo madvidhasya kathaṃ svit syād anindite
a yadi na syur manuṣyeṣu kṣamiṇaḥ pṛthivīsamāḥ
c na syāt saṃdhir manuṣyāṇāṃ krodhamūlo hi vigrahaḥ
a abhiṣakto hy abhiṣajed āhanyād guruṇā hataḥ
c evaṃ vināśo bhūtānām adharmaḥ prathito bhavet
a ākruṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaḥ pratyākrośed anantaram
c pratihanyād dhataś caiva tathā hiṃsyāc ca hiṃsitaḥ
a hanyur hi pitaraḥ putrān putrāś cāpi tathā pitṝn
c hanyuś ca patayo bhāryāḥ patīn bhāryās tathaiva ca
a evaṃ saṃkupite loke janma kṛṣṇe na vidyate
c prajānāṃ saṃdhimūlaṃ hi janma viddhi śubhānane
a tāḥ kṣīyeran prajāḥ sarvāḥ kṣipraṃ draupadi tādṛśe
c tasmān manyur vināśāya prajānām abhavāya ca
a yasmāt tu loke dṛśyante kṣamiṇaḥ pṛthivīsamāḥ
c tasmāj janma ca bhūtānāṃ bhavaś ca pratipadyate
a kṣantavyaṃ puruṣeṇeha sarvāsv āpatsu śobhane
c kṣamā bhavo hi bhūtānāṃ janma caiva prakīrtitam
a ākruṣṭas tāḍitaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣamate yo balīyasā
c yaś ca nityaṃ jitakrodho vidvān uttamapūruṣaḥ
a prabhāvavān api naras tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
c krodhanas tv alpavijñānaḥ pretya ceha ca naśyati
a atrāpy udāharantīmā gāthā nityaṃ kṣamāvatām
c gītāḥ kṣamāvatā kṛṣṇe kāśyapena mahātmanā
a kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā vedāḥ kṣamā śrutam
c yas tām evaṃ vijānāti sa sarvaṃ kṣantum arhati
a kṣamā brahma kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā bhūtaṃ ca bhāvi ca
c kṣamā tapaḥ kṣamā śaucaṃ kṣamayā coddhṛtaṃ jagat
a ati brahmavidāṃ lokān ati cāpi tapasvinām
c ati yajñavidāṃ caiva kṣamiṇaḥ prāpnuvanti tān
a kṣamā tejasvināṃ tejaḥ kṣamā brahma tapasvinām
c kṣamā satyaṃ satyavatāṃ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yaśaḥ
a tāṃ kṣamām īdṛśīṃ kṛṣṇe katham asmadvidhas tyajet
c yasyāṃ brahma ca satyaṃ ca yajñā lokāś ca viṣṭhitāḥ
e bhujyante yajvanāṃ lokāḥ kṣamiṇām apare tathā
f kṣamāvatāṃ brahmaloke lokāḥ paramapūjitāḥ
a kṣantavyam eva satataṃ puruṣeṇa vijānatā
c yadā hi kṣamate sarvaṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a kṣamāvatām ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś caiva kṣamāvatām
c iha saṃmānam ṛcchanti paratra ca śubhāṃ gatim
a yeṣāṃ manyur manuṣyāṇāṃ kṣamayā nihataḥ sadā
c teṣāṃ paratare lokās tasmāt kṣāntiḥ parā matā
a iti gītāḥ kāśyapena gāthā nityaṃ kṣamāvatām
c śrutvā gāthāḥ kṣamāyās tvaṃ tuṣya draupadi mā krudhaḥ
a pitāmahaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ śamaṃ saṃpūjayiṣyati
c ācāryo viduraḥ kṣattā śamam eva vadiṣyataḥ
d kṛṣṇaś ca devakīputraḥ śamaṃ saṃpūjayiṣyati
e kṛpaś ca saṃjayaś caiva śamam eva vadiṣyataḥ
a somadatto yuyutsuś ca droṇaputras tathaiva ca
c pitāmahaś ca no vyāsaḥ śamaṃ vadati nityaśaḥ
a etair hi rājā niyataṃ codyamānaḥ śamaṃ prati
c rājyaṃ dāteti me buddhir na cel lobhān naśiṣyati
d yatra pārtho dhanuṣpāṇir bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca vīryavān
a kālo 'yaṃ dāruṇaḥ prāpto bharatānām abhūtaye
b kṣayaḥ sarvasya lokasya pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
b bhīṣmo droṇaś ca karṇaś ca kiṃ śeṣaṃ tatra paśyasi
c niścitaṃ me sadaivaitat purastād api bhāmini
a suyodhano nārhatīti kṣamām evaṃ na vindati
c arhas tasyāham ity eva tasmān māṃ vindate kṣamā
a etad ātmavatāṃ vṛttam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c kṣamā caivānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca tat kartāsmy aham añjasā
 draupady uvāca
a namo dhātre vidhātre ca yau mohaṃ cakratus tava
c pitṛpaitāmahe vṛtte voḍhavye te 'nyathā matiḥ
d karmabhiś cintito loko gatyāgatyā pṛthagvidhaḥ
d tasmāt karmāṇi nityāni lobhān mokṣaṃ yiyāsati
a neha dharmānṛśaṃsyābhyāṃ na kṣāntyā nārjavena ca
c puruṣaḥ śriyam āpnoti na ghṛṇitvena karhi cit
a tvāṃ ced vyasanam abhyāgād idaṃ bhārata duḥsaham
c yat tvaṃ nārhasi nāpīme bhrātaras te mahaujasaḥ
a na hi te 'dhyagamaj jātu tadānīṃ nādya bhārata
c dharmāt priyataraṃ kiṃ cid api cej jīvitād iha
a dharmārtham eva te rājyaṃ dharmārthaṃ jīvitaṃ ca te
c brāhmaṇā guravaś caiva jānanty api ca devatāḥ
a bhīmasenārjunau caiva mādreyau ca mayā saha
c tyajes tvam iti me buddhir na tu dharmaṃ parityajeḥ
a rājānaṃ dharmagoptāraṃ dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ
c iti me śrutam āryāṇāṃ tvāṃ tu manye na rakṣati
a ananyā hi naravyāghra nityadā dharmam eva te
c buddhiḥ satatam anveti chāyeva puruṣaṃ nijā
d chāyevānveti puruṣaṃ dharmaḥ sādhu mayārjitaḥ
a nāvamaṃsthā hi sadṛśān nāvarāñ śreyasaḥ kutaḥ
c avāpya pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ na te śṛṅgam avardhata
a svāhākāraiḥ svadhābhiś ca pūjābhir api ca dvijān
c daivatāni pitṝṃś caiva satataṃ pārtha sevase
a brāhmaṇāḥ sarvakāmais te satataṃ pārtha tarpitāḥ
c yatayo mokṣiṇaś caiva gṛhasthāś caiva bhārata
d bhuñjate rukmapātrībhir yatrāhaṃ paricārikā
a āraṇyakebhyo lauhāni bhājanāni prayacchasi
c nādeyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyas te gṛhe kiṃ cana vidyate
a yad idaṃ vaiśvadevānte sāyaṃprātaḥ pradīyate
c tad dattvātithibhṛtyebhyo rājañ śeṣeṇa jīvasi
d śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca dattvā śiṣṭena jīvasi
a iṣṭayaḥ paśubandhāś ca kāmyanaimittikāś ca ye
c vartante pākayajñāś ca yajñakarma ca nityadā
a asminn api mahāraṇye vijane dasyusevite
c rāṣṭrād apetya vasato dhārmas te nāvasīdati
a aśvamedho rājasūyaḥ puṇḍarīko 'tha gosavaḥ
c etair api mahāyajñair iṣṭaṃ te bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
a rājan parītayā buddhyā viṣame 'kṣaparājaye
c rājyaṃ vasūny āyudhāni bhrātṝn māṃ cāsi nirjitaḥ
a ṛjor mṛdor vadānyasya hrīmataḥ satyavādinaḥ
c katham akṣavyasanajā buddhir āpatitā tava
a atīva moham āyāti manaś ca paridūyate
c niśāmya te duḥkham idam imāṃ cāpadam īdṛśīm
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c īśvarasya vaśe lokas tiṣṭhate nātmano yathā
a dhātaiva khalu bhūtānāṃ sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye
c dadhāti sarvam īśānaḥ purastāc chukram uccaran
a yathā dārumayī yoṣā naravīra samāhitā
c īrayaty aṅgam aṅgāni tathā rājann imāḥ prajāḥ
a ākāśa iva bhūtāni vyāpya sarvāṇi bhārata
c īśvaro vidadhātīha kalyāṇaṃ yac ca pāpakam
a śakunis tantubaddho vā niyato 'yam anīśvaraḥ
c īśvarasya vaśe tiṣṭhan nānyeṣāṃ nātmanaḥ prabhuḥ
a maṇiḥ sūtra iva proto nasyota iva govṛṣaḥ
c dhātur ādeśam anveti tanmayo hi tadarpaṇaḥ
a nātmādhīno manuṣyo 'yaṃ kālaṃ bhavati kaṃ cana
c srotaso madhyam āpannaḥ kūlād vṛkśa iva cyutaḥ
a ajño jantur anīśo 'yam ātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
c īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ narakam eva ca
a yathā vāyos tṛṇāgrāṇi vaśaṃ yānti balīyasaḥ
c dhātur evaṃ vaśaṃ yānti sarvabhūtāni bhārata
a āryakarmaṇi yuñjānaḥ pāpe vā punar īśvaraḥ
c vyāpya bhūtāni carate na cāyam iti lakṣyate
a hetumātram idaṃ dhātuḥ śarīraṃ kṣetrasaṃjñitam
c yena kārayate karma śubhāśubhaphalaṃ vibhuḥ
a paśya māyāprabhāvo 'yam īśvareṇa yathā kṛtaḥ
c yo hanti bhūtair bhūtāni mohayitvātmamāyayā
a anyathā paridṛṣṭāni munibhir vedadarśibhiḥ
c anyathā parivartante vegā iva nabhasvataḥ
a anyathaiva hi manyante puruṣās tāni tāni ca
c anyathaiva prabhus tāni karoti vikaroti ca
a yathā kāṣṭhena vā kāṣṭham aśmānaṃ cāśmanā punaḥ
c ayasā cāpy ayaś chindyān nirviceṣṭam acetanam
a evaṃ sa bhagavān devaḥ svayambhūḥ prapitāmahaḥ
c hinasti bhūtair bhūtāni chadma kṛtvā yudhiṣṭhira
a saṃprayojya viyojyāyaṃ kāmakārakaraḥ prabhuḥ
c krīḍate bhagavan bhūtair bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva
a na mātṛpitṛvad rājan dhātā bhūteṣu vartate
c roṣād iva pravṛtto 'yaṃ yathāyam itaro janaḥ
a āryāñ śīlavato dṛṣṭvā hrīmato vṛttikarśitān
c anāryān sukhinaś caiva vihvalāmīva cintayā
a tavemām āpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā samṛddhiṃ ca suyodhane
c dhātāraṃ garhaye pārtha viṣamaṃ yo 'nupaśyati
a āryaśāstrātige krūre lubdhe dharmāpacāyini
c dhārtarāṣṭre śriyaṃ dattvā dhātā kiṃ phalam aśnute
a karma cet kṛtam anveti kartāraṃ nānyam ṛcchati
c karmaṇā tena pāpena lipyate nūnam īśvaraḥ
a atha karma kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ na cet kartāram ṛcchati
c kāraṇaṃ balam eveha janāñ śocāmi durbalān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a valgu citrapadaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ yājñaseni tvayā vacaḥ
c uktaṃ tac chrutam asmābhir nāstikyaṃ tu prabhāṣase
a nāhaṃ dharmaphalānveṣī rājaputri carāmy uta
c dadāmi deyam ity eva yaje yaṣṭavyam ity uta
a astu vātra phalaṃ mā vā kartavyaṃ puruṣeṇa yat
c gṛhān āvasatā kṛṣṇe yathāśakti karomi tat
a dharmaṃ carāmi suśroṇi na dharmaphalakāraṇāt
c āgamān anatikramya satāṃ vṛttam avekṣya ca
e dharma eva manaḥ kṛṣṇe svabhāvāc caiva me dhṛtam
f dharmavāṇijyako hīno jaghanyo dharmavādinām
a na dharmaphalam āpnoti yo dharmaṃ dogdhum icchati
c yaś cainaṃ śaṅkate kṛtvā nāstikyāt pāpacetanaḥ
a ativādān madāc caiva mā dharmam atiśaṅkithāḥ
c dharmātiśaṅkī puruṣas tiryaggatiparāyaṇaḥ
a dharmo yasyātiśaṅkyaḥ syād ārṣaṃ vā durbalātmanaḥ
c vedāc chūdra ivāpeyāt sa lokād ajarāmarāt
a vedādhyāyī dharmaparaḥ kule jāto yaśasvini
c sthavireṣu sa yoktavyo rājabhir dharmacāribhiḥ
a pāpīyān hi sa śūdrebhyas taskarebhyo viśeṣataḥ
c śāstrātigo mandabuddhir yo dharmam atiśaṅkate
a pratyakṣaṃ hi tvayā dṛṣṭa ṛṣir gacchan mahātapāḥ
c mārkaṇḍeyo 'prameyātmā dharmeṇa cirajīvitām
a vyāso vasiṣṭho maitreyo nārado lomaśaḥ śukaḥ
c anye ca ṛṣayaḥ siddhā dharmeṇaiva sucetasaḥ
a pratyakṣaṃ paśyasi hy etān divyayogasamanvitān
c śāpānugrahaṇe śaktān devair api garīyasaḥ
a ete hi dharmam evādau varṇayanti sadā mama
c kartavyam amaraprakhyāḥ pratyakṣāgamabuddhayaḥ
a ato nārhasi kalyāṇi dhātāraṃ dharmam eva ca
c rajomūḍhena manasā kṣeptuṃ śaṅkitum eva ca
d unmattān manyate bālaḥ sarvān āgataniścayān
a dharmātiśaṅkī nānyasmin pramāṇam adhigacchati
c ātmapramāṇa unnaddhaḥ śreyaso hy avamanyakaḥ
a indriyaprītisaṃbaddhaṃ yad idaṃ lokasākṣikam
c etāvān manyate bālo moham anyatra gacchati
a prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti yo dharmam atiśaṅkate
c dhyāyan sa kṛpaṇaḥ pāpo na lokān pratipadyate
a pramāṇāny ativṛtto hi vedaśāstrārthanindakaḥ
c kāmalobhānugo mūḍho narakaṃ pratipadyate
a yas tu nityaṃ kṛtamatir dharmam evābhipadyate
c aśaṅkamānaḥ kalyāṇi so 'mutrānantyam aśnute
a ārṣaṃ pramāṇam utkramya dharmān aparipālayan
c sarvaśāstrātigo mūḍhaḥ śaṃ janmasu na vindati
d yasya nārṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāc chiṣṭācāraś ca bhāmini
d naiva tasya paro loko nāyam astīti niścayaḥ
a śiṣṭair ācaritaṃ dharmaṃ kṛṣṇe mā smātiśaṅkithāḥ
c purāṇam ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ sarvajñaiḥ sarvadarśibhiḥ
a dharma eva plavo nānyaḥ svargaṃ draupadi gacchatām
c saiva nauḥ sāgarasyeva vaṇijaḥ pāram ṛcchataḥ
a aphālo yadi dharmaḥ syāc carito dharmacāribhiḥ
c apratiṣṭhe tamasy etaj jagan majjed anindite
a nirvāṇaṃ nādhigaccheyur jīveyuḥ paśujīvikām
c vighātenaiva yujyeyur na cārthaṃ kiṃ cid āpnuyuḥ
a tapaś ca brahmacaryaṃ ca yajñaḥ svādhyāya eva ca
c dānam ārjavam etāni yadi syur aphalāni vai
a nācariṣyan pare dharmaṃ pare paratare ca ye
c vipralambho 'yam atyantaṃ yadi syur aphalāḥ kriyāḥ
a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvāsurarākṣasāḥ
c īśvarāḥ kasya hetos te careyur dharmam ādṛtāḥ
a phaladaṃ tv iha vijñāya dhātāraṃ śreyasi dhruve
c dharmaṃ te hy ācaran kṛṣṇe tad dhi dharmasanātanam
a sa cāyaṃ saphalo dharmo na dharmo 'phala ucyate
c dṛśyante 'pi hi vidyānāṃ phalāni tapasāṃ tathā
a tvayy etad vai vijānīhi janma kṛṣṇe yathā śrutam
c vettha cāpi yathā jāto dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pratāpavān
a etāvad eva paryāptam upamānaṃ śucismite
c karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti dhīro 'lpenāpi tuṣyati
a bahunāpi hy avidvāṃso naiva tuṣyanty abuddhayaḥ
c teṣāṃ na dharmajaṃ kiṃ cit pretya śarmāsti karma vā
a karmaṇām uta puṇyānāṃ pāpānāṃ ca phalodayaḥ
c prabhavaś cāpyayaś caiva devaguhyāni bhāmini
a naitāni veda yaḥ kaś cin muhyanty atra prajā imāḥ
b api kalpasahasreṇa naraḥ śreyo 'dhigacchati
c rakṣyāṇy etāni devānāṃ gūḍhamāyā hi devatāḥ
a kṛśāṅgāḥ suvratāś caiva tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ
c prasannair mānasair yuktāḥ paśyanty etāni vai dvijāḥ
a na phalādarśanād dharmaḥ śaṅkitavyo na devatāḥ
c yaṣṭavyaṃ cāpramattena dātavyaṃ cānasūyatā
a karmaṇāṃ phalam astīti tathaitad dharma śāśvatam
c brahmā provāca putrāṇāṃ yad ṛṣir veda kaśyapaḥ
a tasmāt te saṃśayaḥ kṛṣṇe nīhāra iva naśyatu
c vyavasya sarvam astīti nāstikyaṃ bhāvam utsṛja
a īśvaraṃ cāpi bhūtānāṃ dhātāraṃ mā vicikṣipaḥ
c śikṣasvainaṃ namasvainaṃ mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśī
a yasya prasādāt tadbhakto martyo gacchaty amartyatām
c uttamaṃ daivataṃ kṛṣṇe mātivocaḥ kathaṃ cana
 draupady uvāca
a nāvamanye na garhe ca dharmaṃ pārtha kathaṃ cana
c īśvaraṃ kuta evāham avamaṃsye prajāpatim
a ārtāhaṃ pralapāmīdam iti māṃ viddhi bhārata
c bhūyaś ca vilapiṣyāmi sumanās tan nibodha me
a karma khalv iha kartavyaṃ jātenāmitrakarśana
c akarmāṇo hi jīvanti sthāvarā netare janāḥ
a ā mātṛstanapānāc ca yāvac chayyopasarpaṇam
c jaṅgamāḥ karmaṇā vṛttim āpnuvanti yudhiṣṭhira
a jaṅgameṣu viśeṣeṇa manuṣyā bharatarṣabha
c icchanti karmaṇā vṛttim avāptuṃ pretya ceha ca
a utthānam abhijānanti sarvabhūtāni bhārata
c pratyakṣaṃ phalam aśnanti karmaṇāṃ lokasākṣikam
a paśyāmi svaṃ samutthānam upajīvanti jantavaḥ
c api dhātā vidhātā ca yathāyam udake bakaḥ
d akarmaṇāṃ vai bhūtānāṃ vṛttiḥ syān na hi kā cana
d tad evābhiprapadyeta na vihanyāt kathaṃ cana
a svakarma kuru mā glāsīḥ karmaṇā bhava daṃśitaḥ
c kṛtyaṃ hi yo 'bhijānāti sahasre nāsti so 'sti vā
a tasya cāpi bhavet kāryaṃ vivṛddhau rakṣaṇe tathā
c bhakṣyamāṇo hy anāvāpaḥ kṣīyate himavān api
a utsīderan prajāḥ sarvā na kuryuḥ karma ced yadi
b tathā hy etā na vardheran karma ced aphalaṃ bhavet
c api cāpy aphalaṃ karma paśyāmaḥ kurvato janān
e nānyathā hy abhijānanti vṛttiṃ loke kathaṃ cana
a yaś ca diṣṭaparo loke yaś cāyaṃ haṭhavādakaḥ
c ubhāv apasadāv etau karmabuddhiḥ praśasyate
a yo hi diṣṭam upāsīno nirviceṣṭaḥ sukhaṃ svapet
c avasīdet sudurbuddhir āmo ghaṭa ivāmbhasi
a tathaiva haṭhabuddhir yaḥ śaktaḥ karmaṇy akarmakṛt
c āsīta na ciraṃ jīved anātha iva durbalaḥ
a akasmād api yaḥ kaś cid arthaṃ prāpnoti pūruṣaḥ
c taṃ haṭheneti manyante sa hi yatno na kasya cit
a yac cāpi kiṃ cit puruṣo diṣṭaṃ nāma labhaty uta
c daivena vidhinā pārtha tad daivam iti niścitam
a yat svayaṃ karmaṇā kiṃ cit phalam āpnoti pūruṣaḥ
c pratyakṣaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭaṃ tat pauruṣam iti smṛtam
a svabhāvataḥ pravṛtto 'nyaḥ prāpnoty arthān akāraṇāt
c tat svabhāvātmakaṃ viddhi phalaṃ puruṣasattama
a evaṃ haṭhāc ca daivāc ca svabhāvāt karmaṇas tathā
c yāni prāpnoti puruṣas tat phalaṃ pūrvakarmaṇaḥ
a dhātāpi hi svakarmaiva tais tair hetubhir īśvaraḥ
c vidadhāti vibhajyeha phalaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ nṛṇām
a yad dhy ayaṃ puruṣaḥ kiṃ cit kurute vai śubhāśubham
c tad dhātṛvihitaṃ viddhi pūrvakarmaphalodayam
a kāraṇaṃ tasya deho 'yaṃ dhātuḥ karmaṇi karmaṇi
c sa yathā prerayaty enaṃ tathāyaṃ kurute 'vaśaḥ
a teṣu teṣu hi kṛtyeṣu viniyoktā maheśvaraḥ
c sarvabhūtāni kaunteya kārayaty avaśāny api
a manasārthān viniścitya paścāt prāpnoti karmaṇā
c buddhipūrvaṃ svayaṃ dhīraḥ puruṣas tatra kāraṇam
a saṃkhyātuṃ naiva śakyāni karmāṇi puruṣarṣabha
c agāranagarāṇāṃ hi siddhiḥ puruṣahaitukī
a tile tailaṃ gavi kṣīraṃ kāṣṭhe pāvakam antataḥ
c dhiyā dhīro vijānīyād upāyaṃ cāsya siddhaye
a tataḥ pravartate paścāt karaṇeṣv asya siddhaye
c tāṃ siddhim upajīvanti karmaṇām iha jantavaḥ
a kuśalena kṛtaṃ karma kartrā sādhu viniścitam
c idaṃ tv akuśaleneti viśeṣād upalabhyate
a iṣṭāpūrtaphalaṃ na syān na śiṣyo na gurur bhavet
c puruṣaḥ karmasādhyeṣu syāc ced ayam akāraṇam
a kartṛtvād eva puruṣaḥ karmasiddhau praśasyate
c asiddhau nindyate cāpi karmanāśaḥ kathaṃ tv iha
a sarvam eva haṭhenaike diṣṭenaike vadanty uta
c puruṣaprayatnajaṃ ke cit traidham etan nirucyate
a na caivaitāvatā kāryaṃ manyanta iti cāpare
c asti sarvam adṛśyaṃ tu diṣṭaṃ caiva tathā haṭhaḥ
e dṛśyate hi haṭhāc caiva diṣṭāc cārthasya saṃtatiḥ
a kiṃ cid daivād dhaṭhāt kiṃ cit kiṃ cid eva svakarmataḥ
c puruṣaḥ phalam āpnoti caturthaṃ nātra kāraṇam
e kuśalāḥ pratijānanti ye tattvaviduṣo janāḥ
a tathaiva dhātā bhūtānām iṣṭāniṣṭaphalapradaḥ
c yadi na syān na bhūtānāṃ kṛpaṇo nāma kaś cana
a yaṃ yam artham abhiprepsuḥ kurute karma pūruṣaḥ
c tat tat saphalam eva syād yadi na syāt purākṛtam
a tridvārām arthasiddhiṃ tu nānupaśyanti ye narāḥ
c tathaivānarthasiddhiṃ ca yathā lokās tathaiva te
a kartavyaṃ tv eva karmeti manor eṣa viniścayaḥ
b ā mṛtyoḥ śriyam anvicchen naināṃ manyeta durlabhām
c ekāntena hy anīho 'yaṃ parābhavati pūruṣaḥ
d tat tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ na syāt tvayy akarmaṇy avasthite
a kurvato hi bhavaty eva prāyeṇeha yudhiṣṭhira
c ekāntaphalasiddhiṃ tu na vindaty alasaḥ kva cit
a asaṃbhave tv asya hetuḥ prāyaścittaṃ tu lakṣyate
c kṛte karmaṇi rājendra tathānṛṇyam avāpyate
a alakṣmīr āviśaty enaṃ śayānam alasaṃ naram
c niḥsaṃśayaṃ phalaṃ labdhvā dakṣo bhūtim upāśnute
a anarthaṃ saṃśayāvasthaṃ vṛṇvate muktasaṃśayāḥ
c dhīrā narāḥ karmaratā na tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ kva cit
a ekāntena hy anartho 'yaṃ vartate 'smāsu sāṃpratam
c na tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ na syāt tvayi karmaṇy avasthite
a atha vā siddhir eva syān mahimā tu tathaiva te
c vṛkodarasya bībhatsor bhrātroś ca yamayor api
a anyeṣāṃ karma saphalam asmākam api vā punaḥ
c viprakarṣeṇa budhyeta kṛtakarmā yathā phalam
a pṛthivīṃ lāṅgalenaiva bhittvā bījaṃ vapaty uta
c āste 'tha karṣakas tūṣṇīṃ parjanyas tatra kāraṇam
a vṛṣṭiś cen nānugṛhṇīyād anenās tatra karṣakaḥ
c yad anyaḥ puruṣaḥ kuryāt kṛtaṃ tat sakalaṃ mayā
a tac ced aphalam asmākaṃ nāparādho 'sti naḥ kva cit
c iti dhīro 'nvavekṣyaiva nātmānaṃ tatra garhayet
a kurvato nārthasiddhir me bhavatīti ha bhārata
c nirvedo nātra gantavyo dvāv etau hy asya karmaṇaḥ
e siddhir vāpy atha vāsiddhir apravṛttir ato 'nyathā
a bahūnāṃ samavāye hi bhāvānāṃ karma sidhyati
c guṇābhāve phalaṃ nyūnaṃ bhavaty aphalam eva vā
e anārambhe tu na phalaṃ na guṇo dṛśyate 'cyuta
a deśakālāv upāyāṃś ca maṅgalaṃ svasti vṛddhaye
c yunakti medhayā dhīro yathāśakti yathābalam
a apramattena tat kāryam upadeṣṭā parākramaḥ
c bhūyiṣṭhaṃ karmayogeṣu sarva eva parākramaḥ
a yaṃ tu dhīro 'nvavekṣeta śreyāṃsaṃ bahubhir guṇaiḥ
c sāmnaivārthaṃ tato lipset karma cāsmai prayojayet
a vyasanaṃ vāsya kāṅkṣeta vināśaṃ vā yudhiṣṭhira
c api sindhor girer vāpi kiṃ punar martyadharmiṇaḥ
a utthānayuktaḥ satataṃ pareṣām antaraiṣaṇe
c ānṛṇyam āpnoti naraḥ parasyātmana eva ca
a na caivātmāvamantavyaḥ puruṣeṇa kadā cana
c na hy ātmaparibhūtasya bhūtir bhavati bhārata
a evaṃ saṃsthitikā siddhir iyaṃ lokasya bhārata
c citrā siddhigatiḥ proktā kālāvasthāvibhāgataḥ
a brāhmaṇaṃ me pitā pūrvaṃ vāsayām āsa paṇḍitam
c so 'smā artham imaṃ prāha pitre me bharatarṣabha
a nītiṃ bṛhaspatiproktāṃ bhrātṝn me 'grāhayat purā
c teṣāṃ sāṃkathyam aśrauṣam aham etat tadā gṛhe
a sa māṃ rājan karmavatīm āgatām āha sāntvayan
c śuśrūṣamāṇām āsīnāṃ pitur aṅke yudhiṣṭhira
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yājñasenyā vacaḥ śrutvā bhīmaseno 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
c niḥśvasann upasaṃgamya kruddho rājānam abravīt
a rājyasya padavīṃ dharmyāṃ vraja satpuruṣocitām
c dharmakāmārthahīnānāṃ kiṃ no vastuṃ tapovane
a naiva dharmeṇa tad rājyaṃ nārjavena na caujasā
c akṣakūṭam adhiṣṭhāya hṛtaṃ duryodhanena naḥ
a gomāyuneva siṃhānāṃ durbalena balīyasām
c āmiṣaṃ vighasāśena tadvad rājyaṃ hi no hṛtam
a dharmaleśapraticchannaḥ prabhavaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
c artham utsṛjya kiṃ rājan durgeṣu paritapyase
a bhavato 'nuvidhānena rājyaṃ naḥ paśyatāṃ hṛtam
c ahāryam api śakreṇa guptaṃ gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
a kuṇīnām iva bilvāni paṅgūnām iva dhenavaḥ
c hṛtam aiśvaryam asmākaṃ jīvatāṃ bhavataḥ kṛte
a bhavataḥ priyam ity evaṃ mahad vyasanam īdṛśam
c dharmakāme pratītasya pratipannāḥ sma bhārata
a karśayāmaḥ svamitrāṇi nandayāmaś ca śātravān
c ātmānaṃ bhavataḥ śāstre niyamya bharatarṣabha
a yad vayaṃ na tadaivaitān dhārtarāṣṭrān nihanmahi
c bhavataḥ śāstram ādāya tan nas tapati duṣkṛtam
a athainām anvavekṣasva mṛgacaryām ivātmanaḥ
c avīrācaritāṃ rājan na balasthair niṣevitām
a yāṃ na kṛṣṇo na bībhatsur nābhimanyur na sṛñjayaḥ
c na cāham abhinandāmi na ca mādrīsutāv ubhau
a bhavān dharmo dharma iti satataṃ vratakarśitaḥ
c kaccid rājan na nirvedād āpannaḥ klībajīvikām
d aśakyam iti vā kaś cit kṣātraṃ naiva smariṣyasi
d durmanuṣyā hi nirvedād āpannāḥ klībajīvikām
a durmanuṣyā hi nirvedam aphalaṃ sarvaghātinam
b pratipannā viṣīdanti paṅke gaur iva durbalā
b yad asmān sarvakāryeṣu samarthā dhṛtarāṣṭrajāḥ
c aśaktāḥ śriyam āhartum ātmanaḥ kurvate priyam
a sa bhavān dṛṣṭimāñ śaktaḥ paśyann ātmani pauruṣam
c ānṛśaṃsyaparo rājan nānartham avabudhyase
a asmān amī dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kṣamamāṇān alaṃ sataḥ
c aśaktān eva manyante tadduḥkhaṃ nāhave vadhaḥ
a tatra ced yudhyamānānām ajihmam anivartinām
c sarvaśo hi vadhaḥ śreyān pretya lokāṃl labhemahi
a atha vā vayam evaitān nihatya bharatarṣabha
c ādadīmahi gāṃ sarvāṃ tathāpi śreya eva naḥ
a sarvathā kāryam etan naḥ svadharmam anutiṣṭhatām
c kāṅkṣatāṃ vipulāṃ kīrtiṃ vairaṃ praticikīrṣatām
a ātmārthaṃ yudhyamānānāṃ vidite kṛtyalakṣaṇe
c anyair apahṛte rājye praśaṃsaiva na garhaṇā
a karśanārtho hi yo dharmo mitrāṇām ātmanas tathā
c vyasanaṃ nāma tad rājan na sa dharmaḥ kudharma tat
a sarvathā dharmanityaṃ tu puruṣaṃ dharmadurbalam
c jahatas tāta dharmārthau pretaṃ duḥkhasukhe yathā
a yasya dharmo hi dharmārthaṃ kleśabhāṅ na sa paṇḍitaḥ
c na sa dharmasya vedārthaṃ sūryasyāndhaḥ prabhām iva
a yasya cārthārtham evārthaḥ sa ca nārthasya kovidaḥ
c rakṣate bhṛtako 'raṇyaṃ yathā syāt tādṛg eva saḥ
a ativelaṃ hi yo 'rthārthī netarāv anutiṣṭhati
c sa vadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmaheva jugupsitaḥ
a satataṃ yaś ca kāmārthī netarāv anutiṣṭhati
c mitrāṇi tasya naśyanti dharmārthābhyāṃ ca hīyate
a tasya dharmārthahīnasya kāmānte nidhanaṃ dhruvam
c kāmato ramamāṇasya mīnasyevāmbhasaḥ kṣaye
a tasmād dharmārthayor nityaṃ na pramādyanti paṇḍitāḥ
c prakṛtiḥ sā hi kāmasya pāvakasyāraṇir yathā
a sarvathā dharmamūlo 'rtho dharmaś cārthaparigrahaḥ
c itaretarayonī tau viddhi meghodadhī yathā
a dravyārthasparśasaṃyoge yā prītir upajāyate
c sa kāmaś cittasaṃkalpaḥ śarīraṃ nāsya vidyate
a arthārthī puruṣo rājan bṛhantaṃ dharmam ṛcchati
c artham ṛcchati kāmārthī na kāmād anyam ṛcchatī
d kāmārthī caiva yaḥ kāmaṃ na kāmād anyam ṛcchati
a na hi kāmena kāmo 'nyaḥ sādhyate phalam eva tat
c upayogāt phalasyeva kāṣṭhād bhasmeva paṇḍitaḥ
a imāñ śakunikān rājan hanti vaitaṃsiko yathā
c etad rūpam adharmasya bhūteṣu ca vihiṃsatām
a kāmāl lobhāc ca dharmasya pravṛttiṃ yo na paśyati
c sa vadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pretya ceha ca durmatiḥ
a vyaktaṃ te vidito rājann artho dravyaparigrahaḥ
c prakṛtiṃ cāpi vetthāsya vikṛtiṃ cāpi bhūyasīm
a tasya nāśaṃ vināśaṃ vā jarayā maraṇena vā
b dravyaparigrahāyārtho garīyān durbalātmanaḥ
c anartham iti manyante so 'yam asmāsu vartate
a indriyāṇāṃ ca pañcānāṃ manaso hṛdayasya ca
c viṣaye vartamānānāṃ yā prītir upajāyate
e sa kāma iti me buddhiḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam uttamam
a evam eva pṛthag dṛṣṭvā dharmārthau kāmam eva ca
c na dharmapara eva syān na cārthaparamo naraḥ
e na kāmaparamo vā syāt sarvān seveta sarvadā
a dharmaṃ pūrvaṃ dhanaṃ madhye jaghanye kāmam ācaret
c ahany anucared evam eṣa śāstrakṛto vidhiḥ
a kāmaṃ pūrvaṃ dhanaṃ madhye jaghanye dharmam ācaret
c vayasy anucared evam eṣa śāstrakṛto vidhiḥ
a dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yathāvad vadatāṃ vara
c vibhajya kāle kālajñaḥ sarvān seveta paṇḍitaḥ
a mokṣo vā paramaṃ śreya eṣa rājan sukhārthinām
c prāptir vā buddhim āsthāya sopāyaṃ kurunandana
a tad vāśu kriyatāṃ rājan prāptir vāpy adhigamyatām
c jīvitaṃ hy āturasyeva duḥkham antaravartinaḥ
a viditaś caiva te dharmaḥ satataṃ caritaś ca te
c jānate tvayi śaṃsanti suhṛdaḥ karmacodanām
a dānaṃ yajñaḥ satāṃ pūjā vedadhāraṇam ārjavam
c eṣa dharmaḥ paro rājan phalavān pretya ceha ca
a eṣa nārthavihīnena śakyo rājan niṣevitum
c akhilāḥ puruṣavyāghra guṇāḥ syur yady apītare
a dharmamūlaṃ jagad rājan nānyad dharmād viśiṣyate
c dharmaś cārthena mahatā śakyo rājan niṣevitum
a na cārtho bhaikṣacaryeṇa nāpi klaibyena karhi cit
c vettuṃ śakyaḥ sadā rājan kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā
a pratiṣiddhā hi te yācñā yayā sidhyati vai dvijaḥ
c tejasaivārthalipsāyāṃ yatasva puruṣarṣabha
a bhaikṣacaryā na vihitā na ca viṭśūdrajīvikā
c kṣatriyasya viśeṣeṇa dharmas tu balam aurasam
d svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva jahi śatrūn samāgatān
d dhārtarāṣṭravanaṃ pārtha mayā pārthena nāśaya
a udāram eva vidvāṃso dharmaṃ prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c udāraṃ pratipadyasva nāvare sthātum arhasi
a anubudhyasva rājendra vettha dharmān sanātanān
c krūrakarmābhijāto 'si yasmād udvijate janaḥ
a prajāpālanasaṃbhūtaṃ phalaṃ tava na garhitam
c eṣa te vihito rājan dhātrā dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a tasmād vicalitaḥ pārtha loke hāsyaṃ gamiṣyasi
c svadharmād dhi manuṣyāṇāṃ calanaṃ na praśasyate
a sa kṣātraṃ hṛdayaṃ kṛtvā tyaktvedaṃ śithilaṃ manaḥ
c vīryam āsthāya kaunteya dhuram udvaha dhuryavat
a na hi kevaladharmātmā pṛthivīṃ jātu kaś cana
c pārthivo vyajayad rājan na bhūtiṃ na punaḥ śriyam
a jihvāṃ dattvā bahūnāṃ hi kṣudrāṇāṃ lubdhacetasām
c nikṛtyā labhate rājyam āhāram iva śalyakaḥ
a bhrātaraḥ pūrvajātāś ca susamṛddhāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c nikṛtyā nirjitā devair asurāḥ pāṇḍavarṣabha
a evaṃ balavataḥ sarvam iti buddhvā mahīpate
c jahi śatrūn mahābāho parāṃ nikṛtim āsthitaḥ
a na hy arjunasamaḥ kaś cid yudhi yoddhā dhanurdharaḥ
c bhavitā vā pumān kaś cin matsamo vā gadādharaḥ
a sattvena kurute yuddhaṃ rājan subalavān api
c na pramāṇena notsāhāt sattvastho bhava pāṇḍava
a sattvaṃ hi mūlam arthasya vitathaṃ yad ato 'nyathā
c na tu prasaktaṃ bhavati vṛkṣacchāyeva haimanī
a arthatyāgo hi kāryaḥ syād arthaṃ śreyāṃsam icchatā
c bījaupamyena kaunteya mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
a arthena tu samo 'nartho yatra labhyeta nodayaḥ
c na tatra vipaṇaḥ kāryaḥ kharakaṇḍūyitaṃ hi tat
a evam eva manuṣyendra dharmaṃ tyaktvālpakaṃ naraḥ
c bṛhantaṃ dharmam āpnoti sa buddha iti niścitaḥ
a amitraṃ mitrasaṃpannaṃ mitrair bhindanti paṇḍitāḥ
c bhinnair mitraiḥ parityaktaṃ durbalaṃ kurute vaśe
a sattvena kurute yuddhaṃ rājan subalavān api
c nodyamena na hotrābhiḥ sarvāḥ svīkurute prajāḥ
a sarvathā saṃhatair eva durbalair balavān api
c amitraḥ śakyate hantuṃ madhuhā bhramarair iva
a yathā rājan prajāḥ sarvāḥ sūryaḥ pāti gabhastibhiḥ
c atti caiva tathaiva tvaṃ savituḥ sadṛśo bhava
a etad dhy api tapo rājan purāṇam iti naḥ śrutam
c vidhinā pālanaṃ bhūmer yat kṛtaṃ naḥ pitāmahaiḥ
d na tathā tapasā rājaṃl lokān prāpnoti kṣatriyaḥ
d yathā sṛṣṭena yuddhena vijayenetareṇa vā
a apeyāt kila bhāḥ sūryāl lakṣmīś candramasas tathā
c iti loko vyavasito dṛṣṭvemāṃ bhavato vyathām
a bhavataś ca praśaṃsābhir nindābhir itarasya ca
c kathāyuktāḥ pariṣadaḥ pṛthag rājan samāgatāḥ
a idam abhyadhikaṃ rājan brāhmaṇā guravaś ca te
c sametāḥ kathayantīha muditāḥ satyasaṃdhatām
a yan na mohān na kārpaṇyān na lobhān na bhayād api
c anṛtaṃ kiṃ cid uktaṃ te na kāmān nārthakāraṇāt
a yad enaḥ kurute kiṃ cid rājā bhūmim avāpnuvan
c sarvaṃ tan nudate paścād yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ
a brāhmaṇebhyo dadad grāmān gāś ca rājan sahasraśaḥ
c mucyate sarvapāpebhyas tamobhya iva candramāḥ
a paurajānapadāḥ sarve prāyaśaḥ kurunandana
c savṛddhabālāḥ sahitāḥ śaṃsanti tvāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
d dhārtarāṣṭrīṃ mahārāja na śaṃsanti matiṃ janāḥ
a śvadṛtau kṣīram āsaktaṃ brahma vā vṛṣale yathā
c satyaṃ stene balaṃ nāryāṃ rājyaṃ duryodhane tathā
a iti nirvacanaṃ loke ciraṃ carati bhārata
c api caitat striyo bālāḥ svādhyāyam iva kurvate
d imām avasthāṃ ca gate sahāsmābhir ariṃdama
d hanta naṣṭāḥ sma sarve vai bhavatopadrave sati
a sa bhavān ratham āsthāya sarvopakaraṇānvitam
c tvaramāṇo 'bhiniryātu ciram arthopapādakam
a vācayitvā dvijaśreṣṭhān adyaiva gajasāhvayam
c astravidbhiḥ parivṛto bhrātṛbhir dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ
e āśīviṣasamair vīrair marudbhir iva vṛtrahā
a amitrāṃs tejasā mṛdnann asurebhya ivārihā
c śriyam ādatsva kaunteya dhārtarāṣṭrān mahābala
a na hi gāṇḍīvamuktānāṃ śarāṇāṃ gārdhravāsasām
c sparśam āśīviṣābhānāṃ martyaḥ kaś cana saṃsahet
d kaḥ parair hriyamāṇānām ātmabhāvena saṃsahet
a na sa vīro na mātaṅgo na sadaśvo 'sti bhārata
c yaḥ saheta gadāvegaṃ mama kruddhasya saṃyuge
a sṛñjayaiḥ saha kaikeyair vṛṣṇīnām ṛṣabheṇa ca
c kathaṃ svid yudhi kaunteya rājyaṃ na prāpnuyāmahe
d śatruhastagatāṃ rājan kathaṃ svinn āharer mahīm
d iha yatnam upāhṛtya balena mahatānvitaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
 sa evam uktas tu mahānubhāvaḥ
 satyavrato bhīmasenena rājā
 ajātaśatrus tadanantaraṃ vai
 dhairyānvito vākyam idaṃ babhāṣe
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a asaṃśayaṃ bhārata satyam etad
yan mā tudan vākyaśalyaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi
c na tvā vigarhe pratikūlam etan
mamānayād dhi vyasanaṃ va āgāt
a ahaṃ hy akṣān anvapadyaṃ jihīrṣan
rājyaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāt
c tan mā śaṭhaḥ kitavaḥ pratyadevīt
suyodhanārthaṃ subalasya putraḥ
a mahāmāyaḥ śakuniḥ pārvatīyaḥ
sadā sabhāyāṃ pravapann akṣapūgān
c amāyinaṃ māyayā pratyadevīt
tato 'paśyaṃ vṛjinaṃ bhīmasena
a akṣān hi dṛṣṭvā śakuner yathāvat
kāmānulomān ayujo yujaś ca
c śakyaṃ niyantum abhaviṣyad ātmā
manyus tu hanti puruṣasya dhairyam
a yantuṃ nātmā śakyate pauruṣeṇa
mānena vīryeṇa ca tāta naddhaḥ
c na te vācaṃ bhīmasenābhyasūye
manye tathā tad bhavitavyam āsīt
a sa no rājā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putro
nyapātayad vyasane rājyam icchan
c dāsyaṃ ca no 'gamayad bhīmasena
yatrābhavac charaṇaṃ draupadī naḥ
a tvaṃ cāpi tad vettha dhanaṃjayaś ca
punardyūtāyāgatānāṃ sabhāṃ naḥ
c yan mābravīd dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putra
ekaglahārthaṃ bharatānāṃ samakṣam
a vane samā dvādaśa rājaputra
yathākāmaṃ viditam ajātaśatro
c athāparaṃ cāviditaṃ carethāḥ
sarvaiḥ saha bhrātṛbhiś chadmagūḍhaḥ
a tvāṃ cec chrutvā tāta tathā carantam
avabhotsyante bhāratānāṃ carāḥ sma
c anyāṃś carethās tāvato 'bdāṃs tatas tvaṃ
niścitya tat pratijānīhi pārtha
a caraiś cen no 'viditaḥ kālam etaṃ
yukto rājan mohayitvā madīyān
c bravīmi satyaṃ kurusaṃsadīha
tavaiva tā bhārata pañca nadyaḥ
a vayaṃ caivaṃ bhrātaraḥ sarva eva
tvayā jitāḥ kālam apāsya bhogān
c vasema ity āha purā sa rājā
madhye kurūṇāṃ sa mayoktas tatheti
a tatra dyūtam abhavan no jaghanyaṃ
tasmiñ jitāḥ pravrajitāś ca sarve
c itthaṃ ca deśān anusaṃcarāmo
vanāni kṛcchrāṇi ca kṛcchrarūpāḥ
a suyodhanaś cāpi na śāntim icchan
bhūyaḥ sa manyor vaśam anvagacchat
c udyojayām āsa kurūṃś ca sarvān
ye cāsya ke cid vaśam anvagacchan
a taṃ saṃdhim āsthāya satāṃ sakāśe
ko nāma jahyād iha rājyahetoḥ
c āryasya manye maraṇād garīyo
yad dharmam utkramya mahīṃ praśiṣyāt
a tadaiva ced vīrakarmākariṣyo
yadā dyūte parighaṃ paryamṛkṣaḥ
c bāhū didhakṣan vāritaḥ phalgunena
kiṃ duṣkṛtaṃ bhīma tadābhaviṣyat
a prāg eva caivaṃ samayakriyāyāḥ
kiṃ nābravīḥ pauruṣam āvidānaḥ
c prāptaṃ tu kālaṃ tv abhipadya paścāt
kiṃ mām idānīm ativelam āttha
a bhūyo 'pi duḥkhaṃ mama bhīmasena
dūye viṣasyeva rasaṃ viditvā
c yad yājñasenīṃ parikṛṣyamāṇāṃ
saṃdṛśya tat kṣāntam iti sma bhīma
a na tv adya śakyaṃ bharatapravīra
kṛtvā yad uktaṃ kuruvīramadhye
c kālaṃ pratīkṣasva sukhodayasya
paktiṃ phalānām iva bījavāpaḥ
a yadā hi pūrvaṃ nikṛto nikṛtyā
vairaṃ sapuṣpaṃ saphalaṃ viditvā
c mahāguṇaṃ harati hi pauruṣeṇa
tadā vīro jīvati jīvaloke
a śriyaṃ ca loke labhate samagrāṃ
manye cāsmai śatravaḥ saṃnamante
c mitrāṇi cainam atirāgād bhajante
devā ivendram anujīvanti cainam
a mama pratijñāṃ ca nibodha satyāṃ
vṛṇe dharmam amṛtāj jīvitāc ca
c rājyaṃ ca putrāś ca yaśo dhanaṃ ca
sarvaṃ na satyasya kalām upaiti
 bhīmasena uvāca
a saṃdhiṃ kṛtvaiva kālena antakena patatriṇā
c anantenāprameyena srotasā sarvahāriṇā
a pratyakṣaṃ manyase kālaṃ martyaḥ san kālabandhanaḥ
c phenadharmā mahārāja phaladharmā tathaiva ca
a nimeṣād api kaunteya yasyāyur apacīyate
c sūcyevāñjanacūrṇasya kim iti pratipālayet
a yo nūnam amitāyuḥ syād atha vāpi pramāṇavit
c sa kālaṃ vai pratīkṣeta sarvapratyakṣadarśivān
a pratīkṣamāṇān kālo naḥ samā rājaṃs trayodaśa
c āyuṣo 'pacayaṃ kṛtvā maraṇāyopaneṣyati
a śarīriṇāṃ hi maraṇaṃ śarīre nityam āśritam
c prāg eva maraṇāt tasmād rājyāyaiva ghaṭāmahe
d kālo nūnaṃ manuṣyasya nityaṃ saṃnihito 'mṛtaḥ
a yo na yāti prasaṃkhyānam aspaṣṭo bhūmivardhanaḥ
c ayātayitvā vairāṇi so 'vasīdati gaur iva
a yo na yātayate vairam alpasattvodyamaḥ pumān
c aphalaṃ tasya janmāhaṃ manye durjātajāyinaḥ
a hairaṇyau bhavato bāhū śrutir bhavati pārthiva
c hatvā dviṣantaṃ saṃgrāme bhuktvā bāhvarjitaṃ vasu
a hatvā cet puruṣo rājan nikartāram ariṃdama
c ahnāya narakaṃ gacchet svargeṇāsya sa saṃmitaḥ
a amarṣajo hi saṃtāpaḥ pāvakād dīptimattaraḥ
c yenāham abhisaṃtapto na naktaṃ na divā śaye
a ayaṃ ca pārtho bībhatsur variṣṭho jyāvikarṣaṇe
c āste paramasaṃtapto nūnaṃ siṃha ivāśaye
a yo 'yam eko 'bhimanute sarvāṃl loke dhanurbhṛtaḥ
c so 'yam ātmajam ūṣmāṇaṃ mahāhastīva yacchati
a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca vṛddhā mātā ca vīrasūḥ
c tavaiva priyam icchanta āsate jaḍamūkavat
a sarve te priyam icchanti bāndhavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
c aham eko 'bhisaṃtapto mātā ca prativindhyataḥ
a priyam eva tu sarveṣāṃ yad bravīmy uta kiṃ cana
c sarve hī vyasanaṃ prāptāḥ sarve yuddhābhinandinaḥ
a netaḥ pāpīyasī kā cid āpad rājan bhaviṣyati
c yan no nīcair alpabalai rājyam ācchidya bhujyate
a śīladoṣād ghṛṇāviṣṭa ānṛśaṃsyāt paraṃtapa
c kleśāṃs titikṣase rājan nānyaḥ kaś cit praśaṃsati
d śrotriyasyeva te rājan mandakasyāvipaścitaḥ
d anuvākahatā buddhir naiṣā tattvārthadarśinī
a ghṛṇī brāhmaṇarūpo 'si kathaṃ kṣatre ajāyathāḥ
c asyāṃ hi yonau jāyante prāyaśaḥ krūrabuddhayaḥ
a aśrauṣīs tvaṃ rājadharmān yathā vai manur abravīt
c krūrān nikṛtisaṃyuktān vihitān aśamātmakān
d dhārtarāṣṭrān mahārāja kṣamase kiṃ durātmanaḥ
d jñāne tapasi śaurye vā yasya na prathitaṃ yaśaḥ
d vidyāyām atha lābhe vā mātur uccāra eva saḥ
a kartavye puruṣavyāghra kim āsse pīṭhasarpavat
c buddhyā vīryeṇa saṃyuktaḥ śrutenābhijanena ca
a tṛṇānāṃ muṣṭinaikena himavantaṃ tu parvatam
c channam icchasi kaunteya yo 'smān saṃvartum icchasi
a ajñātacaryā gūḍhena pṛthivyāṃ viśrutena ca
c divīva pārtha sūryeṇa na śakyā carituṃ tvayā
a bṛhacchāla ivānūpe śākhāpuṣpapalāśavān
c hastī śveta ivājñātaḥ kathaṃ jiṣṇuś cariṣyati
a imau ca siṃhasaṃkāśau bhrātarau sahitau śiśū
c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca kathaṃ pārtha cariṣyataḥ
a puṇyakīrtī rājaputrī draupadī vīrasūr iyam
c viśrutā katham ajñātā kṛṣṇā pārtha cariṣyati
a māṃ cāpi rājañ jānanti ākumāram imāḥ prajāḥ
c ajñātacaryāṃ paśyāmi meror iva nigūhanam
a tathaiva bahavo 'smābhī rāṣṭrebhyo vipravāsitāḥ
c rājāno rājaputrāś ca dhṛtarāṣṭram anuvratāḥ
a na hi te 'py upaśāmyanti nikṛtānāṃ nirākṛtāḥ
c avaśyaṃ tair nikartavyam asmākaṃ tatpriyaiṣibhiḥ
a te 'py asmāsu prayuñjīran pracchannān subahūñ janān
c ācakṣīraṃś ca no jñātvā tan naḥ syāt sumahad bhayam
a asmābhir uṣitāḥ samyag vane māsās trayodaśa
c parimāṇena tān paśya tāvataḥ parivatsarān
a asti māsaḥ pratinidhir yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c pūtikān iva somasya tathedaṃ kriyatām iti
a atha vānaḍuhe rājan sādhave sādhuvāhine
c sauhityadānād ekasmād enasaḥ pratimucyate
a tasmāc chatruvadhe rājan kriyatāṃ niścayas tvayā
c kṣatriyasya tu sarvasya nānyo dharmo 'sti saṃyugāt
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a bhīmasenavacaḥ śrutvā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c niḥśvasya puruṣavyāghraḥ saṃpradadhyau paraṃtapaḥ
d śrutā me rājadharmāś ca varṇānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
d āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
d dharmasya jānamāno 'haṃ gatim agryāṃ sudurvidām
d kathaṃ balāt kariṣyāmi meror iva vimardanam
a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā viniścityetikṛtyatām
c bhīmasenam idaṃ vākyam apadāntaram abravīt
a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
c idam anyat samādhatsva vākyaṃ me vākyakovida
a mahāpāpāni karmāṇi yāni kevalasāhasāt
c ārabhyante bhīmasena vyathante tāni bhārata
a sumantrite suvikrānte sukṛte suvicārite
c sidhyanty arthā mahābāho daivaṃ cātra pradakṣiṇam
a tvaṃ tu kevalacāpalyād baladarpocchritaḥ svayam
c ārabdhavyam idaṃ karma manyase śṛṇu tatra me
a bhūriśravāḥ śalaś caiva jalasaṃdhaś ca vīryavān
c bhīṣmo droṇaś ca karṇaś ca droṇaputraś ca vīryavān
a dhārtarāṣṭrā durādharṣā duryodhanapurogamāḥ
c sarva eva kṛtāstrāś ca satataṃ cātatāyinaḥ
a rājānaḥ pārthivāś caiva ye 'smābhir upatāpitāḥ
c saṃśritāḥ kauravaṃ pakṣaṃ jātasnehāś ca sāṃpratam
a duryodhanahite yuktā na tathāsmāsu bhārata
c pūrṇakośā balopetāḥ prayatiṣyanti rakṣaṇe
a sarve kauravasainyasya saputrāmātyasainikāḥ
c saṃvibhaktā hi mātrābhir bhogair api ca sarvaśaḥ
a duryodhanena te vīrā mānitāś ca viśeṣataḥ
c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyanti saṃgrāme iti me niścitā matiḥ
a samā yady api bhīṣmasya vṛttir asmāsu teṣu ca
c droṇasya ca mahābāho kṛpasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a avaśyaṃ rājapiṇḍas tair nirveśya iti me matiḥ
c tasmāt tyakṣyanti saṃgrāme prāṇān api sudustyajān
a sarve divyāstravidvāṃsaḥ sarve dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
c ajeyāś ceti me buddhir api devaiḥ savāsavaiḥ
a amarṣī nityasaṃhṛṣṭas tatra karṇo mahārathaḥ
c sarvāstravid anādhṛṣya abhedyakavacāvṛtaḥ
a anirjitya raṇe sarvān etān puruṣasattamān
c aśakyo hy asahāyena hantuṃ duryodhanas tvayā
a na nidrām adhigacchāmi cintayāno vṛkodara
c ati sarvān dhanurgrāhān sūtaputrasya lāghavam
a etad vacanam ājñāya bhīmaseno 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
c babhūva vimanās trasto na caivovāca kiṃ cana
a tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ tadā pāṇḍavayor dvayoḥ
c ājagāma mahāyogī vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ
a so 'bhigamya yathānyāyaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiram idaṃ vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ
a yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho vedmi te hṛdi mānasam
c manīṣayā tataḥ kṣipram āgato 'smi nararṣabha
a bhīṣmād droṇāt kṛpāt karṇād droṇaputrāc ca bhārata
b duryodhanān nṛpasutāt tathā duḥśāsanād api
c yat te bhayam amitraghna hṛdi saṃparivartate
a tat te 'haṃ nāśayiṣyāmi vidhidṛṣṭena hetunā
c tac chrutvā dhṛtim āsthāya karmaṇā pratipādaya
d pratipādya tu rājendra tataḥ kṣipraṃ jvaraṃ jahi
a tata ekāntam unnīya pārāśaryo yudhiṣṭhiram
c abravīd upapannārtham idaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ
a śreyasas te paraḥ kālaḥ prāpto bharatasattama
c yenābhibhavitā śatrūn raṇe pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
a gṛhāṇemāṃ mayā proktāṃ siddhiṃ mūrtimatīm iva
c vidyāṃ pratismṛtiṃ nāma prapannāya bravīmi te
e yām avāpya mahābāhur arjunaḥ sādhayiṣyati
a astrahetor mahendraṃ ca rudraṃ caivābhigacchatu
c varuṇaṃ ca dhaneśaṃ ca dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍava
e śakto hy eṣa surān draṣṭuṃ tapasā vikrameṇa ca
a ṛṣir eṣa mahātejā nārāyaṇasahāyavān
c purāṇaḥ śāśvato devo viṣṇor aṃśaḥ sanātanaḥ
a astrāṇīndrāc ca rudrāc ca lokapālebhya eva ca
c samādāya mahābāhur mahat karma kariṣyati
a vanād asmāc ca kaunteya vanam anyad vicintyatām
c nivāsārthāya yad yuktaṃ bhaved vaḥ pṛthivīpate
a ekatra ciravāso hi na prītijanano bhavet
c tāpasānāṃ ca śāntānāṃ bhaved udvegakārakaḥ
a mṛgāṇām upayogaś ca vīrudoṣadhisaṃkṣayaḥ
c bibharṣi hi bahūn viprān vedavedāṅgapāragān
a evam uktvā prapannāya śucaye bhagavān prabhuḥ
c provāca yogatattvajño yogavidyām anuttamām
a dharmarājñe tadā dhīmān vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ
c anujñāya ca kaunteyaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata
a yudhiṣṭhiras tu dharmātmā tad brahma manasā yataḥ
c dhārayām āsa medhāvī kāle kāle samabhyasan
a sa vyāsavākyamudito vanād dvaitavanāt tataḥ
c yayau sarasvatītīre kāmyakaṃ nāma kānanam
a tam anvayur mahārāja śikṣākṣaravidas tathā
c brāhmaṇās tapasā yuktā devendram ṛṣayo yathā
a tataḥ kāmyakam āsādya punas te bharatarṣabhāḥ
a   rṣayo devapatiṃ yathā
a saṃprāpya tad vanaṃ ramyaṃ
c nyaviśanta mahātmānaḥ sāmātyāḥ sapadānugāḥ
a tatra te nyavasan rājan kaṃ cit kālaṃ manasvinaḥ
c dhanurvedaparā vīrāḥ śṛṇvānā vedam uttamam
a caranto mṛgayāṃ nityaṃ śuddhair bāṇair mṛgārthinaḥ
c pitṛdaivataviprebhyo nirvapanto yathāvidhi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c saṃsmṛtya munisaṃdeśam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a vivikte viditaprajñam arjunaṃ bharatarṣabham
c sāntvapūrvaṃ smitaṃ kṛtvā pāṇinā parisaṃspṛśan
a sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā vanavāsam ariṃdamaḥ
c dhanaṃjayaṃ dharmarājo rahasīdam uvāca ha
a bhīṣme droṇe kṛpe karṇe droṇaputre ca bhārata
c dhanurvedaś catuṣpāda eteṣv adya pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a brāhmaṃ daivam āsuraṃ ca saprayogacikitsitam
c sarvāstrāṇāṃ prayogaṃ ca te 'bhijānanti kṛtsnaśaḥ
a te sarve dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putreṇa parisāntvitāḥ
c saṃvibhaktāś ca tuṣṭāś ca guruvat teṣu vartate
d aikātmyaṃ ca gatāḥ sarve dhārtarāṣṭreṇa bhārata
a sarvayodheṣu caivāsya sadā vṛttir anuttamā
b ācāryā mānitās tuṣṭāḥ śāntiṃ vyavaharanty uta
c śaktiṃ na hāpayiṣyanti te kāle pratipūjitāḥ
a adya ceyaṃ mahī kṛtsnā duryodhanavaśānugā
b sagrāmanagarā pārtha sasāgaravanākarā
b anena brahmaṇā tāta sarvaṃ saṃpratipadyate
c tvayi vyapāśrayo 'smākaṃ tvayi bhāraḥ samāhitaḥ
e tatra kṛtyaṃ prapaśyāmi prāptakālam ariṃdama
a kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāt tāta gṛhītopaniṣan mayā
c tayā prayuktayā samyag jagat sarvaṃ prakāśate
e tena tvaṃ brahmaṇā tāta saṃyuktaḥ susamāhitaḥ
a devatānāṃ yathākālaṃ prasādaṃ pratipālaya
c tapasā yojayātmānam ugreṇa bharatarṣabha
a dhanuṣmān kavacī khaḍgī muniḥ sārasamanvitaḥ
c na kasya cid dadan mārgaṃ gaccha tātottarāṃ diśam
e indre hy astrāṇi divyāni samastāni dhanaṃjaya
a vṛtrād bhītais tadā devair balam indre samarpitam
c tāny ekasthāni sarvāṇi tatas tvaṃ pratipatsyase
a śakram eva prapadyasva sa te 'strāṇi pradāsyati
b yogayuktasya te pārtha tatra nāsti vicāraṇā
b pravarām atulāṃ satyāṃ nirdoṣāṃ sarvadā satām
b tām ekaḥ pāṇḍaveṣv adya astraṃ prāpto dhanaṃjayaḥ
b na cādharmam imaṃ devā nāsiddhaṃ nātapasvinam
b draṣṭum icchanti kaunteya calacittaṃ kathaṃ cana
b rorūyamāṇaṃ kaṭuka īrṣukaḥ kaṭukākṣaram
b duṣṭaḥ ślāghanakaḥ kṣeptā hantātha vicikitsitaḥ
b viśvastahantā māyāvī krodhano 'nṛtabhāṣitā
b atyāśī nāstiko 'dānto mitradhṛk sarvaśaṅkitaḥ
b ākroṣṭā cātimānī ca raudro lubdho 'tha lolupaḥ
b stenaś ca madyapaś caiva bhrūṇahā gurutalpagaḥ
b saṃbhāvitātmā cātyarthaṃ nṛśaṃsaḥ paruṣaś ca ha
b naite lokān āpnuvanti nirlokās te dhanaṃjaya
b ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaṃ satyaṃ karuṇaveditā
b damaḥ sthitir dhṛtir dharmaḥ kṣamā rūpam anuttamam
b dayā damaś ca dharmaś ca gurupūjā kṛtajñatā
b mitratā dvijabhaktiś ca vasanti tvayi phālguna
b vyapekṣā sarvabhūteṣu kṣamā dānaṃ matiḥ smṛtiḥ
b tasmāt kauravya śakreṇa sameṣyasi dhanaṃjaya
b tvādṛśena hi devānāṃ ślāghanīyaḥ samāgamaḥ
b suhṛdāṃ sodarāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bharatarṣabha
b tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā tāta vṛtrahā marutām iva
b tasmiṃs trayodaśe varṣe bhrātaraḥ suhṛdaś ca te
b sarve 'bhisaṃśrayiṣyanti bāhuvīryaṃ mahābala
b sa pārtha pitaraṃ gaccha sahasrākṣam ariṃdama
b muṣṭigrahaṇam ādatsva sarvāstrāṇi ca vāsavāt
b śataśṛṅge mahābāho maghavān idam abravīt
b śṛṇvatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvām upāghrāya mūrdhani
b viditaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ divaṃ tāta gamiṣyasi
b prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān raṃsyate jayatāṃ varaḥ
b mānitas tridaśaiḥ pārtha vihṛtya susukhaṃ divi
b avāpya paramāstrāṇi pṛthivīṃ punar eṣyasi
b guṇāṃs te vāsavas tāta khāṇḍavaṃ dahyatas tava
b śṛṇvatāṃ kila bhūtānāṃ punaḥ punar abhāṣata
b tāṃ pratijñāṃ naraśreṣṭha kartum arhasi vāsave
b kiṃ cid diśam itaḥ prāpya tapoyogamanā bhava
b kartum arhasi kaunteya maghavadvacanaṃ hitam
c dīkṣito 'dyaiva gaccha tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ devaṃ puraṃdaram
a evam uktvā dharmarājas tam adhyāpayata prabhuḥ
c dīkṣitaṃ vidhinā tena yatavākkāyamānasam
e anujajñe tato vīraṃ bhrātā bhrātaram agrajaḥ
a nideśād dharmarājasya draṣṭuṃ devaṃ puraṃdaram
c dhanur gāṇḍīvam ādāya tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī

a kṣatraṃ cāgnisamasparśaṃ bhāradvājena rakṣitam

e nivātakavacāś caiva saṃsādhyāḥ kurunandana
a pitur mamāṃśo devasya sarvalokapratāpinaḥ
c karṇaḥ sa sumahāvīryas tvayā vadhyo dhanaṃjaya
a aṃśāś ca kṣitisaṃprāptā devagandharvarakṣasām
c tayā nipātitā yuddhe svakarmaphalanirjitām
e gatiṃ prāpsyanti kaunteya yathāsvam arikarśana
a akṣayā tava kīrtiś ca loke sthāsyati phalguna
c tvayā sākṣān mahādevas toṣito hi mahāmṛdhe
e laghvī vasumatī cāpi kartavyā viṣṇunā saha
a gṛhāṇāstraṃ mahābāho daṇḍam aprativāraṇam
c anenāstreṇa sumahat tvaṃ hi karma kariṣyasi
a pratijagrāha tat pārtho vidhivat kurunandanaḥ
c samantraṃ sopacāraṃ ca samokṣaṃ sanivartanam
a tato jaladharaśyāmo varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ
c paścimāṃ diśam āsthāya giram uccārayan prabhuḥ
a pārtha kṣatriyamukhyas tvaṃ kṣatradharme vyavasthitaḥ
c paśya māṃ pṛthutāmrākṣa varuṇo 'smi jaleśvaraḥ
a mayā samudyatān pāśān vāruṇān anivāraṇān
c pratigṛhṇīṣva kaunteya sarahasyanivartanān
a ebhis tadā mayā vīra saṃgrāme tārakāmaye
c daiteyānāṃ sahasrāṇi saṃyatāni mahātmanām
a tasmād imān mahāsattva matprasādāt samutthitān
c gṛhāṇa na hi te mucyed antako 'py ātatāyinaḥ
a anena tvaṃ yadāstreṇa saṃgrāme vicariṣyasi
c tadā niḥkṣatriyā bhūmir bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
d tatas tān vāruṇān divyān astrān astravidāṃ varaḥ
d pratijagrāha vidhivad varuṇād vāsavis tadā
a tataḥ kailāsanilayo dhanādhyakṣo 'bhyabhāṣata
c datteṣv astreṣu divyeṣu varuṇena yamena ca
d prīto 'ham api te prājña pāṇḍaveya mahābala
d tvayā saha samāgamya ajitena tathaiva ca
a savyasācin mahābāho pūrvadeva sanātana
c sahāsmābhir bhavāñ śrāntaḥ purākalpeṣu nityaśaḥ
d darśanāt te tv idaṃ divyaṃ pradiśāmi nararṣabha
d amanuṣyān mahābāho durjayān api jeṣyasi
a matto 'pi tvaṃ gṛhāṇāstram antardhānaṃ priyaṃ mama
b gṛhṇātv astram anuttamam
b anena tvam anīkāni dhārtarāṣṭrasya dhakṣyasi
b tad idaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva
c ojastejodyutiharaṃ prasvāpanam arātihan

d tvadartham udyataṃ cedaṃ mayā satyaparākrama

c kauberam api jagrāha divyam astraṃ mahābalaḥ
a tato 'bravīd devarājaḥ pārtham akliṣṭakāriṇam
c sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā meghadundubhinisvanaḥ
a kuntīmātar mahābāho tvam īśānaḥ purātanaḥ
c parāṃ siddhim anuprāptaḥ sākṣād devagatiṃ gataḥ
a devakāryaṃ hi sumahat tvayā kāryam ariṃdama

a tato 'rjuno mahātejā lokapālān samāgatān
c pūjayām āsa vidhivad vāgbhir adbhiḥ phalair api
a tataḥ pratiyayur devāḥ pratipūjya dhanaṃjayam
c yathāgatena vibudhāḥ sarve kāmamanojavāḥ
a tato 'rjuno mudaṃ lebhe labdhāstraḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
c kṛtārtham iva cātmānaṃ sa mene pūrṇamānasaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a gateṣu lokapāleṣu pārthaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
c cintayām āsa rājendra devarājarathāgamam

a asayaḥ śaktayo bhīmā gadāś cograpradarśanāḥ
c divyaprabhāvāḥ prāsāś ca vidyutaś ca mahāprabhāḥ

a tatra nāgā mahākāyā jvalitāsyāḥ sudāruṇāḥ

a daśa vājisahasrāṇi harīṇāṃ vātaraṃhasām
c vahanti yaṃ netramuṣaṃ divyaṃ māyāmayaṃ ratham
a tatrāpaśyan mahānīlaṃ vaijayantaṃ mahāprabham

c kuntīsutam iha prāptaṃ paśyantu tridaśālayāḥ
a eṣa śakraḥ parivṛto devair ṛṣigaṇais tathā
c gandharvair apsarobhiś ca tvāṃ didṛkṣuḥ pratīkṣate
a asmāl lokād devalokaṃ pākaśāsanaśāsanāt
c āroha tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ labdhāstraḥ punar eṣyasi

a mātale gaccha śīghraṃ tvam ārohasva rathottamam
c rājasūyāśvamedhānāṃ śatair api sudurlabham
a pārthivaiḥ sumahābhāgair yajvabhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
c daivatair vā samāroḍhuṃ dānavair vā rathottamam
a nātaptatapasā śakya eṣa divyo mahārathaḥ
c draṣṭuṃ vāpy atha vā spraṣṭum āroḍhuṃ kuta eva tu
a tvayi pratiṣṭhite sādho rathasthe sthiravājini
c paścād aham athārokṣye sukṛtī satpathaṃ yathā

a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥ
c āruroha rathaṃ śīghraṃ hayān yeme ca raśmibhiḥ

a adrirāja mahāśaila munisaṃśraya tīrthavan

c tīrthāni ca supuṇyāni mayā dṛṣṭāny anekaśaḥ
d phalāni ca sugandhīni bhakṣitāni tatas tataḥ
d susugandhāś ca vāryoghās tvac charīraviniḥsṛtāḥ
d amṛtāsvādanīyā me pītāḥ prasravaṇodakāḥ
d śiśur yathā pitur aṅke susukhaṃ vartate naga
d tathā tavāṅke lalitaṃ śailarāja mayā prabho

a so 'darśanapathaṃ yātvā martyānāṃ bhūmicāriṇām
c dadarśādbhutarūpāṇi vimānāni sahasraśaḥ
a na tatra sūryaḥ somo vā dyotate na ca pāvakaḥ
c svayaiva prabhayā tatra dyotante puṇyalabdhayā
a tārārūpāṇi yānīha dṛśyante dyutimanti vai
c dīpavad viprakṛṣṭatvād aṇūni sumahānty api
a tāni tatra prabhāsvanti rūpavanti ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c dadarśa sveṣu dhiṣṇyeṣu dīptimanti svayārciṣā
a tatra rājarṣayaḥ siddhā vīrāś ca nihatā yudhi
c tapasā ca jitasvargāḥ saṃpetuḥ śatasaṃghaśaḥ
a gandharvāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sūryajvalanatejasām
c guhyakānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ

c airāvataṃ caturdantaṃ kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam

c vyarocata yathā pūrvaṃ māndhātā pārthivottamaḥ
a aticakrāma lokān sa rājñāṃ rājīvalocanaḥ
b evaṃ sa saṃkramaṃs tatra svargaloke mahāyaśāḥ
c tato dadarśa śakrasya purīṃ tām amarāvatīm
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a sa dadarśa purīṃ ramyāṃ siddhacāraṇasevitām
c sarvartukusumaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pādapair upaśobhitām
a tatra saugandhikānāṃ sa drumāṇāṃ puṇyagandhinām
c upavījyamāno miśreṇa vāyunā puṇyagandhinā

c dadarśa divyakusumair āhvayadbhir iva drumaiḥ
a nātaptatapasā śakyo draṣṭuṃ nānāhitāgninā
c sa lokaḥ puṇyakartṝṇāṃ nāpi yuddhaparāṅmukhaiḥ
a nāyajvabhir nānṛtakair na vedaśrutivarjitaiḥ
c nānāplutāṅgais tīrtheṣu yajñadānabahiṣkṛtaiḥ

c puṣpagandhavahaiḥ puṇyair vāyubhiś cānuvījitaḥ
d puṣpotkaraiḥ śubhaiḥ so 'tha kīryamāṇo nararṣabhaḥ
a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
c hṛṣṭāḥ saṃpūjayām āsuḥ pārtham akliṣṭakāriṇam

c adhyakrāmad ameyātmā dvitīya iva vāsavaḥ

c sūryācandramasau vyomni caturdaśyām ivoditau
a tatra sma gāthā gāyanti sāmnā paramavalgunā
c gandharvās tumburuśreṣṭhāḥ kuśalā gītasāmasu

c urvaśī miśrakeśī ca ḍuṇḍur gaurī varūthinī

c kaṭākṣahāvamādhuryaiś cetobuddhimanoharāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ samādāyārghyam uttamam

d gītavāditranṛtyāni bhūya evādideśa ha

d atividdhena manasā manmathena pradīpitā

d arjuna uvāca
d tadābhivādanaṃ kṛtvā gurupūjāṃ prayuktavān
d abhivādaye tvāṃ śirasā pravarāpsarasāṃ vare
d kim ājñāpayase devi preṣyas te 'ham upasthitaḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d phālgunasya vacaḥ śrutvā gatasaṃjñā tadorvaśī
d urvaśy uvāca
d gandharvavacanaṃ sarvaṃ śrāvayām āsa taṃ tadā
d yathā me citrasenena kathitaṃ manujottama
d tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yathā cāham ihāgatā
d upasthāne mahendrasya vartamāne manorame
d tavāgamanato vṛtte svargasya paramotsave
d rudrāṇāṃ caiva sāṃnidhyam ādityānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d samāgame 'śvinoś caiva vasūnāṃ ca narottama
d maharṣīṇāṃ ca saṃgheṣu rājarṣipravareṣu ca
d siddhacāraṇayakṣeṣu mahoragagaṇeṣu ca

d divye manorame geye pravṛtte pṛthulocana

d tatra cāvabhṛthe tasminn upasthāne divaukasām
d tava pitrābhyanujñātā gatāḥ svaṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ surāḥ
d tathaivāpsarasaḥ sarvā visṛṣṭāḥ svagṛhaṃ gatāḥ
d api cānyāś ca śatrughna tava pitrā visarjitāḥ
d tataḥ śakreṇa saṃdiṣṭaś citraseno mamāntikam
d prāptaḥ kamalapatrākṣa sa ca mām abravīd atha

d priyaṃ kuru mahendrasya mama caivātmanaś ca ha

d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d cirābhilaṣito vīra mamāpy eṣa manorathaḥ
d tāṃ tathā bruvatīṃ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ lajjāvṛto 'rjunaḥ
d uvāca karṇau hastābhyāṃ pidhāya tridaśālaye
d duḥśrutaṃ me 'stu subhage yan māṃ vadasi bhāvini
d gurudāraiḥ samānā me niścayena varānane
d yathā kuntī mahābhāgā yathendrāṇī śacī mama
d tathā tvam api kalyāṇī nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
d yac cekṣitāsi vispaṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇa mayā śubhe
d tac ca kāraṇapūrvaṃ hi śṛṇu satyaṃ śucismite
d iyaṃ pauravavaṃśasya jananī muditeti ha
d tvām ahaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tatra vijñāyotphullalocanaḥ
d na mām arhasi kalyāṇi anyathā dhyātum apsaraḥ
d guror gurutarī me tvaṃ mama vaṃśavivardhinī
d urvaśy uvāca
d anāvṛtāś ca sarvāḥ sma devarājābhinandana
d gurusthāne na māṃ vīra niyoktuṃ tvam ihārhasi
d pūror vaṃśe hi ye putrā naptāro vā tv ihāgatāḥ
d tapasā ramayanty asmān na ca teṣāṃ vyatikramaḥ
d tat prasīda na mām ārtāṃ visarjayitum arhasi
d hṛcchayena ca saṃtaptāṃ bhaktāṃ ca bhaja mānada
d arjuna uvāca
d śruṇu satyaṃ varārohe yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmy anindite
d śṛṇvantu me diśaś caiva vidiśaś ca sadevatāḥ
d yathā kuntī ca mādrī ca śacī caiva mamānaghe
d tathā svavaṃśajananī tvaṃ hi me 'dya garīyasī
d gaccha mūrdhnā prapanno 'smi pādau te varavarṇini
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d tvaṃ hi me mātṛvat pūjyā rakṣyo 'haṃ putravat tvayā
d evam uktā tu pārthena urvaśī krodhamūrchitā
d vepantī bhrukuṭīvakrā śaśāpātha dhanaṃjayam
d urvaśy uvāca
d tava pitrābhyanujñātāṃ svayaṃ ca gṛham āgatām
d yasmān māṃ nābhinandethāḥ kāmabāṇavaśaṃ gatām
d tasmāt tvaṃ nartanaḥ pārtha strīmadhye mānavarjitaḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d apumān iti vikhyātaḥ ṣaṇḍhavad vicariṣyasi
d evaṃ dattvārjune śāpaṃ sphuradoṣṭhī śvasanty atha
d punaḥ pratyāgatā kṣipram urvaśī gṛham ātmanaḥ
d tato 'rjunas tvaramāṇaś citrasenam ariṃdamaḥ
d saṃprāpya rajanīvṛttaṃ tad urvaśyā yathā tathā
d nivedayām āsa tadā citrasenāya pāṇḍavaḥ
d tatra caivaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ śāpaṃ caiva punaḥ punaḥ
d nyavedayac ca śakrasya citraseno 'pi sarvaśaḥ
d tata ānāyya tanayaṃ vivikte harivāhanaḥ
d sāntvayitvā śubhair vākyaiḥ smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata
d suputrādya pṛthā tāta tvayā putreṇa sattama
d ṛṣayo 'pi hi dhairyeṇa jitā vai te mahābhuja
d yat tu dattavatī śāpam urvaśī tava mānada
d sa cāpi te 'rthakṛt tāta sādhakaś ca bhaviṣyati
d ajñātavāso vastavyo yuṣmābhir bhūtale 'nagha
d varṣe trayodaśe vīra tatra tvaṃ kṣapayiṣyasi
d tena nartanaveṣeṇa apuṃstvena tathaiva ca
d varṣam ekaṃ vihṛtyaiva tataḥ puṃstvam avāpsyasi
d evam uktas tu śakreṇa phālgunaḥ paravīrahā
d mudaṃ paramikāṃ lebhe na ca śāpaṃ vyacintayat
d citrasenena sahito gandharveṇa yaśasvinā
d reme sa svargabhavane pāṇḍuputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
d ya idaṃ śruṇuyān nityaṃ vṛttaṃ pāṇḍusutasya vai
d na tasya kāmaḥ kāmeṣu pāpakeṣu pravartate
d idam amaravarātmajasya ghoraṃ
d śuci caritaṃ viniśamya phālgunasya
d vyapagatamadadambharāgadoṣās
d tridivagatābhiramanti mānavendrāḥ
a kadā cid aṭamānas tu maharṣir uta lomaśaḥ
c jagāma śakrabhavanaṃ puraṃdaradidṛkṣayā
a sa sametya namaskṛtya devarājaṃ mahāmuniḥ
c dadarśārdhāsanagataṃ pāṇḍavaṃ vāsavasya ha
a tataḥ śakrābhyanujñāta āsane viṣṭarottare
c niṣasāda dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
a tasya dṛṣṭvābhavad buddhiḥ pārtham indrāsane sthitam
c kathaṃ nu kṣatriyaḥ pārthaḥ śakrāsanam avāptavān
a kiṃ tv asya sukṛtaṃ karma lokā vā ke vinirjitāḥ
c ya evam upasaṃprāptaḥ sthānaṃ devanamaskṛtam
a tasya vijñāya saṃkalpaṃ śakro vṛtraniṣūdanaḥ
c lomaśaṃ prahasan vākyam idam āha śacīpatiḥ
a brahmarṣe śrūyatāṃ yat te manasaitad vivakṣitam
c nāyaṃ kevalamartyo vai kṣatriyatvam upāgataḥ
a maharṣe mama putro 'yaṃ kuntyāṃ jāto mahābhujaḥ
c astrahetor iha prāptaḥ kasmāc cit kāraṇāntarāt
a aho nainaṃ bhavān vetti purāṇam ṛṣisattamam
c śṛṇu me vadato brahman yo 'yaṃ yac cāsya kāraṇam
a naranārāyaṇau yau tau purāṇāv ṛṣisattamau
c tāv imāv abhijānīhi hṛṣīkeśadhanaṃjayau
d vikhyātau triṣu lokeṣu naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
d kāryārtham avatīrṇau tau pṛthvīṃ puṇyapratiśrayām
a yan na śakyaṃ surair draṣṭum ṛṣibhir vā mahātmabhiḥ
c tad āśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ badarī nāma viśrutam
a sa nivāso 'bhavad vipra viṣṇor jiṣṇos tathaiva ca
c yataḥ pravavṛte gaṅgā siddhacāraṇasevitā
a tau manniyogād brahmarṣe kṣitau jātau mahādyutī
c bhūmer bhārāvataraṇaṃ mahāvīryau kariṣyataḥ
a udvṛttā hy asurāḥ ke cin nivātakavacā iti
c vipriyeṣu sthitāsmākaṃ varadānena mohitāḥ
a tarkayante surān hantuṃ baladarpasamanvitāḥ
c devān na gaṇayante ca tathā dattavarā hi te
a pātālavāsino raudrā danoḥ putrā mahābalāḥ
c sarve devanikāyā hi nālaṃ yodhayituṃ sma tān
a yo 'sau bhūmigataḥ śrīmān viṣṇur madhuniṣūdanaḥ
c kapilo nāma devo 'sau bhagavān ajito hariḥ
a yena pūrvaṃ mahātmānaḥ khanamānā rasātalam
c darśanād eva nihatāḥ sagarasyātmajā vibho
a tena kāryaṃ mahat kāryam asmākaṃ dvijasattama
c pārthena ca mahāyuddhe sametābhyām asaṃśayam
d so 'surān darśanād eva śakto hantuṃ sahānugān
d nivātakavacān sarvān nāgān iva mahāhrade
d kiṃ tu nālpena kāryeṇa prabodhyo madhusūdanaḥ
d tejasaḥ sumahān rāśiḥ prabuddhaḥ pradahej jagat
a ayaṃ teṣāṃ samastānāṃ śaktaḥ pratisamāsane
c tān nihatya raṇe śūraḥ punar yāsyati mānuṣān
a bhavāṃś cāsmanniyogena yātu tāvan mahītalam
c kāmyake drakṣyase vīraṃ nivasantaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
a sa vācyo mama saṃdeśād dharmātmā satyasaṃgaraḥ
c notkaṇṭhā phalgune kāryā kṛtāstraḥ śīghram eṣyati
a nāśuddhabāhuvīryeṇa nākṛtāstreṇa vā raṇe
c bhīṣmadroṇādayo yuddhe śakyāḥ pratisamāsitum
a gṛhītāstro guḍākeśo mahābāhur mahāmanāḥ
c nṛttavāditragītānāṃ divyānāṃ pāram eyivān
a bhavān api viviktāni tīrthāni manujeśvara
c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvair draṣṭum arhaty ariṃdama
a tīrtheṣv āplutya puṇyeṣu vipāpmā vigatajvaraḥ
c rājyaṃ bhokṣyasi rājendra sukhī vigatakalmaṣaḥ
a bhavāṃś cainaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha paryaṭantaṃ mahītale
c trātum arhati viprāgrya tapobalasamanvitaḥ
a giridurgeṣu hi sadā deśeṣu viṣameṣu ca
c vasanti rākṣasā raudrās tebhyo rakṣet sadā bhavān
d evam ukte mahendreṇa bībhatsur api lomaśam
d uvāca prayato vākyaṃ rakṣethāḥ pāṇḍunandanam
d yathā guptas tvayā rājā caret tīrthāni sattama
d dānaṃ dadyād yathā caiva tathā kuru mahāmune
a sa tatheti pratijñāya lomaśaḥ sumahātapāḥ
c kāmyakaṃ vanam uddiśya samupāyān mahītalam
a dadarśa tatra kaunteyaṃ dharmarājam ariṃdamam
c tāpasair bhrātṛbhiś caiva sarvataḥ parivāritam

a atyadbhutam idaṃ karma pārthasyāmitatejasaḥ
c dhṛtarāṣṭro mahātejāḥ śrutvā vipra kim abravīt
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śakralokagataṃ pārthaṃ śrutvā rājāmbikāsutaḥ
c dvaipāyanād ṛṣiśreṣṭhāt saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt
a śrutaṃ me sūta kārtsnyena karma pārthasya dhīmataḥ
c kaccit tavāpi viditaṃ yathātathyena sārathe

c mama putraḥ sudurbuddhiḥ pṛthivīṃ ghātayiṣyati

c trailokyam api tasya syād yoddhā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
a asyataḥ karṇinārācāṃs tīkṣṇāgrāṃś ca śilāśitān
