d tam āgatam abhiprekṣya bhrātṛbhiḥ saha dharmarāṭ
d pratyutthāya yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre mahātmane
a sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śrīmān bhrātṛbhiḥ kurusattamaḥ
c vibabhāv atidīptaujā devair iva śatakratuḥ
a yathā ca vedān sāvitrī yājñasenī tathā satī
c na jahau dharmataḥ pārthān merum arkaprabhā yathā
d arghyaṃ pādyam athānīya tv abhyavādayad acyutam
d nāradas tu mahātejāḥ svasty astv ity abhyabhāṣata
d tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dṛṣṭvā devarṣisattamam
d yathārhaṃ pūjayām āsa vidhivat kurunandanaḥ
a pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
c āśvāsayad dharmasutaṃ yuktarūpam ivānagha
a uvāca ca mahātmānaṃ dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c brūhi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha kenārthaḥ kiṃ dadāmi te
a atha dharmasuto rājā praṇamya bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
c uvāca prāñjalir vākyaṃ nāradaṃ devasaṃmitam
a tvayi tuṣṭe mahābhāga sarvalokābhipūjite
c kṛtam ity eva manye 'haṃ prasādāt tava suvrata
a yadi tv aham anugrāhyo bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'nagha
c saṃdehaṃ me muniśreṣṭha hṛdisthaṃ chettum arhasi
a pradakṣiṇaṃ yaḥ kurute pṛthivīṃ tīrthatatparaḥ
c kiṃ phalaṃ tasya kārtsnyena tad brahman vaktum arhasi
 nārada uvāca
a śṛṇu rājann avahito yathā bhīṣmeṇa bhārata
c pulastyasya sakāśād vai sarvam etad upaśrutam
a purā bhāgīrathītīre bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c pitryaṃ vrataṃ samāsthāya nyavasan munivat tadā
a śubhe deśe mahārāja puṇye devarṣisevite
c gaṅgādvāre mahātejā devagandharvasevite
a sa pitṝṃs tarpayām āsa devāṃś ca paramadyutiḥ
c ṛṣīṃś ca toṣayām āsa vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya japann eva mahātapāḥ
c dadarśādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ pulastyam ṛṣisattamam
a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvogratapasaṃ dīpyamānam iva śriyā
c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe vismayaṃ ca paraṃ yayau
a upasthitaṃ mahārāja pūjayām āsa bhārata
c bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
a śirasā cārghyam ādāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ
c nāma saṃkīrtayām āsa tasmin brahmarṣisattame
a bhīṣmo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te dāso 'smi tava suvrata
c tava saṃdarśanād eva mukto 'haṃ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
a evam uktvā mahārāja bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c vāgyataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tūṣṇīm āsīd yudhiṣṭhira
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā niyamenātha svādhyāyāmnāyakarśitam
b tataḥ sa madhureṇātha svareṇa sumahātapāḥ
b uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajñaḥ pulastyaḥ prītamānasaḥ
c bhīṣmaṃ kurukulaśreṣṭhaṃ muniḥ prītamanābhavat
 pulastya uvāca
a anena tava dharmajña praśrayeṇa damena ca
c satyena ca mahābhāga tuṣṭo 'smi tava sarvaśaḥ
a yasyedṛśas te dharmo 'yaṃ pitṛbhaktyāśrito 'nagha
c tena paśyasi māṃ putra prītiś cāpi mama tvayi
a amoghadarśī bhīṣmāhaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
c yad vakṣyasi kuruśreṣṭha tasya dātāsmi te 'nagha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a prīte tvayi mahābhāga sarvalokābhipūjite
c kṛtam ity eva manye 'haṃ yad ahaṃ dṛṣṭavān prabhum
a yadi tv aham anugrāhyas tava dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c vakṣyāmi hṛtsthaṃ saṃdehaṃ tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
a asti me bhagavan kaś cit tīrthebhyo dharmasaṃśayaḥ
c tam ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi pṛthak saṃkīrtitaṃ tvayā
a pradakṣiṇaṃ yaḥ pṛthivīṃ karoty amitavikrama
c kiṃ phalaṃ tasya viprarṣe tan me brūhi tapodhana
 pulastya uvāca
a hanta te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi yad ṛṣīṇāṃ parāyaṇam
c tad ekāgramanās tāta śṛṇu tīrtheṣu yat phalam
a yasya hastau ca pādau ca manaś caiva susaṃyatam
c vidyā tapaś ca kīrtiś ca sa tīrthaphalam aśnute
a pratigrahād upāvṛttaḥ saṃtuṣṭo niyataḥ śuciḥ
c ahaṃkāranivṛttaś ca sa tīrthaphalam aśnute
a akalkako nirārambho laghv āhāro jitendriyaḥ
c vimuktaḥ sarvadoṣair yaḥ sa tīrthaphalam aśnute
a akrodhanaś ca rājendra satyaśīlo dṛḍhavrataḥ
c ātmopamaś ca bhūteṣu sa tīrthaphalam aśnute
a ṛṣibhiḥ kratavaḥ proktā vedeṣv iha yathākramam
c phalaṃ caiva yathātattvaṃ pretya ceha ca sarvaśaḥ
a na te śakyā daridreṇa yajñāḥ prāptuṃ mahīpate
c bahūpakaraṇā yajñā nānāsaṃbhāravistarāḥ
a prāpyante pārthivair ete samṛddhair vā naraiḥ kva cit
c nārthanyūnopakaraṇair ekātmabhir asaṃhataiḥ
a yo daridrair api vidhiḥ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ nareśvara
c tulyo yajñaphalaiḥ puṇyais taṃ nibodha yudhāṃ vara
a ṛṣīṇāṃ paramaṃ guhyam idaṃ bharatasattama
c tīrthābhigamanaṃ puṇyaṃ yajñair api viśiṣyate
a anupoṣya trirātrāṇi tīrthāny anabhigamya ca
c adattvā kāñcanaṃ gāś ca daridro nāma jāyate
a agniṣṭomādibhir yajñair iṣṭvā vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ
c na tat phalam avāpnoti tīrthābhigamanena yat
a nṛloke devadevasya tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam
c puṣkaraṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ mahābhāgaḥ samāviśet
a daśa koṭisahasrāṇi tīrthānāṃ vai mahīpate
c sāṃnidhyaṃ puṣkare yeṣāṃ trisaṃdhyaṃ kurunandana
a ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyāś ca samarudgaṇāḥ
c gandharvāpsarasaś caiva nityaṃ saṃnihitā vibho
a yatra devās tapas taptvā daityā brahmarṣayas tathā
b tapoviśeṣair bahubhiḥ sthānāny āpur mahaujasaḥ
c divyayogā mahārāja puṇyena mahatānvitāḥ
a manasāpy abhikāmasya puṣkarāṇi manasvinaḥ
c pūyante sarvapāpāni nākapṛṣṭhe ca pūjyate
a tasmiṃs tīrthe mahābhāga nityam eva pitāmahaḥ
c uvāsa paramaprīto devadānavasaṃmataḥ
a puṣkareṣu mahābhāga devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥ
c siddhiṃ samabhisaṃprāptāḥ puṇyena mahatānvitāḥ
a tatrābhiṣekaṃ yaḥ kuryāt pitṛdevārcane rataḥ
c aśvamedhaṃ daśaguṇaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a apy ekaṃ bhojayed vipraṃ puṣkarāraṇyam āśritaḥ
c tenāsau karmaṇā bhīṣma pretya ceha ca modate
a śākamūlaphalair vāpi yena vartayate svayam
c tad vai dadyād brāhmaṇāya śraddhāvān anasūyakaḥ
e tenaiva prāpnuyāt prājño hayamedhaphalaṃ naraḥ
f api cāpy udapātreṇa brāhmaṇān svasti vācayet
f tenāpi pūjanenāhuḥ pretyānantyāya kalpate
a brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā rājasattama
c na viyoniṃ vrajanty ete snātās tīrthe mahātmanaḥ
a kārttikyāṃ tu viśeṣeṇa yo 'bhigaccheta puṣkaram
c phalaṃ tatrākṣayaṃ tasya vardhate bharatarṣabha
a sāyaṃ prātaḥ smared yas tu puṣkarāṇi kṛtāñjaliḥ
c upaspṛṣṭaṃ bhavet tena sarvatīrtheṣu bhārata
e prāpnuyāc ca naro lokān brahmaṇaḥ sadane 'kṣayān
a janmaprabhṛti yat pāpaṃ striyo vā puruṣasya vā
c puṣkare snātamātrasya sarvam eva praṇaśyati
a yathā surāṇāṃ sarveṣām ādis tu madhusūdanaḥ
c tathaiva puṣkaraṃ rājaṃs tīrthānām ādir ucyate
a uṣya dvādaśa varṣāṇi puṣkare niyataḥ śuciḥ
c kratūn sarvān avāpnoti brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati
a yas tu varṣaśataṃ pūrṇam agnihotram upāsate
c kārttikīṃ vā vased ekāṃ puṣkare samam eva tat
d trīṇi śṛṅgāṇi śubhrāṇi trīṇi prasravaṇāni ca
d puṣkarāṇyādisiddhāni na vidmas tatra kāraṇam
a duṣkaraṃ puṣkaraṃ gantuṃ duṣkaraṃ puṣkare tapaḥ
c duṣkaraṃ puṣkare dānaṃ vastuṃ caiva suduṣkaram
a uṣya dvādaśarātraṃ tu niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtto jambūmārgaṃ samāviśet
a jambūmārgaṃ samāviśya devarṣipitṛsevitam
c aśvamedham avāpnoti viṣṇulokaṃ ca gacchati
a tatroṣya rajanīḥ pañca ṣaṣṭhakālakṣamī naraḥ
c na durgatim avāpnoti siddhiṃ prāpnoti cottamām
a jambūmārgād upāvṛtto gacchet taṇḍulikāśramam
c na durgatim avāpnoti svargaloke ca pūjyate
a agastyasara āsādya pitṛdevārcane rataḥ
c trirātropoṣito rājann agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a śākavṛttiḥ phalair vāpi kaumāraṃ vindate padam
c kaṇvāśramaṃ samāsādya śrījuṣṭaṃ lokapūjitam
a dharmāraṇyaṃ hi tat puṇyam ādyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha
c yatra praviṣṭamātro vai pāpebhyo vipramucyate
a arcayitvā pitṝn devān niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c sarvakāmasamṛddhasya yajñasya phalam aśnute
a pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā yayātipatanaṃ vrajet
c hayamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti tatra vai
a mahākālaṃ tato gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c koṭitīrtham upaspṛśya hayamedhaphalaṃ labhet
a tato gaccheta dharmajña puṇyasthānam umāpateḥ
c nāmnā bhadravaṭaṃ nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
a tatrābhigamya ceśānaṃ gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
c mahādevaprasādāc ca gāṇapatyam avāpnuyāt
d samṛddham asapatnaṃ ca śriyā yuktaṃ narottama
d rājñaś caivādhipatyaṃ hi tatra gatvā samāpnuyāt
a narmadām atha cāsādya nadīṃ trailokyaviśrutām
c tarpayitvā pitṝn devān agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a dakṣiṇaṃ sindhum āsādya brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
c agniṣṭomam avāpnoti vimānaṃ cādhirohati
a carmaṇvatīṃ samāsādya niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c rantidevābhyanujñāto agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a tato gaccheta dharmajña himavatsutam arbudam
c pṛthivyāṃ yatra vai chidraṃ pūrvam āsīd yudhiṣṭhira
a tatrāśramo vasiṣṭhasya triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
c tatroṣya rajanīm ekāṃ gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a piṅgātīrtham upaspṛśya brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
c kapilānāṃ naravyāghra śatasya phalam aśnute
d tato gaccheta tad vṛttaṃ tīrthaṃ devaniṣevitam
d snātvā tatra naro bhāti vimalaś candramā yathā
a tato gaccheta dharmajña prabhāsaṃ lokaviśrutam
b tīrthaṃ devagaṇaiḥ pūjyam ṛṣibhiś ca niṣevitam
c yatra saṃnihito nityaṃ svayam eva hutāśanaḥ
e devatānāṃ mukhaṃ vīra analo 'nilasārathiḥ
a tasmiṃs tīrthavare snātvā śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ
c agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a tato gatvā sarasvatyāḥ sāgarasya ca saṃgame
c gosahasraphalaṃ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate
e dīpyamāno 'gnivan nityaṃ prabhayā bharatarṣabha
f tatra snātvā ca rājendra vimalārkasamadyutiḥ
a trirātram uṣitas tatra tarpayet pitṛdevatāḥ
c prabhāsate yathā somo aśvamedhaṃ ca vindati
a varadānaṃ tato gacchet tīrthaṃ bharatasattama
c viṣṇor durvāsasā yatra varo datto yudhiṣṭhira
a varadāne naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
c tato dvāravatīṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥ
e piṇḍārake naraḥ snātvā labhed bahu suvarṇakam
a tasmiṃs tīrthe mahābhāga padmalakṣaṇalakṣitāḥ
c adyāpi mudrā dṛśyante tad adbhutam ariṃdama
a triśūlāṅkāni padmāni dṛśyante kurunandana
c mahādevasya sāṃnidhyaṃ tatraiva bharatarṣabha
a sāgarasya ca sindhoś ca saṃgamaṃ prāpya bhārata
c tīrthe salilarājasya snātvā prayatamānasaḥ
a tarpayitvā pitṝn devān ṛṣīṃś ca bharatarṣabha
c prāpnoti vāruṇaṃ lokaṃ dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā
a śaṅkukarṇeśvaraṃ devam arcayitvā yudhiṣṭhira
c aśvamedhaṃ daśaguṇaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya gaccheta bharatarṣabha
c tīrthaṃ kuruvaraśreṣṭha triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
e dṛmīti nāmnā vikhyātaṃ sarvapāpapramocanam
a yatra brahmādayo devā upāsante maheśvaram
c tatra snātvārcayitvā ca rudraṃ devagaṇair vṛtam
e janmaprabhṛti pāpāni kṛtāni nudate naraḥ
a dṛmī cātra naraśreṣṭha sarvadevair abhiṣṭutā
c tatra snātvā naravyāghra hayamedham avāpnuyāt
a jitvā yatra mahāprājña viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
c purā śaucaṃ kṛtaṃ rājan hatvā daivatakaṇṭakān
a tato gaccheta dharmajña vasor dhārām abhiṣṭutām
c gamanād eva tasyāṃ hi hayamedham avāpnuyāt
a snātvā kuruvaraśreṣṭha prayatātmā tu mānavaḥ
c tarpya devān pitṝṃś caiva viṣṇuloke mahīyate
a tīrthaṃ cātra paraṃ puṇyaṃ vasūnāṃ bharatarṣabha
c tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca vasūnāṃ saṃmato bhavet
a sindhūttamam iti khyātaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanam
c tatra snātvā naraśreṣṭha labhed bahu suvarṇakam
a brahmatuṅgaṃ samāsādya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ
c brahmalokam avāpnoti sukṛtī virajā naraḥ
a kumārikāṇāṃ śakrasya tīrthaṃ siddhaniṣevitam
c tatra snātvā naraḥ kṣipraṃ śakralokam avāpnuyāt
a reṇukāyāś ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ devaniṣevitam
c tatra snātvā bhaved vipro vimalaś candramā yathā
a atha pañcanadaṃ gatvā niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c pañca yajñān avāpnoti kramaśo ye 'nukīrtitāḥ
a tato gaccheta dharmajña bhīmāyāḥ sthānam uttamam
c tatra snātvā tu yonyāṃ vai naro bharatasattama
a devyāḥ putro bhaved rājaṃs taptakuṇḍalavigrahaḥ
c gavāṃ śatasahasrasya phalaṃ caivāpnuyān mahat
a girimuñjaṃ samāsādya triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
c pitāmahaṃ namaskṛtya gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a tato gaccheta dharmajña vimalaṃ tīrtham uttamam
c adyāpi yatra dṛśyante matsyāḥ sauvarṇarājatāḥ
a tatra snātvā naraśreṣṭha vājapeyam avāpnuyāt
c sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā gacchec ca paramāṃ gatim
d vitastāṃ ca samāsādya saṃtarpya pitṛdevatāḥ
d naraḥ phalam avāpnoti vājapeyasya bhārata
d kāśmīreṣv eva nāgasya bhavanaṃ takṣakasya ca
d vitastākhyam iti khyātaṃ sarvapāpapramocanam
a tato gaccheta maladāṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutām
c paścimāyāṃ tu saṃdhyāyām upaspṛśya yathāvidhi
a caruṃ narendra saptārcer yathāśakti nivedayet
c pitṝṇām akṣayaṃ dānaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
d ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
d guhyakāḥ kiṃnarā yakṣāḥ siddhā vidyādharā narāḥ
d rākṣasā ditijā rudrā brahmā ca manujādhipa
d niyataḥ paramāṃ dīkṣām āsthāyābdasahasrikīm
d viṣṇoḥ prasādanaṃ kurvaṃś caruṃ ca śrapayaṃs tathā
d saptabhiḥ saptabhiś caiva ṛgbhis tuṣṭāva keśavam
d dadāv aṣṭaguṇaiśvaryaṃ teṣāṃ tuṣṭas tu keśavaḥ
d yathābhilaṣitān anyān kāmān dattvā mahīpate
d tatraivāntardadhe devo vidyud abhreṣu vai yathā
d nāmnā saptacaruṃ tena khyātaṃ lokeṣu bhārata
a gavāṃ śatasahasreṇa rājasūyaśatena ca
c aśvamedhasahasreṇa śreyān saptārciṣaś caruḥ
a tato nivṛtto rājendra vastrāpadam athāviśet
c abhigamya mahādevam aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
a maṇimantaṃ samāsādya brahmacārī samāhitaḥ
c ekarātroṣito rājann agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a atha gaccheta rājendra devikāṃ lokaviśrutām
c prasūtir yatra viprāṇāṃ śrūyate bharatarṣabha
a triśūlapāṇeḥ sthānaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
c devikāyāṃ naraḥ snātvā samabhyarcya maheśvaram
a yathāśakti caruṃ tatra nivedya bharatarṣabha
c sarvakāmasamṛddhasya yajñasya labhate phalam
a kāmākhyaṃ tatra rudrasya tīrthaṃ devarṣisevitam
c tatra snātvā naraḥ kṣipraṃ siddhim āpnoti bhārata
a yajanaṃ yājanaṃ gatvā tathaiva brahmavālukām
c puṣpanyāsa upaspṛśya na śocen maraṇaṃ tataḥ
a ardhayojanavistārāṃ pañcayojanam āyatām
c etāvad devikām āhuḥ puṇyāṃ devarṣisevitām
a tato gaccheta dharmajña dīrghasatraṃ yathākramam
c yatra brahmādayo devāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
e dīrghasatram upāsante dakṣiṇābhir yatavratāḥ
a gamanād eva rājendra dīrghasatram ariṃdama
c rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a tato vinaśanaṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c gacchaty antarhitā yatra marupṛṣṭhe sarasvatī
e camase ca śivodbhede nāgodbhede ca dṛśyate
a snātvā ca camasodbhede agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
c śivodbhede naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a nāgodbhede naraḥ snātvā nāgalokam avāpnuyāt
c śaśayānaṃ ca rājendra tīrtham āsādya durlabham
e śaśarūpapraticchannāḥ puṣkarā yatra bhārata
a sarasvatyāṃ mahārāja anu saṃvatsaraṃ hi te
c snāyante bharataśreṣṭha vṛttāṃ vai kārttikīṃ sadā
a tatra snātvā naravyāghra dyotate śaśivat sadā
c gosahasraphalaṃ caiva prāpnuyād bharatarṣabha
a kumārakoṭim āsādya niyataḥ kurunandana
c tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvīta pitṛdevārcane rataḥ
e gavāmayam avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddharet
a tato gaccheta dharmajña rudrakoṭiṃ samāhitaḥ
c purā yatra mahārāja ṛṣikoṭiḥ samāhitā
e praharṣeṇa ca saṃviṣṭā devadarśanakāṅkṣayā
a ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ drakṣyāmi vṛṣabhadhvajam
c evaṃ saṃprasthitā rājann ṛṣayaḥ kila bhārata
a tato yogeṣvareṇāpi yogam āsthāya bhūpate
c teṣāṃ manyupraṇāśārtham ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
a sṛṣṭā koṭis tu rudrāṇām ṛṣīṇām agrataḥ sthitā
c mayā pūrvataraṃ dṛṣṭa iti te menire pṛthak
a teṣāṃ tuṣṭo mahādeva ṛṣīṇām ugratejasām
c bhaktyā paramayā rājan varaṃ teṣāṃ pradiṣṭavān
e adya prabhṛti yuṣmākaṃ dharmavṛddhir bhaviṣyati
a tatra snātvā naravyāghra rudrakoṭyāṃ naraḥ śuciḥ
c aśvamedham avāpnoti kulaṃ caiva samuddharet
a tato gaccheta rājendra saṃgamaṃ lokaviśrutam
c sarasvatyā mahāpuṇyam upāsante janārdanam
a yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ
c abhigacchanti rājendra caitraśuklacaturdaśīm
a tatra snātvā naravyāghra vinded bahu suvarṇakam
c sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati
a ṛṣīṇāṃ yatra satrāṇi samāptāni narādhipa
c satrāvasānam āsādya gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
 pulastya uvāca
a tato gaccheta rājendra kurukṣetram abhiṣṭutam
c pāpebhyo vipramucyante tadgatāḥ sarvajantavaḥ
a kurukṣetraṃ gamiṣyāmi kurukṣetre vasāmy aham
c ya evaṃ satataṃ brūyāt so 'pi pāpaiḥ pramucyate
d pāṃsavo 'pi kurukṣetre vāyunā samudīritāḥ
d api duṣkṛtakarmāṇaṃ nayanti paramāṃ gatim
d dakṣiṇena sarasvatyā dṛṣadvatyuttareṇa ca
d ye vasanti kurukṣetre te vasanti triviṣṭape
a tatra māsaṃ vased vīra sarasvatyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ
a gandharvāpsaraso yakṣāḥ pannagāś ca mahīpate
c brahmakṣetraṃ mahāpuṇyam abhigacchanti bhārata
a manasāpy abhikāmasya kurukṣetraṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c pāpāni vipraṇaśyanti brahmalokaṃ ca gacchati
a gatvā hi śraddhayā yuktaḥ kurukṣetraṃ kurūdvaha
c rājasūyāśvamedhābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a tato macakrukaṃ rājan dvārapālaṃ mahābalam
c yakṣaṃ samabhivādyaiva gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a tato gaccheta dharmajña viṣṇoḥ sthānam anuttamam
c satataṃ nāma rājendra yatra saṃnihito hariḥ
a tatra snātvārcayitvā ca trilokaprabhavaṃ harim
c aśvamedham avāpnoti viṣṇulokaṃ ca gacchati
a tataḥ pāriplavaṃ gacchet tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam
c agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a pṛthivyās tīrtham āsādya gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
c tataḥ śālūkinīṃ gatvā tīrthasevī narādhipa
e daśāśvamedhike snātvā tad eva labhate phalam
a sarpadarvīṃ samāsādya nāgānāṃ tīrtham uttamam
c agniṣṭomam avāpnoti nāgalokaṃ ca vindati
a tato gaccheta dharmajña dvārapālaṃ tarantukam
c tatroṣya rajanīm ekāṃ gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a tataḥ pañcanadaṃ gatvā niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c koṭitīrtham upaspṛśya hayamedhaphalaṃ labhet
e aśvinos tīrtham āsādya rūpavān abhijāyate
a tato gaccheta dharmajña vārāhaṃ tīrtham uttamam
c viṣṇur vārāharūpeṇa pūrvaṃ yatra sthito 'bhavat
e tatra snātvā naravyāghra agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a tato jayantyā rājendra somatīrthaṃ samāviśet
c snātvā phalam avāpnoti rājasūyasya mānavaḥ
a ekahaṃse naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
c kṛtaśaucaṃ samāsādya tīrthasevī kurūdvaha
e puṇḍarīkam avāpnoti kṛtaśauco bhaven naraḥ
a tato muñjavaṭaṃ nāma mahādevasya dhīmataḥ
c tatroṣya rajanīm ekāṃ gāṇapatyam avāpnuyāt
a tatraiva ca mahārāja yakṣī lokapariśrutā
c tāṃ cābhigamya rājendra puṇyāṃl lokān avāpnuyāt
a kurukṣetrasya tad dvāraṃ viśrutaṃ bharatarṣabha
c pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya tīrthasevī samāhitaḥ
a saṃmite puṣkarāṇāṃ ca snātvārcya pitṛdevatāḥ
c jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa āhṛte vai mahātmanā
e kṛtakṛtyo bhaved rājann aśvamedhaṃ ca vindati
a tato rāmahradān gacchet tīrthasevī narādhipa
c yatra rāmeṇa rājendra tarasā dīptatejasā
e kṣatram utsādya vīryeṇa hradāḥ pañca niveśitāḥ
a pūrayitvā naravyāghra rudhireṇeti naḥ śrutam
c pitaras tarpitāḥ sarve tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ
e tatas te pitaraḥ prītā rāmam ūcur mahīpate
a rāma rāma mahābhāga prītāḥ sma tava bhārgava
c anayā pitṛbhaktyā ca vikrameṇa ca te vibho
e varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te kim icchasi mahādyute
a evam uktaḥ sa rājendra rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
c abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ pitṝn sa gagane sthitān
a bhavanto yadi me prītā yady anugrāhyatā mayi
c pitṛprasādād iccheyaṃ tapasāpyāyanaṃ punaḥ
a yac ca roṣābhibhūtena kṣatram utsāditaṃ mayā
c tataś ca pāpān mucyeyaṃ yuṣmākaṃ tejasā hy aham
e hradāś ca tīrthabhūtā me bhaveyur bhuvi viśrutāḥ
a etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmasya pitaras tadā
c pratyūcuḥ paramaprītā rāmaṃ harṣasamanvitāḥ
a tapas te vardhatāṃ bhūyaḥ pitṛbhaktyā viśeṣataḥ
c yac ca roṣābhibhūtena kṣatram utsāditaṃ tvayā
a tataś ca pāpān muktas tvaṃ karmabhis te ca pātitāḥ
c hradāś ca tava tīrthatvaṃ gamiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ
a hradeṣv eteṣu yaḥ snātvā pitṝn saṃtarpayiṣyati
c pitaras tasya vai prītā dāsyanti bhuvi durlabham
e īpsitaṃ manasaḥ kāmaṃ svargalokaṃ ca śāśvatam
a evaṃ dattvā varān rājan rāmasya pitaras tadā
c āmantrya bhārgavaṃ prītās tatraivāntardadhus tadā
a evaṃ rāmahradāḥ puṇyā bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ
c snātvā hradeṣu rāmasya brahmacārī śubhavrataḥ
e rāmam abhyarcya rājendra labhed bahu suvarṇakam
a vaṃśamūlakam āsādya tīrthasevī kurūdvaha
c svavaṃśam uddhared rājan snātvā vai vaṃśamūlake
a kāyaśodhanam āsādya tīrthaṃ bharatasattama
c śarīraśuddhiḥ snātasya tasmiṃs tīrthe na saṃśayaḥ
e śuddhadehaś ca saṃyāti śubhāṃl lokān anuttamān
a tato gaccheta rājendra tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam
c lokā yatroddhṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
a lokoddhāraṃ samāsādya tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam
c snātvā tīrthavare rājaṃl lokān uddharate svakān
e śrītīrthaṃ ca samāsādya vindate śriyam uttamām
e   snātvā niyatamānasaḥ
e arcayitvā pitṝn devān
a kapilātīrtham āsādya brahmacārī samāhitaḥ
c tatra snātvārcayitvā ca daivatāni pitṝṃs tathā
e kapilānāṃ sahasrasya phalaṃ vindati mānavaḥ
a sūryatīrthaṃ samāsādya snātvā niyatamānasaḥ
c arcayitvā pitṝn devān upavāsaparāyaṇaḥ
e agniṣṭomam avāpnoti sūryalokaṃ ca gacchati
a gavāṃbhavanam āsādya tīrthasevī yathākramam
c tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvāṇo gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a śaṅkhinīṃ tatra āsādya tīrthasevī kurūdvaha
c devyās tīrthe naraḥ snātvā labhate rūpam uttamam
a tato gaccheta rājendra dvārapālam arantukam
c tasya tīrthaṃ sarasvatyāṃ yakṣendrasya mahātmanaḥ
e tatra snātvā naro rājann agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a tato gaccheta dharmajña brahmāvartaṃ narādhipa
c brahmāvarte naraḥ snātvā brahmalokam avāpnuyāt
a tato gaccheta dharmajña sutīrthakam anuttamam
c yatra saṃnihitā nityaṃ pitaro daivataiḥ saha
a tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvīta pitṛdevārcane rataḥ
c aśvamedham avāpnoti pitṛlokaṃ ca gacchati
a tato 'mbuvaśyaṃ dharmajña samāsādya yathākramam
c kośeśvarasya tīrtheṣu snātvā bharatasattama
e sarvavyādhivinirmukto brahmaloke mahīyate
a mātṛtīrthaṃ ca tatraiva yatra snātasya bhārata
c prajā vivardhate rājann anantāṃ cāśnute śriyam
a tataḥ śītavanaṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c tīrthaṃ tatra mahārāja mahad anyatra durlabham
a punāti darśanād eva daṇḍenaikaṃ narādhipa
c keśān abhyukṣya vai tasmin pūto bhavati bhārata
a tīrthaṃ tatra mahārāja śvānalomāpahaṃ smṛtam
c yatra viprā naravyāghra vidvāṃsas tīrthatatparāḥ
d gatiṃ gacchanti paramāṃ snātvā bharatasattama
a śvānalomāpanayane tīrthe bharatasattama
c prāṇāyāmair nirharanti śvalomāni dvijottamāḥ
a pūtātmānaś ca rājendra prayānti paramāṃ gatim
c daśāśvamedhikaṃ caiva tasmiṃs tīrthe mahīpate
e tatra snātvā naravyāghra gaccheta paramāṃ gatim
a tato gaccheta rājendra mānuṣaṃ lokaviśrutam
c yatra kṛṣṇamṛgā rājan vyādhena paripīḍitāḥ
e avagāhya tasmin sarasi mānuṣatvam upāgatāḥ
a tasmiṃs tīrthe naraḥ snātvā brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
c sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā svargaloke mahīyate
a mānuṣasya tu pūrveṇa krośamātre mahīpate
c āpagā nāma vikhyātā nadī siddhaniṣevitā
a śyāmākabhojanaṃ tatra yaḥ prayacchati mānavaḥ
c devān pitṝṃś ca uddiśya tasya dharmaphalaṃ mahat
e ekasmin bhojite vipre koṭir bhavati bhojitā
a tatra snātvārcayitvā ca daivatāni pitṝṃs tathā
c uṣitvā rajanīm ekām agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a tato gaccheta rājendra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam uttamam
c brahmodumbaram ity eva prakāśaṃ bhuvi bhārata
a tatra saptarṣikuṇḍeṣu snātasya kurupuṃgava
c kedāre caiva rājendra kapiṣṭhalamahātmanaḥ
a brahmāṇam abhigamyātha śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ
c sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā brahmalokaṃ prapadyate
a kapiṣṭhalasya kedāraṃ samāsādya sudurlabham
c antardhānam avāpnoti tapasā dagdhakilbiṣaḥ
a tato gaccheta rājendra sarakaṃ lokaviśrutam
c kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśyām abhigamya vṛṣadhvajam
e labhate sarvakāmān hi svargalokaṃ ca gacchati
a tisraḥ koṭyas tu tīrthānāṃ sarake kurunandana
c rudrakoṭis tathā kūpe hradeṣu ca mahīpate
e ilāspadaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ bharatasattama
a tatra snātvārcayitvā ca pitṝn devāṃś ca bhārata
c na durgatim avāpnoti vājapeyaṃ ca vindati
a kiṃdāne ca naraḥ snātvā kiṃjapye ca mahīpate
c aprameyam avāpnoti dānaṃ japyaṃ ca bhārata
a kalaśyāṃ cāpy upaspṛśya śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ
c agniṣṭomasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a sarakasya tu pūrveṇa nāradasya mahātmanaḥ
c tīrthaṃ kuruvaraśreṣṭha anājanmeti viśrutam
a tatra tīrthe naraḥ snātvā prāṇāṃś cotsṛjya bhārata
c nāradenābhyanujñāto lokān prāpnoti durlabhān
a śuklapakṣe daśamyāṃ tu puṇḍarīkaṃ samāviśet
c tatra snātvā naro rājan puṇḍarīkaphalaṃ labhet
a tatas triviṣṭapaṃ gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
c tatra vaitaraṇī puṇyā nadī pāpapramocanī
a tatra snātvārcayitvā ca śūlapāṇiṃ vṛṣadhvajam
c sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā gaccheta paramāṃ gatim
a tato gaccheta rājendra phalakīvanam uttamam
c yatra devāḥ sadā rājan phalakīvanam āśritāḥ
e tapaś caranti vipulaṃ bahuvarṣasahasrakam
f tatra snātvā naro rājan sarvayajñaphalaṃ labhet
a dṛṣadvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā tarpayitvā ca devatāḥ
c agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ phalaṃ vindati bhārata
a tīrthe ca sarvadevānāṃ snātvā bharatasattama
c gosahasrasya rājendra phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a pāṇikhāte naraḥ snātvā tarpayitvā ca devatāḥ
c rājasūyam avāpnoti ṛṣilokaṃ ca gacchati
a tato gaccheta rājendra miśrakaṃ tīrtham uttamam
c tatra tīrthāni rājendra miśritāni mahātmanā
a vyāsena nṛpaśārdūla dvijārtham iti naḥ śrutam
c sarvatīrtheṣu sa snāti miśrake snāti yo naraḥ
d sa vai snātvārcayitvā ca miśrake pitṛdevatāḥ
a tato vyāsavanaṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c manojave naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a gatvā madhuvaṭīṃ cāpi devyās tīrthaṃ naraḥ śuciḥ
c tatra snātvārcayed devān pitṝṃś ca prayataḥ śuciḥ
e sa devyā samanujñāto gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a kauśikyāḥ saṃgame yas tu dṛṣadvatyāś ca bhārata
c snāti vai niyatāhāraḥ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a tato vyāsasthalī nāma yatra vyāsena dhīmatā
c putraśokābhitaptena dehatyāgārthaniścayaḥ
a kṛto devaiś ca rājendra punar utthāpitas tadā
c abhigamya sthalīṃ tasya gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a kiṃdattaṃ kūpam āsādya tilaprasthaṃ pradāya ca
c gaccheta paramāṃ siddhim ṛṇair muktaḥ kurūdvaha
d vedītīrthe naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a ahaś ca sudinaṃ caiva dve tīrthe ca sudurlabhe
c tayoḥ snātvā naravyāghra sūryalokam avāpnuyāt
a mṛgadhūmaṃ tato gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
c tatra gaṅgāhrade snātvā samabhyarcya ca mānavaḥ
e śūlapāṇiṃ mahādevam aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
a devatīrthe naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
c atha vāmanakaṃ gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
a tatra viṣṇupade snātvā arcayitvā ca vāmanam
c sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā viṣṇulokam avāpnuyāt
a kulaṃpune naraḥ snātvā punāti svakulaṃ naraḥ
c pavanasya hradaṃ gatvā marutāṃ tīrtham uttamam
e tatra snātvā naravyāghra vāyuloke mahīyate
a amarāṇāṃ hrade snātvā amareṣu narādhipa
c amarāṇāṃ prabhāvena svargaloke mahīyate
d amaraiḥ saha saṃyāti vimānavaram āsthitaḥ
a śālihotrasya rājendra śāliśūrpe yathāvidhi
c snātvā naravaraśreṣṭha gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a śrīkuñjaṃ ca sarasvatyāṃ tīrthaṃ bharatasattama
c tatra snātvā naro rājann agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a tato naimiṣakuñjaṃ ca samāsādya kurūdvaha
c ṛṣayaḥ kila rājendra naimiṣeyās tapodhanāḥ
e tīrthayātrāṃ puraskṛtya kurukṣetraṃ gatāḥ purā
f tatra tīrthe naraḥ snātvā vājimedhaphalaṃ labhet
a tataḥ kuñjaḥ sarasvatyāṃ kṛto bharatasattama
c ṛṣīṇām avakāśaḥ syād yathā tuṣṭikaro mahān
a tasmin kuñje naraḥ snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
b tato gaccheta dharmajña kanyātīrtham anuttamam
c kanyātīrthe naraḥ snātvā agniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet
a tato gacchen naravyāghra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam uttamam
c tatra varṇāvaraḥ snātvā brāhmaṇyaṃ labhate naraḥ
e brāhmaṇaś ca viśuddhātmā gaccheta paramāṃ gatim
a tato gacchen naraśreṣṭha somatīrtham anuttamam
c tatra snātvā naro rājan somalokam avāpnuyāt
a saptasārasvataṃ tīrthaṃ tato gacchen narādhipa
c yatra maṅkaṇakaḥ siddho maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
a purā maṅkaṇako rājan kuśāgreṇeti naḥ śrutam
c kṣataḥ kila kare rājaṃs tasya śākaraso 'sravat
a sa vai śākarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣāviṣṭo mahātapāḥ
c pranṛttaḥ kila viprarṣir vismayotphullalocanaḥ
a tatas tasmin pranṛtte vai sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat
c pranṛttam ubhayaṃ vīra tejasā tasya mohitam
a brahmādibhiḥ surai rājann ṛṣibhiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
c vijñapto vai mahādeva ṛṣer arthe narādhipa
e nāyaṃ nṛtyed yathā deva tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi
a tataḥ pranṛttam āsādya harṣāviṣṭena cetasā
c surāṇāṃ hitakāmārtham ṛṣiṃ devo 'bhyabhāṣata
a aho maharṣe dharmajña kimarthaṃ nṛtyate bhavān
c harṣasthānaṃ kimarthaṃ vā tavādya munipuṃgava
 ṛṣir uvāca
 tapasvino dharmapathe sthitasya dvijasattama
a kiṃ na paśyasi me deva karāc chākarasaṃ srutam
c yaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ pranṛtto vai harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ
 pulastya uvāca
a taṃ prahasyābravīd devo muniṃ rāgeṇa mohitam
c ahaṃ vai vismayaṃ vipra na gacchāmīti paśya mām
a evam uktvā naraśreṣṭha mahādevena dhīmatā
c aṅgulyagreṇa rājendra svāṅguṣṭhas tāḍito 'nagha
a tato bhasma kṣatād rājan nirgataṃ himasaṃnibham
c tad dṛṣṭvā vrīḍito rājan sa muniḥ pādayor gataḥ
a nānyaṃ devam ahaṃ manye rudrāt parataraṃ mahat
c surāsurasya jagato gatis tvam asi śūladhṛk

a siddhacāraṇagandharvā mānuṣāḥ pannagās tathā
c saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailā upāsanta umāpatim
a tatreśānaṃ samabhyarcya trirātropoṣito naraḥ
c daśāśvamedham āpnoti gāṇapatyaṃ ca vindati
e uṣya dvādaśarātraṃ tu kṛtātmā bhavate naraḥ
a tata eva tu gāyatryāḥ sthānaṃ trailokyaviśrutam
c trirātram uṣitas tatra gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a nidarśanaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ narādhipa
c gāyatrīṃ paṭhate yas tu yonisaṃkarajas tathā
e gāthā vā gītikā vāpi tasya saṃpadyate nṛpa
f abrāhmaṇasya sāvitrīṃ paṭhatas tu praṇaśyati
a saṃvartasya tu viprarṣer vāpīm āsādya durlabhām
c rūpasya bhāgī bhavati subhagaś caiva jāyate
a tato veṇṇāṃ samāsādya tarpayet pitṛdevatāḥ
c mayūrahaṃsasaṃyuktaṃ vimānaṃ labhate naraḥ
a tato godāvarīṃ prāpya nityaṃ siddhaniṣevitām
c gavāmayam avāpnoti vāsuker lokam āpnuyāt
a veṇṇāyāḥ saṃgame snātvā vājapeyaphalaṃ labhet
b bāhudāsaṃgame snātvā vājimedhaphalaṃ labhet
c varadāsaṃgame snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a brahmasthānaṃ samāsādya trirātram uṣito naraḥ
c gosahasraphalaṃ vindet svargalokaṃ ca gacchati
a kuśaplavanam āsādya brahmacārī samāhitaḥ
c trirātram uṣitaḥ snātvā aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet
a tato devahrade ramye kṛṣṇaveṇṇājalodbhave
c jātimātrahrade caiva tathā kanyāśrame nṛpa
a yatra kratuśatair iṣṭvā devarājo divaṃ gataḥ
c agniṣṭomaśataṃ vinded gamanād eva bhārata
a sarvadevahrade snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
c jātimātrahrade snātvā bhavej jātismaro naraḥ
a tato 'vāpya mahāpuṇyāṃ payoṣṇīṃ saritāṃ varām
c pitṛdevārcanarato gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a daṇḍakāraṇyam āsādya mahārāja upaspṛśet
c gosahasraphalaṃ tatra snātamātrasya bhārata
a śarabhaṅgāśramaṃ gatvā śukasya ca mahātmanaḥ
c na durgatim avāpnoti punāti ca kulaṃ naraḥ
a tataḥ śūrpārakaṃ gacchej jāmadagnyaniṣevitam
c rāmatīrthe naraḥ snātvā vindyād bahu suvarṇakam
a saptagodāvare snātvā niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c mahat puṇyam avāpnoti devalokaṃ ca gacchati
a tato devapathaṃ gacchen niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c devasatrasya yat puṇyaṃ tad avāpnoti mānavaḥ
a tuṅgakāraṇyam āsādya brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
c vedān adhyāpayat tatra ṛṣiḥ sārasvataḥ purā
a tatra vedān pranaṣṭāṃs tu muner aṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ
c upaviṣṭo maharṣīṇām uttarīyeṣu bhārata
a oṃkāreṇa yathānyāyaṃ samyag uccāritena ca
c yena yat pūrvam abhyastaṃ tat tasya samupasthitam
a ṛṣayas tatra devāś ca varuṇo 'gniḥ prajāpatiḥ
c harir nārāyaṇo devo mahādevas tathaiva ca
a pitāmahaś ca bhagavān devaiḥ saha mahādyutiḥ
c bhṛguṃ niyojayām āsa yājanārthe mahādyutim
a tataḥ sa cakre bhagavān ṛṣīṇāṃ vidhivat tadā
c sarveṣāṃ punar ādhānaṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
a ājyabhāgena vai tatra tarpitās tu yathāvidhi
c devās tribhuvaṇaṃ yātā ṛṣayaś ca yathāsukham
a tad araṇyaṃ praviṣṭasya tuṅgakaṃ rājasattama
c pāpaṃ praṇaśyate sarvaṃ striyo vā puruṣasya vā
a tatra māsaṃ vased dhīro niyato niyatāśanaḥ
c brahmalokaṃ vrajed rājan punīte ca kulaṃ naraḥ
a medhāvikaṃ samāsādya pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayet
a   nadīṃ pāpapramocanīm
a tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvīta
a   brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
a brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu
c agniṣṭomam avāpnoti smṛtiṃ medhāṃ ca vindati
a tataḥ kālaṃjaraṃ gatvā parvataṃ lokaviśrutam
c tatra devahrade snātvā gosahasraphalaṃ labhet
a ātmānaṃ sādhayet tatra girau kālaṃjare nṛpa
c svargaloke mahīyeta naro nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
a tato girivaraśreṣṭhe citrakūṭe viśāṃ pate
c mandākinīṃ samāsādya nadīṃ pāpapramocanīm
a tatrābhiṣekaṃ kurvāṇaḥ pitṛdevārcane rataḥ
c aśvamedham avāpnoti gatiṃ ca paramāṃ vrajet
a tato gaccheta rājendra bhartṛsthānam anuttamam
c yatra devo mahāseno nityaṃ saṃnihito nṛpaḥ
a pumāṃs tatra naraśreṣṭha gamanād eva sidhyati

d tato gaccheta rājendra tīrthayātrāparo nṛpa
d gosahasram avāpnoti phalaṃ caiva supuṣkalam
a pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya jyeṣṭhasthānaṃ vrajen naraḥ
c abhigamya mahādevaṃ virājati yathā śaśī
a tatra kūpo mahārāja viśruto bharatarṣabha
c samudrās tatra catvāro nivasanti yudhiṣṭhira
a tatropaspṛśya rājendra kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
c niyatātmā naraḥ pūto gaccheta paramāṃ gatim
a tato gacchet kuruśreṣṭha śṛṅgaverapuraṃ mahat
c yatra tīrṇo mahārāja rāmo dāśarathiḥ purā
d tasmiṃs tīrthe mahābāho snātvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate
a gaṅgāyāṃ tu naraḥ snātvā brahmacārī samāhitaḥ
c vidhūtapāpmā bhavati vājapeyaṃ ca vindati
d tato muñjavaṭaṃ gacchet sthānaṃ devasya dhīmataḥ
a abhigamya mahādevam abhyarcya ca narādhipa
c pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya gāṇapatyam avāpnuyāt
d tasmiṃs tīrthe tu jāhnavyāṃ snātvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate
a tato gaccheta rājendra prayāgam ṛṣisaṃstutam
c yatra brahmādayo devā diśaś ca sadigīśvarāḥ
a lokapālāś ca sādhyāś ca nairṛtāḥ pitaras tathā
c sanatkumārapramukhās tathaiva paramarṣayaḥ
a aṅgiraḥpramukhāś caiva tathā brahmarṣayo 'pare
c tathā nāgāḥ suparṇāś ca siddhāś cakracarās tathā
a saritaḥ sāgarāś caiva gandharvāpsarasas tathā
c hariś ca bhagavān āste prajāpatipuraskṛtaḥ
a tatra trīṇy agnikuṇḍāni yeṣāṃ madhye ca jāhnavī
c prayāgād abhiniṣkrāntā sarvatīrthapuraskṛtā
a tapanasya sutā tatra triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
c yamunā gaṅgayā sārdhaṃ saṃgatā lokapāvanī
a gaṅgāyamunayor madhyaṃ pṛthivyā jaghanaṃ smṛtam
c prayāgaṃ jaghanasyāntam upastham ṛṣayo viduḥ
a prayāgaṃ sapratiṣṭhānaṃ kambalāśvatarau tathā
c tīrthaṃ bhogavatī caiva vedī proktā prajāpateḥ
a tatra vedāś ca yajñāś ca mūrtimanto yudhiṣṭhira
c prajāpatim upāsante ṛṣayaś ca mahāvratāḥ
e yajante kratubhir devās tathā cakracarā nṛpa
a tataḥ puṇyatamaṃ nāsti triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
c prayāgaḥ sarvatīrthebhyaḥ prabhavaty adhikaṃ vibho
a śravaṇāt tasya tīrthasya nāmasaṃkīrtanād api
c mṛttikālambhanād vāpi naraḥ pāpāt pramucyate
a tatrābhiṣekaṃ yaḥ kuryāt saṃgame saṃśitavrataḥ
c puṇyaṃ sa phalam āpnoti rājasūyāśvamedhayoḥ
a eṣā yajanabhūmir hi devānām api satkṛtā
c tatra dattaṃ sūkṣmam api mahad bhavati bhārata
a na vedavacanāt tāta na lokavacanād api
c matir utkramaṇīyā te prayāgamaraṇaṃ prati

c tatrābhiṣekaṃ yaḥ kuryāt so 'śvamedham avāpnuyāt
a tatra haṃsaprapatanaṃ tīrthaṃ trailokyaviśrutam
c daśāśvamedhikaṃ caiva gaṅgāyāṃ kurunandana
d viśeṣo vai kanakhale prayāge paramaṃ mahat
d yady akāryaśataṃ kṛtvā kṛtaṃ gaṅgāvasecanam
d sarvaṃ tat tasya gaṅgāpo dahaty agnir ivendhanam
d sarvaṃ kṛtayuge puṇyaṃ tretāyāṃ puṣkaraṃ smṛtam
d dvāpare 'pi kurukṣetraṃ gaṅgā kaliyuge smṛtā
d puṣkare tu tapas tapyed dānaṃ dadyān mahālaye
d malaye tv agnim ārohed bhṛgutuṅge tv anāśanam

d snātvā tārayate jantuḥ sapta saptāvarāṃs tathā
d punāti kīrtitā pāpaṃ dṛṣṭā bhadraṃ prayacchati

d brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti evam āha pitāmahaḥ
d kurukṣetrasamā gaṅgā yatratatrāvagāhitā
a yatra gaṅgā mahārāja sa deśas tat tapovanam
c siddhakṣetraṃ tu taj jñeyaṃ gaṅgātīrasamāśritam
a idaṃ satyaṃ dvijātīnāṃ sādhūnām ātmajasya ca
c suhṛdāṃ ca japet karṇe śiṣyasyānugatasya ca
a idaṃ dharmyam idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ sukham
c idaṃ svargyam idaṃ ramyam idaṃ pāvanam uttamam
a maharṣīṇām idaṃ guhyaṃ sarvapāpapramocanam
c adhītya dvijamadhye ca nirmalatvam avāpnuyāt
d śrīmat svargyaṃ tathā puṇyaṃ sapatnaśamanaṃ śivam

d aputro labhate putram adhano dhanam āpnuyāt

d śūdro yathepsitān kāmān brāhmaṇaḥ pāragaḥ paṭhan
a yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ tīrthapuṇyaṃ sadā śuciḥ
c jātīḥ sa smarate bahvīr nākapṛṣṭhe ca modate
a gamyāny api ca tīrthāni kīrtitāny agamāni ca
c manasā tāni gaccheta sarvatīrthasamīkṣayā
a etāni vasubhiḥ sādhyair ādityair marudaśvibhiḥ

a evaṃ tvam api kauravya vidhinānena suvrata
c vraja tīrthāni niyataḥ puṇyaṃ puṇyena vardhate

d sadbhiḥ śāstrārthatattvajñair brāhmaṇaiḥ saha gamyatām

b bhīṣmaḥ kurūṇāṃ pravaro yathā pūrvam avāptavān

a dadhīca iva devendraṃ yathā cāpy aṅgirā ravim
c tathā rakṣasva kaunteyaṃ rākṣasebhyo dvijottama
a yātudhānā hi bahavo rākṣasāḥ parvatopamāḥ
c tvayābhiguptān kaunteyān nātivarteyur antikāt
a so 'ham indrasya vacanān niyogād arjunasya ca
b āgatas tvāṃ mahābāho kuru puṇyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c rakṣamāṇo bhayebhyas tvāṃ cariṣyāmi tvayā saha
a dvis tīrthāni mayā pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭāni kurunandana
c idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ drakṣyāmi tāny eva bhavatā saha
a iyaṃ rājarṣibhir yātā puṇyakṛdbhir yudhiṣṭhira
c manvādibhir mahārāja tīrthayātrā bhayāpahā
a nānṛjur nākṛtātmā ca nāvaidyo na ca pāpakṛt
c snāti tīrtheṣu kauravya na ca vakramatir naraḥ
a tvaṃ tu dharmamatir nityaṃ dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
c vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo bhūya eva bhaviṣyasi
a yathā bhagīratho rājā rājānaś ca gayādayaḥ
c yathā yayātiḥ kaunteya tathā tvam api pāṇḍava
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a na harṣāt saṃprapaśyāmi vākyasyāsyottaraṃ kva cit
c smared dhi devarājo yaṃ kiṃ nāmābhyadhikaṃ tataḥ
a bhavatā saṃgamo yasya bhrātā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
c vāsavaḥ smarate yasya ko nāmābhyadhikas tataḥ
a yac ca māṃ bhagavān āha tīrthānāṃ darśanaṃ prati
c dhaumyasya vacanād eṣā buddhiḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtaiva me
a tad yadā manyase brahman gamanaṃ tīrthadarśane
c tadaiva gantāsmi dṛḍham eṣa me niścayaḥ paraḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a gamane kṛtabuddhiṃ taṃ pāṇḍavaṃ lomaśo 'bravīt
c laghur bhava mahārāja laghuḥ svairaṃ gamiṣyasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bikṣābhujo nivartantāṃ brāhmaṇā yatayaś ca ye
b kṣuttṛṣṇādhvaśramāyāsaśītārtim asahiṣṇavaḥ
b te sarve vinivartantāṃ ye ca miṣṭabhujo dvijāḥ
b pakvānnalehyapānānāṃ māṃsānāṃ ca vikalpakāḥ
b te 'pi sarve nivartantāṃ ye ca sūdānuyāyinaḥ
b mayā yathocitā jīvyaiḥ saṃvibhaktāś ca vṛttibhiḥ
c ye cāpy anugatāḥ paurā rājabhaktipuraskṛtāḥ
a dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ mahārājam abhigacchantu caiva te
c sa dāsyati yathākālam ucitā yasya yā bhṛtiḥ
a sa ced yathocitāṃ vṛttiṃ na dadyān manujeśvaraḥ
c asmatpriyahitārthāya pāñcālyo vaḥ pradāsyati
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato bhūyiṣṭhaśaḥ paurā gurubhārasamāhitāḥ
c viprāś ca yatayo yuktā jagmur nāgapuraṃ prati
a tān sarvān dharmarājasya premṇā rājāmbikāsutaḥ
c pratijagrāha vidhivad dhanaiś ca samatarpayat
a tataḥ kuntīsuto rājā laghubhir brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
c lomaśena ca suprītas trirātraṃ kāmyake 'vasat
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ prayāntaṃ kaunteyaṃ brāhmaṇā vanavāsinaḥ
c abhigamya tadā rājann idaṃ vacanam abruvan
a rājaṃs tīrthāni gantāsi puṇyāni bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
c devarṣiṇā ca sahito lomaśena mahātmanā
a asmān api mahārāja netum arhasi pāṇḍava
c asmābhir hi na śakyāni tvad ṛte tāni kaurava
a śvāpadair upasṛṣṭāni durgāṇi viṣamāṇi ca
c agamyāni narair alpais tīrthāni manujeśvara
a bhavanto bhrātaraḥ śūrā dhanurdharavarāḥ sadā
c bhavadbhiḥ pālitāḥ śūrair gacchema vayam apy uta
a bhavatprasādād dhi vayaṃ prāpnuyāma phalaṃ śubham
c tīrthānāṃ pṛthivīpāla vratānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
a tava vīryaparitrātāḥ śuddhās tīrthapariplutāḥ
c bhavema dhūtapāpmānas tīrthasaṃdarśanān nṛpa
a bhavān api narendrasya kārtavīryasya bhārata
c aṣṭakasya ca rājarṣer lomapādasya caiva ha
a bharatasya ca vīrasya sārvabhaumasya pārthiva
c dhruvaṃ prāpsyasi duṣprāpāṃl lokāṃs tīrthapariplutaḥ
a prabhāsādīni tīrthāni mahendrādīṃś ca parvatān
c gaṅgādyāḥ saritaś caiva plakṣādīṃś ca vanaspatīn
e tvayā saha mahīpāla draṣṭum icchāmahe vayam
f bhavadbhiḥ pālitāḥ śūrais tīrthāny āyatanāni ca
a yadi te brāhmaṇeṣv asti kā cit prītir janādhipa
c kuru kṣipraṃ vaco 'smākaṃ tataḥ śreyo 'bhipatsyase
a tīrthāni hi mahābāho tapovighnakaraiḥ sadā
c anukīrṇāni rakṣobhis tebhyo nas trātum arhasi
a tīrthāny uktāni dhaumyena nāradena ca dhīmatā
b nāradasya ca rājendra devarṣeḥ parvatasya ca
c yāny uvāca ca devarṣir lomaśaḥ sumahātapāḥ
a vidhivat tāni sarvāṇi paryaṭasva narādhipa
b ṛṣikulyāś ca kārtsnyena loḍayasva yudhiṣṭhira
c dhūtapāpmā sahāsmābhir lomaśena ca pālitaḥ
a sa tathā pūjyamānas tair harṣād aśrupariplutaḥ
c bhīmasenādibhir vīrair bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
e bāḍham ity abravīt sarvāṃs tān ṛṣīn pāṇḍavarṣabhaḥ
a lomaśaṃ samanujñāpya dhaumyaṃ caiva purohitam
c tataḥ sa pāṇḍavaśreṣṭho bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vaśī
e draupadyā cānavadyāṅgyā gamanāya mano dadhe
a atha vyāso mahābhāgas tathā nāradaparvatau
c kāmyake pāṇḍavaṃ draṣṭuṃ samājagmur manīṣiṇaḥ
a teṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā pūjāṃ cakre yathāvidhi
c satkṛtās te mahābhāgā yudhiṣṭhiram athābruvan
a yudhiṣṭhira yamau bhīma manasā kurutārjavam
c manasā kṛtaśaucā vai śuddhās tīrthāni gacchata
a śarīraniyamaṃ hy āhur brāhmaṇā mānuṣaṃ vratam
c manoviśuddhāṃ buddhiṃ ca daivam āhur vrataṃ dvijāḥ
a mano hy aduṣṭaṃ śūrāṇāṃ paryāptaṃ vai narādhipa
c maitrīṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya śuddhās tīrthāni gacchata
a te yūyaṃ mānasaiḥ śuddhāḥ śarīraniyamavrataiḥ
c daivaṃ vrataṃ samāsthāya yathoktaṃ phalam āpsyatha
a te tatheti pratijñāya kṛṣṇayā saha pāṇḍavāḥ
c kṛtasvastyayanāḥ sarve munibhir divyamānuṣaiḥ
a lomaśasyopasaṃgṛhya pādau dvaipāyanasya ca
c nāradasya ca rājendra devarṣeḥ parvatasya ca
a dhaumyena sahitā vīrās tathānyair vanavāsibhiḥ
c mārgaśīrṣyām atītāyāṃ puṣyeṇa prayayus tataḥ
a kaṭhināni samādāya cīrājinajaṭādharāḥ
c abhedyaiḥ kavacair yuktās tīrthāny anvacaraṃs tadā
a indrasenādibhir bhṛtyai rathaiḥ paricaturdaśaiḥ
c mahānasavyāpṛtaiś ca tathānyaiḥ paricārakaiḥ
a sāyudhā baddhaniṣṭriṃśās tūṇavantaḥ samārgaṇāḥ
c prāṅmukhāḥ prayayur vīrāḥ pāṇḍavā janamejaya
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a na vai nirguṇam ātmānaṃ manye devarṣisattama
c tathāsmi duḥkhasaṃtapto yathā nānyo mahīpatiḥ
a parāṃś ca nirguṇān manye na ca dharmaratān api
c te ca lomaśa loke 'sminn ṛdhyante kena ketunā
 lomaśa uvāca
a nātra duḥkhaṃ tvayā rājan kāryaṃ pārtha kathaṃ cana
c yad adharmeṇa vardherann adharmarucayo janāḥ
a vardhaty adharmeṇa naras tato bhadrāṇi paśyati
c tataḥ sapatnāñ jayati samūlas tu vinaśyati
d yatra dharmeṇa vardhante rājāno rājasattama
d sarvān sapatnān bādhante rājyaṃ caiṣāṃ vivardhate
a mayā hi dṛṣṭā daiteyā dānavāś ca mahīpate
c vardhamānā hy adharmeṇa kṣayaṃ copagatāḥ punaḥ
a purā devayuge caiva dṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ mayā vibho
c arocayan surā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ tatyajire 'surāḥ
a tīrthāni devā viviśur nāviśan bhāratāsurāḥ
c tān adharmakṛto darpaḥ pūrvam eva samāviśat
a darpān mānaḥ samabhavan mānāt krodho vyajāyata
c krodhād ahrīs tato 'lajjā vṛttaṃ teṣāṃ tato 'naśat
a tān alajjān gatahrīkān hīnavṛttān vṛthāvratān
c kṣamā lakṣmīś ca dharmaś ca nacirāt prajahus tataḥ
e lakṣmīs tu devān agamad alakṣmīr asurān nṛpa
a tān alakṣmīsamāviṣṭān darpopahatacetasaḥ
c daiteyān dānavāṃś caiva kalir apy āviśat tataḥ
a tān alakṣmīsamāviṣṭān dānavān kalinā tathā
c darpābhibhūtān kaunteya kriyāhīnān acetasaḥ
a mānābhibhūtān acirād vināśaḥ pratyapadyata
c niryaśasyās tato daityāḥ kṛtsnaśo vilayaṃ gatāḥ
d adharmarucayo rājann alakṣmyā samadhiṣṭhitāḥ
a devās tu sāgarāṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
c abhyagacchan dharmaśīlāḥ puṇyāny āyatanāni ca
a tapobhiḥ kratubhir dānair āśīrvādaiś ca pāṇḍava
c prajahuḥ sarvapāpāni śreyaś ca pratipedire
a evaṃ hi dānavantaś ca kriyāvantaś ca sarvaśaḥ
c tīrthāny agacchan vibudhās tenāpur bhūtim uttamām
a tathā tvam api rājendra snātvā tīrtheṣu sānujaḥ
c punar vetsyasi tāṃ lakṣmīm eṣa panthāḥ sanātanaḥ
a yathaiva hi nṛgo rājā śibir auśīnaro yathā
c bhagīratho vasumanā gayaḥ pūruḥ purūravāḥ
a caramāṇās tapo nityaṃ sparśanād ambhasaś ca te
c tīrthābhigamanāt pūtā darśanāc ca mahātmanām
a alabhanta yaśaḥ puṇyaṃ dhanāni ca viśāṃ pate
c tathā tvam api rājendra labdhāsi vipulāṃ śriyam
a yathā cekṣvākur acarat saputrajanabāndhavaḥ
c mucukundo 'tha māndhātā maruttaś ca mahīpatiḥ
a kīrtiṃ puṇyām avindanta yathā devās tapobalāt
c devarṣayaś ca kārtsnyena tathā tvam api vetsyase
a dhārtarāṣṭrās tu darpeṇa mohena ca vaśīkṛtāḥ
c nacirād vinaśiṣyanti daityā iva na saṃśayaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a te tathā sahitā vīrā vasantas tatra tatra ha
c krameṇa pṛthivīpāla naimiṣāraṇyam āgatāḥ
a tatas tīrtheṣu puṇyeṣu gomatyāḥ pāṇḍavā nṛpa
c kṛtābhiṣekāḥ pradadur gāś ca vittaṃ ca bhārata
a tatra devān pitṝn viprāṃs tarpayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
c kanyātīrthe 'śvatīrthe ca gavāṃ tīrthe ca kauravāḥ
a vālakoṭyāṃ vṛṣaprasthe girāv uṣya ca pāṇḍavāḥ
c bāhudāyāṃ mahīpāla cakruḥ sarve 'bhiṣecanam
a prayāge devayajane devānāṃ pṛthivīpate
c ūṣur āplutya gātrāṇi tapaś cātasthur uttamam
a gaṅgāyamunayoś caiva saṃgame satyasaṃgarāḥ
c vipāpmāno mahātmāno viprebhyaḥ pradadur vasu
a tapasvijanajuṣṭāṃ ca tato vedīṃ prajāpateḥ
c jagmuḥ pāṇḍusutā rājan brāhmaṇaiḥ saha bhārata
a tatra te nyavasan vīrās tapaś cātasthur uttamam
c saṃtarpayantaḥ satataṃ vanyena haviṣā dvijān
a tato mahīdharaṃ jagmur dharmajñenābhisatkṛtam
c rājarṣiṇā puṇyakṛtā gayenānupamadyute
a saro gayaśiro yatra puṇyā caiva mahānadī
b vānīramālinī ramyā nadī pulinaśobhitā
b divyaṃ pavitrakūṭaṃ ca pavitradharaṇīdharam
c ṛṣijuṣṭaṃ supuṇyaṃ tat tīrthaṃ brahmasarottamam
a agastyo bhagavān yatra gato vaivasvataṃ prati
c uvāsa ca svayaṃ yatra dharmo rājan sanātanaḥ
a sarvāsāṃ saritāṃ caiva samudbhedo viśāṃ pate
c yatra saṃnihito nityaṃ mahādevaḥ pinākadhṛk
a tatra te pāṇḍavā vīrāś cāturmāsyais tadejire
c ṛṣiyajñena mahatā yatrākṣayavaṭo mahān
d akṣaye devayajane akṣayaṃ yatra vai phalam
d te tu tatropavāsāṃs tu cakrur niścitamānasāḥ
a brāhmaṇās tatra śataśaḥ samājagmus tapodhanāḥ
c cāturmāsyenāyajanta ārṣeṇa vidhinā tadā
a tatra vidyātaponityā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
c kathāḥ pracakrire puṇyāḥ sadasisthā mahātmanām
a tatra vidyāvratasnātaḥ kaumāraṃ vratam āsthitaḥ
c śamaṭho 'kathayad rājann āmūrtarayasaṃ gayam
a amūrtarayasaḥ putro gayo rājarṣisattamaḥ
c puṇyāni yasya karmāṇi tāni me śṛṇu bhārata
a yasya yajño babhūveha bahvanno bahudakṣiṇaḥ
c yatrānnaparvatā rājañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a ghṛtakulyāś ca dadhnaś ca nadyo bahuśatās tathā
c vyañjanānāṃ pravāhāś ca mahārhāṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ
a ahany ahani cāpy etad yācatāṃ saṃpradīyate
c anyat tu brāhmaṇā rājan bhuñjate 'nnaṃ susaṃskṛtam
a tatra vai dakṣiṇākāle brahmaghoṣo divaṃ gataḥ
c na sma prajñāyate kiṃ cid brahmaśabdena bhārata
a puṇyena caratā rājan bhūr diśaḥ khaṃ nabhas tathā
c āpūrṇam āsīc chabdena tad apy āsīn mahādbhutam
a tatra sma gāthā gāyanti manuṣyā bharatarṣabha
c annapānaiḥ śubhais tṛptā deśe deśe suvarcasaḥ
a gayasya yajñe ke tv adya prāṇino bhoktum īpsavaḥ
c yatra bhojanaśiṣṭasya parvatāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ
a na sma pūrve janāś cakrur na kariṣyanti cāpare
c gayo yad akarod yajñe rājarṣir amitadyutiḥ
a kathaṃ nu devā haviṣā gayena paritarpitāḥ
c punaḥ śakṣyanty upādātum anyair dattāni kāni cit
d sikatā vā yathā loka yathā vā divi tārakāḥ
d yathā vā varṣato dhārā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sma kena cit
d tathā gaṇayituṃ śakyā gayayajñe na dakṣiṇāḥ
a evaṃvidhāḥ subahavas tasya yajñe mahātmanaḥ
c babhūvur asya sarasaḥ samīpe kurunandana
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ saṃprasthito rājā kaunteyo bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
c agastyāśramam āsādya durjayāyām uvāsa ha
a tatra vai lomaśaṃ rājā papraccha vadatāṃ varaḥ
c agastyeneha vātāpiḥ kimartham upaśāmitaḥ
a āsīd vā kiṃprabhāvaś ca sa daityo mānavāntakaḥ
c kimarthaṃ codgato manyur agastyasya mahātmanaḥ
 lomaśa uvāca
a ilvalo nāma daiteya āsīt kauravanandana
c maṇimatyāṃ puri purā vātāpis tasya cānujaḥ
a sa brāhmaṇaṃ tapoyuktam uvāca ditinandanaḥ
c putraṃ me bhagavān ekam indratulyaṃ prayacchatu
a tasmai sa brāhmaṇo nādāt putraṃ vāsavasaṃmitam
c cukrodha so 'suras tasya brāhmaṇasya tato bhṛśam
d tadā prabhṛti rājendra brahmahāsurasattamaḥ
d manyumān bhrātaraṃ chāgaṃ māyāvī pracakāra ha
d meṣarūpī ca vātāpiḥ kāmarūpo 'bhavat kṣaṇāt
d saṃskṛtya bhojayati taṃ viprān sa sma jighāṃsati
a samāhvayati yaṃ vācā gataṃ vaivasvatakṣayam
c sa punar deham āsthāya jīvan sma pratidṛśyate
a tato vātāpim asuraṃ chāgaṃ kṛtvā susaṃskṛtam
c taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayitvā punar eva samāhvayat
d tām ilvalena mahatā svareṇa giram īritām
d śrutvātimāyo balavān kṣipraṃ brāhmaṇakaṇṭakaḥ
a tasya pārśvaṃ vinirbhidya brāhmaṇasya mahāsuraḥ
c vātāpiḥ prahasan rājan niścakrāma viśāṃ pate
a evaṃ sa brāhmaṇān rājan bhojayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
c hiṃsayām āsa daiteya ilvalo duṣṭacetanaḥ
a agastyaś cāpi bhagavān etasmin kāla eva tu
c pitṝn dadarśa garte vai lambamānān adhomukhān
a so 'pṛcchal lambamānāṃs tān bhavanta iha kiṃparāḥ
b kimarthaṃ veha lambadhvaṃ garte yūyam adhomukhāḥ
c saṃtānahetor iti te tam ūcur brahmavādinaḥ
a te tasmai kathayām āsur vayaṃ te pitaraḥ svakāḥ
c gartam etam anuprāptā lambāmaḥ prasavārthinaḥ
a yadi no janayethās tvam agastyāpatyam uttamam
c syān no 'smān nirayān mokṣas tvaṃ ca putrāpnuyā gatim
a sa tān uvāca tejasvī satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
c kariṣye pitaraḥ kāmaṃ vyetu vo mānaso jvaraḥ
d sa cātha janayām āsa bhāratāpatyam uttamam
d lebhire pitaraś cāsya lokān rājan yathepsitān
a tataḥ prasavasaṃtānaṃ cintayan bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
c ātmanaḥ prasavasyārthe nāpaśyat sadṛśīṃ striyam
d ṛṣir hi pratapā nāma vidhāya varam uttamam
a sa tasya tasya sattvasya tat tad aṅgam anuttamam
c saṃbhṛtya tatsamair aṅgair nirmame striyam uttamām
a sa tāṃ vidarbharājāya putrakāmāya tāmyate
c nirmitām ātmano 'rthāya muniḥ prādān mahātapāḥ
a sā tatra jajñe subhagā vidyutsaudāminī yathā
c vibhrājamānā vapusā vyavardhata śubhānanā
a jātamātrāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vaidarbhaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
c praharṣeṇa dvijātibhyo nyavedayata bhārata
a abhyanandanta tāṃ sarve brāhmaṇā vasudhādhipa
c lopāmudreti tasyāś ca cakrire nāma te dvijāḥ
a vavṛdhe sā mahārāja bibhratī rūpam uttamam
c apsv ivotpalinī śīghram agner iva śikhā śubhā
a tāṃ yauvanasthāṃ rājendra śataṃ kanyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
c dāśīśataṃ ca kalyāṇīm upatasthur vaśānugāḥ
a sā sma dāsīśatavṛtā madhye kanyāśatasya ca
c āste tejasvinī kanyā rohiṇīva divi prabho
a yauvanasthām api ca tāṃ śīlācārasamanvitām
c na vavre puruṣaḥ kaś cid bhayāt tasya mahātmanaḥ
a sā tu satyavatī kanyā rūpeṇāpsaraso 'py ati
c toṣayām āsa pitaraṃ śīlena svajanaṃ tathā
a vaidarbhīṃ tu tathāyuktāṃ yuvatīṃ prekṣya vai pitā
c manasā cintayām āsa kasmai dadyāṃ sutām iti
 lomaśa uvāca
a yadā tv amanyatāgastyo gārhasthye tāṃ kṣamām iti
c tadābhigamya provāca vaidarbhaṃ pṛthivīpatim
a rājan niveśe buddhir me vartate putrakāraṇāt
c varaye tvāṃ mahīpāla lopāmudrāṃ prayaccha me
a evam uktaḥ sa muninā mahīpālo vicetanaḥ
c pratyākhyānāya cāśaktaḥ pradātum api naicchata
a tataḥ sa bhāryām abhyetya provāca pṛthivīpatiḥ
c maharṣir vīryavān eṣa kruddhaḥ śāpāgninā dahet
a taṃ tathā duḥkhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sabhāryaṃ pṛthivīpatim
c lopāmudrābhigamyedaṃ kāle vacanam abravīt
a na matkṛte mahīpāla pīḍām abhyetum arhasi
c prayaccha mām agastyāya trāhy ātmānaṃ mayā pitaḥ
a duhitur vacanād rājā so 'gastyāya mahātmane
c lopāmudrāṃ tataḥ prādād vidhipūrvaṃ viśāṃ pate
a prāpya bhāryām agastyas tu lopāmudrām abhāṣata
c mahārhāṇy utsṛjaitāni vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
a tataḥ sā darśanīyāni mahārhāṇi tanūni ca
c samutsasarja rambhorūr vasanāny āyatekṣaṇā
a tataś cīrāṇi jagrāha valkalāny ajināni ca
c samānavratacaryā ca babhūvāyatalocanā
a gaṅgādvāram athāgamya bhagavān ṛṣisattamaḥ
c ugram ātiṣṭhata tapaḥ saha patnyānukūlayā
a sā prītyā bahumānāc ca patiṃ paryacarat tadā
c agastyaś ca parāṃ prītiṃ bhāryāyām akarot prabhuḥ
a tato bahutithe kāle lopāmudrāṃ viśāṃ pate
c tapasā dyotitāṃ snātāṃ dadarśa bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
a sa tasyāḥ paricāreṇa śaucena ca damena ca
c śriyā rūpeṇa ca prīto maithunāyājuhāva tām
a tataḥ sā prāñjalir bhūtvā lajjamāneva bhāminī
c tadā sapraṇayaṃ vākyaṃ bhagavantam athābravīt
a asaṃśayaṃ prajāhetor bhāryāṃ patir avindata
c yā tu tvayi mama prītis tām ṛṣe kartum arhasi
a yathā pitur gṛhe vipra prāsāde śayanaṃ mama
c tathāvidhe tvaṃ śayane mām upaitum ihārhasi
a icchāmi tvāṃ sragviṇaṃ ca bhūṣaṇaiś ca vibhūṣitam
c upasartuṃ yathākāmaṃ divyābharaṇabhūṣitā
d anyathā nopatiṣṭheyaṃ cīrakāṣāyavāsinī
d naivāpavitro viprarṣe bhūṣaṇo 'yaṃ kathaṃ cana
 agastya uvāca
a na vai dhanāni vidyante lopāmudre tathā mama
c yathāvidhāni kalyāṇi pitus tava sumadhyame
 lopāmudrovāca
a īśo 'si tapasā sarvaṃ samāhartum iheśvara
c kṣaṇena jīvaloke yad vasu kiṃ cana vidyate
 agastya uvāca
a evam etad yathāttha tvaṃ tapovyayakaraṃ tu me
c yathā tu me na naśyeta tapas tan māṃ pracodaya
 lopāmudrovāca
a alpāvaśiṣṭaḥ kālo 'yam ṛtau mama tapodhana
c na cānyathāham icchāmi tvām upaituṃ kathaṃ cana
a na cāpi dharmam icchāmi viloptuṃ te tapodhana
c etat tu me yathākāmaṃ saṃpādayitum arhasi
 agastya uvāca
a yady eṣa kāmaḥ subhage tava buddhyā viniścitaḥ
a   mama dharmavilopakaḥ
a kāme kṛte cariṣyāmi dharmaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathāsmṛti
a yady ayaṃ cepsitaḥ kāmaḥ
c hanta gacchāmy ahaṃ bhadre cara kāmam iha sthitā
 lomaśa uvāca
a tato jagāma kauravya so 'gastyo bhikṣituṃ vasu
c śrutarvāṇaṃ mahīpālaṃ yaṃ vedābhyadhikaṃ nṛpaiḥ
a sa viditvā tu nṛpatiḥ kumbhayonim upāgamat
c viṣayānte sahāmātyaḥ pratyagṛhṇāt susatkṛtam
a tasmai cārghyaṃ yathānyāyam ānīya pṛthivīpatiḥ
c prāñjaliḥ prayato bhūtvā papracchāgamane 'rthitām
d kimartham āgamo brahman dhanyo 'smy āgamanena te
 agastya uvāca
a vittārthinam anuprāptaṃ viddhi māṃ pṛthivīpate
c yathāśakty avihiṃsyānyān saṃvibhāgaṃ prayaccha me
 lomaśa uvāca
a tata āyavyayau pūrṇau tasmai rājā nyavedayat
c ato vidvann upādatsva yad atra vasu manyase
a tata āyavyayau dṛṣṭvā samau samamatir dvijaḥ
c sarvathā prāṇināṃ pīḍām upādānād amanyata
a sa śrutarvāṇam ādāya vadhryaśvam agamat tataḥ
c sa ca tau viṣayasyānte pratyagṛhṇād yathāvidhi
a tayor arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca vadhryaśvaḥ pratyavedayat
c anujñāpya ca papraccha prayojanam upakrame
d vada kāmaṃ muniśreṣṭha dhanyo 'smy āgamanena te
 agastya uvāca
a vittakāmāv iha prāptau viddhy āvāṃ pṛthivīpate
c yathāśakty avihiṃsyānyān saṃvibhāgaṃ prayaccha nau
 lomaśa uvāca
a tata āyavyayau pūrṇau tābhyāṃ rājā nyavedayat
c tato jñātvā samādattāṃ yad atra vyatiricyate
a tata āyavyayau dṛṣṭvā samau samamatir dvijaḥ
c sarvathā prāṇināṃ pīḍām upādānād amanyata
a paurukutsaṃ tato jagmus trasadasyuṃ mahādhanam
c agastyaś ca śrutarvā ca vadhryaśvaś ca mahīpatiḥ
a trasadasyuś ca tān sarvān pratyagṛhṇād yathāvidhi
c abhigamya mahārāja viṣayānte savāhanaḥ
a arcayitvā yathānyāyam ikṣvākū rājasattamaḥ
c samāśvastāṃs tato 'pṛcchat prayojanam upakrame
 agastya uvāca
a vittakāmān iha prāptān viddhi naḥ pṛthivīpate
c yathāśakty avihiṃsyānyān saṃvibhāgaṃ prayaccha naḥ
 lomaśa uvāca
a tata āyavyayau pūrṇau teṣāṃ rājā nyavedayat
c ato jñātvā samādaddhvaṃ yad atra vyatiricyate
a tata āyavyayau dṛṣṭvā samau samamatir dvijaḥ
c sarvathā prāṇināṃ pīḍām upādānād amanyata
a tataḥ sarve sametyātha te nṛpās taṃ mahāmunim
c idam ūcur mahārāja samavekṣya parasparam
a ayaṃ vai dānavo brahmann ilvalo vasumān bhuvi
c tam abhikramya sarve 'dya vayaṃ yācāmahe vasu
a teṣāṃ tadāsīd rucitam ilvalasyopabhikṣaṇam
c tatas te sahitā rājann ilvalaṃ samupādravan
 lomaśa uvāca
a ilvalas tān viditvā tu maharṣisahitān nṛpān
c upasthitān sahāmātyo viṣayānte 'bhyapūjayat
a teṣāṃ tato 'suraśreṣṭha ātithyam akarot tadā
c sa saṃskṛtena kauravya bhrātrā vātāpinā kila
a tato rājarṣayaḥ sarve viṣaṇṇā gatacetasaḥ
c vātāpiṃ saṃskṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā meṣabhūtaṃ mahāsuram
a athābravīd agastyas tān rājarṣīn ṛṣisattamaḥ
c viṣādo vo na kartavyo ahaṃ bhokṣye mahāsuram
a dhuryāsanam athāsādya niṣasāda mahāmuniḥ
c taṃ paryaveṣad daityendra ilvalaḥ prahasann iva
a agastya eva kṛtsnaṃ tu vātāpiṃ bubhuje tataḥ
b bahvannāśāpi te me 'stīty avadad bhakṣayan smayan
b vātāpe pratibudhyasva darśayan balatejasī
b tapasā durjayo yāvad eṣa tvāṃ nātivartate
b tatas tasyodaraṃ bhettuṃ vātāpir vegam āharat
b tam abudhyata tejasvī kumbhayonir mahātapāḥ
b sa vīryāt tapasogras tu nanarda bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
b eṣa jīrṇo 'si vātāpe mayā lokasya śāntaye
b ity uktvā svakarāgreṇa udaraṃ samatāḍayat
b trir evaṃ pratisaṃrabdhas tejasā prajvalann iva
c bhuktavaty asuro ''hvānam akarot tasya ilvalaḥ
a tato vāyuḥ prādurabhūd agastyasya mahātmanaḥ
b śabdena mahatā tāta garjann iva yathā ghanaḥ
b vātāpe niṣkramasveti punaḥ punar uvāca ha
b taṃ prahasyābravīd rājann agastyo munisattamaḥ
b kuto niṣkramituṃ śakto mayā jīrṇas tu so 'suraḥ
c ilvalaś ca viṣaṇṇo 'bhūd dṛṣṭvā jīrṇaṃ mahāsuram
a prāñjaliś ca sahāmātyair idaṃ vacanam abravīt
c kimartham upayātāḥ stha brūta kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ
a pratyuvāca tato 'gastyaḥ prahasann ilvalaṃ tadā
c īśaṃ hy asura vidmas tvāṃ vayaṃ sarve dhaneśvaram
a ime ca nātidhanino dhanārthaś ca mahān mama
c yathāśakty avihiṃsyānyān saṃvibhāgaṃ prayaccha naḥ
a tato 'bhivādya tam ṛṣim ilvalo vākyam abravīt
c ditsitaṃ yadi vetsi tvaṃ tato dāsyāmi te vasu
 agastya uvāca
a gavāṃ daśa sahasrāṇi rājñām ekaikaśo 'sura
c tāvad eva suvarṇasya ditsitaṃ te mahāsura
a mahyaṃ tato vai dviguṇaṃ rathaś caiva hiraṇmayaḥ
c manojavau vājinau ca ditsitaṃ te mahāsura
d lomaśaḥ
d ilvalas tu muniṃ prāha sarvam asti yathāttha mām
d agastyaḥ
d rathaṃ tu yam avoco māṃ nainaṃ vidma hiraṇmayam
d na me vāg anṛtā kā cid uktapūrvā mahāsura
d sarvam etat pradāsyāmi hiraṇyaṃ gāś ca yad dhanam
e jijñāsyatāṃ rathaḥ sadyo vyaktam eṣa hiraṇmayaḥ
 lomaśa uvāca
a jijñāsyamānaḥ sa rathaḥ kaunteyāsīd dhiraṇmayaḥ
c tataḥ pravyathito daityo dadāv abhyadhikaṃ vasu
a vivājaś ca suvājaś ca tasmin yuktau rathe hayau
c ūhatus tau vasūny āśu tāny agastyāśramaṃ prati
e sarvān rājñaḥ sahāgastyān nimeṣād iva bhārata
f ilvalas tv anugamyainam agastyaṃ hantum aicchata
f bhasma cakre mahātejā huṃkāreṇa mahāsuram
f muner āśramam aśvau tau ninyatur vātaraṃhasau
a agastyenābhyanujñātā jagmū rājarṣayas tadā
c kṛtavāṃś ca muniḥ sarvaṃ lopāmudrācikīrṣitam
 lopāmudrovāca
a kṛtavān asi tat sarvaṃ bhagavan mama kāṅkṣitam
c utpādaya sakṛn mahyam apatyaṃ vīryavattaram
 agastya uvāca
a tuṣṭo 'ham asmi kalyāṇi tava vṛttena śobhane
c vicāraṇām apatye tu tava vakṣyāmi tāṃ śṛṇu
a sahasraṃ te 'stu putrāṇāṃ śataṃ vā daśasaṃmitam
c daśa vā śatatulyāḥ syur eko vāpi sahasravat
 lopāmudrovāca
a sahasrasaṃmitaḥ putra eko me 'stu tapodhana
c eko hi bahubhiḥ śreyān vidvān sādhur asādhubhiḥ
 lomaśa uvāca
a sa tatheti pratijñāya tayā samabhavan muniḥ
c samaye samaśīlinyā śraddhāvāñ śraddadhānayā
a tata ādhāya garbhaṃ tam agamad vanam eva saḥ
c tasmin vanagate garbho vavṛdhe sapta śāradān
a saptame 'bde gate cāpi prācyavat sa mahākaviḥ
c jvalann iva prabhāvena dṛḍhasyur nāma bhārata
e sāṅgopaniṣadān vedāñ japann eva mahāyaśāḥ
a tasya putro 'bhavad ṛṣeḥ sa tejasvī mahān ṛṣiḥ
c sa bāla eva tejasvī pitus tasya niveśane
e idhmānāṃ bhāram ājahre idhmavāhas tato 'bhavat
a tathāyuktaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā mumude sa munis tadā
b evaṃ sa janayām āsa bhāratāpatyam uttamam
c lebhire pitaraś cāsya lokān rājan yathepsitān
a agastyasyāśramaḥ khyātaḥ sarvartukusumānvitaḥ
b khyāto bhuvi mahārāja tejasā tasya dhīmataḥ
c prāhrādir evaṃ vātāpir agastyena vināśitaḥ
c   brahmaghno duṣṭacetanaḥ
c evaṃ vināśito rājan
a tasyāyam āśramo rājan ramaṇīyo guṇair yutaḥ
c eṣā bhāgīrathī puṇyā yatheṣṭam avagāhyatām
d vāteritā patākeva virājati nabhastale
d pratāryamāṇā kūṭeṣu yathā nimneṣu nityaśaḥ
d śilātaleṣu saṃtrastā pannagendravadhūr iva
d dakṣiṇāṃ vai diśaṃ sarvāṃ plāvayantī ca mātṛvat
d pūrvaṃ śambhor jaṭābhraṣṭā samudramahiṣī priyā
d lomaśa uvāca
d asyāṃ nadyāṃ supuṇyāyāṃ yatheṣṭam avagāhyatām
d yudhiṣṭhira nibodhedaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
d bhṛgos tīrthaṃ mahārāja maharṣigaṇasevitam
d yatropaspṛṣṭavān rāmo hṛtaṃ tejas tadāptavān
d atra tvaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇayā caiva pāṇḍava
d duryodhanahṛtaṃ tejaḥ punar ādātum arhasi
d kṛtavaireṇa rāmeṇa yathā copahṛtaṃ punaḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d sa tatra bhrātṛbhiś caiva kṛṣṇayā caiva pāṇḍavaḥ
d snātvā devān pitṝṃś caiva tarpayām āsa bhārata
d tasya tīrthasya rūpaṃ vai dīptād dīptataraṃ babhau
d apradhṛṣyataraś cāsīc chātravāṇāṃ nararṣabha
d apṛcchac caiva rājendra lomaśaṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
d bhagavan kimarthaṃ rāmasya hṛtam āsīd vapuḥ prabho
d lomaśa uvāca
d kathaṃ pratyāhṛtaṃ caiva etad ācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
d śṛṇu rāmasya rājendra bhārgavasya ca dhīmataḥ
d jāto daśarathasyāsīt putro rāmo mahātmanaḥ
d viṣṇuḥ svena śarīreṇa rāvaṇasya vadhāya vai
d paśyāmas tam ayodhyāyāṃ jātaṃ dāśarathiṃ tataḥ
d ṛcīkanandano rāmo bhārgavo reṇukāsutaḥ
d tasya dāśaratheḥ śrutvā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
d kautūhalānvito rāmas tv ayodhyām agamat punaḥ
d dhanur ādāya tad divyaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nibarhaṇam
d jijñāsamāno rāmasya vīryaṃ dāśarathes tadā
d taṃ vai daśarathaḥ śrutvā viṣayāntam upāgamat
d preṣayām āsa rāmasya rāmaṃ putraṃ puraskṛtam
d sa tam abhyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā udyatāstram avasthitam
d prahasann iva kaunteya rāmo vacanam abravīt
d kṛtakālaṃ hi rājendra dhanur etan mayā vibho
d samāropaya yatnena yadi śaknoṣi pārthiva
d ity uktas tv āha bhagavaṃs tvaṃ nādhikṣeptum arhasi
d nāham apy adhamo dharme kṣatriyāṇāṃ dvijātiṣu
d ikṣvākūṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa bāhuvīrye na katthanam
d tam evaṃvādinaṃ tatra rāmo vacanam abravīt
d alaṃ vai vyapadeśena dhanur āyaccha rāghava
d tato jagrāha roṣeṇa kṣatriyarṣabhasūdanam
d rāmo dāśarathir divyaṃ hastād rāmasya kārmukam
d dhanur āropayām āsa salīla iva bhārata
d jyāśabdam akaroc caiva smayamānaḥ sa vīryavān
d tasya śabdasya bhūtāni vitrasanty aśaner iva
d athābravīt tadā rāmo rāmaṃ dāśarathis tadā
d idam āropitaṃ brahman kim anyat karavāṇi te
d tasya rāmo dadau divyaṃ jāmadagnyo mahātmanaḥ
d śaram ākarṇadeśāntam ayam ākṛṣyatām iti
d etac chrutvābravīd rāmaḥ pradīpta iva manyunā
d śrūyate kṣamyate caiva darpapūrṇo 'si bhārgava
d tvayā hy adhigataṃ tejaḥ kṣatriyebhyo viśeṣataḥ
d pitāmahaprasādena tena māṃ kṣipasi dhruvam
d paśya māṃ svena rūpeṇa cakṣus te vitarāmy aham
d tato rāmaśarīre vai rāmaḥ paśyati bhārgavaḥ
d ādityān savasūn rudrān sādhyāṃś ca samarudgaṇān
d pitaro hutāśanaś caiva nakṣatrāṇi grahās tathā
d gandharvā rākṣasā yakṣā nadyas tīrthāni yāni ca
d ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca brahmabhūtāḥ sanātanāḥ
d devarṣayaś ca kārtsnyena samudrāḥ parvatās tathā
d vedāś ca sopaniṣado vaṣaṭkāraiḥ sahādhvaraiḥ
d cetomanti ca sāmāni dhanurvedaś ca bhārata
d meghavṛndāni varṣāṇi vidyutaś ca yudhiṣṭhira
d tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇus taṃ vai bāṇaṃ mumoca ha
d śuṣkāśanisamākīrṇaṃ maholkābhiś ca bhārata
d pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā meghavarṣaiś ca bhūtalam
d bhūmikampaiś ca nirghātair nādaiś ca vipulair api
d sa rāmaṃ vihvalaṃ kṛtvā tejaś cākṣipya kevalam
d āgacchaj jvalito bāṇo rāmabāhupracoditaḥ
d sa tu vihvalatāṃ gatvā pratilabhya ca cetanām
d rāmaḥ pratyāgataprāṇaḥ prāṇamad viṣṇutejasam
d viṣṇunā so 'bhyanujñāto mahendram agamat punaḥ
d bhītas tu tatra nyavasad vrīḍitas tu mahātapāḥ
d tataḥ saṃvatsare 'tīte hṛtaujasam avasthitam
d nirmadaṃ duḥkhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitaro rāmam abruvan
d na vai samyag idaṃ putra viṣṇum āsādya vai kṛtam
d sa hi pūjyaś ca mānyaś ca triṣu lokeṣu sarvadā
d gaccha putra nadīṃ puṇyāṃ vadhūsarakṛtāhvayām
d tatropaspṛśya tīrtheṣu punar vapur avāpsyasi
d dīptodaṃ nāma tat tīrthaṃ yatra te prapitāmahaḥ
d bhṛgur devayuge rāma taptavān uttamaṃ tapaḥ
d tat tathā kṛtavān rāmaḥ kaunteya vacanāt pituḥ
d prāptavāṃś ca punatejas tīrthe 'smin pāṇḍunandana
d etad īdṛśakaṃ tāta rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
d prāptam āsīn mahārāja viṣṇum āsādya vai purā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bhūya evāham icchāmi maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥ
c karmaṇāṃ vistaraṃ śrotum agastyasya dvijottama
 lomaśa uvāca
a śṛṇu rājan kathāṃ divyām adbhutām atimānuṣīm
c agastyasya mahārāja prabhāvam amitātmanaḥ
a āsan kṛtayuge ghorā dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ
c kāleyā iti vikhyātā gaṇāḥ paramadāruṇāḥ
a te tu vṛtraṃ samāśritya nānāpraharaṇodyatāḥ
c samantāt paryadhāvanta mahendrapramukhān surān
a tato vṛtravadhe yatnam akurvaṃs tridaśāḥ purā
c puraṃdaraṃ puraskṛtya brahmāṇam upatasthire
a kṛtāñjalīṃs tu tān sarvān parameṣṭhī uvāca ha

gandharvatūryeṣu nadatsu sarvaśaḥ
c divyaiś ca puṣpair avakīryamāṇo
mahārṇavaṃ niḥsalilaṃ cakāra
a dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ niḥsalilaṃ mahārṇavaṃ
surāḥ samastāḥ paramaprahṛṣṭāḥ
c pragṛhya divyāni varāyudhāni
tān dānavāñ jaghnur adīnasattvāḥ
a te vadhyamānās tridaśair mahātmabhir
mahābalair vegibhir unnadadbhiḥ
c na sehire vegavatāṃ mahātmanāṃ
vegaṃ tadā dhārayituṃ divaukasām
a te vadhyamānās tridaśair dānavā bhīmanisvanāḥ
c cakruḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ muhūrtam iva bhārata
a te pūrvaṃ tapasā dagdhā munibhir bhāvitātmabhiḥ
c yatamānāḥ paraṃ śaktyā tridaśair viniṣūditāḥ
a te hemaniṣkābharaṇāḥ kuṇḍalāṅgadadhāriṇaḥ
c nihatya bahv aśobhanta puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥ
a hataśeṣās tataḥ ke cit kāleyā manujottama
c vidārya vasudhāṃ devīṃ pātālatalam āśritāḥ
a nihatān dānavān dṛṣṭvā tridaśā munipuṃgavam
c tuṣṭuvur vividhair vākyair idaṃ caivābruvan vacaḥ
a tvatprasādān mahābhāga lokaiḥ prāptaṃ mahat sukham
c tvattejasā ca nihatāḥ kāleyāḥ krūravikramāḥ
a pūrayasva mahābāho samudraṃ lokabhāvana
c yat tvayā salilaṃ pītaṃ tad asmin punar utsṛja
a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca bhagavān munipuṃgavaḥ
b tāṃs tathā sahitān devān agastyaḥ sapuraṃdarān
c jīrṇaṃ tad dhi mayā toyam upāyo 'nyaḥ pracintyatām
e pūraṇārthaṃ samudrasya bhavadbhir yatnam āsthitaiḥ
a etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
c vismitāś ca viṣaṇṇāś ca babhūvuḥ sahitāḥ surāḥ
a parasparam anujñāpya praṇamya munipuṃgavam
c prajāḥ sarvā mahārāja viprajagmur yathāgatam
a tridaśā viṣṇunā sārdham upajagmuḥ pitāmaham
c pūraṇārthaṃ samudrasya mantrayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
d te dhātāram upāgamya tridaśāḥ saha viṣṇunā
e ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sāgarasyābhipūraṇam
 lomaśa uvāca
a tān uvāca sametāṃs tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
b nirhrādinyā girā rājan devān āśvāsayaṃs tadā
c gacchadhvaṃ vibudhāḥ sarve yathākāmaṃ yathepsitam
a mahatā kālayogena prakṛtiṃ yāsyate 'rṇavaḥ
c jñātīn vai kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā mahārājño bhagīrathāt
d ānayiṣyad yadā gaṅgāṃ tadā pūrṇo bhaviṣyati
d pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā sarve vibudhasattamāḥ
d kālayogaṃ pratīkṣanto jagmuś cāpi yathāgatam
d pūrayiṣyati toyaughaiḥ samudraṃ nidhim ambhasām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ vai jñātayo brahman kāraṇaṃ cātra kiṃ mune
c kathaṃ samudraḥ pūrṇaś ca bhagīrathapariśramāt
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa tapodhana
c kathyamānaṃ tvayā vipra rājñāṃ caritam uttamam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tu viprendro dharmarājñā mahātmanā
c kathayām āsa māhātmyaṃ sagarasya mahātmanaḥ
 lomaśa uvāca
a ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sagaro nāma pārthivaḥ
c rūpasattvabalopetaḥ sa cāputraḥ pratāpavān
a sa haihayān samutsādya tālajaṅghāṃś ca bhārata
c vaśe ca kṛtvā rājño 'nyān svarājyam anvaśāsata
a tasya bhārye tv abhavatāṃ rūpayauvanadarpite
c vaidarbhī bharataśreṣṭha śaibyā ca bharatarṣabha
a sa putrakāmo nṛpatis tatāpa sumahat tapaḥ
c patnībhyāṃ saha rājendra kailāsaṃ girim āśritaḥ
a sa tapyamānaḥ sumahat tapo yogasamanvitaḥ
c āsasāda mahātmānaṃ tryakṣaṃ tripuramardanam
a śaṃkaraṃ bhavam īśānaṃ śūlapāniṃ pinākinam
c tryambakaṃ śivam ugreśaṃ bahurūpam umāpatim
d lokadhātāram ajaram amareśaṃ purātanam
d digvāsasaṃ vṛṣaratham acintyādbhutayoginam
a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva varadaṃ patnībhyāṃ sahito nṛpaḥ
c praṇipatya mahābāhuḥ putrārthaṃ samayācata
a taṃ prītimān haraḥ prāha sabhāryaṃ nṛpasattamam
c yasmin vṛto muhūrte 'haṃ tvayeha nṛpate varam
a ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi śūrāḥ samaradarpitāḥ
c ekasyāṃ saṃbhaviṣyanti patnyāṃ tava narottama
a te caiva sarve sahitāḥ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti pārthiva
c eko vaṃśadharaḥ śūra ekasyāṃ saṃbhaviṣyati
e evam uktvā tu taṃ rudras tatraivāntaradhīyata
a sa cāpi sagaro rājā jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
c patnībhyāṃ sahitas tāta so 'tihṛṣṭamanās tadā
d kālaṃ śaṃbhuvaraprāptaṃ pratīkṣan sagaro 'nayat
a tasyātha manujaśreṣṭha te bhārye kamalekṣaṇe
c vaidarbhī caiva śaibyā ca garbhiṇyau saṃbabhūvatuḥ
a tataḥ kālena vaidarbhī garbhālābuṃ vyajāyata
c śaibyā ca suṣuve putraṃ kumāraṃ devarūpiṇam
a tadālābuṃ samutsraṣṭuṃ manaś cakre sa pārthivaḥ
c athāntarikṣāc chuśrāva vācaṃ gambhīranisvanām
a rājan mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīḥ putrān na tyaktum arhasi
c alābumadhyān niṣkṛṣya bījaṃ yatnena gopyatām
a sopasvedeṣu pātreṣu ghṛtapūrṇeṣu bhāgaśaḥ
c tataḥ putrasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiṃ prāpsyasi pārthiva
a mahādevena diṣṭaṃ te putrajanma narādhipa
c anena kramayogena mā te buddhir ato 'nyathā
 lomaśa uvāca
a etac chrutvāntarikṣāc ca sa rājā rājasattama
c yathoktaṃ tac cakārātha śraddadhad bharatarṣabha
d ekaikaśas tataḥ kṛtvā bījaṃ bījaṃ narādhipaḥ
d ghṛtapūrṇeṣu kumbheṣu tān bhāgān vidadhe tataḥ
d dhātrīś caikaikaśaḥ prādāt putrarakṣaṇatatparaḥ
d tataḥ kālena mahatā samuttasthur mahābalāḥ
a ṣaṣṭiḥ putrasahasrāṇi tasyāpratimatejasaḥ
c rudraprasādād rājarṣeḥ samajāyanta pārthiva
a te ghorāḥ krūrakarmāṇa ākāśaparisarpiṇaḥ
c bahutvāc cāvajānantaḥ sarvāṃl lokān sahāmarān
a tridaśāṃś cāpy abādhanta tathā gandharvarākṣasān
c sarvāṇi caiva bhūtāni śūrāḥ samaraśālinaḥ
a vadhyamānās tato lokāḥ sāgarair mandabuddhibhiḥ
c brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarvadaivataiḥ
a tān uvāca mahābhāgaḥ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
c gacchadhvaṃ tridaśāḥ sarve lokaiḥ sārdhaṃ yathāgatam
a nātidīrgheṇa kālena sāgarāṇāṃ kṣayo mahān
c bhaviṣyati mahāghoraḥ svakṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ surāḥ
d kapilaṃ te samāsādya vinaśiṣyanty asaṃśayam
a evam uktās tato devā lokāś ca manujeśvara
c pitāmaham anujñāpya viprajagmur yathāgatam
a tataḥ kāle bahutithe vyatīte bharatarṣabha
c dīkṣitaḥ sagaro rājā hayamedhena vīryavān
e tasyāśvo vyacarad bhūmiṃ putraiḥ suparirakṣitaḥ
f sarvair eva mahotsāhaiḥ svacchandapracaro nṛpa
a samudraṃ sa samāsādya nistoyaṃ bhīmadarśanam
c rakṣyamāṇaḥ prayatnena tatraivāntaradhīyata
a tatas te sāgarās tāta hṛtaṃ matvā hayottamam
c āgamya pitur ācakhyur adṛśyaṃ turagaṃ hṛtam
e tenoktā dikṣu sarvāsu sarve mārgata vājinam
f sasamudravanadvīpāṃ vicinvanto vasuṃdharām
a tatas te pitur ājñāya dikṣu sarvāsu taṃ hayam
c amārganta mahārāja sarvaṃ ca pṛthivītalam
a tatas te sāgarāḥ sarve samupetya parasparam
c nādhyagacchanta turagam aśvahartāram eva ca
a āgamya pitaraṃ cocus tataḥ prāñjalayo 'grataḥ
b sthitvā sarve mahīpālāḥ sāgarāḥ sahitās tadā
c sasamudravanadvīpā sanadīnadakandarā
e saparvatavanoddeśā nikhilena mahī nṛpa
a asmābhir vicitā rājañ śāsanāt tava pārthiva
c na cāśvam adhigacchāmo nāśvahartāram eva ca
a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ sa rājā krodhamūrchitaḥ
c uvāca vacanaṃ sarvāṃs tadā daivavaśān nṛpa
a anāgamāya gacchadhvaṃ bhūyo mārgata vājinam
c yajñiyaṃ taṃ vinā hy aśvaṃ nāgantavyaṃ hi putrakāḥ
a pratigṛhya tu saṃdeśaṃ tatas te sagarātmajāḥ
c bhūya eva mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vicetum upacakramuḥ
a athāpaśyanta te vīrāḥ pṛthivīm avadāritām
b samudre pṛthivīpāla padamārgaṃ ca vājinaḥ
c samāsādya bilaṃ tac ca khanantaḥ sagarātmajāḥ
e kuddālair hreṣukaiś caiva samudram akhanaṃs tadā
a sa khanyamānaḥ sahitaiḥ sāgarair varuṇālayaḥ
c agacchat paramām ārtiṃ dāryamāṇaḥ samantataḥ
a asuroragarakṣāṃsi sattvāni vividhāni ca
c ārtanādam akurvanta vadhyamānāni sāgaraiḥ
a chinnaśīrṣā videhāś ca bhinnajānvasthimastakāḥ
c prāṇinaḥ samadṛśyanta śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a evaṃ hi khanatāṃ teṣāṃ samudraṃ makarālayam
c vyatītaḥ sumahān kālo na cāśvaḥ samadṛśyata
a tataḥ pūrvottare deśe samudrasya mahīpate
b vidāryamāṇāṃ pṛthivīṃ sāgarair baladarpitaiḥ
c vidārya pātālam atha saṃkruddhāḥ sagarātmajāḥ
e apaśyanta hayaṃ tatra vicarantaṃ mahītale
a kapilaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ tejorāśim anuttamam
c tapasā dīpyamānaṃ taṃ jvālābhir iva pāvakam
d dṛṣṭvā hi hṛṣitāḥ sarve babhūvuḥ sāgarās tadā
 lomaśa uvāca
a te taṃ dṛṣṭvā hayaṃ rājan saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhāḥ
c anādṛtya mahātmānaṃ kapilaṃ kālacoditāḥ
e saṃkruddhāḥ samadhāvanta aśvagrahaṇakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a tataḥ kruddho mahārāja kapilo munisattamaḥ
c vāsudeveti yaṃ prāhuḥ kapilaṃ munisattamam
a sa cakṣur vivṛtaṃ kṛtvā tejas teṣu samutsṛjan
c dadāha sumahātejā mandabuddhīn sa sāgarān
d ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāṇi tadā yugapan munisattamaḥ
a tān dṛṣṭvā bhasmasād bhūtān nāradaḥ sumahātapāḥ
c sagarāntikam āgacchat tac ca tasmai nyavedayat
a sa tac chrutvā vaco ghoraṃ rājā munimukhodgatam
c muhūrtaṃ vimanā bhūtvā sthāṇor vākyam acintayat
d sa putranidhanotthena duḥkhena samabhiplutaḥ
e ātmānam ātmanāśvāsya hayam evānvacintayat
a aṃśumantaṃ samāhūya asamajñaḥsutaṃ tadā
c pautraṃ bharataśārdūla idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a ṣaṣṭis tāni sahasrāṇi putrāṇām amitaujasām
c kāpilaṃ teja āsādya matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
a tava cāpi pitā tāta parityakto mayānagha
c dharmaṃ saṃrakṣamāṇena paurāṇāṃ hitam icchatā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kimarthaṃ rājaśārdūlaḥ sagaraḥ putram ātmajam
c tyaktavān dustyajaṃ vīraṃ tan me brūhi tapodhana
 lomaśa uvāca
a asamañjā iti khyātaḥ sagarasya suto hy abhūt
c yaṃ śaibyā janayām āsa paurāṇāṃ sa hi dārakān
d krīḍataḥ sahasāsādya tatra tatra mahīpate
e khureṣu krośato gṛhya nadyāṃ cikṣepa durbalān
a tataḥ paurāḥ samājagmur bhayaśokapariplutāḥ
c sagaraṃ cābhyayācanta sarve prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ
a tvaṃ nas trātā mahārāja paracakrādibhir bhayaiḥ
c asamañjobhayād ghorāt tato nas trātum arhasi
a paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā ghoraṃ nṛpatisattamaḥ
c muhūrtaṃ vimanā bhūtvā sacivān idam abravīt
a asamañjāḥ purād adya suto me vipravāsyatām
c yadi vo matpriyaṃ kāryam etac chīghraṃ vidhīyatām
a evam uktā narendreṇa sacivās te narādhipa
c yathoktaṃ tvaritāś cakrur yathājñāpitavān nṛpaḥ
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā putro mahātmanā
c paurāṇāṃ hitakāmena sagareṇa vivāsitaḥ
a aṃśumāṃs tu maheṣvāso yad uktaḥ sagareṇa ha
c tat te sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me
 sagara uvāca
a pituś ca te 'haṃ tyāgena putrāṇāṃ nidhanena ca
c alābhena tathāśvasya paritapyāmi putraka
a tasmād duḥkhābhisaṃtaptaṃ yajñavighnāc ca mohitam
c hayasyānayanāt pautra narakān māṃ samuddhara
 lomaśa uvāca
a aṃśumān evam uktas tu sagareṇa mahātmanā
c jagāma duḥkhāt taṃ deśaṃ yatra vai dāritā mahī
a sa tu tenaiva mārgeṇa samudraṃ praviveśa ha
c apaśyac ca mahātmānaṃ kapilaṃ turagaṃ ca tam
a sa dṛṣṭvā tejaso rāśiṃ purāṇam ṛṣisattamam
c praṇamya śirasā bhūmau kāryam asmai nyavedayat
a tataḥ prīto mahātejāḥ kalipo 'ṃśumato 'bhavat
c uvāca cainaṃ dharmātmā varado 'smīti bhārata
a sa vavre turagaṃ tatra prathamaṃ yajñakāraṇāt
c dvitīyam udakaṃ vavre pitṝṇāṃ pāvanepsayā
a tam uvāca mahātejāḥ kapilo munipuṃgavaḥ
c dadāni tava bhadraṃ te yad yat prārthayase 'nagha
a tvayi kṣamā ca dharmaś ca satyaṃ cāpi pratiṣṭhitam
c tvayā kṛtārthaḥ sagaraḥ putravāṃś ca tvayā pitā
a tava caiva prabhāvena svargaṃ yāsyanti sāgarāḥ
b śalabhatvaṃ gatā ete mama krodhahutāśane
c pautraś ca te tripathagāṃ tridivād ānayiṣyati
e pāvanārthaṃ sāgarāṇāṃ toṣayitvā maheśvaram
a hayaṃ nayasva bhadraṃ te yajñiyaṃ narapuṃgava
c yajñaḥ samāpyatāṃ tāta sagarasya mahātmanaḥ
a aṃśumān evam uktas tu kapilena mahātmanā
c ājagāma hayaṃ gṛhya yajñavāṭaṃ mahātmanaḥ
a so 'bhivādya tataḥ pādau sagarasya mahātmanaḥ
c mūrdhni tenāpy upāghrātas tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayat
a yathā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ cāpi sāgarāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ tathā
c taṃ cāsmai hayam ācaṣṭa yajñavāṭam upāgatam
a tac chrutvā sagaro rājā putrajaṃ duḥkham atyajat
c aṃśumantaṃ ca saṃpūjya samāpayata taṃ kratum
a samāptayajñaḥ sagaro devaiḥ sarvaiḥ sabhājitaḥ
c putratve kalpayām āsa samudraṃ varuṇālayam
a praśāsya suciraṃ kālaṃ rājyaṃ rājīvalocanaḥ
c pautre bhāraṃ samāveśya jagāma tridivaṃ tadā
a aṃśumān api dharmātmā mahīṃ sāgaramekhalām
c praśaśāsa mahārāja yathaivāsya pitāmahaḥ
a tasya putraḥ samabhavad dilīpo nāma dharmavit
c tasmai rājyaṃ samādhāya aṃśumān api saṃsthitaḥ
a dilīpas tu tataḥ śrutvā pitṝṇāṃ nidhanaṃ mahat
c paryatapyata duḥkhena teṣāṃ gatim acintayat
a gaṅgāvataraṇe yatnaṃ sumahac cākaron nṛpaḥ
c na cāvatārayām āsa ceṣṭamāno yathābalam
d sa rājarṣir dilīpas tu yuyuje kāladharmaṇā
a tasya putraḥ samabhavac chrīmān dharmaparāyaṇaḥ
c bhagīratha iti khyātaḥ satyavāg anasūyakaḥ
a abhiṣicya tu taṃ rājye dilīpo vanam āśritaḥ
b bhagīrathaṃ mahātmānaṃ satyadharmaparāyaṇam
c tapaḥsiddhisamāyogāt sa rājā bharatarṣabha
e vanāj jagāma tridivaṃ kālayogena bhārata
 lomaśa uvāca
a sa tu rājā maheṣvāsaś cakravartī mahārathaḥ
c babhūva sarvalokasya manonayananandanaḥ
a sa śuśrāva mahābāhuḥ kapilena mahātmanā
c pitṝṇāṃ nidhanaṃ ghoram aprāptiṃ tridivasya ca
a sa rājyaṃ sacive nyasya hṛdayena vidūyatā
c jagāma himavatpārśvaṃ tapas taptuṃ nareśvaraḥ
a ārirādhayiṣur gaṅgāṃ tapasā dagdhakilbiṣaḥ
c so 'paśyata naraśreṣṭha himavantaṃ nagottamam
a śṛṅgair bahuvidhākārair dhātumadbhir alaṃkṛtam
c pavanālambibhir meghaiḥ pariṣvaktaṃ samantataḥ
a nadīkuñjanitambaiś ca sodakair upaśobhitam
c guhākandarasaṃlīnaiḥ siṃhavyāghrair niṣevitam
a śakunaiś ca vicitrāṅgaiḥ kūjadbhir vividhā giraḥ
c bhṛṅgarājais tathā haṃsair dātyūhair jalakukkuṭaiḥ
a mayūraiḥ śatapatraiś ca kokilair jīvajīvakaiḥ
c cakorair asitāpāṅgais tathā putrapriyair api
a jalasthāneṣu ramyeṣu padminībhiś ca saṃkulam
c sārasānāṃ ca madhurair vyāhṛtaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
a kiṃnarair apsarobhiś ca niṣevitaśilātalam
c diśāgajaviṣāṇāgraiḥ samantād ghṛṣṭapādapam
a vidyādharānucaritaṃ nānāratnasamākulam
c viṣolbaṇair bhujaṃgaiś ca dīptajihvair niṣevitam
a kva cit kanakasaṃkāśaṃ kva cid rajatasaṃnibham
c kva cid añjanapuñjābhaṃ himavantam upāgamat
a sa tu tatra naraśreṣṭhas tapo ghoraṃ samāśritaḥ
c phalamūlāmbubhakṣo 'bhūt sahasraṃ parivatsarān
a saṃvatsarasahasre tu gate divye mahānadī
c darśayām āsa taṃ gaṅgā tadā mūrtimatī svayam
 gaṅgovāca
a kim icchasi mahārāja mattaḥ kiṃ ca dadāni te
c tad bravīhi naraśreṣṭha kariṣyāmi vacas tava
 lomaśa uvāca
a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca rājā haimavatīṃ tadā
b tadā bhagīratho rājan praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ
c pitāmahā me varade kapilena mahānadi
e anveṣamāṇās turagaṃ nītā vaivasvatakṣayam
a ṣaṣṭis tāni sahasrāṇi sāgarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
c kāpilaṃ teja āsādya kṣaṇena nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
a teṣām evaṃ vinaṣṭānāṃ svarge vāso na vidyate
c yāvat tāni śarīrāṇi tvaṃ jalair nābhiṣiñcasi
d tāvat svarge na vatsyaṃti mama pūrvapitāmahāḥ
d tāvat teṣāṃ gatir nāsti sāgarāṇāṃ mahānadi
a svargaṃ naya mahābhāge matpitṝn sagarātmajān
c teṣām arthe 'bhiyācāmi tvām ahaṃ vai mahānadi
a etac chrutvā vaco rājño gaṅgā lokanamaskṛtā
c bhagīratham idaṃ vākyaṃ suprītā samabhāṣata
a kariṣyāmi mahārāja vacas te nātra saṃśayaḥ
c vegaṃ tu mama durdhāryaṃ patantyā gaganāc cyutam
a na śaktas triṣu lokeṣu kaś cid dhārayituṃ nṛpa
c anyatra vibudhaśreṣṭhān nīlakaṇṭhān maheśvarāt
a taṃ toṣaya mahābāho tapasā varadaṃ haram
c sa tu māṃ pracyutāṃ devaḥ śirasā dhārayiṣyati
e kariṣyati ca te kāmaṃ pitṝṇāṃ hitakāmyayā
f tapasārādhitaḥ śaṃbhur bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
a etac chrutvā vaco rājan mahārājo bhagīrathaḥ
c kailāsaṃ parvataṃ gatvā toṣayām āsa śaṃkaram
a tatas tena samāgamya kālayogena kena cit
b gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ rājann ayācata mahīpatiḥ
c agṛhṇāc ca varaṃ tasmād gaṅgāyā dhāraṇaṃ nṛpa
e svargavāsaṃ samuddiśya pitṝṇāṃ sa narottamaḥ
 lomaśa uvāca
a bhagīrathavacaḥ śrutvā priyārthaṃ ca divaukasām
c evam astv iti rājānaṃ bhagavān pratyabhāṣata
a dhārayiṣye mahābāho gaganāt pracyutāṃ śivām
c divyāṃ devanadīṃ puṇyāṃ tvatkṛte nṛpasattama
a evam uktvā mahābāho himavantam upāgamat
c saṃvṛtaḥ pārṣadair ghorair nānāpraharaṇodyataiḥ
a tataḥ sthitvā naraśreṣṭhaṃ bhagīratham uvāca ha
c prayācasva mahābāho śailarājasutāṃ nadīm
d pitṝṇāṃ pāvanārthaṃ te tām ahaṃ manujādhipa
e patamānāṃ saricchreṣṭhāṃ dhārayiṣye triviṣṭapāt
a etac chrutvā vaco rājā śarveṇa samudāhṛtam
c prayataḥ praṇato bhūtvā gaṅgāṃ samanucintayat
a tataḥ puṇyajalā ramyā rājñā samanucintitā
c īśānaṃ ca sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā gaganāt sahasā cyutā
a tāṃ pracyutāṃ tato dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sārdhaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
c gandharvoragarakṣāṃsi samājagmur didṛkṣayā
a tataḥ papāta gaganād gaṅgā himavataḥ sutā
c samudbhrāntamahāvartā mīnagrāhasamākulā
a tāṃ dadhāra haro rājan gaṅgāṃ gaganamekhalām
c lalāṭadeśe patitāṃ mālāṃ muktāmayīm iva
a sā babhūva visarpantī tridhā rājan samudragā
c phenapuñjākulajalā haṃsānām iva paṅktayaḥ
a kva cid ābhogakuṭilā praskhalantī kva cit kva cit
c svaphenapaṭasaṃvītā matteva pramadāvrajat
e kva cit sā toyaninadair nadantī nādam uttamam
f kva cid ākāśam āvartaiḥ saṃkṣipantīva sarvaśaḥ
a evaṃ prakārān subahūn kurvantī gaganāc cyutā
c pṛthivītalam āsādya bhagīratham athābravīt
a darśayasva mahārāja mārgaṃ kena vrajāmy aham
c tvadartham avatīrṇāsmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpate
a etac chrutvā vaco rājā prātiṣṭhata bhagīrathaḥ
c yatra tāni śarīrāṇi sāgarāṇāṃ mahātmanām
d prāpayām āsa dharmajñaḥ pitṛdevāntikaṃ nadīm
e pāvanārthaṃ naraśreṣṭha puṇyena salilena ha
a gaṅgāyā dhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā haro lokanamaskṛtaḥ
c kailāsaṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ jagāma tridaśaiḥ saha
a samudraṃ ca samāsādya gaṅgayā sahito nṛpaḥ
c pūrayām āsa vegena samudraṃ varuṇālayam
d jahnunā ca dhṛtā muktā jāhnavī tena saṃsmṛtā
a duhitṛtve ca nṛpatir gaṅgāṃ samanukalpayat
c pitṝṇāṃ codakaṃ tatra dadau pūrṇamanorathaḥ
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ gaṅgā tripathagā yathā
c pūraṇārthaṃ samudrasya pṛthivīm avatāritā
d kāleyāś ca yathā rājaṃs tridaśair vinipātitāḥ
a samudraś ca yathā pītaḥ kāraṇārthe mahātmanā
c vātāpiś ca yathā nītaḥ kṣayaṃ sa brahmahā prabho
e agastyena mahārāja yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ prayātaḥ kaunteyaḥ krameṇa bharatarṣabha
c nandām aparanandāṃ ca nadyau pāpabhayāpahe
a sa parvataṃ samāsādya hemakūṭam anāmayam
c acintyān adbhutān bhāvān dadarśa subahūn nṛpaḥ
a vāco yatrābhavan meghā upalāś ca sahasraśaḥ
c nāśaknuvaṃs tam āroḍhuṃ viṣaṇṇamanaso janāḥ
a vāyur nityaṃ vavau yatra nityaṃ devaś ca varṣati
b svādhyāyaghoṣaś ca tathā śrūyate na ca dṛśyate
b makṣikāś cādaśaṃs tatra tapasaḥ pratighātikāḥ
b nirvedo jāyate tatra gṛhāṇi smarate janaḥ
c sāyaṃ prātaś ca bhagavān dṛśyate havyavāhanaḥ
a evaṃ bahuvidhān bhāvān adbhutān vīkṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
c lomaśaṃ punar eva sma paryapṛcchat tad adbhutam
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d yad etad bhagavaṃś citraṃ parvate 'smin mahaujasi
d etan me sarvam ācakṣva vistareṇa mahādyute
 lomaśa uvāca
a yathāśrutam idaṃ pūrvam asmābhir arikarśana
c tad ekāgramanā rājan nibodha gadato mama
a asminn ṛṣabhakūṭe 'bhūd ṛṣabho nāma tāpasaḥ
c anekaśatavarṣāyus tapasvī kopano bhṛśam
a sa vai saṃbhāṣyamāṇo 'nyaiḥ kopād girim uvāca ha
c ya iha vyāharet kaś cid upalān utsṛjes tadā
a vātaṃ cāhūya mā śabdam ity uvāca sa tāpasaḥ
c vyāharaṃś caiva puruṣo meghena vinivāryate
a evam etāni karmāṇi rājaṃs tena maharṣiṇā
c kṛtāni kāni cit kopāt pratiṣiddhāni kāni cit
a nandām abhigatān devān purā rājann iti śrutiḥ
c anvapadyanta sahasā puruṣā devadarśinaḥ
a te darśanam anicchanto devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
c durgaṃ cakrur imaṃ deśaṃ giripratyūharūpakam
a tadā prabhṛti kaunteya narā girim imaṃ sadā
c nāśaknuvan abhidraṣṭuṃ kuta evādhirohitum
a nātaptatapasā śakyo draṣṭum eṣa mahāgiriḥ
c āroḍhuṃ vāpi kaunteya tasmān niyatavāg bhava
a iha devāḥ sadā sarve yajñān ājahrur uttamān
c teṣām etāni liṅgāni dṛśyante 'dyāpi bhārata
a kuśākāreva dūrveyaṃ saṃstīrṇeva ca bhūr iyam
c yūpaprakārā bahavo vṛkṣāś ceme viśāṃ pate
a devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva vasanty adyāpi bhārata
c teṣāṃ sāyaṃ tathā prātar dṛśyate havyavāhanaḥ
a ihāplutānāṃ kaunteya sadyaḥ pāpmā vihanyate
c kuruśreṣṭhābhiṣekaṃ vai tasmāt kuru sahānujaḥ
a tato nandāplutāṅgas tvaṃ kauśikīm abhiyāsyasi
c viśvāmitreṇa yatrograṃ tapas taptam anuttamam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatas tatra samāplutya gātrāṇi sagaṇo nṛpaḥ
c jagāma kauśikīṃ puṇyāṃ ramyāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm
 lomaśa uvāca
a eṣā devanadī puṇyā kauśikī bharatarṣabha
c viśvāmitrāśramo ramya eṣa cātra prakāśate
a āśramaś caiva puṇyākhyaḥ kāśyapasya mahātmanaḥ
c ṛśyaśṛṅgaḥ suto yasya tapasvī saṃyatendriyaḥ
a tapaso yaḥ prabhāvena varṣayām āsa vāsavam
c anāvṛṣṭyāṃ bhayād yasya vavarṣa balavṛtrahā
a mṛgyāṃ jātaḥ sa tejasvī kāśyapasya sutaḥ prabhuḥ
c viṣaye lomapādasya yaś cakārādbhutaṃ mahat
a nivartiteṣu sasyeṣu yasmai śāntāṃ dadau nṛpaḥ
