c adhomukhaṃ dhyānaparaṃ tadānīm
aṣṭāvakraṃ cāpy udīryantam eva
a tasmiṃs tathā saṃkule vartamāne
sphīte yajñe janakasyātha rājñaḥ
c aṣṭāvakraṃ pūjayanto 'bhyupeyur
viprāḥ sarve prāñjalayaḥ pratītāḥ
 aṣṭāvakra uvāca
a anena vai brāhmaṇāḥ śuśruvāṃso
vāde jitvā salile majjitāḥ kila
c tān eva dharmān ayam adya bandī
prāpnotu gṛhyāpsu nimajjayainam
 bandy uvāca
a ahaṃ putro varuṇasyota rājñas
tatrāsa satraṃ dvādaśavārṣikaṃ vai
c satreṇa te janaka tulyakālaṃ
tadarthaṃ te prahitā me dvijāgryāḥ
a ete sarve varuṇasyota yajñaṃ
draṣṭuṃ gatā iha āyānti bhūyaḥ
c aṣṭāvakraṃ pūjaye pūjanīyaṃ
yasya hetor janitāraṃ sameṣye
 aṣṭāvakra uvāca
a viprāḥ samudrāmbhasi majjitās te
vācā jitā medhayā āvidānāḥ
c tāṃ medhayā vācam athojjahāra
yathā vācam avacinvanti santaḥ
a agnir dahañ jātavedāḥ satāṃ gṛhān
visarjayaṃs tejasā na sma dhākṣīt
c bāleṣu putreṣu kṛpaṇaṃ vadatsu
tathā vācam avacinvanti santaḥ
a śleṣmātakī kṣīṇavarcāḥ śṛṇoṣi
utāho tvāṃ stutayo mādayanti
c hastīva tvaṃ janaka vitudyamāno
na māmikāṃ vācam imāṃ śṛṇoṣi
 janaka uvāca
a śṛṇomi vācaṃ tava divyarūpām
amānuṣīṃ divyarūpo 'si sākṣāt
c ajaiṣīr yad bandinaṃ tvaṃ vivāde
nisṛṣṭa eṣa tava kāmo 'dya bandī
 aṣṭāvakra uvāca
a nānena jīvatā kaś cid artho me bandinā nṛpa
c pitā yady asya varuṇo majjayainaṃ jalāśaye
 bandy uvāca
a ahaṃ putro varuṇasyota rājño
na me bhayaṃ salile majjitasya
c imaṃ muhūrtaṃ pitaraṃ drakṣyate 'yam
aṣṭāvakraś ciranaṣṭaṃ kahoḍam
 lomaśa uvāca
a tatas te pūjitā viprā varuṇena mahātmanā
c udatiṣṭhanta te sarve janakasya samīpataḥ
 kahoḍa uvāca
a ityartham icchanti sutāñ janā janaka karmaṇā
c yad ahaṃ nāśakaṃ kartuṃ tat putraḥ kṛtavān mama
a utābalasya balavān uta bālasya paṇḍitaḥ
c uta vāviduṣo vidvān putro janaka jāyate
 bandy uvāca
a śitena te paraśunā svayam evāntako nṛpa
c śirāṃsy apāharatv ājau ripūṇāṃ bhadram astu te
a mahad ukthyaṃ gīyate sāma cāgryaṃ
samyak somaḥ pīyate cātra satre
c śucīn bhāgān pratijagṛhuś ca hṛṣṭāḥ
sākṣād devā janakasyeha yajñe
 lomaśa uvāca
a samutthiteṣv atha sarveṣu rājan
vipreṣu teṣv adhikaṃ suprabheṣu
c anujñāto janakenātha rājñā
viveśa toyaṃ sāgarasyota bandī
a aṣṭāvakraḥ pitaraṃ pūjayitvā
saṃpūjito brāhmaṇais tair yathāvat
c pratyājagāmāśramam eva cāgryaṃ
jitvā bandiṃ sahito mātulena
d tato 'ṣṭāvakraṃ mātur athāntike pitā
d nadīṃ samaṃgāṃ śīghram imāṃ viśasva
d provāca caināṃ sa tathā viveśa
d samair aṅgaiś cāpi babhūva sadyaḥ
d nadī samaṃgā ca babhūva puṇyā
d yasyāṃ snāto mucyate kilbiṣād dhi
d tvam apy enāṃ snānapānāvagāhaiḥ
d sabhrātṛkaḥ sahabhāryo viśasva
a atra kaunteya sahito bhrātṛbhis tvaṃ
sukhoṣitaḥ saha vipraiḥ pratītaḥ
c puṇyāny anyāni śucikarmaikabhaktir
mayā sārdhaṃ caritāsy ājamīḍha
da   puṇyāny anyāni pāsyasi
da puṇyanadyāḥ sutīrthāni dhutapāpmā gataklamaḥ
da bhāvena dṛḍhabhaktyā ca mayā sārdhaṃ cariṣyasi
 lomaśa uvāca
a eṣā madhuvilā rājan samaṅgā saṃprakāśate
c etat kardamilaṃ nāma bharatasyābhiṣecanam
a alakṣmyā kila saṃyukto vṛtraṃ hatvā śacīpatiḥ
c āplutaḥ sarvapāpebhyaḥ samaṅgāyāṃ vyamucyata
a etad vinaśanaṃ kukṣau mainākasya nararṣabha
c aditir yatra putrārthaṃ tadannam apacat purā
a enaṃ parvatarājānam āruhya puruṣarṣabha
c ayaśasyām asaṃśabdyām alakṣmīṃ vyapanotsyatha
a ete kanakhalā rājan ṛṣīṇāṃ dayitā nagāḥ
c eṣā prakāśate gaṅgā yudhiṣṭhira mahānadī
a sanatkumāro bhagavān atra siddhim agāt parām
c ājamīḍhāvagāhyaināṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramokṣyase
a apāṃ hradaṃ ca puṇyākhyaṃ bhṛgutuṅgaṃ ca parvatam
c tūṣṇīṃ gaṅgāṃ ca kaunteya sāmātyaḥ samupaspṛśa
a āśramaḥ sthūlaśiraso ramaṇīyaḥ prakāśate
c atra mānaṃ ca kaunteya krodhaṃ caiva vivarjaya
a eṣa raibhyāśramaḥ śrīmān pāṇḍaveya prakāśate
b nānāpuṣpasamākīrṇaḥ phalapuṣpopaśobhitaḥ
b nānāvihagasaṃghuṣṭas tāpasālaya uttamaḥ
b raibhyasyaiṣa mahārāja āśramaḥ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ
c bhāradvājo yatra kavir yavakrīto vyanaśyata
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃyukto 'bhavad ṛṣir bharadvājaḥ pratāpavān
c kimarthaṃ ca yavakrīta ṛṣiputro vyanaśyata
a etat sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ śrotum icchāmi lomaśa
c karmabhir devakalpānāṃ kīrtyamānair bhṛśaṃ rame
 lomaśa uvāca
a bharadvājaś ca raibhyaś ca sakhāyau saṃbabhūvatuḥ
c tāv ūṣatur ihātyantaṃ prīyamāṇau vanāntare
a raibhyasya tu sutāv āstām arvāvasuparāvasū
c āsīd yavakrīḥ putras tu bharadvājasya bhārata
a raibhyo vidvān sahāpatyas tapasvī cetaro 'bhavat
c tayoś cāpy atulā prītir bālyāt prabhṛti bhārata
a yavakrīḥ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tapasvinam asatkṛtam
c dṛṣṭvā ca satkṛtaṃ viprai raibhyaṃ putraiḥ sahānagha
a paryatapyata tejasvī manyunābhipariplutaḥ
c tapas tepe tato ghoraṃ vedajñānāya pāṇḍava
a susamiddhe mahaty agnau śarīram upatāpayan
c janayām āsa saṃtāpam indrasya sumahātapāḥ
a tata indro yavakrītam upagamya yudhiṣṭhira
c abravīt kasya hetos tvam āsthitas tapa uttamam
 yavakrīr uvāca
a dvijānām anadhītā vai vedāḥ suragaṇārcita
c pratibhāntv iti tapye 'ham idaṃ paramakaṃ tapaḥ
a svādhyāyārthe samārambho mamāyaṃ pākaśāsana
c tapasā jñātum icchāmi sarvajñānāni kauśika
a kālena mahatā vedāḥ śakyā gurumukhād vibho
c prāptuṃ tasmād ayaṃ yatnaḥ paramo me samāsthitaḥ
 indra uvāca
a amārga eṣa viprarṣe yena tvaṃ yātum icchasi
c kiṃ vighātena te vipra gacchādhīhi guror mukhāt
 lomaśa uvāca
a evam uktvā gataḥ śakro yavakrīr api bhārata
c bhūya evākarod yatnaṃ tapasy amitavikrama
a ghoreṇa tapasā rājaṃs tapyamāno mahātapāḥ
c saṃtāpayām āsa bhṛśaṃ devendram iti naḥ śrutam
a taṃ tathā tapyamānaṃ tu tapas tīvraṃ mahāmunim
c upetya balabhid devo vārayām āsa vai punaḥ
a aśakyo 'rthaḥ samārabdho naitad buddhikṛtaṃ tava
c pratibhāsyanti vai vedās tava caiva pituś ca te
 yavakrīr uvāca
a na caitad evaṃ kriyate devarāja mamepsitam
c mahatā niyamenāhaṃ tapsye ghorataraṃ tapaḥ
a samiddhe 'gnāv upakṛtyāṅgam aṅgaṃ
hoṣyāmi vā maghavaṃs tan nibodha
c yady etad evaṃ na karoṣi kāmaṃ
mamepsitaṃ devarājeha sarvam
 lomaśa uvāca
a niścayaṃ tam abhijñāya munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
c prativāraṇahetvarthaṃ buddhyā saṃcintya buddhimān
a tata indro 'karod rūpaṃ brāhmaṇasya tapasvinaḥ
c anekaśatavarṣasya durbalasya sayakṣmaṇaḥ
a yavakrītasya yat tīrtham ucitaṃ śaucakarmaṇi
c bhāgīrathyāṃ tatra setuṃ vālukābhiś cakāra saḥ
a yadāsya vadato vākyaṃ na sa cakre dvijottamaḥ
c vālukābhis tataḥ śakro gaṅgāṃ samabhipūrayan
a vālukāmuṣṭim aniśaṃ bhāgīrathyāṃ vyasarjayat
c setum abhyārabhac chakro yavakrītaṃ nidarśayan
a taṃ dadarśa yavakrīs tu yatnavantaṃ nibandhane
c prahasaṃś cābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ
a kim idaṃ vartate brahman kiṃ ca te ha cikīrṣitam
c atīva hi mahān yatnaḥ kriyate 'yaṃ nirarthakaḥ
 indra uvāca
a bandhiṣye setunā gaṅgāṃ sukhaḥ panthā bhaviṣyati
c kliśyate hi janas tāta taramāṇaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
 yavakrīr uvāca
a nāyaṃ śakyas tvayā baddhuṃ mahān oghaḥ kathaṃ cana
c aśakyād vinivartasva śakyam arthaṃ samārabha
 indra uvāca
a yathaiva bhavatā cedaṃ tapo vedārtham udyatam
c aśakyaṃ tadvad asmābhir ayaṃ bhāraḥ samudyataḥ
 yavakrīr uvāca
a yathā tava nirartho 'yam ārambhas tridaśeśvara
c tathā yadi mamāpīdaṃ manyase pākaśāsana
a kriyatāṃ yad bhavec chakyaṃ mayā suragaṇeśvara
c varāṃś ca me prayacchānyān yair anyān bhavitāsmy ati
 lomaśa uvāca
a tasmai prādād varān indra uktavān yān mahātapāḥ
c pratibhāsyanti te vedāḥ pitrā saha yathepsitāḥ
a yac cānyat kāṅkṣase kāmaṃ yavakrīr gamyatām iti
c sa labdhakāmaḥ pitaram upetyātha tato 'bravīt
 yavakrīr uvāca
a pratibhāsyanti vai vedā mama tātasya cobhayoḥ
c ati cānyān bhaviṣyāvo varā labdhās tathā mayā
 bharadvāja uvāca
a darpas te bhavitā tāta varāṃl labdhvā yathepsitān
c sa darpapūrṇaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ kṣipram eva vinaśyasi
a atrāpy udāharantīmā gāthā devair udāhṛtāḥ
c ṛṣir āsīt purā putra bāladhir nāma vīryavān
a sa putraśokād udvignas tapas tepe suduścaram
c bhaven mama suto 'martya iti taṃ labdhavāṃś ca saḥ
a tasya prasādo devaiś ca kṛto na tv amaraiḥ samaḥ
c nāmartyo vidyate martyo nimittāyur bhaviṣyati
 bāladhir uvāca
a yatheme parvatāḥ śaśvat tiṣṭhanti surasattamāḥ
c akṣayās tan nimittaṃ me sutasyāyur bhaved iti
 bharadvāja uvāca
a tasya putras tadā jajñe medhāvī krodhanaḥ sadā
c sa tac chrutvākarod darpam ṛṣīṃś caivāvamanyata
a vikurvāṇo munīnāṃ tu caramāṇo mahīm imām
c āsasāda mahāvīryaṃ dhanuṣākṣaṃ manīṣiṇam
a tasyāpacakre medhāvī taṃ śaśāpa sa vīryavān
c bhava bhasmeti coktaḥ sa na bhasma samapadyata
a dhanuṣākṣas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā medhāvinam anāmayam
b munis tat kāraṇaṃ jñātvā svayaṃ mahiṣarūpadhṛk
b śṛṅgeṇādrīn acalayat tato 'yaṃ bhasmasād abhūt
c nimittam asya mahiṣair bhedayām āsa vīryavān
a sa nimitte vinaṣṭe tu mamāra sahasā śiśuḥ
c taṃ mṛtaṃ putram ādāya vilalāpa tataḥ pitā
a lālapyamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ punar ārtavat
c ūcur vedoktayā pūrvaṃ gāthayā tan nibodha me
a na diṣṭam artham atyetum īśo martyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c mahiṣair bhedayām āsa dhanuṣākṣo mahīdharān
a evaṃ labdhvā varān bālā darpapūrṇās tarasvinaḥ
c kṣipram eva vinaśyanti yathā na syāt tathā bhavān
a eṣa raibhyo mahāvīryaḥ putrau cāsya tathāvidhau
c taṃ yathā putra nābhyeṣi tathā kuryās tv atandritaḥ
a sa hi kruddhaḥ samarthas tvāṃ putra pīḍayituṃ ruṣā
c vaidyaś cāpi tapasvī ca kopanaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
 yavakrīr uvāca
a evaṃ kariṣye mā tāpaṃ tāta kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
c yathā hi me bhavān mānyas tathā raibhyaḥ pitā mama
 lomaśa uvāca
a uktvā sa pitaraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ yavakrīr akutobhayaḥ
c viprakurvann ṛṣīn anyān atuṣyat parayā mudā
 lomaśa uvāca
a caṅkramyamāṇaḥ sa tadā yavakrīr akutobhayaḥ
c jagāma mādhave māsi raibhyāśramapadaṃ prati
a sa dadarśāśrame puṇye puṣpitadrumabhūṣite
c vicarantīṃ snuṣāṃ tasya kiṃnarīm iva bhārata
a yavakrīs tām uvācedam upatiṣṭhasva mām iti
c nirlajjo lajjayā yuktāṃ kāmena hṛtacetanaḥ
a sā tasya śīlam ājñāya tasmāc chāpāc ca bibhyatī
c tejasvitāṃ ca raibhyasya tathety uktvā jagāma sā
d athāśramapadaṃ prāpya yavakrītena yācitā
d pativratā yavakrīta
a tata ekāntam unnīya majjayām āsa bhārata
c ājagāma tadā raibhyaḥ svam āśramam ariṃdama
a rudantīṃ ca snuṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāryām ārtāṃ parāvasoḥ
c sāntvayañ ślakṣṇayā vācā paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhira
a sā tasmai sarvam ācaṣṭa yavakrībhāṣitaṃ śubhā
c pratyuktaṃ ca yavakrītaṃ prekṣāpūrvaṃ tadātmanā
a śṛṇvānasyaiva raibhyasya yavakrītaviceṣṭitam
c dahann iva tadā cetaḥ krodhaḥ samabhavan mahān
a sa tadā manyunāviṣṭas tapasvī bhṛśakopanaḥ
c avalupya jaṭām ekāṃ juhāvāgnau susaṃskṛte
a tataḥ samabhavan nārī tasyā rūpeṇa saṃmitā
c avalupyāparāṃ cātha juhāvāgnau jaṭāṃ punaḥ
a tataḥ samabhavad rakṣo ghorākṣaṃ bhīmadarśanam
c abrūtāṃ tau tadā raibhyaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāmahe
a tāv abravīd ṛṣiḥ kruddho yavakrīr vadhyatām iti
c jagmatus tau tathety uktvā yavakrītajighāṃsayā
d tataḥ snuṣākṛtīkṛtya yavakrītam upāgamat
d yavakrīto 'pi raibhyasya snuṣāṃ matvā jagāma tām
a tatas taṃ samupāsthāya kṛtyā sṛṣṭā mahātmanā
c kamaṇḍaluṃ jahārāsya mohayitvā tu bhārata
a ucchiṣṭaṃ tu yavakrītam apakṛṣṭakamaṇḍalum
c tata udyataśūlaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ samupādravat
a tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya śūlahastaṃ jighāṃsayā
c yavakrīḥ sahasotthāya prādravad yena vai saraḥ
a jalahīnaṃ saro dṛṣṭvā yavakrīs tvaritaḥ punaḥ
c jagāma saritaḥ sarvās tāś cāpy āsan viśoṣitāḥ
a sa kālyamāno ghoreṇa śūlahastena rakṣasā
c agnihotraṃ pitur bhītaḥ sahasā samupādravat
a sa vai praviśamānas tu śūdreṇāndhena rakṣiṇā
c nigṛhīto balād dvāri so 'vātiṣṭhata pārthiva
a nigṛhītaṃ tu śūdreṇa yavakrītaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ
c tāḍayām āsa śūlena sa bhinnahṛdayo 'patat
a yavakrītaṃ sa hatvā tu rākṣaso raibhyam āgamat
c anujñātas tu raibhyeṇa tayā nāryā sahācarat
 lomaśa uvāca
a bharadvājas tu kaunteya kṛtvā svādhyāyam āhnikam
c samitkalāpam ādāya praviveśa svam āśramam
a taṃ sma dṛṣṭvā purā sarve pratyuttiṣṭhanti pāvakāḥ
c na tv enam upatiṣṭhanti hataputraṃ tadāgnayaḥ
d putramṛtyujam āśaucaṃ bharadvājo na jajñivān
a vaikṛtaṃ tv agnihotre sa lakṣayitvā mahātapāḥ
c tam andhaṃ śūdram āsīnaṃ gṛhapālam athābravīt
a kiṃ nu me nāgnayaḥ śūdra pratinandanti darśanam
c tvaṃ cāpi na yathāpūrvaṃ kaccit kṣemam ihāśrame
a kaccin na raibhyaṃ putro me gatavān alpacetanaḥ
c etad ācakṣva me śīghraṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ
 śūdra uvāca
a raibhyaṃ gato nūnam asau sutas te mandacetanaḥ
c tathā hi nihataḥ śete rākṣasena balīyasā
a prakālyamānas tenāyaṃ śūlahastena rakṣasā
c agnyāgāraṃ prati dvāri mayā dorbhyāṃ nivāritaḥ
a tataḥ sa nihato hy atra jalakāmo 'śucir dhruvam
c saṃbhāvito hi tūrṇena śūlahastena rakṣasā
 lomaśa uvāca
a bharadvājas tu śūdrasya tac chrutvā vipriyaṃ vacaḥ
c gatāsuṃ putram ādāya vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ
a brāhmaṇānāṃ kilārthāya nanu tvaṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ
c dvijānām anadhītā vai vedāḥ saṃpratibhāntv iti
a tathā kalyāṇaśīlas tvaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu mahātmasu
c anāgāḥ sarvabhūteṣu karkaśatvam upeyivān
a pratiṣiddho mayā tāta raibhyāvasathadarśanāt
c gatavān eva taṃ kṣudraṃ kālāntakayamopamam
a yaḥ sa jānan mahātejā vṛddhasyaikaṃ mamātmajam
c gatavān eva kopasya vaśaṃ paramadurmatiḥ
a putraśokam anuprāpya eṣa raibhyasya karmaṇā
c tyakṣyāmi tvām ṛte putra prāṇān iṣṭatamān bhuvi
a yathāhaṃ putraśokena dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi kilbiṣī
c tathā jyeṣṭhaḥ suto raibhyaṃ hiṃsyāc chīghram anāgasam
a sukhino vai narā yeṣāṃ jātyā putro na vidyate
c te putraśokam aprāpya vicaranti yathāsukham
a ye tu putrakṛtāc chokād bhṛśaṃ vyākulacetasaḥ
c śapantīṣṭān sakhīn ārtās tebhyaḥ pāpataro nu kaḥ
a parāsuś ca suto dṛṣṭaḥ śaptaś ceṣṭaḥ sakhā mayā
c īdṛśīm āpadaṃ ko nu dvitīyo 'nubhaviṣyati
a vilapyaivaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bharadvājo 'dahat sutam
c susamiddhaṃ tataḥ paścāt praviveśa hutāśanam
 lomaśa uvāca
a etasminn eva kāle tu bṛhaddyumno mahīpatiḥ
c satram āste mahābhāgo raibhyayājyaḥ pratāpavān
a tena raibhyasya vai putrāv arvāvasuparāvasū
c vṛtau sahāyau satrārthe bṛhaddyumnena dhīmatā
a tatra tau samanujñātau pitrā kaunteya jagmatuḥ
c āśrame tv abhavad raibhyo bhāryā caiva parāvasoḥ
a athāvalokako 'gacchad gṛhān ekaḥ parāvasuḥ
c kṛṣṇājinena saṃvītaṃ dadarśa pitaraṃ vane
a jaghanyarātre nidrāndhaḥ sāvaśeṣe tamasy api
c carantaṃ gahane 'raṇye mene sa pitaraṃ mṛgam
a mṛgaṃ tu manyamānena pitā vai tena hiṃsitaḥ
c akāmayānena tadā śarīratrāṇam icchatā
d tataḥ samīpam āsādya pitaraṃ dṛṣṭavān hatam
d ajñānāt pitaraṃ hatvā mṛgabuddhyā parāvasuḥ
d vilapya bahudhā rājan raibhyasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a sa tasya pretakāryāṇi kṛtvā sarvāṇi bhārata
c punar āgamya tat satram abravīd bhrātaraṃ vacaḥ
a idaṃ karma na śaktas tvaṃ voḍhum ekaḥ kathaṃ cana
c mayā tu hiṃsitas tāto manyamānena taṃ mṛgam
a so 'smadarthe vrataṃ sādhu cara tvaṃ brahmahiṃsanam
c samartho hy aham ekākī karma kartum idaṃ mune
 arvāvasur uvāca
a karotu vai bhavān satraṃ bṛhaddyumnasya dhīmataḥ
c brahmahatyāṃ cariṣye 'haṃ tvadarthaṃ niyatendriyaḥ
d so 'gacchad vanam ekāgro brahmahatyāvrataṃ caran
d tac chrutvārvāvasuḥ paścāt prāyaścittaṃ vidhāya ca
 lomaśa uvāca
a sa tasyā brahmahatyāyāḥ pāraṃ gatvā yudhiṣṭhira
c arvāvasus tadā satram ājagāma punar muniḥ
a tataḥ parāvasur dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ samupasthitam
c bṛhaddyumnam uvācedaṃ vacanaṃ pariṣadgatam
a eṣa te brahmahā yajñaṃ mā draṣṭuṃ praviśed iti
c brahmahā prekṣitenāpi pīḍayet tvāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d lomaśa uvāca
d tac chrutvaiva tadā rājā preṣyān āha sa viṭpate
a preṣyair utsāryamāṇas tu rājann arvāvasus tadā
c na mayā brahmahatyeyaṃ kṛtety āha punaḥ punaḥ
a ucyamāno 'sakṛt preṣyair brahmahann iti bhārata
c naiva sa pratijānāti brahmahatyāṃ svayaṃ kṛtām
e mama bhrātrā kṛtam idaṃ mayā tu parirakṣitam
f sa tathā pravadan krodhāt taiś ca preṣyaiḥ prabhāṣitaḥ
f tūṣṇīṃ jagāma brahmarṣir vanam eva mahātapāḥ
f ugraṃ tapaḥ samāsthāya divākaram athāśritaḥ
f rahasyavedaṃ kṛtavān sūryasya dvijasattamaḥ
f mūrtimāṃs taṃ dadarśātha svayam agrabhug avyayaḥ
a prītās tasyābhavan devāḥ karmaṇārvāvasor nṛpa
c taṃ te pravarayām āsur nirāsuś ca parāvasum
a tato devā varaṃ tasmai dadur agnipurogamāḥ
c sa cāpi varayām āsa pitur utthānam ātmanaḥ
a anāgastvaṃ tathā bhrātuḥ pituś cāsmaraṇaṃ vadhe
c bharadvājasya cotthānaṃ yavakrītasya cobhayoḥ
d pratiṣṭhāṃ cāpi vedasya saurasya dvijasattamaḥ
d evam astv iti taṃ devāḥ procuś cāpi varān daduḥ
a tataḥ prādurbabhūvus te sarva eva yudhiṣṭhira
c athābravīd yavakrīto devān agnipurogamān
a samadhītaṃ mayā brahma vratāni caritāni ca
c kathaṃ nu raibhyaḥ śakto mām adhīyānaṃ tapasvinam
e tathāyuktena vidhinā nihantum amarottamāḥ
 devā ūcuḥ
a maivaṃ kṛthā yavakrīta yathā vadasi vai mune
c ṛte gurum adhītā hi sukhaṃ vedās tvayā purā
a anena tu gurūn duḥkhāt toṣayitvā svakarmaṇā
c kālena mahatā kleśād brahmādhigatam uttamam
 lomaśa uvāca
a yavakrītam athoktvaivaṃ devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
c saṃjīvayitvā tān sarvān punar jagmus triviṣṭapam
d tato vai sa yavakrīto brahmacaryaṃ cacāra ha
d aṣṭau daśa ca varṣāṇi triṃśataṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
a āśramas tasya puṇyo 'yaṃ sadāpuṣpaphaladrumaḥ
c atroṣya rājaśārdūla sarvapāpaiḥ pramokṣyase
 lomaśa uvāca
a uśīrabījaṃ mainākaṃ giriṃ śvetaṃ ca bhārata
c samatīto 'si kaunteya kālaśailaṃ ca pārthiva
a eṣā gaṅgā saptavidhā rājate bharatarṣabha
c sthānaṃ virajasaṃ ramyaṃ yatrāgnir nityam idhyate
a etad vai mānuṣeṇādya na śakyaṃ draṣṭum apy uta
c samādhiṃ kurutāvyagrās tīrthāny etāni drakṣyatha
d etad dṛśyati devānām ākrīḍaṃ caraṇāṅkitam
d atikrānto 'si kaunteya kālaśailaṃ ca parvatam
a śvetaṃ giriṃ pravekṣyāmo mandaraṃ caiva parvatam
c yatra māṇicaro yakṣaḥ kuberaś cāpi yakṣarāṭ
a aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi gandharvāḥ śīghracāriṇaḥ
c tathā kiṃpuruṣā rājan yakṣāś caiva caturguṇāḥ
a anekarūpasaṃsthānā nānāpraharaṇāś ca te
c yakṣendraṃ manujaśreṣṭha māṇibhadram upāsate
a teṣām ṛddhir atīvāgryā gatau vāyusamāś ca te
c sthānāt pracyāvayeyur ye devarājam api dhruvam
a tais tāta balibhir guptā yātudhānaiś ca rakṣitāḥ
c durgamāḥ parvatāḥ pārtha samādhiṃ paramaṃ kuru
a kuberasacivāś cānye raudrā maitrāś ca rākṣasāḥ
c taiḥ sameṣyāma kaunteya yatto vikramaṇe bhava
a kailāsaḥ parvato rājan ṣaḍyojanaśatāny uta
c yatra devāḥ samāyānti viśālā yatra bhārata
a asaṃkhyeyās tu kaunteya yakṣarākṣasakiṃnarāḥ
c nāgāḥ suparṇā gandharvāḥ kuberasadanaṃ prati
a tān vigāhasva pārthādya tapasā ca damena ca
c rakṣyamāṇo mayā rājan bhīmasenabalena ca
a svasti te varuṇo rājā yamaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ
c gaṅgā ca yamunā caiva parvataś ca dadhātu te
d marutaś ca sahāśvibhyāṃ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
d svasti devāsurebhyaś ca vasubhyaś ca mahādyute
a indrasya jāmbūnadaparvatāgre
śṛṇomi ghoṣaṃ tava devi gaṅge
c gopāyayemaṃ subhage giribhyaḥ
sarvājamīḍhāpacitaṃ narendram
e bhavasva śarma pravivikṣato 'sya
śailān imāñ śailasute nṛpasya
f uktvā tathā sāgaragāṃ sa vipro
f yatto bhavasveti śaśāsa pārtham
f śivapradā sarvasaritpradhāne
f sabhrātṛkasyeha yudhiṣṭhirasya
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a apūrvo 'yaṃ saṃbhramo lomaśasya
kṛṣṇāṃ sarve rakṣata mā pramādam
c deśo hy ayaṃ durgatamo mato 'sya
tasmāt paraṃ śaucam ihācaradhvam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato 'bravīd bhīmam udāravīryaṃ
kṛṣṇāṃ yattaḥ pālaya bhīmasena
c śūnye 'rjune 'saṃnihite ca tāta
tvam eva kṛṣṇāṃ bhajase 'sukheṣu
a tato mahātmā yamajau sametya
mūrdhany upāghrāya vimṛjya gātre
c uvāca tau bāṣpakalaṃ sa rājā
mā bhaiṣṭam āgacchatam apramattau
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a antarhitāni bhūtāni rakṣāṃsi balavanti ca
c agninā tapasā caiva śakyaṃ gantuṃ vṛkodara
a saṃnivartaya kaunteya kṣutpipāse balānvayāt
c tato balaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca saṃśrayasva kurūdvaha
a ṛṣes tvayā śrutaṃ vākyaṃ kailāsaṃ parvataṃ prati
c buddhyā prapaśya kaunteya kathaṃ kṛṣṇā gamiṣyati
a atha vā sahadevena dhaumyena ca sahābhibho
c sūdaiḥ paurogavaiś caiva sarvaiś ca paricārakaiḥ
a rathair aśvaiś ca ye cānye viprāḥ kleśāsahāḥ pathi
c sarvais tvaṃ sahito bhīma nivartasvāyatekṣaṇa
a trayo vayaṃ gamiṣyāmo laghvāhārā yatavratāḥ
c ahaṃ ca nakulaś caiva lomaśaś ca mahātapāḥ
a mamāgamanam ākāṅkṣan gaṅgādvāre samāhitaḥ
c vaseha draupadīṃ rakṣan yāvadāgamanaṃ mama
 bhīma uvāca
a rājaputrī śrameṇārtā duḥkhārtā caiva bhārata
c vrajaty eva hi kalyāṇī śvetavāhadidṛkṣayā
d apaśyantīha taṃ vīram evam eṣā suduḥkhitā
d kiṃ punar nakulaṃ tvāṃ ca taṃ ca vīraṃ dhanaṃjayam
a tava cāpy aratis tīvrā vardhate tam apaśyataḥ
b guḍākeśaṃ mahātmānaṃ saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyinam
c kiṃ punaḥ sahadevaṃ ca māṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca bhārata
a rathāḥ kāmaṃ nivartantāṃ sarve ca paricārakāḥ
c sūdāḥ paurogavāś caiva manyate yatra no bhavān
a na hy ahaṃ hātum icchāmi bhavantam iha karhi cit
c śaile 'smin rākṣasākīrṇe durgeṣu viṣameṣu ca
a iyaṃ cāpi mahābhāgā rājaputrī yatavratā
c tvām ṛte puruṣavyāghra notsahed vinivartitum
a tathaiva sahadevo 'yaṃ satataṃ tvām anuvrataḥ
c na jātu vinivarteta matajño hy aham asya vai
a api cātra mahārāja savyasācididṛkṣayā
c sarve lālasabhūtāḥ sma tasmād yāsyāmahe saha
a yady aśakyo rathair gantuṃ śailo 'yaṃ bahukandaraḥ
c padbhir eva gamiṣyāmo mā rājan vimanā bhava
a ahaṃ vahiṣye pāñcālīṃ yatra yatra na śakṣyati
c iti me vartate buddhir mā rājan vimanā bhava
a sukumārau tathā vīrau mādrīnandikarāv ubhau
c durge saṃtārayiṣyāmi yady aśaktau bhaviṣyataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya balaṃ bhīmābhivardhatām
c yas tvam utsahase voḍhuṃ draupadīṃ vipule 'dhvani
a yamajau cāpi bhadraṃ te naitad anyatra vidyate
c balaṃ ca te yaśaś caiva dharmaḥ kīrtiś ca vardhatām
a yas tvam utsahase netuṃ bhrātarau saha kṛṣṇayā
c mā te glānir mahābāho mā ca te 'stu parābhavaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ kṛṣṇābravīd vākyaṃ prahasantī manoramā
c gamiṣyāmi na saṃtāpaḥ kāryo māṃ prati bhārata
 lomaśa uvāca
a tapasā śakyate gantuṃ parvato gandhamādanaḥ
c tapasā caiva kaunteya sarve yokṣyāmahe vayam
a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca bhīmasenaś ca pārthiva
c ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca kaunteya drakṣyāmaḥ śvetavāhanam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇās te subāhor viṣayaṃ mahat
c dadṛśur muditā rājan prabhūtagajavājimat
a kirātataṅgaṇākīrṇaṃ kuṇindaśatasaṃkulam
c himavaty amarair juṣṭaṃ bahvāścaryasamākulam
a subāhuś cāpi tān dṛṣṭvā pūjayā pratyagṛhṇata
c viṣayānte kuṇindānām īśvaraḥ prītipūrvakam
a tatra te pūjitās tena sarva eva sukhoṣitāḥ
c pratasthur vimale sūrye himavantaṃ giriṃ prati
a indrasenamukhāṃś caiva bhṛtyān paurogavāṃs tathā
c sūdāṃś ca paribarhaṃ ca draupadyāḥ sarvaśo nṛpa
a rājñaḥ kuṇindādhipateḥ paridāya mahārathāḥ
c padbhir eva mahāvīryā yayuḥ kauravanandanāḥ
a te śanaiḥ prādravan sarve kṛṣṇayā saha pāṇḍavāḥ
c tasmād deśāt susaṃhṛṣṭā draṣṭukāmā dhanaṃjayam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bhīmasena yamau cobhau pāñcāli ca nibodhata
c nāsti bhūtasya nāśo vai paśyatāsmān vanecarān
a durbalāḥ kleśitāḥ smeti yad bravīthetaretaram
c aśakye 'pi vrajāmeti dhanaṃjayadidṛkṣayā
a tan me dahati gātrāṇi tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ
c yac ca vīraṃ na paśyāmi dhanaṃjayam upāntike
a tasya darśanatṛṣṇaṃ māṃ sānujaṃ vanam āsthitam
c yājñasenyāḥ parāmarśaḥ sa ca vīra dahaty uta
a nakulāt pūrvajaṃ pārthaṃ na paśyāmy amitaujasam
c ajeyam ugradhanvānaṃ tena tapye vṛkodara
a tīrthāni caiva ramyāṇi vanāni ca sarāṃsi ca
c carāmi saha yuṣmābhis tasya darśanakāṅkṣayā
a pañca varṣāṇy ahaṃ vīraṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ dhanaṃjayam
c yan na paśyāmi bībhatsuṃ tena tapye vṛkodara
a taṃ vai śyāmaṃ guḍākeśaṃ siṃhavikrāntagāminam
c na paśyāmi mahābāhuṃ tena tapye vṛkodara
a kṛtāstraṃ nipuṇaṃ yuddhe pratimānaṃ dhanuṣmatām
c na paśyāmi naraśreṣṭhaṃ tena tapye vṛkodara
a carantam arisaṃgheṣu kālaṃ kruddham ivāntakam
c prabhinnam iva mātaṅgaṃ siṃhaskandhaṃ dhanaṃjayam
a yaḥ sa śakrād anavaro vīryeṇa draviṇena ca
c yamayoḥ pūrvajaḥ pārthaḥ śvetāśvo 'mitavikramaḥ
d nārāyaṇasamo yuddhe satyasaṃdho dṛḍhavrataḥ
d taṃ mamāpaśyato bhīma na śāntir hṛdayasya vai
a duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭaḥ svakṛtenānivartinā
c ajeyam ugradhanvānaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi phalgunam
a satataṃ yaḥ kṣamāśīlaḥ kṣipyamāṇo 'py aṇīyasā
c ṛjumārgaprapannasya śarmadātābhayasya ca
a sa tu jihmapravṛttasya māyayābhijighāṃsataḥ
c api vajradharasyāpi bhavet kālaviṣopamaḥ
a śatror api prapannasya so 'nṛśaṃsaḥ pratāpavān
c dātābhayasya bībhatsur amitātmā mahābalaḥ
a sarveṣām āśrayo 'smākaṃ raṇe 'rīṇāṃ pramarditā
c āhartā sarvaratnānāṃ sarveṣāṃ naḥ sukhāvahaḥ
a ratnāni yasya vīryeṇa divyāny āsan purā mama
c bahūni bahujātāni yāni prāptaḥ suyodhanaḥ
a yasya bāhubalād vīra sabhā cāsīt purā mama
c sarvaratnamayī khyātā triṣu lokeṣu pāṇḍava
a vāsudevasamaṃ vīrye kārtavīryasamaṃ yudhi
c ajeyam ajitaṃ yuddhe taṃ na paśyāmi phalgunam
a saṃkarṣaṇaṃ mahāvīryaṃ tvāṃ ca bhīmāparājitam
c anujātaḥ sa vīryeṇa vāsudevaṃ ca śatruhā
a yasya bāhubale tulyaḥ prabhāve ca puraṃdaraḥ
c jave vāyur mukhe somaḥ krodhe mṛtyuḥ sanātanaḥ
a te vayaṃ taṃ naravyāghraṃ sarve vīra didṛkṣavaḥ
c pravekṣyāmo mahābāho parvataṃ gandhamādanam
a viśālā badarī yatra naranārāyaṇāśramaḥ
c taṃ sadādhyuṣitaṃ yakṣair drakṣyāmo girim uttamam
a kuberanalinīṃ ramyāṃ rākṣasair abhirakṣitām
c padbhir eva gamiṣyāmas tapyamānā mahat tapaḥ
a nātaptatapasā śakyo deśo gantuṃ vṛkodara
c na nṛśaṃsena lubdhena nāpraśāntena bhārata
a tatra sarve gamiṣyāmo bhīmārjunapadaiṣiṇaḥ
c sāyudhā baddhanistriṃśāḥ saha viprair mahāvrataiḥ
a makṣikān maśakān daṃśān vyāghrān siṃhān sarīsṛpān
c prāpnoty aniyataḥ pārtha niyatas tān na paśyati
a te vayaṃ niyatātmānaḥ parvataṃ gandhamādanam
c pravekṣyāmo mitāhārā dhanaṃjayadidṛkṣavaḥ
d lomaśa uvāca
d draṣṭāraḥ parvatāḥ sarve nadyaḥ sapurakānanāḥ
d tīrthāni caiva śrīmanti spṛṣṭaṃ ca salilaṃ karaiḥ
d parvataṃ mandaraṃ divyam eṣa panthāḥ prayāsyati
d samāhitā nirudvignāḥ sarve bhavata pāṇḍavāḥ
d ayaṃ devanivāso vai gantavyo vo bhaviṣyati
d ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva divyānāṃ nivāsaḥ puṇyakarmaṇām
d eṣā śivajalā puṇyā yāti saumya mahānadī
d badarīprabhavā rājan devarṣigaṇasevitā
d eṣā vaihāyasair nityaṃ vālakhilyair mahātmabhiḥ
d arcitā copayātā ca gandharvaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
d atra sāma sma gāyanti sāmagāḥ puṇyanisvanāḥ
d marīciḥ pulahaś caiva bhṛguś caivāṅgirās tathā
d atrāhnikaṃ suraśreṣṭho japate samarudgaṇaḥ
d sādhyāś caivāśvinau caiva paridhāvanti taṃ tadā
d candramāḥ saha sūryeṇa jyotīṃṣi ca grahaiḥ saha
d ahorātravibhāgena nadīm enām anuvrajan
d etasyāḥ salilaṃ mūrdhnā vṛṣāṅkaḥ paryadhārayat
d gaṅgādvāre mahābhāga yena lokasthitir bhavet
d etāṃ bhagavatīṃ devīṃ bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi
d prayatenātmanā tāta pratigamyābhivādata
d tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā lomaśasya mahātmanaḥ
d ākāśagaṅgāṃ prayatāḥ pāṇḍavās te 'bhyavādayan
d abhivādya ca te sarve pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
d punaḥ prayātāḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ sarvair ṛṣigaṇaiḥ saha
d tato dūrāt prakāśantaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ merusaṃnibham
d dadṛśus te naraśreṣṭhā vikīrṇaṃ sarvatodiśam
d tān praṣṭukāmān vijñāya pāṇḍavān sa tu lomaśaḥ
d uvāca vākyaṃ vākyajñaḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
d etad vikīrṇaṃ suśrīmat kailāsaśikharopamam
d yat paśyasi naraśreṣṭha parvatapratimaṃ sthitam
d etāny asthīni daityasya narakasya mahātmanaḥ
d parvatapratimaṃ bhāti parvataprastarāśritam
d purātanena devena viṣṇunā paramātmanā
d daityo vinihatas tāta surarājahitaiṣiṇā
d daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapas tapyan mahāmanāḥ
d aindraṃ prārthayate sthānaṃ tapaḥsvādhyāyavikramāt
d tapobalena mahatā bāhuvegabalena ca
d nityam eva durādharṣo dharṣayan sa diteḥ sutaḥ
d sa tu tasya balaṃ jñātvā dharme ca caritavratam
d bhayābhibhūtaḥ saṃvignaḥ śakra āsīt tadānagha
d tena saṃcintito devo manasā viṣṇur avyayaḥ
d sarvatragaḥ prabhuḥ śrīmān āgataś ca sthito babhau
d ṛṣayaś cāpi taṃ sarve tuṣṭuvuś ca divaukasaḥ
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā jvalamānaśrīr bhagavān havyavāhanaḥ
d naṣṭatejāḥ samabhavat tasya tejobhibhartsitaḥ
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā varadaṃ devaṃ viṣṇuṃ devagaṇeśvaram
d prāñjaliḥ praṇato bhūtvā namaskṛtya ca vajrabhṛt
d viṣṇur uvāca
d prāha vākyaṃ tatas tattvaṃ yatas tasya bhayaṃ bhavet
d jānāmi te bhayaṃ śakra daityendrān narakāt tataḥ
d aindraṃ prārthayate sthānaṃ tapaḥsiddhena karmaṇā
d so 'ham enaṃ tava prītyā tapaḥsiddham api dhruvam
d viyunajmi dehād devendra muhūrtaṃ pratipālaya
d tasya viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pāṇinā cetanāṃ harat
d sa papāta tato bhūmau girirāja ivāhataḥ
d tasyaitad asthisaṃghātaṃ māyāvinihatasya vai
d idaṃ dvitīyam aparaṃ viṣṇoḥ karma prakāśate
d naṣṭā vasumatī kṛtsnā pātāle caiva majjitā
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d punar uddharitā tena vārāheṇaikaśṛṅgiṇā
d bhagavan vistareṇemāṃ kathāṃ kathaya tattvataḥ
d kathaṃ tena sureśena naṣṭā vasumatī tadā
d yojanānāṃ śataṃ brahman punar uddharitā tadā
d kena caiva prakāreṇa jagato dharaṇī dhruvā
d śivā devī mahābhāgā sarvasasyaprarohiṇī
d kasya caiva prabhāvād dhi yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatā
d kenaitad vīryasarvasvaṃ darśitaṃ paramātmanaḥ
d etat sarvaṃ yathātattvam icchāmi dvijasattama
d lomaśa uvāca
d śrotuṃ vistaraśaḥ sarvaṃ tvaṃ hi tasya pratiśrayaḥ
d yat te 'haṃ paripṛṣṭo 'smi kathām etāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
d tat sarvam akhileneha śrūyatāṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
d purā kṛtayuge tāta vartamāne 'bhayaṃkare
d yamatvaṃ kārayām āsa ādidevaḥ purātanaḥ
d yamatvaṃ kurvatas tasya devadevasya dhīmataḥ
d na tatra mriyate kaś cij jāyate vā tathācyuta
d vardhante pakṣisaṃghāś ca tathā paśugaveḍakam
d gavāśvaṃ ca mṛgāś caiva sarve te piśitāśanāḥ
d tathā puruṣaśārdūla mānuṣāś ca paraṃtapa
d sahasraśo hy ayutaśo vardhante salilaṃ yathā
d etasmin saṃkule tāta vartamāne bhayaṃkare
d atibhārād vasumatī yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatā
d sā vai vyathitasarvāṅgī bhāreṇākrāntacetanā
d nārāyaṇaṃ varaṃ devaṃ prapannā śaraṇaṃ gatā
d pṛthivy uvāca
d bhagavaṃs tvatprasādād dhi tiṣṭheyaṃ suciraṃ tv iha
d bhāreṇāsmi samākrāntā na śaknomi sma vartitum
d mamemaṃ bhagavan bhāraṃ vyapanetuṃ tvam arhasi
d lomaśa uvāca
d śaraṇāgatāsmi te deva prasādaṃ kuru me vibho
d tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhagavān akṣaraḥ prabhuḥ
d provāca vacanaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śravyākṣarasamīritam
d na te mahi bhayaṃ kāryaṃ bhārārte vasudhāriṇi
d ayam evaṃ tathā kurmi yathā laghvī bhaviṣyasi
d sa tāṃ visarjayitvā tu vasudhāṃ śailakuṇḍalām
d tato varāhaḥ saṃvṛtta ekaśṛṅgo mahādyutiḥ
d raktābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ tu bhayam utpādayann iva
d dhūmaṃ ca jvalayaṃl lakṣmyā tatra deśe vyavardhata
d sa gṛhītvā vasumatīṃ śṛṅgeṇaikena bhāsvatā
d yojanānāṃ śataṃ vīra samuddharati so 'kṣaraḥ
d tasyāṃ coddhāryamāṇāyāṃ saṃkṣobhaḥ samajāyata
d devāḥ saṃkṣubhitāḥ sarve ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
d hāhābhūtam abhūt sarvaṃ tridivaṃ vyoma bhūs tathā
d na paryavasthitaḥ kaś cid devo vā mānuṣo 'pi vā
d tato brahmāṇam āsīnaṃ jvalamānam iva śriyā
d devāḥ sarṣigaṇāś caiva upatasthur anekaśaḥ
d upasarpya ca deveśaṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokasākṣikam
d bhūtvā prāñjalayaḥ sarve vākyam uccārayaṃs tadā
d lokāḥ saṃkṣubhitāḥ sarve vyākulaṃ ca carācaram
d samudrāṇāṃ ca saṃkṣobhas tridaśeśa prakāśate
d saiṣā vasumatī kṛtsnā yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatā
d kim etat kiṃprabhāveṇa yenedaṃ vyākulaṃ jagat
d brahmovāca
d ākhyātu no bhavāñ śīghraṃ visaṃjñāḥ smeha sarvaśaḥ
d asurebhyo bhayaṃ nāsti yuṣmākaṃ kutra cit kva cit
d śrūyatāṃ yat kṛteṣv eva saṃkṣobho jāyate 'marāḥ
d yo 'sau sarvatragaḥ śrīmān akṣarātmā vyavasthitaḥ
d tasya prabhāvāt saṃkṣobhas tridivasya prakāśate
d yaiṣā vasumatī kṛtsnā yojanānāṃ śataṃ gatā
d samuddhṛtā punas tena viṣṇunā paramātmanā
d tasyām uddhāryamāṇāyāṃ saṃkṣobhaḥ samajāyata
d devā ūcuḥ
d evaṃ bhavanto jānantu chidyatāṃ saṃśayaś ca vaḥ
d kva tadbhūtaṃ vasumatīṃ samuddharati hṛṣṭavat
d brahmovāca
d taṃ deśaṃ bhagavan brūhi tatra yāsyāmahe vayam
d hanta gacchata bhadraṃ vo nandane paśyata sthitam
d eṣo 'tra bhagavāñ śrīmān suparṇaḥ saṃprakāśate
d vārāheṇaiva rūpeṇa bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
d kālānala ivābhāti pṛthivītalam uddharan
d etasyorasi suvyaktaṃ śrīvatsam abhirājate
d paśyadhvaṃ vibudhāḥ sarve bhūtam etad anāmayam
d lomaśa uvāca
d tato dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ śrutvā cāmantrya cāmarāḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya jagmur devā yathāgatam
d śrutvā tu tāṃ kathāṃ sarve pāṇḍavā janamejaya
d lomaśādeśitenāśu pathā jagmuḥ prahṛṣṭavat
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a te śūrās tatadhanvānas tūṇavantaḥ samārgaṇāḥ
c baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇāḥ khadgavanto 'mitaujasaḥ
a parigṛhya dvijaśreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭhāḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām
c pāñcālīsahitā rājan prayayur gandhamādanam
a sarāṃsi saritaś caiva parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
c vṛkṣāṃś ca bahulacchāyān dadṛśur girimūrdhani
e nityapuṣpaphalān deśān devarṣigaṇasevitān
a ātmany ātmānam ādhāya vīrā mūlaphalāśanāḥ
c cerur uccāvacākārān deśān viṣamasaṃkaṭān

a evaṃ tu kṛtam icchāmi tvayāryādya priyaṃ mama
c yat te tadāsīt plavataḥ sāgaraṃ makarālayam
e rūpam apratimaṃ vīra tad icchāmi nirīkṣitum
a evaṃ tuṣṭo bhaviṣyāmi śraddhāsyāmi ca te vacaḥ
c evam uktaḥ sa tejasvī prahasya harir abravīt
a na tac chakyaṃ tvayā draṣṭuṃ rūpaṃ nānyena kena cit
c kālāvasthā tadā hy anyā vartate sā na sāṃpratam
d tato 'dya duṣkaraṃ draṣṭuṃ mama rūpaṃ narottama
a anyaḥ kṛtayuge kālas tretāyāṃ dvāpare 'paraḥ
c ayaṃ pradhvaṃsanaḥ kālo nādya tad rūpam asti me
a bhūmir nadyo nagāḥ śailāḥ siddhā devā maharṣayaḥ
c kālaṃ samanuvartante yathā bhāvā yuge yuge
d kālaṃ kālaṃ samāsādya narāṇāṃ narapuṃgava
e balavarṣmaprabhāvā hi prahīyanty udbhavanti ca
a tad alaṃ tava tad rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ kurukulodvaha
c yugaṃ samanuvartāmi kālo hi duratikramaḥ
 bhīma uvāca
a yugasaṃkhyāṃ samācakṣva ācāraṃ ca yuge yuge
c dharmakāmārthabhāvāṃś ca varṣma vīryaṃ bhavābhavau
 hanūmān uvāca
a kṛtaṃ nāma yugaṃ tāta yatra dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c kṛtam eva na kartavyaṃ tasmin kāle yugottame
a na tatra dharmāḥ sīdanti na kṣīyante ca vai prajāḥ
c tataḥ kṛtayugaṃ nāma kālena guṇatāṃ gatam
a devadānavagandharvayakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ
c nāsan kṛtayuge tāta tadā na krayavikrayāḥ
a na sāmayajuṛgvarṇāḥ kriyā nāsīc ca mānavī
c abhidhyāya phalaṃ tatra dharmaḥ saṃnyāsa eva ca
a na tasmin yugasaṃsarge vyādhayo nendriyakṣayaḥ
c nāsūyā nāpi ruditaṃ na darpo nāpi paiśunam
a na vigrahaḥ kutas tandrī na dveṣo nāpi vaikṛtam
c na bhayaṃ na ca saṃtāpo na cerṣyā na ca matsaraḥ
a tataḥ paramakaṃ brahma yā gatir yogināṃ parā
c ātmā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ śuklo nārāyaṇas tadā
a brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca kṛtalakṣaṇāḥ
c kṛte yuge samabhavan svakarmaniratāḥ prajāḥ
a samāśramaṃ samācāraṃ samajñānamatībalam
c tadā hi samakarmāṇo varṇā dharmān avāpnuvan
a ekavedasamāyuktā ekamantravidhikriyāḥ
c pṛthagdharmās tv ekavedā dharmam ekam anuvratāḥ
a cāturāśramyayuktena karmaṇā kālayoginā
c akāmaphalasaṃyogāt prāpnuvanti parāṃ gatim
a ātmayogasamāyukto dharmo 'yaṃ kṛtalakṣaṇaḥ
c kṛte yuge catuṣpādaś cāturvarṇyasya śāśvataḥ
a etat kṛtayugaṃ nāma traiguṇyaparivarjitam
c tretām api nibodha tvaṃ yasmin satraṃ pravartate
a pādena hrasate dharmo raktatāṃ yāti cācyutaḥ
c satyapravṛttāś ca narāḥ kriyādharmaparāyaṇāḥ
a tato yajñāḥ pravartante dharmāś ca vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
c tretāyāṃ bhāvasaṃkalpāḥ kriyādānaphalodayāḥ
a pracalanti na vai dharmāt tapodānaparāyaṇāḥ
c svadharmasthāḥ kriyāvanto janās tretāyuge 'bhavan
a dvāpare 'pi yuge dharmo dvibhāgonaḥ pravartate
c viṣṇur vai pītatāṃ yāti caturdhā veda eva ca
a tato 'nye ca caturvedās trivedāś ca tathāpare
c dvivedāś caikavedāś cāpy anṛcaś ca tathāpare
a evaṃ śāstreṣu bhinneṣu bahudhā nīyate kriyā
c tapodānapravṛttā ca rājasī bhavati prajā
a ekavedasya cājñānād vedās te bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ
c satyasya ceha vibhraṃśāt satye kaś cid avasthitaḥ
a satyāt pracyavamānānāṃ vyādhayo bahavo 'bhavan
c kāmāś copadravāś caiva tadā daivatakāritāḥ
a yair ardyamānāḥ subhṛśaṃ tapas tapyanti mānavāḥ
c kāmakāmāḥ svargakāmā yajñāṃs tanvanti cāpare
a evaṃ dvāparam āsādya prajāḥ kṣīyanty adharmataḥ
c pādenaikena kaunteya dharmaḥ kaliyuge sthitaḥ
a tāmasaṃ yugam āsādya kṛṣṇo bhavati keśavaḥ
c vedācārāḥ praśāmyanti dharmayajñakriyās tathā
a ītayo vyādhayas tandrī doṣāḥ krodhādayas tathā
c upadravāś ca vartante ādhayo vyādhayas tathā
a yugeṣv āvartamāneṣu dharmo vyāvartate punaḥ
c dharme vyāvartamāne tu loko vyāvartate punaḥ
a loke kṣīṇe kṣayaṃ yānti bhāvā lokapravartakāḥ
c yugakṣayakṛtā dharmāḥ prārthanāni vikurvate
a etat kaliyugaṃ nāma acirād yat pravartate
c yugānuvartanaṃ tv etat kurvanti cirajīvinaḥ
a yac ca te matparijñāne kautūhalam ariṃdama
c anarthakeṣu ko bhāvaḥ puruṣasya vijānataḥ
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c yugasaṃkhyāṃ mahābāho svasti prāpnuhi gamyatām
 bhīma uvāca
a pūrvarūpam adṛṣṭvā te na yāsyāmi kathaṃ cana
c yadi te 'ham anugrāhyo darśayātmānam ātmanā
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tu bhīmena smitaṃ kṛtvā plavaṃgamaḥ
c tad rūpaṃ darśayām āsa yad vai sāgaralaṅghane
a bhrātuḥ priyam abhīpsan vai cakāra sumahad vapuḥ
b tad rūpaṃ yat purā tasya babhūvodadhilaṅghane
c dehas tasya tato 'tīva vardhaty āyāmavistaraiḥ
a tad rūpaṃ kadalīṣaṇḍaṃ chādayann amitadyutiḥ
c gireś cocchrayam āgamya tasthau tatra sa vānaraḥ
a samucchritamahākāyo dvitīya iva parvataḥ
c tāmrekṣaṇas tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭro bhṛkuṭīkṛtalocanaḥ
e dīrghalāṅgūlam āvidhya diśo vyāpya sthitaḥ kapiḥ
a tad rūpaṃ mahad ālakṣya bhrātuḥ kauravanandanaḥ
c visismiye tadā bhīmo jahṛṣe ca punaḥ punaḥ
a tam arkam iva tejobhiḥ sauvarṇam iva parvatam
c pradīptam iva cākāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmo nyamīlayat
a ābabhāṣe ca hanumān bhīmasenaṃ smayann iva
c etāvad iha śaktas tvaṃ rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ mamānagha
a vardhe 'haṃ cāpy ato bhūyo yāvan me manasepsitam
c bhīma śatruṣu cātyarthaṃ vardhate mūrtir ojasā
a tad adbhutaṃ mahāraudraṃ vindhyamandarasaṃnibham
c dṛṣṭvā hanūmato varṣma saṃbhrāntaḥ pavanātmajaḥ
a pratyuvāca tato bhīmaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ
c kṛtāñjalir adīnātmā hanūmantam avasthitam
a dṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇaṃ vipulaṃ śarīrasyāsya te vibho
c saṃharasva mahāvīrya svayam ātmānam ātmanā
a na hi śaknomi tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ divākaram ivoditam
c aprameyam anādhṛṣyaṃ mainākam iva parvatam
a vismayaś caiva me vīra sumahān manaso 'dya vai
c yad rāmas tvayi pārśvasthe svayaṃ rāvaṇam abhyagāt
a tvam eva śaktas tāṃ laṅkāṃ sayodhāṃ sahavāhanām
c svabāhubalam āśritya vināśayitum ojasā
a na hi te kiṃ cid aprāpyaṃ mārutātmaja vidyate
c tava naikasya paryāpto rāvaṇaḥ sagaṇo yudhi
a evam uktas tu bhīmena hanūmān plavagarṣabhaḥ
c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ snigdhagambhīrayā girā
a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
c bhīmasena na paryāpto mamāsau rākṣasādhamaḥ
a mayā tu tasmin nihate rāvaṇe lokakaṇṭake
c kīrtir naśyed rāghavasya tata etad upekṣitam
a tena vīreṇa hatvā tu sagaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam
c ānītā svapuraṃ sītā loke kīrtiś ca sthāpitā
a tad gaccha vipulaprajña bhrātuḥ priyahite rataḥ
c ariṣṭaṃ kṣemam adhvānaṃ vāyunā parirakṣitaḥ
a eṣa panthāḥ kuruśreṣṭha saugandhikavanāya te
c drakṣyase dhanadodyānaṃ rakṣitaṃ yakṣarākṣasaiḥ
a na ca te tarasā kāryaḥ kusumāvacayaḥ svayam
c daivatāni hi mānyāni puruṣeṇa viśeṣataḥ
a balihomanamaskārair mantraiś ca bharatarṣabha
c daivatāni prasādaṃ hi bhaktyā kurvanti bhārata
a mā tāta sāhasaṃ kārṣīḥ svadharmam anupālaya
c svadharmasthaḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ budhyasvāgamayasva ca
a na hi dharmam avijñāya vṛddhān anupasevya ca
c dharmo vai vedituṃ śakyo bṛhaspatisamair api
a adharmo yatra dharmākhyo dharmaś cādharmasaṃjñitaḥ
c vijñātavyo vibhāgena yatra muhyanty abuddhayaḥ
a ācārasaṃbhavo dharmo dharmād vedāḥ samutthitāḥ
c vedair yajñāḥ samutpannā yajñair devāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
a vedācāravidhānoktair yajñair dhāryanti devatāḥ
c bṛhaspatyuśanoktaiś ca nayair dhāryanti mānavāḥ
a paṇyākaravaṇijyābhiḥ kṛṣyātho yonipoṣaṇaiḥ
c vārtayā dhāryate sarvaṃ dharmair etair dvijātibhiḥ
a trayī vārtā daṇḍanītis tisro vidyā vijānatām
c tābhiḥ samyakprayuktābhir lokayātrā vidhīyate
a sā ced dharmakriyā na syāt trayīdharmam ṛte bhuvi
c daṇḍanītim ṛte cāpi nirmaryādam idaṃ bhavet
a vārtādharme hy avartantyo vinaśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ
c supravṛttais tribhir hy etair dharmaiḥ sūyanti vai prajāḥ
a dvijānām amṛtaṃ dharmo hy ekaś caivaikavarṇikaḥ
c yajñādhyayanadānāni trayaḥ sādhāraṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
a yājanādhyāpane cobhe brāhmaṇānāṃ pratigrahaḥ
c pālanaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ vai vaiśyadharmaś ca poṣaṇam
a śuśrūṣā tu dvijātīnāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ dharma ucyate
c bhaikṣahomavratair hīnās tathaiva guruvāsinām
a kṣatradharmo 'tra kaunteya tava dharmābhirakṣaṇam
c svadharmaṃ pratipadyasva vinīto niyatendriyaḥ
a vṛddhaiḥ saṃmantrya sadbhiś ca buddhimadbhiḥ śrutānvitaiḥ
c susthitaḥ śāsti daṇḍena vyasanī paribhūyate
a nigrahānugrahaiḥ samyag yadā rājā pravartate
c tadā bhavati lokasya maryādā suvyavasthitā
a tasmād deśe ca durge ca śatrumitrabaleṣu ca
c nityaṃ cāreṇa boddhavyaṃ sthānaṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayas tathā
a rājñām upāyāś catvāro buddhimantraḥ parākramaḥ
c nigrahānugrahau caiva dākṣyaṃ tatkāryasādhanam
a sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍenopekṣaṇena ca
c sādhanīyāni kāryāṇi samāsavyāsayogataḥ
a mantramūlā nayāḥ sarve cārāś ca bharatarṣabha
c sumantritair nayaiḥ siddhis tadvidaiḥ saha mantrayet
a striyā mūḍhena lubdhena bālena laghunā tathā
c na mantrayeta guhyāni yeṣu conmādalakṣaṇam
d sarvaṃ doṣakṛtaṃ yeṣāṃ vairaṃ tatra pratiṣṭhitam
a mantrayet saha vidvadbhiḥ śaktaiḥ karmāṇi kārayet
c snigdhaiś ca nītivinyāsān mūrkhān sarvatra varjayet
a dhārmikān dharmakāryeṣu arthakāryeṣu paṇḍitān
c strīṣu klībān niyuñjīta krūrān krūreṣu karmasu
a svebhyaś caiva parebhyaś ca kāryākāryasamudbhavā
c buddhiḥ karmasu vijñeyā ripūṇāṃ ca balābalam
a buddhyā supratipanneṣu kuryāt sādhuparigraham
c nigrahaṃ cāpy aśiṣṭeṣu nirmaryādeṣu kārayet
a nigrahe pragrahe samyag yadā rājā pravartate
c tadā bhavati lokasya maryādā suvyavasthitā
a eṣa te vihitaḥ pārtha ghoro dharmo duranvayaḥ
b sāmnā mitrāṇi dānena brāhmaṇaṃ kṛtrimāni ca
b bhedenārīn pradamayet kuṇḍena sādhayet prajāḥ
c taṃ svadharmavibhāgena vinayastho 'nupālaya
a tapodharmadamejyābhir viprā yānti yathā divam
c dānātithyakriyādharmair yānti vaiśyāś ca sadgatim
d dvijaśuśrūṣayā śūdrā labhante gatim uttamām
a kṣatraṃ yāti tathā svargaṃ bhuvi nigrahapālanaiḥ
c samyak praṇīya daṇḍaṃ hi kāmadveṣavivarjitāḥ
e alubdhā vigatakrodhāḥ satāṃ yānti salokatām
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ saṃhṛtya vipulaṃ tad vapuḥ kāmavardhitam
c bhīmasenaṃ punar dorbhyāṃ paryaṣvajata vānaraḥ
a pariṣvaktasya tasyāśu bhrātrā bhīmasya bhārata
c śramo nāśam upāgacchat sarvaṃ cāsīt pradakṣiṇam
d balaṃ cātibalo mene na me 'sti sadṛśaḥ kva cit
a tataḥ punar athovāca paryaśrunayano hariḥ
c bhīmam ābhāṣya sauhārdād bāṣpagadgadayā girā
a gaccha vīra svam āvāsaṃ smartavyo 'smi kathāntare
b śīghraṃ tu kāryasidhyarthaṃ gaccha tvaṃ pāṇḍunandana
b smartavyo 'smi tvayā vīra kathāsvamitavikrama
c ihasthaś ca kuruśreṣṭha na nivedyo 'smi kasya cit
a dhanadasyālayāc cāpi visṛṣṭānāṃ mahābala
c deśakāla ihāyātuṃ devagandharvayoṣitām
a mamāpi saphalaṃ cakṣuḥ smāritaś cāsmi rāghavam
b rāmābhidhānaṃ viṣṇuṃ hi jagad dhṛdayanandanam
b sītāvaktrāravindārkaṃ daśāsyadhvāntabhāskaram
c mānuṣaṃ gātrasaṃsparśaṃ gatvā bhīma tvayā saha
a tad asmaddarśanaṃ vīra kaunteyāmogham astu te
c bhrātṛtvaṃ tvaṃ puraskṛtya varaṃ varaya bhārata
a yadi tāvan mayā kṣudrā gatvā vāraṇasāhvayam
c dhārtarāṣṭrā nihantavyā yāvad etat karomy aham
d nihatān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃs tu tan me vada ca bhārata
a śilayā nagaraṃ vā tan marditavyaṃ mayā yadi
b baddhvā duryodhanaṃ cādya ānayāmi tavāntikam
c yāvad adya karomy etat kāmaṃ tava mahābala
a bhīmasenas tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā tasya mahātmanaḥ
c pratyuvāca hanūmantaṃ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
a kṛtam eva tvayā sarvaṃ mama vānarapuṃgava
c svasti te 'stu mahābāho kṣāmaye tvāṃ prasīda me
a sanāthāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve tvayā nāthena vīryavan
c tavaiva tejasā sarvān vijeṣyāmo vayaṃ ripūn
a evam uktas tu hanumān bhīmasenam abhāṣata
c bhrātṛtvāt sauhṛdāc cāpi kariṣyāmi tava priyam
a camūṃ vigāhya śatrūṇāṃ śaraśaktisamākulām
c yadā siṃharavaṃ vīra kariṣyasi mahābala
e tadāhaṃ bṛṃhayiṣyāmi svaraveṇa ravaṃ tava
f yaṃ śrutvaiva bhaviṣyanti vyasavas te 'rayo raṇe
a vijayasya dhvajasthaś ca nādān mokṣyāmi dāruṇān
c śatrūṇāṃ te prāṇaharān ity uktvāntaradhīyata
c   sukhaṃ yena haniṣyatha
c evam ābhāṣya hanumāṃs tadā pāṇḍavanandanam
c mārgam ākhyāya bhīmāya
c   mā bhūt te mānaso jvaraḥ
c mayā hi prāṇasarvasvaṃ lāṅgūle viniveśitam
c śatruprāṇaharaṃ yogyaṃ
a gate tasmin harivare bhīmo 'pi balināṃ varaḥ
c tena mārgeṇa vipulaṃ vyacarad gandhamādanam
a anusmaran vapus tasya śriyaṃ cāpratimāṃ bhuvi
c māhātmyam anubhāvaṃ ca smaran dāśarather yayau
a sa tāni ramaṇīyāni vanāny upavanāni ca
c viloḍayām āsa tadā saugandhikavanepsayā
a phullapadmavicitrāṇi puṣpitāni vanāni ca
a   sarāṃsi saritas tathā
a nānākusumacitrāṇi
b phullapadmavicitrāṇi sarāṃsi saritas tathā
b nānāvihagajuṣṭāni paśyati sma samantataḥ
c mattavāraṇayūthāni paṅkaklinnāni bhārata
e varṣatām iva meghānāṃ vṛndāni dadṛśe tadā
a hariṇaiś cañcalāpāṅgair hariṇīsahitair vane
c saśaṣpakavalaiḥ śrīmān pathi dṛṣṭo drutaṃ yayau
a mahiṣaiś ca varāhaiś ca śārdūlaiś ca niṣevitam
c vyapetabhīr giriṃ śauryād bhīmaseno vyagāhata
a kusumānataśākhaiś ca tāmprapallavakomalaiḥ
c yācyamāna ivāraṇye drumair mārutakampitaiḥ
a kṛtapadmāñjalipuṭā mattaṣaṭpadasevitāḥ
c priyatīrthavanā mārge padminīḥ samatikraman
a sajjamānamanodṛṣṭiḥ phulleṣu girisānuṣu
c draupadīvākyapātheyo bhīmaḥ śīghrataraṃ yayau
a parivṛtte 'hani tataḥ prakīrṇahariṇe vane
c kāñcanair vimalaiḥ padmair dadarśa vipulāṃ nadīm
a mattakāraṇḍavayutāṃ cakravākopaśobhitām
c racitām iva tasyādrer mālāṃ vimalapaṅkajām
a tasyāṃ nadyāṃ mahāsattvaḥ saugandhikavanaṃ mahat
c apaśyat prītijananaṃ bālārkasadṛśadyuti
a tad dṛṣṭvā labdhakāmaḥ sa manasā pāṇḍunandanaḥ
c vanavāsaparikliṣṭāṃ jagāma manasā priyām
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a sa gatvā nalinīṃ ramyāṃ rākṣasair abhirakṣitām
c kailāsaśikhare ramye dadarśa śubhakānane
d nīlaśādvalaparyantāṃ citradrumaparicchadām
a kuberabhavanābhyāśe jātāṃ parvatanirjhare
c suramyāṃ vipulacchāyāṃ nānādrumalatāvṛtām
a haritāmbujasaṃchannāṃ divyāṃ kanakapuṣkarām
b nānāpakṣigaṇākīrṇāṃ sūpatīrthām akardamām
b atīva ramyāṃ sujalāṃ jātāṃ parvatasānuṣu
c pavitrabhūtāṃ lokasya śubhām adbhutadarśanām
a tatrāmṛtarasaṃ śītaṃ laghu kuntīsutaḥ śubham
c dadarśa vimalaṃ toyaṃ śivaṃ bahu ca pāṇḍavaḥ
a tāṃ tu puṣkariṇīṃ ramyāṃ padmasaugandhikāyutām
c jātarūpamayaiḥ padmaiś channāṃ paramagandhibhiḥ
a vaiḍūryavaranālaiś ca bahucitrair manoharaiḥ
c haṃsakāraṇḍavoddhūtaiḥ sṛjadbhir amalaṃ rajaḥ
a ākrīḍaṃ yakṣarājasya kuberasya mahātmanaḥ
c gandharvair apsarobhiś ca devaiś ca paramārcitām
a sevitām ṛṣibhir divyāṃ yakṣaiḥ kiṃpuruṣais tathā
c rākṣasaiḥ kiṃnaraiś caiva guptāṃ vaiśravaṇena ca
a tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva kaunteyo bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
c babhūva paramaprīto divyaṃ saṃprekṣya tat saraḥ
a tac ca krodhavaśā nāma rākṣasā rājaśāsanāt
c rakṣanti śatasāhasrāś citrāyudhaparicchadāḥ
a te tu dṛṣṭvaiva kaunteyam ajinaiḥ parivāritam
c rukmāṅgadadharaṃ vīraṃ bhīmaṃ bhīmaparākramam
a sāyudhaṃ baddhanistriṃśam aśaṅkitam ariṃdamam
c puṣkarepsum upāyāntam anyonyam abhicukruśuḥ
a ayaṃ puruṣaśārdūlaḥ sāyudho 'jinasaṃvṛtaḥ
c yac cikīrṣur iha prāptas tat saṃpraṣṭum ihārhatha
a tataḥ sarve mahābāhuṃ samāsādya vṛkodaram
c tejoyuktam apṛcchanta kas tvam ākhyātum arhasi
a muniveṣadharaś cāsi cīravāsāś ca lakṣyase
c yadartham asi saṃprāptas tad ācakṣva mahādyute
 bhīma uvāca
a pāṇḍavo bhīmaseno 'haṃ dharmaputrād anantaraḥ
c viśālāṃ badarīṃ prāpto bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rākṣasāḥ
a apaśyat tatra pañcālī saugandhikam anuttamam
c aniloḍham ito nūnaṃ sā bahūni parīpsati
a tasyā mām anavadyāṅgyā dharmapatnyāḥ priye sthitam
c puṣpāhāram iha prāptaṃ nibodhata niśācarāḥ
 rākṣasā ūcuḥ
a ākrīḍo 'yaṃ kuberasya dayitaḥ puruṣarṣabha
c neha śakyaṃ manuṣyeṇa vihartuṃ martyadharmiṇā
a devarṣayas tathā yakṣā devāś cātra vṛkodara
c āmantrya yakṣapravaraṃ pibanti viharanti ca
e gandharvāpsarasaś caiva viharanty atra pāṇḍava
f yakṣādhipasyānumate kuberasya mahātmanaḥ
a anyāyeneha yaḥ kaś cid avamanya dhaneśvaram
c vihartum icched durvṛttaḥ sa vinaśyed asaṃśayam
a tam anādṛtya padmāni jihīrṣasi balād itaḥ
c dharmarājasya cātmānaṃ bravīṣi bhrātaraṃ katham
d teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā vāryamāṇo 'pi pāṇḍavaḥ
d āmantrya yakṣarājaṃ vai tataḥ piba harasva ca
d nāto 'nyathā tvayā śakyaṃ kiṃ cit puṣkaram īkṣitum
 bhīma uvāca
a rākṣasās taṃ na paśyāmi dhaneśvaram ihāntike
c dṛṣṭvāpi ca mahārājaṃ nāhaṃ yācitum utsahe
a na hi yācanti rājāna eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c na cāhaṃ hātum icchāmi kṣātradharmaṃ kathaṃ cana
a iyaṃ ca nalinī ramyā jātā parvatanirjhare
c neyaṃ bhavanam āsādya kuberasya mahātmanaḥ
a tulyā hi sarvabhūtānām iyaṃ vaiśravaṇasya ca
c evaṃgateṣu dravyeṣu kaḥ kaṃ yācitum arhati
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity uktvā rākṣasān sarvān bhīmaseno vyagāhata
b vyagāhata mahābāhur nalinīṃ tāṃ mahābalaḥ
b tāṃ tu puṣkariṇīṃ vīraḥ prabhinna iva kuñjaraḥ
c tataḥ sa rākṣasair vācā pratiṣiddhaḥ pratāpavān
e mā maivam iti sakrodhair bhartsayadbhiḥ samantataḥ
a kadarthīkṛtya tu sa tān rākṣasān bhīmavikramaḥ
c vyagāhata mahātejās te taṃ sarve nyavārayan
d balāj jagrāha padmāni rakṣasāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
d te taṃ na mamṛṣur vīrā gṛhṇantaṃ kamalottamān
d agaṇayya sa tān sarvān bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān
d padmāny agṛhṇāt sahasā pauruṣe sve vyavasthitaḥ
a gṛhṇīta badhnīta nikṛntatemaṃ
pacāma khādāma ca bhīmasenam
c kruddhā bruvanto 'nuyayur drutaṃ te
śastrāṇi codyamya vivṛttanetrāḥ
a tataḥ sa gurvīṃ yamadaṇḍakalpāṃ
mahāgadāṃ kāñcanapaṭṭanaddhām
c pragṛhya tān abhyapatat tarasvī
tato 'bravīt tiṣṭhata tiṣṭhateti
a te taṃ tadā tomarapaṭṭiśādyair
vyāvidhya śastraiḥ sahasābhipetuḥ
c jighāṃsavaḥ krodhavaśāḥ subhīmā
bhīmaṃ samantāt parivavrur ugrāḥ
a vātena kuntyāṃ balavān sa jātaḥ
śūras tarasvī dviṣatāṃ nihantā
c satye ca dharme ca rataḥ sadaiva
parākrame śatrubhir apradhṛṣyaḥ
a teṣāṃ sa mārgān vividhān mahātmā
nihatya śastrāṇi ca śātravāṇām
c yathāpravīrān nijaghāna vīraḥ
paraḥśatān puṣkariṇīsamīpe
a te tasya vīryaṃ ca balaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā
vidyābalaṃ bāhubalaṃ tathaiva
c aśaknuvantaḥ sahitāḥ samantād
dhatapravīrāḥ sahasā nivṛttāḥ
a vidīryamāṇās tata eva tūrṇam
ākāśam āsthāya vimūḍhasaṃjñāḥ
c kailāsaśṛṅgāṇy abhidudruvus te
bhīmārditāḥ krodhavaśāḥ prabhagnāḥ
a sa śakravad dānavadaityasaṃghān
vikramya jitvā ca raṇe 'risaṃghān
c vigāhya tāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ jitāriḥ
kāmāya jagrāha tato 'mbujāni
a tataḥ sa pītvāmṛtakalpam ambho
bhūyo babhūvottamavīryatejāḥ
c utpāṭya jagrāha tato 'mbujāni
saugandhikāny uttamagandhavanti
a tatas tu te krodhavaśāḥ sametya
dhaneśvaraṃ bhīmabalapraṇunnāḥ
c bhīmasya vīryaṃ ca balaṃ ca saṃkhye
yathāvad ācakhyur atīva dīnāḥ
a teṣāṃ vacas tat tu niśamya devaḥ
prahasya rakṣāṃśi tato 'bhyuvāca
c gṛhṇātu bhīmo jalajāni kāmaṃ
kṛṣṇānimittaṃ viditaṃ mamaitat
a tato 'bhyanujñāya dhaneśvaraṃ te
jagmuḥ kurūṇāṃ pravaraṃ viroṣāḥ
c bhīmaṃ ca tasyāṃ dadṛśur nalinyāṃ
yathopajoṣaṃ viharantam ekam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatas tāni mahārhāṇi divyāni bharatarṣabha
c bahūni bahurūpāṇi virajāṃsi samādade
d etasminn antare rājan yudhiṣṭhirasamīpataḥ
a tato vāyur mahāñ śīghro nīcaiḥ śarkarakarṣaṇaḥ
c prādurāsīt kharasparśaḥ saṃgrāmam abhicodayan
a papāta mahatī colkā sanirghātā mahāprabhā
c niṣprabhaś cābhavat sūryaś channaraśmis tamovṛtaḥ
a nirghātaś cābhavad bhīmo bhīme vikramam āsthite
c cacāla pṛthivī cāpi pāṃsuvarṣaṃ papāta ca
a salohitā diśaś cāsan kharavāco mṛgadvijāḥ
c tamovṛtam abhūt sarvaṃ na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
d anye ca bahavo bhīmā utpātās tatra jajñire
a tad adbhutam abhiprekṣya dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ ko 'smān abhibhaviṣyati
a sajjībhavata bhadraṃ vaḥ pāṇḍavā yuddhadurmadāḥ
c yathārūpāṇi paśyāmi svabhyagro naḥ parākramaḥ
a evam uktvā tato rājā vīkṣāṃ cakre samantataḥ
c apaśyamāno bhīmaṃ ca dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a tatra kṛṣṇāṃ yamau caiva samīpasthān ariṃdamaḥ
c papraccha bhrātaraṃ bhīmaṃ bhīmakarmāṇam āhave
a kaccin na bhīmaḥ pāñcāli kiṃ cit kṛtyaṃ cikīrṣati
c kṛtavān api vā vīraḥ sāhasaṃ sāhasapriyaḥ
a ime hy akasmād utpātā mahāsamaradarśinaḥ
c darśayanto bhayaṃ tīvraṃ prādurbhūtāḥ samantataḥ
a taṃ tathā vādinaṃ kṛṣṇā pratyuvāca manasvinī
c priyā priyaṃ cikīrṣantī mahiṣī cāruhāsinī
a yat tat saugandhikaṃ rājann āhṛtaṃ mātariśvanā
c tan mayā bhīmasenasya prītayādyopapāditam
a api cokto mayā vīro yadi paśyed bahūny api
c tāni sarvāṇy upādāya śīghram āgamyatām iti
a sa tu nūnaṃ mahābāhuḥ priyārthaṃ mama pāṇḍavaḥ
c prāgudīcīṃ diśaṃ rājaṃs tāny āhartum ito gataḥ
a uktas tv evaṃ tayā rājā yamāv idam athābravīt
c gacchāma sahitās tūrṇaṃ yena yāto vṛkodaraḥ
a vahantu rākṣasā viprān yathāśrāntān yathākṛśān
c tvam apy amarasaṃkāśa vaha kṛṣṇāṃ ghaṭotkaca
a vyaktaṃ dūram ito bhīmaḥ praviṣṭa iti me matiḥ
c ciraṃ ca tasya kālo 'yaṃ sa ca vāyusamo jave
a tarasvī vainateyasya sadṛśo bhuvi laṅghane
c utpated api cākāśaṃ nipatec ca yathecchakam
a tam anviyāma bhavatāṃ prabhāvād rajanīcarāḥ
c purā sa nāparādhnoti siddhānāṃ brahmavādinām
a tathety uktvā tu te sarve haiḍimbapramukhās tadā
c uddeśajñāḥ kuberasya nalinyā bharatarṣabha
a ādāya pāṇḍavāṃś caiva tāṃś ca viprān anekaśaḥ
c lomaśenaiva sahitāḥ prayayuḥ prītamānasāḥ
a te gatvā sahitāḥ sarve dadṛśus tatra kānane
c praphullapaṅkajavatīṃ nalinīṃ sumanoharām
a taṃ ca bhīmaṃ mahātmānaṃ tasyās tīre vyavasthitam
c dadṛśur nihatāṃś caiva yakṣān suvipulekṣaṇān
d bhinnakāyākṣibāhūrūn saṃcūrṇitaśirodharān
d taṃ ca bhīmaṃ mahātmānaṃ tasyās tīre vyavasthitam
d sakrodhaṃ stabdhanayanaṃ saṃdaṣṭadaśanacchadam
a udyamya ca gadāṃ dorbhyāṃ nadītīre vyavasthitam
c prajāsaṃkṣepasamaye daṇḍahastam ivāntakam
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmarājas tu pariṣvajya punaḥ punaḥ
c uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā kaunteya kim idaṃ kṛtam
a sāhasaṃ bata bhadraṃ te devānām api cāpriyam
c punar evaṃ na kartavyaṃ mama ced icchasi priyam
a anuśāsya ca kaunteyaṃ padmāni pratigṛhya ca
c tasyām eva nalinyāṃ te vijahrur amaropamāḥ
a etasminn eva kāle tu pragṛhītaśilāyudhāḥ
c prādurāsan mahākāyās tasyodyānasya rakṣiṇaḥ
d uccukruśuś ca te 'nyonyaṃ rākṣasā bhīmadarśanāḥ
d rājñas te vai kuberasya nalinīṃ vanacāriṇaḥ
d saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ sarve vyākulenāntarātmabhiḥ
d upatasthur mahātmānaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
a te dṛṣṭvā dharmarājānaṃ devarṣiṃ cāpi lomaśam
c nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca tathānyān brāhmaṇarṣabhān
e vinayenānatāḥ sarve praṇipetuś ca bhārata
a sāntvitā dharmarājena praseduḥ kṣaṇadācarāḥ
c viditāś ca kuberasya tatas te narapuṃgavāḥ
e ūṣur nāticiraṃ kālaṃ ramamāṇāḥ kurūdvahāḥ
f vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
f tasmin nivasamāno 'tha dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
f kṛṣṇayā sahitān bhrātṝn ity uvāca sahadvijān
f dṛṣṭāni tīrthāny asmābhiḥ puṇyāni ca śivāni ca
f manaso hlādanīyāni vanāni ca pṛthak pṛthak
f devaiḥ pūrvaṃ vicīrṇāni munibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
f yathākramaviśeṣeṇa dvijaiḥ saṃpūjitāni ca
f ṛṣīṇāṃ pūrvacaritaṃ tathā karma viceṣṭitam
f rājarṣīṇāṃ ca caritaṃ kathāś ca vividhāḥ śubhāḥ
f śṛṇvānās tatra tatra sma āśrameṣu śiveṣu ca
f abhiṣekaṃ dvijaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛtavanto viśeṣataḥ
f arcitāḥ satataṃ devāḥ puṣpair adbhiḥ sadā ca vaḥ
f yathālabdhair mūlaphalaiḥ pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ
f parvateṣu ca ramyeṣu sarveṣu ca saraḥsu ca
f udadhau ca mahāpuṇye sūpaspṛṣṭaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
f ilā sarasvatī sindhur yamunā narmadā tathā
f nānātīrtheṣu ramyeṣu sūpaspṛṣṭaṃ saha dvijaiḥ
f gaṅgādvāram atikramya bahavaḥ parvatāḥ śubhāḥ
f himavān parvataś caiva nānādvijagaṇāyutaḥ
f viśālā badarī dṛṣṭā naranārāyaṇāśramaḥ
f divyā puṣkariṇī dṛṣṭā siddhadevarṣipūjitā
f yathākramaviśeṣeṇa sarvāṇy āyatanāni ca
f darśitāni dvijaśreṣṭhā lomaśena mahātmanā
f imaṃ vaiśravaṇāvāsaṃ puṇyaṃ siddhaniṣevitam
f kathaṃ bhīma gamiṣyāmo gatir antaradhīyatām
f evaṃ bruvati rājendre vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
f na śakyo durgamo gantum ito vaiśravaṇāśramāt
f anenaiva pathā rājan pratigaccha yathāgatam
f naranārāyaṇasthānaṃ badarīty abhiviśrutam
f tasmād yāsyasi kaunteya siddhacāraṇasevitam
f bahupuṣpaphalaṃ ramyam āśramaṃ vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ
f atikramya ca taṃ pārtha tv ārṣṭiṣeṇāśrame vaseḥ
f tato drakṣyasi kaunteya niveśaṃ dhanadasya ca
f etasminn antare vāyur divyagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
f sukhaprahlādanaḥ śītaḥ puṣpavarṣaṃ vavarṣa ca
f śrutvā tu divyam ākāśād vācaṃ sarve visismiyuḥ
f ṛṣīṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca pārthivānāṃ viśeṣataḥ
f śrutvā tan mahad āścaryaṃ dvijo dhaumyo 'bravīt tadā
f na śakyam uttaraṃ vaktum evaṃ bhavatu bhārata
f tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā pratijagrāha tad vacaḥ
f pratyāgamya punas taṃ tu naranārāyaṇāśramam
f bhīmasenādibhiḥ sarvair bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ
f pāñcālyā brāhmaṇāś caiva nyavasanta sukhaṃ tadā
f pratīkṣamāṇā bībhatsuṃ gandhamādanasānuṣu
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatas tān pariviśvastān vasatas tatra pāṇḍavān
b parvatendre dvijaiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthāgamanakāṅkṣayā
c gateṣu teṣu rakṣaḥsu bhīmasenātmaje 'pi ca
d ājagāma tadā rakṣo nāmnā khyāto jaṭāsuraḥ
a rahitān bhīmasenena kadā cit tān yadṛcchayā
c jahāra dharmarājānaṃ yamau kṛṣṇāṃ ca rākṣasaḥ
d janamejayaḥ
d brahman kathaṃ dharmarājaṃ yamau kṛṣṇāṃ ca rākṣasaḥ
d jagāma kutra bhīmaś ca gato rākṣasakaṇṭakaḥ
d vaktum arhasi viprāgrya vṛttam etan mamānagha
a brāhmaṇo mantrakuśalaḥ sarvāstreṣv astravittamaḥ
b jāmadagnyasya śiṣyo 'haṃ rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
c iti bruvan pāṇḍaveyān paryupāste sma nityadā
a parīkṣamāṇaḥ pārthānāṃ kalāpāni dhanūṃṣi ca
c antaraṃ samabhiprepsur nāmnā khyāto jaṭāsuraḥ
c   draupadyā haraṇaṃ prati
c duṣṭātmā pāpabuddhiḥ sa
d poṣaṇaṃ tasya rājendra cakre pāṇḍavanandanaḥ
d bubudhe na ca taṃ pāpaṃ bhasmacchannam ivānalam
a sa bhīmasene niṣkrānte mṛgayārtham ariṃdame
b ghaṭotkacaṃ sānucaraṃ dṛṣṭvā vipradrutaṃ diśaḥ
b lomaśaprabhṛtīṃs tāṃs tu maharṣīṃś ca samāhitān
b snātuṃ vinirgatān dṛṣṭvā puṣpārthaṃ ca tapodhanān
c anyad rūpaṃ samāsthāya vikṛtaṃ bhairavaṃ mahat
a gṛhītvā sarvaśastrāṇi draupadīṃ parigṛhya ca
c prātiṣṭhata sa duṣṭātmā trīn gṛhītvā ca pāṇḍavān
a sahadevas tu yatnena tato 'pakramya pāṇḍavaḥ
b vikramya kauśikaṃ khaḍgaṃ mokṣayitvā grahaṃ ripoḥ
c ākrandad bhīmasenaṃ vai yena yāto mahābalaḥ
a tam abravīd dharmarājo hriyamāṇo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c dharmas te hīyate mūḍha na cainaṃ samavekṣase
a ye 'nye ke cin manuṣyeṣu tiryagyonigatā api
b dharmaṃ te samavekṣante rakṣāṃsi ca viśeṣataḥ
b dharmasya rākṣasā mūlaṃ dharmaṃ te vidur uttamam
b etat parīkṣya sarvaṃ tvaṃ samaye sthātum arhasi
b devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ siddhāḥ pitaraś cāpi rākṣasāḥ
c gandharvayakṣarakṣāṃsi vayāṃsi paśavas tathā
d tiryag yonigatāś caiva api kīṭapipīlikāḥ
e manuṣyān upajīvanti tatas tvam upajīvasi
a samṛddhyā hy asya lokasya loko yuṣmākam ṛdhyate
c imaṃ ca lokaṃ śocantam anuśocanti devatāḥ
e pūjyamānāś ca vardhante havyakavyair yathāvidhi
a vayaṃ rāṣṭrasya goptāro rakṣitāraś ca rākṣasa
c rāṣṭrasyārakṣyamāṇasya kuto bhūtiḥ kutaḥ sukham
a na ca rājāvamantavyo rakṣasā jātv anāgasi
c aṇur apy apacāraś ca nāsty asmākaṃ narāśana
d vighasāśān yathāśaktyā kurmahe devatādiṣu
d gurūṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś caiva pramāṇapravaṇāḥ sadā
a drogdhavyaṃ na ca mitreṣu na viśvasteṣu karhi cit
c yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta yatra ca syāt pratiśrayaḥ
a sa tvaṃ pratiśraye 'smākaṃ pūjyamānaḥ sukhoṣitaḥ
c bhuktvā cānnāni duṣprajña katham asmāñ jihīrṣasi
a evam eva vṛthācāro vṛthāvṛddho vṛthāmatiḥ
c vṛthāmaraṇam arhas tvaṃ vṛthādya na bhaviṣyasi
a atha ced duṣṭabuddhis tvaṃ sarvair dharmair vivarjitaḥ
c pradāya śastrāṇy asmākaṃ yuddhena draupadīṃ hara
a atha cet tvam avijñāya idaṃ karma kariṣyasi
c adharmaṃ cāpy akīrtiṃ ca loke prāpsyasi kevalam
a etām adya parāmṛśya striyaṃ rākṣasa mānuṣīm
c viṣam etat samāloḍya kumbhena prāśitaṃ tvayā
a tato yudhiṣṭhiras tasya bhārikaḥ samapadyata
c sa tu bhārābhibhūtātmā na tathā śīghrago 'bhavat
a athābravīd draupadīṃ ca nakulaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c mā bhaiṣṭa rākṣasān mūḍhād gatir asya mayā hṛtā
a nātidūre mahābāhur bhavitā pavanātmajaḥ
c asmin muhūrte saṃprāpte na bhaviṣyati rākṣasaḥ
a sahadevas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ mūḍhacetasam
c uvāca vacanaṃ rājan kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
a rājan kiṃ nāma tat kṛtyaṃ kṣatriyasyāsty ato 'dhikam
c yad yuddhe 'bhimukhaḥ prāṇāṃs tyajec chatrūñ jayeta vā
a eṣa cāsmān vayaṃ cainaṃ yudhyamānāḥ paraṃtapa
c sūdayema mahābāho deśakālo hy ayaṃ nṛpa
a kṣatradharmasya saṃprāptaḥ kālaḥ satyaparākrama
c jayantaḥ pātyamānā vā prāptum arhāma sadgatim
a rākṣase jīvamāne 'dya ravir astam iyād yadi
c nāhaṃ brūyāṃ punar jātu kṣatriyo 'smīti bhārata
a bho bho rākṣasa tiṣṭhasva sahadevo 'smi pāṇḍavaḥ
c hatvā vā māṃ nayasvainān hato vādyeha svapsyasi
a tathaiva tasmin bruvati bhīmaseno yadṛcchayā
c prādṛśyata mahābāhuḥ savajra iva vāsavaḥ
a so 'paśyad bhrātarau tatra draupadīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
c kṣitisthaṃ sahadevaṃ ca kṣipantaṃ rākṣasaṃ tadā
a mārgāc ca rākṣasaṃ mūḍhaṃ kālopahatacetasam
c bhramantaṃ tatra tatraiva daivena vinivāritam
a bhrātṝṃs tān hriyato dṛṣṭvā draupadīṃ ca mahābalaḥ
c krodham āhārayad bhīmo rākṣasaṃ cedam abravīt
a vijñāto 'si mayā pūrvaṃ ceṣṭañ śastraparīkṣaṇe
c āsthā tu tvayi me nāsti yato 'si na hatas tadā
e brahmarūpapraticchanno na no vadasi cāpriyam
a priyeṣu caramāṇaṃ tvāṃ na caivāpriyakāriṇam
c atithiṃ brahmarūpaṃ ca kathaṃ hanyām anāgasam
e rākṣasaṃ manyamāno 'pi yo hanyān narakaṃ vrajet
a apakvasya ca kālena vadhas tava na vidyate
c nūnam adyāsi saṃpakvo yathā te matir īdṛśī
e dattā kṛṣṇāpaharaṇe kālenādbhutakarmaṇā
f so 'pi kālaṃ samāsādya tathādya na bhaviṣyasi
a baḍiśo 'yaṃ tvayā grastaḥ kālasūtreṇa lambitaḥ
c matsyo 'mbhasīva syūtāsyaḥ kathaṃ me 'dya gamiṣyasi
a yaṃ cāsi prasthito deśaṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ gataṃ ca te
c na taṃ gantāsi gantāsi mārgaṃ bakahiḍimbayoḥ
a evam uktas tu bhīmena rākṣasaḥ kālacoditaḥ
c bhīta utsṛjya tān sarvān yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ
a abravīc ca punar bhīmaṃ roṣāt prasphuritādharaḥ
c na me mūḍhā diśaḥ pāpa tvadarthaṃ me vilambanam
a śrutā me rākṣasā ye ye tvayā vinihatā raṇe
c teṣām adya kariṣyāmi tavāsreṇodakakriyām
a evam uktas tato bhīmaḥ sṛkkiṇī parisaṃlihan
c smayamāna iva krodhāt sākṣāt kālāntakopamaḥ
d bruvan vai tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ
e bāhusaṃrambham evecchann abhidudrāva rākṣasam
a rākṣaso 'pi tadā bhīmaṃ yuddhārthinam avasthitam
b muhur muhur vyādadānaḥ sṛkkiṇī parisaṃlihan
c abhidudrāva saṃrabdho balo vajradharaṃ yathā

d rākṣaso 'pi ca visrabdho bāhuyuddham akāṅkṣata
a vartamāne tadā tābhyāṃ bāhuyuddhe sudāruṇe
c mādrīputrāv abhikruddhāv ubhāv apy abhyadhāvatām
a nyavārayat tau prahasan kuntīputro vṛkodaraḥ
c śakto 'haṃ rākṣasasyeti prekṣadhvam iti cābravīt
a ātmanā bhrātṛbhiś cāhaṃ dharmeṇa sukṛtena ca
c iṣṭena ca śape rājan sūdayiṣyāmi rākṣasam
a ity evam uktvā tau vīrau spardhamānau parasparam
c bāhubhiḥ samasajjetām ubhau rakṣovṛkodarau
a tayor āsīt saṃprahāraḥ kruddhayor bhīmarakṣasoḥ
c amṛṣyamāṇayoḥ saṃkhye devadānavayor iva
a ārujyārujya tau vṛkṣān anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
c jīmūtāv iva gharmānte vinadantau mahābalau
a babhañjatur mahāvṛkṣān ūrubhir balināṃ varau

c tāḍayām āsatur ubhau vinadantau muhur muhuḥ
a tasmin deśe yadā vṛkṣāḥ sarva eva nipātitāḥ
c puñjīkṛtāś ca śataśaḥ parasparavadhepsayā
a tadā śilāḥ samādāya muhūrtam iva bhārata
c mahābhrair iva śailendrau yuyudhāte mahābalau
a ugrābhir ugrarūpābhir bṛhatībhiḥ parasparam

a abhihatya ca bhūyas tāv anyonyaṃ baladarpitau
c bhujābhyāṃ parigṛhyātha cakarṣāte gajāv iva
a muṣṭibhiś ca mahāghorair anyonyam abhipetatuḥ
c tayoś caṭacaṭāśabdo babhūva sumahātmanoḥ
a tataḥ saṃhṛtya muṣṭiṃ tu pañcaśīrṣam ivoragam
c vegenābhyahanad bhīmo rākṣasasya śirodharām
a tataḥ śrāntaṃ tu tad rakṣo bhīmasenabhujāhatam
c supariśrāntam ālakṣya bhīmaseno 'bhyavartata
a tata enaṃ mahābāhur bāhubhyām amaropamaḥ
c samutkṣipya balād bhīmo niṣpipeṣa mahītale
d tataḥ saṃpīḍya balavad bhujābhyāṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ
a tasya gātrāṇi sarvāṇi cūrṇayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
c aratninā cābhihatya śiraḥ kāyād apāharat

c jaṭāsurasya tu śiro bhīmasenabalād dhṛtam
e papāta rudhirādigdhaṃ saṃdaṣṭadaśanacchadam
a taṃ nihatya maheṣvāso yudhiṣṭhiram upāgamat
a   dānavendram iveśvaraḥ
a babhūva puruṣavyāghraḥ prahṛṣṭa iva pāṇḍavaḥ
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dhaumyaḥ kṛṣṇā yamau tathā
a bhīmasenam upāyāntaṃ dadṛśus te ca pāṇḍavam

a paryaṣvajata durdharṣo yamau cāpi vṛkodaraḥ

a saṃpūjitaḥ   sadbhir brāhmaṇān abhivādya ca

c stūyamāno dvijāgryais tair marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ

c abhyetya rājā kaunteyo nivāsam akarot prabhuḥ
a sa samānīya tān sarvān bhrātṝn ity abravīd vacaḥ

b puṣpitair drumakhaṇḍaiś ca mattakokilaṣaṭpadaiḥ

a ete cānye ca bahavas tatra kānanajā drumāḥ
c latāś ca vividhākārāḥ patrapuṣpaphaloccayāḥ
d bhānty ete puṣpavikacāḥ puṃskokilakulākulāḥ
a yudhiṣṭhiras tu tān vṛkṣān paśyamāno nagottame
c bhīmasenam idaṃ vākyam abravīn madhurākṣaram

c amānuṣagatiṃ prāptāḥ saṃsiddhāḥ sma vṛkodara

c saṃśliṣṭāḥ pārtha śobhante gandhamādanasānuṣu
a śikhaṇḍinībhiś caratāṃ sahitānāṃ śikhaṇḍinām

a bahutālasamutsedhāḥ śailaśṛṅgāt paricyutāḥ

c dhātavo haritālasya kva cid dhiṅgulakasya ca
a manaḥśilāguhāś caiva saṃdhyābhranikaropamāḥ
c śaśalohitavarṇābhāḥ kva cid gairikadhātavaḥ
a sitāsitābhrapratimā bālasūryasamaprabhāḥ

a vyālaiś ca vividhākāraiḥ śataśīrṣaiḥ samantataḥ
c upetaṃ paśya kaunteya śailarājam ariṃdama

c nātṛpyan parvatendrasya darśanena paraṃtapāḥ
d draupadyā sahitā vīrās taiś ca viprair mahātmabhiḥ
a upetam atha mālyaiś ca phalavadbhiś ca pādapaiḥ
c ārṣṭiṣeṇasya rājarṣer āśramaṃ dadṛśus tadā
a tatas taṃ tīvratapasaṃ kṛśaṃ dhamanisaṃtatam
c pāragaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ārṣṭiṣeṇam upāgaman
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhiras tam āsādya tapasā dagdhakilbiṣam
c abhyavādayata prītaḥ śirasā nāma kīrtayan
a tataḥ kṛṣṇā ca bhīmaś ca yamau cāpi yaśasvinau
c śirobhiḥ prāpya rājarṣiṃ parivāryopatasthire
a tathaiva dhaumyo dharmajñaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ purohitaḥ
c yathānyāyam upākrāntas tam ṛṣiṃ saṃśitavratam
a anvajānāt sa dharmajño munir divyena cakṣuṣā
c pāṇḍoḥ putrān kuruśreṣṭhān āsyatām iti cābravīt
a kurūṇām ṛṣabhaṃ prājñaṃ pūjayitvā mahātapāḥ
c saha bhrātṛbhir āsīnaṃ paryapṛcchad anāmayam
a nānṛte kuruṣe bhāvaṃ kaccid dharme ca vartase
c matāpitroś ca te vṛttiḥ kaccit pārtha na sīdati
a kaccit te guravaḥ sarve vṛddhā vaidyāś ca pūjitāḥ
c kaccin na kuruṣe bhāvaṃ pārtha pāpeṣu karmasu
a sukṛtaṃ pratikartuṃ ca kaccid dhātuṃ ca duṣkṛtam
c yathānyāyaṃ kuruśreṣṭha jānāsi na ca katthase
a yathārhaṃ mānitāḥ kaccit tvayā nandanti sādhavaḥ
c vaneṣv api vasan kaccid dharmam evānuvartase
a kaccid dhaumyas tvadācārair na pārtha paritapyate
c dānadharmatapaḥśaucair ārjavena titikṣayā

a sve sve kila kule jāte putre naptari vā punaḥ

c kiṃ cāsya sukṛte 'smābhiḥ prāptavyam iti śobhanam
a pitā mātā tathaivāgnir gurur ātmā ca pañcamaḥ
c yasyaite pūjitāḥ pārtha tasya lokāv ubhau jitau
da yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
da bhagavan nyāyyam āhaitad yathāvad dharmaniścayam
da yathāśakti yathānyāyaṃ kriyate 'yaṃ vidhir mayā
a abbhakṣā vāyubhakṣāś ca plavamānā vihāyasā
c juṣante parvataśreṣṭham ṛṣayaḥ parvasaṃdhiṣu
a kāminaḥ saha kāntābhiḥ parasparam anuvratāḥ
c dṛśyante śailaśṛṅgasthās tathā kiṃpuruṣā nṛpa
a arajāṃsi ca vāsāṃsi vasānāḥ kauśikāni ca
c dṛśyante bahavaḥ pārtha gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ

c mahoragagaṇāś caiva suparṇāś coragādayaḥ
a asya copari śailasya śrūyate parvasaṃdhiṣu
c bherīpaṇavaśaṅkhānāṃ mṛdaṅgānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
a ihasthair eva tat sarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ
c na kāryā vaḥ kathaṃ cit syāt tatrābhisaraṇe matiḥ
a na cāpy ataḥ paraṃ śakyaṃ gantuṃ bharatasattamāḥ
c vihāro hy atra devānām amānuṣagatis tu sā
a īṣaccapalakarmāṇaṃ manuṣyam iha bhārata
c dviṣanti sarvabhūtāni tāḍayanti ca rākṣasāḥ
a abhyatikramya śikharaṃ śailasyāsya yudhiṣṭhira
c gatiḥ paramasiddhānāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ prakāśate
a cāpalād iha gacchantaṃ pārtha yānam ataḥ param
c ayaḥśūlādibhir ghnanti rākṣasāḥ śatrusūdana
a apsarobhiḥ parivṛtaḥ samṛddhyā naravāhanaḥ
c iha vaiśravaṇas tāta parvasaṃdhiṣu dṛśyate
a śikhare taṃ samāsīnam adhipaṃ sarvarakṣasām
c prekṣante sarvabhūtāni bhānumantam ivoditam
a devadānavasiddhānāṃ tathā vaiśravaṇasya ca
c gireḥ śikharam udyānam idaṃ bharatasattama
a upāsīnasya dhanadaṃ tumburoḥ parvasaṃdhiṣu

a etad evaṃvidhaṃ citram iha tāta yudhiṣṭhira
c prekṣante sarvabhūtāni bahuśaḥ parvasaṃdhiṣu
a bhuñjānāḥ sarvabhojyāni rasavanti phalāni ca

a na tāta capalair bhāvyam iha prāptaiḥ kathaṃ cana
bb capalaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dveṣyo bhavati mānavaḥ
c uṣitveha yathākāmaṃ yathāśraddhaṃ vihṛtya ca
e tataḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha pṛthivīṃ pālayiṣyasi
 janamejaya uvāca
 ārṣṭiṣeṇāśrame tasmin mama pūrvapitāmahāḥ
a pāṇḍoḥ putrā mahātmānaḥ sarve divyaparākramāḥ
c kiyantaṃ kālam avasan parvate gandhamādane
d kiṃ cakrus tatra te vīrāḥ sarve 'tibalapauruṣāḥ
a kāni cābhyavahāryāṇi tatra teṣāṃ mahātmanām
c vasatāṃ lokavīrāṇām āsaṃs tad brūhi sattama
a vistareṇa ca me śaṃsa bhīmasenaparākramam
c yad yac cakre mahābāhus tasmin haimavate girau
e na khalv āsīt punar yuddhaṃ tasya yakṣair dvijottama
f dhanadādhyuṣite nityaṃ vasatas tasya parvate
a kaccit samāgamas teṣām āsīd vaiśravaṇena ca
c tatra hy āyāti dhanada ārṣṭiṣeṇo yathābravīt
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa tapodhana
c na hi me śṛṇvatas tṛptir asti teṣāṃ viceṣṭitam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a etad ātmahitaṃ śrutvā tasyāpratimatejasaḥ
c śāsanaṃ satataṃ cakrus tathaiva bharatarṣabhāḥ
a bhuñjānā munibhojyāni rasavanti phalāni ca

a medhyāni himavatpṛṣṭhe madhūni vividhāni ca
c evaṃ te nyavasaṃs tatra pāṇḍavā bharatarṣabhāḥ
a tathā nivasatāṃ teṣāṃ pañcamaṃ varṣam abhyagāt
c śṛṇvatāṃ lomaśoktāni vākyāni vividhāni ca

c agacchan bahavo māsāḥ paśyatāṃ mahad adbhutam
a tais tatra ramamāṇaiś ca viharadbhiś ca pāṇḍavaiḥ

c dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni pāṇḍavāś ca tad adbhutam

c avahat sarvamālyāni gandhavanti śubhāni ca
a tatra puṣpāṇi divyāni suhṛdbhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ
c dadṛśuḥ pañca varṇāni draupadī ca yaśasvinī

d divyavarṇāni divyāni divyagandhavahāni ca
d madayantīva gandhena mano me bharatarṣabha

d naśyatīva manoduḥkhaṃ mamedaṃ śatrutāpana

a tataḥ śailottamasyāgraṃ citramālyadharaṃ śivam

d sāśanaṃ satataṃ kuryus tathaiva bharatarṣabha
a evaṃ praṇihitaṃ bhīma cirāt prabhṛti me manaḥ
c draṣṭum icchāmi śailāgraṃ tvadbāhubalam āśritā
d icchāmi ca naravyāghra puṣpaṃ pratyakṣam īdṛśam
d ānīyamānaṃ kṣipraṃ vai tvayā bharatasattama

c vyapetabhayasaṃmohaḥ śailarājaṃ samāviśat

 vaiśravaṇa uvāca
