c mahāmerur mahābhāga śivo brahmavidāṃ gatiḥ
a yasmin brahmasadaś caiva tiṣṭhate ca prajāpatiḥ
c bhūtātmā visṛjan sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cij jaṅgamāgamam
a yān āhur brahmaṇaḥ putrān mānasān dakṣasaptamān
c teṣām api mahāmeruḥ sthānaṃ śivam anāmayam
a atraiva pratitiṣṭhanti punar atrodayanti ca
c sapta devarṣayas tāta vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sadā
a deśaṃ virajasaṃ paśya meroḥ śikharam uttamam
c yatrātmatṛptair adhyāste devaiḥ saha pitāmahaḥ
a yam āhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ prakṛteḥ prakṛtiṃ dhruvam
c anādinidhanaṃ devaṃ prabhuṃ nārāyaṇaṃ param
a brahmaṇaḥ sadanāt tasya paraṃ sthānaṃ prakāśate
c devāś ca yatnāt paśyanti divyaṃ tejomayaṃ śivam
a atyarkānaladīptaṃ tat sthānaṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ
c svayaiva prabhayā rājan duṣprekṣyaṃ devadānavaiḥ
d prācyāṃ nārāyaṇasthānaṃ merāvativirājate
d yatra bhūteśvaras tāta sarvaprakṛtir ātmabhūḥ
d bhāsayan sarvabhūtāni suśriyābhivirājate
d nātra brahmarṣayas tāta kuta eva maharṣayaḥ
d prāpnuvanti gatiṃ hy etāṃ yatīnāṃ kurusattama
a tad vai jyotīṃṣi sarvāṇi prāpya bhāsanti no 'pi ca
c svayaṃ vibhur adīnātmā tatra hy abhivirājate
a yatayas tatra gacchanti bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ harim
c pareṇa tapasā yuktā bhāvitāḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
a yogasiddhā mahātmānas tamomohavivarjitāḥ
c tatra gatvā punar nemaṃ lokam āyānti bhārata
d svayaṃbhuvaṃ mahātmānaṃ devadevaṃ sanātanam
a sthānam etan mahābhāga dhruvam akṣayam avyayam
c īśvarasya sadā hy etat praṇamātra yudhiṣṭhira
d enaṃ tvaharahar meruṃ sūryācandramasau dhruvam
d pradakṣiṇam upāvṛttau kurutaḥ kurusattama
d jyotīṃṣi cāpy aśeṣeṇa sarvāṇy anagha sarvataḥ
d pariyānti mahārāja girirājaṃ pradakṣiṇam
a etaṃ jyotīṃṣi sarvāṇi prakarṣan bhagavān api
c kurute vitamaskarmā ādityo 'bhipradakṣiṇam
a astaṃ prāpya tataḥ saṃdhyām atikramya divākaraḥ
c udīcīṃ bhajate kāṣṭhāṃ diśam eṣa vibhāvasuḥ
a sa merum anuvṛttaḥ san punar gacchati pāṇḍava
c prāṅmukhaḥ savitā devaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
a sa māsaṃ vibhajan kālaṃ bahudhā parvasaṃdhiṣu
c tathaiva bhagavān somo nakṣatraiḥ saha gacchati
a evam eṣa parikramya mahāmerum atandritaḥ
b somaś ca vibhajan kālaṃ bahudhā parvasaṃdhiṣu
c bhāvayan sarvabhūtāni punar gacchati mandaram
a tathā tamisrahā devo mayūkhair bhāvayañ jagat
c mārgam etad asaṃbādham ādityaḥ parivartate
a sisṛkṣuḥ śiśirāṇy eṣa dakṣiṇāṃ bhajate diśam
c tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kālaḥ śiśiram ṛcchati
a sthāvarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca tejasā
c tejāṃsi samupādatte nivṛttaḥ san vibhāvasuḥ
a tataḥ svedaḥ klamas tandrī glāniś ca bhajate narān
c prāṇibhiḥ satataṃ svapno hy abhīkṣṇaṃ ca niṣevyate
a evam etad anirdeśyaṃ mārgam āvṛtya bhānumān
c punaḥ sṛjati varṣāṇi bhagavān bhāvayan prajāḥ
a vṛṣṭimārutasaṃtāpaiḥ sukhaiḥ sthāvarajaṅgamān
c vardhayan sumahātejāḥ punaḥ pratinivartate
a evam eṣa caran pārtha kālacakram atandritaḥ
c prakarṣan sarvabhūtāni savitā parivartate
a saṃtatā gatir etasya naiṣa tiṣṭhati pāṇḍava
c ādāyaiva tu bhūtānāṃ tejo visṛjate punaḥ
a vibhajan sarvabhūtānām āyuḥ karma ca bhārata
c ahorātrān kalāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ sṛjaty eṣa sadā vibhuḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tasmin nagendre vasatāṃ tu teṣāṃ
mahātmanāṃ sadvratam āsthitānām
c ratiḥ pramodaś ca babhūva teṣām
ākāṅkṣatāṃ darśanam arjunasya
a tān vīryayuktān suviśuddhasattvāṃs
tejasvinaḥ satyadhṛtipradhānān
c saṃprīyamāṇā bahavo 'bhijagmur
gandharvasaṃghāś ca maharṣayaś ca
a taṃ pādapaiḥ puṣpadharair upetaṃ
nagottamaṃ prāpya mahārathānām
c manaḥprasādaḥ paramo babhūva
yathā divaṃ prāpya marudgaṇānām
a mayūrahaṃsasvananāditāni
puṣpopakīrṇāni mahācalasya
c śṛṅgāṇi sānūni ca paśyamānā
gireḥ paraṃ harṣam avāpya tasthuḥ
a sākṣāt kubereṇa kṛtāś ca tasmin
nagottame saṃvṛtakūlarodhasaḥ
c kādambakāraṇḍavahaṃsajuṣṭāḥ
padmākulāḥ puṣkariṇīr apaśyan
a krīḍāpradeśāṃś ca samṛddharūpān
sucitramālyāvṛtajātaśobhān
c maṇipravekān sumanoharāṃś ca
yathā bhaveyur dhanadasya rājñaḥ
a anekavarṇaiś ca sugandhibhiś ca
mahādrumaiḥ saṃtatam abhramālibhiḥ
c tapaḥpradhānāḥ satataṃ carantaḥ
śṛṅgaṃ gireś cintayituṃ na śekuḥ
a svatejasā tasya nagottamasya
mahauṣadhīnāṃ ca tathā prabhāvāt
c vibhaktabhāvo na babhūva kaś cid
aharniśānāṃ puruṣapravīra
a yam āsthitaḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāni
vibhāvasur bhāvayate 'mitaujāḥ
c tasyodayaṃ cāstamayaṃ ca vīrās
tatra sthitās te dadṛśur nṛsiṃhāḥ
a raves tamisrāgamanirgamāṃs te
tathodayaṃ cāstamayaṃ ca vīrāḥ
c samāvṛtāḥ prekṣya tamonudasya
gabhastijālaiḥ pradiśo diśaś ca
a svādhyāyavantaḥ satatakriyāś ca
dharmapradhānāś ca śucivratāś ca
c satye sthitās tasya mahārathasya
satyavratasyāgamanapratīkṣāḥ
a ihaiva harṣo 'stu samāgatānāṃ
kṣipraṃ kṛtāstreṇa dhanaṃjayena
c iti bruvantaḥ paramāśiṣas te
pārthās tapoyogaparā babhūvuḥ
a dṛṣṭvā vicitrāṇi girau vanāni
kirīṭinaṃ cintayatām abhīkṣṇam
c babhūva rātrir divasaś ca teṣāṃ
saṃvatsareṇaiva samānarūpaḥ
a yadaiva dhaumyānumate mahātmā
kṛtvā jaṭāḥ pravrajitaḥ sa jiṣṇuḥ
c tadaiva teṣāṃ na babhūva harṣaḥ
kuto ratis tadgatamānasānām
a bhrātur niyogāt tu yudhiṣṭhirasya
vanād asau vāraṇamattagāmī
c yat kāmyakāt pravrajitaḥ sa jiṣṇus
tadaiva te śokahatā babhūvuḥ
d saṃtyajya kāmān pravrajitās tadaiva
d pārthās tadā śokaparā babhūvuḥ
a tathā tu taṃ cintayatāṃ sitāśvam
astrārthinaṃ vāsavam abhyupetam
c māso 'tha kṛcchreṇa tadā vyatītas
tasmin nage bhārata bhāratānām
d uṣitvā pañca varṣāṇi sahasrākṣaniveśane
d avāpya divyāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi vibudheśvarāt
d āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ saumyaṃ vāyavyam atha vaiṣṇavam
d aindraṃ pāśupataṃ brāhmaṃ pārameṣṭhyaṃ prajāpateḥ
d yamasya dhātuḥ savitus tvaṣṭur vaiśravaṇasya ca
d tāni prāpya sahasrākṣād abhivādya śatakratum
d anujñātas tadā tena kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
d āgacchad arjunaḥ prītaḥ prahṛṣṭo gandhamādanam
a tataḥ kadā cid dharisaṃprayuktaṃ
mahendravāhaṃ sahasopayātam
c vidyutprabhaṃ prekṣya mahārathānāṃ
harṣo 'rjunaṃ cintayatāṃ babhūva
a sa dīpyamānaḥ sahasāntarikṣaṃ
prakāśayan mātalisaṃgṛhītaḥ
c babhau maholkeva ghanāntarasthā
śikheva cāgner jvalitā vidhūmā
a tam āsthitaḥ saṃdadṛśe kirīṭī
sragvī varāṇy ābharaṇāni bibhrat
c dhanaṃjayo vajradharaprabhāvaḥ
śriyā jvalan parvatam ājagāma
a sa śailam āsādya kirīṭamālī
mahendravāhād avaruhya tasmāt
c dhaumyasya pādāv abhivādya pūrvam
ajātaśatros tadanantaraṃ ca
a vṛkodarasyāpi vavanda pādau
mādrīsutābhyām abhivāditaś ca
c sametya kṛṣṇāṃ parisāntvya caināṃ
prahvo 'bhavad bhrātur upahvare saḥ
a babhūva teṣāṃ paramaḥ praharṣas
tenāprameyeṇa samāgatānām
c sa cāpi tān prekṣya kirīṭamālī
nananda rājānam abhipraśaṃsan
a yam āsthitaḥ sapta jaghāna pūgān
diteḥ sutānāṃ namucer nihantā
c tam indravāhaṃ samupetya pārthāḥ
pradakṣiṇaṃ cakrur adīnasattvāḥ
a te mātaleś cakrur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ
satkāram agryaṃ surarājatulyam
c sarvaṃ yathāvac ca divaukasas tān
papracchur enaṃ kururājaputrāḥ
a tān apy asau mātalir abhyanandat
piteva putrān anuśiṣya cainān
c yayau rathenāpratimaprabheṇa
punaḥ sakāśaṃ tridiveśvarasya
a gate tu tasmin varadevavāhe
śakrātmajaḥ sarvaripupramāthī
b sākṣāt sahasrākṣa iva pratītaḥ
b śrīmān svadehād avamucya jiṣṇuḥ
c śakreṇa dattāni dadau mahātmā
mahādhanāny uttamarūpavanti
e divākarābhāṇi vibhūṣaṇāni
prītaḥ priyāyai sutasomamātre
a tataḥ sa teṣāṃ kurupuṃgavānāṃ
teṣāṃ ca sūryāgnisamaprabhāṇām
c viprarṣabhāṇām upaviśya madhye
sarvaṃ yathāvat kathayāṃ babhūva
d devais tu dattā hi yathāstramukhyāḥ
d prakhyāpayad valkalacīravāsāḥ
a evaṃ mayāstrāṇy upaśikṣitāni
śakrāc ca vātāc ca śivāc ca sākṣāt
c tathaiva śīlena samādhinā ca
prītāḥ surā me sahitāḥ sahendrāḥ
a saṃkṣepato vai sa viśuddhakarmā
tebhyaḥ samākhyāya divi praveśam
c mādrīsutābhyāṃ sahitaḥ kirīṭī
suṣvāpa tām āvasatiṃ pratītaḥ
 tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
 bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvair avandata dhanaṃjayaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a etasminn eva kāle tu sarvavāditranisvanaḥ
c babhūva tumulaḥ śabdas tv antarikṣe divaukasām
a rathanemisvanaś caiva ghaṇṭāśabdaś ca bhārata
c pṛthag vyālamṛgāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
d ravonmukhās te saṃprekṣya prīyamāṇāḥ kurūdvahāḥ
d marudbhir anvitaṃ śakram āpatantaṃ vihāyasā
a taṃ samantād anuyayur gandharvāpsarasas tathā
c vimānaiḥ sūryasaṃkāśair devarājam ariṃdamam
a tataḥ sa haribhir yuktaṃ jāmbūnadapariṣkṛtam
c meghanādinam āruhya śriyā paramayā jvalan
a pārthān abhyājagāmāśu devarājaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c āgatya ca sahasrākṣo rathād avaruroha vai
a taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva mahātmānaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ śrīmān devarājam upāgamat
a pūjayām āsa caivātha vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
c yathārham amitātmānaṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
a dhanaṃjayaś ca tejasvī praṇipatya puraṃdaram
c bhṛtyavat praṇatas tasthau devarājasamīpataḥ
a āpyāyata mahātejāḥ kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c dhanaṃjayam abhiprekṣya vinītaṃ sthitam antike
a jaṭilaṃ devarājasya tapoyuktam akalmaṣam
c harṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ phalgunasyātha darśanāt
d babhūva paramaprīto devarājaṃ ca pūjayan
a taṃ tathādīnamanasaṃ rājānaṃ harṣasaṃplutam
c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān devarājaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
a tvam imāṃ pṛthivīṃ rājan praśāsiṣyasi pāṇḍava
c svasti prāpnuhi kaunteya kāmyakaṃ punar āśramam
a astrāṇi labdhāni ca pāṇḍavena
sarvāṇi mattaḥ prayatena rājan
c kṛtapriyaś cāsmi dhanaṃjayena
jetuṃ na śakyas tribhir eṣa lokaiḥ
a evam uktvā sahasrākṣaḥ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ stūyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
a dhaneśvaragṛhasthānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ samāgamam
c śakreṇa ya imaṃ vidvān adhīyīta samāhitaḥ
a saṃvatsaraṃ brahmacārī niyataḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
c sa jīveta nirābādhaḥ susukhī śaradāṃ śatam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yathāgataṃ gate śakre bhrātṛbhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ
c kṛṣṇayā caiva bībhatsur dharmaputram apūjayat
a abhivādayamānaṃ tu mūrdhny upāghrāya pāṇḍavam
c harṣagadgadayā vācā prahṛṣṭo 'rjunam abravīt
a katham arjuna kālo 'yaṃ svarge vyatigatas tava
c kathaṃ cāstrāṇy avāptāni devarājaś ca toṣitaḥ
a samyag vā te gṛhītāni kaccid astrāṇi bhārata
c kaccit surādhipaḥ prīto rudraś cāstrāṇy adāt tava
a yathā dṛṣṭaś ca te śakro bhagavān vā pinākadhṛk
c yathā cāstrāṇy avāptāni yathā cārādhitaś ca te
a yathoktavāṃs tvāṃ bhagavāñ śatakratur ariṃdama
c kṛtapriyas tvayāsmīti tac ca te kiṃ priyaṃ kṛtam
e etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa mahādyute
a yathā tuṣṭo mahādevo devarājaś ca te 'nagha
c yac cāpi vajrapāṇes te priyaṃ kṛtam ariṃdama
e etad ākhyāhi me sarvam akhilena dhanaṃjaya
 arjuna uvāca
a śṛṇu hanta mahārāja vidhinā yena dṛṣṭavān
c śatakratum ahaṃ devaṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śaṃkaram
a vidyām adhītya tāṃ rājaṃs tvayoktām arimardana
c bhavatā ca samādiṣṭas tapase prasthito vanam
a bhṛgutuṅgam atho gatvā kāmyakād āsthitas tapaḥ
c ekarātroṣitaḥ kaṃ cid apaśyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pathi
a sa mām apṛcchat kaunteya kvāsi gantā bravīhi me
c tasmā avitathaṃ sarvam abruvaṃ kurunandana
a sa tathyaṃ mama tac chrutvā brāhmaṇo rājasattama
c apūjayata māṃ rājan prītimāṃś cābhavan mayi
a tato mām abravīt prītas tapa ātiṣṭha bhārata
c tapasvī nacireṇa tvaṃ drakṣyase vibudhādhipam
a tato 'haṃ vacanāt tasya girim āruhya śaiśiram
c tapo 'tapyaṃ mahārāja māsaṃ mūlaphalāśanaḥ
a dvitīyaś cāpi me māso jalaṃ bhakṣayato gataḥ
c nirāhāras tṛtīye 'tha māse pāṇḍavanandana
a ūrdhvabāhuś caturthaṃ tu māsam asmi sthitas tadā
c na ca me hīyate prāṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a caturthe samabhikrānte prathame divase gate
c varāhasaṃsthitaṃ bhūtaṃ matsamīpam upāgamat
a nighnan prothena pṛthivīṃ vilikhaṃś caraṇair api
c saṃmārjañ jaṭhareṇorvīṃ vivartaṃś ca muhur muhuḥ
a anu tasyāparaṃ bhūtaṃ mahat kairātasaṃsthitam
c dhanurbāṇāsimat prāptaṃ strīgaṇānugataṃ tadā
a tato 'haṃ dhanur ādāya tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī
c atāḍayaṃ śareṇātha tad bhūtaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
a yugapat tat kirātaś ca vikṛṣya balavad dhanuḥ
c abhyājaghne dṛḍhataraṃ kampayann iva me manaḥ
a sa tu mām abravīd rājan mama pūrvaparigrahaḥ
c mṛgayādharmam utsṛjya kimarthaṃ tāḍitas tvayā
a eṣa te niśitair bāṇair darpaṃ hanmi sthiro bhava
c sa varṣmavān mahākāyas tato mām abhyadhāvata
a tato girim ivātyartham āvṛṇon māṃ mahāśaraiḥ
c taṃ cāhaṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākiram
a tataḥ śarair dīptamukhaiḥ patritair anumantritaiḥ
c pratyavidhyam ahaṃ taṃ tu vajrair iva śiloccayam
a tasya tac chatadhā rūpam abhavac ca sahasradhā
c tāni cāsya śarīrāṇi śarair aham atāḍayam
a punas tāni śarīrāṇi ekībhūtāni bhārata
c adṛśyanta mahārāja tāny ahaṃ vyadhamaṃ punaḥ
a aṇur bṛhacchirā bhūtvā bṛhac cāṇuśirāḥ punaḥ
c ekībhūtas tadā rājan so 'bhyavartata māṃ yudhi
a yadābhibhavituṃ bāṇair naiva śaknomi taṃ raṇe
c tato 'ham astram ātiṣṭhaṃ vāyavyaṃ bharatarṣabha
a na cainam aśakaṃ hantuṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat
c tasmin pratihate cāstre vismayo me mahān abhūt
a bhūyaś caiva mahārāja saviśeṣam ahaṃ tataḥ
c astrapūgena mahatā raṇe bhūtam avākiram
a sthūṇākarṇam ayojālaṃ śaravarṣaṃ śarolbaṇam
c śailāstram aśmavarṣaṃ ca samāsthāyāham abhyayām
e jagrāsa prahasaṃs tāni sarvāṇy astrāṇi me 'nagha
a teṣu sarveṣu śānteṣu brahmāstram aham ādiśam
c tataḥ prajvalitair bāṇaiḥ sarvataḥ sopacīyata
e upacīyamānaś ca mayā mahāstreṇa vyavardhata
a tataḥ saṃtāpito loko matprasūtena tejasā
c kṣaṇena hi diśaḥ khaṃ ca sarvato 'bhividīpitam
a tad apy astraṃ mahātejāḥ kṣaṇenaiva vyaśātayat
a   tato 'ham apataṃ mahīm
a tataḥ prahasya tad bhūtaṃ
c brahmāstre tu hate rājan bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat
a tato 'haṃ dhanur ādāya tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī
c sahasābhyahanaṃ bhūtaṃ tāny apy astrāṇy abhakṣayat
a hateṣv astreṣu sarveṣu bhakṣiteṣv āyudheṣu ca
c mama tasya ca bhūtasya bāhuyuddham avartata
a vyāyāmaṃ muṣṭibhiḥ kṛtvā talair api samāhatau
c apātayac ca tad bhūtaṃ niśceṣṭo hy agamaṃ mahīm
a tataḥ prahasya tad bhūtaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata
b tataś cintāṃ samagamaṃ pūjayiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
b iti puṣpāṇi saṃgṛhya saikataṃ śaṃkaraṃ prabhum
b pūjayiṣyaṃs tam adrākṣaṃ kirātaṃ puṣpadhāriṇam
b tataś cānyāni puṣpāṇi pūjayiṣyan punaḥ punaḥ
b tāni sarvāṇi dṛṣṭvāhaṃ kirātasya ca mūrdhani
b iti kṛtvā mahādevaṃ praṇato 'smi punaḥ punaḥ
c saha strībhir mahārāja paśyato me 'dbhutopamam
a evaṃ kṛtvā sa bhagavāṃs tato 'nyad rūpam ātmanaḥ
c divyam eva mahārāja vasāno 'dbhutam ambaram
a hitvā kirātarūpaṃ ca bhagavāṃs tridaśeśvaraḥ
c svarūpaṃ divyam āsthāya tasthau tatra maheśvaraḥ
a adṛśyata tataḥ sākṣād bhagavān govṛṣadhvajaḥ
c umāsahāyo haridṛg bahurūpaḥ pinākadhṛk
a sa mām abhyetya samare tathaivābhimukhaṃ sthitam
c śūlapāṇir athovāca tuṣṭo 'smīti paraṃtapa
a tatas tad dhanur ādāya tūṇau cākṣayyasāyakau
c prādān mamaiva bhagavān varayasveti cābravīt
a tuṣṭo 'smi tava kaunteya brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
c yat te manogataṃ vīra tad brūhi vitarāmy aham
e amaratvam apāhāya brūhi yat te manogatam
a tataḥ prāñjalir evāham astreṣu gatamānasaḥ
c praṇamya śirasā śarvaṃ tato vacanam ādade
a bhagavān me prasannaś ced īpsito 'yaṃ varo mama
c astrāṇīcchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ yāni deveṣu kāni cit
e dadānīty eva bhagavān abravīt tryambakaś ca mām
a raudram astraṃ madīyaṃ tvām upasthāsyati pāṇḍava
c pradadau ca mama prītaḥ so 'straṃ pāśupataṃ prabhuḥ
a uvāca ca mahādevo dattvā me 'straṃ sanātanam
c na prayojyaṃ bhaved etan mānuṣeṣu kathaṃ cana
d jagad vinirdahed evam alpatejasi pātitam
a pīḍyamānena balavat prayojyaṃ te dhanaṃjaya
c astrāṇāṃ pratighāte ca sarvathaiva prayojayeḥ
a tad apratihataṃ divyaṃ sarvāstrapratiṣedhanam
c mūrtiman me sthitaṃ pārśve prasanne govṛṣadhvaje
a utsādanam amitrāṇāṃ parasenānikartanam
c durāsadaṃ duṣprahasaṃ suradānavarākṣasaiḥ
a anujñātas tv ahaṃ tena tatraiva samupāviśam
c prekṣataś caiva me devas tatraivāntaradhīyata
 arjuna uvāca
a tatas tām avasaṃ prīto rajanīṃ tatra bhārata
c prasādād devadevasya tryambakasya mahātmanaḥ
a vyuṣito rajanīṃ cāhaṃ kṛtvā pūrvāhṇikakriyām
c apaśyaṃ taṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi yaṃ purā
a tasmai cāhaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ sarvam eva nyavedayam
c bhagavantaṃ mahādevaṃ sameto 'smīti bhārata
a sa mām uvāca rājendra prīyamāṇo dvijottamaḥ
c dṛṣṭas tvayā mahādevo yathā nānyena kena cit
a sametya lokapālais tu sarvair vaivasvatādibhiḥ
c draṣṭāsy anagha devendraṃ sa ca te 'strāṇi dāsyati
a evam uktvā sa māṃ rājann āśliṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ
c agacchat sa yathākāmaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ sūryasaṃnibhaḥ
a athāparāhṇe tasyāhnaḥ prāvāt puṇyaḥ samīraṇaḥ
c punar navam imaṃ lokaṃ kurvann iva sapatnahan
a divyāni caiva mālyāni sugandhīni navāni ca
c śaiśirasya gireḥ pāde prādurāsan samīpataḥ
a vāditrāṇi ca divyāni sughoṣāṇi samantataḥ
c stutayaś cendrasaṃyuktā aśrūyanta manoharāḥ
a gaṇāś cāpsarasāṃ tatra gandharvāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
c purastād devadevasya jagur gītāni sarvaśaḥ
a marutāṃ ca gaṇās tatra devayānair upāgaman
c mahendrānucarā ye ca devasadmanivāsinaḥ
a tato marutvān haribhir yuktair vāhaiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
c śacīsahāyas tatrāyāt saha sarvais tadāmaraiḥ
a etasminn eva kāle tu kubero naravāhanaḥ
c darśayām āsa māṃ rājaṃl lakṣmyā paramayā yutaḥ
a dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi yamaṃ pratyapaśyaṃ vyavasthitam
c varuṇaṃ devarājaṃ ca yathāsthānam avasthitam
a te mām ūcur mahārāja sāntvayitvā surarṣabhāḥ
c savyasācin samīkṣasva lokapālān avasthitān
a surakāryārthasiddhyarthaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi śaṃkaram
c asmatto 'pi gṛhāṇa tvam astrāṇīti samantataḥ
a tato 'haṃ prayato bhūtvā praṇipatya surarṣabhān
c pratyagṛhṇaṃ tadāstrāṇi mahānti vidhivat prabho
a gṛhītāstras tato devair anujñāto 'smi bhārata
c atha devā yayuḥ sarve yathāgatam ariṃdama
a maghavān api deveśo ratham āruhya suprabham
c uvāca bhagavān vākyaṃ smayann iva surārihā
a puraivāgamanād asmād vedāhaṃ tvāṃ dhanaṃjaya
c ataḥ paraṃ tv ahaṃ vai tvāṃ darśaye bharatarṣabha
a tvayā hi tīrtheṣu purā samāplāvaḥ kṛto 'sakṛt
c tapaś cedaṃ purā taptaṃ svargaṃ gantāsi pāṇḍava
a bhūyaś caiva tu taptavyaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
b duścaraṃ ghoram astrāṇāṃ tapasaś copadarśanam
c uvāca bhagavān sarvaṃ tapasaś copapādanam
d svargas tv avaśyaṃ gantavyas tvayā śatruniṣūdana
a mātalir manniyogāt tvāṃ tridivaṃ prāpayiṣyati
c viditas tvaṃ hi devānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
d ihasthaḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha tapaḥ kurvan suduṣkaram
a tato 'ham abruvaṃ śakraṃ prasīda bhagavan mama
c ācāryaṃ varaye tvāham astrārthaṃ tridaśeśvara
 indra uvāca
a krūraṃ karmāstravit tāta kariṣyasi paraṃtapa
c yadartham astrāṇīpsus tvaṃ taṃ kāmaṃ pāṇḍavāpnuhi
 arjuna uvāca
a tato 'ham abruvaṃ nāhaṃ divyāny astrāṇi śatruhan
c mānuṣeṣu prayokṣyāmi vināstrapratighātanam
a tāni divyāni me 'strāṇi prayaccha vibudhādhipa
c lokāṃś cāstrajitān paścāl labheyaṃ surapuṃgava
 indra uvāca
a parīkṣārthaṃ mayaitat te vākyam uktaṃ dhanaṃjaya
c mamātmajasya vacanaṃ sūpapannam idaṃ tava
a śikṣa me bhavanaṃ gatvā sarvāṇy astrāṇi bhārata
c vāyor agner vasubhyo 'tha varuṇāt samarudgaṇāt
a sādhyaṃ paitāmahaṃ caiva gandharvoragarakṣasām
c vaiṣṇavāni ca sarvāṇi nairṛtāni tathaiva ca
e madgatāni ca yānīha sarvāstrāṇi kurūdvaha
 arjuna uvāca
a evam uktvā tu māṃ śakras tatraivāntaradhīyata
c athāpaśyaṃ hariyujaṃ ratham aindram upasthitam
e divyaṃ māyāmayaṃ puṇyaṃ yattaṃ mātalinā nṛpa
a lokapāleṣu yāteṣu mām uvācātha mātaliḥ
c draṣṭum icchati śakras tvāṃ devarājo mahādyute
a saṃsiddhas tvaṃ mahābāho kuru kāryam anuttamam
c paśya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān saśarīro divaṃ vraja
d devarājaḥ sahasrākṣas tvāṃ didṛkṣati bhārata
a ity ukto 'haṃ mātalinā girim āmantrya śaiśiram
c pradakṣiṇam upāvṛtya samārohaṃ rathottamam
a codayām āsa sa hayān manomārutaraṃhasaḥ
c mātalir hayaśāstrajño yathāvad bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
a avaikṣata ca me vaktraṃ sthitasyātha sa sārathiḥ
c tathā bhrānte rathe rājan vismitaś cedam abravīt
a atyadbhutam idaṃ me 'dya vicitraṃ pratibhāti mām
c yad āsthito rathaṃ divyaṃ padā na calito bhavān
a devarājo 'pi hi mayā nityam atropalakṣitaḥ
c vicalan prathamotpāte hayānāṃ bharatarṣabha
a tvaṃ punaḥ sthita evātra rathe bhrānte kurūdvaha
c atiśakram idaṃ sattvaṃ taveti pratibhāti me
a ity uktvākāśam āviśya mātalir vibudhālayān
c darśayām āsa me rājan vimānāni ca bhārata
d sa ratho haribhir yukto hy ūrdhvam ācakrame tataḥ
d ṛṣayo devatāś caiva pūjayanti narottama
d tataḥ kāmagamāṃl lokān apaśyaṃ vai surarṣiṇām
d gandharvāpsarasāṃ caiva prabhāvam amitaujasām
a nandanādīni devānāṃ vanāni bahulāny uta
c darśayām āsa me prītyā mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥ
a tataḥ śakrasya bhavanam apaśyam amarāvatīm
c divyaiḥ kāmaphalair vṛkṣai ratnaiś ca samalaṃkṛtām
a na tāṃ bhāsayate sūryo na śītoṣṇe na ca klamaḥ
c rajaḥ paṅko na ca tamas tatrāsti na jarā nṛpa
a na tatra śoko dainyaṃ vā vaivarṇyaṃ copalakṣyate
c divaukasāṃ mahārāja na ca glānir ariṃdama
a na krodhalobhau tatrāstām aśubhaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
c nityatuṣṭāś ca hṛṣṭāś ca prāṇinaḥ suraveśmani
a nityapuṣpaphalās tatra pādapā haritacchadāḥ
c puṣkariṇyaś ca vividhāḥ padmasaugandhikāyutāḥ
a śītas tatra vavau vāyuḥ sugandho jīvanaḥ śuciḥ
c sarvaratnavicitrā ca bhūmiḥ puṣpavibhūṣitā
a mṛgadvijāś ca bahavo rucirā madhurasvarāḥ
c vimānayāyinaś cātra dṛśyante bahavo 'marāḥ
a tato 'paśyaṃ vasūn rudrān sādhyāṃś ca samarudgaṇān
c ādityān aśvinau caiva tān sarvān pratyapūjayam
a te māṃ vīryeṇa yaśasā tejasā ca balena ca
c astraiś cāpy anvajānanta saṃgrāmavijayena ca
a praviśya tāṃ purīṃ ramyāṃ devagandharvasevitām
c devarājaṃ sahasrākṣam upātiṣṭhaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
a dadāv ardhāsanaṃ prītaḥ śakro me dadatāṃ varaḥ
c bahumānāc ca gātrāṇi pasparśa mama vāsavaḥ
a tatrāhaṃ devagandharvaiḥ sahito bhuridakṣiṇa
c astrārtham avasaṃ svarge kurvāṇo 'strāṇi bhārata
a viśvāvasoś ca me putraś citraseno 'bhavat sakhā
c sa ca gāndharvam akhilaṃ grāhayām āsa māṃ nṛpa
a tato 'ham avasaṃ rājan gṛhītāstraḥ supūjitaḥ
c sukhaṃ śakrasya bhavane sarvakāmasamanvitaḥ
a śṛṇvan vai gītaśabdaṃ ca tūryaśabdaṃ ca puṣkalam
c paśyaṃś cāpsarasaḥ śreṣṭhā nṛtyamānāḥ paraṃtapa
a tat sarvam anavajñāya tathyaṃ vijjñāya bhārata
c atyarthaṃ pratigṛhyāham astreṣv eva vyavasthitaḥ
a tato 'tuṣyat sahasrākṣas tena kāmena me vibhuḥ
c evaṃ me vasato rājann eṣa kālo 'tyagād divi
 arjuna uvāca
a kṛtāstram abhiviśvastam atha māṃ harivāhanaḥ
c saṃspṛśya mūrdhni pāṇibhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a na tvam adya yudhā jetuṃ śakyaḥ suragaṇair api
c kiṃ punar mānuṣe loke mānuṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ
e aprameyo 'pradhṛṣyaś ca yuddheṣv apratimas tathā
f ajeyas tvaṃ hi saṃgrāme sarvair api surāsuraiḥ
a athābravīt punar devaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ
c astrayuddhe samo vīra na te kaś cid bhaviṣyati
a apramattaḥ sadā dakṣaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
c brahmaṇyaś cāstravic cāsi śūraś cāsi kurūdvaha
a astrāṇi samavāptāni tvayā daśa ca pañca ca
c pañcabhir vidhibhiḥ pārtha na tvayā vidyate samaḥ
a prayogam upasaṃhāram āvṛttiṃ ca dhanaṃjaya
c prāyaścittaṃ ca vettha tvaṃ pratighātaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
a tava gurvarthakālo 'yam upapannaḥ paraṃtapa
c pratijānīṣva taṃ kartum ato vetsyāmy ahaṃ param
a tato 'ham abruvaṃ rājan devarājam idaṃ vacaḥ
c viṣahyaṃ cen mayā kartuṃ kṛtam eva nibodha tat
a tato mām abravīd rājan prahasya balavṛtrahā
c nāviṣahyaṃ tavādyāsti triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
a nivātakavacā nāma dānavā mama śatravaḥ
c samudrakukṣim āśritya durge prativasanty uta
a tisraḥ koṭyaḥ samākhyātās tulyarūpabalaprabhāḥ
c tāṃs tatra jahi kaunteya gurvarthas te bhaviṣyati
a tato mātalisaṃyuktaṃ mayūrasamaromabhiḥ
c hayair upetaṃ prādān me rathaṃ divyaṃ mahāprabham
a babandha caiva me mūrdhni kirīṭam idam uttamam
c svarūpasadṛśaṃ caiva prādād aṅgavibhūṣaṇam
a abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ cedaṃ sparśarūpavad uttamam
c ajarāṃ jyām imāṃ cāpi gāṇḍīve samayojayat
a tataḥ prāyām ahaṃ tena syandanena virājatā
c yenājayad devapatir baliṃ vairocaniṃ purā
a tato devāḥ sarva eva tena ghoṣeṇa bodhitaḥ
c manvānā devarājaṃ māṃ samājagmur viśāṃ pate
e dṛṣṭvā ca mām apṛcchanta kiṃ kariṣyasi phalguna
a tān abruvaṃ yathābhūtam idaṃ kartāsmi saṃyuge
c nivātakavacānāṃ tu prasthitaṃ māṃ vadhaiṣiṇam
e nibodhata mahābhāgāḥ śivaṃ cāśāsta me 'naghāḥ
f tato vāgbhiḥ praśastābhis tridaśāḥ pṛthivīpate
a tuṣṭuvur māṃ prasannās te yathā devaṃ puraṃdaram
c rathenānena maghavā jitavāñ śambaraṃ yudhi
e namuciṃ balavṛtrau ca prahlādanarakāv api
a bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
c rathenānena daityānāṃ jitavān maghavān yudhi
a tvam apy etena kaunteya nivātakavacān raṇe
c vijetā yudhi vikramya pureva maghavān vaśī
a ayaṃ ca śaṅkhapravaro yena jetāsi dānavān
c anena vijitā lokāḥ śakreṇāpi mahātmanā
a pradīyamānaṃ devais tu devadattaṃ jalodbhavam
c pratyagṛhṇaṃ jayāyainaṃ stūyamānas tadāmaraiḥ
a sa śaṅkhī kavacī bāṇī pragṛhītaśarāsanaḥ
c dānavālayam atyugraṃ prayāto 'smi yuyutsayā
 arjuna uvāca
a tato 'haṃ stūyamānas tu tatra tatra maharṣibhiḥ
c apaśyam udadhiṃ bhīmam apāṃpatim athāvyayam
a phenavatyaḥ prakīrṇāś ca saṃhatāś ca samucchritāḥ
c ūrmayaś cātra dṛśyante calanta iva parvatāḥ
e nāvaḥ sahasraśas tatra ratnapūrṇāḥ samantataḥ
f nabhasīva vimānāni vicarantyo virejire
a timiṃgilāḥ kacchapāś ca tathā timitimiṃgilāḥ
c makarāś cātra dṛśyante jale magnā ivādrayaḥ
a śaṅkhānāṃ ca sahasrāṇi magnāny apsu samantataḥ
c dṛśyante sma yathā rātrau tārās tanv abhrasaṃvṛtāḥ
a tathā sahasraśas tatra ratnasaṃghāḥ plavanty uta
c vāyuś ca ghūrṇate bhīmas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tam atītya mahāvegaṃ sarvāmbhonidhim uttamam
c apaśyaṃ dānavākīrṇaṃ tad daityapuram antikāt
a tatraiva mātalis tūrṇaṃ nipatya pṛthivītale
b rathaṃ taṃ tu samāśliṣya prādravad rathayogavit
c nādayan rathaghoṣeṇa tat puraṃ samupādravat
a rathaghoṣaṃ tu taṃ śrutvā stanayitnor ivāmbare
c manvānā devarājaṃ māṃ saṃvignā dānavābhavan
a sarve saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ śaracāpadharāḥ sthitāḥ
c tathā śūlāsiparaśugadāmusalapāṇayaḥ
a tato dvārāṇi pidadhur dānavās trastacetasaḥ
c saṃvidhāya pure rakṣāṃ na sma kaś cana dṛśyate
a tataḥ śaṅkham upādāya devadattaṃ mahāsvanam
c puram āsuram āśliṣya prādhamaṃ taṃ śanair aham
a sa tu śabdo divaṃ stabdhvā pratiśabdam ajījanat
c vitresuś ca nililyuś ca bhūtāni sumahānty api
a tato nivātakavacāḥ sarva eva samantataḥ
c daṃśitā vividhais trāṇair vividhāyudhapāṇayaḥ
a āyasaiś ca mahāśūlair gadābhir musalair api
c paṭṭiśaiḥ karavālaiś ca rathacakraiś ca bhārata
a śataghnībhir bhuśuṇḍībhiḥ khaḍgaiś citraiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
c pragṛhītair diteḥ putrāḥ prādurāsan sahasraśaḥ
a tato vicārya bahudhā rathamārgeṣu tān hayān
c prācodayat same deśe mātalir bharatarṣabha
a tena teṣāṃ praṇunnānām āśutvāc chīghragāminām
c nānvapaśyaṃ tadā kiṃ cit tan me 'dbhutam ivābhavat
a tatas te dānavās tatra yodhavrātāny anekaśaḥ
c vikṛtasvararūpāṇi bhṛśaṃ sarvāṇy acodayan
a tena śabdena mahatā samudre parvatopamāḥ
c āplavanta gataiḥ sattvair matsyāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
a tato vegena mahatā dānavā mām upādravan
c vimuñcantaḥ śitān bāṇāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a sa saṃprahāras tumulas teṣāṃ mama ca bhārata
c avartata mahāghoro nivātakavacāntakaḥ
a tato devarṣayaś caiva dānavarṣigaṇāś ca ye
c brahmarṣayaś ca siddhāś ca samājagmur mahāmṛdhe
a te vai mām anurūpābhir madhurābhir jayaiṣiṇaḥ
c astuvan munayo vāgbhir yathendraṃ tārakāmaye
 arjuna uvāca
a tato nivātakavacāḥ sarve vegena bhārata
c abhyadravan māṃ sahitāḥ pragṛhītāyudhā raṇe
a ācchidya rathapanthānam utkrośanto mahārathāḥ
c āvṛtya sarvatas te māṃ śaravarṣair avākiran
a tato 'pare mahāvīryāḥ śūlapaṭṭiśapāṇayaḥ
c śūlāni ca bhuśuṇḍīś ca mumucur dānavā mayi
a tac chūlavarṣaṃ sumahad gadāśaktisamākulam
c aniśaṃ sṛjyamānaṃ tair apatan madrathopari
a anye mām abhyadhāvanta nivātakavacā yudhi
c śitaśastrāyudhā raudrāḥ kālarūpāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
a tān ahaṃ vividhair bāṇair vegavadbhir ajihmagaiḥ
c gāṇḍīvamuktair abhyaghnam ekaikaṃ daśabhir mṛdhe
e te kṛtā vimukhāḥ sarve matprayuktaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ
a tato mātalinā tūrṇaṃ hayās te saṃpracoditāḥ
c rathamārgād bahūṃs tatra vicerur vātaraṃhasaḥ
e susaṃyatā mātalinā prāmathnanta diteḥ sutān
a śataṃ śatās te harayas tasmin yuktā mahārathe
c tadā mātalinā yattā vyacarann alpakā iva
a teṣāṃ caraṇapātena rathanemisvanena ca
c mama bāṇanipātaiś ca hatās te śataśo 'surāḥ
a gatāsavas tathā cānye pragṛhītaśarāsanāḥ
c hatasārathayas tatra vyakṛṣyanta turaṃgamaiḥ
a te diśo vidiśaḥ sarvāḥ pratirudhya prahāriṇaḥ
c nighnanti vividhaiḥ śastrais tato me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
a tato 'haṃ mātaler vīryam apaśyaṃ paramādbhutam
c aśvāṃs tathā vegavato yad ayatnād adhārayat
a tato 'haṃ laghubhiś citrair astrais tān asurān raṇe
c sāyudhān acchinaṃ rājañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a evaṃ me caratas tatra sarvayatnena śatruhan
c prītimān abhavad vīro mātaliḥ śakrasārathiḥ
a vadhyamānās tatas te tu hayais tena rathena ca
c agaman prakṣayaṃ ke cin nyavartanta tathāpare
a spardhamānā ivāsmābhir nivātakavacā raṇe
c śaravarṣair mahadbhir māṃ samantāt pratyavārayan
d śaravegair nihatyāham astraiḥ śaravighātibhiḥ
d jvaladbhiḥ paramaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyaṃ sahasraśaḥ
a tato 'haṃ laghubhiś citrair brahmāstraparimantritaiḥ
c vyadhamaṃ sāyakair āśu śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a tataḥ saṃpīḍyamānās te krodhāviṣṭā mahāsurāḥ
c apīḍayan māṃ sahitāḥ śaraśūlāsivṛṣṭibhiḥ
a tato 'ham astram ātiṣṭhaṃ paramaṃ tigmatejasam
c dayitaṃ devarājasya mādhavaṃ nāma bhārata
a tataḥ khaḍgāṃs triśūlāṃś ca tomarāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
c astravīryeṇa śatadhā tair muktān aham acchinam
a chittvā praharaṇāny eṣāṃ tatas tān api sarvaśaḥ
c pratyavidhyam ahaṃ roṣād daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
a gāṇḍīvād dhi tadā saṃkhye yathā bhramarapaṅktayaḥ
c niṣpatanti tathā bāṇās tan mātalir apūjayat
a teṣām api tu bāṇās te bahutvāc chalabhā iva
c avākiran māṃ balavat tān ahaṃ vyadhamaṃ śaraiḥ
a vadhyamānās tatas te tu nivātakavacāḥ punaḥ
c śaravarṣair mahadbhir māṃ samantāt paryavārayan
a śaravegān nihatyāham astraiḥ śaravighātibhiḥ
c jvaladbhiḥ paramaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyaṃ sahasraśaḥ
a teṣāṃ chinnāni gātrāṇi visṛjanti sma śoṇitam
c prāvṛṣīvātivṛṣṭāni śṛṅgāṇīva dharābhṛtām
a indrāśanisamasparśair vegavadbhir ajihmagaiḥ
c madbāṇair vadhyamānās te samudvignāḥ sma dānavāḥ
a śatadhā bhinnadehāntrāḥ kṣīṇapraharaṇaujasaḥ
c tato nivātakavacā mām ayudhyanta māyayā
 arjuna uvāca
a tato 'śmavarṣaṃ sumahat prādurāsīt samantataḥ
c nagamātrair mahāghorais tan māṃ dṛḍham apīḍayat
a tad ahaṃ vajrasaṃkāśaiḥ śarair indrāstracoditaiḥ
c acūrṇayaṃ vegavadbhiḥ śatadhaikaikam āhave
a cūrṇyamāne 'śmavarṣe tu pāvakaḥ samajāyata
c tatrāśmacūrṇam apatat pāvakaprakarā iva
d tato 'haṃ vāruṇāstreṇa aśmavarṣaṃ viśātavān
a tato 'śmavarṣe nihate jalavarṣaṃ mahattaram
c dhārābhir akṣamātrābhiḥ prādurāsīn mamāntike
a nabhasaḥ pracyutā dhārās tigmavīryāḥ sahasraśaḥ
c āvṛṇvan sarvato vyoma diśaś copadiśas tathā
a dhārāṇāṃ ca nipātena vāyor visphūrjitena ca
c garjitena ca daityānāṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
a dhārā divi ca saṃbaddhā vasudhāyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
c vyāmohayanta māṃ tatra nipatantyo 'niśaṃ bhuvi
a tatropadiṣṭam indreṇa divyam astraṃ viśoṣaṇam
c dīptaṃ prāhiṇavaṃ ghoram aśuṣyat tena taj jalam
a hate 'śmavarṣe tu mayā jalavarṣe ca śoṣite
c mumucur dānavā māyām agniṃ vāyuṃ ca mānada
a tato 'ham agniṃ vyadhamaṃ salilāstreṇa sarvaśaḥ
c śailena ca mahāstreṇa vāyor vegam adhārayam
a tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ
c prākurvan vividhā māyā yaugapadyena bhārata
a tato varṣaṃ prādurabhūt sumahal lomaharṣaṇam
c astrāṇāṃ ghorarūpāṇām agner vāyos tathāśmanām
a sā tu māyāmayī vṛṣṭiḥ pīḍayām āsa māṃ yudhi
c atha ghoraṃ tamas tīvraṃ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
a tamasā saṃvṛte loke ghoreṇa paruṣeṇa ca
c turagā vimukhāś cāsan prāskhalac cāpi mātaliḥ
a hastād dhiraṇmayaś cāsya pratodaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
c asakṛc cāha māṃ bhītaḥ kvāsīti bharatarṣabha
a māṃ ca bhīr āviśat tīvrā tasmin vigatacetasi
c sa ca māṃ vigatajñānaḥ saṃtrasta idam abravīt
a surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
c amṛtārthe purā pārtha sa ca dṛṣṭo mayānagha
a śambarasya vadhe cāpi saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān abhūt
c sārathyaṃ devarājasya tatrāpi kṛtavān aham
a tathaiva vṛtrasya vadhe saṃgṛhītā hayā mayā
c vairocaner mayā yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cāpi sudāruṇam
d balaprajñādayaś cāpi tathānyeṣāṃ ca pāṇḍava
a ete mayā mahāghorāḥ saṃgrāmāḥ paryupāsitāḥ
c na cāpi vigatajñāno bhūtapūrvo 'smi pāṇḍava
a pitāmahena saṃhāraḥ prajānāṃ vihito dhruvam
c na hi yuddham idaṃ yuktam anyatra jagataḥ kṣayāt
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā
c mohayiṣyan dānavānām ahaṃ māyāmayaṃ balam
a abruvaṃ mātaliṃ bhītaṃ paśya me bhujayor balam
c astrāṇāṃ ca prabhāvaṃ me dhanuṣo gāṇḍivasya ca
a adyāstramāyayaiteṣāṃ māyām etāṃ sudāruṇām
c vinihanmi tamaś cograṃ mā bhaiḥ sūta sthiro bhava
a evam uktvāham asṛjam astramāyāṃ narādhipa
c mohanīṃ sarvaśatrūṇāṃ hitāya tridivaukasām
a pīḍyamānāsu māyāsu tāsu tāsv asureśvarāḥ
c punar bahuvidhā māyāḥ prākurvann amitaujasaḥ
a punaḥ prakāśam abhavat tamasā grasyate punaḥ
c vrajaty adarśanaṃ lokaḥ punar apsu nimajjati
a susaṃgṛhītair haribhiḥ prakāśe sati mātaliḥ
c vyacarat syandanāgryeṇa saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇe
a tataḥ paryapatann ugrā nivātakavacā mayi
c tān ahaṃ vivaraṃ dṛṣṭvā prāhiṇvaṃ yamasādanam
d tathā devair avadhyatvaṃ purasyābhedyatvam eva tu
d manuṣyāṇāṃ durbalatvād upekṣyaiva mahāsuraiḥ
a vartamāne tathā yuddhe nivātakavacāntake
c nāpaśyaṃ sahasā sarvān dānavān māyayāvṛtān
 arjuna uvāca
a adṛśyamānās te daityā yodhayanti sma māyayā
c adṛśyān astravīryeṇa tān apy aham ayodhayam
a gāṇḍīvamuktā viśikhāḥ samyag astrapracoditāḥ
c acchindann uttamāṅgāni yatra yatra sma te 'bhavan
a tato nivātakavacā vadhyamānā mayā yudhi
c saṃhṛtya māyāṃ sahasā prāviśan puram ātmanaḥ
a vyapayāteṣu daityeṣu prādurbhūte ca darśane
c apaśyaṃ dānavāṃs tatra hatāñ śatasahasraśaḥ
a viniṣpiṣṭāni tatraiṣāṃ śastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca
c kūṭaśaḥ sma pradṛśyante gātrāṇi kavacāni ca
a hayānāṃ nāntaraṃ hy āsīt padād vicalituṃ padam
c utpatya sahasā tasthur antarikṣagamās tataḥ
a tato nivātakavacā vyoma saṃchādya kevalam
c adṛśyā hy abhyavartanta visṛjantaḥ śiloccayān
a antarbhūmigatāś cānye hayānāṃ caraṇāny atha
c nyagṛhṇan dānavā ghorā rathacakre ca bhārata
a vinigṛhya harīn aśvān rathaṃ ca mama yudhyataḥ
c sarvato mām acinvanta sarathaṃ dharaṇīdharaiḥ
a parvatair upacīyadbhiḥ patamānais tathāparaiḥ
c sa deśo yatra vartāma guheva samapadyata
a parvataiś chādyamāno 'haṃ nigṛhītaiś ca vājibhiḥ
c agacchaṃ paramām ārtiṃ mātalis tad alakṣayat
a lakṣayitvā tu māṃ bhītam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
c arjunārjuna mā bhais tvaṃ vajram astram udīraya
a tato 'haṃ tasya tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vajram udīrayam
c devarājasya dayitaṃ vajram astraṃ narādhipa
a acalaṃ sthānam āsādya gāṇḍīvam anumantrya ca
c amuñcaṃ vajrasaṃsparśān āyasān niśitāñ śarān
a tato māyāś ca tāḥ sarvā nivātakavacāṃś ca tān
c te vajracoditā bāṇā vajrabhūtāḥ samāviśan
a te vajravegābhihatā dānavāḥ parvatopamāḥ
c itaretaram āśliṣya nyapatan pṛthivītale
a antarbhūmau tu ye 'gṛhṇan dānavā rathavājinaḥ
c anupraviśya tān bāṇāḥ prāhiṇvan yamasādanam
a hatair nivātakavacair nirastaiḥ parvatopamaiḥ
c samācchādyata deśaḥ sa vikīrṇair iva parvataiḥ
a na hayānāṃ kṣatiḥ kā cin na rathasya na mātaleḥ
c mama cādṛśyata tadā tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tato māṃ prahasan rājan mātaliḥ pratyabhāṣata
c naitad arjuna deveṣu tvayi vīryaṃ yadīkṣyate
a hateṣv asurasaṃgheṣu dārās teṣāṃ tu sarvaśaḥ
c prākrośan nagare tasmin yathā śaradi lakṣmaṇāḥ
a tato mātalinā sārdham ahaṃ tat puram abhyayām
c trāsayan rathaghoṣeṇa nivātakavacastriyaḥ
a tān dṛṣṭvā daśasāhasrān mayūrasadṛśān hayān
c rathaṃ ca ravisaṃkāśaṃ prādravan gaṇaśaḥ striyaḥ
a tābhir ābharaṇaiḥ śabdas trāsitābhiḥ samīritaḥ
c śilānām iva śaileṣu patantīnām abhūt tadā
a vitrastā daityanāryas tāḥ svāni veśmāny athāviśan
c bahuratnavicitrāṇi śātakumbhamayāni ca
a tad adbhutākāram ahaṃ dṛṣṭvā nagaram uttamam
c viśiṣṭaṃ devanagarād apṛcchaṃ mātaliṃ tataḥ
a idam evaṃvidhaṃ kasmād devatā nāviśanty uta
c puraṃdarapurād dhīdaṃ viśiṣṭam iti lakṣaye
 mātalir uvāca
a āsīd idaṃ purā pārtha devarājasya naḥ puram
c tato nivātakavacair itaḥ pracyāvitāḥ surāḥ
a tapas taptvā mahat tīvraṃ prasādya ca pitāmaham
c idaṃ vṛtaṃ nivāsāya devebhyaś cābhayaṃ yudhi
a tataḥ śakreṇa bhagavān svayambhūr abhicoditaḥ
c vidhattāṃ bhagavān atrety ātmano hitakāmyayā
a tata ukto bhagavatā diṣṭam atreti vāsavaḥ
c bhavitāntas tvam evaiṣāṃ dehenānyena vṛtrahan
a tata eṣāṃ vadhārthāya śakro 'strāṇi dadau tava
c na hi śakyāḥ surair hantuṃ ya ete nihatās tvayā
a kālasya pariṇāmena tatas tvam iha bhārata
c eṣām antakaraḥ prāptas tat tvayā ca kṛtaṃ tathā
a dānavānāṃ vināśārthaṃ mahāstrāṇāṃ mahad balam
c grāhitas tvaṃ mahendreṇa puruṣendra tad uttamam
 arjuna uvāca
a tataḥ praviśya nagaraṃ dānavāṃś ca nihatya tān
c punar mātalinā sārdham agacchaṃ devasadma tat
 arjuna uvāca
a nivartamānena mayā mahad dṛṣṭaṃ tato 'param
c puraṃ kāmacaraṃ divyaṃ pāvakārkasamaprabham
a drumai ratnamayaiś caitrair bhāsvaraiś ca patatribhiḥ
c paulomaiḥ kālakeyaiś ca nityahṛṣṭair adhiṣṭhitam
a gopurāṭṭālakopetaṃ caturdvāraṃ durāsadam
c sarvaratnamayaṃ divyam adbhutopamadarśanam
e drumaiḥ puṣpaphalopetair divyaratnamayair vṛtam
a tathā patatribhir divyair upetaṃ sumanoharaiḥ
c asurair nityamuditaiḥ śūlarṣṭimusalāyudhaiḥ
e cāpamudgarahastaiś ca sragvibhiḥ sarvato vṛtam
a tad ahaṃ prekṣya daityānāṃ puram adbhutadarśanam
c apṛcchaṃ mātaliṃ rājan kim idaṃ dṛśyateti vai
 mātalir uvāca
a pulomā nāma daiteyī kālakā ca mahāsurī
c divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ te ceratuḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ
e tapaso 'nte tatas tābhyāṃ svayambhūr adadād varam
a agṛhṇītāṃ varaṃ te tu sutānām alpaduḥkhatām
c avadhyatāṃ ca rājendra surarākṣasapannagaiḥ
a ramaṇīyaṃ puraṃ cedaṃ khacaraṃ sukṛtaprabham
c sarvaratnaiḥ samuditaṃ durdharṣam amarair api
e sayakṣagandharvagaṇaiḥ pannagāsurarākṣasaiḥ
a sarvakāmaguṇopetaṃ vītaśokam anāmayam
c brahmaṇā bharataśreṣṭha kālakeyakṛte kṛtam
a tad etat khacaraṃ divyaṃ caraty amaravarjitam
c paulomādhyuṣitaṃ vīra kālakeyaiś ca dānavaiḥ
a hiraṇyapuram ity etat khyāyate nagaraṃ mahat
c rakṣitaṃ kālakeyaiś ca paulomaiś ca mahāsuraiḥ
a ta ete muditā nityam avadhyāḥ sarvadaivataiḥ
c nivasanty atra rājendra gatodvegā nirutsukāḥ
d surāsurair avadhyānāṃ dānavānāṃ dhanaṃjaya
e mānuṣo mṛtyur eteṣāṃ nirdiṣṭo brahmaṇā purā
f etān api raṇe pārtha kālakañjān durāsadān
f vajrāstreṇa nayasvāśu vināśaṃ sumahābalān
 arjuna uvāca
a surāsurair avadhyāṃs tān ahaṃ jñātvā tataḥ prabho
c abruvaṃ mātaliṃ hṛṣṭo yāhy etat puram añjasā
a tridaśeśadviṣo yāvat kṣayam astrair nayāmy aham
c na kathaṃ cid dhi me pāpā na vadhyā ye suradviṣaḥ
a uvāha māṃ tataḥ śīghraṃ hiraṇyapuram antikāt
c rathena tena divyena hariyuktena mātaliḥ
a te mām ālakṣya daiteyā vicitrābharaṇāmbarāḥ
c samutpetur mahāvegā rathān āsthāya daṃśitāḥ
a tato nālīkanārācair bhallaśaktyṛṣṭitomaraiḥ
c abhyaghnan dānavendrā māṃ kruddhās tīvraparākramāḥ
a tad ahaṃ cāstravarṣeṇa mahatā pratyavārayam
c śastravarṣaṃ mahad rājan vidyābalam upāśritaḥ
a vyāmohayaṃ ca tān sarvān rathamārgaiś caran raṇe
c te 'nyonyam abhisaṃmūḍhāḥ pātayanti sma dānavāḥ
a teṣām ahaṃ vimūḍhānām anyonyam abhidhāvatām
c śirāṃsi viśikhair dīptair vyaharaṃ śatasaṃghaśaḥ
a te vadhyamānā daiteyāḥ puram āsthāya tat punaḥ
c kham utpetuḥ sanagarā māyām āsthāya dānavīm
a tato 'haṃ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā pratyavārayam
c mārgam āvṛtya daityānāṃ gatiṃ caiṣām avārayam
a tat puraṃ khacaraṃ divyaṃ kāmagaṃ divyavarcasam
c daiteyair varadānena dhāryate sma yathāsukham
a antarbhūmau nipatitaṃ punar ūrdhvaṃ pratiṣṭhate
c punas tiryak prayāty āśu punar apsu nimajjati
a amarāvatisaṃkāśaṃ puraṃ kāmagamaṃ tu tat
c aham astrair bahuvidhaiḥ pratyagṛhṇaṃ narādhipa
a tato 'haṃ śarajālena divyāstramuditena ca
c nyagṛhṇaṃ saha daiteyais tat puraṃ bharatarṣabha
a vikṣataṃ cāyasair bāṇair matprayuktair ajihmagaiḥ
c mahīm abhyapatad rājan prabhagnaṃ puram āsuram
a te vadhyamānā madbāṇair vajravegair ayasmayaiḥ
c paryabhramanta vai rājann asurāḥ kālacoditāḥ
a tato mātalir apy āśu purastān nipatann iva
c mahīm avātarat kṣipraṃ rathenādityavarcasā
a tato rathasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭis teṣām amarṣiṇām
c yuyutsūnāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ paryavartanta bhārata
a tān ahaṃ niśitair bāṇair vyadhamaṃ gārdhravājitaiḥ
c te yuddhe saṃnyavartanta samudrasya yathormayaḥ
a neme śakyā mānuṣeṇa yuddheneti pracintya vai
c tato 'ham ānupūrvyeṇa sarvāṇy astrāṇy ayojayam
a tatas tāni sahasrāṇi rathānāṃ citrayodhinām
c astrāṇi mama divyāni pratyaghnañ śanakair iva
a rathamārgān vicitrāṃs te vicaranto mahārathāḥ
c pratyadṛśyanta saṃgrāme śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a vicitramukuṭāpīḍā vicitrakavacadhvajāḥ
c vicitrābharaṇāś caiva nandayantīva me manaḥ
a ahaṃ tu śaravarṣais tān astrapramuditai raṇe
c nāśaknuvaṃ pīḍayituṃ te tu māṃ paryapīḍayan
a taiḥ pīḍyamāno bahubhiḥ kṛtāstraiḥ kuśalair yudhi
c vyathito 'smi mahāyuddhe bhayaṃ cāgān mahan mama
d tato 'haṃ paramāyasto mātaliṃ paripṛṣṭavān
d kim ete mama bāṇaughair divyāstraparimantritaiḥ
d na vadhyante mahāghorais tattvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
d sa mām uvāca paryāptas tvam eṣāṃ bharatarṣabha
d tān uddiśyātha marmāṇi pratighātaṃ tadācara
d etac chrutvā tu rājendra saṃprahṛṣṭas tam ūcivān
d nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ paśya caitān nipātitān
d evam ukto rathaṃ tatra mātaliḥ paryavartayat
d tato matvā raṇe bhagnaṃ dānavāḥ pratiharṣitāḥ
d vicukruśur mahārāja svareṇa mahatā tadā
d abhagnaḥ kaiś cid apy eṣa pāṇḍavo raṇamūrdhani
d asmābhiḥ samare bhagna ity evaṃ saṃghaśas tadā
a tato 'haṃ devadevāya rudrāya praṇato raṇe
b prayataḥ praṇato bhūtvā namaskṛtya mahātmane
c svasti bhūtebhya ity uktvā mahāstraṃ samayojayam
e yat tad raudram iti khyātaṃ sarvāmitravināśanam
f ahaṃ pāśupataṃ divyaṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtam
a tato 'paśyaṃ triśirasaṃ puruṣaṃ navalocanam
c trimukhaṃ ṣaḍbhujaṃ dīptam arkajvalanamūrdhajam

a sukhoṣitās tatra ta ekarātraṃ
sūtān upādāya rathāṃś ca sarvān
c ghaṭotkacaṃ sānucaraṃ visṛjya
tato 'bhyayur yāmunam adrirājam
a tasmin girau prasravaṇopapanne
himottarīyāruṇapāṇḍusānau
c viśākhayūpaṃ samupetya cakrus
tadā nivāsaṃ puruṣapravīrāḥ
a varāhanānāmṛgapakṣijuṣṭaṃ
mahad vanaṃ caitrarathaprakāśam
c śivena yātvā mṛgayāpradhānāḥ
saṃvatsaraṃ tatra vane vijahruḥ
a tatrāsasādātibalaṃ bhujaṃgaṃ
kṣudhārditaṃ mṛtyum ivograrūpam
c vṛkodaraḥ parvatakandarāyāṃ
viṣādamohavyathitāntarātmā
a dvīpo 'bhavad yatra vṛkodarasya
yudhiṣṭhiro dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
c amokṣayad yas tam anantatejā
grāheṇa saṃveṣṭitasarvagātram
a te dvādaśaṃ varṣam athopayāntaṃ
vane vihartuṃ kuravaḥ pratītāḥ
c tasmād vanāc caitrarathaprakāśāc
chriyā jvalantas tapasā ca yuktāḥ
a tataś ca yātvā marudhanvapārśvaṃ
sadā dhanurvedaratipradhānāḥ
c sarasvatīm etya nivāsakāmāḥ
saras tato dvaitavanaṃ pratīyuḥ
a samīkṣya tān dvaitavane niviṣṭān
nivāsinas tatra tato 'bhijagmuḥ
c tapodamācārasamādhiyuktās
tṛṇodapātrāharaṇāśmakuṭṭāḥ
a plakṣākṣarauhītakavetasāś ca
snuhā badaryaḥ khadirāḥ śirīṣāḥ
c bilveṅgudāḥ pīluśamīkarīrāḥ
sarasvatītīraruhā babhūvuḥ
a tāṃ yakṣagandharvamaharṣikāntām
āyāgabhūtām iva devatānām
c sarasvatīṃ prītiyutāś carantaḥ
sukhaṃ vijahrur naradevaputrāḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a kathaṃ nāgāyutaprāṇo bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
c bhayam āhārayat tīvraṃ tasmād ajagarān mune
a paulastyaṃ yo ''hvayad yuddhe dhanadaṃ baladarpitaḥ
c nalinyāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtvā varāṇāṃ yakṣarakṣasām
a taṃ śaṃsasi bhayāviṣṭam āpannam arikarṣaṇam
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a bahvāścarye vane teṣāṃ vasatām ugradhanvinām
c prāptānām āśramād rājan rājarṣer vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ
a yadṛcchayā dhanuṣpāṇir baddhakhaḍgo vṛkodaraḥ
c dadarśa tad vanaṃ ramyaṃ devagandharvasevitam
a sa dadarśa śubhān deśān girer himavatas tadā
c devarṣisiddhacaritān apsarogaṇasevitān
a cakoraiś cakravākaiś ca pakṣibhir jīvajīvakaiḥ
c kokilair bhṛṅgarājaiś ca tatra tatra vināditān
a nityapuṣpaphalair vṛkṣair himasaṃsparśakomalaiḥ
c upetān bahulacchāyair manonayananandanaiḥ
a sa saṃpaśyan girinadīr vaiḍūryamaṇisaṃnibhaiḥ
c salilair himasaṃsparśair haṃsakāraṇḍavāyutaiḥ
a vanāni devadārūṇāṃ meghānām iva vāgurāḥ
c haricandanamiśrāṇi tuṅgakālīyakāny api
a mṛgayāṃ paridhāvan sa sameṣu marudhanvasu
c vidhyan mṛgāñ śaraiḥ śuddhaiś cacāra sumahābalaḥ
d bhīmasenas tu vikhyāto mahāntaṃ daṃṣṭriṇaṃ balāt
d nighnan nāgaśataprāṇo vane tasmin mahābhujaḥ
d mṛgāṇāṃ savarāhāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ mahābhujaḥ
d vinighnaṃs tatra tatraiva bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
d sa mātaṅgaśataprāṇo manuṣyaśatavāraṇaḥ
d siṃhaśārdūlavikrānto vane tasmin mahābalaḥ
d vṛkṣān utpāṭayām āsa tarasā vai babhañja ca
d pṛthivyāś ca pradeśān vai nādayaṃs tu vanāni ca
d parvatāgrāṇi vai mṛdnan nādayānaś ca vijvaraḥ
d prakṣipan pādapāṃś cāpi nādenāpūrayan mahīm
d vegena nyapatad bhīmo nirbhayaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
d āsphoṭayan kṣveḍayaṃś ca talatālāṃś ca vādayan
d cirasaṃbaddhadarpas tu bhīmaseno vane tadā
d gajendrāś ca mahāsattvā mṛgendrāś ca mahābalāḥ
d bhīmasenasya nādena vyamuñcanta guhā bhayāt
d kva cit pradhāvaṃs tiṣṭhaṃś ca kva cic copaviśaṃs tathā
d mṛgaprepsur mahāraudre vane carati nirbhayaḥ
d sa tatra manujavyāghro vane vanacaropamaḥ
d padbhyām abhisamāpede bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
d sa praviṣṭo mahāraṇye nādān nadati cādbhutān
d trāsayan sarvabhūtāni mahāsattvaparākramaḥ
d tato bhīmasya śabdena bhītāḥ sarpā guhāśayāḥ
d atikrāntās tu vegena jagāmānusṛtaḥ śanaiḥ
d tato 'maravaraprakhyo bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
a sa dadarśa mahākāyaṃ bhujaṅgaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c giridurge samāpannaṃ kāyenāvṛtya kandaram
a parvatābhogavarṣmāṇaṃ bhogaiś candrārkamaṇḍalaiḥ
c citrāṅgam ajinaiś citrair haridrāsadṛśacchavim
a guhākāreṇa vaktreṇa caturdaṃṣṭreṇa rājatā
c dīptākṣeṇātitāmreṇa lihantaṃ sṛkkiṇī muhuḥ
a trāsanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ kālāntakayamopamam
c niḥśvāsakṣveḍanādena bhartsayantam iva sthitam
a sa bhīmaṃ sahasābhyetya pṛdākuḥ kṣudhito bhṛśam
c jagrāhājagaro grāho bhujayor ubhayor balāt
a tena saṃspṛṣṭamātrasya bhimasenasya vai tadā
c saṃjñā mumoha sahasā varadānena tasya ha
a daśa nāgasahasrāṇi dhārayanti hi yad balam
c tad balaṃ bhīmasenasya bhujayor asamaṃ paraiḥ
a sa tejasvī tathā tena bhujagena vaśīkṛtaḥ
c visphurañ śanakair bhīmo na śaśāka viceṣṭitum
a nāgāyutasamaprāṇaḥ siṃhaskandho mahābhujaḥ
c gṛhīto vyajahāt sattvaṃ varadānena mohitaḥ
a sa hi prayatnam akarot tīvram ātmavimokṣaṇe
c na cainam aśakad vīraḥ kathaṃ cit pratibādhitum
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a sa bhīmasenas tejasvī tathā sarpavaśaṃ gataḥ
c cintayām āsa sarpasya vīryam atyadbhutaṃ mahat
a uvāca ca mahāsarpaṃ kāmayā brūhi pannaga
c kas tvaṃ bho bhujagaśreṣṭha kiṃ mayā ca kariṣyasi
a pāṇḍavo bhimaseno 'haṃ dharmarājād anantaraḥ
c nāgāyutasamaprāṇas tvayā nītaḥ kathaṃ vaśam
a siṃhāḥ kesariṇo vyāghrā mahiṣā vāraṇās tathā
c samāgatāś ca bahuśo nihatāś ca mayā mṛdhe
a dānavāś ca piśācāś ca rākṣasāś ca mahābalāḥ
c bhujavegam aśaktā me soḍhuṃ pannagasattama
a kiṃ nu vidyābalaṃ kiṃ vā varadānam atho tava
c udyogam api kurvāṇo vaśago 'smi kṛtas tvayā
a asatyo vikramo nṝṇām iti me niścitā matiḥ
c yathedaṃ me tvayā nāga balaṃ pratihataṃ mahat
a ity evaṃvādinaṃ vīraṃ bhīmam akliṣṭakāriṇam
c bhogena mahatā sarpaḥ samantāt paryaveṣṭayat
a nigṛhya taṃ mahābāhuṃ tataḥ sa bhujagas tadā
c vimucyāsya bhujau pīnāv idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a diṣṭyā tvaṃ kṣudhitasyādya devair bhakṣo mahābhuja
c diṣṭyā kālasya mahataḥ priyāḥ prāṇā hi dehinām
a yathā tv idaṃ mayā prāptaṃ bhujaṃgatvam ariṃdama
c tad avaśyaṃ mayā khyāpyaṃ tavādya śṛṇu sattama
a imām avasthāṃ saṃprāpto hy ahaṃ kopān manīṣiṇām
c śāpasyāntaṃ pariprepsuḥ sarpasya kathayāmi tat
a nahuṣo nāma rājarṣir vyaktaṃ te śrotram āgataḥ
c tavaiva pūrvaḥ pūrveṣām āyor vaṃśakaraḥ sutaḥ
d tapobhiḥ kratubhiś caiva vidyayābhijanena ca
d trailokyaiśvaryam atulaṃ prāptaṃ me vikrameṇa ca
d atha sarvanṛponmāthī mado māṃ samupāviśat
d sahasraṃ munimukhyānām uvāha śibikāṃ mama
d tato vibhraṃśitaś cāham agastyena mahātmanā
d imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaḥ paśya daivam idaṃ mama
d na daivaṃ prajñayā tāta na balotsāhaśaktibhiḥ
d na sahāyabalaiś cāpi kaś cid apy ativartate
d atha prajñā ca śauryaṃ ca saṃpadaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavet
d prajñāvatāṃ ca śūrāṇāṃ na kadā cid asaṃpadaḥ
d yathā prājñāś ca śūrāś ca dṛśyante duḥkhajīvinaḥ
d bhīrumūrkhāś ca sukhinas tasmād daivaṃ hi kāraṇam
a so 'haṃ śāpād agastyasya brāhmaṇān avamanya ca
c imām avasthām āpannaḥ paśya daivam idaṃ mama
d patito hi vimānāgryāt sa muniḥ prārthito mayā
d kuru śāpāntam ity evaṃ provācedaṃ dayānvitaḥ
d yas tu te vyāhṛtān praśnān prativakṣyati dharmataḥ
d sa tvāṃ mokṣayitā śāpāt kasmiṃś cit kālaparyaye
d na ca te matprasādena smṛtibhraṃśo bhaviṣyati
d balavān api jantus te gṛhīto vaśyam eṣyati
a tvāṃ ced avadhyam āyāntam atīva priyadarśanam
c aham adyopayokṣyāmi vidhānaṃ paśya yādṛśam
a na hi me mucyate kaś cit kathaṃ cid grahaṇaṃ gataḥ
c gajo vā mahiṣo vāpi ṣaṣṭhe kāle narottama
a nāsi kevalasarpeṇa tiryagyoniṣu vartatā
c gṛhītaḥ kauravaśreṣṭha varadānam idaṃ mama
a patatā hi vimānāgrān mayā śakrāsanād drutam
c kuru śāpāntam ity ukto bhagavān munisattamaḥ
a sa mām uvāca tejasvī kṛpayābhipariplutaḥ
b yas tvayā veṣṭito rājan moham eti mahābalaḥ
c mokṣas te bhavitā rājan kasmāc cit kālaparyayāt
a tato 'smi patito bhūmau na ca mām ajahāt smṛtiḥ
c smārtam asti purāṇaṃ me yathaivādhigataṃ tathā
a yas tu te vyāhṛtān praśnān pratibrūyād viśeṣavit
c sa tvāṃ mokṣayitā śāpād iti mām abravīd ṛṣiḥ
a gṛhītasya tvayā rājan prāṇino 'pi balīyasaḥ
c sattvabhraṃśo 'dhikasyāpi sarvasyāśu bhaviṣyati
a iti cāpy aham aśrauṣaṃ vacas teṣāṃ dayāvatām
c mayi saṃjātahārdānām atha te 'ntarhitā dvijāḥ
a so 'haṃ paramaduṣkarmā vasāmi niraye 'śucau
c sarpayonim imāṃ prāpya kālākāṅkṣī mahādyute
a tam uvāca mahābāhur bhīmaseno bhujaṃgamam
c na te kupye mahāsarpa na cātmānaṃ vigarhaye
a yasmād abhāvī bhāvī vā manuṣyaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
c āgame yadi vāpāye na tatra glapayen manaḥ
a daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa ko nivartitum arhati
c daivam eva paraṃ manye puruṣārtho nirarthakaḥ
a paśya daivopaghātād dhi bhujavīryavyapāśrayam
c imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptam animittam ihādya mām
a kiṃ tu nādyānuśocāmi tathātmānaṃ vināśitam
c yathā tu vipine nyastān bhrātṝn rājyaparicyutān
a himavāṃś ca sudurgo 'yaṃ yakṣarākṣasasaṃkulaḥ
c māṃ ca te samudīkṣantaḥ prapatiṣyanti vihvalāḥ
a vinaṣṭam atha vā śrutvā bhaviṣyanti nirudyamāḥ
c dharmaśīlā mayā te hi bādhyante rājyagṛddhinā
a atha vā nārjuno dhīmān viṣādam upayāsyati
c sarvāstravid anādhṛṣyo devagandharvarākṣasaiḥ
a samarthaḥ sa mahābāhur ekāhnā sumahābalaḥ
c devarājam api sthānāt pracyāvayitum ojasā
a kiṃ punar dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putraṃ durdyūtadevinam
c vidviṣṭaṃ sarvalokasya dambhalobhaparāyaṇam
a mātaraṃ caiva śocāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragṛddhinīm
c yāsmākaṃ nityam āśāste mahattvam adhikaṃ paraiḥ
a kathaṃ nu tasyānāthāyā madvināśād bhujaṃgama
c aphalās te bhaviṣyanti mayi sarve manorathāḥ
a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca yamajau guruvartinau
c madbāhubalasaṃstabdhau nityaṃ puruṣamāninau
a nirutsāhau bhaviṣyete bhraṣṭavīryaparākramau
c madvināśāt paridyūnāv iti me vartate matiḥ
a evaṃvidhaṃ bahu tadā vilalāpa vṛkodaraḥ
c bhujaṃgabhogasaṃruddho nāśakac ca viceṣṭitum
a yudhiṣṭhiras tu kaunteya babhūvāsvasthacetanaḥ
c aniṣṭadarśanān ghorān utpātān paricintayan
a dāruṇaṃ hy aśivaṃ nādaṃ śivā dakṣiṇataḥ sthitā
c dīptāyāṃ diśi vitrastā rauti tasyāśramasya ha
a ekapakṣākṣicaraṇā vartikā ghoradarśanā
c rudhiraṃ vamantī dadṛśe pratyādityam apasvarā
a pravavāv anilo rūkṣaś caṇḍaḥ śarkarakarṣaṇaḥ
c apasavyāni sarvāṇi mṛgapakṣirutāni ca
a pṛṣṭhato vāyasaḥ kṛṣṇo yāhi yāhīti vāśati
c muhur muhuḥ prasphurati dakṣiṇo 'sya bhujas tathā
a hṛdayaṃ caraṇaś cāpi vāmo 'sya parivartate
c savyasyākṣṇo vikāraś cāpy aniṣṭaḥ samapadyata
a sa dharmarājo medhāvī śaṅkamāno mahad bhayam
c draupadīṃ paripapraccha kva bhīma iti bhārata
a śaśaṃsa tasmai pāñcālī cirayātaṃ vṛkodaram
b kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ mṛgān hantum ito gatam
b tac chrutvā tvarito rājā bhṛśam udvignamānasaḥ
c sa pratasthe mahābāhur dhaumyena sahito nṛpaḥ
a draupadyā rakṣaṇaṃ kāryam ity uvāca dhanaṃjayam
c nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca vyādideśa dvijān prati
a sa tasya padam unnīya tasmād evāśramāt prabhuḥ
b mṛgayām āsa kaunteya bhīmasenaṃ mahāvane
b sa prācīṃ diśam āsthāya mahato gajayūthapān
c dadarśa pṛthivīṃ cihnair bhīmasya paricihnitām
d tato mṛgasahasrāṇi mṛgendrāṇāṃ śatāni ca
d patitāni vane dṛṣṭvā mārgaṃ tasyāviśan nṛpaḥ
a dhāvatas tasya vīrasya mṛgārthe vātaraṃhasaḥ
c ūruvātavinirbhagnān drumān vyāvarjitān pathi
a sa gatvā tais tadā cihnair dadarśa girigahvare
b rūkṣamārutabhūyiṣṭhe niṣpatradrumasaṃkaṭe
b īriṇe nirjale deśe kaṇṭakidrumasaṃkule
b aśmasthāṇukṣupākīrṇe sudurge viṣamotkaṭe
c gṛhītaṃ bhujagendreṇa niśceṣṭam anujaṃ tathā
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhiras tam āsādya sarpabhogābhiveṣṭitam
c dayitaṃ bhrātaraṃ vīram idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a kuntīmātaḥ katham imām āpadaṃ tvam avāptavān
c kaś cāyaṃ parvatābhogapratimaḥ pannagottamaḥ
a sa dharmarājam ālakṣya bhrātā bhrātaram agrajam
c kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ grahaṇādi viceṣṭitam
d bhīma uvāca
d ayam ārya mahāsattvo bhakṣārthaṃ māṃ gṛhītavān
d nahuṣo nāma rājarṣiḥ prāṇavān iva saṃsthitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d mucyatām ayam āyuṣman bhrātā me 'mitavikramaḥ
d sarpa uvāca
d vayam āhāramanyaṃ te dāsyāmaḥ kṣunnivāraṇam
d āhāro rājaputro 'yaṃ mayā prāpto mukhāgataḥ
d gamyatāṃ neha sthātavyaṃ śvo bhavān api me bhavet
d vratam etan mahābāho viṣayaṃ mama yo vrajet
d sa me bhakṣo bhavet tāta tvaṃ cāpi viṣaye mama
d cireṇādya mayāhāraḥ prāpto 'yam anujas tava
d nāham enaṃ vimokṣyāmi na cānyam abhikāṅkṣaye
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a devo vā yadi vā daitya urago vā bhavān yadi
c satyaṃ sarpa vaco brūhi pṛcchati tvāṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d kimarthaṃ ca tvayā grasto bhīmaseno bhujaṃgama
a kim āhṛtya viditvā vā prītis te syād bhujaṃgama
c kim āhāraṃ prayacchāmi kathaṃ muñced bhavān imam
 sarpa uvāca
a nahuṣo nāma rājāham āsaṃ pūrvas tavānagha
c prathitaḥ pañcamaḥ somād āyoḥ putro narādhipa
a kratubhis tapasā caiva svādhyāyena damena ca
c trailokyaiśvaryam avyagraṃ prāpto vikramaṇena ca
a tad aiśvaryaṃ samāsādya darpo mām agamat tadā
c sahasraṃ hi dvijātīnām uvāha śibikāṃ mama
a aiśvaryamadamatto 'ham avamanya tato dvijān
c imām agastyena daśām ānītaḥ pṛthivīpate
a na tu mām ajahāt prajñā yāvad adyeti pāṇḍava
c tasyaivānugrahād rājann agastyasya mahātmanaḥ
a ṣaṣṭhe kāle mamāhāraḥ prāpto 'yam anujas tava
c nāham enaṃ vimokṣyāmi na cānyam abhikāmaye
a praśnān uccāritāṃs tu tvaṃ vyāhariṣyasi cen mama
c atha paścād vimokṣyāmi bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brūhi sarpa yathākāmaṃ prativakṣyāmi te vacaḥ
c api cec chaknuyāṃ prītim āhartuṃ te bhujaṃgama
a vedyaṃ yad brāhmaṇeneha tad bhavān vetti kevalam
b brūhi yat te mayā vācyaṃ tattvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c sarparāja tataḥ śrutvā prativakṣyāmi te vacaḥ
d sarpa uvāca
d dharmaṃ sarve praśaṃsanti devā brahmarṣayas tathā
d tasmāt samāsato dharmaṃ kathayasva mamānagha
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d satyaṃ damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ saṃtoṣo hrīḥ kṣamārjavam
d sarpa uvāca
d jñānaṃ śamo dayā dhyānam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
d kiṃ satyaṃ procyate rājan ko damaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d tapaso lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ syāt kiṃ tac chaucam udāhṛtam
d satyaṃ bhūtahitaṃ proktaṃ manaso damanaṃ damaḥ
d tapaḥ svadharmavartitvaṃ śaucaṃ saṃkaravarjanam
d sarpa uvāca
d saṃtoṣaḥ kaḥ paraḥ proktaḥ kā ca hrīḥ parikīrtitā
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kṣamā ca kā parā proktā kiṃ cārjavam udāhṛtam
d saṃtoṣo viṣayatyāgo hrīr akāryanivartanam
d sarpa uvāca
d kṣamā dvaṃdvasahiṣṇutvam ārjavaṃ samacittatā
d kiṃ jñānaṃ procyate rājan kaḥ śamaś ca prakīrtitaḥ
d dayā ca kā parā proktā kiṃ ca dhyānam udāhṛtam
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d jñānaṃ tattvārthasaṃbodhaḥ śamaś cittapraśāntatā
d sarpa uvāca
d dayā bhūtahitaiṣitvaṃ dhyānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ
d kaḥ śatrur durjayaḥ puṃsāṃ kaś ca vyādhir anantakaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kīdṛśaś ca smṛtaḥ sādhur asādhuḥ kīdṛśaḥ smṛtaḥ
d krodhas tu durjayaḥ śatrur lobho vyādhir anantakaḥ
d sarvabhūtahitaḥ sādhur asādhur nirdayaḥ smṛtaḥ
d sarpa uvāca
d ko mohaḥ procyate rājan kaś ca mānaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kim ālasyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ kaś ca śoka ihocyate
d moho dharmavimūḍhatvaṃ mānas tv ātmābhimānitā
d sarpa uvāca
d dharmaniṣkriyatālasyaṃ śokas tv ajñānam ucyate
d kiṃ sthairyaṃ munibhiḥ proktaṃ kiṃ tad dhairyam udāhṛtam
d snānaṃ ca kiṃ paraṃ proktaṃ kiṃ tad dānam ihocyate
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d svadharme sthiratā sthairyaṃ dhairyam indriyanigrahaḥ
d sarpa uvāca
d snānaṃ manomalatyāgo dānaṃ tv abhayadakṣiṇā
d kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pumāñ jñeyaḥ kaś ca mūrkho janeśvara
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d saṃsārahetuḥ kaś cāsya hṛttāpaḥ kaḥ paras tathā
d dharmātmā paṇḍito jñeyo nāstiko mūrkha ucyate
d kāmaḥ saṃsārahetuś ca hṛttāpo matsaraḥ paraḥ
d sarpa uvāca
d ko 'haṃkāra iti proktaḥ kaś cid dambho janeśvara
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d abhyasūyā ca kā proktā kiṃ tat paiśunyam ucyate
d mohajñānam ahaṃkāro dambho dharmadhvajocchrayaḥ
d sarpa uvāca
d dharmadveṣo hy asūyā ca paiśunyaṃ paradūṣaṇam
d dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca parasparavirodhinaḥ
d teṣāṃ nityavirodhitvāt kva nu syāt saṃgataṃ nṛpa
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d saṃtuṣṭo bhāryayā bhartā bhartrā bhāryā tathaiva ca
d yasminn etat kule nityaṃ kalyāṇaṃ tatra vai dhruvam
d yadā bhartā ca bhāryā ca parasparavaśānugau
d sarpa uvāca
d tadā dharmārthakāmānāṃ trayāṇām api saṃgamaḥ
d jātyā kulena vṛttena svādhyāyena śrutena ca
d brāhmaṇyaṃ kena bhavati prabrūhy etad viniścayam
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d na jātir na kulaṃ tāta na svādhyāyaḥ śrutaṃ na ca
d kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam
d aneke munayas tāta tiryagyonisamāśritāḥ
d svadharmācāraniratā brahmalokam ito gatāḥ
d bahunā kim adhītena naṭasyeva durātmanaḥ
d tenādhītaṃ śrutaṃ tena yo vṛttam anutiṣṭhati
d kapālasthaṃ yathā toyaṃ śvadṛtau ca yathā payaḥ
d duṣṭaṃ syāt sthānadoṣeṇa vṛttahīne tathā śrutam
d vṛttaṃ yatnena rakṣyaṃ syād vittam eti ca yāti ca
d akṣīṇo vittataḥ kṣīṇo vṛttatas tu hato hataḥ
d kiṃ kulenopadiṣṭena vipulena durātmanaḥ
d kṛmayaḥ kiṃ na jāyante kusumeṣu sugandhiṣu

d caturvedo 'pi durvṛttaḥ śūdrāt pāpataraḥ smṛtaḥ
d yo 'gnihotraparo dāntaḥ saṃtoṣaniyataḥ śuciḥ
d tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlaś ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
d sarvadvaṃdvasaho dhīraḥ sarvasaṅgavivarjitaḥ
d sarvabhūtahito maitras taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
d yena kena cid ācchanno yena kena cid āsitaḥ
d yatrakvacanaśāyī ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
d yo 'her iva gaṇād bhīto sanmānān maraṇād iva
d kuṇapād iva ca strībhyas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
 sarpa uvāca
a brāhmaṇaḥ ko bhaved rājan vedyaṃ kiṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
c bravīhy atimatiṃ tvāṃ hi vākyair anumimīmahe
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a satyaṃ dānaṃ kṣamā śīlam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇā
c dṛśyante yatra nāgendra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ
d pareṣāṃ ca guṇānveṣī satataṃ puruṣarṣabha
d sato 'pi doṣān rājendra na gṛhṇāti kadā cana
d dīnānukampī satataṃ satataṃ sādhuvatsalaḥ
d sarpa uvāca
d nityaṃ dānarataś caiva taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
d yatnena brūhi rājendra kaḥ kālaḥ śrāddhadānayoḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ śreṣṭha sarvavit tvaṃ mato 'si me
d yatra vai brāhmaṇaṃ paśyec chrotriyaṃ dhyānatatparam

d sarvajño 'si mahābāho vākyair anumimīmahe
a vedyaṃ sarpa paraṃ brahma nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca yat
c yatra gatvā na śocanti bhavataḥ kiṃ vivakṣitam
 sarpa uvāca
a cāturvarṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca satyaṃ ca brahma caiva ha
c śūdreṣv api ca satyaṃ ca dānam akrodha eva ca
e ānṛśaṃsyam ahiṃsā ca ghṛṇā caiva yudhiṣṭhira
a vedyaṃ yac cāttha nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca narādhipa
c tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ padaṃ cānyan na tad astīti lakṣaye
d tāṃś ca sarvān aśeṣeṇa kathayasva narādhipa
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śūdre caitad bhavel lakṣyaṃ dvije tac ca na vidyate

c yatraitan na bhavet sarpa taṃ śūdram iti nirdiśet

a sarve sarvāsv apatyāni janayanti yadā narāḥ
c vāṅ maithunam atho janma maraṇaṃ ca samaṃ nṛṇām
a idam ārṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca ye yajāmaha ity api
c tasmāc chīlaṃ pradhāneṣṭaṃ vidur ye tattvadarśinaḥ
a prāṅ nābhivardhanāt puṃso jātakarma vidhīyate
b tatas tu nāmakaraṇaṃ tataś caulaṃ vidhīyate
b tatopanayanaṃ proktaṃ dvijātīnāṃ yathāvidhi
c tatrāsya mātā sāvitrī pitā tv ācārya ucyate

c asminn evaṃ matidvaidhe manuḥ svāyambhuvo 'bravīt

 sarpa uvāca
a śrutaṃ viditavedyasya tava vākyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c bhakṣayeyam ahaṃ kasmād bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bhavān etādṛśo loke vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ

 sarpa uvāca
a pātre dattvā priyāṇy uktvā satyam uktvā ca bhārata
c ahiṃsānirataḥ svargaṃ gacched iti matir mama
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dānād vā sarpa satyād vā kim ato guru dṛśyate
c ahiṃsāpriyayoś caiva gurulāghavam ucyatām
 sarpa uvāca
a dāne ratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca ahiṃsā priyam eva ca

c satyavākyāc ca rājendra kiṃ cid dānaṃ viśiṣyate

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

 sarpa uvāca
a tisro vai gatayo rājan paridṛṣṭāḥ svakarmabhiḥ

a viparītaiś ca rājendra kāraṇair mānuṣo bhavet
c tiryagyonis tathā tāta viśeṣaś cātra vakṣyate
a kāmakrodhasamāyukto hiṃsālobhasamanvitaḥ

c nitye mahati cātmānam avasthāpayate nṛpa
a jāto jātaś ca balavān bhuṅkte cātmā sa dehavān
c phalārthas tāta niṣpṛktaḥ prajālakṣaṇabhāvanaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ

a yad ātmadravyam āyuṣman dehasaṃśrayaṇānvitam

d uktās te sarvaśas tāta praśnāḥ praśnavidāṃ vara
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d idānīm eṣa muñcāmi bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
d nahuṣeṇa tato muktaṃ bhīmam āśliṣya sodaram
d yudhiṣṭhiro 'pi dharmātmā nahuṣaṃ pratyapūjayat
d nahuṣo 'pi muneḥ śāpād vimuktaḥ prītamānasaḥ
d divyarūpadharaḥ śrīmān pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiram
d saṃbhāṣyaṃ sādhubhiḥ puṇyam iti vai vaidikī śrutiḥ
d sarpatvāt paśya mukto 'haṃ tvayā saṃbhāṣya sādhunā
d dharmaṃ kila narāḥ kṛtvā labhante satsutān iha
d dharmeṇa kaḥ kṛto dharmo yena labdho bhavān sutaḥ
d na kevalaṃ prajā dhanyā yāsāṃ rājan nṛpo bhavān
d dharmo 'pi dhanyo dharmajña yasya putras tvam īdṛśaḥ
d dṛṣṭāḥ śrutāś ca bahavo nṛpā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d na śruto na ca dṛṣṭo me dharmajñas tvādṛśo nṛpaḥ
d sabhāgyo 'haṃ mahābhāga yasya tuṣṭo bhavān guṇaiḥ
d nāsabhāgyasya tuṣyanti devakalpā bhavādṛśāḥ
d kiṃ tu kautūhalaṃ tāta mama pārthivasattama

d sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñaṃ trailokyeśvarapūjitam

d kathaṃ tvām āviśan mohaḥ prākṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ yathā

d aiśvaryatimiraṃ cakṣur na tat paśyati nirmalam
d paścād vimalatāṃ yāti vinipātāñjanāñjitam
d vartamānaḥ sukhe svarge nāvaitīti matir mama
d so 'ham aiśvaryamohena yadāviṣṭo yudhiṣṭhira
d patitaḥ pratisaṃbuddhaḥ sāṃprataṃ bodhayāmi vaḥ
d lokadvayahitaṃ vaktuṃ jñātuṃ ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ
d tatkriyānuvidhānatve munayo 'pi na paṇḍitāḥ

d yaiḥ kṛtaḥ sarvabhakṣo 'gnir apeyaś ca mahodadhiḥ
d kṣayī cāpāditaś candraḥ ko na naśyet prakopya tān
d lokān anyān sṛjeyur ye lokapālāṃś ca kopitāḥ
d devān kuryur adevāṃś ca kaḥ kṣuṇvaṃs tān samṛdhnuyāt
d yān upāśritya tiṣṭhanti lokā devāś ca sarvadā
d brahma caiva dhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ko hiṃsyāt tāñ jijīviṣuḥ
d praṇītaś cāpraṇītaś ca yathāgnir daivataṃ mahat
d evaṃ vidvān avidvāṃś ca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ param
a sarvajñaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ moha āviśat svargavāsinam
b kathaṃ ca sarpatāṃ yāto bhavān vyākhyātum arhati
c evam adbhutakarmāṇam iti me saṃśayo mahān
 sarpa uvāca
a suprajñam api cec chūram ṛddhir mohayate naram

a so 'ham aiśvaryamohena madāviṣṭo yudhiṣṭhira
c patitaḥ pratisaṃbuddhas tvāṃ tu saṃbodhayāmy aham
a kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ mahārāja tvayā mama paraṃtapa

a brahmarṣīṇāṃ sahasraṃ hi uvāha śibikāṃ mama

c prapatan bubudhe ''tmānaṃ vyālībhūtam adhomukham
a ayācaṃ tam ahaṃ vipraṃ śāpasyānto bhaved iti

a tataḥ sa mām uvācedaṃ prapatantaṃ kṛpānvitaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiro dharmarājaḥ śāpāt tvāṃ mokṣayiṣyati
a abhimānasya ghorasya balasya ca narādhipa

a tato me vismayo jātas tad dṛṣṭvā tapaso balam
c brahma ca brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca yena tvāham acūcudam
a satyaṃ damas tapo yogam ahiṃsā dānanityatā
c sādhakāni sadā puṃsāṃ na jātir na kulaṃ nṛpa
a ariṣṭa eṣa te bhrātā bhīmo mukto mahābhujaḥ
c svasti te 'stu mahārāja gamiṣyāmi divaṃ punaḥ
d sa cāyaṃ puruṣavyāghra kālaḥ puṇya upasthitaḥ
d tad asmāt kāraṇāt pārtha kāryaṃ mama mahat kṛtam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
 tatas tasmin muhūrte tu vimānaṃ kāmagāmi vai
 avapātena mahatā tatrāvāpatad uttamam
a ity uktvājagaraṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā sa nahuṣo nṛpaḥ
c divyaṃ vapuḥ samāsthāya gatas tridivam eva ha
a yudhiṣṭhiro 'pi dharmātmā bhrātrā bhīmena saṃgataḥ
c dhaumyena sahitaḥ śrīmān āśramaṃ punar abhyagāt
a tato dvijebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ sametebhyo yathātatham
c kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a tac chrutvā te dvijāḥ sarve bhrātaraś cāsya te trayaḥ
c āsan suvrīḍitā rājan draupadī ca yaśasvinī
a te tu sarve dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ hitepsayā
c maivam ity abruvan bhīmaṃ garhayanto 'sya sāhasam
a pāṇḍavās tu bhayān muktaṃ prekṣya bhīmaṃ mahābalam
c harṣam āhārayāṃ cakrur vijahruś ca mudā yutāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a nidāghāntakaraḥ kālaḥ sarvabhūtasukhāvahaḥ
c tatraiva vasatāṃ teṣāṃ prāvṛṭ samabhipadyata
a chādayanto mahāghoṣāḥ khaṃ diśaś ca balāhakāḥ
c pravavarṣur divārātram asitāḥ satataṃ tadā
a tapātyayaniketāś ca śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
c apetārkaprabhājālāḥ savidyudvimalaprabhāḥ
a virūḍhaśaṣpā pṛthivī mattadaṃśasarīsṛpā
c babhūva payasā siktā śāntadhūmarajo 'ruṇā
a na sma prajñāyate kiṃ cid ambhasā samavastṛte
c samaṃ vā viṣamaṃ vāpi nadyo vā sthāvarāṇi vā
a kṣubdhatoyā mahāghoṣāḥ śvasamānā ivāśugāḥ
c sindhavaḥ śobhayāṃ cakruḥ kānanāni tapātyaye
a nadatāṃ kānanānteṣu śrūyante vividhāḥ svanāḥ
c vṛṣṭibhis tāḍyamānānāṃ varāhamṛgapakṣiṇām
a stokakāḥ śikhinaś caiva puṃskokilagaṇaiḥ saha
c mattāḥ paripatanti sma dardurāś caiva darpitāḥ
a tathā bahuvidhākārā prāvṛṇ meghānunāditā
c abhyatītā śivā teṣāṃ caratāṃ marudhanvasu
a krauñcahaṃsagaṇākīrṇā śarat praṇihitābhavat
c rūḍhakakṣavanaprasthā prasannajalanimnagā
a vimalākāśanakṣatrā śarat teṣāṃ śivābhavat
c mṛgadvijasamākīrṇā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
a paśyantaḥ śāntarajasaḥ kṣapā jaladaśītalāḥ
c grahanakṣatrasaṃghaiś ca somena ca virājitāḥ
a kumudaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca śītavāridharāḥ śivāḥ
c nadīḥ puṣkariṇīś caiva dadṛśuḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥ
a ākāśanīkāśataṭāṃ nīpanīvārasaṃkulām
c babhūva caratāṃ harṣaḥ puṇyatīrthāṃ sarasvatīm
a te vai mumudire vīrāḥ prasannasalilāṃ śivām
c paśyanto dṛḍhadhanvānaḥ paripūrṇāṃ sarasvatīm
a teṣāṃ puṇyatamā rātriḥ parvasaṃdhau sma śāradī
c tatraiva vasatām āsīt kārttikī janamejaya
a puṇyakṛdbhir mahāsattvais tāpasaiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ
c tat sarvaṃ bharataśreṣṭhāḥ samūhur yogam uttamam
a tamisrābhyudaye tasmin dhaumyena saha pāṇḍavāḥ
c sūtaiḥ paurogavaiś caiva kāmyakaṃ prayayur vanam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a kāmyakaṃ prāpya kaunteyā yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥ
c kṛtātithyā munigaṇair niṣeduḥ saha kṛṣṇayā
a tatas tān pariviśvastān vasataḥ pāṇḍunandanān
c brāhmaṇā bahavas tatra samantāt paryavārayan
a athābravīd dvijaḥ kaś cid arjunasya priyaḥ sakhā
c eṣyatīha mahābāhur vaśī śaurir udāradhīḥ
a viditā hi harer yūyam ihāyātāḥ kurūdvahāḥ
c sadā hi darśanākāṅkṣī śreyo 'nveṣī ca vo hariḥ
a bahuvatsarajīvī ca mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ
c svādhyāyatapasā yuktaḥ kṣipraṃ yuṣmān sameṣyati
a tathaiva tasya bruvataḥ pratyadṛṣyata keśavaḥ
c sainyasugrīvayuktena rathena rathināṃ varaḥ
a maghavān iva paulomyā sahitaḥ satyabhāmayā
c upāyād devakīputro didṛkṣuḥ kurusattamān
a avatīrya rathāt kṛṣṇo dharmarājaṃ yathāvidhi
c vavande mudito dhīmān bhīmaṃ ca balināṃ varam
a pūjayām āsa dhaumyaṃ ca yamābhyām abhivāditaḥ
c pariṣvajya guḍākeśaṃ draupadīṃ paryasāntvayat
a sa dṛṣṭvā phalgunaṃ vīraṃ cirasya priyam āgatam
c paryaṣvajata dāśārhaḥ punaḥ punar ariṃdamam
a tathaiva satyabhāmāpi draupadīṃ pariṣasvaje
c pāṇḍavānāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ kṛṣṇasya mahiṣī priyā
a tatas te pāṇḍavāḥ sarve sabhāryāḥ sapurohitāḥ
c ānarcuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ parivavruś ca sarvaśaḥ
a kṛṣṇas tu pārthena sametya vidvān
dhanaṃjayenāsuratarjanena
c babhau yathā bhūtapatir mahātmā
sametya sākṣād bhagavān guhena
a tataḥ samastāni kirīṭamālī
vaneṣu vṛttāni gadāgrajāya
c uktvā yathāvat punar anvapṛcchat
kathaṃ subhadrā ca tathābhimanyuḥ
a sa pūjayitvā madhuhā yathāvat
pārthāṃś ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca purohitaṃ ca
c uvāca rājānam abhipraśaṃsan
yudhiṣṭhiraṃ tatra sahopaviśya
a dharmaḥ paraḥ pāṇḍava rājyalābhāt
tasyārtham āhus tapa eva rājan
c satyārjavābhyāṃ caratā svadharmaṃ
jitas tavāyaṃ ca paraś ca lokaḥ
a adhītam agre caratā vratāni
samyag dhanurvedam avāpya kṛtsnam
c kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa vasūni labdhvā
sarve hy avāptāḥ kratavaḥ purāṇāḥ
a na grāmyadharmeṣu ratis tavāsti
kāmān na kiṃ cit kuruṣe narendra
c na cārthalobhāt prajahāsi dharmaṃ
tasmāt svabhāvād asi dharmarājaḥ
a dānaṃ ca satyaṃ ca tapaś ca rājañ
śraddhā ca śāntiś ca dhṛtiḥ kṣamā ca
b āpatsv api tvaṃ na jahāsi rājan
c avāpya rāṣṭrāṇi vasūni bhogān
eṣā parā pārtha sadā ratis te
a yadā janaughaḥ kurujāṅgalānāṃ
kṛṣṇāṃ sabhāyām avaśām apaśyat
c apetadharmavyavahāravṛttaṃ
saheta tat pāṇḍava kas tvad anyaḥ
a asaṃśayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmaḥ
kṣipraṃ prajāḥ pālayitāsi samyak
c ime vayaṃ nigrahaṇe kurūṇāṃ
yadi pratijñā bhavataḥ samāptā
a dhaumyaṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca
yamau ca bhīmaṃ ca daśārhasiṃhaḥ
c uvāca diṣṭyā bhavatāṃ śivena
prāptaḥ kirīṭī muditaḥ kṛtāstraḥ
a provāca kṛṣṇām api yājñasenīṃ
daśārhabhartā sahitaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ
b diṣṭyā samagrāsi dhanaṃjayena
b samāgatety evam uvāca kṛṣṇaḥ
c kṛṣṇe dhanurvedaratipradhānāḥ
satyavratās te śiśavaḥ suśīlāḥ
e sadbhiḥ sadaivācaritaṃ samādhiṃ
caranti putrās tava yājñaseni
a rājyena rāṣṭraiś ca nimantryamāṇāḥ
pitrā ca kṛṣṇe tava sodaraiś ca
c na yajñasenasya na mātulānāṃ
gṛheṣu bālā ratim āpnuvanti
a ānartam evābhimukhāḥ śivena
gatvā dhanurvedaratipradhānāḥ
c tavātmajā vṛṣṇipuraṃ praviśya
na daivatebhyaḥ spṛhayanti kṛṣṇe
a yathā tvam evārhasi teṣu vṛttiṃ
prayoktum āryā ca yathaiva kuntī
c teṣv apramādena sadā karoti
tathā ca bhūyaś ca tathā subhadrā
a yathāniruddhasya yathābhimanyor
yathā sunīthasya yathaiva bhānoḥ
c tathā vinetā ca gatiś ca kṛṣṇe
tavātmajānām api raukmiṇeyaḥ
a gadāsicarmagrahaṇeṣu śūrān
astreṣu śikṣāsu rathāśvayāne
c samyag vinetā vinayaty atandrīs
tāṃś cābhimanyuḥ satataṃ kumāraḥ
a sa cāpi samyak praṇidhāya śikṣām
astrāṇi caiṣāṃ guruvat pradāya
c tavātmajānāṃ ca tathābhimanyoḥ
parākramais tuṣyati raukmiṇeyaḥ
a yadā vihāraṃ prasamīkṣamāṇāḥ
prayānti putrās tava yājñaseni
c ekaikam eṣām anuyānti tatra
rathāś ca yānāni ca dantinaś ca
a athābravīd dharmarājaṃ tu kṛṣṇo
daśārhayodhāḥ kukurāndhakāś ca
c ete nideśaṃ tava pālayanti
tiṣṭhanti yatrecchasi tatra rājan
d yodhās tavārtheṣu narendrayantā
d kurvantu kāryaṃ sarathāḥ sanāgāḥ
a āvartatāṃ kārmukavegavātā
halāyudhapragrahaṇā madhūnām
c senā tavārtheṣu narendra yattā
sasādipattyaśvarathā sanāgā
a prasthāpyatāṃ pāṇḍava dhārtarāṣṭraḥ
suyodhanaḥ pāpakṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
c sa sānubandhaḥ sasuhṛdgaṇaś ca
saubhasya saubhādhipateś ca mārgam
a kāmaṃ tathā tiṣṭha narendra tasmin
yathā kṛtas te samayaḥ sabhāyām
c dāśārhayodhais tu sasādiyodhaṃ
pratīkṣatāṃ nāgapuraṃ bhavantam
a vyapetamanyur vyapanītapāpmā
vihṛtya yatrecchasi tatra kāmam
c tataḥ samṛddhaṃ prathamaṃ viśokaḥ
prapatsyase nāgapuraṃ sarāṣṭram
a tatas tad ājñāya mataṃ mahātmā
yathāvad uktaṃ puruṣottamena
c praśasya viprekṣya ca dharmarājaḥ
kṛtāñjaliḥ keśavam ity uvāca
a asaṃśayaṃ keśava pāṇḍavānāṃ
bhavān gatis tvaccharaṇā hi pārthāḥ
c kālodaye tac ca tataś ca bhūyaḥ
kartā bhavān karma na saṃśayo 'sti
a yathāpratijñaṃ vihṛtaś ca kālaḥ
sarvāḥ samā dvādaśa nirjaneṣu
c ajñātacaryāṃ vidhivat samāpya
bhavadgatāḥ keśava pāṇḍaveyāḥ
d eṣaiva buddhir juṣatāṃ sadā tvāṃ
d satye sthitāḥ keśava pāṇḍaveyāḥ
d sadānadharmāḥ sajanāḥ sadārāḥ
d sabāndhavās tvaccharaṇā hi pārthāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tathā vadati vārṣṇeye dharmarāje ca bhārata
c atha paścāt tapovṛddho bahuvarṣasahasradhṛk
e pratyadṛṣyata dharmātmā mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ
f ajaraś cāmaraś caiva rūpaudāryaguṇānvitaḥ
f vyadṛśyata tathā yukto yathā syāt pañcaviṃśakaḥ
f mahāvarāhakoṭyāṃ ca brahmaṇām ayutāni ca
f vyacintayan mahātmā vai tathā rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
a tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ vṛddhaṃ bahuvarṣasahasriṇam
c ānarcur brāhmaṇāḥ sarve kṛṣṇaś ca saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
a tam arcitaṃ suviṣvastam āsīnam ṛṣisattamam
c brāhmaṇānāṃ matenāha pāṇḍavānāṃ ca keśavaḥ
a śuśrūṣavaḥ pāṇḍavās te brāhmaṇāś ca samāgatāḥ
c draupadī satyabhāmā ca tathāhaṃ paramaṃ vacaḥ
a purāvṛttāḥ kathāḥ puṇyāḥ sadācārāḥ sanātanāḥ
c rājñāṃ strīṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mārkaṇḍeya vicakṣva naḥ
a teṣu tatropaviṣṭeṣu devarṣir api nāradaḥ
c ājagāma viśuddhātmā pāṇḍavān avalokakaḥ
a tam apy atha mahātmānaṃ sarve tu puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c pādyārghyābhyāṃ yathānyāyam upatasthur manīṣiṇam
a nāradas tv atha devarṣir jñātvā tāṃs tu kṛtakṣaṇān
c mārkaṇḍeyasya vadatas tāṃ kathām anvamodata
a uvāca cainaṃ kālajñaḥ smayann iva sa nāradaḥ
c brahmarṣe kathyatāṃ yat te pāṇḍaveṣu vivakṣitam
a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ
c kṣaṇaṃ kurudhvaṃ vipulam ākhyātavyaṃ bhaviṣyati
a evam uktāḥ kṣaṇaṃ cakruḥ pāṇḍavāḥ saha tair dvijaiḥ
c madhyaṃdine yathādityaṃ prekṣantas taṃ mahāmunim
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a taṃ vivakṣantam ālakṣya kururājo mahāmunim
c kathāsaṃjananārthāya codayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
a bhavān daivatadaityānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
c rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ caritajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
a sevyaś copāsitavyaś ca mato naḥ kāṅkṣitaś ciram
c ayaṃ ca devakīputraḥ prāpto 'smān avalokakaḥ
a bhavaty eva hi me buddhir dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ sukhāc cyutam
c dhārtarāṣṭrāṃś ca durvṛttān ṛdhyataḥ prekṣya sarvaśaḥ
a karmaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ kartā śubhasyāpy aśubhasya ca
c svaphalaṃ tad upāśnāti kathaṃ kartā svid īśvaraḥ
a atha vā sukhaduḥkheṣu nṛṇāṃ brahmavidāṃ vara
c iha vā kṛtam anveti paradehe 'tha vā punaḥ
a dehī ca dehaṃ saṃtyajya mṛgyamāṇaḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ
c kathaṃ saṃyujyate pretya iha vā dvijasattama
a aihalaukikam evaitad utāho pāralaukikam
c kva ca karmāṇi tiṣṭhanti jantoḥ pretasya bhārgava
d etat sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ mune vaktum ihārhasi
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a tvadyukto 'yam anupraśno yathāvad vadatāṃ vara
c viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te sthityartham anupṛcchasi
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
c yathehāmutra ca naraḥ sukhaduḥkham upāśnute
a nirmalāni śarīrāṇi viśuddhāni śarīriṇām
c sasarja dharmatantrāṇi pūrvotpannaḥ prajāpatiḥ
a amoghabalasaṃkalpāḥ suvratāḥ satyavādinaḥ
c brahmabhūtā narāḥ puṇyāḥ purāṇāḥ kurunandana
a sarve devaiḥ samāyānti svacchandena nabhastalam
c tataś ca punar āyānti sarve svacchandacāriṇaḥ
a svacchandamaraṇāś cāsan narāḥ svacchandajīvinaḥ
c alpabādhā nirātaṅkā siddhārthā nirupadravāḥ
a draṣṭāro devasaṃghānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
c pratyakṣāḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dāntā vigatamatsarāḥ
a āsan varṣasahasrāṇi tathā putrasahasriṇaḥ
c tataḥ kālāntare 'nyasmin pṛthivītalacāriṇaḥ
a kāmakrodhābhibhūtās te māyāvyājopajīvinaḥ
c lobhamohābhibhūtāś ca tyaktā devais tato narāḥ
a aśubhaiḥ karmabhiḥ pāpās tiryaṅ narakagāminaḥ
c saṃsāreṣu vicitreṣu pacyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
a mogheṣṭā moghasaṃkalpā moghajñānā vicetasaḥ
b kāṅkṣiṇaḥ sarvakāmānāṃ nāstikā bhinnasetavaḥ
c sarvātiśaṅkinaś caiva saṃvṛttāḥ kleśabhāginaḥ
e aśubhaiḥ karmabhiś cāpi prāyaśaḥ paricihnitāḥ
a dauṣkulyā vyādhibahulā durātmāno 'pratāpinaḥ
c bhavanty alpāyuṣaḥ pāpā raudrakarmaphalodayāḥ
e nāthantaḥ sarvakāmānāṃ nāstikā bhinnasetavaḥ
a jantoḥ pretasya kaunteya gatiḥ svair iha karmabhiḥ
c prājñasya hīnabuddheś ca karmakośaḥ kva tiṣṭhati
a kvasthas tat samupāśnāti sukṛtaṃ yadi vetarat
b mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
b tvad yukto 'yam anupraśnaḥ śṛṇu bhārata tattvataḥ
c iti te darśanaṃ yac ca tatrāpy anunayaṃ śṛṇu
a ayam ādiśarīreṇa devasṛṣṭena mānavaḥ
c śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca kurute saṃcayaṃ mahat
a āyuṣo 'nte prahāyedaṃ kṣīṇaprāyaṃ kalevaram
c saṃbhavaty eva yugapad yonau nāsty antarābhavaḥ
a tatrāsya svakṛtaṃ karma chāyevānugataṃ sadā
b anuśete śayānaṃ ca tiṣṭhantaṃ cānutiṣṭhati
b anudhāvati dhāvantaṃ pūrvakarma kṛtaṃ naram
c phalaty atha sukhārho vā duḥkhārho vāpi jāyate
a kṛtāntavidhisaṃyuktaḥ sa jantur lakṣaṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ
c aśubhair vā nirādāno lakṣyate jñānadṛṣṭibhiḥ
a eṣā tāvad abuddhīnāṃ gatir uktā yudhiṣṭhira
c ataḥ paraṃ jñānavatāṃ nibodha gatim uttamām
a manuṣyās taptatapasaḥ sarvāgamaparāyaṇāḥ
c sthiravratāḥ satyaparā guruśuśrūṣaṇe ratāḥ
a suśīlāḥ śuklajātīyāḥ kṣāntā dāntāḥ sutejasaḥ
c śubhayonyantaragatāḥ prāyaśaḥ śubhalakṣaṇāḥ
a jitendriyatvād vaśinaḥ śuklatvān mandarogiṇaḥ
c alpabādhaparitrāsād bhavanti nirupadravāḥ
a cyavantaṃ jāyamānaṃ ca garbhasthaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
c svam ātmānaṃ paraṃ caiva budhyante jñānacakṣuṣaḥ
d ṛṣayas te mahātmānaḥ pratyakṣāgamabuddhayaḥ
e karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya punar yānti surālayam
f kṛtvā śubhāni karmāṇi jñānena bharatarṣabha
a kiṃ cid daivād dhaṭhāt kiṃ cit kiṃ cid eva svakarmabhiḥ
c prāpnuvanti narā rājan mā te 'stv anyā vicāraṇā
a imām atropamāṃ cāpi nibodha vadatāṃ vara
c manuṣyaloke yac chreyaḥ paraṃ manye yudhiṣṭhira
a iha vaikasya nāmutra amutraikasya no iha
c iha cāmutra caikasya nāmutraikasya no iha
a dhanāni yeṣāṃ vipulāni santi
nityaṃ ramante suvibhūṣitāṅgāḥ
c teṣām ayaṃ śatruvaraghna loko
nāsau sadā dehasukhe ratānām
a ye yogayuktās tapasi prasaktāḥ
svādhyāyaśīlā jarayanti dehān
c jitendriyā bhūtahite niviṣṭās
teṣām asau nāyam arighna lokaḥ
a ye dharmam eva prathamaṃ caranti
dharmeṇa labdhvā ca dhanāni kāle
c dārān avāpya kratubhir yajante
teṣām ayaṃ caiva paraś ca lokaḥ
a ye naiva vidyāṃ na tapo na dānaṃ
na cāpi mūḍhāḥ prajane yatante
c na cādhigacchanti sukhāny abhāgyās
teṣām ayaṃ caiva paraś ca nāsti
a sarve bhavantas tv ativīryasattvā
divyaujasaḥ saṃhananopapannāḥ
c lokād amuṣmād avaniṃ prapannāḥ
svadhītavidyāḥ surakāryahetoḥ
a kṛtvaiva karmāṇi mahānti śūrās
tapodamācāravihāraśīlāḥ
c devān ṛṣīn pretagaṇāṃś ca sarvān
saṃtarpayitvā vidhinā pareṇa
a svargaṃ paraṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ nivāsaṃ
krameṇa saṃprāpsyatha karmabhiḥ svaiḥ
c mā bhūd viśaṅkā tava kauravendra
dṛṣṭvātmanaḥ kleśam imaṃ sukhārha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a mārkaṇḍeyaṃ mahātmānam ūcuḥ pāṇḍusutās tadā
c māhātmyaṃ dvijamukhyānāṃ śrotum icchāma kathyatām
a evam uktaḥ sa bhagavān mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ
c uvāca sumahātejāḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ
a haihayānāṃ kulakaro rājā parapuraṃjayaḥ
c kumāro rūpasaṃpanno mṛgayām acarad balī
a caramāṇas tu so 'raṇye tṛṇavīrutsamāvṛte
c kṛṣṇājinottarāsaṅgaṃ dadarśa munim antike
e sa tena nihato 'raṇye manyamānena vai mṛgam
a vyathitaḥ karma tat kṛtvā śokopahatacetanaḥ
c jagāma haihayānāṃ vai sakāśaṃ prathitātmanām
a rājñāṃ rājīvanetrosau kumāraḥ pṛthivīpate
c teṣāṃ ca tad yathāvṛttaṃ kathayām āsa vai tadā
d sukumāro mahīpālo hehayānāṃ mahībhṛtām
a taṃ cāpi hiṃsitaṃ tāta muniṃ mūlaphalāśinam
c śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca te tatra babhūvur dīnamānasāḥ
a kasyāyam iti te sarve mārgamāṇās tatas tataḥ
c jagmuś cāriṣṭanemes te tārkṣyasyāśramam añjasā
a te 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ taṃ muniṃ saṃśitavratam
c tasthuḥ sarve sa tu munis teṣāṃ pūjām athāharat
a te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ na vayaṃ satkriyāṃ mune
c tvatto 'rhāḥ karmadoṣeṇa brāhmaṇo hiṃsito hi naḥ
a tān abravīt sa viprarṣiḥ kathaṃ vo brāhmaṇo hataḥ
c kva cāsau brūta sahitāḥ paśyadhvaṃ me tapobalam
a te tu tat sarvam akhilam ākhyāyāsmai yathātatham
c nāpaśyaṃs tam ṛṣiṃ tatra gatāsuṃ te samāgatāḥ
e anveṣamāṇāḥ savrīḍāḥ svapnavad gatamānasāḥ
a tān abravīt tatra munis tārkṣyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
c syād ayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ so 'tha yo yuṣmābhir vināśitaḥ
e putro hy ayaṃ mama nṛpās tapobalasamanvitaḥ
a te tu dṛṣṭvaiva tam ṛṣiṃ vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
c mahad āścaryam iti vai vibruvāṇā mahīpate
a mṛto hy ayam ato dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ jīvitam āptavān
c kim etat tapaso vīryaṃ yenāyaṃ jīvitaḥ punaḥ
e śrotum icchāma viprarṣe yadi śrotavyam ity uta
a sa tān uvāca nāsmākaṃ mṛtyuḥ prabhavate nṛpāḥ
c kāraṇaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi hetuyogaṃ samāsataḥ
d śuddhācārā analasāḥ saṃdhyopāsanatatparāḥ
d suśuddhānnāḥ śuddhadhanā brahmacaryavratānvitāḥ
d mṛtyuḥ prabhavate yena nāsmākaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ
a satyam evābhijānīmo nānṛte kurmahe manaḥ
c svadharmam anutiṣṭhāmas tasmān mṛtyubhayaṃ na naḥ
a yad brāhmaṇānāṃ kuśalaṃ tad eṣāṃ kathayāmahe
c naiṣāṃ duścaritaṃ brūmas tasmān mṛtyubhayaṃ na naḥ
a atithīn annapānena bhṛtyān atyaśanena ca
b saṃbhojya śeṣam aśnīmas tasmān mṛtyubhayaṃ na naḥ
b kṣāntā dāntāḥ kṣamāśīlās tīrthadānaparāyaṇāḥ
b puṇyadeśanivāsāc ca tasmān mṛtyubhayaṃ na naḥ
c tejasvideśavāsāc ca tasmān mṛtyubhayaṃ na naḥ
a etad vai leśamātraṃ vaḥ samākhyātaṃ vimatsarāḥ
c gacchadhvaṃ sahitāḥ sarve na pāpād bhayam asti vaḥ
a evam astv iti te sarve pratipūjya mahāmunim
c svadeśam agaman hṛṣṭā rājāno bharatarṣabha
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a bhūya eva tu māhātmyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ nibodha me
c vainyo nāmeha rājarṣir aśvamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ
e tam atrir gantum ārebhe vittārtham iti naḥ śrutam
a bhūyo 'tha nānurudhyat sa dharmavyaktinidarśanāt
c saṃcintya sa mahātejā vanam evānvarocayat
e dharmapatnīṃ samāhūya putrāṃś cedam uvāca ha
a prāpsyāmaḥ phalam atyantaṃ bahulaṃ nirupadravam
c araṇyagamanaṃ kṣipraṃ rocatāṃ vo guṇādhikam
a taṃ bhāryā pratyuvācedaṃ dharmam evānurudhyatī
c vainyaṃ gatvā mahātmānam arthayasva dhanaṃ bahu
e sa te dāsyati rājarṣir yajamāno 'rthine dhanam
a tata ādāya viprarṣe pratigṛhya dhanaṃ bahu
c bhṛtyān sutān saṃvibhajya tato vraja yathepsitam
e eṣa vai paramo dharmo dharmavidbhir udāhṛtaḥ
 atrir uvāca
a kathito me mahābhāge gautamena mahātmanā
c vainyo dharmārthasaṃyuktaḥ satyavratasamanvitaḥ
a kiṃ tv asti tatra dveṣṭāro nivasanti hi me dvijāḥ
c yathā me gautamaḥ prāha tato na vyavasāmy aham
a tatra sma vācaṃ kalyāṇīṃ dharmakāmārthasaṃhitām
c mayoktām anyathā brūyus tatas te vai nirarthakām
a gamiṣyāmi mahāprājñe rocate me vacas tava
c gāś ca me dāsyate vainyaḥ prabhūtaṃ cārthasaṃcayam
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a evam uktvā jagāmāśu vainyayajñaṃ mahātapāḥ
c gatvā ca yajñāyatanam atris tuṣṭāva taṃ nṛpam
d vākyair maṅgalasaṃyuktaiḥ pūjayāno 'bravīd vacaḥ
a rājan vainya tvam īśaś ca bhuvi tvaṃ prathamo nṛpaḥ
c stuvanti tvāṃ munigaṇās tvad anyo nāsti dharmavit
a tam abravīd ṛṣis tatra vacaḥ kruddho mahātapāḥ
c maivam atre punar brūyā na te prajñā samāhitā
e atra naḥ prathamaṃ sthātā mahendro vai prajāpatiḥ
a athātrir api rājendra gautamaṃ pratyabhāṣata
c ayam eva vidhātā ca yathaivendraḥ prajāpatiḥ
e tvam eva muhyase mohān na prajñānaṃ tavāsti ha
 gautama uvāca
a jānāmi nāhaṃ muhyāmi tvaṃ vivakṣur vimuhyase
c stoṣyase 'bhyudayaprepsus tasya darśanasaṃśrayāt
a na vettha paramaṃ dharmaṃ na cāvaiṣi prayojanam
c bālas tvam asi mūḍhaś ca vṛddhaḥ kenāpi hetunā
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a vivadantau tathā tau tu munīnāṃ darśane sthitau
c ye tasya yajñe saṃvṛttās te 'pṛcchanta kathaṃ tv imau
a praveśaḥ kena datto 'yam anayor vainyasaṃsadi
c uccaiḥ samabhibhāṣantau kena kāryeṇa viṣṭhitau
a tataḥ paramadharmātmā kāśyapaḥ sarvadharmavit
c vivādināv anuprāptau tāv ubhau pratyavedayat
a athābravīt sadasyāṃs tu gautamo munisattamān
c āvayor vyāhṛtaṃ praśnaṃ śṛṇuta dvijapuṃgavāḥ
e vainyo vidhātety āhātrir atra naḥ saṃśayo mahān
f tatas tad gautamenoktaṃ vākyaṃ vainyasya saṃsadi
a śrutvaiva tu mahātmāno munayo 'bhyadravan drutam
c sanatkumāraṃ dharmajñaṃ saṃśayacchedanāya vai
d papracchuḥ praṇatāḥ sarve brahmāṇam iva somapāḥ
a sa ca teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā yathātattvaṃ mahātapāḥ
c pratyuvācātha tān evaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
 sanatkumāra uvāca
a brahma kṣatreṇa sahitaṃ kṣatraṃ ca brahmaṇā saha
b saṃyuktau dahataḥ śatrūn vanānīvāgnimārutau
c rājā vai prathamo dharmaḥ prajānāṃ patir eva ca
e sa eva śakraḥ śukraś ca sa dhātā sa bṛhaspatiḥ
a prajāpatir virāṭ samrāṭ kṣatriyo bhūpatir nṛpaḥ
