b caturbhujam udārāṅgaṃ dṛṣṭavān asmi bhārata
c suṣvāpa bhagavān viṣṇur apśayyām eka eva ha
e nāgasya bhoge mahati śeṣasyāmitatejasaḥ
a lokakartā mahābhāga bhagavān acyuto hariḥ
c nāgabhogena mahatā parirabhya mahīm imām
a svapatas tasya devasya padmaṃ sūryasamaprabham
c nābhyāṃ viniḥsṛtaṃ tatra yatrotpannaḥ pitāmahaḥ
e sākṣāl lokagurur brahmā padme sūryendusaprabhe
a caturvedaś caturmūrtis tathaiva ca caturmukhaḥ
c svaprabhāvād durādharṣo mahābalaparākramaḥ
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya dānavau vīryavattarau
b viṣṇukarṇamalodbhūtau yojanānāṃ śatoc chritau
c madhuś ca kaiṭabhaś caiva dṛṣṭavantau hariṃ prabhum
a śayānaṃ śayane divye nāgabhoge mahādyutim
c bahuyojanavistīrṇe bahuyojanam āyate
a kirīṭakaustubhadharaṃ pītakauśeyavāsasam
c dīpyamānaṃ śriyā rājaṃs tejasā vapuṣā tathā
e sahasrasūryapratimam adbhutopamadarśanam
a vismayaḥ sumahān āsīn madhukaiṭabhayos tadā
c dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaṃ caiva padme padmanibhekṣaṇam
a vitrāsayetām atha tau brahmāṇam amitaujasam
c vitrāsyamāno bahuśo brahmā tābhyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
e akampayat padmanālaṃ tato 'budhyata keśavaḥ
a athāpaśyata govindo dānavau vīryavattarau
a   brahmāṇam amitaujasam
a tau ca vīryamadonmattau
c dṛṣṭvā tāv abravīd devaḥ svāgataṃ vāṃ mahābalau
e dadāni vāṃ varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prītir hi mama jāyate
a tau prahasya hṛṣīkeśaṃ mahāvīryau mahāsurau
c pratyabrūtāṃ mahārāja sahitau madhusūdanam
a āvāṃ varaya deva tvaṃ varadau svaḥ surottama
c dātārau svo varaṃ tubhyaṃ tad bravīhy avicārayan
 bhagavān uvāca
a pratigṛhṇe varaṃ vīrāv īpsitaś ca varo mama
b vidhārayan varaṃ vīrau pratigṛhṇāmi kāmataḥ
c yuvāṃ hi vīryasaṃpannau na vām asti samaḥ pumān
a vadhyatvam upagacchetāṃ mama satyaparākramau
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ prāptuṃ lokahitāya vai
 madhukaiṭabhāv ūcatuḥ
a anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ nau svaireṣv api kuto 'nyathā
c satye dharme ca niratau viddhy āvāṃ puruṣottama
a bale rūpe ca vīrye ca śame ca na samo 'sti nau
c dharme tapasi dāne ca śīlasattvadameṣu ca
a upaplavo mahān asmān upāvartata keśava
c uktaṃ pratikuruṣva tvaṃ kālo hi duratikramaḥ
a āvām icchāvahe deva kṛtam ekaṃ tvayā vibho
c anāvṛte 'sminn ākāśe vadhaṃ suravarottama
d vināśe tejasā yuktā   puruṣasattama
a putratvam abhigacchāva tava caiva sulocana
c vara eṣa vṛto deva tad viddhi surasattama
d anṛtaṃ mā bhaved deva yad dhi nau saṃśrutaṃ tadā
 bhagavān uvāca
a bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvam etad bhaviṣyati
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a vicintya tv atha govindo nāpaśyad yad anāvṛtam
c avakāśaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vā divi vā madhusūdanaḥ
a svakāv anāvṛtāv ūrū dṛṣṭvā devavaras tadā
c madhukaiṭabhayo rājañ śirasī madhusūdanaḥ
e cakreṇa śitadhāreṇa nyakṛntata mahāyaśāḥ
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a dhundhur nāma mahātejās tayoḥ putro mahādyutiḥ
c sa tapo 'tapyata mahan mahāvīryaparākramaḥ
a atiṣṭhad ekapādena kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ
c tasmai brahmā dadau prīto varaṃ vavre sa ca prabho
a devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ sarpagandharvarakṣasām
c avadhyo 'haṃ bhaveyaṃ vai vara eṣa vṛto mayā
a evaṃ bhavatu gaccheti tam uvāca pitāmahaḥ
c sa evam uktas tatpādau mūrdhnā spṛśya jagāma ha
a sa tu dhundhur varaṃ labdhvā mahāvīryaparākramaḥ
c anusmaran pitṛvadhaṃ tato viṣṇum upādravat
a sa tu devān sagandharvāñ jitvā dhundhur amarṣaṇaḥ
c babādha sarvān asakṛd devān viṣṇuṃ ca vai bhṛśam
a samudro vālukāpūrṇa ujjānaka iti smṛtaḥ
c āgamya ca sa duṣṭātmā taṃ deśaṃ bharatarṣabha
e bādhate sma paraṃ śaktyā tam uttaṅkāśramaṃ prabho
a antarbhūmigatas tatra vālukāntarhitas tadā
c madhukaiṭabhayoḥ putro dhundhur bhīmaparākramaḥ
a śete lokavināśāya tapobalasamāśritaḥ
c uttaṅkasyāśramābhyāśe niḥśvasan pāvakārciṣaḥ
a etasminn eva kāle tu sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ
b uttaṅkaviprasahitaḥ kuvalāśvo mahīpatiḥ
b putraiḥ saha mahīpālaḥ prayayau bharatarṣabha
b kuvalāśvo narapatiḥ putraiś ca sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
c kuvalāśvo narapatir anvito balaśālinām
a sahasrair ekaviṃśatyā putrāṇām arimardanaḥ
c prāyād uttaṅkasahito dhundhos tasya niveśanam
a tam āviśat tato viṣṇur bhagavāṃs tejasā prabhuḥ
c uttaṅkasya niyogena lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
a tasmin prayāte durdharṣe divi śabdo mahān abhūt
c eṣa śrīmān nṛpasuto dhundhumāro bhaviṣyati
a divyaiś ca puṣpais taṃ devāḥ samantāt paryavākiran
c devadundubhayaś caiva neduḥ svayam udīritāḥ
a śītaś ca vāyuḥ pravavau prayāṇe tasya dhīmataḥ
c vipāṃsulāṃ mahīṃ kurvan vavarṣa ca sureśvaraḥ
d pradakṣiṇāś cāpy abhavan vanyās tasya mṛgadvijāḥ
a antarikṣe vimānāni devatānāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c tatraiva samadṛśyanta dhundhur yatra mahāsuraḥ
a kuvalāśvasya dhundhoś ca yuddhakautūhalānvitāḥ
c devagandharvasahitāḥ samavaikṣan maharṣayaḥ
a nārāyaṇena kauravya tejasāpyāyitas tadā
b hitārthaṃ sarvalokānām udaṅkasya vaśe sthitaḥ
c sa gato nṛpatiḥ kṣipraṃ putrais taiḥ sarvatodiśam
a arṇavaṃ khānayām āsa kuvalāśvo mahīpatiḥ
c kuvalāśvasya putrais tu tasmin vai vālukārṇave
a saptabhir divasaiḥ khātvā dṛṣṭo dhundhur mahābalaḥ
c āsīd ghoraṃ vapus tasya vālukāntarhitaṃ mahat
d yugānte sarvabhūtāni pāvakasyeva dhakṣyataḥ
e dīpyamānaṃ yathā sūryas tejasā bharatarṣabha
f dīpyamānas tato dhundhus tejasā ca nareśvara
a tato dhundhur mahārāja diśam āśritya paścimām
c supto 'bhūd rājaśārdūla kālānalasamadyutiḥ
a kuvalāśvasya putrais tu sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ
c abhidrutaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair gadābhir musalair api
e paṭṭiśaiḥ parighaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiś ca vimalaiḥ śitaiḥ
a sa vadhyamānaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ samuttasthau mahābalaḥ
c kruddhaś cābhakṣayat teṣāṃ śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
a āsyād vaman pāvakaṃ sa saṃvartakasamaṃ tadā
c tān sarvān nṛpateḥ putrān adahat svena tejasā
a mukhajenāgninā kruddho lokān udvartayann iva
c kṣaṇena rājaśārdūla pureva kapilaḥ prabhuḥ
e sagarasyātmajān kruddhas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a teṣu krodhāgnidagdheṣu tadā bharatasattama
c taṃ prabuddhaṃ mahātmānaṃ kumbhakarṇam ivāparam
e āsasāda mahātejāḥ kuvalāśvo mahīpatiḥ
a tasya vāri mahārāja susrāva bahu dehataḥ
c tadāpīyata tat tejo rājā vārimayaṃ nṛpa
e yogī yogena vahniṃ ca śamayām āsa vāriṇā
a brahmāstreṇa tadā rājā daityaṃ krūraparākramam
c dadāha bharataśreṣṭha sarvalokābhayāya vai
a so 'streṇa dagdhvā rājarṣiḥ kuvalāśvo mahāsuram
c suraśatrum amitraghnas trilokeśa ivāparaḥ
d dhundhor vadhāt tadā rājā kuvalāśvo mahāmanāḥ
d kuvalāśvo mahābāhur dhundhuṃ hatvā jaharṣa ca
e dhundhumāra iti khyāto nāmnā samabhavat tataḥ
a prītaiś ca tridaśaiḥ sarvair maharṣisahitais tadā
c varaṃ vṛṇīṣvety uktaḥ sa prāñjaliḥ praṇatas tadā
e atīva mudito rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a dadyāṃ vittaṃ dvijāgryebhyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ cāpi durjayaḥ
c sakhyaṃ ca viṣṇunā me syād bhūteṣv adroha eva ca
e dharme ratiś ca satataṃ svarge vāsas tathākṣayaḥ
a tathāstv iti tato devaiḥ prītair uktaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
c ṛṣibhiś ca sagandharvair uttaṅkena ca dhīmatā
a sabhājya cainaṃ vividhair āśīrvādais tato nṛpam
c devā maharṣayaś caiva svāni sthānāni bhejire
a tasya putrās trayaḥ śiṣṭā yudhiṣṭhira tadābhavan
c dṛḍhāśvaḥ kapilāśvaś ca candrāśvaś caiva bhārata
e tebhyaḥ paramparā rājann ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
f vaṃśasya sumahābhāga rājñām amitatejasām
a evaṃ sa nihatas tena kuvalāśvena sattama
c dhundhur daityo mahāvīryo madhukaiṭabhayoḥ sutaḥ
a kuvalāśvas tu nṛpatir dhundhumāra iti smṛtaḥ
c nāmnā ca guṇasaṃyuktas tadā prabhṛti so 'bhavat
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c dhaundhumāram upākhyānaṃ prathitaṃ yasya karmaṇā
a idaṃ tu puṇyam ākhyānaṃ viṣṇoḥ samanukīrtanam
c śṛṇuyād yaḥ sa dharmātmā putravāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ
a āyuṣmān dhṛtimāṃś caiva śrutvā bhavati parvasu
c na ca vyādhibhayaṃ kiṃ cit prāpnoti vigatajvaraḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā mārkaṇḍeyaṃ mahādyutim
c papraccha bharataśreṣṭho dharmapraśnaṃ sudurvacam
a śrotum icchāmi bhagavan strīṇāṃ māhātmyam uttamam
c kathyamānaṃ tvayā vipra sūkṣmaṃ dharmaṃ ca tattvataḥ
a pratyakṣeṇa hi viprarṣe devā dṛśyanti sattama
c sūryācandramasau vāyuḥ pṛthivī vahnir eva ca
a pitā mātā ca bhagavan gāva eva ca sattama
c yac cānyad eva vihitaṃ tac cāpi bhṛgunandana
a manye 'haṃ guruvat sarvam ekapatnyas tathā striyaḥ
c pativratānāṃ śuśrūṣā duṣkarā pratibhāti me
a pativratānāṃ māhātmyaṃ vaktum arhasi naḥ prabho
b nānyad daivatam ity eva strīṇāṃ bhartur dvijottama
c nirudhya cendriyagrāmaṃ manaḥ saṃrudhya cānagha
e patiṃ daivatavac cāpi cintayantyaḥ sthitā hi yāḥ

a strīṇāṃ dharmāt sughorād dhi nānyaṃ paśyāmi duṣkaram
c sādhv ācārāḥ striyo brahman yat kurvanti sadādṛtāḥ
e duṣkaraṃ bata kurvanti pitaro mātaraś ca vai
a ekapatnyaś ca yā nāryo yāś ca satyaṃ vadanty uta
c kukṣiṇā daśa māsāṃś ca garbhaṃ saṃdhārayanti yāḥ
e nāryaḥ kālena saṃbhūya kim adbhutataraṃ tataḥ
a saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ prāpya vedanām atulām api
c prajāyante sutān nāryo duḥkhena mahatā vibho
e puṣṇanti cāpi mahatā snehena dvijasattama
f cintayanti tataś cāpi kiṃśīlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
a ye ca krūreṣu sarveṣu vartamānā jugupsitāḥ
c svakarma kurvanti sadā duṣkaraṃ tac ca me matam
a kṣatradharmasamācāraṃ tathyaṃ cākhyāhi me dvija
c dharmaḥ sudurlabho vipra nṛśaṃsena durātmanā
a etad icchāmi bhagavan praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ vara
c śrotuṃ bhṛgukulaśreṣṭha śuśrūṣe tava suvrata
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a hanta te sarvam ākhyāsye praśnam etaṃ sudurvacam
c tattvena bharataśreṣṭha gadatas tan nibodha me
a mātaraṃ sadṛśīṃ tāta pitṝn anye ca manyate
c duṣkaraṃ kurute mātā vivardhayati yā prajāḥ
a tapasā devatejyābhir vandanena titikṣayā
c abhicārair upāyaiś ca īhante pitaraḥ sutān
a evaṃ kṛcchreṇa mahatā putraṃ prāpya sudurlabham
c cintayanti sadā vīra kīdṛśo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
d ye cakrur eṣu sarveṣu vartamānajugupsayā
a āśaṃsate ca putreṣu pitā mātā ca bhārata
c yaśaḥ kīrtim athaiśvaryaṃ prajā dharmaṃ tathaiva ca
d mātuḥ pituś ca rājendra satataṃ hitakāriṇaḥ
a tayor āśāṃ tu saphalāṃ yaḥ karoti sa dharmavit
c pitā mātā ca rājendra tuṣyato yasya nityadā
e iha pretya ca tasyātha kīrtir dharmaś ca śāśvataḥ
a naiva yajñaḥ striyaḥ kaś cin na śrāddhaṃ nopavāsakam
c yā tu bhartari śuśrūṣā tayā svargam upāśnute
a etat prakaraṇaṃ rājann adhikṛtya yudhiṣṭhira
c prativratānāṃ niyataṃ dharmaṃ cāvahitaḥ śṛṇu
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a kaś cid dvijātipravaro vedādhyāyī tapodhanaḥ
c tapasvī dharmaśīlaś ca kauśiko nāma bhārata
a sāṅgopaniṣadān vedān adhīte dvijasattamaḥ
c sa vṛkṣamūle kasmiṃś cid vedān uccārayan sthitaḥ
a upariṣṭāc ca vṛkṣasya balākā saṃnyalīyata
c tayā purīṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇasya tadopari
a tām avekṣya tataḥ kruddhaḥ samapadhyāyata dvijaḥ
b tāṃ balākāṃ mahārāja vilīnāṃ nagamūrdhani
c bhṛśaṃ krodhābhibhūtena balākā sā nirīkṣitā
a apadhyātā ca vipreṇa nyapatad vasudhātale
c balākāṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā gatasattvām acetanām
e kāruṇyād abhisaṃtaptaḥ paryaśocata tāṃ dvijaḥ
a akāryaṃ kṛtavān asmi rāgadveṣabalātkṛtaḥ
c ity uktvā bahuśo vidvān grāmaṃ bhaikṣāya saṃśritaḥ
a grāme śucīni pracaran kulāni bharatarṣabha
c praviṣṭas tat kulaṃ yatra pūrvaṃ caritavāṃs tu saḥ
a dehīti yācamāno vai tiṣṭhety uktaḥ striyā tataḥ
c śaucaṃ tu yāvat kurute bhājanasya kuṭumbinī
a etasminn antare rājan kṣudhāsaṃpīḍito bhṛśam
c bhartā praviṣṭaḥ sahasā tasyā bharatasattama
a sā tu dṛṣṭvā patiṃ sādhvī brāhmaṇaṃ vyapahāya tam
c pādyam ācamanīyaṃ ca dadau bhartre tathāsanam
a prahvā paryacarac cāpi bhartāram asitekṣaṇā
c āhāreṇātha bhakṣyaiś ca vākyaiḥ sumadhurais tathā
a ucchiṣṭaṃ bhuñjate bhartuḥ sā tu nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c daivataṃ ca patiṃ mene bhartuś cittānusāriṇī
a na karmaṇā na manasā nātyaśnān nāpi cāpibat
c taṃ sarvabhāvopagatā patiśuśrūṣaṇe ratā
a sādhvācārā śucir dakṣā kuṭumbasya hitaiṣiṇī
c bhartuś cāpi hitaṃ yat tat satataṃ sānuvartate
a devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ śvaśrūśvaśurayos tathā
c śuśrūṣaṇaparā nityaṃ satataṃ saṃyatendriyā
a sā brāhmaṇaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā saṃsthitaṃ bhaikṣakāṅkṣiṇam
c kurvatī patiśuśrūṣāṃ sasmārātha śubhekṣaṇā
a vrīḍitā sābhavat sādhvī tadā bharatasattama
c bhikṣām ādāya viprāya nirjagāma yaśasvinī
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a kim idaṃ bhavati tvaṃ māṃ tiṣṭhety uktvā varāṅgane
c uparodhaṃ kṛtavatī na visarjitavaty asi
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a brāhmaṇaṃ krodhasaṃtaptaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā
c dṛṣṭvā sādhvī manuṣyendra sāntvapūrvaṃ vaco 'bravīt
d kṣamasva viprapravara kṣamasva strījaḍatvatām
d prasīda bhagavan mahyaṃ kṛpāṃ kuru mayi dvija
a kṣantum arhasi me vipra bhartā me daivataṃ mahat
c sa cāpi kṣudhitaḥ śrāntaḥ prāptaḥ śuśrūṣito mayā
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a brāhmaṇā na garīyāṃso garīyāṃs te patiḥ kṛtaḥ
c gṛhasthadharme vartantī brāhmaṇān avamanyase
a indro 'py eṣāṃ praṇamate kiṃ punar mānuṣā bhuvi
c avalipte na jānīṣe vṛddhānāṃ na śrutaṃ tvayā
e brāhmaṇā hy agnisadṛśā daheyuḥ pṛthivīm api
f saparvatavanadvīpāṃ kṣipram evāvamānitāḥ
 stry uvāca
a nāvajānāmy ahaṃ viprān devais tulyān manasvinaḥ
c aparādham imaṃ vipra kṣantum arhasi me 'nagha
d nāhaṃ balākā viprendra tyaja krodhaṃ tapodhana
d anayā kruddhayā dṛṣṭyā kruddhaḥ kiṃ māṃ kariṣyasi
a jānāmi tejo viprāṇāṃ mahābhāgyaṃ ca dhīmatām
c apeyaḥ sāgaraḥ krodhāt kṛto hi lavaṇodakaḥ
a tathaiva dīptatapasāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
c yeṣāṃ krodhāgnir adyāpi daṇḍake nopaśāmyati
d kasmāt paribhaven mūḍho brāhmaṇān amitaujasaḥ
a brāhmaṇānāṃ paribhavād vātāpiś ca durātmavān

a prabhāvā bahavaś cāpi śrūyante brahmavādinām
c krodhaḥ suvipulo brahman prasādaś ca mahātmanām
a asmiṃs tv atikrame brahman kṣantum arhasi me 'nagha
c patiśuśrūṣayā dharmo yaḥ sa me rocate dvija
a daivateṣv api sarveṣu bhartā me daivataṃ param
c aviśeṣeṇa tasyāhaṃ kuryāṃ dharmaṃ dvijottama
a śuśrūṣāyāḥ phalaṃ paśya patyur brāhmaṇa yādṛśam
c balākā hi tvayā dagdhā roṣāt tad viditaṃ mama
a krodhaḥ śatruḥ śarīrastho manuṣyāṇāṃ dvijottama
b mā sma kruddho balākeva na vadhyāsmi pativratā
c yaḥ krodhamohau tyajati taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a yo vaded iha satyāni guruṃ saṃtoṣayeta ca
c hiṃsitaś ca na hiṃseta taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a jitendriyo dharmaparaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ
c kāmakrodhau vaśe yasya taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a yasya cātmasamo loko dharmajñasya manasvinaḥ
c sarvadharmeṣu ca ratas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a yo 'dhyāpayed adhīyīta yajed vā yājayīta vā
c dadyād vāpi yathāśakti taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a brahmacārī ca vedānyo adhīyīta dvijottamaḥ
c svādhyāye cāpramatto vai taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a yad brāhmaṇānāṃ kuśalaṃ tad eṣāṃ parikīrtayet
c satyaṃ tathā vyāharatāṃ nānṛte ramate manaḥ
a dhanaṃ tu brāhmaṇasyāhuḥ svādhyāyaṃ damam ārjavam
c indriyāṇāṃ nigrahaṃ ca śāśvataṃ dvijasattama
e satyārjave dharmam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmavido janāḥ
a durjñeyaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ sa tu satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c śrutipramāṇo dharmaḥ syād iti vṛddhānuśāsanam
a bahudhā dṛśyate dharmaḥ sūkṣma eva dvijottama
c bhavān api ca dharmajñaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ
e na tu tattvena bhagavan dharmān vetsīti me matiḥ
f yadi vipra na jānīṣe dharmaṃ paramakaṃ dvija
f dharmavyādhaṃ tataḥ pṛccha gatvā tu mithilāṃ purīm
a mātāpitṛbhyāṃ śuśrūṣuḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
c mithilāyāṃ vasan vyādhaḥ sa te dharmān pravakṣyati
e tatra gacchasva bhadraṃ te yathākāmaṃ dvijottama
f vyādhaḥ paramadharmātmā sa te chetsyati saṃśayān
a atyuktam api me sarvaṃ kṣantum arhasy anindita
c striyo hy avadhyāḥ sarveṣāṃ ye dharmaviduṣo janāḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a prīto 'smi tava bhadraṃ te gataḥ krodhaś ca śobhane
c upālambhas tvayā hy ukto mama niḥśreyasaṃ param
e svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi sādhayiṣyāmi śobhane
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a tayā visṛṣṭo nirgamya svam eva bhavanaṃ yayau
c vinindan sa dvijo ''tmānaṃ kauśiko narasattama
d dhanyā tvam asi kalyāṇi yasyāḥ syād vṛttam īdṛśam
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a cintayitvā tad āścaryaṃ striyā proktam aśeṣataḥ
c vinindan sa dvijo ''tmānam āgaskṛta ivābabhau
a cintayānaḥ sa dharmasya sūkṣmāṃ gatim athābravīt
c śraddadhānena bhāvyaṃ vai gacchāmi mithilām aham
a kṛtātmā dharmavit tasyāṃ vyādho nivasate kila
c taṃ gacchāmy aham adyaiva dharmaṃ praṣṭuṃ tapodhanam
a iti saṃcintya manasā śraddadhānaḥ striyā vacaḥ
c balākāpratyayenāsau dharmyaiś ca vacanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
e saṃpratasthe sa mithilāṃ kautūhalasamanvitaḥ
e   janakenābhipālitām
e pathi paśyan nadī ramyāḥ
a atikrāmann araṇyāni grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca
c tato jagāma mithilāṃ janakena surakṣitām
a dharmasetusamākīrṇāṃ yajñotsavavatīṃ śubhām
c gopurāṭṭālakavatīṃ gṛhaprākāraśobhitām
a praviśya sa purīṃ ramyāṃ vimānair bahubhir vṛtām
c paṇyaiś ca bahubhir yuktāṃ suvibhaktamahāpathām
a aśvai rathais tathā nāgair yānaiś ca bahubhir vṛtām
c hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇāṃ nityotsavasamākulām
a so 'paśyad bahuvṛttāntāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ samatikraman
c dharmavyādham apṛcchac ca sa cāsya kathito dvijaiḥ
a apaśyat tatra gatvā taṃ sūnāmadhye vyavasthitam
c mārgamāhiṣamāṃsāni vikrīṇantaṃ tapasvinam
e ākulatvāt tu kretṝṇām ekānte saṃsthito dvijaḥ
a sa tu jñātvā dvijaṃ prāptaṃ sahasā saṃbhramotthitaḥ
c ājagāma yato vipraḥ sthita ekānta āsane
 vyādha uvāca
a abhivādaye tvā bhagavan svāgataṃ te dvijottama

a ekapatnyā yad ukto 'si gaccha tvaṃ mithilām iti
c jānāmy etad ahaṃ sarvaṃ yadarthaṃ tvam ihāgataḥ
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a śrutvā tu tasya tad vākyaṃ sa vipro bhṛśaharṣitaḥ
c dvitīyam idam āścaryam ity acintayata dvijaḥ
a adeśasthaṃ hi te sthānam iti vyādho 'bravīd dvijam

a bāḍham ity eva saṃhṛṣṭo vipro vacanam abravīt
c agratas tu dvijaṃ kṛtvā sa jagāma gṛhān prati
a praviśya ca gṛhaṃ ramyam āsanenābhipūjitaḥ
b arghyeṇa ca sa vai tena vyādhena dvijasattamaḥ
c pādyam ācamanīyaṃ ca pratigṛhya dvijottamaḥ
a tataḥ sukhopaviṣṭas taṃ vyādhaṃ vacanam abravīt
c karmaitad vai na sadṛśaṃ bhavataḥ pratibhāti me
e anutapye bhṛśaṃ tāta tava ghoreṇa karmaṇā
 vyādha uvāca
a kulocitam idaṃ karma pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mama
c vartamānasya me dharme sve manyuṃ mā kṛthā dvija
a dhātrā tu vihitaṃ pūrvaṃ karma svaṃ pālayāmy aham
c prayatnāc ca gurū vṛddhau śuśrūṣe 'haṃ dvijottama
a satyaṃ vade nābhyasūye yathāśakti dadāmi ca
c devatātithibhṛtyānām avaśiṣṭena vartaye
a na kutsayāmy ahaṃ kiṃ cin na garhe balavattaram
c kṛtam anveti kartāraṃ purā karma dvijottama
a kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyam iha lokasya jīvanam
c daṇḍanītis trayī vidyā tena lokā bhavanty uta
a karma śūdre kṛṣir vaiśye saṃgrāmaḥ kṣatriye smṛtaḥ
c brahmacaryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ satyaṃ ca brāhmaṇe sadā
a rājā praśāsti dharmeṇa svakarmaniratāḥ prajāḥ
c vikarmāṇaś ca ye ke cit tān yunakti svakarmasu
a bhetavyaṃ hi sadā rājñāṃ prajānām adhipā hi te
c mārayanti vikarmasthaṃ lubdhā mṛgam iveṣubhiḥ
a janakasyeha viprarṣe vikarmastho na vidyate
c svakarmaniratā varṇāś catvāro 'pi dvijottama
a sa eṣa janako rājā durvṛttam api cet sutam
c daṇḍyaṃ daṇḍe nikṣipati tathā na glāti dhārmikam
a suyuktacāro nṛpatiḥ sarvaṃ dharmeṇa paśyati
c śrīś ca rājyaṃ ca daṇḍaś ca kṣatriyāṇāṃ dvijottama
a rājāno hi svadharmeṇa śriyam icchanti bhūyasīm
c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ trātā rājā bhavaty uta
a pareṇa hi hatān brahman varāhamahiṣān aham
c na svayaṃ hanmi viprarṣe vikrīṇāmi sadā tv aham
a na bhakṣayāmi māṃsāni ṛtugāmī tathā hy aham
c sadopavāsī ca tathā naktabhojī tathā dvija
a aśīlaś cāpi puruṣo bhūtvā bhavati śīlavān
c prāṇihiṃsārataś cāpi bhavate dhārmikaḥ punaḥ
a vyabhicārān narendrāṇāṃ dharmaḥ saṃkīryate mahān
c adharmo vardhate cāpi saṃkīryante tathā prajāḥ
a uruṇḍā vāmanāḥ kubjāḥ sthūlaśīrṣās tathaiva ca
c klībāś cāndhāś ca jāyante badhirā lambacūcukāḥ
e pārthivānām adharmatvāt prajānām abhavaḥ sadā
a sa eṣa rājā janakaḥ sarvaṃ dharmeṇa paśyati
c anugṛhṇan prajāḥ sarvāḥ svadharmaniratāḥ sadā
d pāty eṣa rājā janakaḥ pitṛvad dvijasattama
a ye caiva māṃ praśaṃsanti ye ca nindanti mānavāḥ
c sarvān supariṇītena karmaṇā toṣayāmy aham
a ye jīvanti svadharmeṇa saṃbhuñjante ca pārthivāḥ
c na kiṃ cid upajīvanti dakṣā utthānaśīlinaḥ
d na kiṃ cit phalam āpnoti svadharmasya ca lopanāt
a śaktyānnadānaṃ satataṃ titikṣā dharmanityatā
c yathārhaṃ pratipūjā ca sarvabhūteṣu vai dayā
e tyāgān nānyatra martyānāṃ guṇās tiṣṭhanti pūruṣe
a mṛṣāvādaṃ pariharet kuryāt priyam ayācitaḥ
c na ca kāmān na saṃrambhān na dveṣād dharmam utsṛjet
a priye nātibhṛśaṃ hṛṣyed apriye na ca saṃjvaret
c na muhyed arthakṛcchreṣu na ca dharmaṃ parityajet
a karma cet kiṃ cid anyat syād itaran na samācaret
c yat kalyāṇam abhidhyāyet tatrātmānaṃ niyojayet
a na pāpaṃ prati pāpaḥ syāt sādhur eva sadā bhavet
c ātmanaiva hataḥ pāpo yaḥ pāpaṃ kartum icchati
a karma caitad asādhūnāṃ vṛjinānām asādhuvat
c na dharmo 'stīti manvānāḥ śucīn avahasanti ye
e aśraddadhānā dharmasya te naśyanti na saṃśayaḥ
a mahādṛtir ivādhmātaḥ pāpo bhavati nityadā
b sādhusannītimān eva sarvatra dvijasattama
c mūḍhānām avaliptānām asāraṃ bhāṣitaṃ bhavet
e darśayaty antarātmānaṃ divā rūpam ivāṃśumān
a na loke rājate mūrkhaḥ kevalātmapraśaṃsayā
c api ceha mṛjā hīnaḥ kṛtavidyaḥ prakāśate
a abruvan kasya cin nindām ātmapūjām avarṇayan
c na kaś cid guṇasaṃpannaḥ prakāśo bhuvi dṛśyate
a vikarmaṇā tapyamānaḥ pāpād viparimucyate
c naitat kuryāṃ punar iti dvitīyāt parimucyate
d kariṣye dharmam eveti tṛtīyāt parimucyate
a karmaṇā yena teneha pāpād dvijavarottama
c evaṃ śrutir iyaṃ brahman dharmeṣu paridṛśyate
a pāpāny abuddhveha purā kṛtāni
prāg dharmaśīlo vinihanti paścāt
c dharmo brahman nudate pūruṣāṇāṃ
yat kurvate pāpam iha pramādāt
a pāpaṃ kṛtvā hi manyeta nāham asmīti pūruṣaḥ
b taṃ tu devāḥ prapaśyanti svasyaivāntarapūruṣaḥ
c cikīrṣed eva kalyāṇaṃ śraddadhāno 'nasūyakaḥ
a vasanasyeva chidrāṇi sādhūnāṃ vivṛṇoti yaḥ
b apaśyann ātmano doṣān sa pāpaḥ pretya naśyati
c pāpaṃ cet puruṣaḥ kṛtvā kalyāṇam abhipadyate
e mucyate sarvapāpebhyo mahābhrair iva candramāḥ
a yathādityaḥ samudyan vai tamaḥ sarvaṃ vyapohati
c evaṃ kalyāṇam ātiṣṭhan sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a pāpānāṃ viddhy adhiṣṭhānaṃ lobham eva dvijottama
b tasmāt tau viduṣāṃ vipra varjanīyau pradhānataḥ
c lubdhāḥ pāpaṃ vyavasyanti narā nātibahuśrutāḥ
e adharmā dharmarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpā ivāvṛtāḥ
a teṣāṃ damaḥ pavitrāṇi pralāpā dharmasaṃśritāḥ
c sarvaṃ hi vidyate teṣu śiṣṭācāraḥ sudurlabhaḥ
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a sa tu vipro mahāprājño dharmavyādham apṛcchata
c śiṣṭācāraṃ katham ahaṃ vidyām iti narottama
d etad icchāmi bhadraṃ te śrotuṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
d pañca kāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadā
e etan mahāmate vyādha prabravīhi yathātatham
 vyādha uvāca
a yajño dānaṃ tapo vedāḥ satyaṃ ca dvijasattama
c pañcaitāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadā
a kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā dambhaṃ lobham anārjavam
c dharma ity eva saṃtuṣṭās te śiṣṭāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥ
a na teṣāṃ vidyate 'vṛttaṃ yajñasvādhyāyaśīlinām
c ācārapālanaṃ caiva dvitīyaṃ śiṣṭalakṣaṇam
a guruśuśrūṣaṇaṃ satyam akrodho dānam eva ca
c etac catuṣṭayaṃ brahmañ śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadā
a śiṣṭācāre manaḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya ca sarvaśaḥ
c yām ayaṃ labhate tuṣṭiṃ sā na śakyā hy ato 'nyathā
a vedasyopaniṣat satyaṃ satyasyopaniṣad damaḥ
c damasyopaniṣat tyāgaḥ śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadā
a ye tu dharmam asūyante buddhimohānvitā narāḥ
c apathā gacchatāṃ teṣām anuyātāpi pīḍyate
a ye tu śiṣṭāḥ suniyatāḥ śrutityāgaparāyaṇāḥ
b vyādhaḥ
b etan mahāmate vyādha prabravīhi yathātatham
b yajño dānaṃ tapo vedāḥ satyaṃ ca dvijasattama
b pañcaitāni pavitrāṇi śiṣṭācāreṣu nityadā
c dharmyaṃ panthānam ārūḍhāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
a niyacchanti parāṃ buddhiṃ śiṣṭācārānvitā narāḥ
c upādhyāyamate yuktāḥ sthityā dharmārthadarśinaḥ
a nāstikān bhinnamaryādān krūrān pāpamatau sthitān
c tyaja tāñ jñānam āśritya dhārmikān upasevya ca
a kāmalobhagrahākīrṇāṃ pañcendriyajalāṃ nadīm
c nāvaṃ dhṛtimayīṃ kṛtvā janmadurgāṇi saṃtara
a krameṇa saṃcito dharmo buddhiyogamayo mahān
c śiṣṭācāre bhavet sādhū rāgaḥ śukleva vāsasi
a ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūtahitaṃ param
c ahiṃsā paramo dharmaḥ sa ca satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
e satye kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāṃ tu pravartante pravṛttayaḥ
a satyam eva garīyas tu śiṣṭācāraniṣevitam
c ācāraś ca satāṃ dharmaḥ santaś cācāralakṣaṇāḥ
a yo yathāprakṛtir jantuḥ svāṃ svāṃ prakṛtim aśnute
c pāpātmā krodhakāmādīn doṣān āpnoty anātmavān
a ārambho nyāyayukto yaḥ sa hi dharma iti smṛtaḥ
c anācāras tv adharmeti etac chiṣṭānuśāsanam
a akrudhyanto 'nasūyanto nirahaṃkāramatsarāḥ
c ṛjavaḥ śamasaṃpannāḥ śiṣṭācārā bhavanti te
a traividyavṛddhāḥ śucayo vṛttavanto manasvinaḥ
c guruśuśrūṣavo dāntāḥ śiṣṭācārā bhavanty uta
a teṣām adīnasattvānāṃ duṣkarācārakarmaṇām
c svaiḥ karmabhiḥ satkṛtānāṃ ghoratvaṃ saṃpraṇaśyati
a taṃ sadācāram āścaryaṃ purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
c dharmaṃ dharmeṇa paśyantaḥ svargaṃ yānti manīṣiṇaḥ
a āstikā mānahīnāś ca dvijātijanapūjakāḥ
c śrutavṛttopasaṃpannāḥ te santaḥ svargagāminaḥ
a vedoktaḥ paramo dharmo dharmaśāstreṣu cāparaḥ
c śiṣṭācīrṇaś ca śiṣṭānāṃ trividhaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam
a pāraṇaṃ cāpi vidyānāṃ tīrthānām avagāhanam
c kṣamā satyārjavaṃ śaucaṃ śiṣṭācāranidarśanam
a sarvabhūtadayāvanto ahiṃsāniratāḥ sadā
c paruṣaṃ na prabhāṣante sadā santo dvijapriyāḥ
a śubhānām aśubhānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃcaye
c vipākam abhijānanti te śiṣṭāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥ
a nyāyopetā guṇopetāḥ sarvalokahitaiṣiṇaḥ
c santaḥ svargajitaḥ śuklāḥ saṃniviṣṭāś ca satpathe
a dātāraḥ saṃvibhaktāro dīnānugrahakāriṇaḥ
c sarvabhūtadayāvantas te śiṣṭāḥ śiṣṭasaṃmatāḥ
a sarvapūjyāḥ śrutadhanās tathaiva ca tapasvinaḥ
c dānanityāḥ sukhāṃl lokān āpnuvantīha ca śriyam
a pīḍayā ca kalatrasya bhṛtyānāṃ ca samāhitāḥ
c atiśaktyā prayacchanti santaḥ sadbhiḥ samāgatāḥ
a lokayātrāṃ ca paśyanto dharmam ātmahitāni ca
c evaṃ santo vartamānā edhante śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
a ahiṃsā satyavacanam ānṛśaṃsyam athārjavam
c adroho nātimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā damaḥ śamaḥ
a dhīmanto dhṛtimantaś ca bhūtānām anukampakāḥ
c akāmadveṣasaṃyuktās te santo lokasatkṛtāḥ
a trīṇy eva tu padāny āhuḥ satāṃ vṛttam anuttamam
c na druhyec caiva dadyāc ca satyaṃ caiva sadā vadet
a sarvatra ca dayāvantaḥ santaḥ karuṇavedinaḥ
c gacchantīha susaṃtuṣṭā dharmyaṃ panthānam uttamam
e śiṣṭācārā mahātmāno yeṣāṃ dharmaḥ suniścitaḥ
a anasūyā kṣamā śāntiḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā
c kāmakrodhaparityāgaḥ śiṣṭācāraniṣevaṇam
a karmaṇā śrutasaṃpannaṃ satāṃ mārgam anuttamam
c śiṣṭācāraṃ niṣevante nityaṃ dharmeṣv atandritāḥ
a prajñāprāsādam āruhya muhyato mahato janān
c prekṣanto lokavṛttāni vividhāni dvijottama
e atipuṇyāni pāpāni tāni dvijavarottama
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathāprajñaṃ yathāśrutam
c śiṣṭācāraguṇān brahman puraskṛtya dvijarṣabha
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a sa tu vipram athovāca dharmavyādho yudhiṣṭhira
c yad ahaṃ hy ācare karma ghoram etad asaṃśayam
a vidhis tu balavān brahman dustaraṃ hi purākṛtam
c purākṛtasya pāpasya karmadoṣo bhavaty ayam
e doṣasyaitasya vai brahman vighāte yatnavān aham
a vidhinā vihite pūrvaṃ nimittaṃ ghātako bhavet
c nimittabhūtā hi vayaṃ karmaṇo 'sya dvijottama
a yeṣāṃ hatānāṃ māṃsāni vikrīṇāmo vayaṃ dvija
c teṣām api bhaved dharma upabhogena bhakṣaṇāt
e devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ pratipūjanāt
a oṣadhyo vīrudhaś cāpi paśavo mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
c annādyabhūtā lokasya ity api śrūyate śrutiḥ
a ātmamāṃsapradānena śibir auśīnaro nṛpaḥ
c svargaṃ sudurlabhaṃ prāptaḥ kṣamāvān dvijasattama
a rājño mahānase pūrvaṃ rantidevasya vai dvija
c dve sahasre tu vadhyete paśūnām anvahaṃ tadā
d ahany ahani vadhyete dve sahasre gavāṃ tathā
a samāṃsaṃ dadato hy annaṃ rantidevasya nityaśaḥ
c atulā kīrtir abhavan nṛpasya dvijasattama
e cāturmāsyeṣu paśavo vadhyanta iti nityaśaḥ
a agnayo māṃsakāmāś ca ity api śrūyate śrutiḥ
c yajñeṣu paśavo brahman vadhyante satataṃ dvijaiḥ
e saṃskṛtāḥ kila mantraiś ca te 'pi svargam avāpnuvan
a yadi naivāgnayo brahman māṃsakāmābhavan purā
c bhakṣyaṃ naiva bhaven māṃsaṃ kasya cid dvijasattama
a atrāpi vidhir uktaś ca munibhir māṃsabhakṣaṇe
c devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca bhuṅkte dattvā tu yaḥ sadā
e yathāvidhi yathāśraddhaṃ na sa duṣyati bhakṣaṇāt
a amāṃsāśī bhavaty evam ity api śrūyate śrutiḥ
c bhāryāṃ gacchan brahmacārī ṛtau bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ
a satyānṛte viniścitya atrāpi vidhir ucyate
c saudāsena purā rājñā mānuṣā bhakṣitā dvija
e śāpābhibhūtena bhṛśam atra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a svadharma iti kṛtvā tu na tyajāmi dvijottama
c purākṛtam iti jñātvā jīvāmy etena karmaṇā
a svakarma tyajato brahmann adharma iha dṛśyate
c svakarmanirato yas tu sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
a pūrvaṃ hi vihitaṃ karma dehinaṃ na vimuñcati
c dhātrā vidhir ayaṃ dṛṣṭo bahudhā karmanirṇaye
a draṣṭavyaṃ tu bhavet prājña krūre karmaṇi vartatā
c kathaṃ karma śubhaṃ kuryāṃ kathaṃ mucye parābhavāt
e karmaṇas tasya ghorasya bahudhā nirṇayo bhavet
a dāne ca satyavākye ca guruśuśrūṣaṇe tathā
c dvijātipūjane cāhaṃ dharme ca nirataḥ sadā
e ativādātimānābhyāṃ nivṛtto 'smi dvijottama
a kṛṣiṃ sādhv iti manyante tatra hiṃsā parā smṛtā
c karṣanto lāṅgalaiḥ puṃso ghnanti bhūmiśayān bahūn
e jīvān anyāṃś ca bahuśas tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a dhānyabījāni yāny āhur vrīhy ādīni dvijottama
c sarvāṇy etāni jīvāni tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a adhyākramya paśūṃś cāpi ghnanti vai bhakṣayanti ca
c vṛkṣān athauṣadhīś caiva chindanti puruṣā dvija
a jīvā hi bahavo brahman vṛkṣeṣu ca phaleṣu ca
c udake bahavaś cāpi tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a sarvaṃ vyāptam idaṃ brahman prāṇibhiḥ prāṇijīvanaiḥ
c matsyā grasante matsyāṃś ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a sattvaiḥ sattvāni jīvanti bahudhā dvijasattama
c prāṇino 'nyonyabhakṣāś ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a caṅkramyamāṇā jīvāṃś ca dharaṇīsaṃśritān bahūn
c padbhyāṃ ghnanti narā vipra tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a upaviṣṭāḥ śayānāś ca ghnanti jīvān anekaśaḥ
c jñānavijñānavantaś ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a jīvair grastam idaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ pṛthivī tathā
c avijñānāc ca hiṃsanti tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a ahiṃseti yad uktaṃ hi puruṣair vismitaiḥ purā
c ke na hiṃsanti jīvan vai loke 'smin dvijasattama
e bahu saṃcintya iha vai nāsti kaś cid ahiṃsakaḥ
a ahiṃsāyāṃ tu niratā yatayo dvijasattama
c kurvanty eva hi hiṃsāṃ te yatnād alpatarā bhavet
a ālakṣyāś caiva puruṣāḥ kule jātā mahāguṇāḥ
c mahāghorāṇi karmāṇi kṛtvā lajjanti vai na ca
a suhṛdaḥ suhṛdo 'nyāṃś ca durhṛdaś cāpi durhṛdaḥ
c samyak pravṛttān puruṣān na samyag anupaśyataḥ
a samṛddhaiś ca na nandanti bāndhavā bāndhavair api
c gurūṃś caiva vinindanti mūḍhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
a bahu loke viparyastaṃ dṛśyate dvijasattama
c dharmayuktam adharmaṃ ca tatra kiṃ pratibhāti te
a vaktuṃ bahuvidhaṃ śakyaṃ dharmādharmeṣu karmasu
b vedadharmāviruddhaṃ yat pramāṇaiḥ pratitaṃ śubham
c svakarmanirato yo hi sa yaśaḥ prāpnuyān mahat
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a dharmavyādhas tu nipuṇaṃ punar eva yudhiṣṭhira
c viprarṣabham uvācedaṃ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a śrutipramāṇo dharmo hi vṛddhānām iti bhāṣitam
c sūkṣmā gatir hi dharmasya bahuśākhā hy anantikā
a prāṇātyaye vivāhe ca vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavet
c anṛtaṃ ca bhavet satyaṃ satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ bhavet
a yad bhūtahitam atyantaṃ tat satyam iti dhāraṇā
c viparyayakṛto 'dharmaḥ paśya dharmasya sūkṣmatām
d yat karoty aśubhaṃ karma paśya dharmasya sūkṣmatām
a yat karoty aśubhaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā dvijasattama
b asya kartur gatiṃ sarvāṃ vakṣyāmi dvijasattama
c avaśyaṃ tat samāpnoti puruṣo nātra saṃśayaḥ
a viṣamāṃ ca daśāṃ prāpya devān garhati vai bhṛśam
c ātmanaḥ karmadoṣāṇi na vijānāty apaṇḍitaḥ
a mūḍho naikṛtikaś cāpi capalaś ca dvijottama
c sukhaduḥkhaviparyāso yadā samupapadyate
e nainaṃ prajñā sunītaṃ vā trāyate naiva pauruṣam
f śubhaṃ badhnāti vai karma puruṣaḥ pāpaniścayaḥ
a yo yam icched yathā kāmaṃ taṃ taṃ kāmaṃ samaśnuyāt
c yadi syād aparādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalam
a saṃyatāś cāpi dakṣāś ca matimantaś ca mānavāḥ
c dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ santaḥ prahīṇāḥ sarvakarmabhiḥ
a bhūtānām aparaḥ kaś cid dhiṃsāyāṃ satatotthitaḥ
c vañcanāyāṃ ca lokasya sa sukheneha jīvati
a aceṣṭamānam āsīnaṃ śrīḥ kaṃ cid upatiṣṭhati
c kaś cit karmāṇi kurvan hi na prāpyam adhigacchati
a devān iṣṭvā tapas taptvā kṛpaṇaiḥ putragṛddhibhiḥ
c daśamāsadhṛtā garbhe jāyante kulapāṃsanāḥ
a apare dhanadhānyaiś ca bhogaiś ca pitṛsaṃcitaiḥ
c vipulair abhijāyante labdhās tair eva maṅgalaiḥ
d na dehajā manuṣyāṇāṃ vyādhayo dvijasattama
a karmajā hi manuṣyāṇāṃ rogā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
c ādhibhiś caiva bādhyante vyādhaiḥ kṣudramṛgā iva
a te cāpi kuśalair vaidyair nipuṇaiḥ saṃbhṛtauṣadhaiḥ
c vyādhayo vinivāryante mṛgā vyādhair iva dvija
a yeṣām asti ca bhoktavyaṃ grahaṇīdoṣapīḍitāḥ
c na śaknuvanti te bhoktuṃ paśya dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
a apare bāhubalinaḥ kliśyante bahavo janāḥ
c duḥkhena cādhigacchanti bhojanaṃ dvijasattama
a iti lokam anākrandaṃ mohaśokapariplutam
c srotasāsakṛd ākṣiptaṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā
a na mriyeyur na jīryeyuḥ sarve syuḥ sārvakāmikāḥ
c nāpriyaṃ pratipaśyeyur vaśitvaṃ yadi vai bhavet
a upary upari lokasya sarvo gantuṃ samīhate
c yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tad vartate tathā
a bahavaḥ saṃpradṛśyante tulyanakṣatramaṅgalāḥ
c mahac ca phalavaiṣamyaṃ dṛśyate karmasaṃdhiṣu
d vahanti śibikām anye yānty anye śibikāgatāḥ
a na kaś cid īśate brahman svayaṃgrāhasya sattama
c karmaṇāṃ prākṛtānāṃ vai iha siddhiḥ pradṛśyate
a yathā śrutir iyaṃ brahmañ jīvaḥ kila sanātanaḥ
c śarīram adhruvaṃ loke sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām iha
a vadhyamāne śarīre tu dehanāśo bhavaty uta
c jīvaḥ saṃkramate 'nyatra karmabandhanibandhanaḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a kathaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jīvo bhavati śāśvataḥ
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena vadatāṃ vara
 vyādha uvāca
a na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede
mithyaitad āhur mriyateti mūḍhāḥ
c jīvas tu dehāntaritaḥ prayāti
daśārdhataivāsya śarīrabhedaḥ
a anyo hi nāśnāti kṛtaṃ hi karma
sa eva kartā sukhaduḥkhabhāgī
c yat tena kiṃ cid dhi kṛtaṃ hi karma
tad aśnute nāsti kṛtasya nāśaḥ
a apuṇyaśīlāś ca bhavanti puṇyā
narottamāḥ pāpakṛto bhavanti
c naro 'nuyātas tv iha karmabhiḥ svais
tataḥ samutpadyati bhāvitas taiḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a kathaṃ saṃbhavate yonau kathaṃ vā puṇyapāpayoḥ
c jātīḥ puṇyā hy apuṇyāś ca kathaṃ gacchati sattama
 vyādha uvāca
a garbhādhānasamāyuktaṃ karmedaṃ saṃpradṛśyate
c samāsena tu te kṣipraṃ pravakṣyāmi dvijottama
a yathā saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ punar eva prajāyate
c śubhakṛc chubhayonīṣu pāpakṛt pāpayoniṣu
a śubhaiḥ prayogair devatvaṃ vyāmiśrair mānuṣo bhavet
c mohanīyair viyonīṣu tv adhogāmī ca kilbiṣaiḥ
a jātimṛtyujarāduḥkhaiḥ satataṃ samabhidrutaḥ
c saṃsāre pacyamānaś ca doṣair ātmakṛtair naraḥ
a tiryagyonisahasrāṇi gatvā narakam eva ca
c jīvāḥ saṃparivartante karmabandhanibandhanāḥ
a jantus tu karmabhis tais taiḥ svakṛtaiḥ pretya duḥkhitaḥ
c tadduḥkhapratighātārtham apuṇyāṃ yonim aśnute
a tataḥ karma samādatte punar anyan navaṃ bahu
c pacyate tu punas tena bhuktvāpathyam ivāturaḥ
a ajasram eva duḥkhārto 'duḥkhitaḥ sukhasaṃjñitaḥ
c tato 'nivṛttabandhatvāt karmaṇām udayād api
e parikrāmati saṃsāre cakravad bahuvedanaḥ
a sa cen nivṛttabandhas tu viśuddhaś cāpi karmabhiḥ
b tapoyogasamārambhaṃ kurute dvijasattama
b karmabhir bahubhiś cāpi lokān aśnāti mānavaḥ
c prāpnoti sukṛtāṃl lokān yatra gatvā na śocati
a pāpaṃ kurvan pāpavṛttaḥ pāpasyāntaṃ na gacchati
b puṇyaṃ kurvan puṇyavṛttaḥ puṇyasyāntaṃ na gacchati
c tasmāt puṇyaṃ yatet kartuṃ varjayeta ca pātakam
a anasūyuḥ kṛtajñaś ca kalyāṇāny eva sevate
c sukhāni dharmam arthaṃ ca svargaṃ ca labhate naraḥ
a saṃskṛtasya hi dāntasya niyatasya yatātmanaḥ
c prājñasyānantarā vṛttir iha loke paratra ca
a satāṃ dharmeṇa varteta kriyāṃ śiṣṭavad ācaret
c asaṃkleśena lokasya vṛttiṃ lipseta vai dvija
a santi hy āgatavijñānāḥ śiṣṭāḥ śāstravicakṣaṇāḥ
c svadharmeṇa kriyā loke karmaṇaḥ so 'py asaṃkaraḥ
a prājño dharmeṇa ramate dharmaṃ caivopajīvati
b dharmeṇa vṛttiṃ kurute dharmaṃ caiva praśaṃsati
c tasya dharmād avāpteṣu dhaneṣu dvijasattama
e tasyaiva siñcate mūlaṃ guṇān paśyati yatra vai
a dharmātmā bhavati hy evaṃ cittaṃ cāsya prasīdati
c sa maitrajanasaṃtuṣṭa iha pretya ca nandati
a śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tathā rūpaṃ gandhān iṣṭāṃś ca sattama
c prabhutvaṃ labhate cāpi dharmasyaitat phalaṃ viduḥ
a dharmasya ca phalaṃ labdhvā na tṛpyati mahādvija
c atṛpyamāṇo nirvedam ādatte jñānacakṣuṣā
a prajñācakṣur nara iha doṣaṃ naivānurudhyate
c virajyati yathākāmaṃ na ca dharmaṃ vimuñcati
a sarvatyāge ca yatate dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ kṣayātmakam
c tato mokṣe prayatate nānupāyād upāyataḥ
a evaṃ nirvedam ādatte pāpaṃ karma jahāti ca
c dhārmikaś cāpi bhavati mokṣaṃ ca labhate param
a tapo niḥśreyasaṃ jantos tasya mūlaṃ śamo damaḥ
c tena sarvān avāpnoti kāmān yān manasecchati
a indriyāṇāṃ nirodhena satyena ca damena ca
c brahmaṇaḥ padam āpnoti yat paraṃ dvijasattama
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a indriyāṇi tu yāny āhuḥ kāni tāni yatavrata
c nigrahaś ca kathaṃ kāryo nigrahasya ca kiṃ phalam
a kathaṃ ca phalam āpnoti teṣāṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c etad icchāmi tattvena dharmaṃ jñātuṃ sudhārmika
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a evam uktas tu vipreṇa dharmavyādho yudhiṣṭhira
c pratyuvāca yathā vipraṃ tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa
 vyādha uvāca
a vijñānārthaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ pravartate
c tat prāpya kāmaṃ bhajate krodhaṃ ca dvijasattama
a tatas tadarthaṃ yatate karma cārabhate mahat
c iṣṭānāṃ rūpagandhānām abhyāsaṃ ca niṣevate
a tato rāgaḥ prabhavati dveṣaś ca tadanantaram
c tato lobhaḥ prabhavati mohaś ca tadanantaram
a tasya lobhābhibhūtasya rāgadveṣahatasya ca
c na dharme jāyate buddhir vyājād dharmaṃ karoti ca
a vyājena carate dharmam arthaṃ vyājena rocate
c vyājena sidhyamāneṣu dhaneṣu dvijasattama
e tatraiva ramate buddhis tataḥ pāpaṃ cikīrṣati
a suhṛdbhir vāryamāṇaś ca paṇḍitaiś ca dvijottama
c uttaraṃ śrutisaṃbaddhaṃ bravīti śrutiyojitam
a adharmas trividhas tasya vardhate rāgadoṣataḥ
c pāpaṃ cintayate cāpi bravīti ca karoti ca
a tasyādharmapravṛttasya guṇā naśyanti sādhavaḥ
c ekaśīlāś ca mitratvaṃ bhajante pāpakarmiṇaḥ
a sa tenāsukham āpnoti paratra ca vihanyate
c pāpātmā bhavati hy evaṃ dharmalābhaṃ tu me śṛṇu
a yas tv etān prajñayā doṣān pūrvam evānupaśyati
c kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkheṣu sādhūṃś cāpy upasevate
e tasya sādhusamārambhād buddhir dharmeṣu jāyate
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a bravīṣi sūnṛtaṃ dharmaṃ yasya vaktā na vidyate
c divyaprabhāvaḥ sumahān ṛṣir eva mato 'si me
 vyādha uvāca
a brāhmaṇā vai mahābhāgāḥ pitaro 'grabhujaḥ sadā
c teṣāṃ sarvātmanā kāryaṃ priyaṃ loke manīṣiṇā
a yat teṣāṃ ca priyaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi dvijasattama
c namaskṛtvā brāhmaṇebhyo brāhmīṃ vidyāṃ nibodha me
a idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sarvam ajayyaṃ cāpi sarvaśaḥ
c mahābhūtātmakaṃ brahman nātaḥ parataraṃ bhavet
a mahābhūtāni khaṃ vāyur agnir āpas tathā ca bhūḥ
b vāyur ākāśasaṃyuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu vartate
c śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca tadguṇāḥ
d tapasā hi samāpnoti yad yad evābhivāñchitam
d tad indriyāṇi saṃyamya tapo bhavati nānyathā
a teṣām api guṇāḥ sarve guṇavṛttiḥ parasparam
c pūrvapūrvaguṇāḥ sarve kramaśo guṇiṣu triṣu
a ṣaṣṭhas tu cetanā nāma mana ity abhidhīyate
c saptamī tu bhaved buddhir ahaṃkāras tataḥ param
a indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathā
c ity eṣa saptadaśako rāśir avyaktasaṃjñakaḥ
a sarvair ihendriyārthais tu vyaktāvyaktaiḥ susaṃvṛtaḥ
c caturviṃśaka ity eṣa vyaktāvyaktamayo guṇaḥ
e etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyo śrotum icchasi
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a evam uktaḥ sa vipras tu dharmavyādhena bhārata
c kathām akathayad bhūyo manasaḥ prītivardhanīm
 brāhmaṇa
a mahābhūtāni yāny āhuḥ pañca dharmavidāṃ vara
c ekaikasya guṇān samyak pañcānām api me vada
 vyādha uvāca
a bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva ca
c guṇottarāṇi sarvāṇi teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi te guṇān
a bhūmiḥ pañcaguṇā brahmann udakaṃ ca caturguṇam
c guṇās trayas tejasi ca trayaś cākāśavātayoḥ
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
c ete guṇāḥ pañca bhūmeḥ sarvebhyo guṇavattarāḥ
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś cāpi dvijottama
c apām ete guṇā brahman kīrtitās tava suvrata
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca tejaso 'tha guṇās trayaḥ
c śabdaḥ sparśaś ca vāyau tu śabda ākāśa eva ca
a ete pañcadaśa brahman guṇā bhūteṣu pañcasu
c vartante sarvabhūteṣu yeṣu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
e anyonyaṃ nātivartante saṃpac ca bhavati dvija
a yadā tu viṣamībhāvam ācaranti carācarāḥ
c tadā dehī deham anyaṃ vyatirohati kālataḥ
a ānupūrvyā vinaśyanti jāyante cānupūrvaśaḥ
c tatra tatra hi dṛśyante dhātavaḥ pāñcabhautikāḥ
e yair āvṛtam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
a indriyaiḥ sṛjyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti smṛtam
c avyaktam iti vijñeyaṃ liṅgagrāhyam atīndriyam
a yathāsvaṃ grāhakāny eṣāṃ śabdādīnām imāni tu
c indriyāṇi yadā dehī dhārayann iha tapyate
a loke vitatam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyati
c parāvarajñaḥ saktaḥ san sarvabhūtāni paśyati
a paśyataḥ sarvabhūtāni sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā
c brahmabhūtasya saṃyogo nāśubhenopapadyate
a jñānamūlātmakaṃ kleśam ativṛttasya mohajam
c loko buddhiprakāśena jñeyamārgeṇa dṛśyate
a anādinidhanaṃ jantum ātmayoniṃ sadāvyayam
c anaupamyam amūrtaṃ ca bhagavān āha buddhimān
e tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ viprānupṛcchasi
a indriyāṇy eva tat sarvaṃ yat svarganarakāv ubhau
c nigṛhītavisṛṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca
a eṣa yogavidhiḥ kṛtsno yāvad indriyadhāraṇam
c etan mūlaṃ hi tapasaḥ kṛtsnasya narakasya ca
a indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayam
c saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhim avāpnute
a ṣaṇṇām ātmani nityānām aiśvaryaṃ yo 'dhigacchati
c na sa pāpaiḥ kuto 'narthair yujyate vijitendriyaḥ
a rathaḥ śarīraṃ puruṣasya dṛṣṭam
ātmā niyantendriyāṇy āhur aśvān
c tair apramattaḥ kuśalī sadaśvair
dāntaiḥ sukhaṃ yāti rathīva dhīraḥ
a ṣaṇṇām ātmani nityānām indriyāṇāṃ pramāthinām
c yo dhīro dhārayed raśmīn sa syāt paramasārathiḥ
a indriyāṇāṃ prasṛṣṭānāṃ hayānām iva vartmasu
c dhṛtiṃ kurvīta sārathye dhṛtyā tāni jayed dhruvam
a indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan mano 'nuvidhīyate
c tad asya harate buddhiṃ nāvaṃ vāyur ivāmbhasi
a yeṣu vipratipadyante ṣaṭsu mohāt phalāgame
c teṣv adhyavasitādhyāyī vindate dhyānajaṃ phalam
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a evaṃ tu sūkṣme kathite dharmavyādhena bhārata
c brāhmaṇaḥ sa punaḥ sūkṣmaṃ papraccha susamāhitaḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a sattvasya rajasaś caiva tamasaś ca yathātatham
c guṇāṃs tattvena me brūhi yathāvad iha pṛcchataḥ
 vyādha uvāca
a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c eṣāṃ guṇān pṛthaktvena nibodha gadato mama
a mohātmakaṃ tamas teṣāṃ raja eṣāṃ pravartakam
c prakāśabahulatvāc ca sattvaṃ jyāya ihocyate
a avidyābahulo mūḍhaḥ svapnaśīlo vicetanaḥ
c durdṛśīkas tamodhvastaḥ sakrodhas tāmaso 'lasaḥ
a pravṛttavākyo mantrī ca yo 'nurāgy abhyasūyakaḥ
c vivitsamāno viprarṣe stabdho mānī sa rājasaḥ
a prakāśabahulo dhīro nirvivitso 'nasūyakaḥ
c akrodhano naro dhīmān dāntaś caiva sa sāttvikaḥ
a sāttvikas tv atha saṃbuddho lokavṛttena kliśyate
c yadā budhyati boddhavyaṃ lokavṛttaṃ jugupsate
a vairāgyasya hi rūpaṃ tu pūrvam eva pravartate
c mṛdur bhavaty ahaṃkāraḥ prasīdaty ārjavaṃ ca yat
a tato 'sya sarvadvaṃdvāni praśāmyanti parasparam
c na cāsya saṃyamo nāma kva cid bhavati kaś cana
a śūdrayonau hi jātasya sadguṇān upatiṣṭhataḥ
c vaiśyatvaṃ bhavati brahman kṣatriyatvaṃ tathaiva ca
a ārjave vartamānasya brāhmaṇyam abhijāyate
c guṇās te kīrtitāḥ sarve kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a pārthivaṃ dhātum āsādya śārīro 'gniḥ kathaṃ bhavet
c avakāśaviśeṣeṇa kathaṃ vartayate 'nilaḥ
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a praśnam etaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇena yudhiṣṭhira
c vyādhaḥ sa kathayām āsa brāhmaṇāya mahātmane
 vyādha uvāca
a mūrdhānam āśrito vahniḥ śarīraṃ paripālayan
c prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate
e bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ prāṇe pratiṣṭhitam
a śreṣṭhaṃ tad eva bhūtānāṃ brahmajyotir upāsmahe
c sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ
e mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtānāṃ viṣayaś ca saḥ
f śarīramadhye nābhiḥ syān nābhyām agniḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
f avyaktaṃ sattvasaṃjñaṃ ca jīvaḥ kālaḥ sa caiva hi
f prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś caiva prāṇa eva dvijottama
f jāgarti svapnakāle ca svapne svapnāyate ca saḥ
f jāgratsu balam ādhatte ceṣṭatsu ceṣṭayaty api
f tasmin niruddhe viprendra mṛta ity abhidhīyate
f tyaktvā śarīraṃ bhūtātmā punar anyat prapadyate
a evaṃ tv iha sa sarvatra prāṇena paripālyate
c pṛṣṭhatas tu samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥ
a bastimūle gude caiva pāvakaḥ samupāśritaḥ
c vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartate
a prayatne karmaṇi bale ya ekas triṣu vartate
c udāna iti taṃ prāhur adhyātmaviduṣo janāḥ
a saṃdhau saṃdhau saṃniviṣṭaḥ sarveṣv api tathānilaḥ
c śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ity upadiṣyate
d tvaṅmāṃsamedomajjāsthirasaraktāś ca dhātavaḥ
a dhātuṣv agnis tu vitataḥ sa tu vāyusamīritaḥ
c rasān dhātūṃś ca doṣāṃś ca vartayan paridhāvati
a prāṇānāṃ saṃnipātāt tu saṃnipātaḥ prajāyate
c ūṣmā cāgnir iti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām
a apānodānayor madhye prāṇavyānau samāhitau
c samanvitas tv adhiṣṭhānaṃ samyak pacati pāvakaḥ
a tasyāpi pāyuparyantas tathā syād gudasaṃjñitaḥ
c srotāṃsi tasmāj jāyante sarvaprāṇeṣu dehinām
a agnivegavahaḥ prāṇo gudānte pratihanyate
c sa ūrdhvam āgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam
a pakvāśayas tv adho nābhyā ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ sthitaḥ
c nābhimadhye śarīrasya prāṇāḥ sarve pratiṣṭhitāḥ
a pravṛttā hṛdayāt sarvās tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā
c vahanty annarasān nāḍyo daśa prāṇapracoditāḥ
a yoginām eṣa mārgas tu yena gacchanti tatparam
c jitaklamāsanā dhīrā mūrdhany ātmānam ādadhuḥ
e evaṃ sarveṣu vitatau prāṇāpānau hi dehiṣu
f tāv agnisahitau brahman viddhi vai prāṇam ātmani
a ekādaśavikārātmā kalāsaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtaḥ
c mūrtimantaṃ hi taṃ viddhi nityaṃ karmajitātmakam
a tasmin yaḥ saṃsthito hy agnir nityaṃ sthālyām ivāhitaḥ
c ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ yogajitātmakam
a devo yaḥ saṃsthitas tasminn abbindur iva puṣkare
c kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ tyāgajitātmakam
a jīvātmakāni jānīhi rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamas tathā
c jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ viddhi tathātmānaṃ parātmakam
a sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti
sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam
c tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti
prākalpayad yo bhuvanāni sapta
a evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhūtātmā na prakāśate
c dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā jñānavedibhiḥ
a cittasya hi prasādena hanti karma śubhāśubham
c prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukham ānantyam aśnute
a lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā tṛptaḥ sukhaṃ svapet
b sukhaduḥkhe hi saṃtyajya nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ
c nivāte vā yathā dīpo dīpyet kuśaladīpitaḥ
a pūrvarātre pare caiva yuñjānaḥ satataṃ manaḥ
c laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paśyann ātmānam ātmani
a pradīpteneva dīpena manodīpena paśyati
c dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ nirātmānaṃ tadā sa tu vimucyate
a sarvopāyais tu lobhasya krodhasya ca vinigrahaḥ
c etat pavitraṃ yajñānāṃ tapo vai saṃkramo mataḥ
a nityaṃ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṃ rakṣeta matsarāt
c vidyāṃ mānāpamānābhyām ātmānaṃ tu pramādataḥ
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam
c ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ paraṃ satyavrataṃ vratam
a satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyaṃ jñānaṃ hitaṃ bhavet
c yad bhūtahitam atyantaṃ tad vai satyaṃ paraṃ matam
a yasya sarve samārambhāḥ nirāśīrbandhanāḥ sadā
c tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān
a yato na gurur apy enaṃ cyāvayed upapādayan
c taṃ vidyād brahmaṇo yogaṃ viyogaṃ yogasaṃjñitam
a na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni maitrāyaṇagataś caret
c nedaṃ jīvitam āsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit
a ākiṃcanyaṃ susaṃtoṣo nirāśitvam acāpalam
c etad eva paraṃ jñānaṃ sadātmajñānam uttamam
a parigrahaṃ parityajya bhava buddhyā yatavrataḥ
c aśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭhen niścalaṃ pretya ceha ca
d bāhyasparśeṣu saktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham
d tad brahmayogayuktātmā sukham akṣayyam aśnute
a taponityena dāntena muninā saṃyatātmanā
c ajitaṃ jetukāmena bhāvyaṃ saṅgeṣv asaṅginā
a guṇāguṇam anāsaṅgam ekakāryam anantaram
c etad brāhmaṇa te vṛttam āhur ekapadaṃ sukham
a parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ cāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥ
c brahma prāpnoti so 'tyantam asaṅgena ca gacchati
a yathāśrutam idaṃ sarvaṃ samāsena dvijottama
c etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a evaṃ saṃkathite kṛtsne mokṣadharme yudhiṣṭhira
c dṛḍhaṃ prītamanā vipro dharmavyādham uvāca ha
a nyāyayuktam idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavatā parikīrtitam
c na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid dharmeṣv iha hi dṛśyate
 vyādha uvāca
a pratyakṣaṃ mama yo dharmas taṃ paśya dvijasattama
c yena siddhir iyaṃ prāptā mayā brāhmaṇapuṃgava
a uttiṣṭha bhagavan kṣipraṃ praviśyābhyantaraṃ gṛham
c draṣṭum arhasi dharmajña mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca me
d tasya vyādhasya pitarau brāhmaṇaḥ saṃdadarśa ha
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa praviśyātha dadarśa paramārcitam
c saudhaṃ hṛdyaṃ catuḥśālam atīva ca manoharam
a devatāgṛhasaṃkāśaṃ daivataiś ca supūjitam
c śayanāsanasaṃbādhaṃ gandhaiś ca paramair yutam
a tatra śuklāmbaradharau pitarāv asya pūjitau
c kṛtāhārau sutuṣṭau tāv upaviṣṭau varāsane
e dharmavyādhas tu tau dṛṣṭvā pādeṣu śirasāpatat
 vṛddhāv ūcatuḥ
a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha dharmajña dharmas tvām abhirakṣatu
c prītau svas tava śaucena dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi
d gatim iṣṭāṃ tathā jñānam evaṃ ca paravān bhava
e satputreṇa tvayā putra nityakālaṃ supūjitau
f sukham āvāṃ vasāvo 'tra devalokagatāv iva
a na te 'nyad daivataṃ kiṃ cid daivateṣv api vartate
c prayatatvād dvijātīnāṃ damenāsi samanvitaḥ
a pituḥ pitāmahā ye ca tathaiva prapitāmahāḥ
c prītās te satataṃ putra damenāvāṃ ca pūjayā
a manasā karmaṇā vācā śuśrūṣā naiva hīyate
c na cānyā vitathā buddhir dṛśyate sāṃprataṃ tava
a jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa yathā vṛddhau supūjitau
c tathā tvayā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ tadviśiṣṭaṃ ca putraka
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a tatas taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tābhyāṃ dharmavyādho nyavedayat
c tau svāgatena taṃ vipram arcayām āsatus tadā
a pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ dvijaḥ papraccha tāv ubhau
c saputrābhyāṃ sabhṛtyābhyāṃ kaccid vāṃ kuśalaṃ gṛhe
e anāmayaṃ ca vāṃ kaccit sadaiveha śarīrayoḥ
 vṛddhāv ūcatuḥ
a kuśalaṃ no gṛhe vipra bhṛtyavarge ca sarvaśaḥ
c kaccit tvam apy avighnena saṃprāpto bhagavann iha
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a bāḍham ity eva tau vipraḥ pratyuvāca mudānvitaḥ
c dharmavyādhas tu taṃ vipram arthavad vākyam abravīt
a pitā mātā ca bhagavann etau me daivataṃ param
c yad daivatebhyaḥ kartavyaṃ tad etābhyāṃ karomy aham
a trayastriṃśad yathā devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ
c saṃpūjyāḥ sarvalokasya tathā vṛddhāv imau mama
a upahārān āharanto devatānāṃ yathā dvijāḥ
c kurvate tadvad etābhyāṃ karomy aham atandritaḥ
a etau me paramaṃ brahman pitā mātā ca daivatam
c etau puṣpaiḥ phalai ratnais toṣayāmi sadā dvija
a etāv evāgnayo mahyaṃ yān vadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c yajñā vedāś ca catvāraḥ sarvam etau mama dvija
a etadarthaṃ mama prāṇā bhāryā putrāḥ suhṛjjanāḥ
c saputradāraḥ śuśrūṣāṃ nityam eva karomy aham
a svayaṃ ca snāpayāmy etau tathā pādau pradhāvaye
c āhāraṃ saṃprayacchāmi svayaṃ ca dvijasattama
a anukūlāḥ kathā vacmi vipriyaṃ parivarjayan
c adharmeṇāpi saṃyuktaṃ priyam ābhyāṃ karomy aham
a dharmam eva guruṃ jñātvā karomi dvijasattama
c atandritaḥ sadā vipra śuśrūṣāṃ vai karomy aham
a pañcaiva guravo brahman puruṣasya bubhūṣataḥ
c pitā mātāgnir ātmā ca guruś ca dvijasattama
a eteṣu yas tu varteta samyag eva dvijottama
c bhaveyur agnayas tasya paricīrṇās tu nityaśaḥ
e gārhasthye vartamānasya dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
f kathitas te mayā vipra kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a gurū nivedya viprāya tau mātāpitarāv ubhau
c punar eva sa dharmātmā vyādho brāhmaṇam abravīt
a pravṛttacakṣur jāto 'smi saṃpaśya tapaso balam
c yadartham ukto 'si tayā gacchasva mithilām iti
a patiśuśrūṣaparayā dāntayā satyaśīlayā
c mithilāyāṃ vasan vyādhaḥ sa te dharmān pravakṣyati
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a pativratāyāḥ satyāyāḥ śīlāḍhyāyā yatavrata
c saṃsmṛtya vākyaṃ dharmajña guṇavān asi me mataḥ
 vyādha uvāca
a yat tadā tvaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tayokto māṃ prati prabho
c dṛṣṭam etat tayā samyag ekapatnyā na saṃśayaḥ
a tvadanugrahabuddhyā tu vipraitad darśitaṃ mayā
c vākyaṃ ca śṛṇu me tāta yat te vakṣye hitaṃ dvija
a tvayā vinikṛtā mātā pitā ca dvijasattama
c anisṛṣṭo 'si niṣkrānto gṛhāt tābhyām anindita
e vedoccāraṇakāryārtham ayuktaṃ tat tvayā kṛtam
a tava śokena vṛddhau tāv andhau jātau tapasvinau
c tau prasādayituṃ gaccha mā tvā dharmo 'tyagān mahān
a tapasvī tvaṃ mahātmā ca dharme ca nirataḥ sadā
c sarvam etad apārthaṃ te kṣipraṃ tau saṃprasādaya
d tau prasādya dvijaśreṣṭha yac chreyas tad avāpsyasi
a śraddadhasva mama brahman nānyathā kartum arhasi
c gamyatām adya viprarṣe śreyas te kathayāmy aham
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ satyam asaṃśayam
c prīto 'smi tava dharmajña sādhvācāra guṇānvita
 vyādha uvāca
a daivatapratimo hi tvaṃ yas tvaṃ dharmam anuvrataḥ
c purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ divyaṃ duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
d mātāpitroḥ sakāśaṃ hi gatvā tvaṃ dvijasattama
a atandritaḥ kuru kṣipraṃ mātāpitror hi pūjanam
c ataḥ param ahaṃ dharmaṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmi kaṃ cana
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a ihāham āgato diṣṭyā diṣṭyā me saṃgataṃ tvayā
c īdṛśā durlabhā loke narā dharmapradarśakāḥ
a eko narasahasreṣu dharmavid vidyate na vā
c prīto 'smi tava satyena bhadraṃ te puruṣottama
a patamāno hi narake bhavatāsmi samuddhṛtaḥ
c bhavitavyam athaivaṃ ca yad dṛṣṭo 'si mayānagha
a rājā yayātir dauhitraiḥ patitas tārito yathā
c sadbhiḥ puruṣaśārdūla tathāhaṃ bhavatā tv iha
a mātāpitṛbhyāṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kariṣye vacanāt tava
c nākṛtātmā vedayati dharmādharmaviniścayam
a durjñeyaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ śūdrayonau hi vartatā
c na tvāṃ śūdram ahaṃ manye bhavitavyaṃ hi kāraṇam
e yena karmavipākena prāpteyaṃ śūdratā tvayā
a etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ tattvena hi mahāmate
c kāmayā brūhi me tathyaṃ sarvaṃ tvaṃ prayatātmavān
 vyādha uvāca
a anatikramaṇīyā hi brāhmaṇā vai dvijottama
c śṛṇu sarvam idaṃ vṛttaṃ pūrvadehe mamānagha
a ahaṃ hi brāhmaṇaḥ pūrvam āsaṃ dvijavarātmaja
c vedādhyāyī sukuśalo vedāṅgānāṃ ca pāragaḥ
e ātmadoṣakṛtair brahmann avasthāṃ prāptavān imām
a kaś cid rājā mama sakhā dhanurvedaparāyaṇaḥ
c saṃsargād dhanuṣi śreṣṭhas tato 'ham abhavaṃ dvija
a etasminn eva kāle tu mṛgayāṃ nirgato nṛpaḥ
c sahito yodhamukhyaiś ca mantribhiś ca susaṃvṛtaḥ
e tato 'bhyahan mṛgāṃs tatra subahūn āśramaṃ prati
a atha kṣiptaḥ śaro ghoro mayāpi dvijasattama
b tato mṛgān varāhāṃś ca mahiṣāṃś ca mahīpatiḥ
b jaghāna puruṣavyāghraḥ sa rājā brāhmaṇottama
b tato 'ham api krīḍārthaṃ rājñaḥ priyahite rataḥ
b varān nighnan varāhāṃś ca śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
b vanadurgeṣu dharmajña samaṃ rājñā mahātmanā
b vyacaraṃ dhanur ādāya mṛgahā lubdhako yathā
b tatrāśramasamabhyāśe mayā dharmavidāṃ vara
b mṛgasya vajrasaṃkāśaḥ śaraḥ kṣiptas tadā dvija
c tāḍitaś ca munis tena śareṇānataparvaṇā
a bhūmau nipatito brahmann uvāca pratinādayan
c nāparādhyāmy ahaṃ kiṃ cit kena pāpam idaṃ kṛtam
a manvānas taṃ mṛgaṃ cāhaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sahasā munim
c apaśyaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ viddhaṃ śareṇānataparvaṇā
e tam ugratapasaṃ vipraṃ niṣṭanantaṃ mahītale
a akāryakaraṇāc cāpi bhṛśaṃ me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
c ajānatā kṛtam idaṃ mayety atha tam abruvam
e kṣantum arhasi me brahmann iti cokto mayā muniḥ
a tataḥ pratyabravīd vākyam ṛṣir māṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ
c vyādhas tvaṃ bhavitā krūra śūdrayonāv iti dvija
 vyādha uvāca
a evaṃ śapto 'ham ṛṣiṇā tadā dvijavarottama
c abhiprasādayam ṛṣiṃ girā vākyaviśāradam
a ajānatā mayākāryam idam adya kṛtaṃ mune
c kṣantum arhasi tat sarvaṃ prasīda bhagavann iti
 ṛṣir uvāca
a nānyathā bhavitā śāpa evam etad asaṃśayam
c ānṛśaṃsyād ahaṃ kiṃ cit kartānugraham adya te
a śūdrayonau vartamāno dharmajño bhavitā hy asi
c mātāpitroś ca śuśrūṣāṃ kariṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
a tayā śuśrūṣayā siddhiṃ mahatīṃ samavāpsyasi
c jātismaraś ca bhavitā svargaṃ caiva gamiṣyasi
d bhūtvā ca dhārmiko vyādhaḥ pitroḥ śuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
e śāpakṣayānte nirvṛtte bhavitāsi punar dvijaḥ
 vyādha uvāca
a evaṃ śaptaḥ purā tena ṛṣiṇāsmy ugratejasā
c prasādaś ca kṛtas tena mamaivaṃ dvipadāṃ vara
a śaraṃ coddhṛtavān asmi tasya vai dvijasattama
c āśramaṃ ca mayā nīto na ca prāṇair vyayujyata
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathā mama purābhavat
c abhitaś cāpi gantavyaṃ mayā svargaṃ dvijottama
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a evam etāni puruṣā duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
c prāpnuvanti mahābuddhe notkaṇṭhāṃ kartum arhasi
e duṣkaraṃ hi kṛtaṃ tāta jānatā jātim ātmanaḥ
f lokavṛttāntatattvajña nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇa
a karmadoṣaś ca vai vidvann ātmajātikṛtena vai
c kaṃ cit kālaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ vai tato 'si bhavitā dvijaḥ
e sāṃprataṃ ca mato me 'si brāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ
a brāhmaṇaḥ patanīyeṣu vartamāno vikarmasu
c dāmbhiko duṣkṛtaprāyaḥ śūdreṇa sadṛśo bhavet
a yas tu śūdro dame satye dharme ca satatotthitaḥ
c taṃ brāhmaṇam ahaṃ manye vṛttena hi bhaved dvijaḥ
a karmadoṣeṇa viṣamāṃ gatim āpnoti dāruṇām
c kṣīṇadoṣam ahaṃ manye cābhitas tvāṃ narottama
a kartum arhasi notkaṇṭhāṃ tvadvidhā hy aviṣādinaḥ
c lokavṛttāntavṛttajñā nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
 vyādha uvāca
a prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ
c etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatāṃ vrajet
a aniṣṭasaṃprayogāc ca viprayogāt priyasya ca
c mānuṣā mānasair duḥkhair yujyante alpabuddhayaḥ
a guṇair bhūtāni yujyante viyujyante tathaiva ca
c sarvāṇi naitad ekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate
a aniṣṭenānvitaṃ paśyaṃs tathā kṣipraṃ virajyate
c tataś ca pratikurvanti yadi paśyanty upakramam
e śocato na bhavet kiṃ cit kevalaṃ paritapyate
a parityajanti ye duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ narāḥ
c ta eva sukham edhante jñānatṛptā manīṣiṇaḥ
a asaṃtoṣaparā mūḍhāḥ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ
c asaṃtoṣasya nāsty antas tuṣṭis tu paramaṃ sukham
e na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatim
a na viṣāde manaḥ kāryaṃ viṣādo viṣam uttamam
c mārayaty akṛtaprajñaṃ bālaṃ kruddha ivoragaḥ
a yaṃ viṣādo 'bhibhavati viṣame samupasthite
c tejasā tasya hīnasya puruṣārtho na vidyate
a avaśyaṃ kriyamāṇasya karmaṇo dṛśyate phalam
c na hi nirvedam āgamya kiṃ cit prāpnoti śobhanam
a athāpy upāyaṃ paśyeta duḥkhasya parimokṣaṇe
c aśocann ārabhetaiva yuktaś cāvyasanī bhavet
a bhūteṣv abhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye tu buddheḥ paraṃ gatāḥ
c na śocanti kṛtaprajñāḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatim
a na śocāmi ca vai vidvan kālākāṅkṣī sthito 'smy aham
c etair nidarśanair brahman nāvasīdāmi sattama
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a kṛtaprajño 'si medhāvī buddhiś ca vipulā tava
c nāhaṃ bhavantaṃ śocāmi jñānatṛpto 'si dharmavit
a āpṛcche tvāṃ svasti te 'stu dharmas tvā parirakṣatu
c apramādas tu kartavyo dharme dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a bāḍham ity eva taṃ vyādhaḥ kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
c pradakṣiṇam atho kṛtvā prasthito dvijasattamaḥ
a sa tu gatvā dvijaḥ sarvāṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kṛtavāṃs tadā
c mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vṛddhābhyāṃ yathānyāyaṃ susaṃśitaḥ
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ nikhilena yudhiṣṭhira
c pṛṣṭavān asi yaṃ tāta dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
a pativratāyā māhātmyaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca sattama
c mātāpitroś ca śuśrūṣā vyādhe dharmaś ca kīrtitaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman dharmākhyānam anuttamam
c sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha kathitaṃ dvijasattama
a sukhaśravyatayā vidvan muhūrtam iva me gatam
c na hi tṛpto 'smi bhagavañ śṛṇvāno dharmam uttamam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śrutvemāṃ dharmasaṃyuktāṃ dharmarājaḥ kathāṃ śubhām
c punaḥ papraccha tam ṛṣiṃ mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tapasvinam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a katham agnir vanaṃ yātaḥ kathaṃ cāpy aṅgirāḥ purā
c naṣṭe 'gnau havyam avahad agnir bhūtvā mahān ṛṣiḥ
a agnir yadā tv eka eva bahutvaṃ cāsya karmasu
c dṛśyate bhagavan sarvam etad icchāmi veditum
a kumāraś ca yathotpanno yathā cāgneḥ suto 'bhavat
c yathā rudrāc ca saṃbhūto gaṅgāyāṃ kṛttikāsu ca
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ tvattaḥ śrotuṃ bhārgavanandana
c kautūhalasamāviṣṭo yathātathyaṃ mahāmune
d vaktum arhasi me brahmann itihāsam imaṃ śubham
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yathā kruddho hutavahas tapas taptuṃ vanaṃ gataḥ
a yathā ca bhagavān agniḥ svayam evāṅgirābhavat
c saṃtāpayan svaprabhayā nāśayaṃs timirāṇi ca
d purāṅgirā mahābāho cacāra tapa uttamam
a āśramastho mahābhāgo havyavāhaṃ viśeṣayan
c tathā sa bhūtvā tu tadā jagat sarvaṃ prakāśayan
a tapaś caraṃś ca hutabhuk saṃtaptas tasya tejasā
c bhṛśaṃ glānaś ca tejasvī na sa kiṃ cit prajajñivān
a atha saṃcintayām āsa bhagavān havyavāhanaḥ
c anyo 'gnir iha lokānāṃ brahmaṇā saṃpravartitaḥ
e agnitvaṃ vipranaṣṭaṃ hi tapyamānasya me tapaḥ
a katham agniḥ punar ahaṃ bhaveyam iti cintya saḥ
c apaśyad agnival lokāṃs tāpayantaṃ mahāmunim
a sopāsarpac chanair bhītas tam uvāca tadāṅgirāḥ
c śīghram eva bhavasvāgnis tvaṃ punar lokabhāvanaḥ
e vijñātaś cāsi lokeṣu triṣu saṃsthānacāriṣu
a tvam agne prathamaḥ sṛṣṭo brahmaṇā timirāpahaḥ
c svasthānaṃ pratipadyasva śīghram eva tamonuda
 agnir uvāca
a naṣṭakīrtir ahaṃ loke bhavāñ jāto hutāśanaḥ
c bhavantam eva jñāsyanti pāvakaṃ na tu māṃ janāḥ
a nikṣipāmy aham agnitvaṃ tvam agniḥ prathamo bhava
c bhaviṣyāmi dvitīyo 'haṃ prājāpatyaka eva ca
 aṅgirā uvāca
a kuru puṇyaṃ prajāsvargyaṃ bhavāgnis timirāpahaḥ
c māṃ ca deva kuruṣvāgne prathamaṃ putram añjasā
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a tac chrutvāṅgiraso vākyaṃ jātavedās tathākarot
c rājan bṛhaspatir nāma tasyāpy aṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ
a jñātvā prathamajaṃ taṃ tu vahner āṅgirasaṃ sutam
c upetya devāḥ papracchuḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra bhārata
a sa tu pṛṣṭas tadā devais tataḥ kāraṇam abravīt
c pratyagṛhṇaṃs tu devāś ca tad vaco 'ṅgirasas tadā
a atra nānāvidhān agnīn pravakṣyāmi mahāprabhān
c karmabhir bahubhiḥ khyātān nānātvaṃ brāhmaṇeṣv iha
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a brahmaṇo yas tṛtīyas tu putraḥ kurukulodvaha
c tasyāpavasutā bhāryā prajās tasyāpi me śṛṇu
a bṛhajjyotir bṛhatkīrtir bṛhadbrahmā bṛhanmanāḥ
c bṛhanmantro bṛhadbhāsas tathā rājan bṛhaspatiḥ
a prajāsu tāsu sarvāsu rūpeṇāpratimābhavat
c devī bhānumatī nāma prathamāṅgirasaḥ sutā
a bhūtānām eva sarveṣāṃ yasyāṃ rāgas tadābhavat
c rāgād rāgeti yām āhur dvitīyāṅgirasaḥ sutā
a yāṃ kapardisutām āhur dṛśyādṛśyeti dehinaḥ
c tanutvāt sā sinīvālī tṛtīyāṅgirasaḥ sutā
a paśyaty arciṣmatī bhābhir havirbhiś ca haviṣmatī
c ṣaṣṭhīm aṅgirasaḥ kanyāṃ puṇyām āhur haviṣmatīm
a mahāmakheṣv āṅgirasī dīptimatsu mahāmatī
c mahāmatīti vikhyātā saptamī kathyate sutā
a yāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā bhagavatīṃ janaḥ kuhukuhāyate
c ekānaṃśeti yām āhuḥ kuhūm aṅgirasaḥ sutām
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a bṛhaspateś cāndramasī bhāryābhūd yā yaśasvinī
c agnīn sājanayat puṇyān ṣaḍekāṃ cāpi putrikām
a āhutiṣv eva yasyāgner haviṣājyaṃ vidhīyate
c so 'gnir bṛhaspateḥ putraḥ śaṃyur nāma mahāprabhaḥ
a cāturmāsyeṣu yasyeṣṭyām aśvamedhe 'grajaḥ paśuḥ
c dīpto jvālair anekābhair agnir eko 'tha vīryavān
a śaṃyor apratimā bhāryā satyā satyā ca dharmajā
c agnis tasya suto dīptas tisraḥ kanyāś ca suvratāḥ
a prathamenājyabhāgena pūjyate yo 'gnir adhvare
c agnis tasya bharadvājaḥ prathamaḥ putra ucyate
a paurṇamāsyeṣu sarveṣu haviṣājyaṃ sruvodyatam
c bharato nāmataḥ so 'gnir dvitīyaḥ śaṃyutaḥ sutaḥ
a tisraḥ kanyā bhavanty anyā yāsāṃ sa bharataḥ patiḥ
c bharatas tu sutas tasya bharaty ekā ca putrikā
a bharato bharatasyāgneḥ pāvakas tu prajāpateḥ
c mahān atyartham ahitas tathā bharatasattama
a bharadvājasya bhāryā tu vīrā vīraś ca piṇḍadaḥ
c prāhur ājyena tasyejyāṃ somasyeva dvijāḥ śanaiḥ
a haviṣā yo dvitīyena somena saha yujyate
c rathaprabhū rathadhvānaḥ kumbharetāḥ sa ucyate
a sarayvāṃ janayat siddhiṃ bhānuṃ bhābhiḥ samāvṛṇot
c āgneyam ānayan nityam āhvāneṣv eṣa kathyate
a yas tu na cyavate nityaṃ yaśasā varcasā śriyā
c agnir niścyavano nāma pṛthivīṃ stauti kevalam
a vipāpmā kaluṣair mukto viśuddhaś cārciṣā jvalan
c vipāpo 'gniḥ sutas tasya satyaḥ samayakarmasu
a ākrośatāṃ hi bhūtānāṃ yaḥ karoti hi niṣkṛtim
c agniḥ sa niṣkṛtir nāma śobhayaty abhisevitaḥ
a anukūjanti yeneha vedanārtāḥ svayaṃ janāḥ
c tasya putraḥ svano nāma pāvakaḥ sa rujaskaraḥ
a yas tu viśvasya jagato buddhim ākramya tiṣṭhati
c taṃ prāhur adhyātmavido viśvajin nāma pāvakam
a antarāgniḥ śrito yo hi bhuktaṃ pacati dehinām
c sa yajñe viśvabhuṅ nāma sarvalokeṣu bhārata
a brahmacārī yatātmā ca satataṃ vipulavrataḥ
c brāhmaṇāḥ pūjayanty enaṃ pākayajñeṣu pāvakam
a prathito gopatir nāma nadī yasyābhavat priyā
c tasmin sarvāṇi karmāṇi kriyante karmakartṛbhiḥ
a vaḍavāmukhaḥ pibaty ambho yo 'sau paramadāruṇaḥ
c ūrdhvabhāg ūrdhvabhāṅ nāma kaviḥ prāṇāśritas tu saḥ
a udagdvāraṃ havir yasya gṛhe nityaṃ pradīyate
c tataḥ sviṣṭaṃ bhaved ājyaṃ sviṣṭakṛt paramaḥ smṛtaḥ
a yaḥ praśānteṣu bhūteṣu manyur bhavati pāvakaḥ
b manyumān nāma bhagavān agnir eva mahābalaḥ
b āraṇyāni tathā grāmyān yo dahan saṃprakāśate
b svayam utpatitaḥ śrīmān vṛddhimān nāma pāvakaḥ
b krodhaḥ sa tu mahātejā vijñeyaḥ sarvadehiṣu
c krodhasya tu raso jajñe manyatī cātha putrikā
e svāheti dāruṇā krūrā sarvabhūteṣu tiṣṭhati
a tridive yasya sadṛśo nāsti rūpeṇa kaś cana
c atulyatvāt kṛto devair nāmnā kāmas tu pāvakaḥ
a saṃharṣād dhārayan krodhaṃ dhanvī sragvī rathe sthitaḥ
c samare nāśayec chatrūn amogho nāma pāvakaḥ
a uktho nāma mahābhāga tribhir ukthair abhiṣṭutaḥ
c mahāvācaṃ tv ajanayat sakāmāśvaṃ hi yaṃ viduḥ
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a kāśyapo hy atha vāsiṣṭhaḥ prāṇaś ca prāṇaputrakaḥ
c agnir āṅgirasaś caiva cyavanas triṣuvarcakaḥ
a acaranta tapas tīvraṃ putrārthe bahuvārṣikam
c putraṃ labhema dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasā brahmaṇā samam
a mahāvyāhṛtibhir dhyātaḥ pañcabhis tais tadā tv atha
c jajñe tejomayo 'rciṣmān pañcavarṇaḥ prabhāvanaḥ
a samiddho 'gniḥ śiras tasya bāhū sūryanibhau tathā
c tvaṅ netre ca suvarṇābhe kṛṣṇe jaṅghe ca bhārata
a pañcavarṇaḥ sa tapasā kṛtas taiḥ pañcabhir janaiḥ
c pāñcajanyaḥ śruto vede pañcavaṃśakaras tu saḥ
a daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahātapāḥ
c janayat pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ pitṝṇāṃ sa prajāḥ sṛjan
a bṛhad rathaṃtaraṃ mūrdhno vaktrāc ca tarasāharau
c śivaṃ nābhyāṃ balād indraṃ vāyvagnī prāṇato 'sṛjat
a bāhubhyām anudāttau ca viśve bhūtāni caiva ha
c etān sṛṣṭvā tataḥ pañca pitṝṇām asṛjat sutān
a bṛhadūrjasya praṇidhiḥ kāśyapasya bṛhattaraḥ
c bhānur aṅgiraso vīraḥ putro varcasya saubharaḥ
a prāṇasya cānudāttaś ca vyākhyātāḥ pañca vaṃśajāḥ
c devān yajñamuṣaś cānyān sṛjan pañcadaśottarān
a abhīmam atibhīmaṃ ca bhīmaṃ bhīmabalābalam
c etān yajñamuṣaḥ pañca devān abhyasṛjat tapaḥ
a sumitraṃ mitravantaṃ ca mitrajñaṃ mitravardhanam
c mitradharmāṇam ity etān devān abhyasṛjat tapaḥ
a surapravīraṃ vīraṃ ca sukeśaṃ ca suvarcasam
c surāṇām api hantāraṃ pañcaitān asṛjat tapaḥ
a trividhaṃ saṃsthitā hy ete pañca pañca pṛthak pṛthak
c muṣṇanty atra sthitā hy ete svargato yajñayājinaḥ
a teṣām iṣṭaṃ haranty ete nighnanti ca mahad bhuvi
c spardhayā havyavāhānāṃ nighnanty ete haranti ca
a havir vedyāṃ tad ādānaṃ kuśalaiḥ saṃpravartitam
c tad ete nopasarpanti yatra cāgniḥ sthito bhavet
a cito 'gnir udvahan yajñaṃ pakṣābhyāṃ tān prabādhate
c mantraiḥ praśamitā hy ete neṣṭaṃ muṣṇanti yajñiyam
a bṛhadukthatapasyaiva putro bhūmim upāśritaḥ
c agnihotre hūyamāne pṛthivyāṃ sadbhir ijyate
a rathaṃtaraś ca tapasaḥ putro 'gniḥ paripaṭhyate
c mitravindāya vai tasya havir adhvaryavo viduḥ
d etaiḥ saha mahābhāga tapas tejasvibhir nṛpa
e mumude paramaprītaḥ saha putrair mahāyaśāḥ
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a gurubhir niyamair yukto bharato nāma pāvakaḥ
c agniḥ puṣṭimatir nāma tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭiṃ prayacchati
e bharaty eṣa prajāḥ sarvās tato bharata ucyate
f satataṃ bharataśreṣṭha pāvako vai mahāprabhaḥ
a agnir yas tu śivo nāma śaktipūjāparaś ca saḥ
c duḥkhārtānāṃ sa sarveṣāṃ śivakṛt satataṃ śivaḥ
a tapasas tu phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpravṛddhaṃ tapo mahat
c uddhartukāmo matimān putro jajñe puraṃdaraḥ
a ūṣmā caivoṣmaṇo jajñe so 'gnir bhūteṣu lakṣyate
c agniś cāpi manur nāma prājāpatyam akārayat
a śaṃbhum agnim atha prāhur brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
c āvasathyaṃ dvijāḥ prāhur dīptam agniṃ mahāprabham
a ūrjaskarān havyavāhān suvarṇasadṛśaprabhān
c agnis tapo hy ajanayat pañca yajñasutān iha
a praśānte 'gnir mahābhāga pariśrānto gavāṃpatiḥ
c asurāñ janayan ghorān martyāṃś caiva pṛthagvidhān
a tapasaś ca manuṃ putraṃ bhānuṃ cāpy aṅgirāsṛjat
c bṛhadbhānuṃ tu taṃ prāhur brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
a bhānor bhāryā suprajā tu bṛhadbhāsā tu somajā
c asṛjetāṃ tu ṣaṭ putrāñ śṛṇu tāsāṃ prajāvidhim
c   tadā sā kanyayā saha
c bhānor aṅgirasasyātha
a durbalānāṃ tu bhūtānāṃ tanuṃ yaḥ saṃprayacchati
c tam agniṃ baladaṃ prāhuḥ prathamaṃ bhānutaḥ sutam
a yaḥ praśānteṣu bhūteṣu manyur bhavati dāruṇaḥ
c agniḥ sa manyumān nāma dvitīyo bhānutaḥ sutaḥ
a darśe ca paurṇamāse ca yasyeha havir ucyate
c viṣṇur nāmeha yo 'gnis tu dhṛtimān nāma so 'ṅgirāḥ
a indreṇa sahitaṃ yasya havir āgrayaṇaṃ smṛtam
c agnir āgrayaṇo nāma bhānor evānvayas tu saḥ
a cāturmāsyeṣu nityānāṃ haviṣāṃ yo niragrahaḥ
c caturbhiḥ sahitaḥ putrair bhānor evānvayas tu saḥ
a niśāṃ tv ajanayat kanyām agnīṣomāv ubhau tathā
c manor evābhavad bhāryā suṣuve pañca pāvakān
a pūjyate haviṣāgryeṇa cāturmāsyeṣu pāvakaḥ
c parjanyasahitaḥ śrīmān agnir vaiśvānaras tu saḥ
a asya lokasya sarvasya yaḥ patiḥ paripaṭhyate
c so 'gnir viśvapatir nāma dvitīyo vai manoḥ sutaḥ
e tataḥ sviṣṭaṃ bhaved ājyaṃ sviṣṭakṛt paramaḥ smṛtaḥ
a kanyā sā rohiṇī nāma hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutā
c karmaṇāsau babhau bhāryā sa vahniḥ sa prajāpatiḥ
a prāṇam āśritya yo dehaṃ pravartayati dehinām
c tasya saṃnihito nāma śabdarūpasya sādhanaḥ
a śuklakṛṣṇagatir devo yo bibharti hutāśanam
c akalmaṣaḥ kalmaṣāṇāṃ kartā krodhāśritas tu saḥ
a kapilaṃ paramarṣiṃ ca yaṃ prāhur yatayaḥ sadā
c agniḥ sa kapilo nāma sāṃkhyayogapravartakaḥ
a agnir yacchati bhūtāni yena bhūtāni nityadā
c karmasv iha vicitreṣu so 'graṇīr vahnir ucyate
a imān anyān samasṛjat pāvakān prathitān bhuvi
c agnihotrasya duṣṭasya prāyaścittārtham ulbaṇān
a saṃspṛśeyur yadānyonyaṃ kathaṃ cid vāyunāgnayaḥ
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā vai śucaye 'gnaye
a dakṣiṇāgnir yadā dvābhyāṃ saṃsṛjeta tadā kila
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā vai vītaye 'gnaye
a yady agnayo hi spṛśyeyur niveśasthā davāgninā
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā tu śucaye 'gnaye
a agniṃ rajasvalā cet strī saṃspṛśed agnihotrikam
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā dasyumate 'gnaye
a mṛtaḥ śrūyeta yo jīvan pareyuḥ paśavo yathā
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kartavyābhimate 'gnaye
a ārto na juhuyād agniṃ trirātraṃ yas tu brāhmaṇaḥ
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā syād uttarāgnaye
a darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsaṃ ca yasya tiṣṭhet pratiṣṭhitam
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā pathikṛte 'gnaye
a sūtikāgnir yadā cāgniṃ saṃspṛśed agnihotrikam
c iṣṭir aṣṭākapālena kāryā cāgnimate 'gnaye
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a āpasya muditā bhāryā sahasya paramā priyā
c bhūpatir bhuvabhartā ca janayat pāvakaṃ param
a bhūtānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ yaṃ prāhuḥ pāvakaṃ patim
c ātmā bhuvanabharteti sānvayeṣu dvijātiṣu
a mahatāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām iha yaḥ patiḥ
c bhagavān sa mahātejā nityaṃ carati pāvakaḥ
a agnir gṛhapatir nāma nityaṃ yajñeṣu pūjyate
c hutaṃ vahati yo havyam asya lokasya pāvakaḥ
a apāṃ garbho mahābhāgaḥ sahaputro mahādbhutaḥ
c bhūpatir bhuvabhartā ca mahataḥ patir ucyate
a dahan mṛtāni bhūtāni tasyāgnir bharato 'bhavat
c agniṣṭome ca niyataḥ kratuśreṣṭho bharasya tu
d sa vanhiḥ prathamo nityaṃ devair anviṣyate prabhuḥ
a āyāntaṃ niyataṃ dṛṣṭvā praviveśārṇavaṃ bhayāt
c devās taṃ nādhigacchanti mārgamāṇā yathādiśam
a dṛṣṭvā tv agnir atharvāṇaṃ tato vacanam abravīt
c devānāṃ vaha havyaṃ tvam ahaṃ vīra sudurbalaḥ
e atharvan gaccha madhvakṣaṃ priyam etat kuruṣva me
a preṣya cāgnir atharvāṇam anyaṃ deśaṃ tato 'gamat
c matsyās tasya samācakhyuḥ kruddhas tān agnir abravīt
a bhakṣyā vai vividhair bhāvair bhaviṣyatha śarīriṇām
c atharvāṇaṃ tathā cāpi havyavāho 'bravīd vacaḥ
a anunīyamāno 'pi bhṛśaṃ devavākyād dhi tena saḥ
c naicchad voḍhuṃ haviḥ sarvaṃ śarīraṃ ca samatyajat
a sa tac charīraṃ saṃtyajya praviveśa dharāṃ tadā

a āsyāt sugandhi tejaś ca asthibhyo devadāru ca
c śleṣmaṇaḥ sphaṭikaṃ tasya pittān marakataṃ tathā
a yakṛt kṛṣṇāyasaṃ tasya tribhir eva babhuḥ prajāḥ
c nakhās tasyābhrapaṭalaṃ śirājālāni vidrumam

c arcayām āsur evainam atharvāṇaṃ surarṣayaḥ
a atharvā tv asṛjal lokān ātmanālokya pāvakam
c miṣatāṃ sarvabhūtānām unmamātha mahārṇavam
a evam agnir bhagavatā naṣṭaḥ pūrvam atharvaṇā
c āhūtaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ havyaṃ vahati sarvadā

c vicaran vividhān deśān bhramamāṇas tu tatra vai

c gaṅgā ca śatakumbhā ca śarayūr gaṇḍasāhvayā
a carmaṇvatī mahī caiva medhyā medhātithis tathā
c tāmrāvatī vetravatī nadyas tisro 'tha kauśikī
a tamasā narmadā caiva nadī godāvarī tathā
c veṇṇā praveṇī bhīmā ca medrathā caiva bhārata
a bhāratī suprayogā ca kāverī murmurā tathā
c kṛṣṇā ca kṛṣṇaveṇṇā ca kapilā śoṇa eva ca
e etā nadyas tu dhiṣṇyānāṃ mātaro yāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
a adbhutasya priyā bhāryā tasyāḥ putro viḍūrathaḥ
c yāvantaḥ pāvakāḥ proktāḥ somās tāvanta eva ca

c atriḥ putrān sraṣṭukāmas tān evātmany adhārayat

a evam ete mahātmānaḥ kīrtitās te 'gnayo mayā

a eka evaiṣa bhagavān vijñeyaḥ prathamo 'ṅgirāḥ

c pāvito vividhair mantrair havyaṃ vahati dehinām
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a agnīnāṃ vividho vaṃśaḥ kīrtitas te mayānagha
c śṛṇu janma tu kauravya kārttikeyasya dhīmataḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
d śrutvemāṃ dharmasaṃyuktāṃ dharmarājaḥ kathāṃ śubhām
d yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

a vadhyamānaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahuśas taiḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c svasainyanāyakārthāya cintām āpa bhṛśaṃ tadā
a devasenāṃ dānavair yo bhagnāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahābalaḥ
c pālayed vīryam āśritya sa jñeyaḥ puruṣo mayā
a sa śailaṃ mānasaṃ gatvā dhyāyann artham imaṃ bhṛśam

d keśinn anicchatīṃ kanyāṃ vijane varayasva mām
