 keśy uvāca
a visṛjasva tvam evaināṃ śakraiṣā prārthitā mayā
c kṣamaṃ te jīvato gantuṃ svapuraṃ pākaśāsana
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a evam uktvā gadāṃ keśī cikṣependravadhāya vai
c tām āpatantīṃ ciccheda madhye vajreṇa vāsavaḥ
a athāsya śailaśikharaṃ keśī kruddho vyavāsṛjat
b mahāmeghapratīkāśaṃ calat pāvakasaṃkulam
c tad āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya śailaśṛṅgaṃ śatakratuḥ
e bibheda rājan vajreṇa bhuvi tan nipapāta ha
a patatā tu tadā keśī tena śṛṅgeṇa tāḍitaḥ
c hitvā kanyāṃ mahābhāgāṃ prādravad bhṛśapīḍitaḥ
a apayāte 'sure tasmiṃs tāṃ kanyāṃ vāsavo 'bravīt
c kāsi kasyāsi kiṃ ceha kuruṣe tvaṃ śubhānane
 kanyovāca
a ahaṃ prajāpateḥ kanyā devaseneti viśrutā
c bhaginī daityasenā me sā pūrvaṃ keśinā hṛtā
a sahaivāvāṃ bhaginyau tu sakhībhiḥ saha mānasam
c āgacchāveha ratyartham anujñāpya prajāpatim
a nityaṃ cāvāṃ prārthayate hartuṃ keśī mahāsuraḥ
c icchaty enaṃ daityasenā na tv ahaṃ pākaśāsana
a sā hṛtā tena bhagavan muktāhaṃ tvadbalena tu
c tvayā devendra nirdiṣṭaṃ patim icchāmi durjayam
 indra uvāca
a mama mātṛṣvaseyā tvaṃ mātā dākṣāyaṇī mama
c ākhyātaṃ tv aham icchāmi svayam ātmabalaṃ tvayā
 kanyovāca
a abalāhaṃ mahābāho patis tu balavān mama
c varadānāt pitur bhāvī surāsuranamaskṛtaḥ
 indra uvāca
a kīdṛśaṃ vai balaṃ devi patyus tava bhaviṣyati
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tava vākyam anindite
 kanyovāca
a devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ kiṃnaroragarakṣasām
c jetā sa dṛṣṭo duṣṭānāṃ mahāvīryo mahābalaḥ
a yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni tvayā saha vijeṣyati
c sa hi me bhavitā bhartā brahmaṇyaḥ kīrtivardhanaḥ
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a indras tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā duḥkhito 'cintayad bhṛśam
c asyā devyāḥ patir nāsti yādṛśaṃ saṃprabhāṣate
a athāpaśyat sa udaye bhāskaraṃ bhāskaradyutiḥ
c somaṃ caiva mahābhāgaṃ viśamānaṃ divākaram
a amāvāsyāṃ saṃpravṛttaṃ muhūrtaṃ raudram eva ca
c devāsuraṃ ca saṃgrāmaṃ so 'paśyad udaye girau
a lohitaiś ca ghanair yuktāṃ pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ śatakratuḥ
c apaśyal lohitodaṃ ca bhagavān varuṇālayam
a bhṛgubhiś cāṅgirobhiś ca hutaṃ mantraiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
c havyaṃ gṛhītvā vahniṃ ca praviśantaṃ divākaram
a parva caiva caturviṃśaṃ tadā sūryam upasthitam
c tathā dharmagataṃ raudraṃ somaṃ sūryagataṃ ca tam
a samālokyaikatām eva śaśino bhāskarasya ca
c samavāyaṃ tu taṃ raudraṃ dṛṣṭvā śakro vyacintayat
d sūryācandramasor ghoraṃ dṛśyate pariveṣaṇam
d etasminn eva rātryante mahad yuddhaṃ tu śaṃsati
d sarit sindhur apīyaṃ tu pratyasṛgvāhinī bhṛśam
d śṛgāliny agnivaktrā ca pratyādityaṃ virāviṇī
a eṣa raudraś ca saṃghāto mahān yuktaś ca tejasā
c somasya vahnisūryābhyām adbhuto 'yaṃ samāgamaḥ
e janayed yaṃ sutaṃ somaḥ so 'syā devyāḥ patir bhavet
a agniś caitair guṇair yuktaḥ sarvair agniś ca devatā
c eṣa cej janayed garbhaṃ so 'syā devyāḥ patir bhavet
a evaṃ saṃcintya bhagavān brahmalokaṃ tadā gataḥ
c gṛhītvā devasenāṃ tām avandat sa pitāmaham
e uvāca cāsyā devyās tvaṃ sādhu śūraṃ patiṃ diśa
 brahmovāca
a yathaitac cintitaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā dānavasūdana
c tathā sa bhavitā garbho balavān uruvikramaḥ
a sa bhaviṣyati senānīs tvayā saha śatakrato
c asyā devyāḥ patiś caiva sa bhaviṣyati vīryavān
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a etac chrutvā namas tasmai kṛtvāsau saha kanyayā
c tatrābhyagacchad devendro yatra devarṣayo 'bhavan
e vasiṣṭhapramukhā mukhyā viprendrāḥ sumahāvratāḥ
a bhāgārthaṃ tapasopāttaṃ teṣāṃ somaṃ tathādhvare
c pipāsavo yayur devāḥ śatakratupurogamāḥ
a iṣṭiṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ susamiddhe hutāśane
c juhuvus te mahātmāno havyaṃ sarvadivaukasām
a samāhūto hutavahaḥ so 'dbhutaḥ sūryamaṇḍalāt
c viniḥsṛtyāyayau vahnir vāgyato vidhivat prabhuḥ
e āgamyāhavanīyaṃ vai tair dvijair mantrato hutam
a sa tatra vividhaṃ havyaṃ pratigṛhya hutāśanaḥ
c ṛṣibhyo bharataśreṣṭha prāyacchata divaukasām
a niṣkrāmaṃś cāpy apaśyat sa patnīs teṣāṃ mahātmanām
c sveṣv āśrameṣūpaviṣṭāḥ snāyantīś ca yathāsukham
a rukmavedinibhās tās tu candralekhā ivāmalāḥ
c hutāśanārcipratimāḥ sarvās tārā ivādbhutāḥ
a sa tadgatena manasā babhūva kṣubhitendriyaḥ
c patnīr dṛṣṭvā dvijendrāṇāṃ vahniḥ kāmavaśaṃ yayau
a sa bhūyaś cintayām āsa na nyāyyaṃ kṣubhito 'smi yat
c sādhvīḥ patnīr dvijendrāṇām akāmāḥ kāmayāmy aham
a naitāḥ śakyā mayā draṣṭuṃ spraṣṭuṃ vāpy animittataḥ
c gārhapatyaṃ samāviśya tasmāt paśyāmy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
a saṃspṛśann iva sarvās tāḥ śikhābhiḥ kāñcanaprabhāḥ
c paśyamānaś ca mumude gārhapatyaṃ samāśritaḥ
a niruṣya tatra suciram evaṃ vahnir vaśaṃ gataḥ
c manas tāsu vinikṣipya kāmayāno varāṅganāḥ
a kāmasaṃtaptahṛdayo dehatyāge suniścitaḥ
c alābhe brāhmaṇastrīṇām agnir vanam upāgataḥ
a svāhā taṃ dakṣaduhitā prathamaṃ kāmayat tadā
c sā tasya chidram anvaicchac cirāt prabhṛti bhāminī
e apramattasya devasya na cāpaśyad aninditā
a sā taṃ jñātvā yathāvat tu vahniṃ vanam upāgatam
c tattvataḥ kāmasaṃtaptaṃ cintayām āsa bhāminī
a ahaṃ saptarṣipatnīnāṃ kṛtvā rūpāṇi pāvakam
c kāmayiṣyāmi kāmārtaṃ tāsāṃ rūpeṇa mohitam
e evaṃ kṛte prītir asya kāmāvāptiś ca me bhavet
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a śivā bhāryā tv aṅgirasaḥ śīlarūpaguṇānvitā
c tasyāḥ sā prathamaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā devī janādhipa
e jagāma pāvakābhyāśaṃ taṃ covāca varāṅganā
a mām agne kāmasaṃtaptāṃ tvaṃ kāmayitum arhasi
c kariṣyasi na ced evaṃ mṛtāṃ mām upadhāraya
d tavāpy adharmaḥ sumahān bhavitā vai hutāśana
a aham aṅgiraso bhāryā śivā nāma hutāśana
c sakhībhiḥ sahitā prāptā mantrayitvā viniścayam
 agnir uvāca
a kathaṃ māṃ tvaṃ vijānīṣe kāmārtam itarāḥ katham
c yās tvayā kīrtitāḥ sarvāḥ saptarṣīṇāṃ priyāḥ striyaḥ
 śivovāca
a asmākaṃ tvaṃ priyo nityaṃ bibhīmas tu vayaṃ tava
c tvaccittam iṅgitair jñātvā preṣitāsmi tavāntikam
a maithunāyeha saṃprāptā kāmaṃ prāptaṃ drutaṃ cara
b upayantuṃ mahāvīrya pūrvam eva tvam arhasi
c mātaro māṃ pratīkṣante gamiṣyāmi hutāśana
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a tato 'gnir upayeme tāṃ śivāṃ prītimudāyutaḥ
c prītyā devī ca saṃyuktā śukraṃ jagrāha pāṇinā
a acintayan mamedaṃ ye rūpaṃ drakṣyanti kānane
c te brāhmaṇīnām anṛtaṃ doṣaṃ vakṣyanti pāvake
a tasmād etad rakṣyamāṇā garuḍī saṃbhavāmy aham
c vanān nirgamanaṃ caiva sukhaṃ mama bhaviṣyati
a suparṇī sā tadā bhūtvā nirjagāma mahāvanāt
c apaśyat parvataṃ śvetaṃ śarastambaiḥ susaṃvṛtam
a dṛṣṭīviṣaiḥ saptaśīrṣair guptaṃ bhogibhir adbhutaiḥ
c rakṣobhiś ca piśācaiś ca raudrair bhūtagaṇais tathā
e rākṣasībhiś ca saṃpūrṇam anekaiś ca mṛgadvijaiḥ
f nadīprasravaṇopetaṃ nānātarulatācitam
a sā tatra sahasā gatvā śailapṛṣṭhaṃ sudurgamam
c prākṣipat kāñcane kuṇḍe śukraṃ sā tvaritā satī
a śiṣṭānām api sā devī saptarṣīṇāṃ mahātmanām
c patnīsarūpatāṃ kṛtvā kāmayām āsa pāvakam
a divyarūpam arundhatyāḥ kartuṃ na śakitaṃ tayā
c tasyās tapaḥprabhāveṇa bhartṛśuśrūṣaṇena ca
a ṣaṭkṛtvas tat tu nikṣiptam agne retaḥ kurūttama
c tasmin kuṇḍe pratipadi kāminyā svāhayā tadā
a tat skannaṃ tejasā tatra saṃbhṛtaṃ janayat sutam
c ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitaṃ skannam anayat skandatāṃ tataḥ
a ṣaṭśirā dviguṇaśrotro dvādaśākṣibhujakramaḥ
c ekagrīvas tv ekakāyaḥ kumāraḥ samapadyata
a dvitīyāyām abhivyaktas tṛtīyāyāṃ śiśur babhau
c aṅgapratyaṅgasaṃbhūtaś caturthyām abhavad guhaḥ
a lohitābhreṇa mahatā saṃvṛtaḥ saha vidyutā
c lohitābhre sumahati bhāti sūrya ivoditaḥ
a gṛhītaṃ tu dhanus tena vipulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c nyastaṃ yat tripuraghnena surārivinikṛntanam
a tad gṛhītvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ nanāda balavāṃs tadā
c saṃmohayann ivemān sa trīṃl lokān sacarācarān
a tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā mahāmeghaughanisvanam
c utpetatur mahānāgau citraś cairāvataś ca ha
a tāv āpatantau saṃprekṣya sa bālārkasamadyutiḥ
c dvābhyāṃ gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ śaktiṃ cānyena pāṇinā
e apareṇāgnidāyādas tāmracūḍaṃ bhujena saḥ
a mahākāyam upaśliṣṭaṃ kukkuṭaṃ balināṃ varam
c gṛhītvā vyanadad bhīmaṃ cikrīḍa ca mahābalaḥ
a dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyāṃ balavān gṛhītvā śaṅkham uttamam
c prādhmāpayata bhūtānāṃ trāsanaṃ balinām api
a dvābhyāṃ bhujābhyām ākāśaṃ bahuśo nijaghāna saḥ
c krīḍan bhāti mahāsenas trīṃl lokān vadanaiḥ piban
e parvatāgre 'prameyātmā raśmimān udaye yathā
a sa tasya parvatasyāgre niṣaṇṇo 'dbhutavikramaḥ
c vyalokayad ameyātmā mukhair nānāvidhair diśaḥ
e sa paśyan vividhān bhāvāṃś cakāra ninadaṃ punaḥ
a tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā nyapatan bahudhā janāḥ
c bhītāś codvignamanasas tam eva śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
a ye tu taṃ saṃśritā devaṃ nānāvarṇās tadā janāḥ
c tān apy āhuḥ pāriṣadān brāhmaṇāḥ sumahābalān
a sa tūtthāya mahābāhur upasāntvya ca tāñ janān
c dhanur vikṛṣya vyasṛjad bāṇāñ śvete mahāgirau
a bibheda sa śaraiḥ śailaṃ krauñcaṃ himavataḥ sutam
c tena haṃsāś ca gṛdhrāś ca meruṃ gacchanti parvatam
a sa viśīrṇo 'patac chailo bhṛśam ārtasvarān ruvan
c tasmin nipatite tv anye neduḥ śailā bhṛśaṃ bhayāt
d ghoram ārtasvaraṃ sarve dṛṣṭvā krauñcaṃ vidāritam
a sa taṃ nādaṃ bhṛśārtānāṃ śrutvāpi balināṃ varaḥ
c na prāvyathad ameyātmā śaktim udyamya cānadat
a sā tadā vipulā śaktiḥ kṣiptā tena mahātmanā
c bibheda śikharaṃ ghoraṃ śvetasya tarasā gireḥ
a sa tenābhihato dīno giriḥ śveto 'calaiḥ saha
c utpapāta mahīṃ tyaktvā bhītas tasmān mahātmanaḥ
a tataḥ pravyathitā bhūmir vyaśīryata samantataḥ
c ārtā skandaṃ samāsādya punar balavatī babhau
a parvatāś ca namaskṛtya tam eva pṛthivīṃ gatāḥ
c athāyam abhajal lokaḥ skandaṃ śuklasya pañcamīm
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
 tasmiñ jāte mahāsattve mahāsene mahābale
 samuttasthur mahotpātā ghorarūpāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
 strīpuṃsor viparītaṃ ca tathā dvaṃdvāni yāni ca
 grahā dīptā diśaḥ khaṃ ca rarāsa ca mahī bhṛśam
 ity etad vividhākāraṃ vṛttaṃ śuklasya pañcamīm
 tato yuddhaṃ mahad ghoraṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ vṛttaṃ janādhipa
a ṛṣayas tu mahāghorān dṛṣṭvotpātān pṛthagvidhān
c akurvañ śāntim udvignā lokānāṃ lokabhāvanāḥ
a nivasanti vane ye tu tasmiṃś caitrarathe janāḥ
c te 'bruvann eṣa no 'narthaḥ pāvakenāhṛto mahān
e saṃgamya ṣaḍbhiḥ patnībhiḥ saptarṣīṇām iti sma ha
a apare garuḍīm āhus tvayānartho 'yam āhṛtaḥ
c yair dṛṣṭā sā tadā devī tasyā rūpeṇa gacchatī
e na tu tat svāhayā karma kṛtaṃ jānāti vai janaḥ
a suparṇī tu vacaḥ śrutvā mamāyaṃ tanayas tv iti
c upagamya śanaiḥ skandam āhāhaṃ jananī tava
a atha saptarṣayaḥ śrutvā jātaṃ putraṃ mahaujasam
c tatyajuḥ ṣaṭ tadā patnīr vinā devīm arundhatīm
a ṣaḍbhir eva tadā jātam āhus tad vanavāsinaḥ
c saptarṣīn āha ca svāhā mama putro 'yam ity uta
e ahaṃ jāne naitad evam iti rājan punaḥ punaḥ
a viśvāmitras tu kṛtveṣṭiṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ mahāmuniḥ
c pāvakaṃ kāmasaṃtaptam adṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
e tat tena nikhilaṃ sarvam avabuddhaṃ yathātatham
a viśvāmitras tu prathamaṃ kumāraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
c stavaṃ divyaṃ saṃpracakre mahāsenasya cāpi saḥ
a maṅgalāni ca sarvāṇi kaumārāṇi trayodaśa
c jātakarmādikās tasya kriyāś cakre mahāmuniḥ
a ṣaḍvaktrasya tu māhātmyaṃ kukkuṭasya ca sādhanam
c śaktyā devyāḥ sādhanaṃ ca tathā pāriṣadām api
a viśvāmitraś cakāraitat karma lokahitāya vai
c tasmād ṛṣiḥ kumārasya viśvāmitro 'bhavat priyaḥ
a anvajānāc ca svāhāyā rūpānyatvaṃ mahāmuniḥ
c abravīc ca munīn sarvān nāparādhyanti vai striyaḥ
e śrutvā tu tattvatas tasmāt te patnīḥ sarvato 'tyajan
a skandaṃ śrutvā tato devā vāsavaṃ sahitābruvan
c aviṣahyabalaṃ skandaṃ jahi śakrāśu māciram
a yadi vā na nihaṃsy enam adyendro 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati
c trailokyaṃ saṃnigṛhyāsmāṃs tvāṃ ca śakra mahābalaḥ
a sa tān uvāca vyathito bālo 'yaṃ sumahābalaḥ
b na bālam utsahe hantum iti śakraḥ prabhāṣate
b te 'bruvan nāsti te vīryaṃ yata evaṃ prabhāṣase
c sraṣṭāram api lokānāṃ yudhi vikramya nāśayet
a sarvās tv adyābhigacchantu skandaṃ lokasya mātaraḥ
c kāmavīryā ghnantu cainaṃ tathety uktvā ca tā yayuḥ
a tam apratibalaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣaṇṇavadanās tu tāḥ
c aśakyo 'yaṃ vicintyaivaṃ tam eva śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
a ūcuś cāpi tvam asmākaṃ putro 'smābhir dhṛtaṃ jagat
c abhinandasva naḥ sarvāḥ prasnutāḥ snehaviklavāḥ
d tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pātukāmaḥ stanān prabhuḥ
a tāḥ saṃpūjya mahāsenaḥ kāmāṃś cāsāṃ pradāya saḥ
c apaśyad agnim āyāntaṃ pitaraṃ balināṃ balī
a sa tu saṃpūjitas tena saha mātṛgaṇena ha
c parivārya mahāsenaṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ sthitaḥ sthiram
a sarvāsāṃ yā tu mātṝṇāṃ nārī krodhasamudbhavā
c dhātrī sā putravat skandaṃ śūlahastābhyarakṣata
a lohitasyodadheḥ kanyā krūrā lohitabhojanā
c pariṣvajya mahāsenaṃ putravat paryarakṣata
a agnir bhūtvā naigameyaś chāgavaktro bahuprajaḥ
c ramayām āsa śailasthaṃ bālaṃ krīḍanakair iva
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a grahāḥ sopagrahāś caiva ṛṣayo mātaras tathā
c hutāśanamukhāś cāpi dīptāḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇāḥ
a ete cānye ca bahavo ghorās tridivavāsinaḥ
c parivārya mahāsenaṃ sthitā mātṛgaṇaiḥ saha
a saṃdigdhaṃ vijayaṃ dṛṣṭvā vijayepsuḥ sureśvaraḥ
c āruhyairāvataskandhaṃ prayayau daivataiḥ saha
d ādāya vajraṃ balavān sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ
e vijighāṃsur mahāsenam indras tūrṇataraṃ yayau
a ugraṃ tac ca mahāvegaṃ devānīkaṃ mahāprabham
c vicitradhvajasaṃnāhaṃ nānāvāhanakārmukam
e pravarāmbarasaṃvītaṃ śriyā juṣṭam alaṃkṛtam
a vijighāṃsuṃ tadāyāntaṃ kumāraḥ śakram abhyayāt
c vinadan pathi śakras tu drutaṃ yāti mahābalaḥ
e saṃharṣayan devasenāṃ jighāṃsuḥ pāvakātmajam
a saṃpūjyamānas tridaśais tathaiva paramarṣibhiḥ
c samīpam upasaṃprāptaḥ kārttikeyasya vāsavaḥ
d atha dṛṣṭvā sthitaṃ skandaṃ śvetasyāgre mahāgireḥ
a siṃhanādaṃ tataś cakre deveśaḥ sahitaḥ suraiḥ
c guho 'pi śabdaṃ taṃ śrutvā vyanadat sāgaro yathā
a tasya śabdena mahatā samuddhūtodadhiprabham
c babhrāma tatra tatraiva devasainyam acetanam
a jighāṃsūn upasaṃprāptān devān dṛṣṭvā sa pāvakiḥ
c visasarja mukhāt kruddhaḥ pravṛddhāḥ pāvakārciṣaḥ
e tā devasainyāny adahan veṣṭamānāni bhūtale
a te pradīptaśirodehāḥ pradīptāyudhavāhanāḥ
c pracyutāḥ sahasā bhānti citrās tārāgaṇā iva
a dahyamānāḥ prapannās te śaraṇaṃ pāvakātmajam

c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ taṃ tu devagrahaṃ viduḥ

c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ sa jñeyas tu pitṛgrahaḥ
a avamanyati yaḥ siddhān kruddhāś cāpi śapanti yam
c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ jñeyaḥ siddhagrahas tu saḥ
a upāghrāti ca yo gandhān rasāṃś cāpi pṛthagvidhān
c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ sa jñeyo rākṣaso grahaḥ
a gandharvāś cāpi yaṃ divyāḥ saṃspṛśanti naraṃ bhuvi
c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ graho gāndharva eva saḥ
a āviśanti ca yaṃ yakṣāḥ puruṣaṃ kālaparyaye
c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ jñeyo yakṣagrahas tu saḥ
a adhirohanti yaṃ nityaṃ piśācāḥ puruṣaṃ kva cit
c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ paiśācaṃ taṃ grahaṃ viduḥ
a yasya doṣaiḥ prakupitaṃ cittaṃ muhyati dehinaḥ
c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ sādhanaṃ tasya śāstrataḥ
a vaiklavyāc ca bhayāc caiva ghorāṇāṃ cāpi darśanāt
c unmādyati sa tu kṣipraṃ sattvaṃ tasya tu sādhanam
a kaś cit krīḍitukāmo vai bhoktukāmas tathāparaḥ
c abhikāmas tathaivānya ity eṣa trividho grahaḥ
a yāvat saptativarṣāṇi bhavanty ete grahā nṛṇām
c ataḥ paraṃ dehināṃ tu grahatulyo bhavej jvaraḥ
a aprakīrṇendriyaṃ dāntaṃ śuciṃ nityam atandritam
c āstikaṃ śraddadhānaṃ ca varjayanti sadā grahāḥ
a ity eṣa te grahoddeśo mānuṣāṇāṃ prakīrtitaḥ
c na spṛśanti grahā bhaktān narān devaṃ maheśvaram
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a yadā skandena mātṝṇām evam etat priyaṃ kṛtam
c athainam abravīt svāhā mama putras tvam aurasaḥ
a icchāmy ahaṃ tvayā dattāṃ prītiṃ paramadurlabhām
c tām abravīt tataḥ skandaḥ prītim icchasi kīdṛśīm
 svāhovāca
a dakṣasyāhaṃ priyā kanyā svāhā nāma mahābhuja
c bālyāt prabhṛti nityaṃ ca jātakāmā hutāśane
a na ca māṃ kāminīṃ putra samyag jānāti pāvakaḥ
c icchāmi śāśvataṃ vāsaṃ vastuṃ putra sahāgninā
 skanda uvāca
a havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca yat kiṃ cid dvijā mantrapuraskṛtam
c hoṣyanty agnau sadā devi svāhety uktvā samudyatam
a adya prabhṛti dāsyanti suvṛttāḥ satpathe sthitāḥ
c evam agnis tvayā sārdhaṃ sadā vatsyati śobhane
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a evam uktā tataḥ svāhā tuṣṭā skandena pūjitā
c pāvakena samāyuktā bhartrā skandam apūjayat
a tato brahmā mahāsenaṃ prajāpatir athābravīt
c abhigaccha mahādevaṃ pitaraṃ tripurārdanam
a rudreṇāgniṃ samāviśya svāhām āviśya comayā
c hitārthaṃ sarvalokānāṃ jātas tvam aparājitaḥ
a umāyonyāṃ ca rudreṇa śukraṃ siktaṃ mahātmanā
c āste girau nipatitaṃ miñjikāmiñjikaṃ yataḥ
d mithunaṃ vai mahābhāga tatra tad rudrasaṃbhavam
a saṃbhūtaṃ lohitode tu śukraśeṣam avāpatat
c sūryaraśmiṣu cāpy anyad anyac caivāpatad bhuvi
e āsaktam anyad vṛkṣeṣu tad evaṃ pañcadhāpatat
a ta ete vividhākārā gaṇā jñeyā manīṣibhiḥ
c tava pāriṣadā ghorā ya ete piśitāśanāḥ
a evam astv iti cāpy uktvā mahāseno maheśvaram
c apūjayad ameyātmā pitaraṃ pitṛvatsalaḥ
a arkapuṣpais tu te pañca gaṇāḥ pūjyā dhanārthibhiḥ
c vyādhipraśamanārthaṃ ca teṣāṃ pūjāṃ samācaret
a miñjikāmiñjikaṃ caiva mithunaṃ rudrasaṃbhavam
c namaskāryaṃ sadaiveha bālānāṃ hitam icchatā
a striyo mānuṣamāṃsādā vṛddhikā nāma nāmataḥ
c vṛkṣeṣu jātās tā devyo namaskāryāḥ prajārthibhiḥ
a evam ete piśācānām asaṃkhyeyā gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
c ghaṇṭāyāḥ sapatākāyāḥ śṛṇu me saṃbhavaṃ nṛpa
a airāvatasya ghaṇṭe dve vaijayantyāv iti śrute
c guhasya te svayaṃ datte śakreṇānāyya dhīmatā
a ekā tatra viśākhasya ghaṇṭā skandasya cāparā
c patākā kārttikeyasya viśākhasya ca lohitā
a yāni krīḍanakāny asya devair dattāni vai tadā
c tair eva ramate devo mahāseno mahābalaḥ
a sa saṃvṛtaḥ piśācānāṃ gaṇair devagaṇais tathā
c śuśubhe kāñcane śaile dīpyamānaḥ śriyā vṛtaḥ
a tena vīreṇa śuśubhe sa śailaḥ śubhakānanaḥ
c ādityenevāṃśumatā mandaraś cārukandaraḥ
a saṃtānakavanaiḥ phullaiḥ karavīravanair api
c pārijātavanaiś caiva japāśokavanais tathā
a kadambataruṣaṇḍaiś ca divyair mṛgagaṇair api
c divyaiḥ pakṣigaṇaiś caiva śuśubhe śvetaparvataḥ
a tatra devagaṇāḥ sarve sarve caiva maharṣayaḥ
c meghatūryaravāś caiva kṣubdhodadhisamasvanāḥ
a tatra divyāś ca gandharvā nṛtyanty apsarasas tathā
c hṛṣṭānāṃ tatra bhūtānāṃ śrūyate ninado mahān
a evaṃ sendraṃ jagat sarvaṃ śvetaparvatasaṃsthitam
c prahṛṣṭaṃ prekṣate skandaṃ na ca glāyati darśanāt
 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a yadābhiṣikto bhagavān senāpatyena pāvakiḥ
c tadā saṃprasthitaḥ śrīmān hṛṣṭo bhadravaṭaṃ haraḥ
e rathenādityavarṇena pārvatyā sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
f anuyātaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ sahasrākṣapurogamaiḥ
a sahasraṃ tasya siṃhānāṃ tasmin yuktaṃ rathottame
c utpapāta divaṃ śubhraṃ kālenābhipracoditaḥ
a te pibanta ivākāśaṃ trāsayantaś carācarān
c siṃhā nabhasy agacchanta nadantaś cārukesarāḥ
a tasmin rathe paśupatiḥ sthito bhāty umayā saha
c vidyutā sahitaḥ sūryaḥ sendracāpe ghane yathā
a agratas tasya bhagavān dhaneśo guhyakaiḥ saha
c āsthāya ruciraṃ yāti puṣpakaṃ naravāhanaḥ
a airāvataṃ samāsthāya śakraś cāpi suraiḥ saha
c pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayau yāntaṃ varadaṃ vṛṣabhadhvajam
a jambhakair yakṣarakṣobhiḥ sragvibhiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ
c yāty amogho mahāyakṣo dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āsthitaḥ
a tasya dakṣiṇato devā marutaś citrayodhinaḥ
c gacchanti vasubhiḥ sārdhaṃ rudraiś ca saha saṃgatāḥ
a yamaś ca mṛtyunā sārdhaṃ sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ
c ghorair vyādhiśatair yāti ghorarūpavapus tathā
a yamasya pṛṣṭhataś caiva ghoras triśikharaḥ śitaḥ
c vijayo nāma rudrasya yāti śūlaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ
a tam ugrapāśo varuṇo bhagavān salileśvaraḥ
c parivārya śanair yāti yādobhir vividhair vṛtaḥ
a pṛṣṭhato vijayasyāpi yāti rudrasya paṭṭiśaḥ
c gadāmusalaśaktyādyair vṛtaḥ praharaṇottamaiḥ
a paṭṭiśaṃ tv anvagād rājaṃś chatraṃ raudraṃ mahāprabham
c kamaṇḍaluś cāpy anu taṃ maharṣigaṇasaṃvṛtaḥ
a tasya dakṣiṇato bhāti daṇḍo gacchañ śriyā vṛtaḥ
c bhṛgvaṅgirobhiḥ sahito devaiś cāpy abhipūjitaḥ
a eṣāṃ tu pṛṣṭhato rudro vimale syandane sthitaḥ
c yāti saṃharṣayan sarvāṃs tejasā tridivaukasaḥ
a ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvā bhujagās tathā
c nadyo nadā drumāś caiva tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
a nakṣatrāṇi grahāś caiva devānāṃ śiśavaś ca ye
c striyaś ca vividhākārā yānti rudrasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
e sṛjantyaḥ puṣpavarṣāṇi cārurūpā varāṅganāḥ
a parjanyaś cāpy anuyayau namaskṛtya pinākinam
c chatraṃ tu pāṇḍuraṃ somas tasya mūrdhany adhārayat
e cāmare cāpi vāyuś ca gṛhītvāgniś ca viṣṭhitau
a śakraś ca pṛṣṭhatas tasya yāti rājañ śriyā vṛtaḥ
c saha rājarṣibhiḥ sarvaiḥ stuvāno vṛṣaketanam
a gaurī vidyātha gāndhārī keśinī mitrasāhvayā
c sāvitryā saha sarvās tāḥ pārvatyā yānti pṛṣṭhataḥ
a tatra vidyāgaṇāḥ sarve ye ke cit kavibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
b svena svenānuyogena sarve te 'nuyayur haram
c yasya kurvanti vacanaṃ sendrā devāś camūmukhe
a sa gṛhītvā patākāṃ tu yāty agre rākṣaso grahaḥ
c vyāpṛtas tu śmaśāne yo nityaṃ rudrasya vai sakhā
e piṅgalo nāma yakṣendro lokasyānandadāyakaḥ
a ebhiḥ sa sahitas tatra yayau devo yathāsukham
c agrataḥ pṛṣṭhataś caiva na hi tasya gatir dhruvā
a rudraṃ satkarmabhir martyāḥ pūjayantīha daivatam
c śivam ity eva yaṃ prāhur īśaṃ rudraṃ pinākinam
d evaṃ sarve suragaṇās tadā vai prītamānasāḥ
e bhāvais tu vividhākāraiḥ pūjayanti maheśvaram
a devasenāpatis tv evaṃ devasenābhir āvṛtaḥ
c anugacchati deveśaṃ brahmaṇyaḥ kṛttikāsutaḥ
a athābravīn mahāsenaṃ mahādevo bṛhadvacaḥ
c saptamaṃ mārutaskandhaṃ rakṣa nityam atandritaḥ
 skanda uvāca
a saptamaṃ mārutaskandhaṃ pālayiṣyāmy ahaṃ prabho
c yad anyad api me kāryaṃ deva tad vada māciram
 rudra uvāca
a kāryeṣv ahaṃ tvayā putra saṃdraṣṭavyaḥ sadaiva hi

 mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
a ity uktvā visasarjainaṃ pariṣvajya maheṣvaraḥ
b skandaṃ sahomayā prīto jvalantam iva tejasā

a jajvāla khaṃ sanakṣatraṃ pramūḍhaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhṛśam
c cacāla vyanadac corvī tamobhūtaṃ jagat prabho
a tatas tad dāruṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣubhitaḥ śaṃkaras tadā

c abhyadravad raṇe devān bhagavantaṃ ca śaṃkaram

c parvatāś ca śataghnyaś ca prāsāś ca parighā gadāḥ
a nipatadbhiś ca tair ghorair devānīkaṃ mahāyudhaiḥ
c kṣaṇena vyadravat sarvaṃ vimukhaṃ cāpy adṛśyata
a nikṛttayodhanāgāśvaṃ kṛttāyudhamahāratham
c dānavair arditaṃ sainyaṃ devānāṃ vimukhaṃ babhau
a asurair vadhyamānaṃ tat pāvakair iva kānanam
c apatad dagdhabhūyiṣṭhaṃ mahādrumavanaṃ yathā
a te vibhinnaśirodehāḥ pracyavante divaukasaḥ
c na nātham adhyagacchanta vadhyamānā mahāraṇe
a atha tad vidrutaṃ sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā devaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c āśvāsayann uvācedaṃ balavad dānavārditam
a bhayaṃ tyajata bhadraṃ vaḥ śūrāḥ śastrāṇi gṛhṇata
c kurudhvaṃ vikrame buddhiṃ mā vaḥ kā cid vyathā bhavet
a jayatainān sudurvṛttān dānavān ghoradarśanān
c abhidravata bhadraṃ vo mayā saha mahāsurān
a śakrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā samāśvastā divaukasaḥ
c dānavān pratyayudhyanta śakraṃ kṛtvā vyapāśrayam
a tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve marutaś ca mahābalāḥ
c pratyudyayur mahāvegāḥ sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ saha
a tair visṛṣṭāny anīkeṣu kruddhaiḥ śastrāṇi saṃyuge

a teṣāṃ dehān vinirbhidya śarās te niśitās tadā
c niṣpatanto adṛśyanta nagebhya iva pannagāḥ
a tāni daityaśarīrāṇi nirbhinnāni sma sāyakaiḥ
c apatan bhūtale rājaṃś chinnābhrāṇīva sarvaśaḥ
a tatas tad dānavaṃ sainyaṃ sarvair devagaṇair yudhi
c trāsitaṃ vividhair bāṇaiḥ kṛtaṃ caiva parāṅmukham
a athotkruṣṭaṃ tadā hṛṣṭaiḥ sarvair devair udāyudhaiḥ
c saṃhatāni ca tūryāṇi tadā sarvāṇy anekaśaḥ
a evam anyonyasaṃyuktaṃ yuddham āsīt sudāruṇam
c devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca māṃsaśoṇitakardamam
a anayo devalokasya sahasaiva vyadṛśyata
c tathā hi dānavā ghorā vinighnanti divaukasaḥ
a tatas tūryapraṇādāś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanāḥ
c babhūvur dānavendrāṇāṃ siṃhanādāś ca dāruṇāḥ
a atha daityabalād ghorān niṣpapāta mahābalaḥ
c dānavo mahiṣo nāma pragṛhya vipulaṃ girim
a te taṃ ghanair ivādityaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃparivāritam
c samudyatagiriṃ rājan vyadravanta divaukasaḥ
a athābhidrutya mahiṣo devāṃś cikṣepa taṃ girim
b mahākāyaṃ mahārāja satoyam iva toyadam
c patatā tena giriṇā devasainyasya pārthiva
e bhīmarūpeṇa nihatam ayutaṃ prāpatad bhuvi
a atha tair dānavaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahiṣas trāsayan surān
c abhyadravad raṇe tūrṇaṃ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgān iva
a tam āpatantaṃ mahiṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sendrā divaukasaḥ
c vyadravanta raṇe bhītā viśīrṇāyudhaketanāḥ
a tataḥ sa mahiṣaḥ kruddhas tūrṇaṃ rudrarathaṃ yayau
c abhidrutya ca jagrāha rudrasya rathakūbaram
a yadā rudrarathaṃ kruddho mahiṣaḥ sahasā gataḥ
c resatū rodasī gāḍhaṃ mumuhuś ca maharṣayaḥ
a vyanadaṃś ca mahākāyā daityā jaladharopamāḥ
c āsīc ca niścitaṃ teṣāṃ jitam asmābhir ity uta
a tathābhūte tu bhagavān nāvadhīn mahiṣaṃ raṇe
a   āhūya guham ātmajam

a ayojayan nigrahārthaṃ mahiṣasya gatāyuṣaḥ
a tathābhūte tu bhagavān
c sasmāra ca tadā skandaṃ mṛtyuṃ tasya durātmanaḥ

b ajayyo yudhi devānāṃ dānavaḥ sumahābalaḥ

a śataṃ mahiṣatulyānāṃ dānavānāṃ tvayā raṇe

a tāvakair bhakṣitāś cānye dānavāḥ śatasaṃghaśaḥ
b bhavato 'nucarair vīra gaṇaiḥ paramabhīṣaṇaiḥ
c ajeyas tvaṃ raṇe 'rīṇām umāpatir iva prabhuḥ

d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi nāmāny asya mahātmanaḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca

d uvāca bhagavāṃs tatra mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ
d āgneyaś caiva skandaś ca dīptakīrtir anāmayaḥ
d mayūraketur dharmātmā bhūteśo mahiṣārdanaḥ
d kāmajit kāmadaḥ kāntaḥ satyavāg bhuvaneśvaraḥ
d śiśuḥ śīghraḥ śuciś caṇḍo dīptavarṇaḥ śubhānanaḥ
d amoghas tv anagho raudraḥ priyaś candrānanas tathā
d dīptaśaktiḥ praśāntātmā bhadrakṛt kūṭamohanaḥ
d ṣaṣṭhīpriyaś ca dharmātmā pavitro mātṛvatsalaḥ
d kanyābhartā vibhaktaś ca svāheyo revatīsutaḥ
d prabhur netā viśākhaś ca naigameyaḥ suduścaraḥ
d suvrato lalitaś caiva bālakrīḍanakapriyaḥ
d khacārī brahmacārī ca śūraḥ śaravaṇodbhavaḥ
d viśvāmitrapriyaś caiva devasenāpriyas tathā
d vāsudevapriyaś caiva priyaḥ priyakṛd eva tu
d nāmāny etāni divyāni kārttikeyasya yaḥ paṭhet
d svargaṃ kīrtiṃ dhanaṃ caiva sa labhen nātra saṃśayaḥ
d mārkaṇḍeya uvāca
d stoṣyāmi devair ṛṣibhiś ca juṣṭaṃ
d śaktyā guhaṃ nāmabhir aprameyam
d ṣaḍānanaṃ śaktidharaṃ suvīraṃ
d nibodha caitāni kurupravīra
d brahmaṇyo vai brahmajo brahmavic ca
d brahmeśayo brahmavatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
d brahmapriyo brāhmaṇasavratī tvaṃ
d brahmajño vai brāhmaṇānāṃ ca netā
d svāhā svadhā tvaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ
d mantrastutas tvaṃ prathitaḥ ṣaḍarciḥ
d saṃvatsaras tvam ṛtavaś ca ṣaḍ vai
d māsārdhamāsāv ayanaṃ diśaś ca
d tvaṃ puṣkarākṣas tv aravindvaktraḥ
d sahasravaktro 'si sahasrabāhuḥ
d tvaṃ lokapālaḥ paramaṃ haviś ca
d tvaṃ bhāvanaḥ sarvasurāsurāṇām
d tvam eva senādhipatiḥ pracaṇḍaḥ
d prabhur vibhuś cāpy atha śatrujetā
d sahasrabhūs tvaṃ dharaṇī tvam eva
d sahasratuṣṭiś ca sahasrabhuk ca
d sahasraśīrṣas tvam anantarūpaḥ
d sahasrapāt tvaṃ guha śaktidhārī
d gaṅgāsutas tvaṃ svamatena deva
d svāhāmahīkṛttikānāṃ tathaiva
d tvaṃ krīḍase ṣaṇmukha kukkuṭena
d yatheṣṭanānāvidhakāmarūpī
d dīkṣāsi somo marutaḥ sadaiva
d dharmo 'si vāyur acalendra indraḥ
d sanātanānām api śāśvatas tvaṃ
d prabhuḥ prabhūṇām api cogradhanvā
d ṛtasya kartā ditijāntakas tvaṃ
d jetā ripūṇāṃ pravaraḥ surāṇām
d sūkṣmaṃ tapas tat paramaṃ tvam eva
d parāvarajño 'si parāvaras tvam
d dharmasya kāmasya parasya caiva
d tvattejasā kṛtsnam idaṃ mahātman
d vyāptaṃ jagat sarvasurapravīra
d śaktyā mayā saṃstuta lokanātha
d namo 'stu te dvādaśanetrabāho
d ataḥ paraṃ vedmi gatiṃ na te 'ham
d skandasya ya idaṃ vipraḥ paṭhej janma samāhitaḥ
d śrāvayed brāhmaṇebhyo yaḥ śṛṇuyād vā dvijeritam
d dhanam āyur yaśo dīptaṃ putrāñ śatrujayaṃ tathā
d sa puṣṭituṣṭī saṃprāpya skandasālokyam āpnuyāt
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a upāsīneṣu vipreṣu pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
c draupadī satyabhāmā ca viviśāte tadā samam
d praviśya cāśramaṃ puṇyam ubhe te paramastriyau
e jāhasyamāne suprīte sukhaṃ tatra niṣīdatuḥ
a cirasya dṛṣṭvā rājendra te 'nyonyasya priyaṃvade
c kathayām āsatuś citrāḥ kathāḥ kuruyadukṣitām
a athābravīt satyabhāmā kṛṣṇasya mahiṣī priyā
c sātrājitī yājñasenīṃ rahasīdaṃ sumadhyamā
a kena draupadi vṛttena pāṇḍavān upatiṣṭhasi
c lokapālopamān vīrān yūnaḥ paramasaṃmatān
e kathaṃ ca vaśagās tubhyaṃ na kupyanti ca te śubhe
a tava vaśyā hi satataṃ pāṇḍavāḥ priyadarśane
b na cānyonyam asūyante kathaṃ vā te sumadhyame
c mukhaprekṣāś ca te sarve tattvam etad bravīhi me
a vratacaryā tapo vāpi snānamantrauṣadhāni vā
c vidyāvīryaṃ mūlavīryaṃ japahomas tathāgadāḥ
a mama ācakṣva pāñcāli yaśasyaṃ bhagavedanam
c yena kṛṣṇe bhaven nityaṃ mama kṛṣṇo vaśānugaḥ
a evam uktvā satyabhāmā virarāma yaśasvinī
c pativratā mahābhāgā draupadī pratyuvāca tām
a asatstrīṇāṃ samācāraṃ satye mām anupṛcchasi
c asadācarite mārge kathaṃ syād anukīrtanam
a anupraśnaḥ saṃśayo vā naitat tvayy upapadyate
c tathā hy upetā buddhyā tvaṃ kṛṣṇasya mahiṣī priyā
a yadaiva bhartā jānīyān mantramūlaparāṃ striyam
c udvijeta tadaivāsyāḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
a udvignasya kutaḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
c na jātu vaśago bhartā striyāḥ syān mantrakāraṇāt
a amitraprahitāṃś cāpi gadān paramadāruṇān
c mūlapravādair hi viṣaṃ prayacchanti jighāṃsavaḥ
a jihvayā yāni puruṣas tvacā vāpy upasevate
c tatra cūrṇāni dattāni hanyuḥ kṣipram asaṃśayam
a jalodarasamāyuktāḥ śvitriṇaḥ palitās tathā
c apumāṃsaḥ kṛtāḥ strībhir jaḍāndhabadhirās tathā
a pāpānugās tu pāpās tāḥ patīn upasṛjanty uta
c na jātu vipriyaṃ bhartuḥ striyā kāryaṃ kathaṃ cana
a vartāmy ahaṃ tu yāṃ vṛttiṃ pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
c tāṃ sarvāṃ śṛṇu me satyāṃ satyabhāme yaśasvini
a ahaṃkāraṃ vihāyāhaṃ kāmakrodhau ca sarvadā
c sadārān pāṇḍavān nityaṃ prayatopacarāmy aham
a praṇayaṃ pratisaṃgṛhya nidhāyātmānam ātmani
c śuśrūṣur nirabhīmānā patīnāṃ cittarakṣiṇī
a durvyāhṛtāc chaṅkamānā duḥsthitād duravekṣitāt
c durāsitād durvrajitād iṅgitādhyāsitād api
a sūryavaiśvānaranibhān somakalpān mahārathān
c seve cakṣurhaṇaḥ pārthān ugratejaḥpratāpinaḥ
a devo manuṣyo gandharvo yuvā cāpi svalaṃkṛtaḥ
c dravyavān abhirūpo vā na me 'nyaḥ puruṣo mataḥ
a nābhuktavati nāsnāte nāsaṃviṣṭe ca bhartari
c na saṃviśāmi nāśnāmi sadā karmakareṣv api
a kṣetrād vanād vā grāmād vā bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam
c pratyutthāyābhinandāmi āsanenodakena ca
a pramṛṣṭabhāṇḍā mṛṣṭānnā kāle bhojanadāyinī
c saṃyatā guptadhānyā ca susaṃmṛṣṭaniveśanā
a atiraskṛtasaṃbhāṣā duḥstriyo nānusevatī
c anukūlavatī nityaṃ bhavāmy analasā sadā
a anarme cāpi hasanaṃ dvāri sthānam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
c avaskare cirasthānaṃ niṣkuṭeṣu ca varjaye
d niratāhaṃ sadā satye pāpānāṃ ca visarjane
d atyālāpam asaṃtoṣaṃ paravyāpārasaṃkathāḥ
a atihāsātiroṣau ca krodhasthānaṃ ca varjaye
c niratāhaṃ sadā satye bhartṝṇām upasevane
e sarvathā bhartṛrahitaṃ na mameṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana
a yadā pravasate bhartā kuṭumbārthena kena cit
c sumanovarṇakāpetā bhavāmi vratacāriṇī
a yac ca bhartā na pibati yac ca bhartā na khādati
c yac ca nāśnāti me bhartā sarvaṃ tad varjayāmy aham
a yathopadeśaṃ niyatā vartamānā varāṅgane
c svalaṃkṛtā suprayatā bhartuḥ priyahite ratā
a ye ca dharmāḥ kuṭumbeṣu śvaśrvā me kathitāḥ purā
b anutiṣṭhāmi taṃ satye nityakālam atandritā
c bhikṣābaliśrāddham iti sthālīpākāś ca parvasu
e mānyānāṃ mānasatkārā ye cānye viditā mayā
a tān sarvān anuvartāmi divārātram atandritā
c vinayān niyamāṃś cāpi sadā sarvātmanā śritā
a mṛdūn sataḥ satyaśīlān satyadharmānupālinaḥ
c āśīviṣān iva kruddhān patīn paricarāmy aham
a patyāśrayo hi me dharmo mataḥ strīṇāṃ sanātanaḥ
c sa devaḥ sā gatir nānyā tasya kā vipriyaṃ caret
a ahaṃ patīn nātiśaye nātyaśne nātibhūṣaye
c nāpi parivade śvaśrūṃ sarvadā pariyantritā
a avadhānena subhage nityotthānatayaiva ca
c bhartāro vaśagā mahyaṃ guruśuśrūṣaṇena ca
a nityam āryām ahaṃ kuntīṃ vīrasūṃ satyavādinīm
c svayaṃ paricarāmy ekā snānācchādanabhojanaiḥ
a naitām atiśaye jātu vastrabhūṣaṇabhojanaiḥ
c nāpi parivade cāhaṃ tāṃ pṛthāṃ pṛthivīsamām
a aṣṭāv agre brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasrāṇi sma nityadā
c bhuñjate rukmapātrīṣu yudhiṣṭhiraniveśane
a aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi snātakā gṛhamedhinaḥ
c triṃśaddāsīka ekaiko yān bibharti yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a daśānyāni sahasrāṇi yeṣām annaṃ susaṃskṛtam
c hriyate rukmapātrībhir yatīnām ūrdhvaretasām
a tān sarvān agrahāreṇa brāhmaṇān brahmavādinaḥ
c yathārhaṃ pūjayāmi sma pānācchādanabhojanaiḥ
a śataṃ dāsīsahasrāṇi kaunteyasya mahātmanaḥ
c kambukeyūradhāriṇyo niṣkakaṇṭhyaḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
a mahārhamālyābharaṇāḥ suvarṇāś candanokṣitāḥ
c maṇīn hema ca bibhratyo nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ
a tāsāṃ nāma ca rūpaṃ ca bhojanācchādanāni ca
c sarvāsām eva vedāhaṃ karma caiva kṛtākṛtam
a śataṃ dāsīsahasrāṇi kuntīputrasya dhīmataḥ
c pātrīhastā divārātram atithīn bhojayanty uta
a śatam aśvasahasrāṇi daśa nāgāyutāni ca
c yudhiṣṭhirasyānuyātram indraprasthanivāsinaḥ
a etad āsīt tadā rājño yan mahīṃ paryapālayat
c yeṣāṃ saṃkhyāvidhiṃ caiva pradiśāmi śṛṇomi ca
a antaḥpurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhṛtyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
c ā gopālāvipālebhyaḥ sarvaṃ veda kṛtākṛtam
a sarvaṃ rājñaḥ samudayam āyaṃ ca vyayam eva ca
c ekāhaṃ vedmi kalyāṇi pāṇḍavānāṃ yaśasvinām
a mayi sarvaṃ samāsajya kuṭumbaṃ bharatarṣabhāḥ
c upāsanaratāḥ sarve ghaṭante sma śubhānane
a tam ahaṃ bhāram āsaktam anādhṛṣyaṃ durātmabhiḥ
c sukhaṃ sarvaṃ parityajya rātryahāni ghaṭāmi vai
a adhṛṣyaṃ varuṇasyeva nidhipūrṇam ivodadhim
c ekāhaṃ vedmi kośaṃ vai patīnāṃ dharmacāriṇām
a aniśāyāṃ niśāyāṃ ca sahāyāḥ kṣutpipāsayoḥ
c ārādhayantyāḥ kauravyāṃs tulyā rātrir ahaś ca me
a prathamaṃ pratibudhyāmi caramaṃ saṃviśāmi ca
c nityakālam ahaṃ satye etat saṃvananaṃ mama
a etaj jānāmy ahaṃ kartuṃ bhartṛsaṃvananaṃ mahat
c asatstrīṇāṃ samācāraṃ nāhaṃ kuryāṃ na kāmaye
a tac chrutvā dharmasahitaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ kṛṣṇayā tadā
c uvāca satyā satkṛtya pāñcālīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
a abhipannāsmi pāñcāli yājñaseni kṣamasva me
c kāmakāraḥ sakhīnāṃ hi sopahāsaṃ prabhāṣitum
 draupady uvāca
a imaṃ tu te mārgam apetadoṣaṃ
vakṣyāmi cittagrahaṇāya bhartuḥ
c yasmin yathāvat sakhi vartamānā
bhartāram ācchetsyasi kāminībhyaḥ
a naitādṛśaṃ daivatam asti satye
sarveṣu lokeṣu sadaivateṣu
c yathā patis tasya hi sarvakāmā
labhyāḥ prasāde kupitaś ca hanyāt
a tasmād apatyaṃ vividhāś ca bhogāḥ
śayyāsanāny adbhutadarśanāni
c vastrāṇi mālyāni tathaiva gandhāḥ
svargaś ca loko viṣamā ca kīrtiḥ
a sukhaṃ sukheneha na jātu labhyaṃ
duḥkhena sādhvī labhate sukhāni
c sā kṛṣṇam ārādhaya sauhṛdena
premṇā ca nityaṃ pratikarmaṇā ca
a tathāśanaiś cārubhir agryamālyair
dākṣiṇyayogair vividhaiś ca gandhaiḥ
c asyāḥ priyo 'smīti yathā viditvā
tvām eva saṃśliṣyati sarvabhāvaiḥ
a śrutvā svaraṃ dvāragatasya bhartuḥ
pratyutthitā tiṣṭha gṛhasya madhye
c dṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaṃ tvaritāsanena
pādyena caiva pratipūjaya tvam
a saṃpreṣitāyām atha caiva dāsyām
utthāya sarvaṃ svayam eva kuryāḥ
c jānātu kṛṣṇas tava bhāvam etaṃ
sarvātmanā māṃ bhajatīti satye
a tvatsaṃnidhau yat kathayet patis te
yady apy aguhyaṃ parirakṣitavyam
c kā cit sapatnī tava vāsudevaṃ
pratyādiśet tena bhaved virāgaḥ
a priyāṃś ca raktāṃś ca hitāṃś ca bhartus
tān bhojayethā vividhair upāyaiḥ
c dveṣyair apakṣair ahitaiś ca tasya
bhidyasva nityaṃ kuhakoddhataiś ca
a madaṃ pramādaṃ puruṣeṣu hitvā
saṃyaccha bhāvaṃ pratigṛhya maunam
c pradyumnasāmbāv api te kumārau
nopāsitavyau rahite kadā cit
a mahākulīnābhir apāpikābhiḥ
strībhiḥ satībhis tava sakhyam astu
c caṇḍāś ca śauṇḍāś ca mahāśanāś ca
caurāś ca duṣṭāś capalāś ca varjyāḥ
a etad yaśasyaṃ bhagavedanaṃ ca
svargyaṃ tathā śatrunibarhaṇaṃ ca
c mahārhamālyābharaṇāṅgarāgā
bhartāram ārādhaya puṇyagandhā
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a mārkaṇḍeyādibhir vipraiḥ pāṇḍavaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
c kathābhir anukūlābhiḥ sahāsitvā janārdanaḥ
a tatas taiḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā yathāvan madhusūdanaḥ
c ārurukṣū rathaṃ satyām āhvayām āsa keśavaḥ
a satyabhāmā tatas tatra svajitvā drupadātmajām
c uvāca vacanaṃ hṛdyaṃ yathābhāvasamāhitam
a kṛṣṇe mā bhūt tavotkaṇṭhā mā vyathā mā prajāgaraḥ
c bhartṛbhir devasaṃkāśair jitāṃ prāpsyasi medinīm
a na hy evaṃ śīlasaṃpannā naivaṃ pūjitalakṣaṇāḥ
c prāpnuvanti ciraṃ kleśaṃ yathā tvam asitekṣaṇe
a avaśyaṃ ca tvayā bhūmir iyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakā
c bhartṛbhiḥ saha bhoktavyā nirdvaṃdveti śrutaṃ mayā
a dhārtarāṣṭravadhaṃ kṛtvā vairāṇi pratiyātya ca
c yudhiṣṭhirasthāṃ pṛthivīṃ draṣṭāsi drupadātmaje
a yās tāḥ pravrājamānāṃ tvāṃ prāhasan darpamohitāḥ
c tāḥ kṣipraṃ hatasaṃkalpā drakṣyasi tvaṃ kurustriyaḥ
a tava duḥkhopapannāyā yair ācaritam apriyam
c viddhi saṃprasthitān sarvāṃs tān kṛṣṇe yamasādanam
d ye ca tatra sthitā rājñi tatpakṣīyāḥ kṣitīśvarāḥ
d teṣāṃ kālaḥ kṣitīśānāṃ prāptaḥ kṛṣṇe durāsadaḥ
a putras te prativindhyaś ca sutasomas tathā vibhuḥ
c śrutakarmārjuniś caiva śatānīkaś ca nākuliḥ
e sahadevāc ca yo jātaḥ śrutasenas tavātmajaḥ
a sarve kuśalino vīrāḥ kṛtāstrāś ca sutās tava
c abhimanyur iva prītā dvāravatyāṃ ratā bhṛśam
a tvam ivaiṣāṃ subhadrā ca prītyā sarvātmanā sthitā
c prīyate bhāvanirdvaṃdvā tebhyaś ca vigatajvarā
d duḥkhitā tena duḥkhena sukhena sukhitā tathā
a bheje sarvātmanā caiva pradyumnajananī tathā
c bhānuprabhṛtibhiś cainān viśinaṣṭi ca keśavaḥ
a bhojanācchādane caiṣāṃ nityaṃ me śvaśuraḥ sthitaḥ
c rāmaprabhṛtayaḥ sarve bhajanty andhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
e tulyo hi praṇayas teṣāṃ pradyumnasya ca bhāmini
a evamādi priyaṃ prītyā hṛdyam uktvā manonugam
c gamanāya manaś cakre vāsudevarathaṃ prati
a tāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ kṛṣṇamahiṣī cakārābhipradakṣiṇam
c āruroha rathaṃ śaureḥ satyabhāmā ca bhāminī
a smayitvā tu yaduśreṣṭho draupadīṃ parisāntvya ca
c upāvartya tataḥ śīghrair hayaiḥ prāyāt paraṃtapaḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a evaṃ vane vartamānā narāgryāḥ
śītoṣṇavātātapakarśitāṅgāḥ
c saras tad āsādya vanaṃ ca puṇyaṃ
tataḥ paraṃ kim akurvanta pārthāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a saras tad āsādya tu pāṇḍuputrā
janaṃ samutsṛjya vidhāya caiṣām
c vanāni ramyāṇy atha parvatāṃś ca
nadīpradeśāṃś ca tadā viceruḥ
a tathā vane tān vasataḥ pravīrān
svādhyāyavantaś ca tapodhanāś ca
c abhyāyayur vedavidaḥ purāṇās
tān pūjayām āsur atho narāgryāḥ
a tataḥ kadā cit kuśalaḥ kathāsu
vipro 'bhyagacchad bhuvi kauraveyān
c sa taiḥ sametyātha yadṛcchayaiva
vaicitravīryaṃ nṛpam abhyagacchat
a athopaviṣṭaḥ pratisatkṛtaś ca
vṛddhena rājñā kurusattamena
c pracoditaḥ san kathayāṃ babhūva
dharmānilendraprabhavān yamau ca
a kṛśāṃś ca vātātapakarśitāṅgān
duḥkhasya cograsya mukhe prapannān
c tāṃ cāpy anāthām iva vīranāthāṃ
kṛṣṇāṃ parikleśaguṇena yuktām
a tataḥ kathāṃ tasya niśamya rājā
vaicitravīryaḥ kṛpayābhitaptaḥ
c vane sthitān pārthivaputrapautrāñ
śrutvā tadā duḥkhanadīṃ prapannān
a provāca dainyābhihatāntarātmā
niḥśvāsabāṣpopahataḥ sa pārthān
c vācaṃ kathaṃ cit sthiratām upetya
tat sarvam ātmaprabhavaṃ vicintya
a kathaṃ nu satyaḥ śucir āryavṛtto
jyeṣṭhaḥ sutānāṃ mama dharmarājaḥ
c ajātaśatruḥ pṛthivītalasthaḥ
śete purā rāṅkavakūṭaśāyī
a prabodhyate māgadhasūtapūgair
nityaṃ stuvadbhiḥ svayam indrakalpaḥ
c patatrisaṃghaiḥ sa jaghanyarātre
prabodhyate nūnam iḍātalasthaḥ
a kathaṃ nu vātātapakarśitāṅgo
vṛkodaraḥ kopapariplutāṅgaḥ
c śete pṛthivyām atathocitāṅgaḥ
kṛṣṇāsamakṣaṃ vasudhātalasthaḥ
a tathārjunaḥ sukumāro manasvī
vaśe sthito dharmasutasya rājñaḥ
c vidūyamānair iva sarvagātrair
dhruvaṃ na śete vasatīr amarṣāt
a yamau ca kṛṣṇāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca
bhīmaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sukhaviprayuktān
c viniḥśvasan sarpa ivogratejā
dhruvaṃ na śete vasatīr amarṣāt
a tathā yamau cāpy asukhau sukhārhau
samṛddharūpāv amarau divīva
c prajāgarasthau dhruvam apraśāntau
dharmeṇa satyena ca vāryamāṇau
a samīraṇenāpi samo balena
samīraṇasyaiva suto balīyān
c sa dharmapāśena sitogratejā
dhruvaṃ viniḥśvasya sahaty amarṣam
a sa cāpi bhūmau parivartamāno
vadhaṃ sutānāṃ mama kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ
c satyena dharmeṇa ca vāryamāṇaḥ
kālaṃ pratīkṣaty adhiko raṇe 'nyaiḥ
a ajātaśatrau tu jite nikṛtyā
duḥśāsano yat paruṣāṇy avocat
c tāni praviṣṭāni vṛkodarāṅgaṃ
dahanti marmāgnir ivendhanāni
a na pāpakaṃ dhyāsyati dharmaputro
dhanaṃjayaś cāpy anuvartate tam
c araṇyavāsena vivardhate tu
bhīmasya kopo 'gnir ivānilena
a sa tena kopena vidīryamāṇaḥ
karaṃ kareṇābhinipīḍya vīraḥ
c viniḥśvasaty uṣṇam atīva ghoraṃ
dahann ivemān mama putrapautrān
a gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca vṛkodaraś ca
saṃrambhiṇāv antakakālakalpau
c na śeṣayetāṃ yudhi śatrusenāṃ
śarān kirantāv aśaniprakāśān
a duryodhanaḥ śakuniḥ sūtaputro
duḥśāsanaś cāpi sumandacetāḥ
c madhu prapaśyanti na tu prapātaṃ
vṛkodaraṃ caiva dhanaṃjayaṃ ca
a śubhāśubhaṃ puruṣaḥ karma kṛtvā
pratīkṣate tasya phalaṃ sma kartā
c sa tena yujyaty avaśaḥ phalena
mokṣaḥ kathaṃ syāt puruṣasya tasmāt
a kṣetre sukṛṣṭe hy upite ca bīje
deve ca varṣaty ṛtukālayuktam
c na syāt phalaṃ tasya kutaḥ prasiddhir
anyatra daivād iti cintayāmi
a kṛtaṃ matākṣeṇa yathā na sādhu
sādhupravṛttena ca pāṇḍavena
c mayā ca duṣputravaśānugena
yathā kurūṇām ayam antakālaḥ
a dhruvaṃ pravāsyaty asamīrito 'pi
dhruvaṃ prajāsyaty uta garbhiṇī yā
c dhruvaṃ dinādau rajanīpraṇāśas
tathā kṣapādau ca dinapraṇāśaḥ
a kriyeta kasmān na pare ca kuryur
vittaṃ na dadyuḥ puruṣāḥ kathaṃ cit
c prāpyārthakālaṃ ca bhaved anarthaḥ
kathaṃ nu tat syād iti tat kutaḥ syāt
a kathaṃ na bhidyeta na ca sraveta
na ca prasicyed iti rakṣitavyam
c arakṣyamāṇaḥ śatadhā viśīryed
dhruvaṃ na nāśo 'sti kṛtasya loke
a gato hy araṇyād api śakralokaṃ
dhanaṃjayaḥ paśyata vīryam asya
c astrāṇi divyāni caturvidhāni
jñātvā punar lokam imaṃ prapannaḥ
a svargaṃ hi gatvā saśarīra eva
ko mānuṣaḥ punar āgantum icchet
c anyatra kālopahatān anekān
samīkṣamāṇas tu kurūn mumūrṣūn
a dhanurgrāhaś cārjunaḥ savyasācī
dhanuś ca tad gāṇḍivaṃ lokasāram
c astrāṇi divyāni ca tāni tasya
trayasya tejaḥ prasaheta ko nu
a niśamya tad vacanaṃ pārthivasya
duryodhano rahite saubalaś ca
c abodhayat karṇam upetya sarvaṃ
sa cāpy ahṛṣṭo 'bhavad alpacetāḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a dhṛtarāṣṭrasya tad vākyaṃ niśamya sahasaubalaḥ
c duryodhanam idaṃ kāle karṇo vacanam abravīt
a pravrājya pāṇḍavān vīrān svena vīryeṇa bhārata
c bhuṅkṣvemāṃ pṛthivīm eko divaṃ śambarahā yathā
d tavādya pṛthivī rājan nikhilā sāgarāmbarā
d saparvatavanākārā sahasthāvarajaṅgamā
a prācyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca pratīcyodīcyavāsinaḥ
c kṛtāḥ karapradāḥ sarve rājānas te narādhipa
a yā hi sā dīpyamāneva pāṇḍavān bhajate purā
c sādya lakṣmīs tvayā rājann avāptā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
a indraprasthagate yāṃ tāṃ dīpyamānāṃ yudhiṣṭhire
c apaśyāma śriyaṃ rājann aciraṃ śokakarśitāḥ
c   dṛśyate sā tavādya vai
c śatravas tava rājendra
a sā tu buddhibaleneyaṃ rājñas tasmād yudhiṣṭhirāt
c tvayākṣiptā mahābāho dīpyamāneva dṛśyate
a tathaiva tava rājendra rājānaḥ paravīrahan
c śāsane 'dhiṣṭhitāḥ sarve kiṃ kurma iti vādinaḥ
a tavādya pṛthivī rājan nikhilā sāgarāmbarā
c saparvatavanā devī sagrāmanagarākarā
e nānāvanoddeśavatī pattanair upaśobhitā
f nānājanapadākīrṇā sphītarāṣṭrā mahābalā
a vandyamāno dvijai rājan pūjyamānaś ca rājabhiḥ
c pauruṣād divi deveṣu bhrājase raśmivān iva
a rudrair iva yamo rājā marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ
c kurubhis tvaṃ vṛto rājan bhāsi nakṣatrarāḍ iva
a ye sma te nādriyante ''jñā nodvijante kadā ca na
c paśyāmas tāñ śriyā hīnān pāṇḍavān vanavāsinaḥ
a śrūyante hi mahārāja saro dvaitavanaṃ prati
c vasantaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sārdhaṃ brāhmaṇair vanavāsibhiḥ
a sa prayāhi mahārāja śriyā paramayā yutaḥ
c pratapan pāṇḍuputrāṃs tvaṃ raśmivān iva tejasā
a sthito rājye cyutān rājyāc chriyā hīnāñ śriyā vṛtaḥ
c asamṛddhān samṛddhārthaḥ paśya pāṇḍusutān nṛpa
a mahābhijanasaṃpannaṃ bhadre mahati saṃsthitam
c pāṇḍavās tvābhivīkṣantāṃ yayātim iva nāhuṣam
a yāṃ śriyaṃ suhṛdaś caiva durhṛdaś ca viśāṃ pate
c paśyanti puruṣe dīptāṃ sā samarthā bhavaty uta
a samastho viṣamasthān hi durhṛdo yo 'bhivīkṣate
c jagatīsthān ivādristhaḥ kiṃ tataḥ paramaṃ sukham
a na putradhanalābhena na rājyenāpi vindati
c prītiṃ nṛpatiśārdūla yām amitrāghadarśanāt
a kiṃ nu tasya sukhaṃ na syād āśrame yo dhanaṃjayam
c abhivīkṣeta siddhārtho valkalājinavāsasam
a suvāsaso hi te bhāryā valkalājinavāsasam
c paśyantv asukhitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ sā ca nirvidyatāṃ punaḥ
e vinindatāṃ tathātmānaṃ jīvitaṃ ca dhanacyutā
f dārāṇāṃ te śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīptām adya janādhipa
a na tathā hi sabhāmadhye tasyā bhavitum arhati
c vaimanasyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭvā tava bhāryāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
a evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ karṇaḥ śakuninā saha
c tūṣṇīṃ babhūvatur ubhau vākyānte janamejaya
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a karṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā duryodhanas tadā
c hṛṣṭo bhūtvā punar dīna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a bravīṣi yad idaṃ karṇa sarvaṃ me manasi sthitam
c na tv abhyanujñāṃ lapsyāmi gamane yatra pāṇḍavāḥ
a paridevati tān vīrān dhṛtarāṣṭro mahīpatiḥ
c manyate 'bhyadhikāṃś cāpi tapoyogena pāṇḍavān
a atha vāpy anubudhyeta nṛpo 'smākaṃ cikīrṣitam
c evam apy āyatiṃ rakṣan nābhyanujñātum arhati
a na hi dvaitavane kiṃ cid vidyate 'nyat prayojanam
c utsādanam ṛte teṣāṃ vanasthānāṃ mama dviṣām
a jānāsi hi yathā kṣattā dyūtakāla upasthite
c abravīd yac ca māṃ tvāṃ ca saubalaṃ ca vacas tadā
a tāni pūrvāṇi vākyāni yac cānyat paridevitam
c vicintya nādhigacchāmi gamanāyetarāya vā
a mamāpi hi mahān harṣo yad ahaṃ bhīmaphalgunau
c kliṣṭāv araṇye paśyeyaṃ kṛṣṇayā sahitāv iti
a na tathā prāpnuyāṃ prītim avāpya vasudhām api
c dṛṣṭvā yathā pāṇḍusutān valkalājinavāsasaḥ
a kiṃ nu syād adhikaṃ tasmād yad ahaṃ drupadātmajām
c draupadīṃ karṇa paśyeyaṃ kāṣāyavasanāṃ vane
a yadi māṃ dharmarājaś ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c yuktaṃ paramayā lakṣmyā paśyetāṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet
a upāyaṃ na tu paśyāmi yena gacchema tad vanam
c yathā cābhyanujānīyād gacchantaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ
a sa saubalena sahitas tathā duḥśāsanena ca
c upāyaṃ paśya nipuṇaṃ yena gacchema tad vanam
a aham apy adya niścitya gamanāyetarāya vā
c kālyam eva gamiṣyāmi samīpaṃ pārthivasya ha
a mayi tatropaviṣṭe tu bhīṣme ca kurusattame
c upāyo yo bhaved dṛṣṭas taṃ brūyāḥ sahasaubalaḥ
a tato bhīṣmasya rājñaś ca niśamya gamanaṃ prati
c vyavasāyaṃ kariṣye 'ham anunīya pitāmaham
a tathety uktvā tu te sarve jagmur āvasathān prati
c vyuṣitāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu karṇo rājānam abhyayāt
a tato duryodhanaṃ karṇaḥ prahasann idam abravīt
c upāyaḥ paridṛṣṭo 'yaṃ taṃ nibodha janeśvara
a ghoṣā dvaitavane sarve tvatpratīkṣā narādhipa
c ghoṣayātrāpadeśena gamiṣyāmo na saṃśayaḥ
a ucitaṃ hi sadā gantuṃ ghoṣayātrāṃ viśāṃ pate
c evaṃ ca tvāṃ pitā rājan samanujñātum arhati
a tathā kathayamānau tau ghoṣayātrāviniścayam
c gāndhārarājaḥ śakuniḥ pratyuvāca hasann iva
a upāyo 'yaṃ mayā dṛṣṭo gamanāya nirāmayaḥ
c anujñāsyati no rājā codayiṣyati cāpy uta
a ghoṣā dvaitavane sarve tvatpratīkṣā narādhipa
c ghoṣayātrāpadeśena gamiṣyāmo na saṃśayaḥ
a tataḥ prahasitāḥ sarve te 'nyonyasya talān daduḥ
c tad eva ca viniścitya dadṛśuḥ kurusattamam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ tataḥ sarve dadṛśur janamejaya
c pṛṣṭvā sukham atho rājñaḥ pṛṣṭvā rājñā ca bhārata
a tatas tair vihitaḥ pūrvaṃ samaṅgo nāma ballavaḥ
c samīpasthās tadā gāvo dhṛtarāṣṭre nyavedayat
a anantaraṃ ca rādheyaḥ śakuniś ca viśāṃ pate
c āhatuḥ pārthivaśreṣṭhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ janādhipam
a ramaṇīyeṣu deśeṣu ghoṣāḥ saṃprati kaurava
c smāraṇāsamayaḥ prāpto vatsānām api cāṅkanam
a mṛgayā cocitā rājann asmin kāle sutasya te
c duryodhanasya gamanaṃ tvam anujñātum arhasi
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a mṛgayā śobhanā tāta gavāṃ ca samavekṣaṇam
c viśrambhas tu na gantavyo ballavānām iti smare
a te tu tatra naravyāghrāḥ samīpa iti naḥ śrutam
c ato nābhyanujānāmi gamanaṃ tatra vaḥ svayam
a chadmanā nirjitās te hi karśitāś ca mahāvane
c taponityāś ca rādheya samarthāś ca mahārathāḥ
a dharmarājo na saṃkrudhyed bhīmasenas tv amarṣaṇaḥ
c yajñasenasya duhitā teja eva tu kevalam
a yūyaṃ cāpy aparādhyeyur darpamohasamanvitāḥ
c tato vinirdaheyus te tapasā hi samanvitāḥ
a atha vā sāyudhā vīrā manyunābhipariplutāḥ
c sahitā baddhanistriṃśā daheyuḥ śastratejasā
a atha yūyaṃ bahutvāt tān ārabhadhvaṃ kathaṃ cana
c anāryaṃ paramaṃ tat syād aśakyaṃ tac ca me matam
a uṣito hi mahābāhur indraloke dhanaṃjayaḥ
c divyāny astrāṇy avāpyātha tataḥ pratyāgato vanam
a akṛtāstreṇa pṛthivī jitā bībhatsunā purā
c kiṃ punaḥ sa kṛtāstro 'dya na hanyād vo mahārathaḥ
a atha vā madvacaḥ śrutvā tatra yattā bhaviṣyatha
c udvignavāso viśrambhād duḥkhaṃ tatra bhaviṣyati
a atha vā sainikāḥ ke cid apakuryur yudhiṣṭhire
c tad abuddhikṛtaṃ karma doṣam utpādayec ca vaḥ
a tasmād gacchantu puruṣāḥ smāraṇāyāptakāriṇaḥ
c na svayaṃ tatra gamanaṃ rocaye tava bhārata
 śakunir uvāca
a dharmajñaḥ pāṇḍavo jyeṣṭhaḥ pratijñātaṃ ca saṃsadi
c tena dvādaśa varṣāṇi vastavyānīti bhārata
a anuvṛttāś ca te sarve pāṇḍavā dharmacāriṇaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiraś ca kaunteyo na naḥ kopaṃ kariṣyati
a mṛgayāṃ caiva no gantum icchā saṃvardhate bhṛśam
c smāraṇaṃ ca cikīrṣāmo na tu pāṇḍavadarśanam
a na cānāryasamācāraḥ kaś cit tatra bhaviṣyati
c na ca tatra gamiṣyāmo yatra teṣāṃ pratiśrayaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktaḥ śakuninā dhṛtarāṣṭro janeśvaraḥ
c duryodhanaṃ sahāmātyam anujajñe na kāmataḥ
a anujñātas tu gāndhāriḥ karṇena sahitas tadā
c niryayau bharataśreṣṭho balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
a duḥśāsanena ca tathā saubalena ca devinā
c saṃvṛto bhrātṛbhiś cānyaiḥ strībhiś cāpi sahasraśaḥ
a taṃ niryāntaṃ mahābāhuṃ draṣṭuṃ dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
c paurāś cānuyayuḥ sarve sahadārā vanaṃ ca tat
a aṣṭau rathasahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca
c pattayo bahusāhasrā hayāś ca navatiḥ śatāḥ
a śakaṭāpaṇaveśyāś ca vaṇijo bandinas tathā
c narāś ca mṛgayāśīlāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a tataḥ prayāṇe nṛpateḥ sumahān abhavat svanaḥ
c prāvṛṣīva mahāvāyor uddhatasya viśāṃ pate
a gavyūtimātre nyavasad rājā duryodhanas tadā
c prayāto vāhanaiḥ sarvais tato dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a atha duryodhano rājā tatra tatra vane vasan
c jagāma ghoṣān abhitas tatra cakre niveśanam
a ramaṇīye samājñāte sodake samahīruhe
c deśe sarvaguṇopete cakrur āvasathaṃ narāḥ
a tathaiva tatsamīpasthān pṛthagāvasathān bahūn
c karṇasya śakuneś caiva bhrātṝṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ
a dadarśa sa tadā gāvaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
c aṅkair lakṣaiś ca tāḥ sarvā lakṣayām āsa pārthivaḥ
a aṅkayām āsa vatsāṃś ca jajñe copasṛtās tv api
c bālavatsāś ca yā gāvaḥ kālayām āsa tā api
a atha sa smāraṇaṃ kṛtvā lakṣayitvā trihāyanān
c vṛto gopālakaiḥ prīto vyaharat kurunandanaḥ
a sa ca paurajanaḥ sarvaḥ sainikāś ca sahasraśaḥ
c yathopajoṣaṃ cikrīḍur vane tasmin yathāmarāḥ
a tato gopāḥ pragātāraḥ kuśalā nṛttavādite
c dhārtarāṣṭram upātiṣṭhan kanyāś caiva svalaṃkṛtāḥ
a sa strīgaṇavṛto rājā prahṛṣṭaḥ pradadau vasu
c tebhyo yathārham annāni pānāni vividhāni ca
a tatas te sahitāḥ sarve tarakṣūn mahiṣān mṛgān
c gavayarkṣavarāhāṃś ca samantāt paryakālayan
a sa tāñ śarair vinirbhindan gajān badhnan mahāvane
c ramaṇīyeṣu deśeṣu grāhayām āsa vai mṛgān
a gorasān upayuñjāna upabhogāṃś ca bhārata
c paśyan suramaṇīyāni puṣpitāni vanāni ca
a mattabhramarajuṣṭāni barhiṇābhirutāni ca
c agacchad ānupūrvyeṇa puṇyaṃ dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
d mattabhramarasaṃjuṣṭaṃ nīlakaṇṭharavākulam
d saptacchadasamākīrṇaṃ puṃnāgabakulair yutam
e ṛddhyā paramayā yukto mahendra iva vajrabhṛt
a yadṛcchayā ca tadaho dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c īje rājarṣiyajñena sadyaskena viśāṃ pate
e divyena vidhinā rājā vanyena kurusattamaḥ
f vidvadbhiḥ sahito dhīmān brāhmaṇair vanavāsibhiḥ
a kṛtvā niveśam abhitaḥ sarasas tasya kauravaḥ
c draupadyā sahito dhīmān dharmapatnyā narādhipaḥ
d bhīmārjunayamaiḥ sārdhaṃ sarābhyāśe tadāvasat
a tato duryodhanaḥ preṣyān ādideśa sahānujaḥ
c ākrīḍāvasathāḥ kṣipraṃ kriyantām iti bhārata
a te tathety eva kauravyam uktvā vacanakāriṇaḥ
c cikīrṣantas tadākrīḍāñ jagmur dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
a senāgraṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya prāptaṃ dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
c praviśantaṃ vanadvāri gandharvāḥ samavārayan
a tatra gandharvarājo vai pūrvam eva viśāṃ pate
c kuberabhavanād rājann ājagāma gaṇāvṛtaḥ
a gaṇair apsarasāṃ caiva tridaśānāṃ tathātmajaiḥ
c vihāraśīlaḥ krīḍārthaṃ tena tat saṃvṛtaṃ saraḥ
a tena tat saṃvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā te rājaparicārakāḥ
c pratijagmus tato rājan yatra duryodhano nṛpaḥ
d te sametya tadā procur gantuṃ naivopalabhyate
d rakṣitaṃ bahubhiḥ śūrai rājan dvaitavanaṃ saraḥ
d nyavedayaṃs tato rājñe gandharvās tatra bhārata
a sa tu teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sainikān yuddhadurmadān
c preṣayām āsa kauravya utsārayata tān iti
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājñaḥ senāgrayāyinaḥ
c saro dvaitavanaṃ gatvā gandharvān idam abruvan
a rājā duryodhano nāma dhṛtarāṣṭrasuto balī

c āgneyenārjunaḥ saṃkhye gandharvāṇāṃ balotkaṭaḥ
a tathā bhīmo maheṣvāsaḥ saṃyuge balināṃ varaḥ
c gandharvāñ śataśo rājañ jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
a mādrīputrāv api tathā yudhyamānau balotkaṭau
c parigṛhyāgrato rājañ jaghnatuḥ śataśaḥ parān
a te vadhyamānā gandharvā divyair astrair mahātmabhiḥ
c utpetuḥ kham upādāya dhṛtarāṣṭrasutāṃs tataḥ
a tān utpatiṣṇūn buddhvā tu kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
c mahatā śarajālena samantāt paryavārayat
a te baddhāḥ śarajālena śakuntā iva pañjare
c vavarṣur arjunaṃ krodhād gadāśaktyṛṣṭivṛṣṭibhiḥ
a gadāśaktyasivṛṣṭīs tā nihatya sa mahāstravit
c gātrāṇi cāhanad bhallair gandharvāṇāṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
a śirobhiḥ prapatadbhiś ca caraṇair bāhubhis tathā
c aśmavṛṣṭir ivābhāti pareṣām abhavad bhayam
a te vadhyamānā gandharvāḥ pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
c bhūmiṣṭham antarikṣasthāḥ śaravarṣair avākiran
a teṣāṃ tu śaravarṣāṇi savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ
c astraiḥ saṃvārya tejasvī gandharvān pratyavidhyata
a sthūṇākarṇendrajālaṃ ca sauraṃ cāpi tathārjunaḥ
c āgneyaṃ cāpi saumyaṃ ca sasarja kurunandanaḥ
a te dahyamānā gandharvāḥ kuntīputrasya sāyakaiḥ
c daiteyā iva śakreṇa viṣādam agaman param
a ūrdhvam ākramamāṇāś ca śarajālena vāritāḥ
c visarpamāṇā bhallaiś ca vāryante savyasācinā
a gandharvāṃs trāsitān dṛṣṭvā kuntīputreṇa dhīmatā
c citraseno gadāṃ gṛhya savyasācinam ādravat
a tasyābhipatatas tūrṇaṃ gadāhastasya saṃyuge
c gadāṃ sarvāyasīṃ pārthaḥ śaraiś ciccheda saptadhā
a sa gadāṃ bahudhā dṛṣṭvā kṛttāṃ bāṇais tarasvinā
c saṃvṛtya vidyayātmānaṃ yodhayām āsa pāṇḍavam
e astrāṇi tasya divyāni yodhayām āsa khe sthitaḥ
f divyair astrais tadā vīraḥ paryavārayad arjunaḥ
f sa vāryamāṇas tair astrair arjunena mahātmanā
a gandharvarājo balavān māyayāntarhitas tadā
c antarhitaṃ samālakṣya praharantam athārjunaḥ
e tāḍayām āsa khacarair divyāstrapratimantritaiḥ
a antardhānavadhaṃ cāsya cakre kruddho 'rjunas tadā
c śabdavedhyam upāśritya bahurūpo dhanaṃjayaḥ
a sa vadhyamānas tair astrair arjunena mahātmanā
c athāsya darśayām āsa tadātmānaṃ priyaḥ sakhā
d citrasenas tathovāca sakhāyaṃ yudhi viddhi mām
a citrasenam athālakṣya sakhāyaṃ yudhi durbalam
c saṃjahārāstram atha tat prasṛṣṭaṃ pāṇḍavarṣabhaḥ
a dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve saṃhṛtāstraṃ dhanaṃjayam
c saṃjahruḥ pradrutān aśvāñ śaravegān dhanūṃṣi ca
a citrasenaś ca bhīmaś ca savyasācī yamāv api
c pṛṣṭvā kauśalam anyonyaṃ ratheṣv evāvatasthire
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato 'rjunaś citrasenaṃ prahasann idam abravīt
c madhye gandharvasainyānāṃ maheṣvāso mahādyutiḥ
a kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ vīra kauravāṇāṃ vinigrahe
c kimarthaṃ ca sadāro 'yaṃ nigṛhītaḥ suyodhanaḥ
 citrasena uvāca
a vidito 'yam abhiprāyas tatrasthena mahātmanā
c duryodhanasya pāpasya karṇasya ca dhanaṃjaya
a vanasthān bhavato jñātvā kliśyamānān anarhavat
c ime 'vahasituṃ prāptā draupadīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
d samastho viṣamasthāṃs tān drakṣyāmīty anavasthitān
a jñātvā cikīrṣitaṃ caiṣāṃ mām uvāca sureśvaraḥ
c gaccha duryodhanaṃ baddhvā sāmātyaṃ tvam ihānaya
a dhanaṃjayaś ca te rakṣyaḥ saha bhrātṛbhir āhave
c sa hi priyaḥ sakhā tubhyaṃ śiṣyaś ca tava pāṇḍavaḥ
a vacanād devarājasya tato 'smīhāgato drutam
c ayaṃ durātmā baddhaś ca gamiṣyāmi surālayam
d neṣyāmy enaṃ durātmānaṃ pākaśāsanaśāsanāt
 arjuna uvāca
a utsṛjyatāṃ citrasena bhrātāsmākaṃ suyodhanaḥ
c dharmarājasya saṃdeśān mama ced icchasi priyam
 citrasena uvāca
a pāpo 'yaṃ nityasaṃduṣṭo na vimokṣaṇam arhati
c pralabdhā dharmarājasya kṛṣṇāyāś ca dhanaṃjaya
a nedaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ tasya kuntīputro mahāvrataḥ
c jānāti dharmarājo hi śrutvā kuru yathecchasi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a te sarva eva rājānam abhijagmur yudhiṣṭhiram
c abhigamya ca tat sarvaṃ śaśaṃsus tasya duṣkṛtam
a ajātaśatrus tac chrutvā gandharvasya vacas tadā
c mokṣayām āsa tān sarvān gandharvān praśaśaṃsa ca
a diṣṭyā bhavadbhir balibhiḥ śaktaiḥ sarvair na hiṃsitaḥ
c durvṛtto dhārtarāṣṭro 'yaṃ sāmātyajñātibāndhavaḥ
a upakāro mahāṃs tāta kṛto 'yaṃ mama khecarāḥ
c kulaṃ na paribhūtaṃ me mokṣeṇāsya durātmanaḥ
a ājñāpayadhvam iṣṭāni prīyāmo darśanena vaḥ
c prāpya sarvān abhiprāyāṃs tato vrajata māciram
a anujñātās tu gandharvāḥ pāṇḍuputreṇa dhīmatā
c sahāpsarobhiḥ saṃhṛṣṭāś citrasenamukhā yayuḥ
d devalokaṃ tato gatvā gandharvaiḥ sahitās tadā
d nyavedayac ca tat sarvaṃ citrasenaḥ śatakratoḥ
a devarāḍ api gandharvān mṛtāṃs tān samajīvayat
c divyenāmṛtavarṣeṇa ye hatāḥ kauravair yudhi
d citrasenas tadā vākyam uvāca prauḍhayā girā
d muñcadhvaṃ sānujāmātyaṃ sadāraṃ ca suyodhanam
d gandharvās tu vacaḥ śrutvā citrasenasya vai drutam
d rājānaṃ mokṣayām āsur baddhaṃ nigaḍabandhanaiḥ
d sadāraṃ sānugāmātyaṃ bāṇajālamaye vane
d luṭhantaś cāpi te sarve yudhiṣṭhirasamīpataḥ
d patitā lajjitāś caiva tasthuś cādhomukhās tadā
d yudhiṣṭhiro 'pi dayayā tān samīkṣya tathāgatān
a jñātīṃs tān avamucyātha rājadārāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
c kṛtvā ca duṣkaraṃ karma prītiyuktāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
a sastrīkumāraiḥ kurubhiḥ pūjyamānā mahārathāḥ
c babhrājire mahātmānaḥ kurumadhye yathāgnayaḥ
a tato duryodhanaṃ mucya bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaṃ tadā
c yudhiṣṭhiraḥ sapraṇayam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a mā sma tāta punaḥ kārṣīr īdṛśaṃ sāhasaṃ kva cit
c na hi sāhasakartāraḥ sukham edhanti bhārata
a svastimān sahitaḥ sarvair bhrātṛbhiḥ kurunandana
c gṛhān vraja yathākāmaṃ vaimanasyaṃ ca mā kṛthāḥ
a pāṇḍavenābhyanujñāto rājā duryodhanas tadā
b abhivādya dharmaputraṃ gatendriya ivāturaḥ
c vidīryamāṇo vrīḍena jagāma nagaraṃ prati
a tasmin gate kauraveye kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vīraḥ pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥ
a tapodhanaiś ca taiḥ sarvair vṛtaḥ śakra ivāmaraiḥ
c vane dvaitavane tasmin vijahāra mudā yutaḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a śatrubhir jitabaddhasya pāṇḍavaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
c mokṣitasya yudhā paścān mānasthasya durātmanaḥ
a katthanasyāvaliptasya garvitasya ca nityaśaḥ
c sadā ca pauruṣaudāryaiḥ pāṇḍavān avamanyataḥ
a duryodhanasya pāpasya nityāhaṃkāravādinaḥ
c praveśo hāstinapure duṣkaraḥ pratibhāti me
a tasya lajjānvitasyaiva śokavyākulacetasaḥ
c praveśaṃ vistareṇa tvaṃ vaiśaṃpāyana kīrtaya
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a dharmarājanisṛṣṭas tu dhārtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanaḥ
c lajjayādhomukhaḥ sīdann upāsarpat suduḥkhitaḥ
a svapuraṃ prayayau rājā caturaṅgabalānugaḥ
c śokopahatayā buddhyā cintayānaḥ parābhavam
a vimucya pathi yānāni deśe suyavasodake
c saṃniviṣṭaḥ śubhe ramye bhūmibhāge yathepsitam
e hastyaśvarathapādātaṃ yathāsthānaṃ nyaveśayat
a athopaviṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ paryaṅke jvalanaprabhe
c upaplutaṃ yathā somaṃ rāhuṇā rātrisaṃkṣaye
e upagamyābravīt karṇo duryodhanam idaṃ tadā
a diṣṭyā jīvasi gāndhāre diṣṭyā naḥ saṃgamaḥ punaḥ
c diṣṭyā tvayā jitāś caiva gandharvāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
a diṣṭyā samagrān paśyāmi bhrātṝṃs te kurunandana
c vijigīṣūn raṇān muktān nirjitārīn mahārathān
a ahaṃ tv abhidrutaḥ sarvair gandharvaiḥ paśyatas tava
c nāśaknuvaṃ sthāpayituṃ dīryamāṇāṃ svavāhinīm
a śarakṣatāṅgaś ca bhṛśaṃ vyapayāto 'bhipīḍitaḥ
c idaṃ tv atyadbhutaṃ manye yad yuṣmān iha bhārata
a ariṣṭān akṣatāṃś cāpi sadāradhanavāhanān
c vimuktān saṃprapaśyāmi tasmād yuddhād amānuṣāt
a naitasya kartā loke 'smin pumān vidyeta bhārata
c yatkṛtaṃ te mahārāja saha bhrātṛbhir āhave
a evam uktas tu karṇena rājā duryodhanas tadā
c uvācāvākśirā rājan bāṣpagadgadayā girā
 duryodhana uvāca
a ajānatas te rādheya nābhyasūyāmy ahaṃ vacaḥ
c jānāsi tvaṃ jitāñ śatrūn gandharvāṃs tejasā mayā
a āyodhitās tu gandharvāḥ suciraṃ sodarair mama
c mayā saha mahābāho kṛtaś cobhayataḥ kṣayaḥ
a māyādhikās tv ayudhyanta yadā śūrā viyadgatāḥ
c tadā no nasamaṃ yuddham abhavat saha khecaraiḥ
d asamarthās tatas tāṃs tu pratiyoddhuṃ viyadgatān
a parājayaṃ ca prāptāḥ sma raṇe bandhanam eva ca
c sabhṛtyāmātyaputrāś ca sadāradhanavāhanāḥ
e uccair ākāśamārgeṇa hriyāmas taiḥ suduḥkhitāḥ
a atha naḥ sainikāḥ ke cid amātyāś ca mahārathān
c upagamyābruvan dīnāḥ pāṇḍavāñ śaraṇapradān
a eṣa duryodhano rājā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ sahānujaḥ
c sāmātyadāro hriyate gandharvair divam āsthitaiḥ
a taṃ mokṣayata bhadraṃ vaḥ sahadāraṃ narādhipam
c parāmarśo mā bhaviṣyat kurudāreṣu sarvaśaḥ
d ity abruvan raṇān muktā dharmarājam upāgatāḥ
a evam ukte tu dharmātmā jyeṣṭhaḥ pāṇḍusutas tadā
c prasādya sodarān sarvān ājñāpayata mokṣaṇe
a athāgamya tam uddeśaṃ pāṇḍavāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c sāntvapūrvam ayācanta śaktāḥ santo mahārathāḥ
a yadā cāsmān na mumucur gandharvāḥ sāntvitā api
b ākāśacāriṇo vīrā nadanto jaladā iva
c tato 'rjunaś ca bhīmaś ca yamajau ca balotkaṭau
e mumucuḥ śaravarṣāṇi gandharvān pratyanekaśaḥ
a atha sarve raṇaṃ muktvā prayātāḥ khacarā divam
c asmān evābhikarṣanto dīnān muditamānasāḥ
a tataḥ samantāt paśyāmi śarajālena veṣṭitam
c amānuṣāṇi cāstrāṇi prayuñjānaṃ dhanaṃjayam
a samāvṛtā diśo dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavena śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
c dhanaṃjayasakhātmānaṃ darśayām āsa vai tadā
a citrasenaḥ pāṇḍavena samāśliṣya paraṃtapaḥ
c kuśalaṃ paripapraccha taiḥ pṛṣṭaś cāpy anāmayam
a te sametya tathānyonyaṃ saṃnāhān vipramucya ca
c ekībhūtās tato vīrā gandharvāḥ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
d parasparaṃ samāgamya prītyā paramayā yutāḥ
e apūjayetām anyonyaṃ citrasenadhanaṃjayau
 duryodhana uvāca
a citrasenaṃ samāgamya prahasann arjunas tadā
c idaṃ vacanam aklībam abravīt paravīrahā
a bhrātṝn arhasi no vīra moktuṃ gandharvasattama
c anarhā dharṣaṇaṃ hīme jīvamāneṣu pāṇḍuṣu
a evam uktas tu gandharvaḥ pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
c uvāca yat karṇa vayaṃ mantrayanto vinirgatāḥ
e draṣṭāraḥ sma sukhād dhīnān sadārān pāṇḍavān iti
f sthito rājye cyutān sthānāc chriyā hīnāñ śriyāvṛtāḥ
a tasminn uccāryamāṇe tu gandharveṇa vacasy atha
c bhūmer vivaram anvaicchaṃ praveṣṭuṃ vrīḍayānvitaḥ
a yudhiṣṭhiram athāgamya gandharvāḥ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
c asmaddurmantritaṃ tasmai baddhāṃś cāsmān nyavedayan
a strīsamakṣam ahaṃ dīno baddhaḥ śatruvaśaṃ gataḥ
c yudhiṣṭhirasyopahṛtaḥ kiṃ nu duḥkham ataḥ param
a ye me nirākṛtā nityaṃ ripur yeṣām ahaṃ sadā
c tair mokṣito 'haṃ durbuddhir dattaṃ tair jīvitaṃ ca me
a prāptaḥ syāṃ yady ahaṃ vīra vadhaṃ tasmin mahāraṇe
c śreyas tad bhavitā mahyam evaṃbhūtaṃ na jīvitam
a bhaved yaśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ me khyātaṃ gandharvato vadhāt
c prāptāś ca lokāḥ puṇyāḥ syur mahendrasadane 'kṣayāḥ
a yat tv adya me vyavasitaṃ tac chṛṇudhvaṃ nararṣabhāḥ
c iha prāyam upāsiṣye yūyaṃ vrajata vai gṛhān
e bhrātaraś caiva me sarve prayāntv adya puraṃ prati
a karṇaprabhṛtayaś caiva suhṛdo bāndhavāś ca ye
c duḥśāsanaṃ puraskṛtya prayāntv adya puraṃ prati
a na hy ahaṃ pratiyāsyāmi puraṃ śatrunirākṛtaḥ
c śatrumānāpaho bhūtvā suhṛdāṃ mānakṛt tathā
d kāmaṃ raṇaśirasy adya śatrubhir vai vimānitaḥ
d kāraṇair asmy abhihitaḥ śatrubhir vai vimānitaḥ
d akāraṇe 'smy abhijitaḥ śatrubhir vai vimānitaḥ
a sa suhṛcchokado bhūtvā śatrūṇāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ
c vāraṇāhvayam āsādya kiṃ vakṣyāmi janādhipam
a bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpo drauṇir viduraḥ saṃjayas tathā
c bāhlīkaḥ somadattaś ca ye cānye vṛddhasaṃmatāḥ
a brāhmaṇāḥ śreṇimukhyāś ca tathodāsīnavṛttayaḥ
c kiṃ māṃ vakṣyanti kiṃ cāpi prativakṣyāmi tān aham
a ripūṇāṃ śirasi sthitvā tathā vikramya corasi
c ātmadoṣāt paribhraṣṭaḥ kathaṃ vakṣyāmi tān aham
a durvinītāḥ śriyaṃ prāpya vidyām aiśvaryam eva ca
c tiṣṭhanti na ciraṃ bhadre yathāhaṃ madagarvitaḥ
a aho bata yathedaṃ me kaṣṭaṃ duścaritaṃ kṛtam
c svayaṃ durbuddhinā mohād yena prāpto 'smi saṃśayam
a tasmāt prāyam upāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum
c cetayāno hi ko jīvet kṛcchrāc chatrubhir uddhṛtaḥ
a śatrubhiś cāvahasito mānī pauruṣavarjitaḥ
c pāṇḍavair vikramāḍhyaiś ca sāvamānam avekṣitaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ cintāparigato duḥśāsanam athābravīt
c duḥśāsana nibodhedaṃ vacanaṃ mama bhārata
a pratīccha tvaṃ mayā dattam abhiṣekaṃ nṛpo bhava
c praśādhi pṛthivīṃ sphītāṃ karṇasaubalapālitām
a bhrātṝn pālaya visrabdhaṃ maruto vṛtrahā yathā
c bāndhavās tvopajīvantu devā iva śatakratum
a brāhmaṇeṣu sadā vṛttiṃ kurvīthāś cāpramādataḥ
c bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva bhavethās tvaṃ gatiḥ sadā
a jñātīṃś cāpy anupaśyethā viṣṇur devagaṇān iva
c guravaḥ pālanīyās te gaccha pālaya medinīm
a nandayan suhṛdaḥ sarvāñ śātravāṃś cāvabhartsayan
c kaṇṭhe cainaṃ pariṣvajya gamyatām ity uvāca ha
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā dīno duḥśāsano 'bravīt
c aśrukaṇṭhaḥ suduḥkhārtaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇipatya ca
e sagadgadam idaṃ vākyaṃ bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭham ātmanaḥ
a prasīdety apatad bhūmau dūyamānena cetasā
c duḥkhitaḥ pādayos tasya netrajaṃ jalam utsṛjan
a uktavāṃś ca naravyāghro naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati
c vidīryet sanagā bhūmir dyauś cāpi śakalībhavet
e ravir ātmaprabhāṃ jahyāt somaḥ śītāṃśutāṃ tyajet
a vāyuḥ śaighryam atho jahyād dhimavāṃś ca parivrajet
c śuṣyet toyaṃ samudreṣu vahnir apy uṣṇatāṃ tyajet
a na cāhaṃ tvad ṛte rājan praśāseyaṃ vasuṃdharām
c punaḥ punaḥ prasīdeti vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
d śatrūṇāṃ śokakṛd rājan suhṛdāṃ śokanāśanaḥ
e tvam eva naḥ kule rājā bhaviṣyasi śataṃ samāḥ
a evam uktvā sa rājendra sasvanaṃ praruroda ha
c pādau saṃgṛhya mānārhau bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya bhārata
a tathā tau duḥkhitau dṛṣṭvā duḥśāsanasuyodhanau
c abhigamya vyathāviṣṭaḥ karṇas tau pratyabhāṣata
a viṣīdathaḥ kiṃ kauravyau bāliśyāt prākṛtāv iva
c na śokaḥ śocamānasya vinivarteta kasya cit
a yadā ca śocataḥ śoko vyasanaṃ nāpakarṣati
c sāmarthyaṃ kiṃ tv ataḥ śoke śocamānau prapaśyathaḥ
e dhṛtiṃ gṛhṇīta mā śatrūñ śocantau nandayiṣyathaḥ
f dhṛtimanto jayaṃ śatrūñ śocantau nābhaviṣyatha
a kartavyaṃ hi kṛtaṃ rājan pāṇḍavais tava mokṣaṇam
c nityam eva priyaṃ kāryaṃ rājño viṣayavāsibhiḥ
e pālyamānās tvayā te hi nivasanti gatajvarāḥ

 karṇa uvāca
a duryodhana nibodhedaṃ yat tvā vakṣyāmi kaurava
b bhīṣmo 'smān nindati sadā pāṇḍavāṃś ca praśaṃsati
b tvaddveṣāc ca mahābāho mamāpi dveṣṭum arhati
b vigarhate ca māṃ nityaṃ tvatsamīpe nareśvara

b tvatsamakṣaṃ yad uktaṃ ca bhīṣmeṇāmitrakarśana

b saṃpaśyatu sudurbuddhir bhīṣmaḥ kurukulādhamaḥ
b anindyaṃ nindate yo hi apraśaṃsyaṃ praśaṃsati

b anujānīhi māṃ rājan dhruvo hi vijayas tava
b pratijānāmi te satyaṃ rājann āyudham ālabhe
