a pāsyāmi tāvat pānīyam iti pārtho vṛkodaraḥ
c tato 'bhyadhāvat pānīyaṃ pipāsuḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
d vāg uvācātha suspaṣṭam adṛśyā pāṇḍunandanam
 yakṣa uvāca
a mā tāta sāhasaṃ kārṣīr mama pūrvaparigrahaḥ
c praśnān uktvā tu kaunteya tataḥ piba harasva ca
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tato bhīmo yakṣeṇāmitatejasā
c avijñāyaiva tān praśnān pītvaiva nipapāta ha
d tataḥ kuntīsuto rājā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d tataś ciragatān bhrātṝn atha jñātuṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d cirāyamānān bahuśaḥ punaḥ punar uvāca ha
d mādreyau kiṃ cirāyete gāṇḍīvī kiṃ cirāyate
d mahābaladharas tatra kiṃ nu bhīmaś cirāyate
d gacchāmy eṣāṃ padaṃ draṣṭum iti kṛtvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a tataḥ kuntīsuto rājā vicintya puruṣarṣabhaḥ
b vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
b ātmanātmānam etac ca cintayann idam abravīt
b tataś ciragatān bhrātṝn atha rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
b cirāyamāṇān bahuśaḥ punaḥ punar uvāca ha
b kiṃ svid vanam idaṃ draṣṭuṃ kiṃ svid dṛṣṭo mṛgo bhavet
b prāhasan vā mahābhūtaṃ śaptās tenātha te 'patan
b na paśyanty atha vā vīrāḥ pānīyaṃ yatra te gatāḥ
b anviṣadbhir vane toyaṃ kālo 'yam iti pātitaḥ
b kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena nāyānti puruṣarṣabhāḥ
b gacchāmy eṣāṃ padaṃ draṣṭum iti kṛtvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
b vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
b evamādīni vākyāni vimṛṣan nṛpasattamaḥ
c samutthāya mahābāhur dahyamānena cetasā
a apetajananirghoṣaṃ praviveśa mahāvanam
c rurubhiś ca varāhaiś ca pakṣibhiś ca niṣevitam
a nīlabhāsvaravarṇaiś ca pādapair upaśobhitam
c bhramarair upagītaṃ ca pakṣibhiś ca mahāyaśāḥ
d mṛduśāḍvalasaṃkīrṇaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ manoharam
a sa gacchan kānane tasmin hemajālapariṣkṛtam
c dadarśa tat saraḥ śrīmān viśvakarmakṛtaṃ yathā
a upetaṃ nalinījālaiḥ sindhuvāraiś ca vetasaiḥ
c ketakaiḥ karavīraiś ca pippalaiś caiva saṃvṛtam
d tato dharmasutaḥ śrīmān bhrātṛdarśanalālasaḥ
e śramārtas tad upāgamya saro dṛṣṭvātha vismitaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a sa dadarśa hatān bhrātṝṃl lokapālān iva cyutān
c yugānte samanuprāpte śakrapratimagauravān
a viprakīrṇadhanurbāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā nihatam arjunam
c bhīmasenaṃ yamau cobhau nirviceṣṭān gatāyuṣaḥ
a sa dīrgham uṣṇaṃ niḥśvasya śokabāṣpapariplutaḥ
b tān dṛṣṭvā patitān bhrātṝn sarvāṃś cintāsamanvitaḥ
b dharmaputro mahābāhur vilalāpa suvistaram
b nanu tvayā mahābāho pratijñātaṃ vṛkodara
b suyodhanasya bhetsyāmi gadayā sakthinī raṇe
b vyarthaṃ tad adya me sarvaṃ tvayi vīre nipātite
b mahātmani mahābāho kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhane
b manuṣyasaṃbhavā vāco vidharmiṇyaḥ pratiśrutāḥ
b bhavatāṃ divyavācas tu tā bhavantu kathaṃ mṛṣā
b devāś cāpi yadāvocan sūtake tvāṃ dhanaṃjaya
b sahasrākṣād anavaraḥ kunti putras taveti vai
b uttare pāriyātre ca jagbur bhūtāni sarvaśaḥ
b vipranaṣṭāṃ śriyaṃ caiṣām āhartā punar añjasā
b nāsya jetā raṇe kaś cid ajetā naiṣa kasya cit
b so 'yaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ yātaḥ kathaṃ jiṣṇur mahābalaḥ
b ayaṃ mamāśāṃ saṃhatya śete bhūmau dhanaṃjayaḥ
b āśritya yaṃ vayaṃ nāthaṃ duḥkhāny etāni sehima
b raṇe 'pramattau vīrau ca sadā śatrunibarhaṇau
b kathaṃ ripuvaśaṃ yātau kuntīputrau mahābalau
b yau sarvāstrāpratihatau bhīmasenadhanaṃjayau
b aśmasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mama durhṛdaḥ
b yamau yad etau dṛṣṭvādya patitau nāvadīryate
b śāstrajñā deśakālajñās tapoyuktāḥ kriyānvitāḥ
b akṛtvā sadṛśaṃ karma kiṃ śedhvaṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
b avikṣataśarīrāś cāpy apramṛṣṭaśarāsanāḥ
b asaṃjñā bhuvi saṃgamya kiṃ śedhvam aparājitāḥ
b sānūn ivādreḥ saṃsuptān dṛṣṭvā bhrātṝn mahāmatiḥ
b sukhaṃ prasuptān prasvinnaḥ khinnaḥ kaṣṭāṃ daśāṃ gataḥ
b evam evedam ity uktvā dharmātmā sa nareśvaraḥ
b śokasāgaramadhyastho dadhyau kāraṇam ākulaḥ
b itikartavyatāṃ ceti deśakālavibhāgavit
b nābhipede mahābāhuś cintayāno mahāmatiḥ
b atha saṃstabhya dharmātmā tadātmānaṃ tapaḥsutaḥ
b evaṃ vilapya bahudhā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c buddhyā vicintayām āsa vīrāḥ kena nipātitāḥ
a naiṣāṃ śastraprahāro 'sti padaṃ nehāsti kasya cit
c bhūtaṃ mahad idaṃ manye bhrātaro yena me hatāḥ
e ekāgraṃ cintayiṣyāmi pītvā vetsyāmi vā jalam
f bhrātṝṇāṃ vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ samam eva mahātmanām
a syāt tu duryodhanenedam upāṃśuvihitaṃ kṛtam
c gāndhārarājaracitaṃ satataṃ jihmabuddhinā
a yasya kāryam akāryaṃ vā samam eva bhavaty uta
c kas tasya viśvased vīro durmater akṛtātmanaḥ
a atha vā puruṣair gūḍhaiḥ prayogo 'yaṃ durātmanaḥ
c bhaved iti mahābāhur bahudhā samacintayat
d ācāryaṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi kṛpaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ nu kim
d viduraṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi bṛhaspatisamaṃ naye
d ambāṃ ca kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi sadā duḥkhasya bhāginīm
d dṛṣṭvā māṃ bhrātṛbhir hīnaṃ pṛcchantīṃ putragṛddhinīm
d yadā tvaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvaiḥ śakratulyaparākramaiḥ
d sārdhaṃ vanaṃ gato vīraiḥ katham ekas tvam āgataḥ
a tasyāsīn na viṣeṇedam udakaṃ dūṣitaṃ yathā
b mṛtānām api caiteṣāṃ vikṛtaṃ naiva jāyate
c mukhavarṇāḥ prasannā me bhrātṝṇām ity acintayat
a ekaikaśaś caughabalān imān puruṣasattamān
c ko 'nyaḥ pratisamāseta kālāntakayamād ṛte
a etenādhyavasāyena tat toyam avagāḍhavān
c gāhamānaś ca tat toyam antarikṣāt sa śuśruve
 yakṣa uvāca
a ahaṃ bakaḥ śaivalamatsyabhakṣo
mayā nītāḥ pretavaśaṃ tavānujāḥ
c tvaṃ pañcamo bhavitā rājaputra
na cet praśnān pṛcchato vyākaroṣi
a mā tāta sāhasaṃ kārṣīr mama pūrvaparigrahaḥ
c praśnān uktvā tu kaunteya tataḥ piba harasva ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a rudrāṇāṃ vā vasūnāṃ vā marutāṃ vā pradhānabhāk
c pṛcchāmi ko bhavān devo naitac chakuninā kṛtam
a himavān pāriyātraś ca vindhyo malaya eva ca
c catvāraḥ parvatāḥ kena pātitā bhuvi tejasā
a atīva te mahat karma kṛtaṃ balavatāṃ vara
b vinighnatā maheṣvāsāṃś caturo 'pi mamānujān
c yan na devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
e viṣaheran mahāyuddhe kṛtaṃ te tan mahādbhutam
a na te jānāmi yat kāryaṃ nābhijānāmi kāṅkṣitam
c kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ sādhvasaṃ cāgataṃ mama
a yenāsmy udvignahṛdayaḥ samutpannaśirojvaraḥ
c pṛcchāmi bhagavaṃs tasmāt ko bhavān iha tiṣṭhati
 yakṣa uvāca
a yakṣo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te nāsmi pakṣī jalecaraḥ
c mayaite nihatāḥ sarve bhrātaras te mahaujasaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatas tām aśivāṃ śrutvā vācaṃ sa paruṣākṣarām
c yakṣasya bruvato rājann upakramya tadā sthitaḥ
d tato rājann apākramya tasmād deśād avasthitaḥ
a virūpākṣaṃ mahākāyaṃ yakṣaṃ tālasamucchrayam
c jvalanārkapratīkāśam adhṛṣyaṃ parvatopamam
a setum āśritya tiṣṭhantaṃ dadarśa bharatarṣabhaḥ
c meghagambhīrayā vācā tarjayantaṃ mahābalam
d uvāca yakṣaḥ kaunteyaṃ bhrātṛśokābhipīḍitam
 yakṣa uvāca
a ime te bhrātaro rājan vāryamāṇā mayāsakṛt
c balāt toyaṃ jihīrṣantas tato vai sūditā mayā
a na peyam udakaṃ rājan prāṇān iha parīpsatā
c pārtha mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīr mama pūrvaparigrahaḥ
e praśnān uktvā tu kaunteya tataḥ piba harasva ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a naivāhaṃ kāmaye yakṣa tava pūrvaparigraham
c kāmaṃ naitat praśaṃsanti santo hi puruṣāḥ sadā
a yadātmanā svam ātmānaṃ praśaṃset puruṣaḥ prabho
c yathāprajñaṃ tu te praśnān prativakṣyāmi pṛccha mām
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svid ādityam unnayati ke ca tasyābhitaś carāḥ
c kaś cainam astaṃ nayati kasmiṃś ca pratitiṣṭhati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brahmādityam unnayati devās tasyābhitaś carāḥ
c dharmaś cāstaṃ nayati ca satye ca pratitiṣṭhati
 yakṣa uvāca
a kena svic chrotriyo bhavati kena svid vindate mahat
c kena dvitīyavān bhavati rājan kena ca buddhimān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śrutena śrotriyo bhavati tapasā vindate mahat
c dhṛtyā dvitīyavān bhavati buddhimān vṛddhasevayā
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ devatvaṃ kaś ca dharmaḥ satām iva
c kaś caiṣāṃ mānuṣo bhāvaḥ kim eṣām asatām iva
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a svādhyāya eṣāṃ devatvaṃ tapa eṣāṃ satām iva
c maraṇaṃ mānuṣo bhāvaḥ parivādo 'satām iva
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ devatvaṃ kaś ca dharmaḥ satām iva
c kaś caiṣāṃ mānuṣo bhāvaḥ kim eṣām asatām iva
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a iṣvastram eṣāṃ devatvaṃ yajña eṣāṃ satām iva
c bhayaṃ vai mānuṣo bhāvaḥ parityāgo 'satām iva
 yakṣa uvāca
a kim ekaṃ yajñiyaṃ sāma kim ekaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajuḥ
c kā caikā vṛścate yajñaṃ kāṃ yajño nātivartate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a prāṇo vai yajñiyaṃ sāma mano vai yajñiyaṃ yajuḥ
c vāg ekā vṛścate yajñaṃ tāṃ yajño nātivartate
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svid āpatatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kiṃ svin nipatatāṃ varam
c kiṃ svit pratiṣṭhamānānāṃ kiṃ svit pravadatāṃ varam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a varṣam āpatatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bījaṃ nipatatāṃ varam
c gāvaḥ pratiṣṭhamānānāṃ putraḥ pravadatāṃ varaḥ
 yakṣa uvāca
a indriyārthān anubhavan buddhimāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
c saṃmataḥ sarvabhūtānām ucchvasan ko na jīvati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ pitṝṇām ātmanaś ca yaḥ
c na nirvapati pañcānām ucchvasan na sa jīvati
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svid gurutaraṃ bhūmeḥ kiṃ svid uccataraṃ ca khāt
c kiṃ svic chīghrataraṃ vāyoḥ kiṃ svid bahutaraṃ nṛṇām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mātā gurutarā bhūmeḥ pitā uccataraś ca khāt
c manaḥ śīghrataraṃ vāyoś cintā bahutarī nṛṇām
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svit suptaṃ na nimiṣati kiṃ svij jātaṃ na copati
c kasya svid dhṛdayaṃ nāsti kiṃ svid vegena vardhate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a matsyaḥ supto na nimiṣaty aṇḍaṃ jātaṃ na copati
c aśmano hṛdayaṃ nāsti nadī vegena vardhate
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svit pravasato mitraṃ kiṃ svin mitraṃ gṛhe sataḥ
c āturasya ca kiṃ mitraṃ kiṃ svin mitraṃ mariṣyataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sārthaḥ pravasato mitraṃ bhāryā mitraṃ gṛhe sataḥ
c āturasya bhiṣaṅ mitraṃ dānaṃ mitraṃ mariṣyataḥ
d yakṣa uvāca
d ko 'tithiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ kiṃ svid dharmaṃ sanātanam
d amṛtaṃ kiṃ svid rājendra kiṃ svit sarvam idaṃ jagat
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d atithiḥ sarvabhūtānām agniḥ somo gavāmṛtam
d sanātano 'mṛto dharmo vāyuḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svid eko vicarati jātaḥ ko jāyate punaḥ
c kiṃ svid dhimasya bhaiṣajyaṃ kiṃ svid āvapanaṃ mahat
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sūrya eko vicarati candramā jāyate punaḥ
c agnir himasya bhaiṣajyaṃ bhūmir āvapanaṃ mahat
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svid ekapadaṃ dharmyaṃ kiṃ svid ekapadaṃ yaśaḥ
c kiṃ svid ekapadaṃ svargyaṃ kiṃ svid ekapadaṃ sukham
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dākṣyam ekapadaṃ dharmyaṃ dānam ekapadaṃ yaśaḥ
c satyam ekapadaṃ svargyaṃ śīlam ekapadaṃ sukham
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ svid ātmā manuṣyasya kiṃ svid daivakṛtaḥ sakhā
c upajīvanaṃ kiṃ svid asya kiṃ svid asya parāyaṇam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a putra ātmā manuṣyasya bhāryā daivakṛtaḥ sakhā
c upajīvanaṃ ca parjanyo dānam asya parāyaṇam
 yakṣa uvāca
a dhanyānām uttamaṃ kiṃ svid dhanānāṃ kiṃ svid uttamam
c lābhānām uttamaṃ kiṃ svit kiṃ sukhānāṃ tathottamam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dhanyānām uttamaṃ dākṣyaṃ dhanānām uttamaṃ śrutam
c lābhānāṃ śreṣṭham ārogyaṃ sukhānāṃ tuṣṭir uttamā
 yakṣa uvāca
a kaś ca dharmaḥ paro loke kaś ca dharmaḥ sadāphalaḥ
c kiṃ niyamya na śocanti kaiś ca saṃdhir na jīryate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmas trayīdharmaḥ sadāphalaḥ
c mano yamya na śocanti sadbhiḥ saṃdhir na jīryate
 yakṣa uvāca
a kiṃ nu hitvā priyo bhavati kiṃ nu hitvā na śocati
c kiṃ nu hitvārthavān bhavati kiṃ nu hitvā sukhī bhavet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mānaṃ hitvā priyo bhavati krodhaṃ hitvā na śocati
c kāmaṃ hitvārthavān bhavati lobhaṃ hitvā sukhī bhavet
d yakṣa uvāca
d kimarthaṃ brāhmaṇe dānaṃ kimarthaṃ naṭanartake
d kimarthaṃ caiva bhṛtyeṣu kimarthaṃ caiva rājasu
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d dharmārthaṃ brāhmaṇe dānaṃ yaśorthaṃ naṭanartake
d bhṛtyeṣu bharaṇārthaṃ vai bhayārthaṃ caiva rājasu
d yakṣa uvāca
d kena svid āvṛto lokaḥ kena svin na prakāśate
d kena tyajati mitrāṇi kena svargaṃ na gacchati
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d ajñānenāvṛto lokas tamasā na prakāśate
d lobhāt tyajati mitrāṇi saṅgāt svargaṃ na gacchati
 yakṣa uvāca
a mṛtaḥ kathaṃ syāt puruṣaḥ kathaṃ rāṣṭraṃ mṛtaṃ bhavet
c śrāddhaṃ mṛtaṃ kathaṃ ca syāt kathaṃ yajño mṛto bhavet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mṛto daridraḥ puruṣo mṛtaṃ rāṣṭram arājakam
c mṛtam aśrotriyaṃ śrāddhaṃ mṛto yajñas tv adakṣiṇaḥ
 yakṣa uvāca
a kā dik kim udakaṃ proktaṃ kim annaṃ pārtha kiṃ viṣam
c śrāddhasya kālam ākhyāhi tataḥ piba harasva ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a santo dig jalam ākāśaṃ gaur annaṃ prārthanā viṣam
c śrāddhasya brāhmaṇaḥ kālaḥ kathaṃ vā yakṣa manyase
d yakṣa uvāca
d tapaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ ko damaś ca prakīrtitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kṣamā ca kā parā proktā kā ca hrīḥ parikīrtitā
d tapaḥ svadharmavartitvaṃ manaso damanaṃ damaḥ
d kṣamā dvaṃdvasahiṣṇutvaṃ hrīr akāryanivartanam
d yakṣa uvāca
d kiṃ jñānaṃ procyate rājan kaḥ śamaś ca prakīrtitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d dayā ca kā parā proktā kiṃ cārjavam udāhṛtam
d jñānaṃ tattvārthasaṃbodhaḥ śamaś cittapraśāntatā
d yakṣa uvāca
d dayā sarvasukhaiṣitvam ārjavaṃ samacittatā
d kaḥ śatrur durjayaḥ puṃsāṃ kaś ca vyādhir anantakaḥ
d kīdṛśaś ca smṛtaḥ sādhur asādhuḥ kīdṛśaḥ smṛtaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d krodhaḥ sudurjayaḥ śatrur lobho vyādhir anantakaḥ
d yakṣa uvāca
d sarvabhūtahitaḥ sādhur asādhur nirdayaḥ smṛtaḥ
d ko mohaḥ procyate rājan kaś ca mānaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kim ālasyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ kaś ca śokaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
d moho hi dharmamūḍhatvaṃ mānas tv ātmābhimānitā
d dharmaniṣkriyatālasyaṃ śokas tv ajñānam ucyate
d yakṣa uvāca
d kiṃ sthairyam ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ kiṃ ca dhairyam udāhṛtam
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d snānaṃ ca kiṃ paraṃ proktaṃ dānaṃ ca kim ihocyate
d svadharme sthiratā sthairyaṃ dhairyam indriyanigrahaḥ
d yakṣa uvāca
d snānaṃ manomalatyāgo dānaṃ vai bhūtarakṣaṇam
d kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pumāñ jñeyo nāstikaḥ kaś ca ucyate
d ko mūrkhaḥ kaś ca kāmaḥ syāt ko matsara iti smṛtaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d dharmajñaḥ paṇḍito jñeyo nāstiko mūrkha ucyate
d yakṣa uvāca
d kāmaḥ saṃsārahetuś ca hṛttāpo matsaraḥ smṛtaḥ
d ko 'haṃkāra iti proktaḥ kaś ca dambhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kiṃ tad daivaṃ paraṃ proktaṃ kiṃ tat paiśunyam ucyate
d mahājñānam ahaṃkāro dambho dharmadhvajocchrayaḥ
d daivaṃ dānaphalaṃ proktaṃ paiśunyaṃ paradūṣaṇam
d yakṣa uvāca
d dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca parasparavirodhinaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d eṣāṃ nityaviruddhānāṃ katham ekatra saṃgamaḥ
d yadā dharmaś ca bhāryā ca parasparavaśānugau
d yakṣa uvāca
d tadā dharmārthakāmānāṃ trayāṇām api saṃgamaḥ
d akṣayo narakaḥ kena prāpyate bharatarṣabha
d etan me pṛcchataḥ praśnaṃ tac chīghraṃ vaktum arhasi
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d brāhmaṇaṃ svayam āhūya yācamānam akiṃcanam
d paścān nāstīti yo brūyāt so 'kṣayaṃ narakaṃ vrajet
d vedeṣu dharmaśāstreṣu mithyā yo vai dvijātiṣu
d deveṣu pitṛdharmeṣu so 'kṣayaṃ narakaṃ vrajet
d vidyamāne dhane lobhād dānabhogavivarjitaḥ
d yakṣa uvāca
d paścān nāstīti yo brūyāt so 'kṣayaṃ narakaṃ vrajet
d rājan kulena vṛttena svādhyāyena śrutena vā
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d brāhmaṇyaṃ kena bhavati prabrūhy etat suniścitam
d śṛṇu yakṣa kulaṃ tāta na svādhyāyo na ca śrutam
d kāraṇaṃ hi dvijatve ca vṛttam eva na saṃśayaḥ
d vṛttaṃ yatnena saṃrakṣyaṃ brāhmaṇena viśeṣataḥ
d akṣīṇavṛtto na kṣīṇo vṛttatas tu hato hataḥ
d paṭhakāḥ pāṭhakāś caiva ye cānye śāstracintakāḥ
d sarve vyasanino mūrkhā yaḥ kriyāvān sa paṇḍitaḥ
d caturvedo 'pi durvṛttaḥ sa śūdrād atiricyate
d yakṣa uvāca
d yo 'gnihotraparo dāntaḥ sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ
d priyavacanavādī kiṃ labhate
d vimṛśitakāryakaraḥ kiṃ labhate
d bahumitrakaraḥ kiṃ labhate
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d dharme rataḥ kiṃ labhate kathaya
d priyavacanavādī priyo bhavati
d vimṛśitakāryakaro 'dhikaṃ jayati
d bahumitrakaraḥ sukhaṃ vasate
d yakṣa uvāca
d yaś ca dharmarataḥ sa gatiṃ labhate
d ko modate kim āścaryaṃ kaḥ panthāḥ kā ca vārtikā
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d vada me caturaḥ praśnān mṛtā jīvantu bāndhavāḥ
d pañcame 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā śākaṃ pacati sve gṛhe
d anṛṇī cāpravāsī ca sa vāricara modate
d ahany ahani bhūtāni gacchantīha yamālayam
d śeṣāḥ sthāvaram icchanti kim āścaryam ataḥ param
d tarko 'pratiṣṭhaḥ śrutayo vibhinnā
d naiko ṛṣir yasya mataṃ pramāṇam
d dharmasya tattvaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ
d mahājano yena gataḥ sa panthāḥ
d asmin mahāmohamaye kaṭāhe
d sūryāgninā rātridivendhanena
d māsartudarvīparighaṭṭanena
d bhūtāni kālaḥ pacatīti vārtā
 yakṣa uvāca
a vyākhyātā me tvayā praśnā yāthātathyaṃ paraṃtapa
c puruṣaṃ tv idānīm ākhyāhi yaś ca sarvadhanī naraḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a divaṃ spṛśati bhūmiṃ ca śabdaḥ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ
c yāvat sa śabdo bhavati tāvat puruṣa ucyate
a tulye priyāpriye yasya sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca
b samatvaṃ yasya sarveṣu sa vai puruṣa ucyate
b bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyeṣu niḥspṛhaḥ śāntamānasaḥ
c atītānāgate cobhe sa vai sarvadhanī naraḥ
 yakṣa uvāca
a vyākhyātaḥ puruṣo rājan yaś ca sarvadhanī naraḥ
c tasmāt tavaiko bhrātṝṇāṃ yam icchasi sa jīvatu
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śyāmo ya eṣa raktākṣo bṛhacchāla ivodgataḥ
c vyūḍhorasko mahābāhur nakulo yakṣa jīvatu
 yakṣa uvāca
a priyas te bhīmaseno 'yam arjuno vaḥ parāyaṇam
c sa kasmān nakulaṃ rājan sāpatnaṃ jīvam icchasi
a yasya nāgasahasreṇa daśasaṃkhyena vai balam
c tulyaṃ taṃ bhīmam utsṛjya nakulaṃ jīvam icchasi
a tathainaṃ manujāḥ prāhur bhīmasenaṃ priyaṃ tava
c atha kenānubhāvena sāpatnaṃ jīvam icchasi
a yasya bāhubalaṃ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ samupāśritāḥ
c arjunaṃ tam apāhāya nakulaṃ jīvam icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ
 tasmād dharmaṃ na tyajāmi mā no dharmo hato vadhīt
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ paramārthāc ca me matam
c ānṛśaṃsyaṃ cikīrṣāmi nakulo yakṣa jīvatu
a dharmaśīlaḥ sadā rājā iti māṃ mānavā viduḥ
c svadharmān na caliṣyāmi nakulo yakṣa jīvatu
d kuntī caiva tu mādrī ca dve bhārye tu pitur mama
d ubhe saputre syātāṃ vai iti me dhīyate matiḥ
a yathā kuntī tathā mādrī viśeṣo nāsti me tayoḥ
c mātṛbhyāṃ samam icchāmi nakulo yakṣa jīvatu
 yakṣa uvāca
a yasya te 'rthāc ca kāmāc ca ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paraṃ matam
c tasmāt te bhrātaraḥ sarve jīvantu bharatarṣabha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatas te yakṣavacanād udatiṣṭhanta pāṇḍavāḥ
c kṣutpipāse ca sarveṣāṃ kṣaṇe tasmin vyagacchatām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sarasy ekena pādena tiṣṭhantam aparājitam
c pṛcchāmi ko bhavān devo na me yakṣo mato bhavān
a vasūnāṃ vā bhavān eko rudrāṇām atha vā bhavān
c atha vā marutāṃ śreṣṭho vajrī vā tridaśeśvaraḥ
a mama hi bhrātara ime sahasraśatayodhinaḥ
c na taṃ yogaṃ prapaśyāmi yena syur vinipātitāḥ
a sukhaṃ prativibuddhānām indriyāṇy upalakṣaye
c sa bhavān suhṛd asmākam atha vā naḥ pitā bhavān
 yakṣa uvāca
a ahaṃ te janakas tāta dharmo mṛduparākrama
c tvāṃ didṛkṣur anuprāpto viddhi māṃ bharatarṣabha
a yaśaḥ satyaṃ damaḥ śaucam ārjavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
c dānaṃ tapo brahmacaryam ity etās tanavo mama
a ahiṃsā samatā śāntis tapaḥ śaucam amatsaraḥ
c dvārāṇy etāni me viddhi priyo hy asi sadā mama
a diṣṭyā pañcasu rakto 'si diṣṭyā te ṣaṭpadī jitā
c dve pūrve madhyame dve ca dve cānte sāṃparāyike
a dharmo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te jijñāsus tvām ihāgataḥ
c ānṛśaṃsyena tuṣṭo 'smi varaṃ dāsyāmi te 'nagha
d kāmakrodhau tu prathamau lobhamohau tu madhyamau
d ante bhayaviṣādau ca eṣā sā ṣaṭpadī smṛtā
a varaṃ vṛṇīṣva rājendra dātā hy asmi tavānagha
c ye hi me puruṣā bhaktā na teṣām asti durgatiḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a araṇīsahitaṃ yasya mṛga ādāya gacchati
c tasyāgnayo na lupyeran prathamo 'stu varo mama
 dharma uvāca
a araṇīsahitaṃ tasya brāhmaṇasya hṛtaṃ mayā
c mṛgaveṣeṇa kaunteya jijñāsārthaṃ tava prabho
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a dadānīty eva bhagavān uttaraṃ pratyapadyata
c anyaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varaṃ tvam amaropama
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a varṣāṇi dvādaśāraṇye trayodaśam upasthitam
c tatra no nābhijānīyur vasato manujāḥ kva cit
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a dadānīty eva bhagavān uttaraṃ pratyapadyata
c bhūyaś cāśvāsayām āsa kaunteyaṃ satyavikramam
a yady api svena rūpeṇa cariṣyatha mahīm imām
c na vo vijñāsyate kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
a varṣaṃ trayodaśaṃ cedaṃ matprasādāt kurūdvahāḥ
c virāṭanagare gūḍhā avijñātāś cariṣyatha
a yad vaḥ saṃkalpitaṃ rūpaṃ manasā yasya yādṛśam
c tādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ sarve chandato dhārayiṣyatha
a araṇīsahitaṃ cedaṃ brāhmaṇāya prayacchata
c jijñāsārthaṃ mayā hy etad āhṛtaṃ mṛgarūpiṇā
d pravṛṇīṣvāparaṃ saumya varam iṣṭaṃ dadāni te
d na tṛpyāmi naraśreṣṭha prayacchan vai varāṃs tava
a tṛtīyaṃ gṛhyatāṃ putra varam apratimaṃ mahat
c tvaṃ hi matprabhavo rājan viduraś ca mamāṃśabhāk
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a devadevo mayā dṛṣṭo bhavān sākṣāt sanātanaḥ
c yaṃ dadāsi varaṃ tuṣṭas taṃ grahīṣyāmy ahaṃ pitaḥ
a jayeyaṃ lobhamohau ca krodhaṃ cāhaṃ sadā vibho
c dāne tapasi satye ca mano me satataṃ bhavet
 dharma uvāca
a upapanno guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ svabhāvenāsi pāṇḍava
c bhavān dharmaḥ punaś caiva yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity uktvāntardadhe dharmo bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
c sametāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva sukhasuptā manasvinaḥ
a abhyetya cāśramaṃ vīrāḥ sarva eva gataklamāḥ
c āraṇeyaṃ dadus tasmai brāhmaṇāya tapasvine
a idaṃ samutthānasamāgamaṃ mahat
pituś ca putrasya ca kīrtivardhanam
c paṭhan naraḥ syād vijitendriyo vaśī
saputrapautraḥ śatavarṣabhāg bhavet
a na cāpy adharme na suhṛdvibhedane
parasvahāre paradāramarśane
c kadaryabhāve na ramen manaḥ sadā
nṛṇāṃ sadākhyānam idaṃ vijānatām
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a dharmeṇa te 'bhyanujñātāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ satyavikramāḥ
c ajñātavāsaṃ vatsyantaś channā varṣaṃ trayodaśam
e upopaviśya vidvāṃsaḥ sahitāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
a ye tadbhaktā vasanti sma vanavāse tapasvinaḥ
c tān abruvan mahātmānaḥ śiṣṭāḥ prāñjalayas tadā
e abhyanujñāpayiṣyantas taṃ nivāsaṃ dhṛtavratāḥ
a viditaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrair yathā vayam
c chadmanā hṛtarājyāś ca niḥsvāś ca bahuśaḥ kṛtāḥ
a uṣitāś ca vane kṛcchraṃ yatra dvādaśa vatsarān
c ajñātavāsasamayaṃ śeṣaṃ varṣaṃ trayodaśam
e tad vatsyāmo vayaṃ channās tad anujñātum arhatha
a suyodhanaś ca duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ
c jānanto viṣamaṃ kuryur asmāsv atyantavairiṇaḥ
e yuktācārāś ca yuktāś ca paurasya svajanasya ca
f durātmanāṃ hi kas teṣāṃ viśvāsaṃ gantum arhati
a api nas tad bhaved bhūyo yad vayaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
c samastāḥ sveṣu rāṣṭreṣu svarājyasthā bhavemahi
a ity uktvā duḥkhaśokārtaḥ śucir dharmasutas tadā
c saṃmūrchito 'bhavad rājā sāśrukaṇṭho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a tam athāśvāsayan sarve brāhmaṇā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
c atha dhaumyo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mahārthaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
a rājan vidvān bhavān dāntaḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ
c naivaṃvidhāḥ pramuhyanti narāḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
a devair apy āpadaḥ prāptāś channaiś ca bahuśas tathā
c tatra tatra sapatnānāṃ nigrahārthaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
a indreṇa niṣadhān prāpya giriprasthāśrame tadā
c channenoṣya kṛtaṃ karma dviṣatāṃ balanigrahe
a viṣṇunāśvaśiraḥ prāpya tathādityāṃ nivatsyatā
c garbhe vadhārthaṃ daityānām ajñātenoṣitaṃ ciram
a prāpya vāmanarūpeṇa pracchannaṃ brahmarūpiṇā
c baler yathā hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ vikramais tac ca te śrutam
a aurveṇa vasatā channam ūrau brahmarṣiṇā tadā
c yatkṛtaṃ tāta lokeṣu tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
a pracchannaṃ cāpi dharmajña hariṇā vṛtranigrahe
c vajraṃ praviśya śakrasya yatkṛtaṃ tac ca te śrutam
a hutāśanena yac cāpaḥ praviśya channam āsatā
c vibudhānāṃ kṛtaṃ karma tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
a evaṃ vivasvatā tāta channenottamatejasā
c nirdagdhāḥ śatravaḥ sarve vasatā bhuvi sarvaśaḥ
a viṣṇunā vasatā cāpi gṛhe daśarathasya vai
c daśagrīvo hataś channaṃ saṃyuge bhīmakarmaṇā
a evam ete mahātmānaḥ pracchannās tatra tatra ha
c ajayañ śātravān yuddhe tathā tvam api jeṣyasi
a tathā dhaumyena dharmajño vākyaiḥ saṃparitoṣitaḥ
c śāstrabuddhyā svabuddhyā ca na cacāla yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a athābravīn mahābāhur bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
c rājānaṃ balināṃ śreṣṭho girā saṃpariharṣayan
a avekṣayā mahārāja tava gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
c dharmānugatayā buddhyā na kiṃ cit sāhasaṃ kṛtam
a sahadevo mayā nityaṃ nakulaś ca nivāritau
c śaktau vidhvaṃsane teṣāṃ śatrughnau bhīmavikramau
a na vayaṃ tat prahāsyāmo yasmin yokṣyati no bhavān
c bhavān vidhattāṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣipraṃ jeṣyāmahe parān
a ity ukte bhīmasenena brāhmaṇāḥ paramāśiṣaḥ
c prayujyāpṛcchya bharatān yathāsvān svān yayur gṛhān
a sarve vedavido mukhyā yatayo munayas tathā
c āśīr uktvā yathānyāyaṃ punar darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a saha dhaumyena vidvāṃsas tathā te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
c utthāya prayayur vīrāḥ kṛṣṇām ādāya bhārata
a krośamātram atikramya tasmād deśān nimittataḥ
c śvobhūte manujavyāghrāś channavāsārtham udyatāḥ
a pṛthakśāstravidaḥ sarve sarve mantraviśāradāḥ
c saṃdhivigrahakālajñā mantrāya samupāviśan
